34a7(rgyud): 'byung ba dang / de kho na nyid kyi don bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// //de nas mchod pa'i cho ga 'di'i/ /nges par bstan pa bdag gis bshad//
34b1(rgyud): thim dang longs spyod dag gis ni/ /yid 'phrog yang dag mchod pa'o/ /zla ba nyi ma me tog gis/ /sku yi rgyal po nyid la mchod/ /'dod pa 'di ni dpral ba ru/ /mar ngo tshes kyi
34b2(rgyud): dang po dbang / /yid las de ru 'dod par 'gyur/ /nges par a yi thig le las/ /thim pa 'di yis tshes gnyis pa/ /bdud rtsi 'di ni smin phrag tu/ /dga' bas de las 'da'
34b3(rgyud): par 'gyur/ /A li'i thig le gnyis pas so/ /bde ba'i mkhur tshos gnyis nas su/ /tshes gsum pa la longs spyod 'gyur/ /de la rnam par smin pas 'gro/ /A li'i thigs
34b4(rgyud): pa gsum pas so/ /bdud rtsi kos ko'i gnas su ni/ /tshes bzhi pa la thim pa 'byung / /de la mgu ba las dga' ba/ /bzhi pa'i ye shes thig les so/ /bde ba yi ni mgrin
34b5(rgyud): gnas su/ /tshes lnga pa la longs spyod 'byung / /de la dgyes pas rgyas par 'gyur/ /thig le lnga pa'i khengs pas so/ /'dod pa brang gi gnas su ni/ /tshes drug pa la thim
34b6(rgyud): pa 'byung / /de la bsam gtan las drag po/ /thig le drug la gang bas so/ /bde ba'i nu ma'i gnas su ni/ /tshes bdun pa la dbang ni 'byung / /de la bdun pas 'byung
34b7(rgyud): ba yin| |thigs pa bdun pas khengs pas so/ /'dod pa'i rtsi ba logs gnas su ni/ /tshes brgyad pa la thim pa 'byung / /de la chags pas mchog gi dga'/ /thig le brgyad
35a1(rgyud): ba gang bas so/ /bde ba'i lte ba'i gnas su ni/ /tshes dgu pa la longs spyod 'byung / /de la rnam smin las 'bar 'byung / /thig le dgu
35a2(rgyud): pa khengs pas so/ /'dod pa'i mdoms kyi gnas su ni/ /tshes bcu pa la thim pa 'byung / /de la brtan las thig ler 'gyur/ /thig ler bcu pa gang bas so/ /bde
35a3(rgyud): ba'i spyi bo'i gnas su ni/ /bcu gcig pa la dbang ni 'byung / /de yi stobs las myos par 'gyur/ /bcu gcig thig le khengs pas so/ /bde ba'i rdo rje'i rtsa gnas
35a4(rgyud): su| |bcu gnyis tshes la thim pa 'byung / /de la 'od las dga' bral dga'/ /bcu gnyis thig le gang bas so/ /rgyas pa'i rdo rje'i dbus gnas su/ /bcu gsum
35a5(rgyud): tshes la longs spyod 'byung / /de las snang bas ur tar 'byung / /A li'i bcu gsum thig les so/ /bde ba'i mdud pa'i gnas su ni/ /bcu bzhi pa la thim ba shar//
35a6(rgyud): de la reg bya las chur 'gyur/ /bcu bzhi'i zla ba'i thig les so/ /bde ba'i nor bu'i dbus su ni/ /nya gang ba las dbang ni shar/ /de las phrad las gnyid du 'gyur/
35a7(rgyud): bco lnga pa yi thig les so/ /dbang po bcu drug pa yi cha/ /gzhan ni gang du'ang mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin du ni so sor gzugs/ /rang bzhin de ni yod pa yin/ /dga'
35b1(rgyud): ba'i bye brag lhan skyes dga'/ /bcu drug pa yi don du yod/ /char yang bcu drug 'di ru ni/ /yod pa ma yin med pa min/ /de bzhin du ni ye shes che/ /lha yi dbang phyug rang
35b2(rgyud): bzhin no/ /g.yas g.yon yan lag gnyis su ni/ /khu ba yi ni 'byung bar dran/ /mar ngo de bzhin yar ngo yi/ /'dod pa yis ni 'byung ba'i tshe/ /bcu dang lnga yis gnyis med
35b3(rgyud): sbyor| |bde ba 'di yi 'byung ba min/ /de nyid gsum shes bcu dang lnga/ /shes rab dang bral bde ba che/ /bla ma'i zhal snga'i bka' drin gyis/ /gnyis su med pa'i bde ba shes/ /rtag tu
35b4(rgyud): mos pa yis ni shar/ /bsam gtan gyis ni shes pa'o/ /bcu drug gi ni yi ge'i gzugs/ /A li'i thig le rang ngo bo/ /A sogs yig 'bru'i char yang 'byung / /A li'i
35b5(rgyud): ye shes bde bdag nyid/ /ka sogs yig 'bru'i char yang 'byung / /kA li'i ye shes bde ba che/ /A li kA li gnyis sbyor las/ /mchod sbyin gyis ni rab mchod bya/ /mchod
35b6(rgyud): pa yang ni de bzhin te/ /gsang ba'i pad+ma'i snying gar ro/ /gsang ba de nyid gsum zhes bya/ /la la mda' la gnyis sbyor las/ /mchod sbyin gyi ni rab mchog bya/ /mchod
35b7(rgyud): pa yang ni de bzhin te/ /gsang ba'i pad+ma'i snying gar ro/ /gsang ba de nyid gsum zhes bya/ /thim dang longs spyod sogs bye brag/ /thim pa dang ni longs spyod dbang / /dga'
36a1(rgyud): ba gsum du bstan pa'o/ /de yi thig le gsum zhes bya/ /sku gsum yig gsum bdag nyid do/ /tshangs pa'i bu ga de bzhin mgrin/ /
36a2(rgyud): snying ga ru ni thig le gsum/ /de yis bskyed pa'i rim shes bya/ /mdud pa'i nang ni man chad do/ /bzlog ba yi ni thig le gsum/ /gyen du rdzogs pa'i rim pa yin/ /
36a3(rgyud): rgyu 'bras rnam dag bye brag tu/ /thig le drug ni rab tu grags/ /dri med ye shes char yang drug /de ni rnam shes sbyor drug bshad/ /de yi dbus su de nyid bzhugs/ /lhan
36a4(rgyud): skyes dga' ba'i bde ba che/ /mchod pa'i las sbyor che ba yis/ /the tshom med par rnyed par 'gyur/ /mchod pa'i dam tshig dus su ni/ /gsang ba'i sgra ni 'bad pa yis/ /
36a5(rgyud): gang zhig 'dod pa grub pa che/ /dam tshig sems dpar brjod par bya/ /la la rdo rje la la pad/ /A li zla ba kA li nyi/ /ri bong can ni khu ba'o/ /nyi ma khrag tu rab tu grags/ /
36a6(rgyud): khu ba ga pur shes bya ste/ /khrag ni si h+la zhes su dran/ /sbrul ni nag po gnyis ka yin/ /'dus pa phung por brjod pa'o/ /na ra ka pA la ru brjod/ /chags pa chad du rab tu
36a7(rgyud): grags| |zhe sdang de ni sha yin te/ /gti mug tshod ma ru ni dran/ /nga rgyal 'di ru sha chen po/ /zan ni phrag dog nyid du dran/ /gci 'khor bshad ba mya ngan 'das/ /mtho ris
36b1(rgyud): gzugs zhes dran pa'o/ /mi yi yul ni sgra zhes bstan/ /sa 'og ro ru bshad pa'o/ /dri ni ri rab rtse mo'o/ /gling bzhi po ni reg bya 'o| |sa ni pha ru rab tu grags/ /chu ni sring mo
36b2(rgyud): yin par dran/ /me ni yum ste bu mo ni/ /rlung du rab tu grags pa'o/ /nam mkha' sgyug mor shes par bya/ /bcings pa med pa nam mkha' yin/ /skal ldan ma yin krung
36b3(rgyud): krung mo| |skal ldan dang pa 'on pa mtshe/ /'on pa min pa rgya mtshor brjod/ /dbang bskur grong khyer pa ru dran/ /dbang bskur min pa grong pa bzhin/ /gsang ba snying ga yin
36b4(rgyud): par brjod/ /khyer shog dri ma med par brjod/ /gsal byed nam mkha' yin par dran/ /gzhang kha dgyes pa DaM Di 'bras/ /ma rungs lcags su kun tu grags/ /stan ni pad+ma
36b5(rgyud): yin par brjod/ /sbyin pa ge sar dran pa 'o/ /gzhon nu ma ni mtshe 'ur grags/ /rgan mo gtsang por dran pa'o/ /gnas pa rna ba zhes su brjod/ /'gro ba 'di ni urbu da/ /dus ni
36b6(rgyud): dbyug pa bde ba nyid/ /thal ba min dga' dga' stobs so/ /de dag tshogs kyi mchod sbyin gyi/ /dus su 'bad pas brjod par bya/ /khrung khrung la sogs 'jug min phyir/ /
36b7(rgyud): gsang ba'i tshig ni smra bar bya/ /rnal 'byor ma 'am rnal 'byor pa/ /shin tu dgyes pas gsang skad smra/ /dpal ye shes thig le las/ mchod pa'i rim pa dang / gsang
37a1(rgyud): ba'i skad ces bya ba'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o/ / //dbang bskur la sogs nges bstan ni/ /lha yi dbang phyug ngas
37a2(rgyud): 'dir bshad/ /rgyud gsum gyi ni rim pa yis/ /dbang drug dbye ba bstan pa'o/ /chu yi dbang bskur dbu rgyan dag /bya ba'i rgyud las rab tu grags/ /rdo rje dril bu de bzhin
37a3(rgyud): ming / spyod pa'i rgyud las rab tu gsal/ /phyir mi ldog pa yi ni dbang / /rnal 'byor rgyud du gsal bar byas/ /de ni drug gi bye brag dbang / /de ni slob dpon dbang zhes
37a4(rgyud): bya| |rnal 'byor bla ma yi ni mtshan/ /gsang ba yi ni dbang rgyal bshad/ /shes rab ye shes bla na med/ /bzhi pa de ltar de bzhin no/ /dgu yi bye brag dbang la
37a5(rgyud): sogs| |'bras bu'i phyir na brgyad dbyer 'gyur/ /bzhi pa de ltar de bzhin brjod/ /shes rab ye shes de yi 'bras/ /dngos po so sor shes mi bya/ /de ltar zhes ni tshad
37a6(rgyud): med do| |de bas 'bras bu'i tshig don ni/ /rigs pa ma yin pa yi sems/ /de bzhin re zhig dga' ba'i sems/ /de bzhin re zhig dga' ba'i rim/ /ji ltar bur ni yod
37a7(rgyud): par 'gyur/ /dga' ba lus su grags pa ste/ /mchog tu dga' ba 'di ru gang / /yid ni dga' bral shes par bya/ /lhan skyes de ni gang na yod/ /kun na yod pa'i
37b1(rgyud): ye shes sems/ /sems las gzhan ni yod pa min/ /gang zhig ci zhig 'di thams cad/ /de ni thams cad sems yin no/ /sems las thams cad 'byung ba ste/ /sems
37b2(rgyud): kyis yongs su 'das pa'o/ /lus kyi mgo bo dga' ba'i gnas/ /ngag gi mgrin pa mchog tu dga'/ /sems ni snying gar shes bya ba/ /chags pa'i dga' ba rtag tu shar/ /
37b3(rgyud): lus rgyu 'bras bu de ni ngag /ngag ni rgyu ste 'bras bu yid/ /yid nyid yongs su shes pa ni/ /'bras bu de ni don dam par/ /de nyid gsum bdag ye shes gang / /rtsa gsum
37b4(rgyud): nang gi dbus na bzhugs/ /gnas gsum khyab pa skye ba med/ /'od gsum srid pa gsum dang bral/ /'od rab gnas ni rab kyi mchog /de ni bzhi pa mchog gi dbang / /
37b5(rgyud): bdun gnyis bye brag tu ni yod/ /yan lag rab kyi mdor bsdus la/ /chu yi dbang bskur dga' ba'o/ /gsang ba'i dbang bskur mgrin pa ru/ /mchog tu dga' ba'i bdag
37b6(rgyud): nyid mchog / shes rab ye shes kyi ni dbang / /snying ga ru ni dga' bral dga'/ /gsang ba pad+ma'i lte ba ru/ /bzhi pa'i rang bzhin bdag nyid do/ /de ltar dbang ni bzhi ru dbye/ /
37b7(rgyud): bskyed pa'i rim pa'i phyogs yin no/ /chu yi dbang ni mdoms su ste/ /sna tshogs 'bras bu sbyin pa'o/ /gsang ba'i dbang ni gnyis pa ste/ /rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu
38a1(rgyud): ster| |rdo rje yi ni rtsa ba'i gnas/ /rtsa ba dang ni mdoms kyi 'og /shes rab ye shes kyi ni dbang / /mdud pa'i gnas su rtag tu dran/ /dbang
38a2(rgyud): rnams kun gyi bla ma'i bla/ /rnam par 'joms pa'i 'bras bu ste/ /shes rab ye shes nor bu'i khar/ /shes rab pad+ma'i yid 'gro'i phyir/ /rlung ma dang ni gnyid skyed rtsa/ /gnyis
38a3(rgyud): ka rgyas pa yis ni bde/ /gyen gyi lam gyis bzlog par bya/ /mdud pa'i nang gi gnas su 'gro/ /de ltar bzhi pa rab tu bstan/ /mtshan nyid dang bral 'bras bur grags/ /
38a4(rgyud): mdud ba'i gnas su rim pa yis/ /tshangs pa'i sprul pa snying man chad/ /de tsam du ni lhan skyes dga'/ /rlabs dang bral ba dpe med do/ /de ni de kun don dam par/ /dbang
38a5(rgyud): gi ye shes nges bstan to/ /rdo rje ka ba de bzhin gsang / /sdom dang sdom pa'i rgya mtsho dang / /rigs chen ye shes snying po dang / /kye rdor 'jigs byed rdo rje dang / /mtshan
38a6(rgyud): dang gsang ba 'dus pa ru/ /lha yi dbang phyug bdag gis sbas/ /khyod kyis ngor mdzad dbang gi don/ /rgyud 'di ru ni rab tu gsal/ /rtog ge ba dang rgan po dang / /dge
38a7(rgyud): slong mos par gnas pa la/ /yang dag lam shes slob dpon gyis/ /de rnams de nyid bshad mi bya/ /a yi yig 'bru dga' ba yin/ /b+hi yi yig 'bru mchog tu
38b1(rgyud): dga'| |She yi yig 'bru dga' bral dga'/ /ka yi yig 'bru lhan skyes so/ /gang du yang ni mi dmigs shing / /a ni skye med rang bzhin te/ /kun gyi rgyu ni yin phyir ro/ /She
38b2(rgyud): yi yig 'brur yang dag brjod/ /gtsug tor gsang ba'i pad+mar b+hi/ /bskur dang khrus ni byed pa'i phyir/ /ka ni rnam rtog dngos por grags/ /'gro ba chad pa'i bdag nyid do/ /
38b3(rgyud): gsang ba'i pad+ma'i snying ga a/ /rtsa kun gyis ni 'bigs pa gang / /de phyir mngon par dga' ba mchog /b+hi yi yig 'bru thig le 'bigs/ /She bde ye shes kun brtag bral/
38b4(rgyud): yang dag don gyis gsal bar byed/ /dang po'i dga' ba rgyu yi dngos/ /a yi yig 'bru mchog gi gnas/ /mchog dga' dga' bral dga' bar grags/ /dbang bskur
38b5(rgyud): rab tu grags pa'o/ /de gnyis dbus su de nyid bzhugs/ /rang bzhin dga' ba bzhi dang bral/ /mngon par dga' dang dga' bral dga'i/ /gang zhig rang bzhin mi shes na//
38b6(rgyud): dpal ldan rdo rje sems dpa' yis/ /sangs rgyas yin yang mi bstod do/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad kyi/ /thams cad khyab par mnga' bdag bdag /sangs rgyas thams cad
38b7(rgyud): rgyal chen po/ /sangs rgyas thams cad yid ltar mgyogs/ /thams cad kun gyi dbang phyug bdag /'byung ba kun gyi bdag nyid do/ /dpal ye shes thig le las/ dbang
39a1(rgyud): bskur ba'i nges pa bstan pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste bcu gsum pa'o/ / //de nas yang ni bshad bya ba/ /nang gi mtshan nyid
39a2(rgyud): sbyin sreg go / kha ni hom khung dgang gzar lag /tshul ni rang byung me yin no/ /nga rgyal phrag dog bsreg rdzas yin/ /bzlas pa de ni kham du brjod/ /sa 'og dang ni sring mo
39a3(rgyud): mar| |de yi bsreg rdzas rab tu dbul/ /ye shes bdud rtsi rnam dag pas/ /phrag dog la sogs bsang gtor bya/ /dum bu gsum pa'i snod mdun du/ /phrag dog bdud rtsis
39a4(rgyud): rab tu tshim/ /rdor gsum ye shes sa bon gyi/ /dag byas dkar byas rim gyis so/ /rlung mer bskul byas 'bar bar byas/ /bdud rtsi mchog ni zhu bar byed/ /ha yi ma mo'i
39a5(rgyud): sngags kyis ni/ /'khor lo drug ni rab tshim bya/ /ri bo'i ma mo dang bral bas/ /phyi nang rtag tu rab tshim bya/ /de lta'i sbyin sreg las kyis ni/ /lha yi sku ru nges par
39a6(rgyud): 'gyur| |lha yi sku ni bde chen po/ /don dam par ni shes pa'o/ /lha yi yig 'bru yis 'byung gang / /de ni don dam sbyin sreg go /dpa' bo gnyis kyi mnyam sbyor ba/ /
39a7(rgyud): dus kyi gang du steng dbang po/ /lte snying bde ba'i pad+ma yi/ /rtag bar shes rab mas ni brjod/ /de ni sbyin sreg bsreg rdzas ldan/ /mngon par dga' las 'byung ba'o/ /kun
39b1(rgyud): rdzob rnam pa'i gzugs su ni/ /shes rab thabs ni phrad pa las/ /sbyin sreg las kyi 'bras bu mchog /myur ba ru ni rnyed pa 'o/ /hom khung d+ha la dgyes pa che/ /la la 'di
39b2(rgyud): ru dgang gzar dran/ /blugs gzar gsang pad sna yi rtse/ /mar ni khu ba zla 'od mnyam/ /gsang pad zlum po'i rnam pa bzhin/ /mar gyi snod du rnam par grags/ /blugs gzar
39b3(rgyud): dgang gzar mar gyi snod/ /rtsa gsum du ni brjod pa'o/ /bsrub dang srub pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /rlung ma dang ni gnyid ma gnyis/ /gcig pa'i dngos po yang dag pas/ /ye shes
39b4(rgyud): me ni mchog tu 'bar/ /pad+ma'i 'khor lo drug rim pas/ /gzhan min bde chen man chad do/ /mchog gi bdud rtsi rgyun ni 'dzag /ji ltar mkha' las chu 'bab pa/ /rtsa yi
39b5(rgyud): dra ba du ma yis/ /'khor lo drug snying khyab pa'o/ /sku gsum ye shes rdo rje mchog /rtag tu bsreg rdzas mchod par bya/ /me yi kha ru dgang gzar ni/ /mar gyis bkang pa
39b6(rgyud): dbul bar bya/ /me ni mchog tu dga' ba ste/ /rnam rtog hom shing tshig par byed/ /mdud pa'i hom khung gi ni me/ /de ni mchog tu dga' rang bzhin/ /zhi ba'i zlum po'i
39b7(rgyud): rnam pa bzhin/ /longs spyod dang ni grol ba bzhin/ /sku yi rdo rje rin chen khar/ /gsung gi rdo rje dbus kyi dkyil/ /thugs kyi rdo rje mdud snying po/ /dga' ba yis ni mchod par
40a1(rgyud): bya| |gsung gi rdo rje blugs gzar mchog / dga' bral dga' ba sku rdo rje/ /lhan skyes dga' ba'i ye shes kyi/ /dgang blugs kyis ni mchod
40a2(rgyud): par bya| |bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pas/ bye ba phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis kyi grangs kun brgyal ba dang / sa la 'gyel bar gyur to/ /de nas
40a3(rgyud): yun ring po zhig nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba la 'dir ye shes yod dam ci zhes yang ya mtshan du gyur to/ /yang de'i dus su bcom
40a4(rgyud): l dan 'das mas phyag rgya chen pos dam por 'khyud nas ma mchu btung ba'i bdud rtsi'i mchod sbyin phul te gsang ba'i pad+ma'i bskor ba dam po'i snyim pa mnyam par sbyor ba
40a5(rgyud): bcings nas gus pas zhus pa/ sangs rgyas kun gyi bla ma mgon/ /ye shes zab mo dri ma med/ /ci yi don phyir de'i lta'i tshig /'khor kun gyi ni nang du gsungs/ /lhan
40a6(rgyud): cig skyes dga'i ye shes gang / /dgang blugs kyis ni mchod pa la/ /bdag kyang 'dir ni bcom ldan 'das/ /the tshom chen po skyes par gyur/ /gsang ba yi ni gsang ba
40a7(rgyud): mchog / rnal 'byor ma rgyud du ma ru/ /mgon pos gang du'ang ma gsungs so/ /de tsam yang ni brdar ma mdzad/ /lhan cig la ni ye shes yod/ /ma gsungs bdag gis
40b1(rgyud): thos ma lags/ /de ring de ltar the tshom dag /mnga' bdag chen pos gcad du gsol/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ a la la rab tu ngo mtshar to/ /lhan cig
40b2(rgyud): skyes pa'i dga' ba la ci'i phyir ye shes med/ /dad pa chen po dang brtson 'grus can dang ye shes dang ldan pa yang rmongs par 'gyur na/ ye shes med pas lhan cig skyes pa'i
40b3(rgyud): dga' ba ji ltar rnyed/ de bzhin du yang 'dir gzhan pa de ma yin pa'i dpe nyon cig /ji ltar/ du ba las ni mer shes te/ /chu skyar las ni chu yin no/ /byang chub sems
40b4(rgyud): dpa' blo ldan gyi/ /rigs ni mtshan ma rnams las shes/ /de bzhin du lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba rnyed pa'i don gyi phyir skyabs sbyin gyi ngo bo ye shes so/ /ye shes ni/ tshor
40b5(rgyud): bar yongs su shes pas spyod pa'i bdag nyid kyi thabs de ni/ ye shes su bdag gis bshad do/ /de bzhin du ji ltar mun nag tu rin po che phra mo'i phra mo yod pa de ni/ rin
40b6(rgyud): po che mar me ma yin pas rnyed par mi 'gyur ba de bas na/ blo gros can gyis rin po che mar me khyer nas tshol bar byed la/ gal te de rnyed na de ci mar me las rin po che
40b7(rgyud): skye'am| 'on kyang mar me'i thabs kyis mthong ba dang rnyed pa de bzhin du ye shes kyi mar mes lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'i rin po che'i rgyal po mthong zhing rnyed kyi/ ye shes
41a1(rgyud): las skye ba ni/ ma yin no/ /de bas na ye shes kyi sgra 'di ni/ don mi shes pa'i phyir mkhas pas 'dir the tshom mi bya'o/ /dpal ye shes
41a2(rgyud): thig le las/ mchod pa sna tshogs nges par bstan pa dang / nang gi sbyin sreg ces bya ba'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// //de nas gtor ma chen po'i
41a3(rgyud): las kyi nges par bstan pa'i don bshad do/ /sems can thams cad bsrung don du/ /'bad pa yis ni gtor ma sbyin/ /b+ha yi yig 'bru b+ha gar brjod/ /liM gi yig
41a4(rgyud): 'bru liM gar bstan/ /ling+ga gar mnyam sbyor bas/ /sems can thams cad kyi ni tshogs/ /de las 'byung bar 'gyur ba ste/ /lha mo de nyid shes bya ste/ /thams cad sgra
41a5(rgyud): ni dga' ba yin/ /sems can don ni mchog tu 'gyur/ /tshogs pa de ni dga' bral dga'/ /gtor ma de yis bstung ba'i don/ /dur khrod yang ni chu yi dogs//
41a6(rgyud): ye shes ldan pas sbyin par bya/ /dur khrod dbugs dbyung gi ni gnas/ /gsang ba'i pad+ma'i bya gdong ngo / /sha yi yig 'bru pad+ma dag /wa yi yig 'bru lte bar
41a7(rgyud): yin| |sa yi yig 'bru bde ngo bo/ /na yi yig 'bru bcos pa med/ /dri med ma yi zhu ba'i dga'/ /thig le'i ngo bo yi ge bral/ /dur khrod dbugs dbyung du ni grags/ /
41b1(rgyud): zhal bzang bdag gis bshad pa yin/ /chu yi ngogs ni rin chen kha/ /yang na de ni rtog med ma/ /'byung ba rnams ni bsrung ba'i phyir/ /de la gtor ma sbyin par bya/ /'byung ba khu ba
41b2(rgyud): ru ni grags/ /khu ba sems can 'di ru bstan/ /sems can snying po ye shes bde/ /b+ha ga liM ga gnyis las 'byung / /de las bsrung ba'i don du ni/ /gtor ma kun tu 'bad de
41b3(rgyud): sbyin| |dpal ye shes thig le las/ 'byung ba bsrung ba'i don du gtor ma chen po nges par bstan pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o// //de nas bcom
41b4(rgyud): ldan 'das ma phyag rgya chen pos byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha'i dbang phyug la bos te/ /kye dpa' bo chen po lha'i dbang phyug /'dir de kho na nyid
41b5(rgyud): gsum gyi bdag nyid dang / zla ba'i bde ba mchog dang / phyag rgya chen po'i mtha'i rgyas pa nges par bstan pa'i don du rang gi ngo bo nyid dang / tshad dang / rnam pa de dag bcom
41b6(rgyud): ldan 'das kyi thad du legs par zhus shig / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha'i dbang phyug gis gsol pa/ mchog gi dbang phyug ma/ mchog gi bde
41b7(rgyud): ba chen po'i 'od kyi rang gi ngo bo/ /sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yum/ /sdig pa thams cad zad par byed ma/ /bdud thams cad 'joms par byed ma/ /dga' ba thams cad dang /
42a1(rgyud): skad cig dang / ro dang / ye shes kyi mthar khyab pa/ lte ba'i pad+ma'i dbus nas bzhengs nas bde ba chen pos rab tu tshim par mdzad ma/ bcom
42a2(rgyud): ldan 'das/ ma bzang mo mchog /dri ma me dpa'i sku nam mkha'i ngo bo legs so legs so/ /yang byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po lha'i dbang phyug gis bcom
42a3(rgyud): ldan 'das mas gsungs pa khong du chud pas mchog tu dga' ba chen po'i sems kyis rdzu 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul rmad du byung ba chen po sprul te rnam pa du ma sna tshogs
42a4(rgyud): pa'i mchod pa chen pos mchod pa byas nas sngar gyi dri ba de dag zhus so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de kho na nyid gsum gyi bdag nyid dang / zla ba'i bde ba mchog dang / phyag rgya
42a5(rgyud): chen po'i mtha'i rgyas pa nges par bstan pa'i don du rang gi ngo bo nyid dang / tshad dang / rnam pa de dag bdag la bka' stsal du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
42a6(rgyud): stsal ba/ dri ba shin tu zab las zab/ /thams cad mkhyen pas rnyed dka' ba/ /ji ltar de nyid mtshan nyid ni/ /nyon cig da yis bshad par bya/ /mtshan nyid las skyes
42a7(rgyud): de nyid ni/ /de lta mi nan mi mthun no/ /rang rig pa ni bdag nyid phyir/ /de bas brjod par mi nus so/ /de nyid gsum bdag de snang ba/ /mtshan mo'i 'du shes rang ngo bo/ /zla ba'i
42b1(rgyud): bde mchog snang ba mched/ /nyin mo'i 'du shes rang ngo bo/ /phyag rgya chen po snang ba thob/ /mtshams kyi 'du shes rang ngo bo/ /mtha' yi de ni 'od kyi rab/ /nyin mo mtshan mo sogs dang
42b2(rgyud): bral| |de ni gnas mchog ye shes te/ /blta bar dka' ba'i mtshan nyid do/ /char yang dang ni thig le'i tshul/ /de nyid gsum bdag brjod pa'o/ /'khor lo gsum yod me rlung
42b3(rgyud): chu| |dngos po'i 'du shes rang ngo bo/ /tshul tsam zla ba yi ni bde/ /sa yi 'khor lor bde ni mchog /de ni rten gyi 'du shes can/ /lha yi dbang phyug shes par bya/ /phyag rgya chen po
42b4(rgyud): 'di ni mchog / nam mkhar ye shes 'du shes so/ /de yi mtha' yi gzhan gyi mchog /bde chen mchog gi nam mkhar ro/ /de ni rnal 'byor ngo bor grags/ /gnyis su med
42b5(rgyud): pa'i ye shes rab/ /de ni 'khor lo drug dbus gnas/ /rnam shes drug gi rang ngo bo/ /dngos po rten la sogs bye brag /bzhir ni bya bar yod pa'o/ /de nyid gsum
42b6(rgyud): bdag bye brag gis/ /de ni rnam pa gsum du dbye/ /mtshan mo nyin mo mtshams bral phyir/ /gcig pu yi ni bde ba che/ /rang bzhin bstan pa gang la lar/ /mchog gi nam mkha'
42b7(rgyud): gang la lar/ /la lar 'od rab kyi ni gnas/ /la lar dga' bar dran pa'o/ /la lar mchog gi dga' ba ste/ /la lar dga' bral dga' ba 'o/ /sna tshogs dum la sogs
43a1(rgyud): dbye| |lhan skyes gcig pu rtag tu shar/ /du mar smra bas ci zhig bya/ /'di kun bdag nyid lhan cig skyes/ /kun rdzob rnam pa'i gzugs
43a2(rgyud): kyis ni| |chu yi zla ba bzhin du mthong / /don dam pa yi rang bzhin ni/ /yang dag rtog pa'i gnas med do/ /thabs la sogs pa'i rim pa yis/ /bla ma'i zhal nas rnyed par
43a3(rgyud): 'gyur| |bla ma mtho ris thar pa'i bla/ /bla ma ye shes bla ma bde/ /bla ma ston pa bla ma mgon/ /bla ma rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid/ /bla ma'i zhal snga'i bka' drin las/ /mchog gi gnas ni rnyed par
43a4(rgyud): 'gyur| |tshe 'di yis ni phyag rgya che/ /dngos grub rnyed par the tshom med/ /sa bcu yi ni dbang phyug bdag /de yi bka' drin gyis ni sla/ /de bas bla ma las lhag gzhan/ /
43a5(rgyud): ston pa chen po ga la yod/ /gang zhig bla mas bstan bcos ni/ /mdzad dam bshad pa gang yin yang / /de ni bstan bcos de tshad ma/ /de ni de nyid 'khrul pa med/ /
43a6(rgyud): slob dpon gsung dang bdag gis smras/ /de la bye brag mi dbye 'o/ /rnal 'byor rnal 'byor ma rgyud shes/ /bla mas mdzad pa'i bstan bcos gang / /de la sgra dang sgra
43a7(rgyud): ngan du| |lha yi dbang phyug brtag mi bya/ /snyan ngag zlos gang bstan bcos las/ /sgra dang sgra ngan brtag bya yi/ /sngags kyi bstan bcos gtan la phab/ /ci yi phyir
43b1(rgyud): na brtag par bya/ /brtag par byed pas gti mug byed/ /rtsa ba'i don ni zad par song / /de phyir sgra dang rtog ge shes/ /de la de nyid bshad mi bya/ /de kun la ni dbang mi bskur/ /phyi
43b2(rgyud): yi don la mos pa'i phyir/ /thabs dang thabs las byung mtshan nyid/ /'bras bu sbyin pa gang zhig phyir/ /de ni thams cad dngos rig pa/ /mchog gi don ni ster phyir ro/ /de ltar
43b3(rgyud): yang de kho na nyid gsum gyi bdag nyid dang / /zla ba'i bde ba mchog dang / /phyag rgya chen po'i mtha' rnyed pa'i don du rnam pa dang / tshad dang / rang gi ngo bo ngas smras so/ /yang
43b4(rgyud): 'dir de kho na nyid kyi bdag nyid ni/ kun gzhi rnam par shes pa ste/ rnam pa'o/ /zla ba'i bde ba mchog ni/ tshogs kyi rnam par shes pa ste/ mtha'i tshad do/ /phyag rgya chen
43b5(rgyud): po ni| |yid kyi rnam par shes pa snang ba ste/ de ni/ rang gi ngo bo'i de'i mtha' la rnam pa mi ba'i rnam par shes pa nam mkha'o/ /yang na sprul pa dang / chos dang / longs
43b6(rgyud): spyod dang / bde ba chen po'i rnam pa'i don yod du chud par bya'o/ /yang na rtsa bzhi'i don du rnam phal sogs par shes par bya'o/ /dpal ye shes thig le las/ de kho na nyid
43b7(rgyud): gsum la sogs pa'i rgyas pa nges par bstan pa'i rang bzhin gyi don zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o/ / //de nas lha mo rab dgyes nas/ /rang
44a1(rgyud): bzhin don ni gsal ba'i phyir/ /dam po ru ni 'khyud byas nas/ /pad+ma por rab tu bskor/ /dur khrod la sogs pa yi don/ /rdo rje rgyal po la
44a2(rgyud): ni zhus| |bsrub dang srub pa'i sbyor ba las/ /dpal bdag dgyes nas bka' stsal to/ /dur khrod la sogs pa yi don/ /skal ldan lha mo khyod nyon cig /mi bzad 'di ru
44a3(rgyud): rnam khyab pa/ /lha mo kha la rab tu grags/ /g.yas pa'i sna yi bu ga ni/ /mi sdug pa ni shin tu tshig/ /lce sbyang tshogs ni phyed tshig pa/ /sna bug g.yon pa ru ni dran/ /rna
44a4(rgyud): ba g.yas pa 'jigs su rung / /swa swa dang ni tsheg tsheg go/ /sha za'i kha ni rna ba g.yon/ /dum bu ma go bo la sogs rgyan/ /lha mo g.yas pa yi ni mig /ha har dgod pa
44a5(rgyud): rab tu grags/ /rnam pa dang bcas yid dga' ldan/ /'jigs pa shin tu 'jigs par byed/ /g.yon pa pho nya nag po me/ /me lce 'bar ba'i phreng bas khyab/ /rdo rje'i
44a6(rgyud): kha ru 'jigs par byed/ /rus pa dkar po rab khyab pa/ /khu ba gzhan min rus dkar 'di/ /nges par lha mo shes par bya/ /de ni shin tu tsha ba skye/ /de tshe 'bar phred khyad
44a7(rgyud): par che| |byang chub sems ni bde ba che/ /mi brtan ma yin pa ru bzhugs/ /de tshe rnam bcas yi dwags kyis/ /ldan par rab tu grags pa'o/ /gsum dbye bzhir dbye drug
44b1(rgyud): dbye 'am/ /mchog gi bdud rtsi gang du gshegs/ /de ni dum mgo la sogs bstan/ /gang tshe thim las longs spyod 'gro/ /de tshe swa swa tshe tsheg go/ /go/ /gang gi tshe ni dbang ma
44b2(rgyud): 'grub| |de phyed tshig ldan dran pa'o/ /srog gi rlung ni nub pa'i phyir/ /shin tu tshig par brtag pa 'o/ /khu ba nye ba'i shar ma thag /bkram par bdag gis bshad pa'o/ /lha mo
44b3(rgyud): shin tu gsang ba che/ /dur khrod brgyad ni rab mchog go /de ni shing brgyad dang ldan pa/ /nang gi bdag sbyor mtshan nyid do/ /dpal gyi me tog mi rtsi dang / /nA ga ge sar wa rta
44b4(rgyud): dang / /pa la shing dang shar shing / /khar ba dang ni sha mi yi/ /yal ga du ma la sogs dang ldan brgyad/ /'bras bus dud pa'i gzugs kyis shin tu brgyan/ /'dod ma rgyas
44b5(rgyud): ma glu stobs ma dang sa/ /mtsho skyes snying po 'dzin ma bya gtong ma/ /mgyogs dang bral ma zhig gnyis kun tu brtag /shing mchog chen po rtsa brgyad kyi ni gzugs/ /yang
44b6(rgyud): ni dur khrod chen po ni/ /sbrul pa'i 'khor lo'i chu skyes chos kyi 'byung gnas kyi nang gsang ba chen po 'dus pa'i gnas dang / nye ba'i gnas la sogs pa'i gnas nas
44b7(rgyud): rnal 'byor ma re res shing re khyer nas song ngo / /lha mos gsol ba/ /bcom ldan 'das/ /'dir ni/ rnal 'byor ma ni/ /gang lags/ /shing rnams kyi ming ni/ /de lags/ /
45a1(rgyud): ji ltar na sprul pa'i 'khor lo'i chu skyes de kun gyi 'dus pa lags pa bka' stsal du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
45a2(rgyud): yan lag che ma dang / drag mig ma dang / 'jigs ma dang / khro gdong ma dang / zlum mig ma dang / sna nyams ma dang / lce bskyod ma dang / sbrul gdong ma dang /
45a3(rgyud): bya rgod gdong ma dang / ser mig ma dang / mche gtsigs ma dang / so ring ma dang / nya gdong ma dang / mgrin ring ma dang / rna 'byang ma dang / sgur mo dang / byin
45a4(rgyud): chen ma dang / spu ldan ma dang / sen ring ma dang / yan lag nag ma dang / sngo ma dang / yan lag dmar mo dang / gu gum 'od mnyam ma dang / rta gdong ma dang /
45a5(rgyud): gdong chen ma dang / ral gcig ma dang / ral ring ma dang / bong rnam dang / glang chen lte ba ma dang / bud mig ma dang / me tog dga' ma dang / sna ring ma dang /
45a6(rgyud): rma bya'i mgrin ma dang / sbrul lce ma dang / ne'u le'i gdong ma dang / nu 'phyang ma dang / gsus 'phyang ma dang / smad che ma dang / gdong skam ma dang / /rlung mgyogs
45a7(rgyud): ma dang / dal 'gro ma dang / spyan ring ma dang / dgod gdong ma dang / du ma dang / 'thab dga' ma dang / /gar ma dang / dga' 'gro ma dang / chog med ma dang /
45b1(rgyud): ma za ma dang / chang dga' ma dang / sha dga' ma dang / phar 'gro tshur 'gro ma dang / bram ze mo dang / rgyal po'i sras mo dang 'chang tshong ma dang / thod pa ma dang / lho bi
45b2(rgyud): dang / gtum mo dang / khrus mkhan mo dang / tshos ma dang / sha wa ri dang / legs ma dang / khrag dga' ma dang / skyabs sbyin ma'o/ /de kun lha mo rnal 'byor
45b3(rgyud): ma| |shin tu drag la yang dag 'jigs/ /de kun lag na gang zhig shing / /khyer nas 'od ba khyod nyon cig /tsam pa ka dang / ba ta li dang / ka 'un tsa dang / pa ta dang /
45b4(rgyud): pad+ma dang / sha ra dang / shi mya dang / pha la sha dang / na' ga ge sar dang / sA la dang / a ro d+ha ka dang / g+ha na dang / po sa la dang / bung pa'i dra ba dang / a shwad+tha dang
45b5(rgyud): a ta bu ta dang / ha ya dang / sa ha ka ra dang / 'o ma'i shing dang / chu shing dang / na li gi ra dang / u dum wa ra dang / e ran+Da dang / ka po ta dang / a mra dang / dza mar
45b6(rgyud): dang / kha di ra dang / tsan+dan dmar po dang / pad+ma ku dang / tsan+dan dang / li shi dang / rdza ti shing dang gur shing sha dang / bil ba dang / skyu ru ra dang / bur ra dang /
45b7(rgyud): rgun 'brum dang / khar rdzu ra dang / da ga ra dang / ka ba la dang du/ /ba ni te da ka da dang / go yul shing dang / 'dod pa'i mda' gzhu dang / phra mo'i lo ma dang / gu gu la
46a1(rgyud): dang / sardza ra sa dang / pa la ka dang / ma da na'i shing dang / karma m+ma ri dang / pun+Da rI ka dang / 'bras bu che ba dang / tsher 'bras dang / klu'i mgo shing
46a2(rgyud): dang / su 'dar sha na dang / ta la'i shing dang / chos kyi rgyal mtshan dang / gshin rje'i gdugs dang / a sho ka dang / a rka dang / kA ra bI ra dang / ru k+Sha dang / ardzu na dang /
46a3(rgyud): rdo rje'i mig dang / shing de dag kun ni/ chu zheng gab pa/ me tog dang / 'bras bu dang ldan pa ste/ 'dus pa chen po'i gnas su rnal 'byor ma rnams kyis khyer te 'ongs
46a4(rgyud): nas dam tshig gi spyod pa chen po byed do/ /'dus pa chen po'i gnas brgyad pa brgyad kyi 'dab ma dang ldan no/ /'dab ma re re la rnal 'byor ma de dag dang / gnyis pa ni/
46a5(rgyud): shing ste| de gnyis gcig la gcig mnyam par gnas so/ /de ltar shing gi rnam pa nyid kyi rtsal bzhugs pa'i phyir ro/ /rnal 'byor pa dang / shing gi sgras rtsa drug cu rtsa
46a6(rgyud): bzhi khong du chud pa'o/ /'di la rtsa'i 'khor lo'i lte bar srog gi rtsa bar nang dang lhan cig rtsa gsum dang ldan pa'i 'dab ma gsum gyi pad+ma'i g.yas ngos su ping+ga la'o//
46a7(rgyud): g.yon ngos su i Da'o/ /dbus su bde legs yid 'ong ma dang / 'jug pa dang / gnas pa dang / 'gro ba 'grub bar byed do/ /de dag gi dngos po dang / rten dang ye shes
46b1(rgyud): dang / rnam par 'byed pa las zhal bzang mo de ru shes par bya'o/ /shar ba dang nub pa'i dus su rtsa'i 'khor lo'i 'byung ba thams cad 'bad pas btsal bar bya'o/ /gang gi phyir
46b2(rgyud): rtsa'i 'byung ba med par gyur na/ byang chub kyi sems kyi bdud rtsi bde ba'i ye shes 'di 'jug pa dang / gnas pa dang / 'gro ba'i skye ba shes pa ma yin no/ /ma shes na/
46b3(rgyud): ji ltar phyag rgya chen po'i grub pa rnyed par 'gyur te/ de bas na phyag rgya chen po'i grub pa'i don 'dod pa'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug gis bsam gtan la mi g.yeng bas
46b4(rgyud): brtson par bya'o/ /lha mos gsol pa/ bcom ldan rnal 'byor dbang phyug gis/ /bsam gtan 'dir ni ji lta bu/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnal 'byor
46b5(rgyud): dbang phyug bsam gtan ni/ /nyon cig lha mo ngas rab bshad/ /kun rdzob ye shes brten pa las/ /gnyis su med pa'i gnas rab rnyed/ /nyer 'gro bsam gtan mchog
46b6(rgyud): gis ni| |grub pa chen po rnyed par 'gyur/ /skyon ni thams cad bral ba yi/ /yid dang mthun pa'i rang gnas su/ /lus ni ma bsgrims pa yis ni/ /spros pa med par stan
46b7(rgyud): bder bsdad/ /lte ba'i dbus na yod pa'i tshul/ /hUM gi yig 'bru grags chen grags/ /rnam par rtog pa dang bral ba/ /bskal pa'i me yi 'od dang mnyam/ /langs nas chos
47a1(rgyud): kyi 'khor lo yi/ /mkha' 'gro bsregs nas smin mtshams kyi/ /dbus na grang zhig la 'khor lo yod/ /rang gi ngo bo srog gi rlung / /snying
47a2(rgyud): gar 'ongs nas de gnas su/ /rtag tu de ni bzhugs pa'o/ /de ni oM yig ngo bor grags/ /sku yi rgyal po rnam par shes/ /srog dang rdub pa 'gog pa yis/ /srog dang rdub
47a3(rgyud): pa'i bza' ba gsol/ /srog dang rdub pa gnyis zos nas/ /des ni rdzogs par 'gyur ba yin/ /de nas de la rtags ni kun/ /mtshan ma 'di lta bu dag 'byung / /'dar dang
47a4(rgyud): rdul dang ba spu langs/ /dbyangs kyi bye brag de nas mdangs/ /kha dog 'gyur dang mchi ma dang / /lha mo de las de nyid skye'o/ /de nas rnal 'byor dbang shes nas/ /rnam
47a5(rgyud): par shes pa'i yi ge mchog / nang du lta ba byas pas na/ /steng mtshams rtse mo zab pa ru/ /mchog go nam mkha' bde chen du/ /yi ge mchog ni shes byas nas/ /tshangs
47a6(rgyud): pa'i pad+mar byon te rgyas/ /chags pa dang bral gnas su 'gro/ /dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin pa yi/ /lha mo gnas der shes par bya/ /'di lta bu yi 'dus pa yi/ /sa yi
47a7(rgyud): dur khrod chen po ni/ /chos kyi 'byung gnas kyi ni gzhir/ /grangs med pa yi rnal 'byor pa/ /phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub thog/ /nye bar 'gro ba'i bsam gtan las/ /nges
47b1(rgyud): bar 'grub pa'i dbang po mchog / spros med 'od kyi gnas rnyed do/ /dpal ye shes thig le las/ /dur khrod kyi nges par bstan pa'i don dang / nang gi bsam gtan gyi nye bar 'gro
47b2(rgyud): ba bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o/ / //bcom ldan 'das ma phyag rgya chen po pad+ma'i mchog bskyed cing shin tu dga' bas yang zhus pa/ kye bcom
47b3(rgyud): ldan 'das/ dpal ye shes thig le'i rgyud 'di'i tshad ni/ ci lags/ gnas ni/ gang lags/ mchog gi dbang phyug bdag la bka' stsol cig /bcom
47b4(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang zhig dri ba mchog byas pa/ /spyan bzang ma ni khyod nyon cig /dpal ldan ye shes thig le yi/ /de yi tshad ni don dam par//
47b5(rgyud): sus kyang smras par nus ma yin/ /zhal bzang de ni bden ma yin/ /'on kyang cung zad skal ldan mo/ /gsang ba'i ye shes rab mchog ni/ /gang zhig rgyal bas yang mi
47b6(rgyud): shes| |khyod kyi ngor byas bdag gis bshad/ /srog gi dbyug pa'i gang zhig ste/ /sor bcu gnyis ni mdud pa med/ /'og gi cha ni bcu gnyis phyed/ /de bzhin sprul
47b7(rgyud): pa'i pad+mar ni/ /drug phyed pad+ma mig dang 'dra/ /rtsa ba dang bcas lto nang du/ /rtsa ba rtsa ba'i nang 'ongs nas/ /'dab ma'i ske ru bcar te gnas/ /dgug pa'i rnam pa'i ngo bor
48a1(rgyud): grags| |bu ga phra mo nang na ldan/ /de ni srog pa rtsa nyid yin/ /khams gsum gyi ni rten yin no/ /rgyu dang 'bras bu gnyis med pa'i/ /
48a2(rgyud): rtsa dang 'bras bu rgya yis btab/ /drug phyed rtsa ba dang ldan ni/ /rtsa ba'i skud pa byad gzugs gsal/ /bcu drug phyed phyed bye brag tu/ /rtsa ba'i skud pa gcig pu 'o/ /rtsa ba
48a3(rgyud): gsum dbye skal ldan mo/ /'bras bu yang ni de bzhin no/ /rtsa ba'i 'bras bu gnyis kyi gnas/ /bcu gnyis phyed kyi gcig pa'o/ /de ni shin tu phra mo 'jam/ /rin chen
48a4(rgyud): kha nang man chad du/ /de tsam ye shes thig skud yod/ /rnam shes drug po'i rten mchog go /char yang dang ni thig le tshul/ /tshul tsam mchog dang gzhan mchog go/ /shrI
48a5(rgyud): ni gzhan min 'di ru char/ /thig le dz+nyA zhes su ni dran/ /tshul ni na yi yig 'bru yin/ /te yi yi ge tshul tsam mo/ /mchog ni la yi yig 'brur bstan/ /gzhan
48a6(rgyud): mchog ka ru dran pa'o/ /gug ma'i rnam pa'i kha ru ni/ /yungs kar che ba'i spom po tsam/ /gnyis su med pa'i ye shes dpal/ /char yang du grags mchog dbang phyug
48a7(rgyud): de yi snying ga'i dbus su ni/ /ye shes thig le grub pa bzhugs/ /tshul ni mdud pa'i mgrin par gnas/ /na yi yi ge mtshan zhes mchog /g.yon glo yi ni 'dab ma'i
48b1(rgyud): nang / /ti ni thig le'i tshul tsam gnas/ /g.yas su la yi yig 'brur grags/ /lha mo mchog ni rtag tu bzhugs/ /steng du gzhan min kun gyi mchog /kha yi gnas su rtse
48b2(rgyud): mo'i cha| |de tshad yungs kar rus pa tsam/ /ga yi rnam pa'i yi ge mchog /bde ba chen po'i rang ngor grags/ /rang gi ngo bo'i mtshan nyid can/ /dpal ldan ye shes thig le
48b3(rgyud): 'di| |mkha' 'gro ma yi 'khor los bsgyur/ /nam mkhar 'gro ba yi ni phyir/ /mkha' 'gro ma ni rtsa kun dran/ /'jug pa'i gnas su longs spyod yin/ /thim pa'i 'gro
48b4(rgyud): ba'i gnas su yod/ /'byung ba dbang gi gnas su ste/ /rang bzhin de ni mchog gzhan mchog /g.yon gyi glu ru i Ta'i rtsa/ /pheM ga la ni g.yas su gnas/ /rtog med ma
48b5(rgyud): ni steng du gnas/ /phyag rgya chen po'i rang bzhin no/ /steng dang 'og gnas yod pa'i rtsa/ /srid dang mya ngan 'das dag byed/ /g.yon glu ru ni yod pas yang / /de bzhin 'di ni
48b6(rgyud): dran pa 'o/ /de rnams lte ba'i dbus su ni/ /skra rtse bye ba brgya yi cha/ /de yi tshad ni de bzhin gnas/ /zhal bzang ye shes thig le 'o/ /rnal 'byor ma yi ye shes rang / /gsang
48b7(rgyud): ba mchog ni bdag gis bshad/ /thos pa yis ni sdig pa zad/ /de nas de la dga' ba skye/ /dran pa yis ni sod nams skye/ /de nas de la mchog dga' skye/ /lta ba yis ni
49a1(rgyud): 'grub par 'gyur/ /dga' bral dga' ba rab tu skye/ /reg pa yis ni lhan skyes dga'/ /de nas yang dag rab 'od gnas/ /'od rab gnas
49a2(rgyud): las thams cad 'di/ /gnas la sogs pa'i dag kun no/ /lha mos gsol pa/ gnas la grangs ni ji tsam du/ /mchog gi dbang phyug khyod dbang mdzad/ /bcom ldan
49a3(rgyud): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rtag tu sprul pa yi ni skus/ /sa ni bcu gcig pa ru dran/ /longs spyod rdzogs sku bcu gnyis pa/ /chos kyi skus ni bcu gsum mo/ /
49a4(rgyud): bde ba chen pos bcu bzhi pa/ /gang zhig bco lnga yi ni sa/ /de ni ye shes sa zhes bya/ /bcu drug pa ni brtag pa min/ /khyod dang lhan cig zhal bzang mo/ /de kun sa yi
49a5(rgyud): dbang phyug bdag / gnas la sogs pa dga' ba'i gnas/ /sa yi sgra yis brjod pa yin/ /sa dang po mos pas spyod pa/ gnyis pa rab tu dga' ba/ gsum pa dri ma
49a6(rgyud): med pa| bzhi pa 'od byed pa/ lnga pa 'od 'phro ba/ drug pa sbyang dga' ba/ bdun pa mngon du gyur pa/ brgyad pa ring du song ba/ dgu pa mi g.yo ba/ bcu pa legs
49a7(rgyud): pa'i blo gros/ de rnams ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa'o/ /chos kyi sprin ni sangs rgyas kyi sa/ kun tu 'od ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ kun tu
49b1(rgyud): snang ba mched pa'i 'od ni dpal rdo rje sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das kyi sprul pa'i sku yis/ /kun tu snang ba thob pa'i 'od ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'i sa/ yang dag 'od rab chos kyi
49b2(rgyud): sku'i sa/ /brjod du med pa tshad med pa ni bde ba chen po'i sa ste/ de kun dga' ba'i bye brag la/ /sar ni kun tu brtags pa'o/ /lha mos gsol pa/ rdo rje sems dpa' mnga' bdag
49b3(rgyud): che/ /sku ni 'di ru ci ru grags/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sku ni de bzhin gshegs skyabs sbyin/ /sems ni rdo rje 'dzin par dran/ /phung po lnga las grub pa'i sku/ /
49b4(rgyud): rigs lnga yi ni bdag nyid mchog /rigs ni drug pa thugs rdo rje/ /grangs med rigs kyi gtso bo'o/ /'khor lo rin chen de bzhin pad/ /ral gri rdo rje lnga pa'o/ /gzugs dang
49b5(rgyud): tshor ba 'du shes dang / /'du byed rnam shes de bzhin no/ /gzugs ni rnam bar snang mdzad grags/ /gti mug rdo rje'i ngo bo nyid/ /tshor ba rin chen rgyal po ni/ /da rgyal rdo rje'i ngo bo
49b6(rgyud): nyid/ /'du shes de ni snang mtha' yas/ /chags pa rdo rjer rab tu grags/ /'du byed don yod grub pa ste/ /phrag dog rdo rje ru ni bstan/ /rnam par shes 'dir mi bskyod pa/ /
49b7(rgyud): zhe sdang rdo rje rab tu bsgom/ /nam mkha' rdo rje sems dpar grags/ /rnam pa dang bral grub mnga' bdag/ gti mug me long ye shes blta/ /nga rgyal mnyam pa nyid du dran/ /
50a1(rgyud): so sor rtog pa 'dod chags yin/ /bya ba grub pa phrag dog che/ /zhe sdang chos dbyings rnam par dag /bde chen gcig pu las ni 'dir/ /
50a2(rgyud): bye brag lnga ru gyur par grags/ /bde ba dkar po bsrubs pa las/ /zhal bzang mo ni sra ba gang / /de ni rnam par snang mdzad cas/ /gti mug chos kyi mtshan nyid can/ /
50a3(rgyud): bde ba nag po zhu ba'i gzugs/ /de ni mi bskyod pa ru dran/ /bde ba dmar mo'i 'od kyi phyir/ /'od dpag med pa de bzhin gshegs/ /rlung gis khyab phyir bde ba sngo//
50a4(rgyud): don yod grub pa de rab bstan/ /nga rgyal las ni 'dir bde ser/ /de ni rin chen 'byung ldan yin/ /nam mkha' dang bral grub mgon po/ /rdor sems rgyal ba
50a5(rgyud): kun mnga' bdag / spyan ring bzang mo de phyir sku/ /lha yi rnam pa rab tu mchog /'bad pa yis ni de mchod bya/ /nam yang smad par mi bya'o/ /sha dang / khrag dang /
50a6(rgyud): bshang ba dang / gci ba dang / mig rdu dang / snabs dang / sen mo dang / so dang / skra dang / spu dang / rus pa dang / rgyus pa dang / mkhal ma dang / snying dang /
50a7(rgyud): mkhris pa dang / glo ba dang / rgyu ma dang / dri ma dang / tshil dang / rang dang / ang khri ni dang / gnye ma dang / lto ba dang / kha wu dang / bad kan dang / rdul
50b1(rgyud): dang / mchi ma dang / klad pa dang / rkang mar dang / khu ba dang / khrag dang / sha ma 'di yang lha'i gzugs kyis gnas pa ste/ gzhan ma yin no/ /de bas na shing dang /
50b2(rgyud): rdo ba dang / sa las grub pa dang / dngul dang / zangs dang / 'khar ba las grub pa'i lha dang / mchod rten dang / bris sku dang / po ti la sogs pa rnams la phyag
50b3(rgyud): mi bya'o| |gang gi phyir ye shes kyi sku spangs nas phyi'i don gyis ci'i phyir gnas/ /phyi yi thams cad skad cig ma/ /dga' mo sems kyi rdzu 'phrul yin/ /de ltar
50b4(rgyud): sems las gzhan pa yin/ /sems nyid nam mkha' lta bu 'o/ /gzugs sogs kha dog gnas pa'i phyir/ /tha mal pa yi lus su snang / /rnam par dag pas lha
50b5(rgyud): nyid du| |bla ma'i zhal snga'i bka' drin no/ /lha mos gsol pa/ mgon po bla ma ji lta bu/ /slob ma yang ni ci 'dra ba/ /rgyud kyi rim pa ji ltar lags/ /re zhig rgyud ni
50b6(rgyud): ji ltar gsungs/ /dpal ye shes thig le las/ dpal ye shes thig le'i tshad dang / gnas dang / sa bstan pa'i don dang / phung po rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba'i
50b7(rgyud): le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o/ / //de nas yang ni bshad bya ba/ /bla ma slob ma'i mtshan nyid ni/ /bla ma tha mal dngos bral yon tan ldan/ /gzhan
51a1(rgyud): min mchog gi dbang gis dbang bskur sku/ /thugs rje dang ldan shin tu rlabs che'i sems/ /de nyid shes pa log pa'i nga rgyal med/ /
51a2(rgyud): bla ma yul gyis ma gos dmu rgod ma yin pa/ /rgyud lung bstan bcos du ma'i pha rol phyin/ /yan lag mtshan mchog kun gyis shin tu brgyan/ /dkyil 'khor 'bri
51a3(rgyud): dang dbang gi rim la mkhas/ /bla ma yid thub srid pa'i 'jigs bral zhing / /mya ngan 'das la 'dod pa'i yid dang bral/ /dngos po chu zla lta bur nyid kyis mthong / /
51a4(rgyud): drug lhag bcu yi stong la gcig tu sems/ /bla mchog nyon mongs med cing skye ba med/ /phung po la sogs skye mched khams dang bral/ /mchog dang dga' bral
51a5(rgyud): gnyis ka'i dbus na bzhugs/ /de lta'i dpal bla rdo rje rgyal po nyid/ /slob ma khrims ldan dul zhing dad pa can/ /rlabs chen zab mo'i theg pa nyan par byed/ /
51a6(rgyud): rnam rtog 'dam gyis rtag tu ma gos shing / /mkhas shing blo rno thugs rje'i bdag nyid can/ /spyan ring bzang mo 'di lta bu dag gi /bla ma dang ni slob ma gnyis rnams
51a7(rgyud): gyi| |mtshan nyid dang ni legs par brtag pa ni/ /ji lta'i don gyis rab tu gsal ba 'o/ /dpal ye shes thig le las/ /bla ma dang slob ma'i mtshan nyid brtag pa zhes
51b1(rgyud): bya ba'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o/ / //de nas gzhan nyon bdag gis bshad/ /ji ltar rgyud kyi rim pa bzhugs/ /dpal dang ldan pa'i rigs chen rgyud/ /
51b2(rgyud): 'bum bdun gyi ni mtshan zhes bya/ /de ni gtso bo'i rtsa ba'i rgyud/ /sku brgyad bdag nyid rab kyi mchog /de brtag kye yi rdo rje ni/ /'bum lnga yi ni mtshan zhes bya/ /dpal ldan
51b3(rgyud): phyag rgya chen thig le/ /de yi phyi ma'i rgyud du dran/ /ye shes snying por grags pa'i rgyud/ /de yi phyi ma'i phyi ma 'o/ /dga' mo ye shes thig le'i sgra/ /bshad pa'i rgyud ni gsang ba
51b4(rgyud): che| |grub pa'i nges bstan thig le ni/ /zhal bzang mo de snying po dang / /de kho na nyid sgrol ma'i mchan/ /'bras bu'i rgyud grags 'chad par 'gyur/ /de bdun du ni bdag
51b5(rgyud): gis bshad/ /shin tu rmad du byung ba'i rgyud/ /lha mo brgyad pa sku dang bral/ /de phyir smra bar mi btub bo/ /de ltar rim pa thams cad ni/ /lha mo de nyid shes par bya/ /sa
51b6(rgyud): bon las ni myu gu bzhin/ /rgyud kun rim shes rim pas so/ /rgyud ni rim pas 'di ru grags/ /yang na ye shes 'khor lo rgyud/ /yang na don ni rgyud yin te/ /yang na rim
51b7(rgyud): pa gnyis ni rgyud/ /lha mo gang du skal ldan mo/ /shes rab thabs gnyis phrad pa'i sa/ /de ni rgyud du bshad pa yin/ /yang na yid shes las byung ba/ /ta yi yig 'bru sku ru
52a1(rgyud): grags| |na ni de nyid dri ma med/ /ta yi yig 'bru khu ba yab/ /ra ni yum ste khrag yin no/ /de gnyis 'dres pa thig le yin/ /gzhan min rnam
52a2(rgyud): par shes ngo bo'o/ /de yi thig le a'i rnam pa/ /zla pa'i dkyil 'khor nya gang ngo / /ta yig dang ni ra yig 'bru/ /tshul tsam gyis ni gnyis ka ldan/ /de ni rab mchog
52a3(rgyud): a yig 'bru/ /rtsa dang dga' bdag nyid skye med/ /lha mo 'di ltar rgyud kyi rim/ /rgyud kyi don yang shin tu bshad/ /dpal ye shes thig le las/ /rtsa ba'i rgyud la
52a4(rgyud): sogs pa'i rim pa dang / don zhes bya ba'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o// //bcom ldan ye shes thig le lags/ /nyi ma bye ba'i 'od dang mnyam/ /
52a5(rgyud): bdag gi zhu ba gang zhig ci/ /rgyal ba'i mnga' bdag de bdag gsungs/ /mnga' bdag rang gi ngo bo nyid/ /gang las skyes shing ci las 'ongs/ /de ni mdor bsdus pa
52a6(rgyud): yi chig / thub pa chen pos bka' stsol cig /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /dri ba 'di ni shin tu zab/ /ye shes kyis rnyed gsang ba 'o/ /lha mo khyod ni
52a7(rgyud): 'byung ba min/ /skye ba dang ni 'pho med rab/ /mchog gi rnam rtog rlabs dang bral/ /rang gi ngo bo ye shes 'od/ /bdag rang gi ni ye shes sku'i/ /mchog gi dbang phyug ma
52b1(rgyud): khyod 'ong / /gzhan min bdag dang khyod med na/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis rnyed dka' ba/ /khyod med na ni khams gsum kun/ /mgo bo chad pa'i mi bzhin du/ /grangs med 'jig rten gyi ni
52b2(rgyud): khams| |khyod ni ye shes 'od byed pa/ /khyod ni thams cad dngos kun gyi/ /thams cad bdag nyid 'byung ba kun/ /chos kun yongs su shes nas ni/ /de ni thams cad mkhyen par
52b3(rgyud): grags| |de yang lha mo khyod kyi drin/ /brjod par mi nus yang dag don/ /khyod kyi drin gyis grangs med pas/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas rnyed 'gyur/ /mchog gi nam
52b4(rgyud): mkha'i gnas nas byon/ /mchog gi nam mkha'i gnas su gshegs/ /mchog gi nam mkha'i rang ngo khyod/ /mchog gi nam mkha'i ngal bsos nas/ /mchog gi nam
52b5(rgyud): mkhar rtag tu bzhugs/ /kun rdzob rnam pa'i mchog tu ni/ /pad+ma'i skud pa ji bzhin du/ /gsang ba'i sna rtse snying por gnas/ /langs nas bde ba'i pad+mar ni/ /thig le khong du
52b6(rgyud): chud pa'i phyir/ /gshegs nas bsten pa thams cad sreg /rgyas pas thig le khyer nas su/ /yang ni khyod 'dir byon pa'i don/ /lte ba sprul pa'i pad+ma yi/ /lha mo gang tshe
52b7(rgyud): khyod kyi gnas/ /de tshe khyod ni shes rab grags/ /legs dgyes rab mchog rmad du byung / /bdag dang lhan cig gnyis med sbyor/ /legs dgyes dbang mo khyod ni bzhugs/
53a1(rgyud): tshangs pa'i g.yul sa bya ba mthar/ /legs dgyes khyod kyi rgya yis btab/ /grangs med pa la rgyas btab ste/ /de phyir phyag rgya che khyod
53a2(rgyud): grags| |dpal ye shes thig le las/ dpal phyag rgya chen po bcom ldan 'das ma'i rang gi ngo bo bstan pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gcig
53a3(rgyud): pa'o/ / //gsang ba'i pad snying rgyas 'byed pa/ /rdo rje nyi ma gzhan yang zhu/ /re zhig ci'i yang gsang ba gsungs/ /gnas ni gang na yod pa lags//
53a4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems ni gsang ba yin/ /khu ba'i ngo bo chang dang bral/ /de yi gnas ni mngal yin te/ /phyag rgya dga' ba sbyin
53a5(rgyud): pa mo| |bcom ldan 'das mas gsol pa/ byang chub sems ni khu ba'i gzugs/ /de ni ji ltar gsang bar brjod/ /gsang ba'i gnas ni mngal yin te/ /gzhung
53a6(rgyud): de bdag la 'thad ma lags/ /de lta na ni gang zag kun/ /nges par gsang ba shes par 'gyur/ /de yang dbang bskur la sogs ni/ /su la yang ni mi dgod lags/
53a7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sangs rgyas kun gyi yum khyod de ni bden/ /gang zhig khyod kyis nges par bzung ba'i don/ /'on kyang drang ba'i don gyi tshig
53b1(rgyud): gis ldan/ /rten gyi don phyir yang na nges pa'i don/ /rten med na ni 'bras bu rnyed mi 'gyur/ /lus kyi dngos med ji ltar 'di ru sems/ /ji ltar don mthun gsang tshig de ni
53b2(rgyud): gsang / /drang ba'i don min nges pa'i don yang min/ /dngos med yang min dngos po'i gzugs ma yin/ /bden rim 'byung ba thim rnams kyi ni gzhan/ /khu gzugs gang du
53b3(rgyud): de ni yod ma yin/ /khrag kyang yin par ji ltar yang ni min/ /mchog dga' dga' bral lhan skyes dga' ba min/ /gnas mngal de la nam yang yod ma yin/ /rdo rje
53b4(rgyud): rtsa ba bde chen la sogs min/ /drug phyed rtsa dang mtsho skyes snying po min/ /rig min yang min rig pa nam yang min/ /brjod med nam mkha'i rang gi ngo bo 'o/ /'di lta bu
53b5(rgyud): ni don dam par/ /lha mo gsang bar rab tu gsal/ /yang ni 'bring gi don gyis su/ /bdag gis gsang bshad khyod nyon cig /'bring don de ni don gyi mchog/ /mchog
53b6(rgyud): gi dga' ba sbyin pa 'o/ /'bad pas dga' bral srung bar byed/ /dga' bral dga' bas lhan skyes 'gyur/ /nor mdud snying ga yi ni gsang / /byang chub kyi ni sems dang
53b7(rgyud): ldan| |de ni thabs kyi gsang ba'i don/ /shes rab ma yi de bzhin no/ /gsang ba shes rab dbang gnyis las/ /dga' mo gsang ba'i don shes so/ /dpal ye shes thig le
54a1(rgyud): las| gsang ba'i don zhes bya ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o/ / //de nas bcom ldan 'das ma phyag rgya chen
54a2(rgyud): pos 'jam pa'i dbyangs la yang zhu ba zhus pa/ mgon po thams cad gtan phab pa/ /rang bzhin ji ltar lags pa gsungs/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de lta bu'i tshig
54a3(rgyud): gsan pa dang cang mi gsung ba'i dngos pos skad cig tsam bzhugs te/ de nas mi snang ba'i rang gi ngo bor bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das ma phyag rgya chen pos
54a4(rgyud): bdag rang rten med par mthong nas zhus pas shin tu 'gyod nas cang mi smra bar bzhugs so/ /de'i dus su sna tshogs pad+ma la bzhugs pa'i 'khor bye ba phrag bdun cu rtsa
54a5(rgyud): gnyis kyi grangs rnams kyis chos kyi 'byung gnas stong par mthong nas shin tu ya mtshan du gyur pas kun smre zhing brgyal par gyur to/ /kye byang chub sems dpa'
54a6(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po lha'i dbang phyug / bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa' gang na bzhugs/ gar gshegs/ kun tu stong par bdag cag gis mthong lags
54a7(rgyud): so| |lha'i dbang phyug gis gsol pa/ 'khor chen po rnams nyon cig /bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la bcom ldan 'das dpal phyag rgya chen pos
54b1(rgyud): 'di ltar zhus te/ mgon po thams cad gtan la phab/ /rang bzhin ji ltar lags pa gsungs/ /de lta bu'i tshig gsan pa dang bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar mi
54b2(rgyud): snang bar gyur to/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rang bzhin de ni/ brjod du med pa dang / rtog ge med pa dang / btsal du med pa dang / grangs med pa dang / skye ba med pa dang /
54b3(rgyud): gzugs med pa dang / rigs pa med pa la dris pas/ de nyid smrar mi btub pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das snang ba med par gyur to/ /yang 'khor thams cad kyis
54b4(rgyud): gsol pa/ kye/ blo gros chen po chos kyi mdzod/ /snang ba med cing dngos po med/ /chad par mi 'gyur ram/ de'i don la shin tu 'jigs shing yang dag par yid zhum
54b5(rgyud): par gyur to/ /lha'i dbang phyug gis bka' stsal pa/ snang ba med par 'du shes gang / /de ni dngos med shes mi bya/ /nang gi rang ngor 'gro ba'i phyir/ /snang ba med par 'di
54b6(rgyud): ru brjod/ /de bas 'khor chen ma 'jig shig /yid skyo ba ni yongs su spongs/ /de la thabs ni gcig yod do/ /gang gis rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid/ /sngar ni khyod kyis mthong ba bzhin/ /
54b7(rgyud): pad+ma'i dbus bzhugs mthong bar 'gyur/ /de'i tshe 'khor thams cad kyis byang chub sems dba' sems dpa' chen po lha'i dbang phyug gi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te
55a1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das mthong bar bya ba'i phyir thabs zhus pa/ kye blo gros chen po dpa' bo chen po/ /thabs ci yod pa bdag cag la bstan du
55a2(rgyud): gsol| dpa' bo chen pos bka' stsal pa/ dus gcig tu mgrin gcig gis snyan pa'i glus mchod pa gyis shig /de lta bu'i thabs kyi tshig thos nas thams cad
55a3(rgyud): dga' zhing mgu la yid rangs pas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha'i dbang phyug gi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ de nas drug ldan la sogs
55a4(rgyud): pa'i glu thams cad len no/ /kye| sku rab mchog gi ngo bo'i mtshan nyid ni/ /gang na bzhugs pa mya ngan 'das mtshan nyid/ /de nyid dang bral chad pa'i stong de ni/ /gnyis med
55a5(rgyud): bde bas mkhyen par mi 'gyur ram/ /rdo rje mtsho skyes mchog sbyor yongs su gzigs/ /gang zhig dngos med dngos de spyad par mdzod/ /de nang rang bzhin las bcom
55a6(rgyud): ldan| |chu las nya ni bzhin du bzhengs/ /mchog gi dga' ba'i gzugs bdag nyid/ /mchog gi dga' ba'i sbyin pa'i bdag /dngos dang dngos min gnyis kyi steng / /gyen
55a7(rgyud): bltas pad+ma'i lte bar ni/ /zhal bzhi dang ni phyag bzhi pa/ /shin tu ngo mtshar sku dang ldan/ /rgyal po yi ni bzhugs thabs bzhugs/ /brgyad gnyis blo ldan byad gzugs
55b1(rgyud): can/ /spyan gsum mchog gi rnam pa can/ /zla ba nyi ma zhabs kyis mnan/ /rnge'u chung thod pa kha T+wAM ga /rdo rje 'bar ba phyag na bsnams/ /de lta bu'i rmad du byung ba'i gzugs mthong
55b2(rgyud): nas 'khor thams cad lhan cig bcom ldan 'das ma phyag rgya chen mo langs nas lan gsum du bskor ba byas te dam por 'khyud nas bstod pas bstod ba/ mchog tu rmad byung chen po'i sku
55b3(rgyud): ni rgyal gyur cig / ye shes zab mo rgya mtsho'i snying po rgyal gyur cig /brjod bral bltar med dngos med sku mi mnga'/ /gti mug chen po 'joms de rgyal gyur cig /
55b4(rgyud): mchog dang gzhan mchog de ni mchog gzhan mchog /mkha' mchog 'od mchog mchog gi ye shes snang / /mchog gi bdud rtsi'i snying po gang ba'i rgyun/ /mi 'chad rgyun
55b5(rgyud): 'bab byed pa rgyal gyur cig / shin tu lkog gyur dbang pos bltar med pa/ /skye 'gag 'du byed mtshan med rgyal gyur cig /de lta bu'i bstod pa'i rgyal po byas nas yang
55b6(rgyud): phyag rgya chen mo lha mo chen mos bcom ldan 'das la dad pas zhu bzhus pa/ kye bcom ldan 'das/ dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams ci'i phyir ma gsungs lags/ bcom ldan
55b7(rgyud): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bsrub dang srub pa'i sbyor ba las/ /lha rnams 'byung ba'i rim ba 'o/ /dang po rtsom pa shin tu 'dar/ /rnam par shes pas lha mo skye/ /de ni grong las
56a1(rgyud): kha dog dkar/ /'dod pa'i gti mug rnam par thos/ /grong khyer las ni longs spyod yin/ /spyod lam lha mo rgyal ba'i 'od/ /bskum pa
56a2(rgyud): las ni snang ba mched/ /snang ba mched las ye shes 'od/ /bgrad pa las ni skye ba sbyor/ /sbyor las dga' ba'i skye ma ste/ /mnyam sbyor las ni ye shes skye/ /ye
56a3(rgyud): shes las ni dngos zad ma/ /khyod las 'di ru dngos po ste/ /dngos po longs spyod zla ba ma/ /dkar po las ni rten shes bya/ /rten las pad+ma'i lte ba ma/ /brang brdabs
56a4(rgyud): las ni rnam par 'byed/ /rnam par 'byed las pad mig ma/ /nag dang ljang dang gur gum mdog /dmar dang sngon po yi ni gzugs/ /zla ba dkar dang dmar gyi sngon/ /
56a5(rgyud): sgo la sogs dang mtshams na bzhugs/ /zhal gcig pa la spyan gsum pa/ /phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan/ /snod dang gri gug gis phyag brel/ /na bza' grol
56a6(rgyud): ba phyag gnyis pa/ /de ni nyi zla'i gdan la bzhugs/ /rus pa sna tshogs rgyan dang ldan/ /khyod kyi bzhugs thabs ji lta bar/ /lha mo rnams kyang de bzhin no/ /de rnams
56a7(rgyud): thabs ni bzhi gnyis kyi ni grangs/ /mnyam ba'i bzhugs thabs phyag dang zhabs la sogs/ /rab tu dga' ba'i yid ldan zhi ba'i gzugs/ /rtag tu sems can don
56b1(rgyud): byed kho na brtson/ /lha mos gsol pa/ dpa' bo rnams kyi ming gi brda/ /de bzhin nyid kyi rdo rjes gsungs/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ khyod kyis nga la gang zhus
56b2(rgyud): ba| |skal ldan lha mo de ni nyon/ /'di yi rgyud la bdag la gzhan/ /mtshan ni yod pa gang la lar/ /na ni lte ba gsang ba'i pad/ /dga' bral dga' ba sbyin pa'o/ /ma
56b3(rgyud): zhes nor bu srub pa ni/ /mchog gi dga' ba sbyin pa 'o/ /gang zhig de yi dbus nas langs/ /de ni bdag gi rang bzhin mtshan/ /dpa' bo rnams ni bdag gis bshad/ /
56b4(rgyud): shes rab pha rol phyin ma nyon/ /lha chen po dang khyab 'jug dang / /pad+ma'i lte ba shin tu blta/ /lha yi dbang dang 'dod pa'i lha/ /pad+ma'i mig dang gzhon nu ma/ /re zhig de
56b5(rgyud): ni dkyil 'khor ba/ /rang gi phyag rgya mtshon cha 'dzin/ /dpal ye shes thig le las/ /bskul ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o// //bcom
56b6(rgyud): ldan 'das mas gsol pa/ kye bcom ldan 'das/ dbang bskur ba'i dus su dkyil 'khor rnams ji lta bu lags/ cho ga gang gis dbang bskur ba sbyin zhing blang /
56b7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chu la sogs pa'i dbang dus su/ /rdul tshon la sogs dkyil 'khor mdzes/ /gsang ba'i dbang bskur dus su ni/ /me tog
57a1(rgyud): sna tshogs mchog gis so/ /shes rab ye shes dbang bskur dus/ /sna tshogs dri zhim po yis brgyan/ /las dang po yi dang po la/ /nges
57a2(rgyud): pa'i don gyi chu la sogs/ /dbang bskur shes pas sbyin bya ste/ /de ltar min na skyon du 'gyur/ /shes rab can gyis drang don der/ /sbyin no de nas dam chig sbyin/ /nor
57a3(rgyud): bu mgrin par byang chub sems/ /bla ma nyid kyis rang rig byed/ /shes rab lhan cig gnas las langs/ /slob ma'i kha yi pad+ma ru/ /nyid kyi rdo rje rab tu sbyin/ /de
57a4(rgyud): nas bde ba'i bdud rtsis dkrol/ /mgrin pa'i dbus su rtsa gnyis ni/ /g.yas dang g.yon na yod pa 'o/ /sbom ma yangs mar 'di ru grags/ /srog dang nye ba'i
57a5(rgyud): rang ngo bo/ /g.yon ni srog tu shes par bya/ /nye ba'i srog ni g.yas na 'o/ /de ru bde bar 'jug par bya/ /mthe bong srin lag gnyis kyis mnan/ /de nas ye shes
57a6(rgyud): 'byung bar 'gyur/ /bu mos rnyed pa'i bde ji bzhin/ /reg bya chen pos dga' ba che/ /dga' ba chen pos bde ba che/ /bde ba chen pos byang chub sems/ /shes par
57a7(rgyud): bya gdong ma yi khar/ /nor bu'i kha las thigs pa gcig /shes rab ye shes zhal bzang mo/ /shes rab bya gdong las bde ba/ /rdo rje rin chen kha ru 'gro/ /de ni dbang
57b1(rgyud): gi mchog rang yin/ /sangs rgyas grub pa'i 'bras sbyin bdag /shes rab gzugs bzang b+ha ga rab/ /shin tu lang tsho dbang bskur ldan/ /dga' sogs bye brag mgu bar
57b2(rgyud): byas| |de nas slob ma la sbyin bya/ /sems dpa' chen po shes rab 'di/ /yang dag ye shes rab tu ster/ /gang zhig bka' lung skyabs sbyin te/ /de ni bu khyod dad par
57b3(rgyud): bya| |de yi mngal gyi g.yon logs na/ /i Ta bya gdong ma ni bzhugs/ /de rnyed tsam gyis rang bzhin ni/ /shes rab bsnyen pas rnyed par 'gyur/ /de ni gzhan min yongs
57b4(rgyud): su shes| |bzhi ba'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo yin/ /rang rig pa dang mchog ye shes/ /ngag gi lam gyis rnyed dang bral/ /des na lha mo skal ldan mo/ /gsang ba las ni shin tu
57b5(rgyud): gsang / /rgyud kun du ni bdag gis sbas/ /mtha' yi mtha' ru rab tu gsal/ /bcom ldan 'das mas gsol pa/ mtha' dang mtha' yi don ni ci/ /mchog gi dbang phyug
57b6(rgyud): bdag la gsungs/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtha' ni rnam par 'byed par shes/ /rnam par 'byed pa bcom pa'i phyir/ /rnam par 'byed pa bcom
57b7(rgyud): pa'i mtha'/ /rnam par 'byed pa mthar gsal 'gyur/ /rnam par 'byed mthar ye shes che/ /de rang ngo bo'i rang bzhin no/ /lha mos gsol ba/ /dgyes pa rdul tshon dkyil
58a1(rgyud): 'khor ni/ /mnga' bdag ji lta'i rnam pas bri/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang zhig khyod kyis yongs su zhus/ /nyon cig
58a2(rgyud): lha mo bdag gis bshad/ /phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor 'di ru ni/ /las la mkhas pas bri bar bya/ /pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad par bya/ /pad+ma'i nang du char yang bya/ /char yang dang
58a3(rgyud): ldan sna tshogs 'dab/ /char yang gi nang thig le ste/ /de yi steng du rdo rje bri/ /sna tshogs pad+ma'i ze 'bru ldan/ /rdo rje gri gug gis ni bskor/ /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /
58a4(rgyud): rta babs bzhi yis rnam par brgyan/ /sna tshogs bum pa dang ldan pa/ /dkyil 'khor rab kyi mchog ni bya/ /shar gyi 'dab mar 'khor lo bri/ /byang du de bzhin pad+mo
58a5(rgyud): 'o| |nub kyi 'dab mar rin po che/ /lho ru ral gri bsgreng ba 'o/ /pad+ma gzhan rnams thod pa ni/ /bdud rtsi lnga yis rab tu gang / /dung gzhu de bzhin ri rab dang / /rab tu
58a6(rgyud): 'bar ba yi ni me/ /me mtshams la sogs rim bzhin bya/ /'bad pa yis ni yongs su bskor/ /shar gyi sgor ni dpag bsam shing / /byang du 'bras bu sa bon dang / /
58a7(rgyud): nub tu rin chen sdong bu dang / lho ru sna tshogs rdo rje 'o/ /sgo yi phyi rol rdo rje'i phreng / /'od dang ldan pas bskar bar bya/ /lha mo chen mo de lta bu'i/ /dkyil 'khor ye
58b1(rgyud): shes sbyin bdag po/ /dam tshig chen po dang ldan pas/ /rab tu 'bad pa yis ni bya/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni bdag po'i phyir/ /des na bdag ni rab tshim bya/ /dpal ye shes thig le
58b2(rgyud): las| dbang bskur ba blang ba dang / phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o// //bcom ldan 'das mas gsol pa/ kye
58b3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das/ dga' ba bzhi yi ngo bo dang / /bskyed pa'i rim pa ji ltar lags/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dga' ba las ni mchog dga' ba/ /mchog
58b4(rgyud): dga' ba las dga' bral dga'/ /dga' bral las ni lhan cig skyes/ /dga' ba kun gyi de nyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das mas gsol pa/ de lta'i rig pa mgon chen po/ /
58b5(rgyud): rig pa sngar gyi gzhung ngam ci/ /mngon sum dang ni rjes su dpag /sa bon dang 'dra 'bras bu yin/ /go tra ba las sA lu ni/ /gang du yang ni mthong mi 'gyur/ /dga' bral las ni
58b6(rgyud): lhan cig skyes/ /bde min dga' bral sdug bsngal des/ /dga' ba kun ni 'joms par byed/ /mchog gi dbang phyug dga' bral 'di/ /dga' ba kun dang mi mthun no/ /
58b7(rgyud): dga' ba las ni mchog dga' ba/ /mchog dga' ba las shin tu dgyes/ /bcom ldan mkha' 'gro de rigs lags/ /yang na mchog las lhan skyes so/ /bcom ldan
59a1(rgyud): 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma de bden/ /dga' bral las ni lhan skyes min/ /'od kyang de bsrubs pa las yod/ /de
59a2(rgyud): min lhan skyes gang du gnas/ /dga' ba kun dang mi mnyam ste/ /dga' ba kun ni 'joms byed pa/ /'di skad smra ba shin tu mchog /don dam pa yi tshig yin no/ /
59a3(rgyud): dga' kun 'gro ba yang gcig pu/ /yid 'phrog lhan cig skyes pa 'o/ /sprin med snying ga'i nam mkha' ru/ /ye shes nyi ma rab mdzes shing / /dpal ldan ye
59a4(rgyud): shes thig le rgyud/ /nam yang de ni thos ma yin/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas ni mchog /lha mo de ni gang las rnyed/ /rnal 'byor ma dang lhan cig tu/ /du
59a5(rgyud): ma'i rgyud du bshad na yang / /de lta mod kyi rgyud 'di yi/ /bcu drug char yang mi phod do/ /de skad smra ba'i rgyud gzhan kun/ /dge ba'i yid dang ldan yang yin/ /'di
59a6(rgyud): ru dang ba med gyur na/ /dmyal ba la sogs 'gro bar 'gyur/ /mdo sde la sogs gsung rab kun/ /dad cing gus pa kho na yin/ /gang phyir rgyud kun gyi snying po/ /de phyir rgyud
59a7(rgyud): 'di rab kyi mchog / bcom ldan 'das mas gsol pa/ sbas pa'i yi ge drang ba gang / /snying po ye shes 'bras bu ste/ /nye ba'i snying po de ni mgon/ /de ni de ring gsal
59b1(rgyud): bar mdzod/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sngags ni shin tu gsal ba mchog /de lta na yang gsal bar byas/ /sngags kyi bzlas las 'grub par 'gyur/ /grub pa rnyed pas sangs
59b2(rgyud): rgyas sras/ /hA swA Tapha hUM hUM ka la ti na dz+nyA dzrab hAm shrI oM/ /hA swA Tapha Tapha haM haM hUM hUM hriM hriM oM/ hA swA Tapha hUM hUM ye mA k+Sha la ba ma hA ma ye ha ma dzreb oM/ /hA swA Ta pha hUM hUM ra sa wi ra sa oM/ /
59b3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' grangs med pa dang / de bzhin gshegs
59b4(rgyud): pa grangs med pa rnams kyis rdzu 'phrul gyis me tog rnam pa sna tshogs pa man+dA ra ba dang / man+dA ra ba chen po dang / sngon med ba'i me tog rnam pa sna tshogs rnams kyi chun po 'phyang ba dang /
59b5(rgyud): rol mo sna tshogs dang / gar dang / glu dang / mchod pa dang / rig pa 'dzin pas byas pa rmad du byung ba'i chos gos dang / rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs dang / gser dang /
59b6(rgyud): nam mkha' las nor bu'i char bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs kyi rtsar babs par gyur to/ /de nas nam mkha' las de bzhin gshegs pa dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'
59b7(rgyud): rnams kyis bstod pas bstod pa/ sangs rgyas kun gyis ku gcig pu/ /legs so legs so bcom ldan 'das/ /shin tu rmad byung ye shes che/ /mchog gi dbang
60a1(rgyud): phyug gtan la phab/ /'di yi 'khor ni dag byed dge/ /sdig pa thams cad 'jig par byed/ /yang dag mchog gi gsang ba 'di/ /rnyed par
60a2(rgyud): dka' ba don dam pa/ /dpal ldan ye shes thig le'i rgyud/ /ye shes rgya mtsho gtan la phab/ /de lta bu'i tshogs kyi mchod pa byas nas nam mkha' la gnas pa'i
60a3(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa rnams de kho na nyid kyi bsam gtan la bzhugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das mas gsol pa/ kye bcom ldan 'das/ bde ba
60a4(rgyud): chen po gcig pu'i sku/ /tshig rgyas pa yi snying po'i don/ /mchog gi dbang phyug bdag la gsungs/ /mchog gi dbang phyug gis bka' stsal pa/ nyon cig lha mo
60a5(rgyud): gsang ba'i mchog / rgyud kun du ni rnyed dka' ba/ /gsang sna pad+ma'i snying po ni/ /tshogs kyi gnas su 'di ru brjod/ /rdo rje'i rtse mo kha phye'i phyir/ /de ni rgyas par brjod pa'o//
60a6(rgyud): yang na thams cad kyi ni tshogs/ /snying po bya yi gdong mar dran/ /de la rdo rje rtse mo yis/ /phye ba de ni rgyas par brjod/ /i Da ping+gal gnyis kyi dbus/ /rtog med
60a7(rgyud): ye shes ngo bo nyid/ /bsrub dang srub pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /rdo rje'i mthe chung rtse mo las/ /reg byas gang gis bde bar 'dzag /zhal bzang de ni tshig rgyas pa'o/ /lte
60b1(rgyud): pa'i gnas nas smin 'khor lo/ /de nas gnas pa'i rna ba 'o/ /spyi rtse tshangs pa'i bu ga ni/ /tshig rgyas pa ni gsum du dran/ /ma ni srub dang srub pa ste/ /ra ni dga' ba yin
60b2(rgyud): par brjod/ /mu ni lha mo sgrol ma yin/ /da yi yig 'bru zhu ba'i gzugs/ /g+ha yi yig 'bru sgra ru grags/ /ta yi yig 'bru gsal bar byed/ /na ni lte ba'i gsang ba'i
60b3(rgyud): mthar| |de yi dbus su rtag tu shar/ /zla ba'i sku dang 'dra ba gsal/ /nyi ma bye ba'i mnyam pa'i 'od/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba che/ /byang chub kyi ni lam rab ster//
60b4(rgyud): de ni gsang ba ye shes che/ /rang bzhin tshig gis rab gsal byas/ /'bad pa yis ni sba bar bya/ /su la'ang sbyin par mi bya 'o/ /dpal ye shes thig le las/
60b5(rgyud): tshig rgyas par bstan pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'o// //de nas gzhan nyon bdag gis bshad/ /ye shes rab mchog gang gis
60b6(rgyud): smras| |de kho na nyid bdag don zab/ /des bstan la sogs bye brag tu/ /srog gi dbyug pa bzhugs thabs nas/ /rtsa dang ldan pa'i sbyor ba drug /thig le shar ba nub pa dang /
60b7(rgyud): 'pho ba sbyor ba'i mtshan nyid dang / /rtsa yi 'khor lo 'byung ba dgyes/ /dbang gi rim pa de bzhin no/ /srung ba'i 'khor lo lha mo che/ /snying po sngags kyi rgyal po nyid/ /sku brgyad
61a1(rgyud): bdag nyid mchod sbyin dang / /thim dang longs spyod dang ni dbang / /rdo rje lha mo ye shes sku/ /gsang ba'i sgra yang de bzhin no/ /srung ba'i dam
61a2(rgyud): tshig la sogs dang / /dpal ldan sbyin sreg don dam par/ /bsrub dang srub pa'i dgyes pa dang / /sngags kyi bzlas pa mchod sbyin dang / /gnas brgyad sku yi ngo bo dang / /
61a3(rgyud): dga' ba la sogs pa yi mchog /dur khrod rnam rtog med par grags/ /chu ngogs rtog pa med pa dang / /snang ba la sogs mchog ye shes/ /dngos po la sogs
61a4(rgyud): bde ba che/ /thog ma tha ma dur khrod brgyad/ /zhing la sogs pa bstan pa dang / /rlung gi de nyid snying po'i don/ /'jug pa gnas pa 'gro ba dang / /nyer 'gro sbyor ba rab
61a5(rgyud): mchog dang / /nyid ni ye shes thig le dang / /rang gi ngo bo rnam pa mchog /sa la sogs pa'i bdag po dang / /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku skyabs dang / /rgyud kyi rim pa
61a6(rgyud): bstan pa dang / /phyag rgya chen po'i rang bzhin no/ /gsang ba yi ni don dam par/ /de nyid mchod pas bskul ba dang / /shes rab ye shes ji bzhin no/ /gsang ba'i dkyil
61a7(rgyud): 'khor 'khor lo sogs/ /zhal bzang tshig rgyas bstan pa 'o/ /gtor ma 'byung la phan don du/ /sdig pa thams cad 'jig par byed/ /de ni bde ba chen po'i mtha'/ /
61b1(rgyud): de nyid bsdus pa'i snying po'i don/ /bzhi bcu'i bdag nyid de nyid don/ /gsang chen bdag gis rab tu bshad/ /de nyid sum cu drug bdag po/ /char yang ye shes tshor byed do/ /
61b2(rgyud): thig le ye shes bdag nyid tshor/ /de ni sum cu bdun dbang phyug /tshul gyis ye shes bdag nyid tshor/ /de ni sum cu brgyad dbang phyug /tshul tsa ma ye shes tshor byed pa/ /
61b3(rgyud): dgu lhag sum cu de nyid do/ /mchog shes pa yi rnal 'byor gang / /bzhi bcu'i mnga' bdag chen po 'o/ /gzhan mchog gsung lam brjod du med/ /rnam par dag pa de
61b4(rgyud): nyid mchog / thams cad de kho'i bdag nyid phyir/ /de bas bye brag mi bya 'o/ /dpal ye shes thig le las/ de kho na nyid kyi snying po bsdus pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste nyi
61b5(rgyud): shu rtsa drug pa'o/ / //lha mos gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das ni mchog dga' ba/ /kun dga' ba yi rnam pa sku/ /de kho na nyid zhal brgyad pa'i//
61b6(rgyud): rnam par dag pa ji ltar lags/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de nyid sgom pa rnam par dag /skal ldan lha mo khyod nyon cig /zhal brgyad rnam par thar
61b7(rgyud): pa brgyad/ /nang gi stong pa de nyid do/ /spyan ni nyi shu rtsa bzhi ni/ /sa dang stobs dang ye shes so/ /phyag rnams stong nyid rnam par dag /brgyad gnyis phyag ni stong pa nyid/ /spyangs
62a1(rgyud): pa'i yon tan sde dang ldan/ /thod pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid/ /sangs rgyas chos ni ma 'dres pa/ /'jigs byed ma ni brgyad gnyis dbye/ /bsdu ba'i
62a2(rgyud): dngos po bzhi po ni/ /zhabs bzhi ru ni dran pa 'o/ /chags sdang de bzhin gti mug ni/ /legs dgyes zla nyi 'jigs byed do/ /gang zhig srid pa'i gnas su bzhugs/ /zhal
62a3(rgyud): bzang de phyir g.yas brkyang ba/ /lha mo g.yon bskum mya ngan 'das/ /ye shes sku nyid bzhugs pa'o/ /srid dang mya ngan 'das min phyir/ /lha mo de phyir bzhengs pa 'o/ /
62a4(rgyud): gzugs brgyad rnam par dag pa yis/ /sna tshogs pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad/ /gzugs med gnyis kyi 'du shes phyir/ /shes rab thabs gnyis bdag nyid do/ /gar
62a5(rgyud): dgu'i ro dang ldan pa'i phyir/ /zhal bzang mo ni sna tshogs gzugs/ /lha mos gsol pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa mchog dbang phyug /bcom ldan bdag gis rnam
62a6(rgyud): dag shes/ /gsang ba'i don gyis 'di ltar mgon/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa bka' drin gsol/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba'i sgom pa rnam par
62a7(rgyud): dag / lha mo shes rab chen mo nyon/ /zhal dang lhan cig pa yi spyan/ /zhal bzang gnas la sogs pa 'o/ /longs spyod rdzogs par yod pa'i rtsa/ /bcu drug phyag ni
62b1(rgyud): bcu drug pa 'o/ /A li thig le rnam dag pa'i/ /thod pa yin par 'di ru bstan/ /'jigs byed rnam par 'jigs byed ma/ /legs dgyes dga' ba bcu drug go /skad cig
62b2(rgyud): bzhi yi sbyor ba yis/ /zhabs ni bzhi ru dran pa 'o/ /g.yas brkyang ba ni mchog gi dga'/ /g.yon brkyang dga' ba dga' ba yin/ /bzhengs pa lhan skyes dga' ba 'o/ /phyag
62b3(rgyud): rgya pha rol phyin par dran/ /dbang gi rang gi ngo bo 'o/ /thim pa smad kyi tshangs pa'i ras/ /longs spyod zhi ba'i pags pa'i gos/ /legs dgyes dbang phyug yang na gnas/ /
62b4(rgyud): bskyed pa tshangs pa'i pags par grags/ /bong bu'i zhal ni 'jigs pa'i sgra/ /phyag rgya shes rab thabs ni che/ /thabs dang shes rab gnyis med dran/ /byang chub sems
62b5(rgyud): kyi rnam dag pas/ /rus pa sna tshogs rgyan la sogs/ /nam mkha' ru ni 'gro pa'i phyir/ /gyen du 'bar ba'i dbu skyes so/ /rang gi ngo bo bde chen phyir/ /sku mdog nag po
62b6(rgyud): mkha' dang mtshungs/ /dga' bral gyi ni bdud chen po/ /'jigs pa byed phyir 'jigs pa che/ /dpal ye shes thig le las/ rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste nyi
62b7(rgyud): shu rtsa bdun pa'o/ / //de nas bcom ldan 'das mas ma mchu'i bdud rtsi'i ro phul te nyi ma dang zla ba'i me tog gis mchod nas bcom ldan 'das rab tu
63a1(rgyud): tshim par mdzad nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /kye bcom ldan 'das/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus su yang dag par gsang pa'i rgyud 'di skal ba dang
63a2(rgyud): ldan pa'i sems can rnams la sus 'chad par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dpal phyag na rdo rje mgon pos bshad par byed do/ /bcom ldan
63a3(rgyud): 'das mas gsol pa/ ye shes bdud rtsi'i char pa che/ /mgon po khyod kyis rmad byung sbyin/ /phyag na rdo rje mgon po che/ /de yi bskyed pa ji ltar lags/ /rgyal ba'i
63a4(rgyud): mnga' bdag ye shes rgyal/ /de ni tshig gcig bka' stsol cig /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang zhig khyod kyis yongs zhus pa/ /bcom ldan ma
63a5(rgyud): de yang dag nyon/ /phyag na rdo rje mgon chen po/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gyi bdag /mtha' yas pa yi 'jig rten khams/ /skye dang 'jig pa'i rgyu yin no/ /de las skye pa gang
63a6(rgyud): yang med/ /rang byung mchog gi dbang phyug go/ /de yi phyag gi rdo rje ni/ /ye shes bcu gnyis skye ba med/ /thog ma yis ni rwa lnga las/ /de bzhin gshegs pa lnga
63a7(rgyud): 'byung ngo / /mtha' nas 'byung ba chen po lnga/ /dbus nas 'gro ba'i rigs drug 'byung / /lta ba kun ni bsrung don phyir/ /sna tshogs pa yi gzugs su spyod/ /la lar
63b1(rgyud): rdo rje 'dzin pa dang / /la lar sangs rgyas kyi ni gzugs/ /la lar he ru ka yi gzugs/ /la lar de bzhin gshegs pa dang / /la lar byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs/ /la
63b2(rgyud): lar nyan pa lta bur bzhugs/ /la lar 'chad do dgyes pad+ma/ /la lar klog pa'i tshul du bzhugs/ /la lar rgyud dang bstan bcos ni/ /mdzad pa dang ni la lar
63b3(rgyud): 'dzin| |mang du brjod lta ci zhig dgos/ /de ston phyag na rdo rje rgyal/ /lha mos gsol pa/ dkyil 'khor dang ni 'khor la sogs/ /de la mdor bsdus ji ltar lags/
63b4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dkyil 'khor rdo rje 'dzin pa yi/ /mkha' 'gro dbang phyug ma dgyes mdzod/ /gru bzhi la sogs dang ldan pa/ /dur khrod kyi
63b5(rgyud): ni rgyan gyis brgyan/ /shing brgyad kyis ni chal par bkram/ /rdzing brgyad kyis ni brgyan pa 'o/ /de dbus sna tshogs chu skyes ni/ /'dab ma dang ni ge sar bcas/ /de yi dbus
63b6(rgyud): su lha thod pa/ /dum bu gsum pa kun dang bzhi/ /rang gi ngo bo chos kyi dbyings/ /bdud rtsi lngas ni shin tu gang / /hUM gi yig 'bru de dbus gnas/ /ye shes ma yi 'od dang mnyam//
63b7(rgyud): zla ba nyi ma'i gdan la bzhugs/ /sdig pa thams cad 'jig par byed/ /hUM la sogs pa yongs gyur las/ /skad cig gcig gis rmad du byung / /lha mo bcu gnyis dang ldan
64a1(rgyud): pa| |phyag na rdo rje rgyal po bzhengs/ /zhal gcig pa la spyan gsum pa/ /char sprin gyi ni mdog dang mnyam/ /phyag bzhi pa ni rta la bcibs/ /
64a2(rgyud): ma'i 'od dang mnyam pa'i spyan/ /bskal pa chen po'i me dang 'dra/ /nyi ma bye ba'i 'od dang mnyam/ /gdul dka' chen po 'dul bar mdzad/ /snying rje'i rlan gyis brlan
64a3(rgyud): par mdzad/ /phyag rgya lnga 'dzin dpa' bo che/ /ral pa'i dbu rgyan gyis ni brgyan/ /ra la pa sna tshogs rgyan dang ldan/ /sna tshogs rdo rje zla cod pan/ /phyag g.yas pa ni rdo rje
64a4(rgyud): 'dzin| |sna tshogs kyi ni 'od zer 'phro/ /g.yon ni thod pa kha T+wAM ga /gzhan pas rdo rje'i mda' dang gzhu/ /rta ni 'di ru sngon po'i gzugs/ /spyan gsum pa la drag po'i
64a5(rgyud): 'od| |zhi ba'i pags pas sga cha byas/ /dgod pa'i nga ro gshog pa can/ /sna tshogs pad+ma'i 'dab ma la/ /shar dang / lho dang / nub dang / byang du rdo rje 'jigs byed ma
64a6(rgyud): dang / rdo rje drag mo dang / rdo rje gtum mo dang / rdo rje nag mo ste/ nag pa dang / dmar ba dang / ljang ba dang / dkar po ste ngang pa la bcibs pa'o/ /phyag dang mtshon
64a7(rgyud): cha la sogs pa ni/ gtso bo bzhin no/ /mtshams kyi 'dab ma bzhir bdud rtsi sna tshogs pas gang ba'i bum pa'i steng na thod pa'o/ /mtshams su rdo rje 'dod ma dang / /rdo
64b1(rgyud): rje gtsag bu ma dang / rdo rje phreng ba ma dang / rdo rje brtson ma rnams ni/ gzugs gnyis pa'i sku/ nam mkha' lding la bcibs pa gtso bo lta bu'o/ /shar sgo la sogs par rdo rje
64b2(rgyud): sha wa ri dang / rdo rje ro langs ma dang / rdo rje rab tu gtum ma dang / rdo rje Dom+b+hi ni ste/ nam mkha' sngon po dang / nyi ma'i 'od dang / me'i kha dog dang / du ba'i mdog bya
64b3(rgyud): rgod la bcibs pa mtshams kyi bzhin no/ /dkyil 'khor gyi phyogs bzhi'i snam bu la tshangs pa dang / brgya byin dang / drag po dang / mi mchog la sogs pa 'dre'i
64b4(rgyud): rgyal po rang rang gi mtshon cha phyag na bsnams pa du ma bya'o/ /lha mos gsol pa/ phyag na rdo rje gtso bo'i gsang sngags ni/ gang / sems can rnams kyis ji ltar bsgom
64b5(rgyud): par bgyi/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha mo sngags ni yi ge drug /thams cad 'dod pa'i don grub byed/ /gdug pa thams cad 'jigs byed cing / /nad
64b6(rgyud): rnams kun ni zad par byed/ /dngos grub thams cad rab tu sbyin/ /thams cad mkhyen pas mi thub bo/ /oM badzra pA Ni hUM/ rnal 'byor khro po'i lta bas bzla/ /skad cig gcig/
64b7(rgyud): gis khams gsum gsod/ /yang na zhi ba'i lta bas bzla/ /mtha' yas pa yi nad zhi byed/ /mchod sbyin yang dag cher byas nas/ /sngon du bsnyen pa bye ba bya/ /zhi ba la
65a1(rgyud): sogs sbyin sreg bya/ /ji ltar sngar ni bdag gis smras/ /dur khrod yang na chu ngogs su/ /phyag na rdo rje bsgrub par bya/ /dung chen gyi ni phreng ba yis/ /
65a2(rgyud): 'grub pa'i don phyir bye ba bzla/ /zhi ba zhi ba'i sems kyis ni/ /drag po drag po sgrub par dka'/ /dbang bskur med pa'i sems can la/ /sngags 'di sbyin par mi bya ste/ /mkhas
65a3(rgyud): pas bris sku glegs bam ni/ /nam yang de la bstan mi bya/ /de lta min na 'grub mi 'gyur/ /kun nas kun tu rab tu blta/ /gsang ba yis ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /kun nas
65a4(rgyud): kun tu zhal bzang mo/ /pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad gyes pa/ /'dab ma sna tshogs pa yis mdzes/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /mnga' bdag phyag na rdo rje rgyal/ /rgyal
65a5(rgyud): po'i bzhugs thabs kyis ni bzhugs/ /nam mkha'i mdog ltar sngo ba ste/ /phyag bzhi pa la zhal gcig pa/ /spyan gsum pa la zhi ba'i gzugs/ /g.yas dang g.yon
65a6(rgyud): pa'i phyag gnyis ni/ /rdo rje thod pa kha T+wAM ga /chos kyi don ni 'chad pa'i phyir/ /phyag gnyis chos kyi phyag rgya 'o/ /'dab ma bdun la sangs rgyas bdun/ /brgyad pa la ne byams
65a7(rgyud): pa 'o| |pa ti la sogs shing la brten/ /thams cad zla ba'i gdan du dran/ /gshin rje gshed la sogs pa bzhi/ /gzhan min sgo la sogs par dgod/ /rdo rje lcags kyu la
65b1(rgyud): sogs bzhi/ /sgo yi mtshams su gnas pa 'o/ /sgo yi phyi rol snam bu'i gnas/ /yang dag lha chen la sogs pa'o/ /rdo rje phreng bas kun tu mchog /mkhas pas yongs su
65b2(rgyud): bskor bya 'o/ /dpal ye shes thig le las/ dpal phyag na rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor bskyed pa'i sgom pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa'o// //de
65b3(rgyud): n as de'i dus su 'khor thams cad stan las langs te lan gsum du bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te tshigs su bcad pa
65b4(rgyud): 'di dag brjod do/ /mgon khyod bka' drin gyis ni bdag cag dag /gzhan dang mi mnyam rgyal bas rnyed dka' ba/ /blta bar dka' ba shes dka' gzung bar dka'/ /
65b5(rgyud): gsang ba'i gsang ba mchog gi mchog rab nyid/ /dpa' bo dbang phyug chos dbyings phyag 'tshal bstod/ /log shes mun nag 'joms la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dang
65b6(rgyud): po'i sangs rgyas mchog char grags la 'dud/ /yig bral thig le skye med la phyag 'tshal/ /nam mkha'i rang bzhin tshul grags la phyag 'tshal/ /gnyis su med pa'i
65b7(rgyud): tshul tsam la phyag 'tshal/ /mchog gi rang bzhin phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /gzhan min gzhan mchog rang bzhin phyag 'tshal lo/ /dpal ye shes thig le las/ bstod
66a1(rgyud): pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa dgu pa'o/ / //yang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor thams cad dang bcas
66a2(rgyud): pa'i bcom ldan 'das ma la bos te/ kye bcom ldan 'das ma/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma sbyor drug gi grags pa bcu dang bral ba bcu gsum gyi bdag nyid/ dpal
66a3(rgyud): mchog gi bla ma'i zhal snga nas pad+ma btsal te bsam gtan la sogs pas yang dag par mthong ba zhes gtan la phab pa'o/ / //dpal ye shes thig le
66a4(rgyud): las| mchog tu gsang zhing shin tu gsang ba thams cad mkhyen ba rnams kyis kyang rnyed par dka' ba/ rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rmad du byung ba mchog chen po nang gi rnam
66a5(rgyud): par shes pa drug gi bstod pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i le'u ste sum cu pa'o/ / //dpal ye shes thig le rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po
66a6(rgyud): rdzogs so/ / //rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po shrI pra dz+nyA gup+tas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ slad kyis dpal sa skya'i dben gnas su zhu gtugs g.yar
66a7(rgyud): khral bgyis so/ /rgya gar skad du/ shrI tA twa pra dI paM nA ma ma hA yo gi nI tan+t+ra rA dza/ bod skad du/ dpal de kho na nyid kyi sgron ma zhes bya ba rnal 'byor chen mo'i rgyud kyi rgyal po/
66b1(rgyud): dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs
66b2(rgyud): rdo rje dpa' bo chen po dang dpa' mo'i dbang phyug mas yang dag par bskor nas shes rab kyi b+ha ga la bzhugs so/ /der bcom ldan 'das ma rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug mas
66b3(rgyud): legs dgyes chen po'i rol pas sgeg pas nye bar longs spyod pa dang / ma mchu'i bdud rtsi'i btung bas bcom ldan 'das mnyes par byas te kha sbyor gyi thabs kyi sbyor ba
66b4(rgyud): l as langs nas ri rab kyi nyi rdul gyi grangs kyi rnal 'byor ma dang lhan cig pas lan gsum du bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te
66b5(rgyud): 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan ye shes zla bar grags/ /lte ba'i ku mud kha 'byed pa/ /gang zhig bdag gi zhu ba kun/ /mnga' bdag chen pos bdag la gsungs/ /
66b6(rgyud): dpal ldan bla na med pa'i rgyud/ /rnal 'byor ma zhes rab grags pa/ /e baM ma ya la sogs sgra'i/ /don ni ji lta bur ni brjod/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
