66b7(rgyud): nyon cig lha mo spyan bzang ring / /khyod kyis nga la gang zhus pa/ /e baM ma ya sogs sgra yis/ /khams gsum 'gro dang mi 'gro bcas/ /shes rab thabs kyi rang bzhin
67a1(rgyud): gyis| |thams cad rgyas btab gzhan gyis min/ /de kho na nyid sgron mar grags/ /dri med rdzogs pa'i 'bras bu'i gzugs/ /e baM ma
67a2(rgyud): ya de nyid gsum/ /thog mar bdag bcas pa dang ni/ /rang bzhin bzhi yi bye brag tu/ /don dam bar ni shes par bya/ /thos pa'i don ni zla ba bde/ /de ni nam mkha'
67a3(rgyud): bzhin du mchog / gcig ces bya ba gzhan mchog rab/ /srid dang mya ngan 'das pa spangs/ /dus ni phyag rgya chen po ste/ /bskyed pa dang ni rdzogs dang bral/ /bcom ldan
67a4(rgyud): 'das ni mtha' zhes bya/ /rang dga' nyams su myong ba'i dngos/ /thams cad ye shes gsum stong nyid/ /de nyid de nyid kyis ni spangs/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnam
67a5(rgyud): 'byed grags/ /dang po'i gnas ni rab tu byed/ /sku ni dga' ba'i gzugs su grags/ /dbang po gnyis byung dang bral ba/ /gsung ni mngon par dga' zhes bya/ /
67a6(rgyud): dam tshig las byung gis ni spangs/ /thugs ni dga' bral dga' zhes bya/ /ye shes las byung bde dang bral/ /rdo rje lhan skyes zhes su bstan/ /rang bzhin gyis
67a7(rgyud): ni spangs pa 'o/ /lha mo dpal chen nyi ma skyes/ /zhu ba dga' bral dang bral lo/ /dpa' mo'i dbang phyug ma bde rten/ /dang po'i bdud rtsi las skyes so/ /yan lag kun
67b1(rgyud): gyis yang dag bskor/ /khyab pa srog gi pad+ma bzhin/ /shes rab tshangs pa'i sgo lnga'i khyim/ /tshangs pa'i ye shes 'dzin phyir ro/ /b+ha ga dngos po 'jig pa yis/ /yang na longs
67b2(rgyud): spyod myong bas so/ /bzhugs pa rang gi ngo bo la/ /gnas pa yang na gshegs pa 'o/ /de lta bu ni don dam par/ /'di skad bdag la sogs par bshad/ /thams cad rnal
67b3(rgyud): 'byor rgyud du sbas/ /de bzhin rnal 'byor bla mar yang / /nges dang dran don bye brag tu/ /e baM ma ya la sogs gnas/ /rgyud shes pa yi don phyir te/ /gnyis su dbye ba'i
67b4(rgyud): rgyud rab bstan/ /'bras bu ye shes chen po'i ro/ /rang gis nyams myong ngo bo nyid/ /rang rig ngag gis mi rnyed pas/ /rtog pa thams cad rnam par spangs/ /lha mos
67b5(rgyud): gsol ba/ bcom ldan ye shes rgyal po nyid/ /log pa'i ye shes mun 'joms pa/ /de nyid nyi shu gnyis bdag nyid/ /gang zhig ye shes thig ler gsungs/ /de
67b6(rgyud): la yang ni nges ba'i don/ /mchog gi dbang phyug bdag la gsungs/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang zhig de nyid nges don du/ /zhal bzang de ni gsang ba
67b7(rgyud): 'o| |khyod kyi ngor byas bdag gis bshad/ /de lta min na sbas pa 'o/ /e baM rnam pa'i dbus su gang zhig drug cu rtsa bzhi'i 'dab ma'i dbyibs kyi rtsa'i 'khor lo de ni/ rnam
68a1(rgyud): pa dang bcas pa'i rnam par shes pa'o/ /de'i nang du gang du rtsa sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi bdag nyid ut+pa la'i rnam pa'i 'khor lo de ni/ mtha' ste/
68a2(rgyud): de la gang zhig zur brgyad pa'i rnam pa'i lte ba de ni/ snang ba'o/ /gang zhig lte ba'i dbus yangs pa de ni/ nam mkha'o/ /der ni lnga gnyis nas bzung ste bco lnga'i bar
68a3(rgyud): gyi sa'am| dbang phyug gi mnga' bdag bzhugs so/ /der gang zhig de kho na nyid gsum gyi bdag nyid de ni/ lan gsum 'bab pa'i phung po'i rnam par shes pa sems
68a4(rgyud): dang sems las byung ba dang ma rig pa'i gzugs kyis gsum du dbye ba zur dang po la thun tshod gcig gi bar du 'phar ba'o/ /gang zhig srog gi dbyig pa de ni/ lu
68a5(rgyud): g u rgyud kyi rnam pa'i mdud pa sum cu rtsa gnyis su sbom pa dang phra ba'i thig le ro gcig pa'i gzugs kyis dbyig pa'i bdud rtsi zur gnyis pa la thun tshod gnyis kyi
68a6(rgyud): bar du zhu ba'o/ /drug po de ni/ bskyed pa dang rdzogs pa'i grags pa dga' ba drug zur gsum pa la thun tshod gsum gyi bar du 'dzag pa'o/ /gang zhig thig le shar ba
68a7(rgyud): dang nub pa de ni/ thim pa dang longs spyod du grags pa'i srog de ni/ zur bzhi pa la thun tshod bzhi'i bar du 'bar ba'o/ /gang zhig 'pho ba'i sbyor ba de ni/ steng dang
68b1(rgyud): 'og gi 'dab ma yod par byang chub kyi sems 'dus pa'i dbang ni/ zur lnga pa la thun tshod lnga'i bar du zhu ba'o/ /gang zhig rtsa'i 'khor lo 'byung ba de ni/ yan lag thams
68b2(rgyud): cad la bdud rtsi rgyas pa zur drug pa la thun tshod drug gi bar du 'dzag pa'o/ /gang zhig dbang gi rim pa de ni/ gcig nyid srog gi kha ru srog la 'bab pa dang / 'phur
68b3(rgyud): pa dang khyab pa de yang zur bdun pa la thun tshod bdun pa'i bar du 'bar ba'o/ /gang zhig srung ba'i 'khor lo de ni/ mthe'u chung gi mdud pa'i nang du bdud rtsi la bskor
68b4(rgyud): ba zur brgyad pa la thun tshod brgyad kyi bar du zhu ba'o/ /de dag ni/ g.yon du bskor ba'i srog gi rlung la zhon pa nyi ma skye ba la mtshan mo dang / nyi mo'i bar du sum cu rtsa
68b5(rgyud): gnyis kyi cha rgyas par 'gyur ro/ /sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi nang na bcu drug bral ba'i mtshan nyid mi gsal ba dang / dga' ba'i mtshan nyid bcu drug gsal ba de'i don
68b6(rgyud): gyi phyir dga' bral gyi dga' ba'i mtshan nyid A li'i rang gi ngo bo zla ba'o/ /phyi dang phyi'i don rnams kyis ni/ nang dang nang gi don gnas par shes par bya'o/ /de yang
68b7(rgyud): phyi'i tshes kyi grangs kyis so/ /nang srog gi rlung gi grangs kyis so/ /lha mos gsol pa/ sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi chu skyes kyi ut+pa la'i rnam pa la bde ba chen po'i kun tu spyod pa
69a1(rgyud): nges pa'i don gyis gnas pa de mchog gi dbang phyug gi dka' drin bskyab tu gsol/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyon cig lha mo
69a2(rgyud): skal ldan mo/ /gsang ba chen po ye shes mchog /gang zhig shes pa tsam gyis ni/ /thams cad sa yi dbang phyug 'gyur/ /gang zhig snying po'i sngags ni nyid/ /de ni bdag
69a3(rgyud): nyid bcu drug bde/ /kun rdzob ri bong can gyi 'od/ /don dam par ni nam mkha' bzhin/ /gang zhig sku brgyad mchog sbyin ni/ /de ni mtshan mo brgyad mchog go /lha mo yang
69a4(rgyud): na ye shes brgyad/ /mtshan mo nyin mo gnyis las 'byung / /gang zhig thim dang longs spyod dbang / /de ni nges par bskyed rim mo/ /lha mo bskyed rim gsal ba ste/ /
69a5(rgyud): rim las byung ba'i bde ba che/ /skal ldan mo gang ye shes sku/ /de ni rim sogs yan lag spangs/ /yan lag bzhir dbye drug dbye 'am/ /bskyed dang rdzogs pa'i
69a6(rgyud): rim pa 'o/ /lha mo gang zhig gsang ba'i sgra/ /de ni ye shes gsum dang bral/ /yang na gzhan min bdag nyid gsum/ /mtshams kyi ye shes yod pa'i phyir/ /lha mo
69a7(rgyud): gang zhig dam tshig ni/ /srung ba la sogs nges par ro/ /de ni bde ba dbus gnas su/ /gzung bya yang na gang nang du/ /gang zhig sbyin sreg don dam par/ /de ni ha zhes
69b1(rgyud): glo bur ste/ /char yang dbus yod thig le ni/ /gang du skad cig gis thim mo/ /gang zhig bsrub dang srub thabs ni/ /de ni thog ma'i dga' ba spangs/ /lha mo de bzhin tha
69b2(rgyud): ma'ang min/ /thog ma tha ma gnyis dang bral/ /skal ldan mo gang sngags kyi bzlas/ /de ni srid pa 'das ba'i yid/ /mya ngan 'das pa'i gnas kyang min/ /gnyis kyi ngo bo
69b3(rgyud): gnyis dang bral/ /gang zhig gnas ni brgyad du bstan/ /de ni nyi skyes ma rgyas pa/ /gnas kyi dbang gis shar ba la/ /nye bas myur du rgyas pa 'o/ /gang zhig dga' ba la
69b4(rgyud): sogs rim/ /de ni rim pa gnyis su dbye/ /rnam bcas las ni dang po ba/ /rnam bral bcu yi dbang phyug go /gang zhig dur khrod rnam rtog bral/ /dbugs dbyung la sogs
69b5(rgyud): rnam par spangs/ /byang chub kyi ni sems ro la/ /rnam par zhu ba dam tshig phyir/ /lha mo gang zhig chu yi ngogs/ /de ni rtog med ma yi mthar/ /yang na de ru srog gi rtsa/ /bde
69b6(rgyud): ba'i chu bo 'bab pa'i phyir/ /gang zhig snang ba sogs ye shes/ /de ni dga' ba dang ldan yid/ /sa dang chu dang 'od kyi gzugs/ /de bzhin rlung gi ngo bo dang / /gang zhig dngos
69b7(rgyud): po rten la sogs/ /de ni bde ba'i dang por rig /rang gi rnam pa'i bye brag gam/ /rnam par dpyod pas nges par spyod/ /lha mo gang zhig dur khrod brgyad/ /de ni bde ba la thim
70a1(rgyud): zhes| |rnam par rtog pa 'dzin pa'i sku/ /de la thim zhing thim pa 'o/ /gang zhig shing la sogs pa'i don/ /de ni dang po'i bdud rtsi rgyu/ /rtsa de
70a2(rgyud): rten pa'i gzugs su grags/ /thams cad rnam pa'i bde sbyin ma/ /gang rlung de nyid snying po'i don/ /de ni rin chen gdu bu'i bde/ /'dzum pa yis ni yang dag par//
70a3(rgyud): pad+ma'i zhal de myong ba 'o/ /lha mo gang zhig mdzub la sogs/ /de ni gyen du bzung ba'i rlung / /yang na rtsa yi kun spyod las/ /'gro ba'i bdud rtsi 'dzin pa 'o/ /gang zhig
70a4(rgyud): nyer 'gro'i bsam gtan sbyor/ /de ni zla ba gyen du byed/ /yang na tshangs bzhi rnam dbye byas/ /rnam par shes pa las gshegs gsol/ /gang nyid ye shes thig le
70a5(rgyud): ni| |de ni drug byed gsum dang bral/ /bcu dang lnga yis rnams ni/ /dbang phyug 'pho med skye med do/ /gang zhig bdag gi rang ngo mchog /de ni nges par bzhi pa'i 'bras//
70a6(rgyud): yang na tor ya nyams su myong / /'bras bu'i sgras ni brjod pa 'o/ /gang zhig sa yi dbang byed pa/ /de ni de nyid drug rang bzhin/ /de nyid drug las de nyid gsum/ /de nyid
70a7(rgyud): gsum las rang bzhin gcig / gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku/ /de ni mya ngan 'das mtshan nyid/ /yang na dga' ba dang ni bral/ /dga' bral dga' min rang
70b1(rgyud): ngo bo| |lha mo gang zhig rgyud bstan pa/ /de ni bde ba shin tu 'phel/ /bde dang bral ba'i bde ba ni/ /yang na de nyid rnyed pa 'o/ /gang zhig phyag rgya che rang bzhin/ /de ni thim sogs yid
70b2(rgyud): las 'das/ rang gis nyams myong rang ngo bo/ /bsam gtan 'dzin pa spangs pa 'o/ /gang zhig gsang ba don dam par/ /de ni dga' ba dga' dang bral/ /yang na nang gi reg
70b3(rgyud): bya ste| |reg bya dang bral rtog pa med/ /gang zhig bskul ba'i mchod pa'i don/ /de ni dri med bde ba 'byung / /'das pa las ni yang skye ba/ /skye ba de la 'phel ba 'o/ /lha mo
70b4(rgyud): shes rab ye shes gang / /de ni kha la snying gar bde/ /kha ni rtag tu shes rab yin/ /snying ga ye shes brjod pa 'o/ /gang zhig gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'khor/ /de ni khu ba
70b5(rgyud): 'pho med dge / yang na bde chen rang ngo bo/ /bde ba'i rnam par rtog dang bral/ /lha mo tshigs rgyas gang zhig ni/ /bya gdong ma de khong du chud/ /yang na tshigs ni zhu med khu/ /
70b6(rgyud): dga' mo rgyas pa mchog yin no/ /'byung ba bsrung don gtor ma gang / /de ni srog chags bsad pa 'o/ /bcad pa de ni mchog gis gnas/ /'gro ba 'gog par byed
70b7(rgyud): pa 'o| |de dag ni/ mchog gi gsang ba chen po'i gsang chen bcom ldan 'das ma bzhi bcu'i bdag nyid kyi de kho na nyid bde ba chen po'i rgyal po'i bdud rtsi'i gter la
71a1(rgyud): nges pa'i don to/ /lha mos gsol pa/ bzhi bcu'i bdag nyid de nyid ni/ /shin tu reg med gzung bar dka'/ /sa yi dbang phyug du tsam
71a2(rgyud): zhig / mchog gi dbang phyug gis mkhyen lags/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sna tshogs rnyed pa sum cu drug /bcu gcig sa yi bdag po 'o/ /dga'
71a3(rgyud): ba rnyed pa sum cu bdun/ /bcu gnyis sa yi bdag por brjod/ /mchog dga' rnyed pa sum cu brgyad/ /de ni bcu gsum pa yi sa/ /sum cu dgu lhag mthar thug
71a4(rgyud): pa| |sa ni bcu bzhi rnyed pa 'o/ /bzhi bcu de ni lhan skyes so/ /bco lnga rnyed pa'i mnga' bdag go /gang zhig bcu drug pa yi sa/ /brjod du med pa nam mkha' bzhin/ /de la
71a5(rgyud): dbang phyug mchog gi mkha'/ /thams cad mkhyen pa rnyed dka' ba/ /zag med 'pho med zhi ba ste/ /skye med rmad byung bas rmad byung / /kye bcom ldan 'das/ sum
71a6(rgyud): cu rtsa gnyis kyi bdag nyid bde ba chen po'i bdud rtsi'i gter de kho na nyid de la kun tu spyod pa'i dus ni/ gang lags/ 'dus pa ni/ ci zhig lags/ nyams su
71a7(rgyud): myong ba ni/ gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi bdag nyid la sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi chu tshod kyi bar du srog dang rtsol ba'i
71b1(rgyud): rlung gnyis shar ba ni/ kun tu spyod pa'o/ /rtsol ba'i rlung 'byung ba'i dus su gang zhig yan lag thams cad la khyab pa'i srog de g.yon bskor du 'byung bas ut+pa la'i
71b2(rgyud): rnam pa 'dzum zhing nang gi lte ba'i snying po rtsa ba'i sdong bus 'jug pa'o/ /'jug pa tsam gyis zur brgyad pa'i nang na yod pa'i bde ba chen po'i srog gi rgyal po la gang
71b3(rgyud): zhig ro gcig pa'i mtshan nyid de ni/ 'dus pa'o/ /de'i dus su gang zhig bdag dang gzhan gyi bye brag med pa gnyis su med pa'i spros pa dang bral ba'i ye shes kyis thams
71b4(rgyud): cad gzigs pa de nyams su myong ba'o/ /lha mos gsol pa/ gang zhig nyams myong las rnyed de/ /mnga' bdag de ni ji ltar lags/ /nyams su myong bas gang rnyed pa/ /de
71b5(rgyud): nyid mdor bsdus bka' stsol cig / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dris pa de ni rmad byung mchog /nyon cig lha mo spyan bzang ring / /nyams su myong bas
71b6(rgyud): gang rnyed pa/ /dga' ba'i dbang mo de brjod med/ /bla ma'i zhal nas nyams su myong / /dbang bskur las ni rnyed pa 'o/ /lha mos gsol pa/ dbang bskur ba ni du ma zhig /
71b7(rgyud): rgyud rgyud nang du rab tu gsal/ /'di ru bye brag ci 'dra ba/ /su la sbyin par bgyi ba lags/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dga' ba'i 'bras bu bye brag tu/ /
72a1(rgyud): dbang ni re zhig bzhi ru dbye/ /dang po dga' ba dang ldan pa/ /las dang po la sbyin par bya/ /gnyis pa mchog dga' dang ldan pa/ /snang ba gsum
72a2(rgyud): ni thob pa la/ /dga' ba gsum pa dang ldan pa/ /chos kyi sprin rnyed nges pas so/ /kun tu 'od sa zhes bya ba/ /rnyed pa bzhi la sbyin par bya/ /lha mos gsol pa/ kye bcom
72a3(rgyud): ldan 'das/ snang ba la sogs pa dang / chos kyi sprin dang kun tu 'od rnyed pa la de lta bu'i dbang gi rim pa lags na/ sa la sogs pa ma rnyed pa la ji ltar lags/
72a4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sa la sogs pa ma rnyed pa rnams la thog mar rang gri ngo bos so/ /sa la sogs pa rnyed pa rnams la mthar thug pa'i rang gi ngo
72a5(rgyud): bos so| |gang gi phyir zhe na/ de rnams la brtson 'grus kyi stobs kyis shin tu bsod nams kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis bya ba la sogs pa dang bral ba'i ye shes chen po
72a6(rgyud): mthong ba tsam gyis thob bo/ /ji ltar pad+ma yongs su smin pa nyi ma'i 'od kyis reg pa tsam gyis rgyas so/ /ma smin pa de bzhin du ma yin no/ /lha mos gsol pa/ ma
72a7(rgyud): smin pa rnams la yongs su smin pa'i dus gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sbyin sogs bsod nams bsags pa yis/ /mchog gi
72b1(rgyud): bla mas gtan la phab/ /skal ldan mo de smin pa'i dus/ /de las bla med byang chub ni/ /bla med gnas ni thob pa gang / /phyi nas ci yang bslab mi dgos/ /bla med ye shes
72b2(rgyud): chen po'i gnas/ /'bad min de ni mthong ba 'o/ /ji ltar nyi ma shar tsam gyis/ /sna tshogs gzugs ni mthong bar 'gyur/ /de bzhin bla med 'od kyis ni/ /ye shes chen po
72b3(rgyud): mthong bar 'gyur/ /ye shes chen po sku dang bral/ /gnyis su med pa nam mkha' bzhin/ /lus dang ngag dang yid gzugs min/ /sgra la sogs pa rnam par spangs/ /
72b4(rgyud): dpe med nam mkha' dang bral ba/ /srid dang mya ngan 'das pa spangs/ /sbom dang phra la sogs las 'das/ /char yang thig le dang bral ba/ /tshul dang tshul tsam ma yin
72b5(rgyud): te| |mchog dang gzhan mchog gnas las grol/ /skye ba med dang 'chi med pa/ /rmad byung chen po'i 'du shes so/ /lha mos gsol pa/ kye bcom ldan 'das/ ye shes
72b6(rgyud): chen po'i dbang phyug bla na med pa'i yang dag pa'i byang chub rnyed pa la ye shes chen po brjod du med pa'i gnas gzhan rnyed pa yod dam ci/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
72b7(rgyud): stsal pa| grangs med pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi yum khyod ci la de lta bur 'dri/ brjod du med pa'i ye shes chen po khyod kyis ci phyir mi shes/ de ltar yin na bdag
73a1(rgyud): gi rang gi ngo bo yang dag par khyod mi shes so/ /lha mos gsol pa/ khyod kyi ngo bo bdag gis shes/ /'on kyang bdag gis gzhan zhig zhus/ /
73a2(rgyud): sems can byang chub las gzhan ci/ /mchog gi dbang phyug rnyed pa 'am/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byang chub rnyed las gzhan ci zhig /zhal bzang mo
73a3(rgyud): de rnyed yod dam/ /'on kyang de la mthong ba yod/ /tshil la bdud rtsi ji bzhin no/ /lha mos gsol pa/ bcom ldan dpa' bo'i dpa' dbang phyug /rang bzhin ye shes sbyin
73a4(rgyud): pa po| |bdag gis gzhan zhig zhu ba bgyid/ /de la bka' drin bdag la stsol/ /dbang gi rim pa'i ye shes gang / /bzhi pa de ltar de bzhin no/ /de la re zhig ji bzhin
73a5(rgyud): don| |rdo rje 'dzin pa bdag la gsungs/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bzhi pa de nyid ngo bor grags/ /de ltar ye shes 'dus shes so/ /de bzhin ye shes
73a6(rgyud): las byung zhes/ /ye shes las byung lte bar bde/ /lha mo ye shes kha la yod/ /ye shes las byung ske ru ste/ /ske ru longs spyod ngo bor grags/ /snying ga ru ni dbang zhes bya/ /
73a7(rgyud): thim pa kha ru shes bya ste/ /bskyed pa'i rim pa yi ni phyogs/ /yang ni de bzhin gyi ni sgra/ /ji bzhin shes rab la sngar thal/ /de ltar ye shes lta ba yis/ /bkug nas rang gi
73b1(rgyud): kha la bkod/ /rang gi snying ga'i pad gnas su/ /byas nas nyid kyis nyams su myong / /de yi skad cig ye shes bde/ /spros pa dang bal rtog med pa/ /sems kyis thams cad mthong
73b2(rgyud): nas su| |nam mkha' bzhin du bsam par bya/ /de yang bsam pa bor nas su/ /phyi nas bsam pa ci yang med/ /nyid ni bde chen ye shes te/ /nam mkha' zla ba bzhin du
73b3(rgyud): mthong / /lha mo de ni rdzogs pa'i rim/ /don dam par ni shes par bya/ /lha mos gsol pa/ bcom ldan ye shes rin chen nyi/ /'dod pa thams cad rab 'grub pa/ /snang ba
73b4(rgyud): bzhi la go rim gnas/ /mnga' bdag chen pos bka' stsol cig /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ snang ba bzhi la go rim gnas/ /sems dang sems byung
73b5(rgyud): 'du shes so/ /de dag las ni ma rig 'byung / /mtshams kyi 'du shes mtshan nyid can/ /nyin mo'i rang bzhin sems las 'byung / /sems ni mtshan mo'i ngo bo nyid/ /
73b6(rgyud): yang dag 'od ni gsum dang bral/ /lhan skyes ye shes mtshan nyid do/ /gang tshe tshangs pa'i tshigs su sems/ /lha mo de tshe nyin mor 'gyur/ /gang tshe de las srog 'phro
73b7(rgyud): ba| |de tshe mtshan mo 'og na gnas/ /steng yang ma yin 'og ma min/ /de tshe mtshams shes dran par bya/ /de yang me yi rang bzhin grags/ /nyi ma la ni srog 'dzin ma/ /gang
74a1(rgyud): gis nyi ma yod pa ni/ /snang ba las ni shar dus 'gyur/ /snang ba zla ba zhes par bstan/ /yongs su zhu ba'i bdud rtsi g.yo/ /lha mo chen mo
74a2(rgyud): g.yo ba'i phyir/ /dga' bral dga' bar rab tu grags/ /gang du chad pa las ni thim/ /mchog gi dga' ba shar ba'i dus/ /de ni snang ba dang po'i dga'/ /de las mchog
74a3(rgyud): ni gsal bar 'gyur/ /gsang phyir snang ba mtshan par grags/ /zhu med g.yo med ska ba 'o/ /ska ba la ni phra mo'i dngos/ /bde sbyin yang na kun spyod do/ /kun spyod las ni
74a4(rgyud): thob pa yin/ /zhal bzang mo ni snang bas so/ /de ni mtshams zhes grags pa ste/ /dbus kyi gnas su yod pa'i phyir/ /dbus kyi gnas na yod pa na/ /de phyir kun tu spyod
74a5(rgyud): byed pa'o/ /dbus ni dngos po thams cad la/ /'dus par byed pa dran pa 'o/ /yang na gang du mtshan mo ni/ /ma byung nyi ma nub pa 'o/ /de ni dbus kyi mtshams zhes
74a6(rgyud): grags| |rang bzhin dga' ba sbyin byed ma/ /de nyid snang ba thob pa yin/ /thams cad skye ba'i rgyu yin no/ /gang du dbus mtshams skad cig gis/ /bde ba'i tshor ba
74a7(rgyud): ma shes na| / skal ldan lha mo de ru ni/ /dga' bral gsal bar 'gyur ba'o/ /de yi nyams su myong shes pa/ /skyon ni cung zad mi byed do/ /mi shes pas ni skal ldan mo/ /
74b1(rgyud): rtsa ba dang bcas med par byed/ /rtsa ba snang ba zhes byar dran/ /khu ba'i gzugs ni zla ba 'o/ /bde ba chen po'i bdud rtsi'i gter/ /bsrubs las skye ba yin pa'i phyir/ /lha mo me
74b2(rgyud): tog snang ba mched/ /dmar ba'i phyir na nyi mar brjod/ /bde chen rnam par smin pa'i phyir/ /dmar ba'i gzugs ni sngar 'gyur ro/ /'bras bu thob pa'i grags pa ste/ /mtshan
74b3(rgyud): dang dpe byad dang ldan no/ /dngos dang dngos min bral ba'i phyir/ /zhal bzang mtshams kyi ye shes so/ /nyin mo snang ba mched 'khor grags/ /mtshan mo snang ba mya ngan
74b4(rgyud): 'das| |srid dang mya ngan 'das bral pa/ /mtshams ni snang ba thob pa 'o/ /de lta bu yi gsang chen mchog /gang du yang ni gsal ma byas/ /skal ldan khyod kyi ngor byas pas/ /
74b5(rgyud): ye shes rin chen gsal byas so/ /lha mos gsol pa/ 'bras bu de nyid rin chen gang / /mnga' bdag de ni ji ltar rnyed/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'bras
74b6(rgyud): bu de ni rin chen gang / /de ni gnyis su dbye bar gnas/ /mchog gi dga' ba'i ngo bo gcig /mchog gi dga' ba dang bral ba/ /mchog dga' ngo bor grags pa ni/ /nyams
74b7(rgyud): su myong bas rnyed pa yin/ /mchog gi dga' ba dang bral ba/ /rang las rab tu gsal bar 'gyur/ /skal ldan mo gang nyams su myong / /de ni rdzogs pa'i rang bzhin no/ /
75a1(rgyud): nyams su myong min rdzogs pa ni/ /gang du sus kyang mi shes so/ /ji ltar bu mo lang tsho bab/ /skyes bu med na nam yang min/ /legs dgyes
75a2(rgyud): kyi ni bde myong ba/ /legs dgyes dbang mo mi shes so/ /gang zhig bsam pa la sogs kyis/ /de ni bskyed pa'i mtshan nyid do/ /bskyed pa dang ni rdzogs bral ba/ /de ni 'bras
75a3(rgyud): mchog rang bzhin no/ /de ru gang zhig sgom pa ni/ /phra mo'i phra mo yang dag mchog /gang gis bla na med pa rnyed/ /'gro ba'i ma de yod pa min/ /bla na med pa'i ye
75a4(rgyud): shes che| |bzhi dang bral ba rtag tu shar/ /rtag tu shar ba las gzhan ci/ /gang du yang na sgom yod dam/ /gal te gang gis sgom pa de/ /khyad par can du yongs mi
75a5(rgyud): skye| |mi skye'i phyir na bsam gtan ngal/ /gal te khyad par 'ong 'gyur na/ /de ni de nyid rang bzhin min/ /de nyid min par the tshom med/ /de nyid mi sgom de nyid ni/ /su
75a6(rgyud): zhig de la rnyed par 'dod/ /de ni mkha' la ri mo ni/ /mchog gi dbang mo 'bri ba 'o/ /lha mos gsol pa/ gsang ba chen po'i rgyud 'di ni/ /shes pa dang ni bshad pa su/ /
75a7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byang phyogs su dpal rdo rje'i gnas auD+yan du rgyal po in+d+ra b+hU ti zhes bya bas shes pa dang / bshad pa dang / sems can
75b1(rgyud): la gsal bar byed do/ /lha mos gsol pa/ kye bcom ldan 'das/ rgyal po chen po in+d+ra b+hU ti zhes bya ba de sa du'i dbang phyug lags bka' stsol cig /bcom ldan
75b2(rgyud): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dpal ye shes thig le'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las gang zhig ngas bstan pa'i phyag na rdo rje'i rgyal po de nyid in+d+ra b+hU ti sprul pa'i sku sa bcu'i dbang phyug /
75b3(rgyud): ye shes kyi sku sa bcu bzhi'i dbang phyug go /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / ri rab kyi nyi rdul gyi grangs bcom ldan 'das ma dang lhan cig tu stan
75b4(rgyud): las langs te lan gsum du bskor ba byas nas zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te rang rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyis sna tshogs pa'i mchod pas mchod sbyin byas nas bstong pa/ de kho na nyid bdud rtsi'i rgya mtsho'i snying po rab tu mchog rgyal gyur cig /
75b5(rgyud): ye shes nam mkha' skye med gzugs med brjod med sku rab rgyal gyur cig /dngos dang dngos min ro
75b6(rgyud): gcig ngo bo'i rmad byung de nyid rab gter rgyal gyur cig / stong nyid stong pa nyid min mchog dang gzhan mchog 'od kyis grub pa rgyal gyur cig /de lta bu'i bstod pa'i rgyal pos
75b7(rgyud): bstod nas 'khor thams cad bcom ldan 'das dang bcas bar mi snang bar gyur to/ /dpal rnal 'byor ma chen po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po'i rgyal po mchog chen po rmad du byung zhing rmad du byung ba da
76a1(rgyud): kho na nyid kyi sgron ma zhes bya ba rdzogs so/ / //rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po pra dz+nyA shrI gup+tas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/
76a2(rgyud): dus phyis dpal sa skya'i dben gnas su bsgyur cing zhus te dag par byas so/ /rgya gar skad du /tan+t+ra rA dza shrI la g+hu sa wa ra nA ma/ bod skad du/ rgyud kyi rgyal po
76a3(rgyud): dpal bde mchog nyung ngu zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas gsang ba bshad par bya/ /mdor bsdus pa ste rgyas par
76a4(rgyud): min| |dpal he ru ka yang dag sbyor/ /'dod pa'i don kun sgrub byed yin/ /bla ma las kyang bla ma ste/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba sdom/ /gsang ba mchog gi dgyes
76a5(rgyud): pa na| |thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs/ /mkha' 'gro kun dngos sems dpa' ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog /'di ni rang byung bcom ldan dpa'/ /
76a6(rgyud): mkha' 'gro dra ba'i sdom pa yin/ /sgra yi tshul las nges 'byung rnams/ /dam tshig spyod ba'i spyod yul yin/ /'jig rten gsum du rnyed dka' ba/ /thog ma dbus
76a7(rgyud): mthar yang dag gnas/ /bsrub bya srub byed yang dag sbyar/ /ji lta ba ni de bzhin du/ /sngags bzlas bsam gtan la sogs ldan/ /sbyor nyid cho ga'i ye shes ni/ /rnal 'byor bla na med pa yi/ /
76b1(rgyud): rgyud las gsungs pa mnyan par gyis/ /dbugs 'byin bar ma mchog dag dang / /dri yi chu dang bcas pas kyang / /rnal 'byor pas dus khyad par du/ /rigs ldan rtag tu
76b2(rgyud): mchod par bya/ /pho nya lhan cig skyes grub ma/ /mchog dang 'bring dang tha ma ste/ /yid ni nang du chud pa yis/ /'dod pa yi ni dngos grub bya/ /rang rdzas thig les sangs
76b3(rgyud): rgyas dang / /byang chub sems dpa' mchod par bya/ /mthong ba dang ni reg pa dang / /thos pa 'am ni dran pa yis/ /sdig pa kun las grol 'gyur ba/ /de lta nyid du the tshom/
76b4(rgyud): med| |rnal 'byor pa nyid bsod nams mchog /dag byed sdig pa 'joms byed pa/ /gsang sngags bzlas dang bsam gtan dang / /bde bas kyang ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /
76b5(rgyud): dam tshig rtag tu bskyang bar bya/ /shin tu mnyam bzhag sgrub pa pos/ /dam tshig nyams pas dkyil 'khor du/ /dbang bskur dngos grub thob mi 'gyur/ /sbrang rtsi mar dang
76b6(rgyud): ga pur bcas/ /tsan+dan dmar po dang sbyar ba/ /tshogs kyi nang du bzhag ba ni/ /thams cad rdor mtshan mtshan ma 'dzin/ /ming med mthe bong rtse sbyar bas/ /rnal 'byor rig
76b7(rgyud): pas rtag tu spyad/ /myangs pas zhi ba'i btung ba bzhin/ /dngos grub rtag pa thob par 'gyur/ /'di ni mi 'chi bcu phyed 'gyur/ /dngos grub thams cad 'jug byed yin/ /
77a1(rgyud): mchod bzhi dpa' bo chen po ni/ /yid la 'dod pa byed pa ste/ /dbang gnyis snyoms par 'jug pa yi/ /snyoms par zhugs pa'ang de
77a2(rgyud): nyid 'dzin/ /lha dang mi yi bde ba ni/ /bsdus byas rdo rje 'dzin pa yis/ /de lta bur ni byed pa yi/ /bcu drug char ni mi phod do/ /ri bo tshang tshing sman ljongs sam/ /chu
77a3(rgyud): bo che rnams ngogs dag dang / /gdod nas grub pa'i dur khrod du/ /der ni dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/ /dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las/ dkyil 'khor du
77a4(rgyud): 'jug pa'i le'u ste dang po'o/ / //der ni lci ba ma lhung bas/ /dkyil 'khor sa ni nye bar byug /dur khrod thal bar ldan pa dang / /bdud rtsi
77a5(rgyud): lnga dang bcas pa yis/ /dkyil 'khor sa ni nyer byugs te/ /der ni dkyil 'khor yang dag brtsam/ /gnas de ru ni bsgoms pa yis/ /dur khrod du ni kun tu
77a6(rgyud): brtag / ro bsregs sol ba'i phye ma dang / /dur khrod so phag ldan pa yi/ /dkyil 'khor bzang po bri bar bya/ /slob dpon dge ba'i mtshan nyid can/ /yang dag
77a7(rgyud): shos shing rgyud shes pa/ /dpal ldan khrag 'thung gsang sngags shes/ /khro med gtsang zhing mkhas pa dang / /sbyor shes ye shes pha rol 'gro/ /thod pas spyi bor
77b1(rgyud): brgyan byas shing / /yan lag bral bas byugs pa dang / /gug skyed dag gis lus brgyan cing / /rus pa'i phreng la sogs pas brgyan/ /dum gcig spyi bor brgyan pa dang //
77b2(rgyud): rus pa'i phreng ba rnam par 'phyang / /kha T+wAM ga ni lag na gnas/ /bdag nyid khrag 'thung dpal byas nas/ /de 'og khrag 'thung dpal dran bya/ /'khor lo 'di ni snying gar
77b3(rgyud): dgod| |bdag nyid de ltar go bgos nas/ /ra ba rnams ni phyogs su dgod/ /de ltar bdag nyid go bgos nas/ /'og tu yang ni mtshon cha dgod/ /'khor lo mtshon cha'i
77b4(rgyud): phreng ba dag / steng du mda' yi dra ba nyid/ /slar yang bdag nyid mkha' spyod du/ /gur byas de ni go char 'gyur/ /de ltar go cha de bgos na/ /sum cu pas kyang mi phyed do//
77b5(rgyud): de ltar bdag nyid rab bsrungs shing / /sngags dang phyag rgyas rnam brgyan nas/ /dngos grub chen po rab ster ba'i/ /dkyil 'khor 'jigs pa bri bar bya/ /de nas sems
77b6(rgyud): med srad bu 'am/ /ru d+hi ra ni chen pos brlan/ /he ru ka dpal grong khyer mchog /dkyil 'khor 'jigs pa thig gdab bya/ /khru gang khru bzhi'am khru brgyad pa/ /sgo bzhi kun nas
77b7(rgyud): zur bzhi pa/ /rta babs bzhi yis rnam par brgyan/ /sngags pas nyis 'gyur rnam par spyad/ /mkha' 'gro dra ba'i bde mchog mchod/ /de yi dbus su pad+ma ni/ /'dab bcas
78a1(rgyud): lte bar 'bar dang bcas/ /ge sar yang dag ldan par gzhag /lte bar dgod bya dpa' bo ni/ /'jigs byed kyang ni 'jigs par mdzad/ /mdangs
78a2(rgyud): dang ldan zhing rab tu 'bar/ /ha ha zhes pa'i sgra cher bzhad/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i rgyan dang ldan/ /bzang po spyan gsum zhal bzhi mnga'/ /glang po'i phags pa rnam par
78a3(rgyud): bgos| |smin ma bzang po rdo rje dbyes/ /phyag na kha T+wAM mi thod bsnams/ /brgya phyed phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /de mdun gnas pa'i lha mo ni/ /rdo rje phag mo rab 'jigs
78a4(rgyud): ma| |he ru ka dpal che la phyogs/ /spyan gsum drag po'i gzugs can yin/ /ka pA la ni an+t+ras bkang / /kha nas ru d+hi ra 'dzag cing / /lha dang lha min mir bcas pa//
78a5(rgyud): phyogs kun tu ni sdigs mdzub byed/ /mkha' mgro ma ni nyi shu bzhi/ /phag mo yi ni rigs las byung / /phyogs dang phyogs kyi mtshams rnams dang / /'khor lo'i
78a6(rgyud): dbus su mchod par bya/ /de bzhin 'dir ni dpa' bo yang / /'khor lor yang dag gnas pa mchod/ /sgrub po gal te dngos grub 'dod/ /gnyis med dpa' bo mchod
78a7(rgyud): par bya| |de nas bum pa bya ba ni/ /rtsa pa nag po la sogs med/ /mu tig gser dang rin chen dang / /byi ru dngul dang zangs ma ste/ /bza' ba kun gyis legs bkang ba'i//
78b1(rgyud): snod ni steng du gzhag par bya/ /mgrin pa slad bus dkri ba dang / /kha ni 'dab mas brgyan par bya/ /gos zung gis ni legs dkris pa/ /brgyad ni sgo ru rnam par dgod/ /gos
78b2(rgyud): zung gis ni legs dkris pa'i/ /bum pa dgu pa dbus su gzhag /gser ram dngul lam rin chen nam/ /mu tig rnams kyis mdzes par bya/ /dkyil 'khor kun tu rin chen
78b3(rgyud): dang / /gser gyis mdzes par spras par bya/ /grong mchog yid 'ong mchod pa ni/ /grub pa nyid du the tshom med/ /bdag nyid kun nas zhal la ni/ /dri yi chu yis legs par
78b4(rgyud): gdab| |gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na/ /mar me brgya ni dbul bar bya/ /nam mkha'i mkha' 'gro ma rnams ni/ /yid kyis thams cad steng du dgod/ /sa steng mkha'
78b5(rgyud): 'gro ma gang yin/ /dkyil 'khor kun tu dgod par bya/ /gang yang sa 'og mkha' 'gro ma/ /de ni sa 'og rnams su dgod/ /ma mo thams cad phyogs dang ni/ /phyogs mtshams
78b6(rgyud): rnams su dgod par bya/ /gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na/ /dri dang me tog de bzhin spos/ /cho ga bzhin du de bzhin mchod/ /mar me brgya yang dbul bya zhing / /dpal he ru
78b7(rgyud): ka'i dkyil 'khor gnas/ /dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma rnams mchod/ /rgyal mtshan dmar dang de bzhin ser/ /dkar dang nag dang ser skya dang / /me tog phreng ba du ma dang / /de bzhin
79a1(rgyud): gos ni sna tshogs dang / /bla re dang ni yol ba dag /mdzes pa ji lta de bzhin te/ /de bzhin bza' bca' btung ba yis/ /rab mnyam
79a2(rgyud): bzhag ste mchod par bya/ /dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las/ 'khor lo mchod pa'i cho ga'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// //de nas sgrub pos dngos
79a3(rgyud): kun gyis/ /dang por slob dpon mnyes par bya/ /grub 'dod shin du mnyam bzhag pas/ /ci nus pas ni bla ma mchod/ /dril bu sgra ldan dbyangs pa dang / /me tog spos
79a4(rgyud): rnams kyis brgyan cing / /shin tu sgra snyan dril pu dkrol/ /sgrub pa po yis rnga brdung zhing / /ha ha zhes ni brjod par bya/ /de ltar cho ga bzhin dkyil 'khor/ /'dod pa kun
79a5(rgyud): ldan mchod nas ni/ /bu sdug de dag gdong pa la/ /dar ras legs par bkab nas su/ /thal mo me tog gis bkang ste/ /yang dag par ni zhugs pa dag /sgrub po shin
79a6(rgyud): tu mnyam bzhag pas/ /de nas bskor ba byas nas ni/ /blo bzang yid ni mnyam bzhag pa/ /pho brang nyams dgar gzhug par bya/ /lho yi phyogs su lus bstan la/ /
79a7(rgyud): thal mo'i me tog de nas dor/ /dkyil 'khor steng du dor bar bya/ /gang du me tog de ltung ba/ /shrI he ru ka'i gnas sogs bstan/ /de yi rigs ni rnam bstan te/ /de ni rigs
79b1(rgyud): de'i ming 'gyur ba/ /slob dpon gyis ni ming bstan to/ /de nas slob dpon legs par ni/ /mnyam par bzhag ste phyag rgya mchod/ /de nas slob ma phyi de nyon/ /las ni yang dag
79b2(rgyud): spyad par bya/ /mtshal chen lan gsum bzlas pa yis/ /de rnams su ni thig le bya/ /slob ma yi ni gdong phye la/ /de nas dkyil 'khor bstan par bya/ /lha gang gi ni gnas
79b3(rgyud): gang yin/ /der ni yang dag bstan par bya/ /slob dpon dang bcas pho brang la/ /de nas slob mas rab btud nas/ /phyir yang g.yon nas brtsams pa yis/ /de nas bskor ba
79b4(rgyud): byas nas ni/ /dkyil 'khor dang ni bla ma la/ /ji bzhin cho gas phyag bya 'o/ /de nas bla ma dag la yon/ /de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa dbul/ /gser ni brgya stong dbul
79b5(rgyud): ba dang / /rin chen rnam pa sna tshogs dang / /ras ni zung gyur brgya nyid dang / /glang po rta dang yul 'khor dang / /rna rgyan 'am ni gdu bu dang / /mgul gdub sor gdub dam pa dang //
79b6(rgyud): gser las byas pa'i mchod phyir thogs/ /chung ma bzang dang bu mo nyid/ /bran pho bran mo sring mo rnams/ /phyag btsal nas ni dbul bar bya/ /ji skad gsungs bzhin slob
79b7(rgyud): ma ni| |blo dang ldan pas bla ma la/ /dngos po kun gyis bdag nyid ni/ /de bzhin du ni dbul bar bya/ /deng nas brtsams te bran du bdag /khyed la bdag gis phul ba lags//
80a1(rgyud): de nas sgrub pos rab nges par/ /de ltar cho ga byas nas ni/ /de nas de la mkha' 'gro ma/ /rnal 'byor ma mo rnams mnyes 'gyur/ /mkha' 'gro
80a2(rgyud): ma dang lA mA dang / /khaN+Da ro hi gzugs can ma/ /sgrub po mkha' 'gro ma lhan cig /de dang rnam spyod kun tu 'gro/ /thams cad sgrub po de yi ni/ /ci bgyi byed par the tshom
80a3(rgyud): med| |rnal 'byor 'di ni sgrub 'gyur na/ /'jig rten gsum du mi ldog cing / /mi snang phug dang nam mkhar rgyu/ /rkang mgyogs de bzhin bcud kyis len/ /sgrub pa po
80a4(rgyud): yi 'dod tsam gyis/ /rtag par rgyun du bskyed par 'gyur/ /gzugs ni du ma byed pa dang / /nam mkha' la ni 'gro bar 'gyur/ /mkha' 'gro rnams kyang khyad par du//
80a5(rgyud): skad cig de la sbyor bskyed de/ /'gro ba rnams kyang nges par gnon/ /lhan cig bltas pas rnal 'byor pas/ /sngags pa dkyil 'khor ma mthong bar/ /gang zhig
80a6(rgyud): rnal 'byor pa nyid 'dod/ /mkha' la khu tshur gyis brdeg dang / /smig rgyu'i chu ni 'thung dang mtshungs/ /rnal 'byor 'di ni mchog rab dang / /sbyor ba kun gyi dam pa
80a7(rgyud): yin| |gang zhig rtag tu 'dod gyur pa/ /lha dang lha min mi rnams te/ /'di dag zil gyis gnon par 'gyur/ /rgyud 'di ru ni dbang bskur bas/ /thams cad kyi ni sgrub pa
80b1(rgyud): po| |dgod dang lta dang lag 'dzin gyis/ /'khyud dang gnyis sprad la sogs la/ /dbang bskur bar ni gyur pa yin/ /thams cad rgyud las dam pa 'o/ /'di ni lha mi zil
80b2(rgyud): gnon 'gro/ /de nyid bsdus pa'am sdom pa'am/ /gsang ba'am rdo rje 'jigs byed las/ /dkyil 'khor rnams kyi rgyal po 'di/ /ma byung 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /bshad
80b3(rgyud): dang ma bshad gang ci'ang rung / /de kun he ru ka la gnas/ /dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las/ yon tan dang bcas pa'i dbang bskur ba'i cho ga'i le'u ste gsum

80b5(rgyud): dpa' mo/ /'khor lo'i go cha chang tshong ma/ /khaN+Da ro hi 'khor lo'i shugs/ /bya gdong ma dang rta rna mo/ /shin tu bzang mo ljang lha mo/ /chang 'thung ma dang rlung shugs ma/ /de
80b6(rgyud): bzhin 'jig byed chen mo dang / /sa srung ma dang shing grib ma/ /lang+ka'i dbang phyug mi'u thung ma/ /dpa' bo'i blo ma sna chen ma/ /'od ldan ma dang gtum mig ma/ /rab gtum ma ste sgrub byed pa'i/ /mkha'
80b7(rgyud): 'gro ma ni nyi shu bzhi/ /'di dag sngon nyid sgrub pa yin/ /sku gsung thugs kyi dbus su ni/ /ji ltar phyi rol nang de bzhin/ /rang ming brjod pa'i sngags la ni/ /mthar ni hUM hUM phaT sbyar te/ /rnal 'byor ram mchog
81a1(rgyud): 'di mthong na/ /me ste gzhan dag sog mar mtshungs/ /oM ni kun la gsal byed de/ /grub stsol 'dod pa thams cad byed/ /dpa' bo nyid 'gyur
81a2(rgyud): grub pa ni/ /khyim du dkyil 'khor mthong ba yin/ /de nas de rtag bsgom par bya/ /dngos grub de bzhin gshegs gsungs bzhin/ /dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa
81a3(rgyud): las| dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma gnyis su med par dgos pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o/ / //de nas thams cad chos 'byung bar/ /sna tshogs lte bar mi
81a4(rgyud): shigs dge / sngags pas cho ga bzhin du bri/ /chos kun gcig tu bsdu bar bya/ /'dir sngags tshig ni 'di yin te/ /A li kA li mnyam byas nas/ /sde tshan la ni yongs
81a5(rgyud): bsdoms pa/ /bzhi bzhi ru ni shes byas la/ /thub pa mchog gi re mig la/ /der gnas dpa' bo btu bar bya/ /'dod don thams cad sgrub byed pa'o/ /bzhi pa'i lnga pa

81b1(rgyud): la| |de bzhin brgya yi phyed phyed kyang / /de nas sum cu rtsa gsum gzung / /dang po'i dang po nyid dag dang / /mthar gnas pa yi gsum pa dang / /dang po yi ni gsum pa dang / /sum
81b2(rgyud): cu rtsa gnyis nyid dag dang / /bzhi pa yi ni lnga pa dang / /lnga pa yi yang bzhi pa dang / /mthar gnas pa yi dang po dang / /gnyis pa yi ni gsum pa dang / /gsum pa'i dang po gang

82a1(rgyud): de bzhin yang ni sum cu pa/ /lnga pa yi ni dang po dang / /uSh+ma Sha yi dang po nyid/ /de bzhin yi ge d+ya nyid dang / /bzhi pa'i dang po gang yin dang /

83a1(rgyud): yi bzhi pa nyid/ /lnga pa yi ni gsum pa dang / /bdun pa yi ni bzhi pa dang / /nyi shu gcig pa de nas btu/ /gnyis pa yi ni dang po dang / /lnga

83b1(rgyud): gcig pa blang / /bzhi pa yi ni dang po dang / /mthar gnas pa yi gsum pa dang / /gnyis pa yi ni gsum pa dang / /bzhi pa yi ni dang po dang / /lnga pa yi ni bzhi pa dang / /gsum

84b1(rgyud): bau ShaT| |hUM hUM phaT dang yang dag ldan/ /sgrub pos snying por shes par bya/ /dang po snying ga nyid du ste/ /gnyis pa spyi bor shes par bya/ /gsum pa spyi gtsug dag tu sbyar/ /bzhi pa

85b1(rgyud): ba byas pa nyid/ /bzhi bcu gnyis pa nyid dag ni/ /dbyangs yig lnga pa nyid dang sbyar/ /yi ge bzhi bcu lnga pa ni/ /dbyangs kyi yi ge gnyis par sbyar/ /dbyangs yig lnga pa nyid
85b2(rgyud): dag kyang / /bzhi bcu rtsa drug pa ldan pa/ /dpa' bo thams cad rab mchod yin/ /bzhi bcu rtsa bdun pa nyid ni/ /dbyangs yig gnyis pa dang sbyar ba/ /'di ni rdo rje sems dpa'

85b7(rgyud): ni yin par bshad/ /de bzhin drug cu rtsa gnyis pa/ /dbyangs yig gsum par sbyar ba ni/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi mchog tu 'dod/ /yi ge drug cu rtsa gsum nyid/ /dbyangs yig
86a1(rgyud): bcu gcig yang dag ldan/ /mdzes pa'i yi ge kun mchod nyid/ /de bzhin drug cu rtsa lnga pa/ /rdo rje sems dpas phye ba dag /sa bon 'di ni lha rdzas
86a2(rgyud): mchog / sgrub sbyin thar pa sbyin chen po/ /yi ge drug cu rtsa drug pa/ /dbyangs yig gsum pa dang yang sbyar/ /bya ba kun la sgrub sbyin par/ /de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas
86a3(rgyud): gsungs/ /yi ge drug cu rtsa bdun pa/ /dbyangs yig gnyis par yang dag ldan/ /rnal 'byor ma yi bya ba kun/ /'di nyid yin par the tshom med/ /drug cu brgyad pa nyid
86a4(rgyud): la yang / /der ni yi ge pa sbyar ba/ /sa bon yi ge 'di yi ni/ /'og gi char ni brtag par bya/ /yi ge bdun cu rtsa gcig pa/ /dbyangs yig gnyis par yang dag sbyar//
86a5(rgyud): yi ge kun la mdzes pa ni/ /'di nyid yin par the tshom med/ /bdun cu rtsa bzhi pa nyid ni/ /dbyangs yig gnyis par sbyar ba dag /gdod nas grub pa yin par ni/ /de
86a6(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal nas gsungs/ /yi ge bdun cu lnga pa nyid/ /ma mo drug pa dang ldan pa/ /'di ni rnal 'byor rab mchog ste/ /bya ba kun la dam pa yin/ /
86a7(rgyud): bdun cu rtsa drug pa nyid ni/ /dbyangs yig gnyis pa dang ldan zhing / /nyi ma yis ni dbye bya ste/ /yi ge pa ni der sbyar bya/ /mchog tu mdzes pa gzhan yod min/ /yi ge bdun
86b1(rgyud): cu rtsa bdun pa/ /der ni d+ha dang sbyar bar bya/ /sa bon 'di ni rdzas kyi mchog /mkha' 'gro ma yi mdzes par 'dod/ /bdun cu rtsa brgyad pa nyid ni/ /dbyangs yig gnyis pa dang ldan zhing //
86b2(rgyud): sa bon 'di ni mchog bzang po/ /rgyu yi mchog ni yin par 'dod/ /yi ge brgyad cu rtsa gcig pa/ /bzhi pa'i mtha' yi khyad par gyis/ /gdod nas grub byed 'di yin te/ /dngos
86b3(rgyud): grub kun la 'jug byed pa'o/ /yi ge brgyad cu rtsa gnyis pa/ /dbyangs yig gnyis pa dang sbyar bya/ /ma mo rnams las lnga pa nyid/ /de bzhin yi ge brgyad cu brgyad/ /ma mo
86b4(rgyud): dag las lnga pa nyid/ /yi ge brgyad cu rtsa dgu pa/ /ma mo rnams las lnga pa nyid/ /de bzhin yi ge dgu bcu pa/ /ma mo dag las lnga pa dang / /yi ge dgu cu rtsa gcig pa/ /ma mo
86b5(rgyud): rnams las gnyis pa nyid/ /yi ge dgu bcu rtsa drug pa/ /dbyangs dag las ni gnyis pa dang / /yi ge dgu bcu rtsa dgu pa/ /gdug pa rnams ni skrag byed cing / /sngags
86b6(rgyud): pa rnams la bde 'byung byed/ /dbyangs rnams kyi ni bcu gsum pa/ /yi ge gnyis par yang dag ldan/ /dbyangs las bcu gsum pa nyid dang / /yi ge lnga par yang dag ldan//
86b7(rgyud): gdug pa rnams ni zad byed cing / /mkha' 'gro rnams kyi bde 'bab pa'o/ /dbyangs rnams las ni bcu bzhi nyid/ /yi ge brgyad par yang dag ldan/ /bco lnga pa yi gdan du
87a1(rgyud): bya/ /dbyangs dag las ni bcu bzhi pa/ /yi ge dgu par yang dag ldan/ /spyi bor thig les mtshan pa'o/ /sgrub po mkha' 'gro ma rnams
87a2(rgyud): ni/ /khyad par du ni dga' byed pa'o/ /dbyangs rnams las ni bcu gcig pa/ /bcu gnyis pa yi yang dag ldan/ /spyi bor thig les mtshan pa'o/ /'byung po
87a3(rgyud): thams cad skrag byed cing / /sgrub po rnams la phan 'byung ba'o/ /bcu gcig par ni yang dag ldan/ /yi ge bcu gsum pa nyid la/ /thig les rnam par brgyan pa'o/ /
87a4(rgyud): 'byung po thams cad skrag byed cing / /sgrub po rnams la phan 'byung ba'o/ /dbyangs rnams las ni lnga pa nyid/ /yi ge sum cu gnyis par ldan/ /dbyangs rnams las ni
87a5(rgyud): gsum pa dang / /yi ge sum cu gsum par ldan/ /dbyangs kyi gnyis pa nyid dang ni/ /yi ge sum cu bzhi par ldan/ /dbyangs rnams las ni gnyis pa nyid/ /
87a6(rgyud): yi ge sum cu drug par ldan/ /thog ma'i gnyis par yang dag ldan/ /yi ge sum cu rtsa bdun pa/ /dbyangs las gsum par yang dag ldan/ /yi ge bzhi
87a7(rgyud): bcu pa la'o/ /ma mo'i bcu gcig yang dag ldan/ /yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gcig pa/ /dbyangs dag las ni gsum pa nyid/ /yi ge bzhi bcu gnyis par ldan/ /dbyangs dag las ni gsum pa
87b1(rgyud): nyid| |yi ge bzhi bcu bzhi par ldan/ /ma mo las ni gnyis pa nyid/ /yi ge bzhi bcu brgyad par ldan/ /dbyangs dag las ni gnyis pa nyid/ /yi ge bzhi bcu dgu par ldan/ /ma mo
87b2(rgyud): las ni lnga pa nyid/ /yi ge lnga bcu gsum par ldan/ /yi ge lnga bcu rtsa bzhi pa/ /thig les kyang ni rnam brgyan pa'o/ /yi ge lnga bcu rtsa lnga pa/ /spyi bor thig les mtshan pa la//
87b3(rgyud): dbyangs kyi gnyis par sbyar ba 'o/ /yi ge lnga bcu rtsa bdun pa/ /spyi bor thig les mnan pa 'o/ /dbyangs rnams las ni gnyis pa nyid/ /yi ge lnga bcu rtsa brgyad pa/ /ma mo
87b4(rgyud): las ni gnyis pa nyid/ /yi ge drug cu lnga pa la'o/ /ma mo las ni gnyis pa nyid/ /yi ge drug cu brgyad par ldan/ /dngos grub thams cad 'gugs byed cing / /sgrub po
87b5(rgyud): rnams la dpal sbyin pa'o/ /ma mo las ni bzhi pa nyid/ /yi ge bdun cu gcig par ldan/ /thig les kyang ni rnam par brgyan/ /ma mo las ni bzhi pa nyid/ /yi ge bdun
87b6(rgyud): cu gnyis par ldan/ /sems can thams cad dbang byed pa/ /thig le yis ni mnyam par mnan/ /dbyangs kyi bcu bzhi par nges ldan/ /yi ge bdun cu rtsa gsum pa'o//
87b7(rgyud): ma mo las ni bcu bzhi pa/ /yi ge bdun cu bzhi par ldan/ /de bzhin thig les rnam brgyan pa'o/ /dbyangs rnams las ni gnyis pa nyid/ /yi ge bdun cu lnga par ldan/ /ma mo
88a1(rgyud): las ni gnyis pa nyid/ /yi ge bdun cu brgyad par ldan/ /steng du thig les mtshan pa'o/ /ma mo las ni bzhi pa dang / /yi ge bdun cu rtsa
88a2(rgyud): dgu pa| |spyi bor thig les mnan pa'o/ /dbyangs rnams las ni drug pa nyid/ /rta yi rgyal po bskyed pa la/ /thig le nA das rnam brgyan pa/ /dbyangs rnams las ni gsum pa
88a3(rgyud): nyid| |yi ge bcu drug ldan pa'o/ /yi ge'i grangs ni brgya yi steng / /dgu bcu dang ni rtsa brgyad do/ /'di ni re mig las btus pa/ /he ru ka dpal mgon po yi/ /rtsa ba'i
88a4(rgyud): sngags mchog tu shes bya/ /dngos grub kun gyi gnas yin zhing / /mkha' 'gro'i snying ni 'joms pa yin/ /dpal ldan khrag 'thung lha rig rgyal/ /ba klags pas grub
88a5(rgyud): pa don yod pa/ /yi ge oM ni dang po ste/ /hUM hUM phaT ni mtha' mar sbyar/ /rtsa ba'i sngags te sngags 'di ni/ /sgrub pa thams cad sbyin byed yin/ /dpal he ru ka'i nges par
88a6(rgyud): brjod pa las/ sngags btu ba'i cho ga'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// //de nas rang gi bdag nyid kyi/ /dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ /mkha' 'gro
88a7(rgyud): ma yi dra ba yi/ /'khor lo bde mchog yin par 'dod/ /hA swA raM ba saM la dzA ni ki DA phaT hUM hUM kaM ru ru he he badzra shrI oM/ /rig pa'i rgyal po'i snying po ni/ /ma byung 'byung bar mi
88b1(rgyud): 'gyur ro/ /Ta pha hUM hriM hriM haMH oM/ /yi ge baM dang yoM dang ni/ /yi ge maM dang hrIM nyid dang / /hUM dang phaT ces bshad pa ni/ /rnal 'byor ma ni drug tu bshad/ /oM badzra bai ro tsa nI ye hUM hUM phaT swAhA/
88b2(rgyud): mkha' 'gro ma yi rig pa che/ /ma byung 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /sa steng na ni rin chen bzhi/ /phreng ba'i sngags ni dam pa yin/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi rig pa che/ /rig pa'i rgyal po
88b3(rgyud): he ru ka / dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las/ go zlog pa'i snying po dang rnal 'byor ma drug gi sngags btu ba'i cho ga'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// //de nas rtsa ba'i
88b4(rgyud): gsang sngags kyi/ /las mchog go rim ji bzhin du/ /de ni rnam par bshad par bya/ /'jig rten gsum gang ci yod rnams/ /thams cad skad cig gis grub par/ /las
88b5(rgyud): rnams thams cad byed pa 'o/ /lha thams cad dang / klu thams cad dang / gnod sbyin thams cad dang / dri za thams cad kyi skye gnas thams cad dran pa tsam gyis
88b6(rgyud): gsod par byed do/ /sprin thams cad 'thor ba dang / char 'bebs par byed pa dang / zlog par byed pa'o/ /rgya mtsho skem par byed do/ /chu bo rgyun phyogs las ldog ste 'bang
88b7(rgyud): par ston to/ /dbang po zlog par byed do/ /gsang sngags 'di bzlas brjod 'bum byas pas sa g.yo bar byed pa dang / shing la 'dzegs te gang du 'dod pa der 'gro bar byed do/ /
89a1(rgyud): sngags thams cad 'phrog par byed pa dang / dngos grub thams cad 'phrog par byed do/ /khrag 'dren par byed pa dang / /slar yang gtong
89a2(rgyud): bar byed do/ /gzugs brgya stong phrag du mar byed do/ /'dod na snang bar byed cing 'dod na mi snang bar byed do/ /khang bzang dang shing gi rtse mo la sogs pa phye mar byed do/ /
89a3(rgyud): dug bdud rtsir byed pa dang / bdud rtsi yang dug tu byed do/ /zla ba chur byed pa dang chu zla bar byed do/ /dri thams cad 'phrog par byed do/ /gang du 'dod pa der 'pho bar
89a4(rgyud): byed do| |nam mkha' lding gi gdong dang / 'gro ba 'byin par byas pa zhi ba 'dus pa'i lha mo dang gang zhig kun tu spyod pa'i mi'i mchog de'i lag mthil na yod pa'i
89a5(rgyud): dpal gang gis kyang mi 'phrog par 'gyur ro/ /rnam pa de lta bu'i cho ga dang ldan pa'i dngos grub kyi 'bras bu thams cad skal par 'gyur ro/ /dran pa tsam gyis
89a6(rgyud): gsod par byed pa dang / mi skyed par byed do/ /sa 'og rnam par gshegs par byed pa dang /ser ba 'bebs pa dang yang zlog par byed de/ /dran pa tsam gyis glog skyed par byed
89a7(rgyud): do| |lha thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan gar byed du 'jug go / gang gis bsgrub pa'i phyir ming nas bzung ste lan gcig bzlas na de'i mod la 'chi bar 'gyur ro/ /sa
89b1(rgyud): ma lus pa rnams la longs spyod par 'gyur ro/ /'dod na sdud par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di la ni/ brtul zhugs mi dgos/ spyod pa dang smyung ba mi dgos te/ /rtog
89b2(rgyud): pa'i bya ba cho ga 'dis ci 'dod pa'i las rnams bya'o/ /gal te khros pas lan gcig bzlas na/ bye ba gsod par 'gyur ro/ /zhi bas bzlas na/ 'tsho bar byed do/ /dur
89b3(rgyud): khrod kyi sol ba la lan gcig bzlas pas gang la bsnun pa de'i mod la ltung bar byed do/ /thal ba la yongs su bzlas te gang la bsnun na/ de'i mod la sha zas bzung
89b4(rgyud): bar 'gyur ro/ /dur khrod kyi sol ba la lan cig bzlas nas spang leb la sogs pa la mtshan ma gang gi ming bris pa de gdon chen pos bzung bar 'gyur ro/ /a ti mug+ta'i
89b5(rgyud): lcug ma la lan gcig bzlas nas gang la bsnun pa de de'i mod la rlung gi shugs kyis 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /bseg ma la lan gcig bzlas te gang la brdegs pa de rengs
89b6(rgyud): par 'gyur ro/ /gang du 'dod pa der 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /gu gul gyi bdug pa la lan gcig bzlas te spos su sbyar na/ sems can thams cad 'bebs par 'gyur ro//
89b7(rgyud): lag pa la lan gcig bzlas te bkab na nag pos zin pa'i dug sos par byed do/ /mkha' 'gros rgyas btab pa la lan gcig bzlas pa'i chus de gtong bar byed do/ /kA ra bI
90a1(rgyud): ra'i lcug ma la lan gcig bzlas pas mngal gang du 'dod pa der 'pho bar 'gyur ro/ /he ru ka dpal ye shes ni/ /mi shes dngos grub mngon
90a2(rgyud): 'dod pa/ /de ni phub ma brdung ba ste/ /gsang sngags 'di ni med pa ru/ /dngos grub dang ni bde ba dag /mi yis thob par mi 'gyur ro/ /gsang sngags 'di ni mi shes par/ /
90a3(rgyud): rnal 'byor pa ni mngon 'dod pa/ /de yi ngal ba don med de/ /'bras bu thob par mi 'gyur ro/ /gsang sngags 'di ni 'dod spyod pa'i/ /dngos grub thams cad sbyin byed
90a4(rgyud): yin| |sgrub po sngags dang phyag rgya dag / bder gshegs gsungs pa 'di shes pa/ /bza' btung la sogs tsa ru yi/ /bza' dang btung ba'i ro sogs pa/ /dngos
90a5(rgyud): grub thams cad sgrub byed yin/ /dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las/ /rtsa ba'i sngags kyi las kyi cho ga'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// //de
90a6(rgyud): nas sku gsum bshad par bya/ /khrag 'thung dpal gnyis med sbyor bas/ /gang gis shes pa tsam gyis ni/ /'dir ni grub par the tshom med/ /sku gsum po ni bshad
90a7(rgyud): par bya/ /chos kyi sku yi lus can du/ /gang tshe sgrub pa po 'gyur ba/ /de ltar legs sems gyur pa la/ /de tshe ye shes nga smra 'o/ /longs spyod rdzogs pa'i lus can
90b1(rgyud): du| |gang tshe sgrub pa po 'gyur ba/ /de nas mnyam par bzhag pa la/ /longs spyod rdzogs par nga rab smra/ /sprul pa'i sku yi lus can du/ /gang tshe sgrub pa po 'gyur ba/ /de tshe
90b2(rgyud): sems de rtse gcig la/ /sprul pa'i skur yang nga smra ste/ /ye shes longs spyod rdzogs dang sprul/ /yang dag thob par gdon mi za/ /bdag nyid shrI he ru kar ni/ /'grub 'gyur
90b3(rgyud): 'di la the tshom med/ /gsang sngags 'di yi snying po ni/ /gsang ba bshad kyi sgrub po nyon/ /snying po bzlas pas dpag tshad bye ba 'phags pa 'gyur zhing 'gro dang 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /
90b4(rgyud): gzugs stong phrag du mar byed do/ /khang bzang dang shing dang khyim la 'dzegs te mkha' 'gro ma rnams dang lhan cig dpag tshad bye ba'i bar du 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /nam
90b5(rgyud): mkha' la 'gro zhing 'ong ba las gzhan du mi 'gyur ro/ /'dod na snang bar 'gyur zhing 'dod na mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /'dod na byis pa dang / rgan po dang / dar la bab pa'i
90b6(rgyud): gzugs 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /'dod na glang po che dang / ma he dang / ba men dang / stag dang / seng+ge dang / khyu mchog dang / byi la dang / ri bong dang / rnga mo 'i gzugs
90b7(rgyud): 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang / 'dod na rma bya dang / khyim bya dang / ngang pa dang / ngur ba dang / chu skyar dang / 'ug pa dang / khra dang / bya rgod dang / bya rgod gi gzugs 'dzin par
91a1(rgyud): 'gyur ro/ /gang 'dod pa de'i gzugs su byed do/ /tshig 'phrog pa dang / mthong ba 'phrog pa dang / nyan pa 'phrog pa dang / sna 'phrog pa dang /
91a2(rgyud): lce 'phrog par byed do/ /gang gi 'dod pa de'i khrag 'dren par byed pa'am/ rengs par byed do/ /dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las/ sku gsum grub pa'i snying po'i
91a3(rgyud): sngags kyi las kyi cho ga'i le'u ste bcu pa'o/ / //de nas gzhan yang sgrub pa pos/ /skye ba bdun pa'i bar 'byung ba/ /gang gis bsten pa tsam gyis
91a4(rgyud): ni| |myur du dngos grub la 'jug pa'o/ /dngos grub thob 'gyur bshad par bya/ /skyes bu gang zhig rdul gyi dri zhim par gyur pa dang / bden par smra ba dang / yun ring
91a5(rgyud): por mig mi 'dzum pa dang / khro ba med par 'gyur ba dang / kha nas dbugs dri zhim par 'byung ba de ni/ /skye ba bdun du mi'i skye bar gyur pa yin no/ /grib ma bdun pa bya
91a6(rgyud): dang pa'i 'gros can snying rje dang yang dag par ldan pa de bstan na/ /de'i snying ga na ro tsan yod de/ /de blangs la dpal he ru ka'i snying po'i sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas
91a7(rgyud): thig le byas na steng du lding bar 'gyur zhing dpag tshad bye bar 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /de bstan pa tsam gyis 'jig rten gsum gyi ye shes can du 'gyur ro/ /dpag tshad bye ba
91b1(rgyud): lnga bcur nyin zhag gcig gis 'gro zhing 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /lha'i lus kyang thob par 'gyur ro/ /dpal he ru ka'i snying po gang zhig shes pa de gang dang gang 'dod pa de dang de
91b2(rgyud): ster bar 'gyur ro/ /dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las/ skye ba bdun pa'i mtshan nyid kyi cho ga'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// //de nas nye ba'i snying
91b3(rgyud): po ni| |dngos grub thams cad 'jug byed cing / /'jig rten gsum 'gyur gang cung zad/ /de kun skad cig gis 'grub bshad/ /Tapha hUM hUM ha ha hrIH oM/ /'di ni snying po'i nye
91b4(rgyud): ba'i snying pa'o/ /gsang sngags 'di 'bum bzlas pas 'jig rten gsum yang g.yo bar byed do/ /lha dang / lha ma yin dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / klu dang /
91b5(rgyud): dri za dang / mi 'am ci rnams 'gugs par byed do/ /rgya mtsho dang / 'bab chu dang / mtshe'u la sogs pa skem pa'am/ gnon par byed do/ /gang du bzlas pa'i
91b6(rgyud): gnas der mkha' 'gro ma thams cad sgrub pa po'i mngag gzhug byed par 'gyur ro/ /'dis chu la yongs su bzlas te bdag nyid kyi mig bkrus na/ skye ba bdun pa'i
91b7(rgyud): mi shes par 'gyur ro/ /tshe zad pa yang 'chi ba bzhin du snang ba dang / tshe ring ba gson bar snang bar 'gyur ro/ /mig la mngon par bsngags nas gang la bltas pa de
92a1(rgyud): gnon par 'gyur ro/ /dpa' bo shi ba'i rkang mthil gyi pags pa blangs te/ mi'i khrag dang btags te rna ba'i mig sman dang thod par
92a2(rgyud): bcug la ldong ros dang / gi'u wang dang / gur gum dang / khrag dang bsnol te grib ma la bskams la lcags gsum gyis dkris par bya ste/ yang de lhag par
92a3(rgyud): gnas pa skar ma rgyal la bya ba yang dpal he ru ka'i zhal du bcug la lag pa g.yon pas kha bkab ste yang brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas na/ de de'i mod la mi snang bar 'gyur
92a4(rgyud): zhing grib ma med par 'gyur te/ lha rnams kyis kyang mthong bar mi 'gyur na/ sa steng gi mi rnams kyis lta smos kyang ci dgos/ /de bzhin du kha las bton na ni/ snang
92a5(rgyud): par 'gyur ro/ /rgyud 'dir mkha' spyod grub pa'i ril bu 'di ni/ dpa' bo rang nyid kyis gsungs pa yin no/ /dpal he ru ka'i snying po'i nye ba'i snying bo'i sngags
92a6(rgyud): 'dis mdzub mo'i rtses mgo'i thod pa'i sha med par byas la mnyes na/ de'i phrag 'dren par byed do/ /g.yon pas yang dang yang du mnyes pas ni/ 'jug par
92a7(rgyud): 'gyur ro/ /mngon par bzlas te mgo'i thod par khu tshur bsnun na/ gang gi ming nas smos te byas pa de'i klad pa 'gas par 'gyur ro/ /gsang sngags rjes su dran
92b1(rgyud): la thod pa 'o mas bkang na/ nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /gi'u wang la bzlas te thig le byas na gang la bltas pa de rgyas btab par 'gyur ro/ /mdzub mo la yongs su bzlas te gang
92b2(rgyud): la bsdigs mdzub byas pa de de'i mod la ltung bar 'gyur ro/ /sngags bzlas nas rkang pa sa la bsnun na/ gang gi ming nas smos pa de de'i mod la 'chi bar 'gyur ro/ /chu la bzlas
92b3(rgyud): te sa la gtor na slar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /gsang sngags bzlas pa'i mdzub mo'i rtse mos stong la yang sdigs mdzub byas na/ bltas pa de thams cad gnon par 'gyur ro/ /
92b4(rgyud): tshig gis ni/ grol bar 'gyur ro/ /rme sha can gyi thal ba la bzlas brjod brgya byas te sems can gang rjes su dran pa de la bsnun pa de'i gzugs 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /sbyin
92b5(rgyud): sreg gi me'i thal ba la bzlas brjod brgya byas te gang la bsnun pa de lha nyid kyis mi mthong ngo / /chu la bzlas pas gtor na slar snang bar 'gyur ro/ /thod pa'i phyag rgya kha sbyar
92b6(rgyud): bcings la dbugs mi 'phyin par gang gi ming nas bzlas pa de smyo bar 'gyur ro/ /skye bo stong yang smyo bar 'gyur ro/ /yid kyis grol bar 'gyur ro/ /gang gi ming nas smos
92b7(rgyud): te gtsug phud la lan bcu bzlas te mdud na/ mkha' 'gro ma thams cad 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /khang stong du song ste lan brgya bzlas nas spyi bor bcings la mig bgrad de ji srid
93a1(rgyud): du bzlas pa de srid mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /dkrol na snang bar 'gyur ro/ /gseg ma la mngon par bzlas te steng dang 'og dang phyogs mtshams
93a2(rgyud): rnams su gtor na/ lha dang / lha ma yin dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / dri za dang mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po thams cad kyang 'ching bar 'gyur
93a3(rgyud): ro| |mkha' 'gro ma'i sbyor ba thams cad kyang 'phrog par 'gyur ro/ /stan dang mal khri la skyes pa dang bud med 'du ba la bltas te sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas na/
93a4(rgyud): 'byar bar 'gyur ro/ /yid kyis ni/ grol bar 'gyur ro/ /gyo mog dang bcas pa la yongs su bzlas te chu bor bcug nas bor na/ phyogs las ldog ste 'bab par
93a5(rgyud): 'gyur ro/ /gyo mog dang bcas pa de nyid kyis dba' rlabs gnon par 'gyur ro/ /yid kyis ni/ bzlog par 'gyur ro/ /sngags bzlas te steng du bltas bzhin du
93a6(rgyud): stong bzlas na/ char chen po gcod par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan gyi dpung mngon du phyogs na bzlas brjod stong byas te g.yul du zhugs pa na mtshon cha brgyas bsnun
93a7(rgyud): kyang gnod pa'i tshor ba 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing mtshon gyis kyang chod par mi 'gyur ro/ /rdo rje'i lus can du 'gyur ro/ /dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las/
93b1(rgyud): nye ba'i snying po'i las kyi cho ga'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// //de nas go cha'i las rnams ni/ /'jig rten gsum na gang yod pa/ /yid la 'dod pa de
93b2(rgyud): dag kun/ /go rim bzhin du bshad par bya/ /de la go cha zlos bzhin du yang lam du bzhugs na/ rkun ma dang stag gis 'jigs par mi 'gyur ba'am/ mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /go cha
93b3(rgyud): zlos bzhin du rgyal po'i pho brang gi bud med kyi gnas su zhugs na yang mi snang bar 'gyur te/ gang 'dod pa de blangs te 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /lha rnams kyis kyang mi mthong ngo //
93b4(rgyud): go cha'i sngags brgya zlos pa'i lag pas gang la reg pa de mdung bzhin du rengs par 'gyur ro/ /sum cu rtsa gsum pas kyang mi g.yo'o/ /sngags zlos pa'i rkang pas bsnun na/
93b5(rgyud): thar par 'gyur ro/ /rang gi khrag la lan gsum bzlas nas thig le byas la gang dang lhan cig smra ba dang / gang gis mthong zhing gang mthong ba de thams cad kyi khrag 'dren
93b6(rgyud): par byed do/ /gang gi khyim du khro ba dang bcas pas lan stong bzlas na/ thams cad la rims kyis 'debs par 'gyur ro/ /chu la lan lnga bzlas te gtor na/ slar 'tsho
93b7(rgyud): bar 'gyur ro/ /gang gi gdong la bltas te bzlas pa de'i tshig 'phrog par 'gyur ro/ /'bab chu'i 'gro ma dang lteng kar gnas te stong bzlas na/ chu'i steng du gnas te thang
94a1(rgyud): la ji lta ba de bzhin du chu la yang de bzhin du 'gro'i/ /chu la zhugs na chu bo'am rgya mtsho yang gnas so/ /lag pa gnyis dril phyis byas la
94a2(rgyud): lan stong bzlas na/ rnal 'byor ma rnams dbang du 'gyur ro/ /rnal 'byor ma ni sna tshogs gzugs/ /mkha' 'gro de bzhin lA ma dang / /khaN+Da ro hi de bzhin te/ /gzugs
94a3(rgyud): can ma ru rab grags pa/ /de la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor ma/ /de kun de yi dbang du 'gyur/ /skar ma rgyal gyi sbyor bas ras byas la/ /de gyon pa'i lus kyis rnal 'byor
94a4(rgyud): ma mnyam par bzhag pas stong phrag bcu bzlas na/ de'i 'og tu 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de gyon pa'i lus kyis dpag tshad stong gi bar du nam mkhar mi snang bar 'gyur
94a5(rgyud): ro| |gang du 'dod pa der 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i rgya mtsho'i mthar thug pa'i sa rnams su 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /steng gi rgyud du 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /dbang po gang dang
94a6(rgyud): gang lam gyur/ /de dang de yi rang bzhin 'gro/ /mchog tu mnyam bzhag sbyor pa yis/ /thams cad sangs rgyas rang bzhin 'gyur/ /shing yongs 'du'i khu bcud
94a7(rgyud): blangs la bzlas brjod stong byas te gang thig le byas pa de shing du 'gyur ro/ /chu la lan bdun bzlas pas gtor na/ 'di ni/ slar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /glang po che'i
94b1(rgyud): rkang mthil dang bsgrub bya'i rdul blangs te bzlas brjod stong bzlas nas gang la bsnun na/ de glang po cher 'gyur ro/ /dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las/ go cha'i sngags
94b2(rgyud): gyi las kyi cho ga'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o/ / //bong bu'i rnam pa'i rnal 'byor bdag /yid kyi shugs ni bzlog bya'i phyir/ /gang gis sgrub po 'grub pa
94b3(rgyud): yi| |sgrub pa de ni bshad par bya/ /mkha' 'gro de bzhin lA ma dang / /khaN+Da ro hi 'dod gzugs can/ bong bu'i rnam pa khrag 'jig zhal/ /mkha' 'gro rtse gsum lag na
94b4(rgyud): thogs| |bsgrubs na no zad pa dang ni/ /tshe ring ba yang snang ba yin/ /'dir ni bong bu'i rnal 'byor bdag /de bzhin bong bur mthong ba yin/ /glang po nyid du sngon du yang / /
94b5(rgyud): mthong ste glang po'i gzugs can yin/ /gang dang gang gi skye ba gang / /sngon gyi skye bar gyur ba dag /de dang de yi gzugs snang bar/ /rnal 'byor pas ni 'dir mthong
94b6(rgyud): 'gyur/ /sngon nas skye ba bdun du ni/ /grub pa ster ba yod gyur na/ /de yis gtor ma'i bya ba dag /byas nas sgrub pas 'grub par 'gyur/ /de bzhin dpag tshad brgya phrag
94b7(rgyud): ni| |steng gi steng du skad cig 'gro / 'di ni rnal 'byor sngags mchog gtso/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi sbyor grub byed/ /rnal 'byor mtshan mas gang zlos pa/ /zla ba gcig gis
95a1(rgyud): 'grub par 'gyur/ /de ni gsang ba'i rgyud 'di yi/ /sngags kyi snying po dge ba yin/ /de nyid mchog shes gang de 'dir/ /rnal 'byor ba ru the
95a2(rgyud): tshom med/ /mkha' 'gro dra ba'i sdom par ni/ /de dag thams cad brjod pa yin/ /dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las/ dpal he ru ka bong bu'i rnam par mdzad pa'i cho
95a3(rgyud): ga'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o/ / //de nas sdom pa rnams la ni/ /gang zhig brdar gyur shes pa dag /de nyid kyis de grub pa yin/ /the tshom med par
95a4(rgyud): bshad par bya/ /Da zhes bya ba skyes bur bshad/ /DI zhas bya ba bud med yin/ /bU zhes bya ba gnon pa yin/ /su zhes bya ba za ba yin/ /ma zhes bya ba ma ru bshad//
95a5(rgyud): yA zhes bya ba chung ma yin/ /b+hI zhes sring mo de bzhin te/ bI zhes bya ba mdza' mor bshad/ /lu zhes bya ba bu mo yin/ /shrI zhes khrag tu shes par bya/ /so zhes zhi pa'i
95a6(rgyud): btung ba yin/ /be zhes de bzhin btung ba ste/ /he zhes bya ba de bzhin sha/ /b+ha zhes bya ba za ba yin/ /b+hu zhes bya ba 'dres pa yin/ /pI zhes dur khrod de bzhin te/ /d+hu
95a7(rgyud): zhes bya ba ro ru shes/ /d+hi zhes rnal 'byor ma ru bshad/ /gang zhes de bzhin lA ma yin/ /sti zhes bya ba gzugs can ma/ /ku zhes de bzhin mkha' 'gro ma/ /ha ni
95b1(rgyud): baN+Ta ro hi nyid/ /dza zhes bya ba byin pa gnyis/ /ka zhes bya ba dpung par gzung / /b+ha zhes bya ba gsong por smra/ /swa zhes legs 'ongs bya ba yin/ /mi zhes bya ba nya yin la/ /ba
95b2(rgyud): zhes bya ba za ba yin/ /pa zhes bya ba btung ba btung / /g+ha ni bgrod dang bgrod min yin/ /ka zhes bya ba 'dod pa yin/ /sa zhes bya ba gzhan mi 'gro /ra zhes bya ba khyo
95b3(rgyud): med mo| |du zhes bya ba spyod ngan mo/ /su zhes bya ba skal bzang ma/ /na zhes bya ba skal ngan ma/ /sa zhes bya ba dam tshig can/ /a zhas bya ba dam tshig med/ /a zhes
95b4(rgyud): bya ba 'ongs pa yin/ /na zhes bya ba ma 'ongs yin/ /so zhes bya ba chags pa yin/ /'di dag ni/ yi ge re re'i brda yin te/ /dpa' bo dang sring mor 'du shes par byed pa/
95b5(rgyud): gus pa dang mi gus pa la sbyin par bya ba dam tshig gi mchog yid du 'ong ba phan 'dogs par byed pa ste/ gus pa la sbyin par bya'o/ /dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod
95b6(rgyud): pa las| yi ge'i brda'i cho ga'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o/ / //de nas skal ldan skal ldan min/ /mdor bsdus nas ni rab bshad bya/ /dam tshig
95b7(rgyud): mdog la gnas pa ste/ /skal ldan yid 'ong phan 'dogs byed/ /gus pa nyid la rab sbyin bya/ /de nas rigs kyi dbye bzung na/ /dpa' dang gnyis med rnal 'byor ma/ /
96a1(rgyud): gang gis shes pa tsam gyis ni/ /sgrub po dngos grub thob 'gyur ba'o/ /bud med pad rtsa ltar dkar gang / /pad+ma'i 'dab ltar dkyus ring mig /
96a2(rgyud): rtag tu gos ni dkar la dga'/ /tsan+dan gsar ba'i dri dang ldan/ /bde gshegs pa 'dus nyid la dga'/ /de rigs rus byung shes pa bya/ /phud gang btso ma'i gser
96a3(rgyud): 'dra zhing / /dmar dang ser ba'i gos la dga'/ /dzA ti tsam pa'i dri dang ldan/ /de ni dpa' bo'i rjes 'gror 'gyur/ /gang zhig ut+pal ltar sngo bsangs/ /gos ni sngon
96a4(rgyud): po 'dzin la dga'/ /ut+pal sngon por snang ba'i dri/ /de ni dpa' bo dran rjes 'gro/ /bud med gang zhig mdzes ma ste/ /pags pa pad dkar 'dab 'dra ma/ /rtag tu pad+ma'i
96a5(rgyud): rtsa ba'i dri/ /de ni de bzhin dpa' bo'i blo/ /dmar zhing dkar ba'i bud med gang / /gzugs bzang kha ni dmar ba dang / /ma li ka dang ut+pal dri/ /de ni rdo rje'i rigs byung
96a6(rgyud): yin| |ser zhing ljang ba'i bud med gang / /gos ni dkar po 'chang bar dga'/ /mgo la me tog dri dang ldan/ /de bzhin gshegs rigs rjes 'gro yin/ /bud med gang
96a7(rgyud): zhig kha dog dmar/ /de yi mdog gi gos 'chang zhing / /rtag tu ga bur dri dang ldan/ /rnam snang rigs kyi rjes 'gro yin/ /rnal 'byor ma yi rigs rnams ni/ /de ltar bdun
96b1(rgyud): po ngas bshad pa/ /g.yon pa'i kun spyod la rtag dga'/ /'di dag rang rgya'i mdog gis khyab/ /rigs kyi rig pa'i yi ge yang / /rigs kyi rjes su 'dir 'gyur ba/ /'di la kha dog
96b2(rgyud): drug tu 'gyur/ /rang gi phyag rgya 'ching ba dang / /rang rigs las byung tshig tu smra/ /g.yon nas 'gro ba'i bud med gang / /rnal 'byor ma la'ang g.yon la brtag /skad ni chen
96b3(rgyud): por rab smra ba/ /g.yon nas blta bas rnam par lta/ /bud med rnams mthong rab smra ba/ /de ni dam tshig ldan par bshad/ /bud med rnams gang gsol gdab byed/ /rigs
96b4(rgyud): kyi sa bon rab tu smra/ /rigs kyi bya ba mi 'dor zhing / /rang gi bstan bcos gsung pa skyong / /rang gi rigs kyi rig pa zlos/ /de ni dam tshig ldan par brjod/ /phyag
96b5(rgyud): 'tshal ba ni gang 'ching ba/ /g.yon pa'i lus kyis rtag tu 'dud/ /lha mo rnams dang kun smra ba/ /de ni nges par bden par 'gro/ /mthe bong g.yon pas sa la ni/ /rkang pas
96b6(rgyud): ri mo 'bri byed cing / /mgo ni dkrug par byed pa ste/ /zur gyis lta zhing lag g.yon gyis/ /sgrub pa po la khyad par du/ /de yi rang rig dran pa'o/ /mkhur ba'am kos ko
96b7(rgyud): drag dang ni/ /sna dag tu ni sor mo ston/ /zur gyis lta zhing lan gcig sngags/ /bzlas nas rig la rnam par lta/ /bden par 'gro ba'i rnam 'byor ma/ /nges pa dam tshig can/
97a1(rgyud): yin no| |dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las/ /rnal 'byor ma'i mtshan nyid nges par brtag pa'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o// //de nas rnyed dka' rnal 'byor ma/ /de bzhin mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi/ /bdud rtsi rnams la yang dag 'byung / /ya mi nI dang skrag byed ma/ /nags tshal ma dang de bzhin
97a2(rgyud): 'jigs/ /gzugs kun spyod ma mdzes ma dag /b+ha su ra mkha' 'gro rnams bdun/ /bsdus ma rang mtshan nyid 'dir bshad/ /gzugs can ma dang tsum bi ka/
97a3(rgyud): lA ma yongs gyur byis bcas mo/ /mi ldog e hi ka lha mo/ /mkha' 'gro ma rnams bdun du bshad/ /mngon par zhen pas lta ba dang / /smin ma 'degs par gar
97a4(rgyud): byed cing / /sngon gyi gzugs ni sdud byed gang / /phyis ni 'jig par byed pa yin/ /de ni gzugs can mar shes bya/ /dpa' bo gnyis med bstan par bya/ /grung pa
97a5(rgyud): 'am yang na mi grung pa/ /byis pa 'khyud cing tsum pan/ /de ni tsum+bi kir zhes bya/ /mkha' 'gro sdig pa 'joms ma yin/ /zur lta gdong la khro gnyer ldan/ /smin
97a6(rgyud): ma sgyur zhing sdigs mdzub dang / /dbugs 'byin 'jigs par byed gang yin/ /'di na gzhan yang dbugs mi 'byin/ /'jigs par byed pa gang yin pa/ /de ni
97b1(rgyud): lA ma yin par bstan/ /phag dang dred dang byi la dang / /lce sbyang ra dang rta dag dang / /thams cad der ni 'jigs byed pa/ /yongs su gyur par de bshad do/ /shin tu dga' bas
97b2(rgyud): dgod pa dang / /song nas slar yang mi ldog pa/ /rjes su chags pas gsol bar 'dod/ /khaN+Da ro hir de bshad do/ /yid ni byung bas lag pa 'am/ /bong ba 'am ni rkang pas
97b3(rgyud): sam| |gos mtha' ma yang na shing dag gis/ /des reg pa ni 'tsho mi 'gyur/ /mi ldog par ni shes bya ste/ /bsgrub bya min par de la brjod/ /dgod smra rgyu med pa ru ni/ /du
97b4(rgyud): zhing rab tu khros pa ste/ /de ni e hi kar dran bya/ /lha mo gsong por smra ba yin/ /sangs rgyas pa dang rtag tu smra/ /de nyid rdo rje'i rigs las byung / /mkha' 'gro ma yi rigs
97b5(rgyud): phyag rgya| |dpa' bos bsten phyir mtshan par bya/ /thod pa dgra sta mche ba dang / /'khor lo rdo rje rgyal mtshan dang / /ral gri kun tu skrag byed nyid/ /dung dang brgyad du shes
97b6(rgyud): par bya/ /rigs kyi phyag rgya yin par bshad/ /dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las/ /rnal 'byor ma thams cad kyi gzugs yongs su brje ba dang phyag mtshan dang phyag rgya
97b7(rgyud): bstan pa'i cho ga'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o/ / //de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /mkha' 'gro mchog gi go 'phang ni/ /gang gis yang dag shes
98a1(rgyud): pa yis| |mkha' 'gro'i dam tshig la gnas pa'o/ /dmar zhing ser ba'i bud med gang / /pad+ma'i dri ni rnam par gtor/ /lta stangs rang bzhin
98a2(rgyud): zhi ba dang / /zhen par lta ba'i rjes 'gro ba/ /bud med gang zhig ser mo dmar/ /de bzhin skye bo kun la brtse/ /khyim du pad+ma 'bri ba ni/ /pad+ma gar dbang rigs byung yin/ /
98a3(rgyud): smin ma'i dbus na rtse gsum yod/ /lus kyi mdog ni skya bsangs dang / /rtag tu rdo rje rigs sgom pa/ /gang gi khyim du rdo rje 'bri/ /rtag par mchod pa byed pa yi/ /mkha'
98a4(rgyud): 'gro ma de dpal ldan ni/ /he ru ka yi rigs byung yin/ /gang gi dpal bar rtse gsum ni/ /mdung thung dag kyang snang gyur cing / /mig dmar mdog ni dmar ser yang //
98a5(rgyud): de bzhin rkang pa lag pa dmar/ /ra skyes khyim bya dag la yang / /rtag tu yod na dgar gyur cing / /de yi khyim du rdo rje'i mtshan/ /rtag tu gang zhig mchod byed pa/ /shrI he
98a6(rgyud): ru ka'i gzugs las byung / /mkha' 'gro yin par gdon mi za/ /'khor lo gang gi dpral ba 'am/ /lag par yang ni snang gyur pa/ /sbrin sngon dag dang 'dra pa ste/ /
98a7(rgyud): rtag tu dbral bar dar 'ching ba/ /skal pa chen por kun tshogs shing / /mchog tu bde ba gang yin dang / /khyim du 'khor lo 'bri byed cing / /rtag tu de la mchod byed pa//
98b1(rgyud): rdo rje bag mo'i rigs byung ba'i/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi stobs kyis dregs/ /gang zhig smin ma snag 'dra zhing / /so ni dkar zhing mtho ba dang / /g.yon pa rtag tu ma rungs pa/ /snying stobs
98b2(rgyud): ldan par gyur pa dang / /rtag tu khrus la dga' ba dang / /mang du smra bar mi byed cing / /khyim du rdo rje 'bri ba dang / /rtag tu dge bas mchod byed pa/ /rdo rje phag mo'i rigs byung ba/ /
98b3(rgyud): stong phrag bcu dang ldan pa yin/ /ser zhing ser gyi mdog 'drar snang / /mig mi g.yo zhing kha spu ser/ /rdo rje gang gi dbral ba 'am/ /lag par yang ni snang gyur pa/ /rtag
98b4(rgyud): tu rgyal srid dag la gnas/ /snyems shing bden par smra ba dang / /mA li ka yi dri byung zhing / /gang gi khyim du rdo rje ni/ /rtag tu 'bri zhing cher mchod pa/ /khaN+Da ro hi'i rigs
98b5(rgyud): las byung / /rnal 'byor ma yi dbang phyag mchog /gang zhig rtag par sha la dga'/ /skem zhing smin ma nag po'i mdog /dpral bar mdung rtse lta bu yod/ /gan gzhig
98b6(rgyud): gdug pa'i las la dga'/ /rtag tu dur khrod dag tu 'gro/ /'jigs pa med cing rtog med de/ /gang gi dpral bar thig le dang / /khyim du thad pa 'bri zhing mchod/ /dpal
98b7(rgyud): ldan he ru ka de yi/ /mkha' 'gro'i rigs las byung ba yin/ /srin gyi mdog 'dra'i bud med gang / /so ni mi mnyam par gnas shing / /rtag tu gdug pa'i las la
99a1(rgyud): dga'| |g.yon gyi mche ba gtsigs pa dag / de yi khyim du dgra sta ni/ /'bri zhing rta tu mchod byed pa/ /rnam par 'dren pa'i rigs byung
99a2(rgyud): ba'i| |mkha' 'gro yin par the tshom med/ /mkha' 'gro ma ni tshogs 'di dag/ /shrI he ru ka'i rigs las byung / /sgrub pa po la phan pa'i phyir/ /gsang ba'i mtshan nyid
99a3(rgyud): sprul pa yin/ /dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las/ rnal 'byor ma thams cad kyi kha dog gi mtshan nyid dang / mtshan ma'i nges pa'i cho ga'i le'u ste
99a4(rgyud): bco brgyad pa'o/ / //de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /lA ma yi ni khyad par du/ /sgrub po gang gis yan lag gi /cha shas yang dag par shes
99a5(rgyud): pa'o| |gang gi bzhin ni yongs rgyas par/ /kun nas zlum por snang gyur cing / /kha yi sma ra rtag par yod/ /spu dang smin ma ring ba dang / /gos bzang gtsang zhing zhi ba
99a6(rgyud): dang | |mi g.yo bden par smra ba dang / /rtag tu dam pa'i chos la dga'/ /de ni dpa' bo'i sring mor bshad/ /pad+ma'i phyag rgya sbyin bya ba/ /yang na rus sbal phyag rgya bya//
99a7(rgyud): pags pa ril ba spyi blugs nyid/ /phyag rgya'i lan du brjod pa yin/ /de ni tshes bcu'i dus tshigs la/ /khyim du pad+ma 'dri bar 'gyur/ /lA ma'i bud med rnams kyi ni//
99b1(rgyud): mtshan nyid gyur pa 'di dag yin/ /mchu gnyis rlo zhing mig dkyus ring / mig ni dmar zhing ser skyar gnas/ /phyug cing skal bzang phan yon can/ /dkar zhing tsam pa lta bur
99b2(rgyud): snang / /shin tu ring min thung ba'ang min/ /sna tshogs pa yi gos la dga'/ /dpral bar ri mo gsum yod cing / /mtshams na gyen du bsten pa las/ /dgod cing dga'
99b3(rgyud): ba nyid dag dang / /lam ni rnam par gnon cing gnas/ /g.yul du 'chi ba rnams kyi ni/ /gtam dag la ni rtag tu dga'/ /de ltar rab dregs mthong nas ni/ /mdung gi phyag
99b4(rgyud): rgya bstan par bya/ /rkang pa g.yon pa bskum pa yi/ /gar nyid kyang ni bstan par bya/ /g.yon pa dag nas yongs bzlog pa/ /phyag rgya'i lan ni yin par bshad/ /bcu bzhi
99b5(rgyud): dang ni tshes brgyad ni/ /de yi dus tshigs yin par bshad/ /khyim du mdung rtse gsum pa yang / /bris nas de ni rtag tu mchog /'jig rten dbang phyug la ma yi/ mtshan nyid gyur
99b6(rgyud): pa 'di dag yin/ /gang gis mkhur tshos dag tu ni/ /khung bur snang ba'ang gnas gyur cing / /de bzhin rtag tu dmar zhing ser/ /mig ni ljang ser dag tu snang / /skra ni de
99b7(rgyud): bzhin 'khyil pa dang / /mgo dang dpral bar dar bcings snang / /ri mo gcig par rab tu gnas/ /de bzhin mgrin pa ring ba dang / /rtag tu gos dmar la dga' zhing / /dgod
100a1(rgyud): cing glu ni len pa nyid/ /glo bur du ni khro ba dang / /sems ni rnam par g.yo ba dang / /rtsod pa la ni dga' ba ste/ /'di 'dra'i rab dregs mthong nas ni/ /
100a2(rgyud): mdung gi phyag rgya rab sbyin bya/ /gnyis pa nyid ni 'bad pa yis/ /dril bu'i phyag rgya rab sbyin bya/ /g.yon gyi phyogs su bzlog pa yin/ /phyag rgya'i lan ni yin par bshad/ /thung
100a3(rgyud): zhing byin pa sbom pa dang / /rtag tu gos ser la dga' zhing / /phrag pa dag nas gos kyang 'phyang / /de 'dra'i bud med mthong nas ni/ /'khor lo'i phyag rgya bstan bya zhing / /'bad
100a4(rgyud): pa yis ni gnyis pa yang / /dung gi phyag rgya bstan par bya/ /g.yon nas yongs su bzlog pa ni/ /phyag rgya'i lan ni yin par bshad/ /bcu bzhi de yi dus yin te/ /de
100a5(rgyud): yi khyim du rdo rje 'bri/ /shrI he ru ka lA ma yi/ /mtshan nyid gyur pa 'di dag yin/ /lus kun la ni ba spu yod/ /mig ni nag cing ser ba dang / /spom zhing rnam 'gyur
100a6(rgyud): mi bzad pa/ /bzhin 'phel che zhing kha che la/ /gsus pa rlo zhing kha dog nag /mig zlum sna ni nyams pa dang / /rtag tu glu la mkhas pa dang / /sprin gyi mdog can yid
100a7(rgyud): 'phrog pa/ 'di 'dra'i rab dregs mthong nas ni/ /glu yi phyag rgya bstan par bya/ /gnyis pa yang ni 'bad pa yis/ /mdung gi phyag rgya bstan par bya/ /g.yon nas yongs
100b1(rgyud): su bzlog pa ni/ /phyag rgya'i lan ni yin par bshad/ /de yi dus tshigs bcu gcig ste/ /khyim du mche ba 'bri bar byed/ /rdo rje phag mo lA ma yi/ /mtshan nyid gyur pa 'di
100b2(rgyud): dag yin/ /dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las/ /rnal 'byor ma thams cad kyi phyag rgya dang phyag rgya'i lan bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /lag pa g.yon gyi brda rnams ni/ /gang gis shes pas yang dag par/ /ming sring du ni de bzhin 'gyur/ /gang gis lag g.yon ston pa
100b3(rgyud): ni| |gsong por smra zhes ston pa yin/ /gang zhig srin lag ston pa ni/ /gsong por smra ba'i lan 'gyur yin/ /gang zhig lto ba rdeb pa ni/ /bdag nyid bkres par
100b4(rgyud): ston pa yin/ /gang zhig dpral pa ston pa ni/ /nam mkha' las ni 'ongs zhes pa'o/ /gang zhig khar ni sor mo 'jug /zos zin zhes ni smra ba yin/ /gang zhig lce ni bskyod pa
100b5(rgyud): dag |za'o zhes ni smra ba yin/ /gang zhig pus mo la reg pa/ /ngal lo zhes ni ston pa ni// gan zhig sor mo'i rtsal reg /ngal sogs zhes ni smra ba yin/ /gan zhig so ni 'cha' phyed
100b6(rgyud): pa| |bza' yis zhes ni ston pa yin/ /gang zhig pa ti sa ston pa/ /de ltar gyis zhes ston pa yin/ /gang zhig khro gnyer ston pa ni/ /bcings so zhes ni ston pa yin/ /gang zhig
101a1(rgyud): mkha' lding ston pa ni/ /grol lo zhes ni ston pa yin/ /gang zhig khu tshur ston pa ni/ /de la ba ti'i so bstan bya/ /rnam par 'gyur ba bltas
101a2(rgyud): nas ni| |gang zhig sgra ni ston pa yi/ /kha T+wAM ga ni de la bstan/ /gang zhig yan lag bskyod pa dang / /de la mche ba gnyis bstan bya/ /gang zhig lag pas lag pa
101a3(rgyud): ston| |gtor ma za zhes smra ba yin/ /gang zhig lag pa g.yas pa ston/ /de ltar gyis zhes smra ba yin/ /gang zhig rna ba la reg pa/ /gnas par bya zhes ston pa yin//
101a4(rgyud): gang zhig sen mos sen mo reg /shi yi khyer ces smra ba yin/ /gang zhig sa 'di dkyil 'khor du/ /de ring 'jug ces smra ba yin/ /gang zhig nu ma la reg pa/ /bdag
101a5(rgyud): gi bu ni srung zhes bya/ /gang zhig g.yon mtheb sa la 'bri/ /bla ma'i skye bos nga srungs smra/ /gang zhig mig ni rnam 'dzum byed/ /de ltar byos zhes smra ba yin/ /gang
101a6(rgyud): zhig tshigs la reg pa ni/ /bde bar nyal zhes smra ba yin/ /pho nya mo ni gang yang rung / /de dag kun gyis yang dag spyad/ /dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las/
101a7(rgyud): rnal 'byor ma thams cad kyi lag pa'i phyag rgya'i brda'i cho ga'i le'u ste nyi shu ba'o// //de nas gsang ba chen po yi/ /lta ba nga yis bshad
101b1(rgyud): par bya| |bud med spyi gtsug reg byed pa/ /mgo bo de la bstan par bya/ /gang zhig dpral pa ston pa ni/ /de la mkhur tshos bstan par bya/ /gang zhig so ni ston pa na/ /de la
101b2(rgyud): lce ni bstan par bya/ /gang zhig mchu ni ston byed pa/ /de la kos ko bstan par bya/ /gang zhig mgrin pa ston byed pa/ /lto ni de la bstan par bya/ /gang zhig lag pa ston byed
101b3(rgyud): pa| |de la dpung pa bstan par bya/ /gang zhig sum rked ston byed pa/ /de la rgyab ni bstan par bya/ /gang zhig nu ma ston byed pa/ /de la kos ko bstan par bya/ /gang
101b4(rgyud): zhig lto ba ston byed pa/ /de la lte ba bstan par bya/ /gang zhig gsang ba ston byed pa/ /de la ling+ga bstan par bya/ /gang zhig brla ni ston byed pa/ /de la 'phongs ni
101b5(rgyud): bstan par bya/ /gang zhig pus mo ston byed pa/ /de la byin pa bstan par bya/ /gang zhig rkang pa ston byed pa/ /de la rkang mthil bstan par bya/ /gang zhig sor tshigs
101b6(rgyud): ston byed pa/ /de la sor mo bstan par bya/ /gang zhig sa ni ston pa na/ /de la nam mkha' bstan par bya/ /gang zhig nam mkha' ston byed pa/ /de la nyi ma bstan
101b7(rgyud): par bya| |gang zhig 'bab chu ston byed pa/ /de la rgya mtsho bstan par bya/ /'di dag mkha' 'gro ma yi ni/ /lus kyi phyag rgya the tshom med/ /'di dag rtag bstan gsang
102a1(rgyud): ba ste| |yang dag ston par 'gro bar 'gyur/ /dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las/ /yan lag gi mtshan nyid kyi cho ga'i le'u ste
102a2(rgyud): nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o/ / //de nas gzhan yang bshad par bya/ /yan lag phyag rgya'i cho ga bzhin/ /gang zhig shes pas ming po'am/ /srid mor
102a3(rgyud): the tshom med 'gyur ba'o/ /sor mo gcig ni ston pa yis/ /legs par 'ongs zhes smra ba yin/ /sor mo gnyis ni bstan pa yis/ /legs 'ongs lan ni smra ba
102a4(rgyud): yin| |'di ni rnal 'byor ma kun gyi/ /yan lag phyag rgyar rab tu bshad/ /g.yon gyi gung mo brkyang ba la/ /cung zad mdzub mo bskum pa ni/ /mig gi phyag rgyar
102a5(rgyud): shes par bya/ /sngags pas de la de bstan te/ /do mod ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar/ /dbang du 'gyur bar the tshom med/ /gang zhig gung mo ston byed pa/ /de la mdzub
102a6(rgyud): mo bstan par bya/ /gang zhig srin lag ston byed pa/ /de la lce ni bstan par bya/ /gang zhig pa ti'i sa ston pa/ /de la mdun ni bstan par bya/ /gang zhig spyi po
102a7(rgyud): ston byed pa/ /de la mtshams kyi mtha' bstan bya/ /gang zhig sa ni ston byed pa/ /de la mkha' ni bstan par bya/ /gang zhig khro gnyer ston byed pa/ /de la mtshams
102b1(rgyud): kyi mtha' bstan bya/ /gang zhig so ni ston byed pa/ /de la mchu ni bstan par bya/ /gang zhig mgrin pa ston byed pa/ /de la kha ni bstan par bya/ /gang zhig dpral ba ston
102b2(rgyud): byed pa| |de la mig ni bstan par bya/ /'di ni rnal 'byor ma kun gyi/ /rim bzhin yan lag phyag rgya yin/ /'di dag rtag bstan gsang ba pa/ /yang dag lta bar 'gro
102b3(rgyud): bar 'gyur/ /dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las/ /khyad par gyi phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid kyi cho ga'i le'u ste nyi shu gnyis pa'o// //de nas yang
102b4(rgyud): dag bshad bya ba/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi rnam rol pa/ /gang gis rig nas ring nas kyang / /dpa' bo dpa' mo'i sring mo ru'o/ /dam tshig can gang rjes chags pa/ /dpa'
102b5(rgyud): bo'i longs spyod sa gzhi yin/ /gzhi ni sa gzhir byas nas su/ /rnal 'byor pa yi sdom pa mchod/ /'di dag rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi/ /go ldog pa yis lta ba
102b6(rgyud): ni| |bzhin ni rnam par 'gyur ba nyid/ /bde ba rtag pa smin ma g.yo/ /sna tshogs myur du shes bya ba/ /de bzhin mkha' 'gro las byung ba'o/ /rnam 'gyur bskor
102b7(rgyud): bar shes bya ste/ /ri mo gsum pa yongs su zlum/ /mkha' 'gro ma rnams nges 'gro ba'i/ /de yi mtshan ma kun shes bya/ /glo bur rnam par ldog 'gyur te/ /sngar
103a1(rgyud): bzhin gdong ni 'jig gyur pa/ /rnam pa de lta de yi ni/ /gang gi rdo rje lta bur gsal/ /sgra ni khu byug skad lta bur/ /mchog tu gsal
103a2(rgyud): bar de'i de nyid/ /'di yi mtshan ma khyim du ni/ /rdo rje lta bur me long bcas/ /gnyis par yang ni gyur pa yang / /ral gri 'dra bar me long bcas/ /rgyal mtshan mdung
103a3(rgyud): 'drar rtag tu 'byung / /me long kha sbyar bar shes bya/ /mtshan mar byas pa'i gzugs rnams ni/ /mdor bsdus rnam par shes bya ste/ /mtshan nyid 'di dag dang
103a4(rgyud): ldan pa| |mkha' 'gro ma mchog yin zhes bya/ /dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las/ /mkha' 'gro ma'i khyad par gyi mtshan ma'i phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid kyi cho
