103b1(rgyud): cig ces smra ba yin no/ /bI rA Na zhes bya ba ni/ snying nyid do/ /mA ra Na zhes bya ba ni/ smra ngan no/ /kar+Ni ka ni/ dril bu'o/ /ka ra NaM ni/ /phag pa'i za ba'o/ /shra ba Na ni/ rna

103b3(rgyud): khi la ni/ sgo'o/ /shwa sa naM ni/ bram ze'i rigs so/ /pa ri di ni/ rgyal rigs so/ /bi ra ta ni/ rje rigs so/ /kru ra ni/ /dmangs rigs so/ /an+tas+tha ni/ sme sha can no//

104a1(rgyud): ha ni| gru'o/ /pa shu ni/ ri dwags so/ /ya ti ni/ dkyil 'khor ro/ /so sa ni/ bzhi mdo'o/ /phal gu shaM ni/ skye ba'o/ /ma hA k+Sha raM ni/ phyugs

104a4(rgyud): rnam grangs te/ kha cig tu'o/ /hri ni/ ngo tsha'o/ /stong pa la reg pa ni/ med do zhes pa'o/ /brla la reg pa ni/ mi thun gyis shig pa'o/ /steng nyid ni/ /de bzhin no zhes
104a5(rgyud): pa'o| |e ba zhes bya ba ni/ 'og na med pa'o/ /phyag rgya dang phyag rgya'i lan gsang ba'i brda nyid de dpa' bos gsungs pa sde bzhi'i mtshan nyid do/ /dpal he ru ka'i
104a6(rgyud): nges par brjod pa las/ sde bzhi'i mtshan nyid thams cad kyi brda'i tshig gi brdar btags pa'i cho ga'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o// //de nas
104a7(rgyud): don kun 'dod pa yi/ /sbas pa brgyad mthar sbyar ba ste/ /mos pa dman pa'i sems can dag /rmongs shing mi shes sems ldan la'o/ /de la dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor
104b1(rgyud): ma rnams kyi gsal bar gsungs pa'i gsang sngags ni/ 'di yin te/ oM na mo b+ha ga wa te wI re shA ya/ ma hA kalpa ag+ni saM ni d+gA ya/ dza TA ma ku Tot+ka TA ya/ daMSh+Ta ka rA

104b6(rgyud): gzhan yang 'jig rten ni/ /gsum po dag na yod min pa'i/ /shrI he ru ka'i sngags shes na/ /gsang sngags thams cad yongs 'dor ba'o/ /lugs 'byung lugs

107b7(rgyud): dang lhan cig tu/ /bde dang sdug bsngal kun 'byung bya/ /sngags dang phyag rgya nyid dag dang / /ye shes de ni bstan mi bya/ /dag byed zas la bza' bar bya/ /rtag tu dam tshig
108a1(rgyud): spyod byas pa/ /gsang sngags su la'ang sbyin mi bya/ /man ngag nyams par sbyin mi bya/ /dam tshig gnas la don ji bzhin/ /man ngag gnas
108a2(rgyud): kyang sbyin par bya/ /pho nya ma gtogs gzhan dag la/ /'dod la rmongs pas 'gro mi byed/ /pho nya la rtag zhen thar pa/ /'da' ba yis kyang longs spyod bya/ /skye gnas dman
108a3(rgyud): dang gcig shos la'ang / /bsnyen bkur nyid ni bya ba min/ /ma dang sring mo bu mo dang / /chung ma pho nya mo nyid gnas/ /dka' thub nges par zad par 'gyur/ /'khor lo'am
108a4(rgyud): de bzhin grub pa la/ /mchod la lhan cig dgug par bya/ /de ltar rdzas ni rnam nges yin/ /'jig rten la rtag g.yon nas spyod/ /rkang pa g.yon pa sngon du 'dor/ /lag pa
108a5(rgyud): g.yon pa yongs su bsgyur/ /g.yon gyi spyod pas rab mchod byed/ /g.yon pas 'khyud pa tsam dang ni/ /g.yon pa yis ni mchod cing za/ /brtul zhugs ma nyams brtul
108a6(rgyud): zhugs rdzogs/ /sgrub pa po ni bya ba brtson/ /dam tshig rigs la spyod pa dang / /gcig tu zas la spyod par byed/ /rigs lnga la ni kun spyod pa/ /rigs bzhir rab tu brtag
108a7(rgyud): par bya| |rigs gcig la ni kun spyod pa/ /rnal 'byor grub pa rab tu mchod/ /ba lang sha dang rta sha dang / /khyi sha dag dang bya dag gis/ /dkyil 'khor gru gsum byas nas ni/ /
108b1(rgyud): sangs rgyas dag kyang nges par 'jig /phyag rgya sngags dang yang dag ldan/ /dpa' bo rnams kyi zas de bzhin/ /shrI he ru ka'i sprul pa ste/ /nyes spyod bstan bcos kun rnams spangs/ /rtag
108b2(rgyud): pa nyid du 'dzin pa ni/ /las rnams kun la srung ba dang / /bgegs med ji bzhin de sgrub pa/ /'dir ni 'gar yang 'grub ma yin/ /de yi pho nya ma mchog bzang / /lhan cig brtson
108b3(rgyud): par ldan pa yin/ /kun nas chags dga'i legs sbyor bas/ /rnal 'byor rdzas kyi rnam 'byed nyid/ /bla ma'i man dag la chags pa/ /de ni don nor sbyin dang mtshungs/ /dpal
108b4(rgyud): he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las/ /nang gi sbyin sreg dang / /rigs gcig dang ldan pa'i cho ga'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang
108b5(rgyud): bstan pa ni/ /pho nya'i mtshan nyid shes bya ba/ /gang gis yang dag shes 'gyur ba/ /mkha' 'gro'i dam tshig la gnas pa'o/ /ming po dang ni pha ngang yang / /bdag po nyid du
108b6(rgyud): skad cig bshad/ /lce sbom mig ni dmar ser la/ /rtsub cing spu ni dmar ser yin/ /thun mong dngos grub thams cad dang / /bzlas dang brtul zhugs la rtag dga'/ /dran
108b7(rgyud): pa dang ni yang dag ldan/ /pho nya mo sogs go 'phang bcas/ /mkha' 'gro ma mchog nyi shu bzhi/ /spyod dang grol ba'i 'bras rab ster/ /rtsa ba'i sngags ni rtag tu zlos/ /'dod pa'i
109a1(rgyud): don kun sgrub byed pa/ /bdud kun rab tu zhi bar byed/ /rgyu dang mi rgyu'i 'jig rten gsum/ /rnal 'byor rol pa'i 'bras rab ster/ /gsang
109a2(rgyud): sngags 'di las 'byung ba yin/ /sngags dang phyag rgyar yang dag ldan/ /sgrub pa po ni dngos grub brtson/ /phyag rgya dang bral gsang spags te/ /lus can rnams la
109a3(rgyud): 'grub mi 'gyur/ /ji srid dro ba'i bya ba dag/ /mngon par brtson par rtogs par bya/ /'dod pa'i don kun sgrub byed pa'i/ /rnal 'byor che la gang zhig sdang / /khyi yi skye
109a4(rgyud): gnas brgyar skyes te/ /rme sha can du skye bar 'gyur/ /dper na la la mar 'dod pas/ /'bad pas chu ni bsrubs gyur kyang / /mar gsar 'byung bar mi 'gyur gyi/ /lus
109a5(rgyud): nyon mongs pa kho nar zad/ /'dzin cing mchod par byed pa ni/ /'tsho ba'i thabs kyi rgyur gyur pa'i/ /rnal 'byor gzhan la bsten pa ni/ /gzhan du de bzhin don med 'gyur//
109a6(rgyud): rnal 'byor che mchog dpa' bo ni/ /yul phyogs gang na gnas gyur pa/ /rigs ngan kla klo yin na yang / /yul de yongs su brtags pa ste/ /sems can yongs su
109a7(rgyud): gzung ba'i rgyur/ /de ru nga ni brtag par gnas/ /dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las/ pho nya'i mtshan nyid dang / nus pa'i gnas skabs kyi cho ga'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa
109b1(rgyud): dgu pa'o/ / //de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /shin tu rnyed dka'i dgod pa ste/ /gang gis shes pa tsam gyis ni/ /myur du dngos grub sgrub byed pa'o/ /sa yi cha ni mnyam yid 'ong / /tsan+dan
109b2(rgyud): gyis ni nye bar byug / dri bzang dri ldan sa la ni/ /me tog sil ma gcal bkram zhing / /mar me'i phreng ba yang dag dkrigs/ /spos kyi dri yis nyams dga' bar/ /bdag gis thams cad byas nas ni/ /phyogs bcing
109b3(rgyud): pa ni byas nas su/ /de nas rdza rnga bcing bya ste/ /ri mo dgu pa yongs su zlum/ /yi ge phyi mo mnyam bris la/ /shin tu mnyam gzhag dgod par bya/ /der gnas pa las dpa' bo ni/ /'dod pa'i don kun sgrub
109b4(rgyud): byed btu/ /lugs su 'byung dang ldog pa yi/ /dbyangs dang yi ge sgrub pa pos/ /grangs de dag ni nang chud par/ /dge ba thub pas byas nas ni/ /re mig sum cu gnyis pa blang / /lnga pa yis ni
109b5(rgyud): khyad par bya/ /brgya phyed phyed pa yang dag blang / /nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa yis phye/ /re mig gsum cu drug pa blang / /gsum pa yis ni khyad par dbya/ /de nas sum cu gnyis pa blang / /lnga pa yis
109b6(rgyud): ni khyad par bya/ /de nas nyi shu lnga pa gzung / /nyi shu bzhi pa dag dang sbyar/ /sum cu gsum pa yang dag blang / /re mig bco lnga pa yir ldan/ /lnga pa dag dang
109b7(rgyud): yang dag bcas/ /mdzes pa'i mchog ni yin par 'dod/ /nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa dang ldan/ /bcu gcig pa yis mtshan pa'o/ /tshig gi dang po yin par 'dod/ /re mig bcu dgu pa
110a1(rgyud): gzung bya/ /me yi bu dang yang dag ldan/ /re mig gsum pas phye ba'o/ /ya tshogs brgyad pa'i sa bon la/ /re mig sum cu drug pa dang / /yang
110a2(rgyud): dag ldan pa'i yi ger gyur/ /slar yang tshig ni de dag nyid/ /'dod pa'i don kun sgrub byed yin/ /de nas rang byung blangs nas ni/ /re mig las ni lnga par sbyar/ /spyi bor
110a3(rgyud): nA da thig ler sbyar/ /don kun sgrub ces bya ba yi/ /tshig ni gnyis pa yin par bshad/ /re mig bcu dgu pa nyid la/ /nyi shu rtsa bdun pa yis phye/ /gsum pa dag dang
110a4(rgyud): yang dag ldan/ /sum cu gsum pa legs blangs te/ /re mig gi ni gnyis par sbyar/ /nyi shu pa dang yang dag ldan/ /mdzes pa'i mchog ni yin par 'dod/ /de bzhin
110a5(rgyud): nyi shu gcig pa nyid/ /de bzhin nyi shu drug pa yin/ /lan gnyis bzlas pa'i tshig tu ni/ /shin tu mnyam par bzhag ste btu/ /de nas go rim ldog pas gzung / /re mig
110a6(rgyud): las ni dang po nyid/ /bzhi pa'i mtha' dang yang dag ldan/ /de bzhin bco lnga ba dang bcas/ /chos don 'dod dang thar pa yi/ /tshig ni gsum pa yin par bshad/ /re mig
110a7(rgyud): gnyis pa'i sa bon dang / /re mig sum cu drug pa nyid/ /de bzhin nyi shu drug pa yang / /sum cu gsum pa yang dag blang / /re mig bcu gsum pa yir ldan/ /re mig
110b1(rgyud): las ni bcu pa nyid/ /go rim ldog pas sgrub pos blang / /re mig las ni bcu dgu pa/ /re mig nyi shu gsum pa la/ /re mig gnyis par yang dag ldan/ /steng du thig les rnam
110b2(rgyud): par brgyan/ /de nas chu yis sa bon gzung / /brgyad pa yang ni de bzhin te/ /me yi bu yis khyad par dbye/ /yi ge hUM gis mtha' ru sbyar/ /'di ni khams gsum rgyal
110b3(rgyud): zhes bya'i/ /sngags tshig bzhi yis rnam brgyan pa'i/ /oM ni kun la gsal byed yin/ /hUM dang phaT ni mthar ru sbyar/ /rig rgyal 'khor los bsgyur ba'i sngags/ /'di ni ma
110b4(rgyud): byung 'byung mi 'gyur/ /de nyid bsdus dang dpal mchog dang / /bde mchog rdo rje 'jigs byed pa/ /khro bo bzhi dang yang dag ldan/ /skad cig gis ni sku brgyad 'gyur/ /bde
110b5(rgyud): ba'i dkyil 'khor bsrung don du/ /gdug pa thams cad khyad par gyis/ /'di ni rnyed pa tsam gyis kyang / /brtag mi dgos par 'chi bar 'gyur/ /'khor lo'i sbyor bdag
110b6(rgyud): nyid kyis bzla/ /dngos grub kun gyi 'bras skyed pa'o/ /oM sum+b+ha ni sum+b+ha hUM hUM phaT/ oM gr-ih+na gr-i h+na hUM hUM phaT/ gr-ih+na pa ya gr-ih+na pa ya hUM hUM phaT/ oM A na ya ho/ /b+ha ga wAn bid+yA rA
110b7(rgyud): dza hUM hUM phaT/ dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las/ /rdza rnga bcing pa'i sngags btu ba'i le'u ste sum cu pa'o// //de nas sha chen thams cad
111a1(rgyud): kyi| |'dzin byed rdo rje skyes yin bshad/ /'di ni gdug pa thams cad kyi/ /'jigs byed mi bzad par bshad do/ /'di ltar khyi dang phag gi
111a2(rgyud): sha| |zangs kyi gtsug phud can de bzhin/ /mngon spyod kyi ni bya ba la/ /bza' dang sbyin sreg gtor ma bya/ /bya ba rnam spyod med par bya/ /ma lus lus pa med grub cing //
111a3(rgyud): rgyal srid thams cad rab grub 'gyur/ /dung dang nya phyis mu tig gi/ /rgyu mtshan gsum po 'byung ba yis/ /chos kyi sku yi lus can gyi/ /thod pa la ni su zhig smod/ /
111a4(rgyud): dpa' bo thod pa'i phreng ba can/ /zla ba phyed pas rgyan du byas/ /rnam pa de ltar gyur pa nyid/ /dpa' bo'i dbang phyug yin par bshad/ /brda ni lnga po bstan pa dag /sgrub pa po
111a5(rgyud): yi lag g.yon gyis/ /'di ni dpa' bo'i gnas yin te/ /brda rnams kyi ni rab 'jug pa 'o/ /khams gsum rgyu dang mi rgyu dang / /'gro kun g.yon las byung ba yin/ /
111a6(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa' mthe por bzhugs/ /lcug mar de bzhin rnam snang mdzad/ /go cha'i rnam pa de lta bur/ /gtso bor pad+ma gar mdzad de/ /brtan par dngos grub thams
111a7(rgyud): cad ni| |rab stsal pa yi dpa' bo bzhugs/ /mthe'u chung la ni mkha' snying po/ /mi zad sku dang ldan pa nyid/ /sen mo'i ngos ni rta mgrin gyi/ /gnas su gyur par
111b1(rgyud): bshad pa yin/ /'di dag thams cad dpa' bo ni/ /g.yon pa las zung rgyu yin no/ /lag mthil shrI he ru ka yi/ /phag mo'i 'das pa dga' byed yin/ /rgyab tu shin tu nges byas
111b2(rgyud): nas| |bdag nyid lnga po bstan par bya/ /'di dag lag tu dgod pa ste/ /mdza' ba thams cad 'dus pa yin/ /rnam pa de lta'i cho ga yis/ /dpa' bo dam pa mchod par bya/ /
111b3(rgyud): sa ni spyan zhes bya bar bshad/ /chu khams mA ma kI ru brjod/ /me ni gos dkar mor bshad de/ /rlung ni sgrol mar rab tu brjod/ /tsum pi ka ni stong pa ste/ /de bzhin pha rol phyin
111b4(rgyud): pa yin| |dbus su dpa' bo kun gyi gnas/ /mkhas pas rgyab tu gshegs su gsol/ /gsang ba 'di ni mi bshad cing / /rab tu 'bad de spa bar bya/ /de ltar brda bya
111b5(rgyud): dpa' bo rnams/ /gcig tu zas la brtsam par bya/ /dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ /mkha' 'gro dra ba'i bde mchog yin/ /dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa
111b6(rgyud): las| bza' ba dang spyin sreg dang gtor ma'i bya ba la lag pa'i brda'i cho ga'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa gcig pa'o/ / //de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba//
111b7(rgyud): bza' dang ston mo 'dus pa ste/ /yang dag cho ga gang gis ni/ /dngos grub myur du rab 'jug pa'o/ /phyugs rnams kyi ni dgug pa nyid/ /sgrub pos sngar bstan rim pa
112a1(rgyud): 'dis| |phyugs rnams dang ni de bzhin lnga/ /bong bu rus sbal mi rnga mo/ /lce spyang rta la sogs rnams kyis/ /dngos grub sgrub pa'i dkyil
112a2(rgyud): 'khor du/ /phyugs 'di dag ni sgrub yan lag /rigs rnams las ni rigs mchog phyugs/ /rkang bzhi rnams las glang por brjod/ /'dab chags rnams las dang
112a3(rgyud): pa nyid| |dud 'gro rnams las dud 'gro phyug/ /lha rnams las ni mchu g.yo ba/ /rnam pa de ltar brjod pa ste/ /dngos grub sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor du/ /phyugs de dag ni
112a4(rgyud): rnam par bshad/ /khwa dang chu skyar lce spyang dang / /skye gnyis blon po chen po dang / /khrung khrung bzhad dang ka dam pa/ /bza' dang sbyin sreg gtor bya bas/ /'dod pa dag ni
112a5(rgyud): 'grub par 'gyur/ /khyi nag po yi 'o thug ni/ /ma sha'i 'bras ni nag por ldan/ /'dod pas dogs pa med pa ru/ /ji srid brgya rtsa brgyad kyi bar/ /ro yi khar ni sbyin sreg
112a6(rgyud): bya| |de nas yi dwags langs nas ni/ /sgrub po de la 'di byed de/ /ci bgyi zhes ni smra 'gyur zhing / /sa 'og las sam ral gri 'am/ /tshar gcod phan 'dogs nyid dag
112a7(rgyud): dang / /ril bu mig sman gter rnams sam/ /rkang mgyogs dag gam bcud kyis len/ /dngos 'di de bzhin gcig byin nas/ /'gro bar 'gyur gyi gzhan du min/ /steng
112b1(rgyud): du 'og tu pho nya 'grub/ /rgyud 'dir the tshom med pa yin/ /ba lang gnas dang lding pa nyid/ /lhag ma skam po rtsa de nas/ /bde ba chen po'i ngo bor bya/ /yang na rus sbal dag gi 'o/ /'di de
112b2(rgyud): dngos grub sbyin 'gyur zhing / /phyag bzhi pa dang zhal bzhi pa/ /ji srid phyag ni 'bum gyi bar/ /sku ni dkar ba'i khro bo che/ /de nas drag shul gzugs 'chang ba/ /rdo rje phag mo la
112b3(rgyud): gzigs pa/ /de yi sku mdog mtshon cha 'chang / /dpa' bo thod pa'i phreng ba can/ /sku la thal bas nye bar byugs/ /ral pa'i cod pan mdung dang ldan/ /phyag rgya yis ni sku la
112b4(rgyud): brgyan| |zhal gyi mche ba cung zad gtsigs/ /yi dwags chen po gdan du bya/ /sgrub pa po yis dus rtag tu/ /sngags de shes nas bsgom par bya/ /de lta'i yon tan khyad 'phags
112b5(rgyud): pas| |'dod pa yi ni dngos grub 'gyur/ /dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las/ /dud 'gro phyugs dang ro langs sgrub pa dang / /bskyed pa'i rim pa'i cho ga'i le'u ste sum
112b6(rgyud): cu rtsa gnyis pa'o/ / //de nas sgrub po'i mchog kun ni/ /sbyor ba kun la med pa'o/ /bza' dang bca' dang nya sha sogs/ /nus pa ji bzhin bya ba ste/ /
112b7(rgyud): med par gyur kyang bza' ba ni/ /lnga po nyid du bya ba yin/ /bza' dang bca' pa rgya che ba/ /rtag tu mtshan mo nyid du bya/ /de nas pho nya rab sbyin zhing / /khyad par du ni sgrub pa po/ /rang
113a1(rgyud): gi bang du mgo bzhag la/ /dpa' bo gnyis med rab tu mchod/ /ma 'am yang na sring mo 'am/ /nu mo'am yang na chung ma gnyen/ /rnam pa
113a2(rgyud): 'di lta'i cho ga yis/ /bcings pa las ni rab grol bya/ /de nas sngags 'di 'grub 'gyur te/ /ji srid 'byung ba yod bar du'o/ /slob dpon lus su legs gnas
113a3(rgyud): te| |sgrub pa po las mchod pa len/ /dpa' bo rnams kyi stan dag dang / /phyag rgya nyid du the tshom med/ /sgrub po shin tu mnyam bzhag pas/ /glu dang gar la sogs pa
113a4(rgyud): bya| |ji srid lus can thams cad kyang / /rnal 'byor ye shes zhen ma gyur/ /de srid 'khor bar 'khor 'gyur zhing / /sdug bsngal mya ngan gyis g.yengs 'gyur/ /
113a5(rgyud): dngos po kun gyis sgrub pa pos/ /de nas phyag rgya mchod par bya/ /mchod pas mchod par 'dod pa ste/ /brnyas pa yis ni nges par sreg /rnal 'byor rgyud du mi rnams
113a6(rgyud): kyi| |phyag rgya chen po dang po 'grub/ /rab tu 'bad pas mchod par bya/ /phyi nas dpa' bo rnams kyis ni/ /dpa' bo nyid la spyad par bya/ /de ltar mchod byas de nas ni//
113a7(rgyud): sa 'og sgrub po langs pa dang / /zhi ba nyid dang rgyas pa dang / /dpa' dang dgug pa dag dang ni/ /bsad dang bskrad pa la sogs dang / /rmugs dang rengs ba de bzhin te/ /
113b1(rgyud): dbye ba nyid dang tshar gcad dang / /las kyi dngos sgrub mchod par bya/ /gang ci'ang rung pa'i las gyur la/ /nyon mi rmongs par 'grub 'gyur te/ /the tshom med par sgrub pa po'i/ /
113b2(rgyud): dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ /dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las/ /gsang ba'i mchod pa dang bsnyen bkur gyi mchod pa'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa gsum
113b3(rgyud): pa'o|| ||de nas mkha' 'gro ma dra ba'i/ /'khor lo zhes pa'i cho ga rgyas/ /las gang ci yang de myur bar/ /sgrub pa po ni the tshom med/ /dpa' bo kun dang
113b4(rgyud): rnal 'byor ma/ /pad+ma'i lte bar nges par sbyar/ /smin ma'i dbus su gzhug par bya/ /a ba d+hU ti'i gnas de bzhin/ /dpa' bo'i 'chol bar byas chags par/ /bza'
113b5(rgyud): ba yang ni de nas sreg / go mAM dang ru d+hi ra/ /'bad pas bsreg bya lnga dag bya/ /de nas 'bar ba'i byin sa la/ /sreg blugs dgu ni sbyin par bya/ /'bar phreng rgya mtsho
113b6(rgyud): blta bar bya/ /kun nas sgo yi 'khor lo nyid/ /dpa' bo'i dbang po zhal bzhi pa/ /dpa' bo dpa' mo'i gnas de bzhin/ /'dab la pho nya mo bzhi yin/ /dpa' bo kun
113b7(rgyud): dang gnyis med bde/ /cho ga ji bzhin rnam pa yis/ /khaN+Ta ro hi phyi rol ni/ /rang gi gzugs su rnam zhugs pa/ /'khor lo'i dbus su blta bar bya/ /'khor lo 'di dag
114a1(rgyud): gsal bar ni/ /rim pa ji lta ba bzhin bya/ /rig pa'i rgya mtsho'i las de bzhin/ /mdor bsdus nas ni gsungs pa yin/ /pho nya gnyis med sbyor
114a2(rgyud): ba'i bdag / 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las/ pho nya mo'i sbyin sreg dang las kyi cho ga'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa bzhi pa'o// //de nas las kyi rab mchog ni/ /ji bzhin rim gyis mtshon pa ste/ /mchod pa gnyis med sbyor ba'i bdag /las ni so sor sbyar bar bya/ /gang dag rab grub byed pa'i sngags//
114a3(rgyud): de yi dbye ba rim bzhin bshad/ /kha dog pho nya sogs sngags gang / /mda' yi shugs kyis yongs su 'khor/ /phan tshun mdud rgyud dpa' bo ni/ /yul nyid kyis ni phye
114a4(rgyud): ba'o| |sa bon phreng bas de nas bzung / /hUM ni mthar ru gnas pa yin/ /bsgrub bya 'gog par gyur pa ni/ /gom pa gcig kyang mi 'gro 'o/ /kha sbyar sbyar bar gyur pa dang / /rdo
114a5(rgyud): rje'i lu gu rgyud bcings pas/ /rdo rje dbye ba nyid dang ni/ /de bzhin bud ba ltar 'khor bya/ /lcags kyu nyid kyis dgug pa dang / /gtun shing gis bskyod de bzhin te/ /rdo rje nyid
114a6(rgyud): kyis 'dabs par bshad/ /dbug la mdas ni sbyar bya ste/ /dus min 'chi ba blu ba la/ /yan lag kha T+wAM ga dang sbyar/ /thod pa'i mchod yon snod du ni/ /zhal du mtshon cha
114b1(rgyud): nges par sbyar/ /dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las/ gnyis su med pa'i las dang dus ma yin par 'chi ba blu ba'i cho ga'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa lnga pa'o// //de nas phyag rgya'i mchod chen dang / /sngags kyi dgod pa rab tu grags/ /myur du dngos grub byed par ni/ /phyag rgya'i mchod 'di the tshom med/ /mtshan ma gnyis la sngags sbyar te//
114b2(rgyud): mkha' 'gro dpa' bo gnyis med pa/ /snying po rnams kyis de bzhin du/ /sngags pas mkha' 'gro ma la sbyar/ /blo ldan mkha' 'gro ma bsrub bya/ /dag pa'i lus ni rang 'dod pa/ /dpa' bo mchod pa rnams
114b3(rgyud): byas nas/ /las ni 'bad pa nyid kyis bya/ /rnam dbye rang dgas sngags pa ni/ /phyin ci log tu nges par sbyar/ /tshar gcod phan 'dogs don rnams la/ /las kyi dngos por
114b4(rgyud): rnam par sgom/ /de nyid dbye bar phye nas ni/ /rtsa yi lam du sbyar bar bya/ /rab tu sgrub pa'i sbyor don la/ /phyi rol ji bzhin nang de bzhin/ /'di yis myur du lha dang ni/ /lha min mir bcas bsgrub par bya/ /dpal
114b5(rgyud): he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las/ /de kho na nyid kyi mchod pa dang las kyi cho ga'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa drug pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /gzugs
114b6(rgyud): ni gnon pa'i cho ga ste/ /phan tshun sbyar ba'i gsang sngags ni/ /mkha' 'gro ma dang gcig tu sbyar/ /bza' ba zos ming de nas ni/ /bzlas pa'i mthar ni skyug par bya/ /mtshan
115a1(rgyud): mo bdun ni rdzogs pa dang / /bza' dang btung ba dag la sbyar/ /'di yis ji srid 'tsho yi bar/ /dbang du 'gro bar the tshom med/ /ser skya'i
115a2(rgyud): mar ni 'thungs nas su/ /bzlas pa'i mthar ni skyug par bya/ /de yis rang gi gdong bskus nas/ /gal te rtag tu khros gyur pa/ /mthong ba tsam gyis dbang du 'gyur/ /
115a3(rgyud): til mar sA lu btags pa dang / /ldan pas lus ni bskus gyur cing / /snum khur sngags pas byas nas ni/ /bza' ba la ni rab tu sbyar/ /gal te las 'di
115a4(rgyud): ma btang na/ /ji srid 'tsho bar rtag dbang 'gyur/ /til nag dag ni zos nas su/ /ske tsher bcas pa skyugs pa dang / /ru rta bshang ba dang ldan pa/ /las skyes lto ba'i
115a5(rgyud): srin bu ni/ /rang gi khrag dang btags nas ni/ /rang gi khu ba nyid dang sbyar/ /bza' btung mig sman gos la ni/ /byug pa nyid du rab tu sbyar/ /'di yis ji srid
115a6(rgyud): 'tsho yi bar/ /dbang du 'gyur bar gdon mi za/ /ba lang sha sreg sbyin sreg ni/ /khrag gis bskus na lha rnams ni/ /de mod dbang du 'gyur ba 'am/ /gal te ma
115a7(rgyud): 'ongs 'chi bar 'gyur/ /bdag nyid de yi mdun du ni/ /bsgoms nas mkhas pas sbyin sreg bya/ /sbyin sreg mthar ni gtor ma bya/ /khams gsum skad cig gis
115b1(rgyud): 'gugs pa/ /mtshan bdun gyis ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /'jig rten gsum na rnyed dka' ba'i/ /dam tshig spyod pa'i mtshan nyid ni/ /rtag tu rang sngags sbas pa yis/ /rab tu 'bad de
115b2(rgyud): gsang bar bya/ /sbas don rnyed par mi 'gyur zhing / /skal ba dman pas 'grub mi 'gyur/ /bsod nams chung ba'i sgrub pos kyang / /nga mnyes byas pas rnyed par 'gyur/ /dpal he
115b3(rgyud): ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las/ /nang gi bdag nyid kyi dbang du ba'i cho ga'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa bdun pa'o// //de nas brda ni mkha' 'gro ma'i/ /lus kyi
115b4(rgyud): mtshan nyid gang yin dang / /dbang po'i yan lag dbye ba ni/ grub par gyur pa de grub 'gyur/ /dpa' bo'i dbang phyug mi bri zhing / /rnam pa kun tu sba bar bya/ /gang gi thad du'ang
115b5(rgyud): mi gdon te/ /g.yon pa'i kun spyod sgrub pa pos/ /gsang ba'i mtshan nyid mkha' 'gro yi/ /sngags rnams bag med pas 'dod na/ /de la nga ni mi blta ste/ /mkha' 'gro stong
115b6(rgyud): phrag du ma yis/ /dan pa'i bdag nyid can de za/ /dam tshig 'joms shing ngan spyod de/ /bram ze gsod par the tshom med/ /sdig spyod rmongs pa'i bdag nyid can/ /lus gyur ngan
115b7(rgyud): ba'i bdag nyid de/ /mkha' 'gro ma yis zos gyur kyang / /de lar ni skyob mi byed/ /gsang ba pa yi nang na ni/ /sgrub po de ni phyugs dang 'dra/ /bla ma dam tshig la 'khu ba/ /sangs
116a1(rgyud): rgyas 'jig rten de las lhung / /he ru ka dpal blta dka'i rgyud/ /gang zhig srung bar byed pa ni/ /mkha' 'gro mar bcas dge sdong zhes/ /de la nga ni rjes su 'dzin/ /bla ma la ni bsnyen
116a2(rgyud): bkur byed/ /gsong por byed pa'i sgrub pa po/ /mkha' 'gro ma la rtag dga' ba/ /de la dngos grub 'byung bar 'gyur/ /sgrub pa po ni dpa' nyid 'gyur/ /khams gsum mkha' la rgyu ba'i bdag /sgrub po
116a3(rgyud): dpa' bo nyid 'dod pa/ /thams cad du ni mchod par 'gyur/ /de ni rnal 'byor la rab 'jug /yang dag sbyin pa'ang rig par 'gyur/ /he ru ka yi brtul zhugs 'dzin/ /slob dpon dpa' bo mthong
116a4(rgyud): gyur na| |mthong zhing mthong zhing kun tu dga'/ /sgrub pa pos ni sngags 'di yis/ /dpa' bo'i rtsa ba'i gsang sngags mchog /lan bdun du ni brjod par bya/ /rab sngags hUM la sogs pas phye/ /de rnams
116a5(rgyud): 'bad de phyag byas na/ /sangs rgyas la sogs thams cad mchod/ /rtag pa nyid du dpa' chen dang / /rol par ldan pa the tshom med/ /de yi thugs kar gnas phag mo/ /nga dang dpa' bo rnal 'byor
116a6(rgyud): ma| |pho nya rnams dang lhan cig bcas/ /de dang gang zhig legs skyes pa/ /srog chags bsod nams mthong ba yin/ /'bab chu'i 'gram dang rgya mtsho dang / /ri bo dang ni bzhi mdo
116a7(rgyud): dang / /lteng ka dang mi khron pa mtshe'u/ /khang stong dang ni lam srang dag /thams cad du ni mkha' 'gro ma/ /kun tu zhen par lta la gnas/ /'jigs pa chen po dur khrod du/ /mkha' spyod de bzhin sa 'og dang /
116b1(rgyud): ro langs kyang ni du ma zhig /'jigs pa'i gzugs dang stobs chen pos/ /de dag lhan cig dpa' bo che/ /ci bde bar ni rol par mdzad/ /ri sul tshang tshing gsang ba dang / /rnal
116b2(rgyud): 'byor ma dang gsang ba'i mi/ /phyogs ni de dang de dag tu/ /sgrub pa po dang sa steng rol/ /dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las/ rnal 'byor ma'i sgrub pa'i sa dang gsang ba'i
116b3(rgyud): dpa' bo'i gnas kyi cho ga'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa brgyad pa'o/ / //de nas sgrub pa'i rnal 'byor che/ /sngags kyi rnam pa brgyad kyis dgod/ /de nas 'di la
116b4(rgyud): yang dag mthong / /gsol bar 'gyur bar gdon mi za/ /'jigs pa'i sgra ni rnam mang po/ /mi bzad mkha' 'gro 'jigs byed pa/ /dpa' bo 'jigs par gyur na ni/ /skrag
116b5(rgyud): cing rnam par 'byed par byed/ /gal te dpa' bo mi 'jigs na/ /lag pa g.yon pas bzung nas ni/ /rang gi gnas su khyer nas su/ /mkha' 'gro ma ni de dag dang / /rtag tu mngon
116b6(rgyud): par rtse byed de/ /bde ba can gyi gnas 'gro 'gyur/ /he ru ka dpal gus 'dod pas/ /mkha' la 'gro ba'i gnas su khyer/ /sgrub pa po ni sngags lus can/ /'khor bar 'chi
116b7(rgyud): dang rga ba med/ /dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las/ blta ba dang ha har dgod pa'i cho ga'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa dgu pa'o// //da ni rab tu bshad bya ba//
117a1(rgyud): gang gis sa steng dbang du 'gyur/ /dpa' bo'i sngags kyi zla ba yis/ /rnal 'byor cho ga gnas pas 'grub/ /sgron ma myos byed bcas pa dang //
117a2(rgyud): nya yi sha dang ldan par ni/ /dpa' dbang gnas skabs thams cad du/ /nyi ma bdun gyis sgrub pa be'i/ /mtshan mo'i sbyin sreg byed la gzhol/ /dngos grub rgya chen gsol
117a3(rgyud): bar 'gyur/ /brgya dang rtsa brgyad ldan nyid kyis/ /thun gsum du ni sgrub byed na/ /rgyal po dpung dang bcas par ni/ /nyin bdun gyis ni dbang du 'gyur/ /byed kyis dpa' bo
117a4(rgyud): blon po ste/ /de yi phyed kyis blon po yi/ /rgyal phran la ni sum cu gnyis/ /sreg pa'i rim gyis sbyin sreg bya/ /nyi shus bram ze nyid la ni/ /nyi ma bdun gyis sbyin sreg
117a5(rgyud): bya| |de bzhin rgyal rigs dag la bdun/ /sbyin sreg lnga po rje rigs la/ /dmangs rigs la ni sbyin sreg gsum/ /tha ma la ni sbyin sreg gcig /de ltar dpa' bos
117a6(rgyud): rigs rim gyis/ /zla ba gcig ni yang dag spyad/ /sngags kyi nus pa sgrub pa pos/ /'gro ba thams cad dgug par bya/ /dpa' bos cho ga snga ma yis/ /'dod pas bsten na thob
117a7(rgyud): bar 'gyur/ /sa steng 'dod pa'i dbang phyug bzhin/ /dpal ldan skal ba bzang por 'gyur/ /sgrub po mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi/ /yid 'ong 'gyur bar gdon mi za/ /dpal he ru
117b1(rgyud): ka'i nges par brjod pa las/ rigs lnga po dbang du bya ba dang phyag rgya chen po bsten pa'i cho ga'i le'u ste bzhi bcu pa'o// //de nas las kyi mchog rab ni/ /
117b2(rgyud): gang gis shes na sgrub pa pos/ /dbang dang dgug dang dbye ba dang / /bsad dang bskrad pa la sogs dang / /rmugs dang rengs par bya ba dang / /rmongs dang de bzhin phur bus gdab/ /
117b3(rgyud): tshig 'phrog lkugs par 'gyur ba dang / /'on dang de bzhin long ba dang / /ma ning nyid du bya ba dang / /gzugs ni yongs su 'gyur ba ste/ /las chen bcu gnyis 'di dag ni/ /rtag
117b4(rgyud): tu sgrub pa po yis bsgrubs/ /dngos grub sgrub pa po la ni/ /dran pa 'grub 'gyur gdon mi za/ /thams cad bla ma'i gnas la sogs/ /mkha' 'gro mas ni thams cad khyab/ /
117b5(rgyud): ye shes ldan pa'i rang skye gnas/ /yul dang yul du mngon par skye/ /rdo rje dkyil 'khor gtso mo yin/ /de rnams mkha' 'gro ma ru bshad/ /ku lu ta dang dgon pa dang / /sin+d+hu'i
117b6(rgyud): yul dang grong khyer dbang / /gsar gyi gling dang so raSh+Ta/ /de bzhin lha yi khyim dang ni/ /yi dwags grong dang kha ba'i gnas/ /kAny+tsi'am lAM pa ka yi yul/ /ka ling+ka dang ko sa la//
117b7(rgyud): tri sha ku ne o tre dang / /kA ma ru pa mA la wa/ /lha mo'i mkhar dang rA ma'i dbang / /god ba ri arbu ta/ /au D+yan dzA lan+d+ha ra dang / /pu li ra ma la ya sogs/ /yul 'di dag gi bu mo
118a1(rgyud): gang / /dpa' bo gnyis med rnal 'byor ma/ /de kun 'dod pa'i gzugs can te/ /yid kyi shugs kyis 'jug pa yin/ /rnal 'byor ma drug ku
118a2(rgyud): lu tar| |mya ngan yul na ma mo rnams/ /sin+d+hu'i yul na lA ma ste/ /rigs kyi gtso mo na ga rar/ /lAM pa ka dang sauSh+Tar/ /rigs kyi lha mo rnams yin no/ /yi dwags grong dang
118a3(rgyud): nags chen por/ /mkha' 'gro ru pi ka ru bcas/ /kha ba ri dang kAny+tsir ni/ /byis bcas ma ru bshad pa ste/ /pAny+tsa la yi yul dag na/ /khyim gyi lha mo ka ling+kar/ /brtul
118a4(rgyud): zhugs 'dzin pa rnams yin no/ /ko sa lar ni sha za ba/ /yi dwags grong du de bzhin du/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro sbom dbang phyug /tri sha ku ner dum skyes ma/ /pu lir ma la ya
118a5(rgyud): de bzhin/ /gser rir sme sha can rigs skyes/ /bud med stong phrag nyi shu gcig /lhag ma gzhan dag ji srid pa/ /dpal ldan he ru ka yi ni/ /'khor lo'i rnal 'byor ma
118a6(rgyud): yin no/ /he ru ka dpal sbyor ba che/ /de yi dkyil 'khor gtso mo yin/ /mkha' 'gro nyi shu rtsa bzhi 'dis/ /rgyu dang mi rgyu 'jig rten gsum/ /'gro ba kun ni 'di yis
118a7(rgyud): khyab| |mkha' 'gro ma yi dam tshig 'di/ /sprul pa sgom pa nyid yin te/ /bsam gtan la sogs dang ci'ang rung / /sa steng na ni rdzogs 'gyur ba'o/ /g.yon gyi spyod pa
118b1(rgyud): gcer bu yin/ /mtshan mo rtag tu mnyam bzhag pas/ /skyes pa'am gal te g.yon pa kun/ /rnal 'byor ma kun dpa' bo 'gro/ /phyag rgya gar gyi mchod pa yis/ /rang
118b2(rgyud): byung rtag tu mchod na ni/ /ma lus lus pa med grub cing / /g.yon pa'i mchod pa la rab 'jug /dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las/ yi ge nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i dkyil
118b3(rgyud): 'khor dgod pa'i cho ga'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa gcig pa'o/ / //de nas dpa' bo me tog chu/ /'thungs nas sngags 'di rjes dran bya/ /rtag tu 'di ltar
118b4(rgyud): bya ba nyid/ /phyag rgya lhan cig sgrub pa pos/ /mtshan mo rtag tu sha bza' ba/ /sngags 'di nyid kyis lan gsum bsngags/ /myur du bde ba thob par 'gyur/ /'thungs
118b5(rgyud): dang de bzhin byin pa dang / /reg nas bzhag na gtso mo che/ /bden pas tshangs par spyod pa dang / /thog mar bzhad pa'i phyag rgya yis/ /blta ba'i bsnyems pa grags ldan pa/ /
118b6(rgyud): mtshan mo'ang de bzhin nyin mo ni/ /'dis ni bzhad pa dag tu bya/ /gzugs dang las kyi gsang ba gang / /ji ltar gnas pa dpa' bo nyon/ /rtag tu de yi mchi ma 'byung / /
118b7(rgyud): dad pas de yi spu yang ldang / /rdo rje la ni 'gom mi byed/ /de bzhin gcer bus mchod pa ste/ /'dod pa'i dbang phyug thams cad kyi/ /phyag rgya'i tshogs kyi rim pa nyid/ /dbugs
119a1(rgyud): 'byin bskul dang dgod pa dang / /sgeg pa'i gar ni ngo mtshar bas/ /sna tshogs gang dag mdun byed cing / /phyag rgya sngags ni rjes dran bya/ /
119a2(rgyud): ha ha he he rnam brgyad bzhad/ /sna tshogs dbang phyug mchog tu dga'/ /hA hA zhes bya 'di nye bar/ /rtag tu mchi ma 'byung ba dang / /de nyid kyis de dgar 'gyur zhing / /bsam
119a3(rgyud): gtan gyi sngags legs par sbyor/ /gtso mo rnams dang dpa' bo ni/ /spu ldang ba dang lhan cig bde/ /rdo rje 'gom par mi bya ba/ /g.yon pas yongs su brtags pa yin/ /
119a4(rgyud): dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las/ bzhad pa'i sngags dang mkha' 'gro ma'i gzugs kyi sgyu ma'i cho ga'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis pa'o// //de
119a5(rgyud): nas spyan ras gzigs bshad de/ /dpa' bo dang ni gnyis med mi/ /gnas kyi dbye ba chog shes/ /sgom la rtag tu mngon dga' ba'o/ /lam gyi bzhi mdo'am khyim bdag
119a6(rgyud): gam| |dpa' bo'i gnas dang ri bor ni/ /mkha' 'gro ma yis dam tshig gnas/ /ring po nas kyang gzigs par 'gyur/ /phyag rgyas gcer bu mchod pa yi/ /lag pas
119a7(rgyud): go 'phang dam pa ste/ /gos nyid kyis ni bkab pa'am gzhan/ /'dod pa rnams kyis gos mi 'gyur/ /de bzhin sgra grol gtsor gyur pas/ /las rnams thams cad brtsam
119b1(rgyud): par bya| |rtsa ba'i sngags dang de bzhin gzhan/ /phyogs bcing bar ni 'jug pa yis/ /lha dang lha yi tshogs kyis kyang / /ma mthong bar ni mchod par bgyi/ /snyim pa me tog gis
119b2(rgyud): bkang ste/ /mkha' la spyod la gyen du 'thor/ /me tog de dag ma lhung zhing / /me tog sa la ma mthong na/ /gnas kyi khyad par la gnas dang / /mkha' la 'gro ba stong phrag
119b3(rgyud): gi / gnas la dbang ni byed par 'gyur/ /ngag gi dbang phyug ma rnams dang / /ngag gi dbang phyug 'gugs par 'gyur/ /lha dang lha yi gtam shes shing / /rim pa ji lta
119b4(rgyud): bzhin du 'o/ /skar ma'i rgyu ba shes par 'gyur/ /grong dang grong rdal de bzhin dgon/ /grong khyer dang ni bzhi mdo dang / /shing gcig dang ni dpa' bo'i khyim/ /ri rtse dang ni mtshan
119b5(rgyud): drung du| |snying po'i nye snying rtag dan na/ /lha dang mi yis mthong mi 'gyur/ /de bas yul phyogs 'di dag tu/ /sgrub pa po ni rtag tu gnas/ /yi ge bdun gyi bdag nyid
119b6(rgyud): can| |shing rtser kha dog dmar bsams nas/ /myur du lhung ba mi phyed par/ /sa rnams kyang ni gzhan du min/ /bdag gi lus la rnam bkod de/ /sa la ku sha'i stan du nyal/ /
119b7(rgyud): yi ge bdun gyi bdag nyid sngags/ /brgya rtsa brgyad ni nyid du bzla/ /rmi lam du ni bya ba kun/ /yid la 'dod pa ston par 'gyur/ /dus min 'chi dang bcom dang nyams/ /bya ba
120a1(rgyud): kun tu gang gyur dang / /rnam pa sna tshogs gzhan dag kyang / /thams cad rmi lam dag tu ston/ /de bzhin sngags bzlas ral gri chu/ /mthe bong
120a2(rgyud): mar me me long la/ /sngags pa bdag nyid rtag rnal 'byor/ /pra se na ni 'bebs par byed/ /bsgoms nas lan bdun bzlas brjod pas/ /dge dang mi dge ston par 'gyur/ /
120a3(rgyud): de nas dpa' bo'i yi ge bdun/ /sngags dgod dbye ba nyid kyis te/ /nyi ma'i dbus su bsams nas ni/ /stong gi bar du bzla bar bya/ /shel gyi rnam pa lta bur ni/ /nad
120a4(rgyud): kyis gdungs la bstan par bya/ /mthong ba tsam gyi mod la ni/ /nad kun 'jigs par the tshom med/ /nad las rnam par grol 'gyur na/ /ston kha'i dus kyi zla ba 'dra/ /
120a5(rgyud): zla ba'i dbus su rnam bkod cing / /lag pa g.yon par 'khor lo nyid/ /yi ge shel gyi mdog ltar snang / /nad rnams kun la dgod par bya/ /rims dang gdon
120a6(rgyud): sogs brjod byed dang / /gzer sogs kun dang mdze can dang / /dug gis zin sogs nad rnams dang / /nad kun the tshom med par ni/ /zla gzugs yi ge bsams nas
120a7(rgyud): ni| |phyogs bcur rnam par 'byer bar 'gyur/ /mtshan mo gsang ba la gnas te/ /go mAM sa ni mngar gsum btags/ /yig bdun gsang sngags shes pa dang / /stong
120b1(rgyud): phrag brgyad du sbyin sreg byas/ /sngags pa nang par dus su ni/ /gser srang stong ni rnyed par 'gyur/ /sbyin sreg stong phrag bcu yis ni/ /yul 'khor dam pa rnyed par 'gyur/ /
120b2(rgyud): yang na gsang sngags rgyal po ni/ /gnas ni gang du bsam pa dang / /de dang der ni de yi tshe/ /skye bar 'gyur bar gdon mi za/ /dkar po yis ni zhi bar 'gyur/ /nag pos skad
120b3(rgyud): cig dag gis gsod/ /dmar pos dbang du 'gyur ba ste/ /'phral du nges par 'gugs par 'gyur/ /ser pos thams cad gnon 'gyur te/ /'di ni bstan bcos nges pa
120b4(rgyud): yin| |ser pos dpung ni gnon pa dang / /gru dang 'khrul 'khor glang po gnon/ /dkar po bsam pa tsam gyis ni/ /'chi ba nges par grol bar 'gyur/ /sprul chen brgya yis
120b5(rgyud): zin pa ni/ /de yang myur du slong bar byed/ /dug gis brgyal ba rnams mthong nas/ /rab tu sad pas sad par 'gyur/ /rims dang gdon dang brjed byed ni/ /lag pa mthong bas
120b6(rgyud): 'jigs par 'gyur/ /g.yul gyi dus su khu tshur bcings/ /yid la rtag tu zlos byed na/ /khu tshur ma bkrol de srid du/ /bya ba thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ /dgra
120b7(rgyud): bo gal te lag na ni/ /mtshon cha 'phyar bar byed pa yang / /ji srid khu tshur ma bkrol par/ /mtshon cha gtong bar mi nus so/ /gzhan yang bya ba thams cad ni/ /de bzhin
121a1(rgyud): nyid du sgrub par byed/ /'bras bu me tog 'dab ma dang / /so rtsi de bzhin zas rnams la/ /lus kyi sbyor ba dang po ste/ /de bzhin gnyis pa
121a2(rgyud): nus pa yin/ /gsum pa dag ni ngag nyid do/ /bzhi pa dmigs par mi 'gyur te/ /sngags kyi rgyal pos 'grub par 'gyur/ /sa bzhi shing dang bcas pa dang / /
121a3(rgyud): rgya mtsho ske rags btags de la/ /'dir ni 'grub par the tshom med/ /khams gsum rgyu dang mi rgyu'i bar/ /dmod 'debs phan 'dogs nus pa yin/ /dpal
121a4(rgyud): he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las/ /nye ba'i snying po'i las sgrub pa'i cho ga'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa gsum pa'o// //de nas pho nya la bsten
121a5(rgyud): te| |yi ge bdun pa dang ldan pa/ /gang du las la yang dag brtsams/ /de yi mod la myur du 'grub/ /yi ge bdun pa'i cho ga yis/ /rnal 'byor ma drug rnam
121a6(rgyud): par dgod/ /'khor lor legs par gnas pa drug /rnam pa de lta'i cho ga yis/ /g.yon pa nyid du bskul dang bcas/ /gang gis gzung 'dzin bsams
121a7(rgyud): nas ni| |kha nas gsang sngags rgyal po zlos/ /gang la lag pa de bstan pa/ /de ni nges par 'gugs par 'gyur/ /tsan+dan dmar po'i rdul dang ni/ /de bzhin ske
121b1(rgyud): tshe lan tshwa dang / /bsgrub par bya ba'i rkang rjes la/ /gcig tu byas nas brtag par bya/ /lag pa gnyis kyis mnyes nas ni/ /rnal 'byor ma la sbyin sreg bya/ /mtshan mo me
121b2(rgyud): sha can me 'am/ /dur khrod me la phye ma bsreg /bsgrub par bya la mngon phyogs te/ /sbyor ba 'di ni brtsam par bya/ /ji srid brgya yi bar du bzlas/ /des ni nges par
121b3(rgyud): 'gugs par 'gyur/ /bsgrub par bya ba'i bdag nyid dang / /nor dang skye bo dbang du 'gyur/ /sbyor ba 'di ni grub pa ste/ /gzhan du na ni nga mi smra/ /rdul de nyid ni blangs
121b4(rgyud): nas su| |lcags phye dang ni rnam par bsres/ /dur khrod ras la btums nas ni/ /lan bdun bzlas la bzhi mdo ru/ /sor brgyad tsam du sa brkos nas/ /dgra yi ming
121b5(rgyud): dang bcas par ni/ /gang gi ming smos sbas gyur pa/ /de ni myur du gnon par 'gyur/ /phye ma de nyid bzlas nas su/ /'bad de ba yi 'o ma yis/ /de ni slar yang gsos
121b6(rgyud): gyur na| |'grub pa nyid du the tshom med/ /phye ma de ni blangs nas ni/ /myos byed lnga dang ldan pa ru/ /de ni dur khrod ras kyis bcings/ /dgra yi ming yang bri bar bya/ /bzlas
121b7(rgyud): brjod lan brgya byas nas ni/ /dur khrod du ni nges sbas na/ /bsgrub bya smyo ba nyid du 'gyur/ /bton pa nyid kyis thar par 'gyur/ /bton nas ba yi 'o ma yis/ /'bad
122a1(rgyud): pas de bzhin bkru bar bya/ /slar yang gso ba de dag ni/ /'grub pa nyid du the tshom med/ /dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las/ rnal
122a2(rgyud): 'byor ma drug gi yi ge bdun gyi las kyi cho ga'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi pa'o/ / //de nas las kyi rab mchog ni/ /ngag gi dngos grub byed
122a3(rgyud): pa'o| |kA ra bI ra'i me tog dmar/ /brgya rtsa brgyad ni blangs nas su/ /'bad de ba yi 'o ma dang / /bzlas brjod brgya yang bya ba yin/ /lan re bzlas pa'i me tog
122a4(rgyud): gis| |ling+ga'i spyi bor bsnun par bya/ /de ltar shin tu mnyam bzhag pas/ /nyi ma bdun du bya ba yin/ /de nas nyin zhag bcu gcig par/ /me tog dag ni blangs
122a5(rgyud): nas su| |chu bo chen por song nas ni/ /re re nas ni chu la dor/ /de dag thams cad rim bzhin du/ /lan re bzlas nas rab tu bya/ /chu bor me tog tha ma ni/ /rgyun las ldog
122a6(rgyud): ste rab 'bab na/ /chu dang bcas par blangs nas ni/ /sos ma reg par de 'thungs na/ /gsang ba'i rgyud las byung ba yi/ /sgrub po'i tshig ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /de nas
122a7(rgyud): skye gnas rgya bcings la/ /brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas nas ni/ /sngags pa bsgrub byar mngon phyogs na/ /bsgrub par bya ba'i lto bar gnas/ /de la yid kyi gnas
122b1(rgyud): bzhin du/ /blo ldan thun gsum mthe'u chung bskyod/ /bram ze gsod pa dag gis kyang / /zhag bdun brgya byin sogs nges 'gugs/ /tsan+dan dmar po'i rdul las ni/ /bsgrub
122b2(rgyud): par bya ba'i gzugs byas la/ /tsha ba gsum gyis lus la bsku/ /spra tshil gyis kyang rab tu byug /sgrub pa po yi gsang gnas su/ /zangs ma'i khab kyis phug nas
122b3(rgyud): ni| |seng ldeng mdag me du med la/ /mkhas pas nyi ma bdun du bsro/ /lan brgya bzlas te bzlas pa'i mthar/ /mi yi bdag po mdun na 'don/ /btsun mo'i 'khor
122b4(rgyud): dang bcas pa ni/ /nges par 'gugs par byed pa yin/ /mi yi bdag po 'khor bcas pa/ /gro ga'i 'dab mar bri bya ba/ /gi wang dag gis bris nas ni/ /ming
122b5(rgyud): dang spel nas gang la ni/ /mngon par phyogs te brgya bzlas nas/ /seng ldeng me la de gdungs shing / /dur khrod me steng bsgrub phyir bshad/ /ji srid spra tshil ma zhu
122b6(rgyud): bar| |bsros par gyur na rgyal po ni/ /'khor los bsgyur dang bcas par yang / /nges par 'gugs par 'gyur pa yin/ /bsgrub par bya ba'i rkang rjes las/ /tsan+dan
122b7(rgyud): dmar po nyid dang ni/ /dur khrod lhag ma thal bas spyod/ /sgrub pa po yis gcig bsdus la/ /seng ldeng me ni du med la/ /rab tu 'bad pas bsro bar bya/ /rdul de lag
123a1(rgyud): pa gnyis kyis ni/ /mnyes nas sbyin sreg byas nas ni/ /ji srid du ni bsregs pas 'grub/ /rdul de blangs nas ma yengs par/ /dbugs mi
123a2(rgyud): 'byin par sbas na ni/ /brgyal zhing sems dang bral 'dra la/ /myos shing smyon rmongs pa nyid dang / /rlung gi shugs kyis 'ongs nas ni/ /sgrub pa po yi steng du lhung / /
123a3(rgyud): phyugs sam yang na pho nya mo/ /mkhas pa yis ni dbye ba yin/ /de nas las kyi pho nya mor/ /bya ba 'di ni 'dzin pa nyid/ /kA ra bI ra'i lcug ma ni/ /rlan bcas
123a4(rgyud): dpung pa'i tshad mnyam blangs/ /'bar 'gyur ro bsregs me la dor/ /ji srid de ni ma tshig pa/ /myur du song ste de blangs la/ /rig pa lan bdun bzlas nas
123a5(rgyud): ni| |gang zhig bzlas te bskor na ni/ /de ni de yi skad cig la/ /skyes pa 'am bud med rang gzugs can/ /rlung gi shugs kyis 'ongs par 'gyur/ /kA ra bI ra'i me tog
123a6(rgyud): dmar| |brgya bzlas rgyal gyis sbyor pa las/ /sgrub pos gi wang gis byugs la/ /me tog chu la gnas pa la/ /chu bo chen por zhugs nas ni/ /lte ba man chod
123a7(rgyud): chur bcug ste/ /lag pa sbyar ba'i dbus gnas la/ /rig pa stong du bzlas nas ni/ /lag pa gnyis kyis phyer blangs te/ /chu dang bcas par btung bar bya/ /de nas sgrub
123b1(rgyud): pa bo de yis/ /tshig gi dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /rgyal po'am rgyal po'i chung ma ni/ /yid kyis nges par 'gugs par 'gyur/ /lhar bcas lha min mi rnams ni/ /myur du
123b2(rgyud): dbang du byed par 'gyur/ /khros pas tshig gis gsod 'gyur zhing / /dbye dang bskrad pa nyid kyang byed/ /sgrub pa po yi tshig nyid kyis/ /tshar gcod par ni byed par
123b3(rgyud): 'gyur| |tshig tsam gyis ni chu bo dang / /shing rta 'khrul 'khor rgya mtsho dang / /glang po rta dang de bzhin sprin/ /skyes bu'am yang na bya yang gnon/ /yid kyis yid la
123b4(rgyud): gang 'dod pa/ /tshig gis thams cad byed par 'gyur/ /dgug pa yi ni sbyor ba dag /bud med thams cad rmongs byed pa/ /kA ra bI ra'i me tog ni/ /dmar po yang
123b5(rgyud): dag blangs nas su/ /rig pa lan brgya bzlas pa dag /skye gnas dbus su gzhug par bya/ /me tog de ni kha sbyar byas/ /gsang ba'i gnas su nges par sbyar/ /gnyis
123b6(rgyud): med ye shes rnal 'byor ldan/ /sngags pas brgya phrag gcig tu bzlas/ /skye gnas dbus kyi me tog dang / /sgrub pa po yis gcig blangs la/ /me tog gis ni gang
123b7(rgyud): bsnun pa/ /de ni mdo la dbang du 'gyur/ /brgyal zhing sems dang bral ba yang / /yan lag tshigs kun gzhan dbang ste/ /mngon 'gyur sems ni ldog pa ru/ /skad cig
124a1(rgyud): gis ni dbang du byed/ /'di ni yid ches dngos grub ste/ /don yod dbang du byed pa yin/ /dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las/ rnal

124a3(rgyud): sgrub byed pa/ /gang zhig shes pa tsam gyis ni/ /myur du dngos grub rab 'jug pa'o/ /haM hau ho he ha/ yi ge ha lnga lag pa yis/ /bskul dang ldan pas mnyes nas ni/ /kha

124a5(rgyud): bsgrub bya rnam par 'jig / gal te khro ba 'bar ba dang / /mig dmar ba yis bzlas na ni/ /dpung tshogs bzhon par bcas pa yis/ /rgyal po myur du 'chi bar byed/ /
124a6(rgyud): byi la dang ni ne'u le dang / /khwa dang wa dang chu skyar ni/ /mkha' 'gro ma la stobs can sbyar/ /'di dag myur du grub yin par/ /rgyud 'di la ni the tshom med/ /ri bong la sogs
124a7(rgyud): spu las ni/ /srad bu byas te lan stong bzlas/ /gang gis mgul du bcings gyur pa/ /de ni de dang 'dra bar 'gyur/ /lag par bzlas brjod stong byas te/ /kA ra bI ra'i me
124b1(rgyud): tog dang / /yi ge re re mngon bzlas la/ /sbrum ma la ni reg gyur na/ /mngal ni rnam par 'pho 'gyur te/ /btang na thar bar 'gyur ba yin/ /gang la sdigs mdzub
124b2(rgyud): byas te 'chi/ /slar yang 'tsho bar byed pa yin/ /dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las/ yi ge ha lnga'i las kyi cho ga'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa drug pa'o// //de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /mkha' 'gro kun gyi snying po ste/ /'di ni brjod pa tsam gyis kyang / /dngos grub thams cad skyed byed yin/ /de nas mkha' 'gro ma'i rig
124b3(rgyud): pa chen po bzlas na/ rigs thams cad dbang du byed par 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu bzlas brjod byas pas ni/ dpal chen po bskyed par 'gyur ro/ /mi rus kyi rgyu la
124b4(rgyud): phur bu sor drug pa byas la brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bzlas nas gang gi sgor sbas pa de'i rigs rgyud rnams gcod par 'gyur ro/ /zhing dang / ra ba dang / ma he dang /
124b5(rgyud): glang po che dang / rta'i gnas su brkos te sbas na/ /thams cad brlag par 'gyur ro/ /de nas rgyal po'am rgyal po'i blon po dbang du bya bar 'dod na/ /rgyal po'i sgor sa
124b6(rgyud): las byas pa'i gzugs brnyan sor brgyad pa byas la/ mkhas pas bzhag nas nyin zhag dang bo la ma tu lung ka'i me tog dang 'bras bu rnams dang ku su ma bsres pas

125a3(rgyud): dang / khwa'i sen mo dang / rkang pa'i 'og gi pags pa cha mnyam par byas la ri bong gi khrag dang btags te ril bu bcu gcig byas la grib ma la skam mo/ /de bzhin
125a4(rgyud): du zhag bzang po la lag pa la bcings te nyi ma gnyis pa la gang gi spyi bor phye ma bzhag pa de bud med du 'gyur ro/ /de nas skyes pa khyir bya bar 'dod na/ gnam lcags
125a5(rgyud): n e'u le'i mgo bor bzhag la mtshan mo bdun gyi bar du brgya stong sbyin sreg byas la nyin zhag brgyad pa la gur gum dang mnyam por sbyar te lan brgya rtsa brgyad mngon
125a6(rgyud): par bzlas nas phye ma'i sbyin sreg byas la de'i thal ba gang gi spyi bor bzhag pa de khyir 'gyur ro/ /slar gso ba ni/ mtshan mo'i dus su mkha' 'gro ma rnams la
125a7(rgyud): mchod pa chen po byas te gtor ma byin na/ de'i 'og tu rnal mar 'gyur ro/ /rdzas rdzas ma yin par bya bar 'dod na/ /gser shing gi 'bras bu sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad
125b1(rgyud): byas na| rdzas ma yin par 'gyur ro/ /a ru ra'i sbyin sreg byas na/ rnal mar 'gyur ro/ /de nas smyo bar bya bar 'dod na/ bya chen po'i gnas kyi sbyin sreg byas na/ nyi ma
125b2(rgyud): bdun pa la smyo bar 'gyur ro/ /slar zlog pa ni/ 'bras kyi phub ma'i sbyin sreg byas na/ zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /byi la'i spu zla ba gzas zin pa'i tshe bsdus la gang gi ming
125b3(rgyud): nas smos nas sngags kyi sbyin sreg byas nas thal ba de gang gi spyi bor bzhag pa de byi lar 'gyur ro/ /slar bzlas na/ rnam par zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /bya rog gi rgyus

125b5(rgyud): te mgul du bcings pa de de dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du khwa dang / thi ba dang / rma bya dang / chu skyar dang / 'ug pa dang / khra dang / bya rgod kyi gzugs 'dzin par

128b7(rgyud): gnyis bar du sbyin sreg byas/ /rang gi lus ni de nyid kyis/ /mkha' la 'gro ba nyid thob 'gyur/ /go yu ba yi sha chang gis/ /phyi dang nang gi sbyin sreg bya/ /myur du de

129a2(rgyud): par byed/ /de ltar nyan re byas na ni/ /rgyal po nyid du de byed 'gyur/ /'di las rab mchog gzhan dag ni/ /'jig rten gsum na yod ma yin/ /rnal 'byor chen po
129a3(rgyud): rang dgas 'chi/ /sna tshogs gzugs ni 'dzin cing rol/ /bil ba de bzhin ba la sha /u dum wa ra nyid dag ni/ /sbyin sreg 'bum byas myur du ni/ /nor gyi bdag
129a4(rgyud): po chen por 'gyur/ /go mAM sa dad myos byed bsre/ /rgyal srid 'dod pas sbyin sreg bya/ /rnal 'byor dbang phyug mnyes byas na/ /dbul po nyid du ga la 'gyur/ /go ma
129a5(rgyud): yu ni bsregs byas pas/ /ci bde bar ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /go ma yu yi sbyin sreg gis/ /myur du nor bdag mnyam par 'gyur/ /brtul zhugs gtsang sbra med
129a6(rgyud): na yang / /bstan pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /lhag pa'i tshe dang kuSh+maN+DaM/ /mud ga ma Sha tsa na ka /sbrang rtsi gtsigs ma ske tshe dang / /khyim gyi ta ma la 'dab blangs//
129a7(rgyud): kha bcings par ni 'gyur ba yin/ /ci rung spyod pa'i rnal 'byor pa/ /gang du dga' ba der gnas so/ /de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /rnal 'byor ma yis dang gnas/ /
129b1(rgyud): he ru ka dpal rgyu yan lag /thams cad brtan g.yo'i bdag nyid can/ /gnas ni rab tu dga' ba'i sa/ /de bzhin nye gnas dri ma med/ /zhing 'dir 'od byed shes par bya/ /
129b2(rgyud): nye ba'i zhing ni 'od 'phro ba/ /tshan+do ha ni mngon 'gyur zhing / /nye ba'i tshan+do spyad dka' ba/ /'dus pa ring du song ba yin/ /nye bar 'dus pa mi g.yo ba/ /dur khrod legs pa'i blo gros
129b3(rgyud): nyid| |nye ba'i dur khrod chos kyi sprin/ /shrI he ru ka gzhung spyod pa'i/ /'di ni nang gi bdag nyid sa/ /pha rol phyin bcu sa rnams ni/ /rnal 'byor ma yi brda yi skad/ /mtho ris
129b4(rgyud): sa steng sa 'og tu/ /dpa' bo'i yan lag brtan g.yo'i bdag /pu lIr la sogs gang bstan pa/ /phyi nang bdag nyid can du gnas/ /dpal ldan khrag 'thung rgyal po che/ /'dod
129b5(rgyud): pa kun gyi dbang phyug gtso/ /kun tu phyag dang zhabs ldan zhing / /thams cad du ni spyan zhal dbu/ /kun tu thos ldan 'jig rten na/ /thams cad g.yogs te rnam par bzhugs/ /
129b6(rgyud): de nas dngos grub bsgrub bya ba/ /bsam gtan ldan pa'i sems kyis te/ /sgrub pa po la phan pa'i phyir/ /gsang ba 'di nyid gsungs pa yin/ /dpal he ru ka'i nges par
129b7(rgyud): brjod pa las/ /dbang gi sbyin sreg dang gnas la sogs pa'i sa bstan pa'i cho ga'i le'u ste lnga bcu pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /man
130a1(rgyud): ngag shin tu rnyed dka' ste/ /dpa' bo'i brda yi skad du ni/ /nga yis rgyud du sbas pa yin/ /gos dang phyag rgya lnga la sogs/ /shes rab yan lag
130a2(rgyud): phur bu dra/ /A li kA li zhes brjod pa/ /rgyu la sogs stong sngon 'gro ba/ /'jug pa sgra la sogs pa nas/ /ji srid bsdus pa'i sbyor ldan pa/ /bdud rtsi tshim byed mya ngan
130a3(rgyud): 'das| |lag pa'i mchod pa'i dbang bskur ba/ /go cha chen pos yang dag srung / /sngags rnams kun gyis mchod par bya/ /de ltar de nyid bcu bzhi ni/ /mdor bsdus nas
130a4(rgyud): ni bshad pa yin/ /mi mchog gang zhig kun spyod pa/ /sdig pa thams cad rnam dag bdag /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa 'thob cing / /skye dang skye bar bde gshegs
130a5(rgyud): kyi| |rigs skyes rgyal po chos ldan 'gyur/ /ji ltar sngon bsags sdig pa yi/ /mtshan nyid thams cad dman pa ste/ /gang zhig 'di ni rtag sgom pa/ /sa la 'dod pa
130a6(rgyud): kun dbang phyug / dper na mar gyis gang ba'i snod/ /me yi dbus su bzhag na ni/ /mar gsar steng du zhu 'gyur zhing / /snod kyi dri ma 'jig par 'gyur/ /de bzhin shrI he
130a7(rgyud): ru ka yi| |mchan gyis sdig pa 'jig par 'gyur/ /bsam gtan sems pa tsam gyis sam/ /klo ga cing kha ton bris pa yis/ /mtho ris longs spyod thob 'gyur ba/ /
130b1(rgyud): yang na 'khor los bsgyur ba 'thob/ /rnal 'byor pa rnams 'pho ba'i tshe/ /khrag 'thung dpal sogs rnal 'byor ma/ /lag na me tog sna tshogs thogs/ rgyal mtshan ba dan
130b2(rgyud): sna tshogs dang / /rol mo'i sgra ni sna tshogs dang / /sna tshogs glu yi mchod pa yis/ /'chi ba zhes bya rnam rtog 'di/ /mkha' spyod gnas su 'khrid bar byed/ /de 'dra'i dpa'

130b4(rgyud): tu 'byung bar 'gyur/ /mgul rgyan gdu bu dpung rgyan dang / /rna rgyan tshangs pa'i skud pa dang / /do shal mgo yi phreng ba dang / /ska rags sil sil sgra sgrog pa/ /ri steng sna tshogs
130b5(rgyud): pad+ma yi| |lte bar A li kA li skyes/ /dkar mo bdag po rnam gnon cing / /rdo rje dril bus sku la 'khyud/ /nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i phyed ldan pa'i/ /dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma tshogs
130b6(rgyud): dang / /he ru ka dpal rgyal po che'i/ /go 'phang mchog ni bsgom par bya/ /dpa' bo kun dang rnal 'byor ma'i/ /'khor bcas dbus su sbyor ldan pa/ /thams cad dgyes shing
130b7(rgyud): gnyis med gyur/ /'byin dang sdud par mdzad pa yin/ /mos pa du ma'i sems can la/ /spyod pa sna tshogs ston mdzad de/ /sna tshogs tshul gyis gdul bya ba/ /thabs ni sna tshogs
131a1(rgyud): ston pa yin/ /zab mo'i chos ni ston pa la/ /gal te mos par ma gyur kyung / /smod pa dag tu mi bya ste/ /chos nyid bsam mi khyab dran bya| |
131a2(rgyud): gang gis 'dir bdag yul min pa/ /gang gis chos nyid mi shes yin/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas dang de'i sras ni/ /bdag nyid chen po rnams kyis mkhyen/ /sangs rgyas
131a3(rgyud): rnams ni byung gyur tam/ /ma byung na yang rnam kun tu/ /bsam mi khyab pa'i chos nyid ni/ /'phel 'grib spangs pas gnas pa yin/ /de ltar rnam par bzhag nas
131a4(rgyud): kyang / /'jig rten pa kun yong mi smad/ /de yi bgrod pa bsam yas shing / /sangs rgyas rol ba bsam mi khyab/ /mdo sde bya ba spyod pa rnams/ /rnal 'byor gsang

136a1(rgyud): rdo rje he ru ka dang / rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po rdo rje nyi ma dang / rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po rdo rje rta mchog dang / rigs drug po de

149a5(rgyud): chang tshong ma dmar po'o/ /lhor su war+Na dwI par nam mkha'i snying po dang / 'khor lo'i go cha ma ljang gu'o/ /mer nag rar dpal khrag 'thung dang / rab dpa' mo dmar po'o//
149a6(rgyud): bden bral du sin+d+hur pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug dang / stobs chen ma ste zla ba dang / ser skya'o/ /rlung phyogs na ma ru tar rnam par snang mdzad dang / 'khor los bsgyur ma dud ka'i
149a7(rgyud): mdog dang / dbang ldan du ku lu tar rdo rje sems dpa' dang / brtson 'grus chen mo dkar po'o/ /stobs po che la sogs pa'i dpa' bo ni/ zhal gcig pa/ phyag bzhi pa/
149b1(rgyud): ral pa'i dbu rgyan 'chang ba/ phyag gnyis la 'khor lo dang dril bus 'khyud pa/ phyag gzhan la kha T+wAM ga dang cang te'u 'dzin pa/ phyag rgya lngas brgyan pa/ g.yas brkyang bas
149b2(rgyud): bzhugs pa'o/ /'khor lo'i shugs can ma la sogs pa'i lha mo ni/ gdong gcig pa/ phyag gnyis pa/ thod pa dang / sdigs mdzub 'khor lo 'dzin pas 'khyud pa/ spyan gsum
149b3(rgyud): pa| drag po'i gzugs can/ skra grol pa/ gcer bu gnyis su med par sbyor bar mnyam par gnas pa/ phyogs kyi gos can ma mgrin pa'i nor bu dang / gdu bu dang /
149b4(rgyud): dpung rgyan dang / rna cha dang / tshangs pa'i skud pa dang / mgul rgyan dang / mgo'i phreng ba dang / g.yer kas 'og pag byas pa shar dang / byang dang / nub dang / lho'i
149b5(rgyud): sgor kha gdong ma dang / 'ug gdong ma dang / khyi gdong ma dang / phag gdong ma rnams so/ /me dang / bden bral dang / rlung dang / dbang ldan du ni gshin rje sreg ma dang /
149b6(rgyud): gshin rje'i pho nya mo dang / gshin rje mche ba ma dang / gshin rje 'joms ma rnams so/ /ji ltar mkha' 'gro ma bzhi ni/ khwa gdong ma la sogs pa'i dbye ba yang de
149b7(rgyud): bzhin no/ /mtshams kyi lha mo gzugs gnyis pa/ yid 'phrog ba'i tshul can/ yi dwags kyi gdan la bzhugs pa/ drag po chen po thugs rjes sems can
150a1(rgyud): gyi don mdzad pa'o/ /dpa' bo 'di dag thams cad kyang dpral bar 'khor lo'i phreng ba can no/ /'di dag ni/ sku'i 'khor lo sa

150a3(rgyud): ro bcud bde ba ste/ /chags pa'i bde ba chen po ni/ /de ring du ni bdag gis rnyed/ /a la la ho dgyes pa che/ /bde ba chen po de nyid yin/ /bde gshegs
150a4(rgyud): lha ni shin tu mdzes/ /glu 'di blangs pa tsam gyis ni/ /dga' bas srid pa dag las grol/ /bde bar gshegs pa dag pa ste/ /dkyil 'khor du ni rnam
150a5(rgyud): par brtag / mngal skyes glu yi dbang gyur par/ /rnal 'byor kha cig 'dod pa yin/ /mngal skyes sku yi 'khor lo ste/ /ye shes dkyil 'khor bltas nas

150a7(rgyud): bzlas pa khri 'am 'bum du bzla/ /skye ba can gyi lus grub ste/ /mkha' la spyod par the tshom med/ /oM shrI kA ya DA ka ru lu ru lu b+h+rUM hUM phaT/ DA ki nI
150b1(rgyud): dzA la shaM wa ra swAhA/ snying po'o/ /oM b+h+rUM haM ha b+h+rUM hUM phaT/ nye ba'i snying po'o/ /oM bud+d+ha DA ki nI ye b+h+rUM bai ro tsa nI ye b+h+rUM hUM phaT swAhA/ snying po'o/ /oM
150b2(rgyud): b+h+rUM sarba bud+d+ha DA ki nI ye hUM b+h+rUM phaT/ nye ba'i snying po'o/ /oM k+Sh+mAM ma hA ba la k+Sh+mAM huM hUM phaT/ oM tsakra be ge huM hUM phaT/ oM haM raM badzra hUM hUM hUM phaT/ oM khaN+Da ro he
150b3(rgyud): huM hUM phaT/ oM ha ya grI bA hi huM hUM phaT/ oM shoN+Di nI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM hUM A kA shA gar+b+ha huM hUM phaT/ oM tsakra warma NI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM ki li shrI he ru ka
150b4(rgyud): ki li huM hUM phaT/ oM su bI re huM hUM phaT/ oM si li pad+ma ni rte shwa ra si li huM hUM phaT/ oM ma hA ba le huM hUM phaT/ oM hi le bai ro tsa nI ye hi li huM hUM phaT/ oM tsakra
150b5(rgyud): brti nI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM d+hi li badzra satwa d+hi li huM hUM phaT/ oM ma hA biR+ya huM hUM phaT/ oM kA kA s+ye huM hUM phaT/ oM u lU kA s+ye huM hUM phaT/ oM shwA nA s+ye huM hUM
150b6(rgyud): phaT| oM sU ka rA s+ye huM hUM phaT/ oM ya ma dA D+hI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM ya ma dU tI huM hUM phaT/ oM ya ma daMSh+TI NI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM ma ma ma tha nI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM
150b7(rgyud): DA ki nI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM lA me huM hUM phaT/ oM khaN+Da ro he huM hUM phaT/ oM rU bi NI ye huM hUM phaT/ mkha' 'gro mkha' 'gro ma sogs la/ /thog ma pad+ma

151a3(rgyud): langs dus su/ /yan lag drug tu bsgom bya ba/ /rnam dag ye shes mig gis ni/ /dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma rnams blta/ /oM ha snying ga la/ na maH hi mgo
151a4(rgyud): bo la/ swA hA hu spyi gtsug la/ oM bau ShaT he go cha 'o/ hUM hUM ho mig la'o/ /phaT haM yan lag kun gyi mtshon cha'o/ /dkar ba ser dang dmar ba dang / /sngo dang

151a6(rgyud): byed ma ste/ kha la'o/ /hriM hrIM g.yo byed ma ste/ mgo bo la'o/ /hUM hUM skrag byed ma ste/ spyi gtsug la 'o/ /phaT na maH tsaN+Ti ka ste/ yan lag thams cad kyi mtshon

151b1(rgyud): med ye shes lnga bza' zhing / /ji ltar bde bar gnas par bya/ /rdo rje dam tshig can mchod nas/ /dus bzhi dag tu bsnyen pa bya/ /mngon par brjod ba'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/
151b2(rgyud): sku'i sdom pa'i cho ga'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /gsung gi dkyil 'khor rnam bsgoms te/ /sngar gyi dkyil 'khor dbus dag tu/ /

151b5(rgyud): par 'khyud/ /dbang phyug chen po'i mgo bsnams shing / /dbang phyug chen po'i pags pa ni/ /phyag gnyis dag gis brkyang nas 'dzin/ /lhag ma ni/ snga ma'i rim pa bzhin du
151b6(rgyud): 'gyur ro/ /dbang phyug chen po'i 'khor rnams ni/ /zhabs 'og mnan par rnam par blta/ /dmar zhing sngo la de bzhin ser/ /g.yon pa dkar la spyan gsum pa/ /ral ba'i
151b7(rgyud): dbu rgyan dag gis brgyan/ /thod pa'i phreng bas dbu la mdzes/ /zla ba phyed pa 'chang ba dang / /sna tshogs pad+ma rnam dgod cing / /mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa dang / /'jigs
152a1(rgyud): pa'i zhal ni rnam 'gyur zhing / /sgeg pa la sogs nyams dang ldan/ /stag gi pags pa gos su bgos/ /mi mgo rlon pa'i phreng ba can/ /mgul
152a2(rgyud): rgyan gdu bu rna cha dang / /mgo bo'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /mchod phyir thogs dang thal ba ste/ /phyag rgya drug tu rab tu grags/ /de dag pha rol phyin drug ste/ /phyag rgya
152a3(rgyud): drug gis rgyas btab pa'o/ /de yi pang na bcom ldan ma/ /pad+ma'i mkha' 'gro ma rang mdog/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis spyan gsum pa/ /gcer bu skra ni grol ba ni/ /dum
152a4(rgyud): bus brgyan pa'i ska rags can/ /phyag g.yon thod 'dzin 'khyud pa dang / /gdug pa'i bdud kyi khrag 'chang zhing / /pad ldan lag pas phyogs kun tu/ /gdug pa kun

152a6(rgyud): bdag/ /mkha' 'gro ma sogs sngar bshad bzhin/ /pad+ma la sogs phyogs bkod na/ /dngos grub thams cad rab tu stsol/ /sngar bshad mdog tu gnas pa ste//
152a7(rgyud): 'on kyang mkha' 'gro ma dkar po/ /dum skyes ma ni de bzhin nag/ lha mo gnyis po mdog de bzhin/ /phyag g.yon kha T+wAM thod pa dang / /g.yas pa cang te'u gri gug
152b1(rgyud): 'dzin/ /mtsham pa ni bzhi po dag tu yang / /'chi med lnga po'i bum steng du/ /byang chub sems kyi snod kyang gzhag /gsung gi 'khor lo'i shar du kA ma ru pa na myu gu can dang / sa srung ma
152b2(rgyud): ste/ dkar po'o/ /byang du o te na rdo rje ral pa can dang / 'jigs byed ma chen mo ste/ dmar po'o/ /nu ba tu tri sha ku na na dpa' bo chen po dang / rlung gi shugs can ma ste/ nag po'o//
152b3(rgyud): lho ru ko sa lar rdo rje hUM mdzad dang / chang 'thung ma ste/ gnam mdog ljang gu'o/ /me'i phyogs su ka ling+ka na rab bzang dang / sngo sangs ma ste/ ser skya'o/ /bden bral du lAM pa ka na rdo rje
152b4(rgyud): bzang dang / rab bzang ma ste/ dkar po'o/ /rlung gi phyogs su kA ny+tsi na 'jigs byed chen po dang / rta rnam ste/ ljang gu'o/ /dbang ldan na hi ma la ya na mig mi bzang dang / bya gdong ma ste/

152b6(rgyud): can/ dar dpyang dang ldan pa/ phyag gnyis na pad+ma dang / dril bus 'khyud pa/ g.yon pa'i phyag na kha T+waM ga /g.yas na cang te'u/ phyag rgya lnga la sogs pas brgyan pa/ /g.yas

154b7(rgyud): pas grol/ /de nyid rnal 'byor mas bskul nas/ /sna tshogs du ma mang po yi/ /dam tshig mchod pa ngo mtshar rmad/ /mig bye nas ni bstod pa ni/ /A par ta ru su ra ta
155a1(rgyud): su kha bA hA su kha me tA sau khya ma ya/ sa ma ya ra ma ra ma ho/ /sur ta so bya ya tre sa ma tsa ri ti/ su ra ta sau khya ya tre sa ma tsa ri ti/ /su ga ta sA n+ta ma ya pra bi 'i
155a2(rgyud): bi kurba bi kurba/ su ra ta di ya pad+ma dz+wa le/ pra bi dzim+pa dzim+pa/ su ra to su kha pad+ma dz+wa le/ pra bi nan+ta na rta su kha sa da na pad+ma dz+wa le/ pra bi marda su ra ta ma ba si bi shwa dza le ho ha hUM ha ha ho/ /dza
155a3(rgyud): ya mahA su kha su kha te dze ma ya ra ma ra ma ho/ /su ra ke tu su kha ba hUM bi ti te dza mu ka dza ya te dza ra/ ha na ta ho ba rA ha/ sa su kha ho hUM ho ho su ra to twA ra ga su kha ra ti rI dzi na par ma shrI ra ti
155a4(rgyud): ho| |pa ra ma he tu ma hA su kha ho/ /su kha ma nu yo na ra ba ra me shwa ra ho/ /ho b+ha ga wA na ma hA su khaM hUM ho/ /ba huM bi ti bi shwa dzA la ri ta bi shwa ma ho/ /su ra ti su khaM ga tsit+ta pa ra ma mahA su
155a5(rgyud): kha ho/ /su khu ma nu gr-ih+dz+ya ho/ /su ra ta ut+ta ma san+di su khaM a A ro li ka/ a ma hA su kha gr-i h+dz+ya ho/ /glu 'di dag ni blangs tsam gyis/ /dga' zhing bde ba yang dag 'dus/ /bde ba chen
155a6(rgyud): po yid 'dod pa/ /dngos grub kyang ni 'thob par 'gyur/ /'khor tshogs chen po byin brlabs nas/ /dkyil 'khor chen po dgyes pa che/ /pad+ma dra ba'i sdom pa yin/ /mngon par
155a7(rgyud): brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma las/ gsung gi sdom pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /thugs kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa ste/ /gzhal yas
155b1(rgyud): brtsegs ma'i dbus dag tu/ /'khor lo mchog ni dgod par bya/ /sngon po'i mdog can gzi brjid che/ /gsang ba las byung rtsibs brgyad pa/ /de yi dbus su pad+ma ni/ /sna tshogs
155b2(rgyud): pad+ma ge sar can/ /'dab ma brgyad du bshad pa ste/ /rnam dag gdan du byas pa yin/ /de yi dbus su zla ba bsgom/ /der ni zla ba khyab par ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba che/ /lha
155b3(rgyud): mchog grol zhing bzhengs par gyur/ /oM hUM a mahA su kha a la la ho/ /ma hA su ra ta s+t+waM su ra ta su kha bi yo ga su ra ta ut+ta ma bo d+hi su khaM/ su kha ma nu sid+d+hi ho/ /su ra ta ba ya sau khya ma ya
155b4(rgyud): oM AH hUM hoH b+ha ga wA na ma hA su kha ut+ta ra ut+ta ra/ sar+b+ba ut+ta ma sau khya ma ya hUM/ a la la ho/ /mahA su kha s+t+waM/ ba ra ma su khA ma lai du bi bi ut+ta ma dzA la su khaM a la la ho/ /su ra te sau
155b5(rgyud): khya ma ya/ bcom ldan bde ba chen po ni/ /'khor dang bcas par mnyam par bzhengs/ /thugs kyi 'khor lo zhal bzhi pa/ phyag bcu gnyis pa/ g.yas brkyang g.yon bskum
155b6(rgyud): pa'i zhabs kyis bzhugs pa/ spyan gsum pa/ mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa/ sngo ba dang / dkar ba dang / ser ba dang / dmar ba'i zhal/ rdo rje dang dril bus 'khyud pa/ khyab 'jug
155b7(rgyud): gi mgo bo phyag na bsnams pa/ khyab 'jug gi pags pa rlon pa brkyang nas phyag gzhan gnyis na bsnams pa'o/ /lhag ma sku'i mkha' 'gro dang mtshungs so/ /thod pa'i phreng ba
156a1(rgyud): can| mgo'i phreng ba 'chang ba/ mgo'i phreng bas sku rags bcings pa/ rdo rje sems dpa' dbu rgyan can/ /zla ba phyed pa'i rgyan yang 'chang / /sna tshogs
156a2(rgyud): rdo rje cod pa na gnon/ /stag gi pags pa gos su man bas/ /phyag rgya drug gis rnam par brgyan/ /mdun gyi mkha' 'gro ma ni/ zhal gcig pa/ phyag gnyis pa/ spyan gsum
156a3(rgyud): pa| skra grol ba/ gtser bu dum bus brgyan pa/ ska rags can/ phyag g.yon pa thod pa thogs pas 'khyud pa/ g.yas pa rdo rje sdigs mdzub can/ /ska rags g.yer ka'i sgra
156a4(rgyud): sgrog pa/ /chos kyi sgra ni yid 'ong ba/ /'byung bar 'gyur ba bye ba snyed/ chos kyi dbyings te stong pa yin/ /mnyam pa nyid dang so sor rtog/ /bya byed pa yang de bzhin bsgom/ /sbyor
156a5(rgyud): ba mchog gi dam pa ste/ /rnam dag legs par brtags nas su/ /mnyam nyid chos kyi ro gcig byas/ /'khor lo la ni rnam par blta/ /shar gyi 'dab mar mkha' 'gro dang //
156a6(rgyud): lho phyogs lA ma de bzhin te/ /nub phyogs dum skyes ma dang ni/ /byang phyogs gzugs can ma de bzhin/ /dkar dang ser dang de bzhin dmar/ /ljang gu'i mdog can mchog
156a7(rgyud): dam pa| |thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin/ /cang te'u gri gug de bzhin te/ /spyan gsum pa la bzhin rnams bsgyur/ /gcer bu skra grol 'jigs ba can/ /g.yas brkyang ba yi gnas
156b1(rgyud): pas bzhugs/ /'dod pa'i chags pas legs par myos/ /cung zad ngo tsha'i mig zur dang / /nu ma rab rgyas dga' ba 'dzin/ /zhal gyi mche ba cung zad gtsigs/ /phyag rgya lnga yis
156b2(rgyud): rgya yang gdab/ /mtshams bzhi ru ni bum pa dag/ ye shes bdud rtsi gang bas dgod/ /de steng byang chub sems kyis ni/ /yongs su gang bar gzhag par bya/ /thugs kyi 'khor
156b3(rgyud): lo'i shar phyogs su pU li ra ma la ya na thod pa'i dum bu dang / rab gtum ma ste/ dkar po'o/ /byang du dzA lan+d+ha ra na keng rus chen po dang / gtum mig ma ste/ ser bo'o/ /nub tu au
156b4(rgyud): D+yan na keng rus can dang / 'od ldan ma ste/ dmar po'o/ /lho phyogs su arbu ta na ma che ba rnam par gtsigs pa dang / sna chen ma ste/ ljang gu'o/ /me'i phyogs na go dA ba ri na lha dgra
156b5(rgyud): dang / dpa' ba'i blo gros ma nam mkha'i mdog can ma'o/ /bden bral du rA me shwa ra na 'od dpag med dang / mi'u thung ma ste/ dkar skya'o/ /rlung gi phyogs na de bi ko Ti na rdo rje'i
156b6(rgyud): 'od dang / lang+ka'i dbang phyug ma ste/ ljang gu dang / mu tig lta bu'o/ /dbang ldan na ma lA ba na rdo rje lus dang / shing grib ma ste/ pad+ma dang / ser skya'o/ /thugs kyi 'khor lo nam
156b7(rgyud): mkha' la spyod pa'o/ /thod pa'i dum bu la sogs pa'i dpa' bo ni/ gdong gcig pa/ phyag bzhi pa/ ral pa'i cod pan can/ thugs rjes khro zhing 'jigs pa/ rdo rje dang dril bu'i
157a1(rgyud): phyag gnyis kyis 'khyud pa/ g.yon pa dang g.yas pa'i phyag gnyis la khwa T+wAM ga dang / cang te'u 'chang ba/ phyag rgya lngas brgyan pa/ g.yas brkyang
157a2(rgyud): pas bzhugs pa'o/ /rab gtum ma la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams ni/ zhal gcig pa/ phyag gnyis pa/ sdigs mdzub kyis thod ba 'khyud pa/ spyan gsum pa/ ser skya'i gzugs
157a3(rgyud): can no| |skra grol ba/ gzugs gnyis pa/ gnyis su med par mnyam par ldan pa/ phyogs kyi gos can rnam par rol pa/ mgrin pa'i nor bu dang / gdu bu dang / dpung rgyan dang /
157a4(rgyud): rna cha dang / tshangs pa'i skud pa dang / mgul rgyan dang / mgo bo'i phreng ba dang / g.yer ka'i sku rags can/ sgo dang zur gyi lha mo rnams/ /khwa gdong gshin rje sreg la sogs//
157a5(rgyud): ji ltar mkha' 'gro mdog bzhin du/ /khwa gdong la sogs de bzhin no/ /mtshams rnams lha mo de bzhin te/ /gzugs gnyis 'dzin cing yid 'phrog pa'o/ /phyag sogs de
157a6(rgyud): ltar bsgoms nas ni/ /dngos grub thams cad rab tu stsol/ /ye shes 'khor lo de mthong nas/ /mchod dang bstod dang dbang yang bskur/ /sgom pa rtse gcig byas na ni/ /bdag
157a7(rgyud): med ma yi go 'phang gnas/ /snying po ye shes dam tshig ni/ /sgrub pos 'dod pa kun gyi phyir/ /sku gsung thugs la rnam bkod nas/ /sangs rgyas mchog ni rnam par spro/ /rtag
157b1(rgyud): tu dam tshig bskyang bya zhing / /ye shes lnga yi bdud rtsi chu/ /dam tshig mchod pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /cho ga bzhin du bzlas pa bya/ /oM shri tsit+ta DA ki d+hi ka a khaM huM hUM phaT/ DA ki nI dzA la shaM ba ra
157b2(rgyud): huM hUM phaT/ snying po'o/ /oM hrIH ha ha huM hUM phaT/ nye ba'i snying po'o/ /oM badzra DA ki nI huM hUM phaT/ nye ba'i snying po'o/ /oM sarba badzra DA ki nI ye badzra bar+Na nI ye huM hUM phaT/ snying po dang nye ba'i snying
157b3(rgyud): po'o/ /oM DA ki nI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM lA me huM hUM phaT/ oM khaN+Da ro he huM hUM phaT/ oM rU pi Ni huM hUM phaT/ oM ka raM khaN+Da ka pA la ka ra huM hUM phaT/ oM pra tsa N+De huM hUM phaT/ oM ku ru mahA kaM kA la ku ru
157b4(rgyud): huM hUM phaT/ oM tsaN+DA k+Shi ye huM hUM phaT/ oM ban+d+ha kaM kA la ban+d+ha huM hUM phaT/ oM pra b+ha pa tI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM tA sa ya bi ka Da daM Sh+TaM Ni tA sa ya huM hUM phaT/ oM ma hA na se huM hUM phaT/ oM k+Sho b+ha ya su
157b5(rgyud): ra bai ri Na k+Sho b+ha ya huM hUM phaT/ oM bI ra ma tI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM hroM a mi tA b+hA hroM huM hUM phaT/ oM kharba rI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM hra badzra b+hA hra huM hUM phaT/ oM laM ke shwA rI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM pheM badzra
157b6(rgyud): de ha pheM huM hUM phaT/ oM dru mats+tsha ye huM hUM phaT/ oM kA kA s+ye huM hUM phaT/ oM u lU kA s+ye huM hUM phaT/ oM shwA nA s+ye huM hUM phaT/ oM sU ka rA s+ye huM hUM phaT/ oM ya ma dA D+hI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM ya ma du
157b7(rgyud): tI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM ya ma daM Sh+Ti NI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM ya ma ma tha nI ye huM hUM phaT/ bzlas pa sgom par ldan byas nas/ /spro dang bsdu ba'i rim pa yis/ /sngags pa myur du 'grub pa ste//
158a1(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa'i go 'phang rnyed/ /mnyam pa'i dam tshig dam tshig mchog /thugs kyi rnyed pas khyab pa la/ /rnal 'byor chen po rnam par spyod/ /mkha'
158a2(rgyud): la spyod pa nyad thob 'gyur/ /'di ni khams gsum thams cad du/ /go 'phang mchog la legs par bzhugs/ /langs ba'i dus su dam tshig can/ /yan lag drug tu sbyor ba
158a3(rgyud): bshad/ /oM haH snying ga ste/ rdo rje sems dpa' dkar po/ /na ma hi mgo la ste/ rnam par snang mdzad ser po/ /swA hA hu spyi gtsug la ste/ pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug zla ba dang ser
158a4(rgyud): skya'o| |bau ShaT he go cha ste/ he ru ka nam mkha'i mdog can no/ /hUM hUM ho mig la ste/ rdo rje nyi ma gser btso ma lta bu'o/ /phaT haM ni/ yan lag thams cad kyi mtshon cha ste/ rta
158a5(rgyud): mchog ljang gu ser skya'o/ /oM baM lte ba la ste/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro nam mkha' dang ser skya'o/ /haM yoM snying ga la ya mi ni/ dkar mo'o/ /hrIM moM kha la ste/ rmongs byed ma dmar mo'o/ /hreM
158a6(rgyud): hrIM mgo la ste/ g.yo byed ma ser mo'o/ /hUM hUM spyi gtsug la ste/ skrag byed ma sngon mo'o/ /phaT phaT yan lag thams cad kyi mtshon cha ste/ tsa N+Di ka dmar ser ro/ /ji ltar bde bar
158a7(rgyud): cho ga bzhin du spyod cing gnas so/ /'gro ba du ma'i bsam pal/ /thugs kyi rdo rje tshul can 'di/ /gnyis med sbyor ba mtha' yas pa/ /srid pa kun gyi dngos por gnas/ /dri
158b1(rgyud): ma med cing nga rgyal med/ /yi ge med cing brjod du med/ /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma las/ thugs kyi sdom pa dang / bla ma'i bsnyen bkur gyi le'u ste drug pa'o// //de
158b2(rgyud): nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /dkyil 'khor dam tshig mchog gyur pa/ /'dod pa'i gsang ba kun ster ba/ /shin tu gsang ba'i dngos grub stsol/ /sgrub pa po la phan pa'i phyir/ /sgrub
158b3(rgyud): pa'i don ni bshad par bya/ /dkyil 'khor snga ma'i dbus su ni/ /pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa bri/ /sna tshogs mdog can ge sar bcas/ /'dod pa kun gyi 'dras bu ster/ /de yi dbus su
158b4(rgyud): yi ge hUM/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rnam par bsgom/ /mtshan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs/ /dpe byad kun gyis rnam par brgyan/ /dgyes pa chen po'i sbyor ba yis/ /gnyis med
158b5(rgyud): gnyis su med pa'i mchog/ byang chub sems kyi rgyu las ni/ /byang chub zla ba dri med pa/ /de mthong lha mo langs nas ni/ /glu 'di yis ni bskul bar byed/ /hUM/ rol cig rol cig
158b6(rgyud): dgyes pa ho/ /bde ba chen po'i rdo rje ni/ /bde ba chen po ro nyid las/ /'di nyid du ni bzhengs su gsol/ /a la la ho dgyes pa che/ /khyod ni bde ba'i mchog yin te/ /khyod kyi zhal
158b7(rgyud): ni khums tsam gyis/ /bdag gis 'dir ni ro gcig rnyed/ /kye ma'o bcom ldan bde chen dgyes/ /oM/ rdo rje sems dpa' legs dgyes khyod/ /ro dang ro mchog thams cad de//
159a1(rgyud): dgyes pa chen po bde ba rnams/ /rtag par dngos grub kun la yang / /rol cig rol cig lha mo la/ /rnal 'byor ma ni thams cad dang / /bcom ldan
159a2(rgyud): rdo rje chen po ni/ /lha mo'i pad+ma dgyes la rol/ /hUM/ a la la ho dgyes pa che/ /bcom ldan 'dod la dgyes pa khyod/ /'dod pa'i dngos grub legs par stsol/ /pad+ma mchog la

159a5(rgyud): dus ni 'di nyid du/ /yang dag byang chub 'dus pa yin/ /a la la ho dgyes pa che/ /bde chen kun tu dgyes mchog rol/ /a la la ho dgyes pa che/ /glu 'di dag gis bskul

159a7(rgyud): dang | ser ba dang / dmar ba dang / ljang gu'i zhal te/ spyan gsum pa/ phyag bcu gnyis pa/ g.yas brkyang bas 'jigs byed chen po dang dus mtshan zhabs 'og tu
159b1(rgyud): mnan pa/ phyag gnyis rdo rje dril bu bsnams pas dam tshig rdo rje phag mo la 'khyung pa/ phyag gzhan gnyis po na tshogs bdag gi pags pa 'dzin pa/ g.yas pa'i gsum pa na cang te'u
159b2(rgyud): bzhi pa la dgra sta/ lnga ba la gri gug/ drug pa la rdo rje mdung bsnams pa/ phyag g.yon pa'i gsum na rdo rje kha T+wAM ga/ bzhi pa la khrag gis bkang ba'i thod pa/ lnga pa la rdo rje zhags pa/ drug
159b3(rgyud): pa la bdud bzhi'i mgo bo bsnams pa'o/ /ral pa'i cod pan rgyan cha can/ /dbu la thod pa'i phreng ba 'chang / /zla ba phyed pa dbu la 'dzin/ /dbu la sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan/ /'jigs pa'i
159b4(rgyud): mche ba rnam bsgyur zhal/ /sgeg pa la sogs nyams dang ldan/ /stag gi pags pa gos su mnabs/ /mi yi mgo bo'i phreng ba 'dzin/ /mgrin nor gdu bur na cha dang / /mgo yi nor bus rnam

159b6(rgyud): gnyis pa/ /spyan gnyis pa la skra grol ba/ /gcer bu ska rags 'og pag gis rnam par brgyan pa/ phyag g.yon pas 'khyud pa ste/ bdud kyi khrag gis yongs su gang ba'i thod pa
159b7(rgyud): bsnams ba/ g.yas pa na sdigs mdzub rdo rje dang bcas pas phyogs bcur sdigs par byed pa/ bskal pa'i me yi gzi brjid can/ /khrag la dgyes shing zhal nas 'dzag/ byin
160a1(rgyud): ba gnyis kyis mnyam par 'khyud/ /thugs rje chen po'i bdag nyid can/ /chos kun gnas ni dge ba yin/ /A li kA li las byung ba/ /rnam par rtog pa
160a2(rgyud): med pa ste/ /chos dang chos min rnam par spangs/ /pad 'dab lha mo dgod pa yis/ /dngos grub thams cad rab tu stsol/ /mkha' 'gro ma dang lA ma dang / /dum skyes ma dang gzugs
160a3(rgyud): can ma/ /g.yon phyogs bskor ba'i dgod pa yis/ /rnal 'byor ma la dngos grub stsol/ /nag cing ser la de bzhin dmar/ /ljang gu drag po'i gzugs can te/ /thams cad zhal
160a4(rgyud): gsum phyag drug pa/ /spyan gsum g.yas brkyang gnas pas bzhugs/ /gcer bu dbu skra grol ba ste/ /bdud bzhi zhabs kyis gnon pa dang / /chags shing zhen pas myos pa
160a5(rgyud): dang / /thod pa dag gi dbu rgyan can/ /phyag rgya lngas ni rnam par brgyan/ /nag cing sngo la ljang ba dang / /shin tu 'jigs shing sdang mig can/ /ser zhing nag la ljang gu ste/ /snying
