179b5(rgyud): pa'i dpa' bo dang / rab tu gtum ma la sogs pa thams cad kyang gzugs sna tshogs pa/ zhal gsum pa/ phyag drug pa/ spyan gsum pa/ g.yas brkyang bas bzhugs pa/ phyag rgya
179b6(rgyud): lngas rgyas btab pa/ lha mo gcer bu skra grol ba/ thod pa dang / kha T+wAM ga dang / cang te 'u dang / gri gug dang / rdo rje dang / dril bus 'khyud pa/ lha mo'i byin pa gnyis kyis 'khril ba/
179b7(rgyud): dgyes pa chen po'i dga' ba'i ros rnam par myos pa'o/ /dbus kyi dkyil 'khor dpa' po yin/ /zur bzhi bum pa'i steng du ni/ /byang chub sems kyis yongs gang ba'i/
180a1(rgyud): thod pa'i snod ni gzhag par bya/ /dkyil 'khor gzhan gyi zur la ni/ /bum pa'i thod pa gnyis po dgod/ /mtshams kyi char mkha' 'gro ma la sogs
180a2(rgyud): pa'i lha mo bzhi po gzugs phyed pa bud med dbang phyug ma ste/ zhal gsum pa/ spyan gsum pa/ g.yas brkyang ba'i gnas pas bzhugs pa/ phyogs kyi gos
180a3(rgyud): can| skra grol ba/ phyag rgya lnga brtan par 'dzin pa'o/ /rdo rje phreng bas yongs bskor ba/ /dkyil 'khor lnga yi phyi rol tu/ /'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor sna tshogs bri/ /dpa'
180a4(rgyud): bo dang rnal 'byor ma thams cad kyang sna tshogs pad+ma'i steng du yi dwags kyi gdan la bzhugs pa/ sgo bzhi'i shar phyogs su khwa gdong ma khros pa'i mig can/ /shel mig
180a5(rgyud): khros pa'i zhal mnga' ba/ gri gug dang / mgo bo dang / thod pa dang / kha T+wAM ga dang / dril bu dang / cang te'u 'chang ba/ spyan gsum pa/ zhal gsum pa/ skra grol ba/
180a6(rgyud): gcer bu sna tshogs pa'i mdog can g.yas brkyang bas gnas pa/ yi dwags dang sna tshogs pad+ma la bzhugs pa/ 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus na bzhugs te phyag
180a7(rgyud): rgya lngas rnam par brgyan pa'o/ /'ug gdong ma dang / khyi gdong ma dang / phag gdong ma ni/ ji ltar khwa gdong ma'i mdog dang / phyag dang / 'dug stangs dang / gdan
180b1(rgyud): bzhin no/ /bong bu dang / rnga mo dang / ra dang / byi la'i zhal te/ shin tu drag pos mngon du gsol ba'o/ /gshin rje sreg ma nas gshin rje 'joms ma'i bar ni/ gang byed
180b2(rgyud): pa'i dbang phyug ma ste/ zhal gsum pa/ phyag drug pa/ spyan gsum pa/ g.yas brkyang bas gnas pa/ phyogs kyi gos can/ skra grol ba/ sna tshogs pad+ma dang yi dwags
180b3(rgyud): mnan pa/ phyag rgya lngas byin gyis brlabs pa/ thod pa dang / kha T+wAM 'dzin pa/ mgo bo dang / gri gug bsnams pa/ cang te'u dang / rdo rje dang / mdung 'dzin pa/
180b4(rgyud): mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa/ 'jigs su rung ba/ thams cad kyang mi mgo'i thod pa'i phreng brgyan du 'chang ba/ thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i
180b5(rgyud): dbu rgyan can/ /cod pan rdo rje'i phreng bas byas/ /rdo rje las byas rgyan can te/ /sna tshogs rdo rje zla phyed kyis/ /dbu la mnan cing brgyan pa yin/ /ji ltar bcom
180b6(rgyud): ldan mdog bzhin du/ /rdo rje phag mo'i zhal mdog phyag /phyag rgya 'dug stangs las kyang de/ /gcer bu skra ni grol ba ste/ /dum bu'i ska rags rgyan can te/ /
180b7(rgyud): 'od kyang rdo rje phag mo yi/ /steng gi zhal gdong dkar po ste/ /mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa 'o/ /ji ltar gnas kyi rim pa dag /'bum pa mngon brjod rim pa
181a1(rgyud): las| rnal 'byor ma yi dkyil 'khor gyi/ /le'u rdo rje sems dpas bshad/ /gzhan du rdo rje mkha' 'gro dang / /mngon ba rjod rgyud kyi dang po
181a2(rgyud): yi| |le'u la nge par 'gal ba med/ /snyoms pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi ni cho ga ste/ /lnga po lnga pa'i bdag nyid sbyor chen po/ /sdom pa'i cho ga sbas pa gsang ba ste/ /mkha'
181a3(rgyud): 'gro ma ni ma lus thams cad kyi/ /'di ltar gzhan du bka' yi phyogs bzhin du/ /bum pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa/ /bum ba sna tshogs cho ga bzhin/ /gser dang dngul las
181a4(rgyud): byas pa ste/ /sna tshogs gos kyis mdzes pa dang / /me tog phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /'chi med lnga yis yongs su bkang / /rnam lnga sman dang yang dag ldan/ /rin chen
181a5(rgyud): lnga dang bcas pa dang / /'bru lnga dag gis rnam par mdzes/ /dkyil 'khor phyogs dang mtshams rnams su/ /bum pa bcu drug bzhag nas kyang / /mkha' 'gro
181a6(rgyud): ma ni sna tshogs mchod/ /glu dang gar dang bde ba che/ /phyogs kyi gos can skra grol ba/ /sna tshogs rol mo'i sgra dang / /sna tshogs yi dwags phreng ba yis/ /dkyil
181a7(rgyud): 'khor phyi rol yongs su bskor/ /de yi phyi rol mu khyud kyi/ /dbus su mkha' 'gro ma yin te/ /phyi rol ska rags kyis bskor ba/ /dur khrod rnam par 'jigs pa
181b1(rgyud): dag / sna tshogs du mas rnam par mdzes/ /mdun du ye shes dam tshig gi /dkyil 'khro mchog ni mthong nas kyang / /mngon brjod dam tshig de bzhin mchod/ /rim pa bzhi
181b2(rgyud): du dbang yang bskur/ /mkhas pas lus la bkod nas ni/ /gcig tu bsdus te thim nas su/ /dpa' bo dang ni rnal 'byor ma/ /phung po khams dang skye mched gnas/ /go
181b3(rgyud): cha gnyis po bgo bar bya/ /'khro lo thams cad rnam bsgoms nas/ /phung po khams dang skye mched dang / /lus ngang yid la rnam par dgod/ /ye shes sems dpa' snying
181b4(rgyud): la dgod/ /sna tshogs yid du 'ong ba yi/ /dam tshig lha yi mchod pas mchod/ /ye shes bzlas pa'i bya ba dag /rangs med pa ni rnam bar spros/ /dung chen phreng ba blangs
181b5(rgyud): nas su| |mnyam par bzhag nas bzlas pa bya/ /der ni ye shes 'khor lo la/ /mkhas pas mchod bstod bzlas pa bya/ /sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir/ /rnal
181b6(rgyud): 'byor pa yis smon lam gdab/ /theg pa chen po'i chos rnams ni/ /rnal 'byor pa yis myur bar 'grub/ /oM badzra he he ru ru kaM shrI DA ki nI dzA la shaM ba raM hUM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM
181b7(rgyud): hrIH ha ha hUM hUM phaT/ snying po dang nye ba'i snying pa'o/ /oM badzra pai ro tsa nI ye huM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM sarba bud+d+ha DA ki nI ye badzra bar+Na nI ye huM hUM phaT swAhA/ lha mo'i snying po dang nye ba'i snying
182a1(rgyud): po'o| |oM khaN+Da ka pA li ka ra ka ra huM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM pra tsaN+De huM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM ma hA kaM kA la ku ru ku ru huM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM tsaN+Da k+Shi me huM
182a2(rgyud): hUM phaT swAhA/ oM kaM kA la ban+d+ha ban+d+ha huM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM pra b+hA ba tI ya huM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM bi ka Ta daM Sh+Ti Na tra sa ya tra sa ya huM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM ma hA nA se huM hUM phaT swAhA/
182a3(rgyud): oM su ru bI ri NI k+Sho b+ha ma k+Sho b+ha ya swAhA/ oM bI ra ma tI ye huM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM a mi tA b+ha hrauM hA+auM huM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM kharba ri ye huM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM badzra phra b+hA hra hra hu hU phaT swAhA/
182a4(rgyud): oM laM ke shwa rI ye huM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM badzra de ha phaiM phaiM huM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM badzra dru mats+tsha ye huM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM aM ku ri ka phaT huM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM ai ra ba tI ye hUM hUM phaT swAhA/
182a5(rgyud): oM badzra dza Ti la da ha da ha huM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM ma hA b+hai ra pI ye huM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM ma hA bI ra pa tsa pa tsa huM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM bA yu be ge huM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM badzra hUM kA ra b+hak+Sha b+hak+Sha
182a6(rgyud): ba sa ru d+hi ra an+ta mA lA ba laM pi ni huM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM su ra b+hak+ShI ye huM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM su b+ha dra gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na sap+ta pA tA la ga ta b+hu dzaM ga sarbaM bA tar+dz+dza ya tAr+dz+dza ya huM hUM phaT
182a7(rgyud): swAhA/ oM sh+yA ma de bI ye huM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM badzra b+ha dra A kaD+D+h+ya a kaD+D+h+ya huM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM su b+ha dre huM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM hA b+hai ra ba hriM hriM huM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM ha ya kar+Ne huM hUM
182b1(rgyud): phaT swAhA/ oM bi rU pAk+Shi dz+NauM dz+NauM huM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM kha gA na ne huM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM ma hA pa la k+Sh+mAM k+Sh+mAM huM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM tsakra be ke huM hUM nga Ta swAhA/ oM rat+na badzra haM haM hraM hUM phaT swAhA/
182b2(rgyud): oM khan+Da ngo he huM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM ha ya grI ba hrIM hrIM huM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM she N+Di nI ye huM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM a kA sha gar+b+ha hUM hUM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM tsa kra wa rmi NI ye hUM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM he ru ka ki li
182b3(rgyud): ki li huM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM su bI re hUM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM pad+ma narte shwa ra si li si li huM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM ma hA ba la huM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM bai ro tsa na hi li hi li huM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM tsakra warte ni ye
182b4(rgyud): huM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM badzra satwa d+hi li d+hi li huM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM ma hA bIR+ye huM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM DA kI nI ye huM hUM phaT swAhA oM lA me huM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM khaN+Da ro he huM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM rU pi NI
182b5(rgyud): ye huM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM kA kA s+ye huM hUM swAhA/ oM u lU kA s+ye huM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM shwa nA s+ye hUM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM sU ka rA s+ye huM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM ya ma dA D+hI ye hUM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM ya ma dU
182b6(rgyud): tI ye huM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM ya ma daMSh+T+ri NI ye huM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM ya ma ma tha na ye huM hUM phaT swAhA/ 'di ni ji lta'i rim pa yis/ /gzhan la phan phyir dam tshig can/ / mchod dang sgom dang
182b7(rgyud): bzlas pa bya/ /zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa 'phel/ /yid du 'ong ba'i dngos grub thob/ /sgong skyes dbye ba'i mchog dam pa/ /sbyor bas 'dod pas thams cad stsol/ /ji lta'i las rnams
183a1(rgyud): byas nas ni/ /'grub par yang ni tha tshom med/ /sbyong ba'i dngos grub dam pa'i mchog /bla ma'i ngang las rnyed par 'gyur/ /gzhan yang na la
183a2(rgyud): 'byor ma yi gnas/ /brgyud pa'i rim pa'i mchog gyur pa/ /yang na sngon gyi dngos grub ni/ /rmi lam du ni ston pa yin/ /gzhan yang bla ma'i go 'phang brnyes ba ni/ /rna la
183a3(rgyud): 'byor ma yis rab tu stsol/ /dam tshig mchog gi gsang ba dang / /sbas pa 'di ni bstan mi bya/ /rnal 'byor ma yi thugs dang ni/ /sangs rgyas thugs ni mchog
183a4(rgyud): gyur ba| |mkha' 'gro ma yi snying po gsang / /rnal 'byor sbyor ba'i mchog yin no/ /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ dngos grub kyi gnas kyi rim pa'i
183a5(rgyud): le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o/ / //de nas sbyor ba bshad bya ba/ /'dod pa'i don kun sgrub byed pa/ /bla ma las kyang bla ma sta/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba'i
183a6(rgyud): sdom| |phag mo bdag mo chen mo ni/ /rnal 'byor ma yis legs bsgrubs pa/ /'di ni kun gyi rnal 'byor te/ /rnal 'byor snying po bsdus pa yin/ /pad+ma 'dab brgyad
183a7(rgyud): la bri ba| |sna tshogs mdog can mchog dam pa/ /lte ba ge sar bcas pa la/ /thams cad yongs su dag pa'i gdan/ /de yi dbus su zla ba'i cha/ /de bzhin dag cing dri
183b1(rgyud): ma med| |de steng A li kA li ste/ /dbus su baM gyis rnam par brgyan/ /de dbus lha mo bzhengs pa ni/ /rdo rje phag mo rnal 'byor ma/ /zhal bzhi pa la phyag bcu gnyis/ /sbyan gsum
183b2(rgyud): pa la zhal rnam bsgyur/ skyil mo krung ni phyed par bzhugs/ /gar gyis rnam par legs brgyan cing / /phyogs kyi gos can skra grol ba/ /phyed ni bud med bang phyug zhal/ /dkar
183b3(rgyud): la dmar pa'i gzugs 'dzin cing / /thod pa'i cod pan rnam par brgyan/ /rdo rje dril bu phyag na 'chang / /pad+ma 'khyil bas rnam bskor cing / /dpral ba yi ni phyag rgya 'bar/ /
183b4(rgyud): gnyis kyis mi yi pags pa mnabs/ /thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'chang / /zhags pa lcags kyu mchog kyang 'dzin/ /cang te'u gri gug tshangs pa yi/ /mgo bo gdong ni bzhi pa ste//
183b5(rgyud): sngo zhing ser la ljang ba yis/ /zhal gyis lha mo rnam bar brgyan/ /zhal gdong mche ba rnam gtsigs shing / /zla ba phyed pas rnam bar brgyan/ /sna tshogs rdo rje dbu rgya na mtshan/ /
183b6(rgyud): dngos grub thams cad rab tu stsol/ /phyag rgya drug gis rgyas btab cing / /lha mo dum bu'i ska rags rgyan/ /g.yer ka'i sku rags sgra dang ldan/ /rkang gdub dag gis legs
183b7(rgyud): par brgyan/ /dpung dag gis rnam bar mdzes/ /dpral ba la ni rdo rje'i phreng / /rdo rjes mtshan pa'i phyag rgya can/ /sku lus mdzes shing yid 'phrog pa'o/ /shar gyi 'dab mar
184a1(rgyud): mkha' 'gro ma/ /seng+ge'i gdong ste rnam par 'jig /g.yon du phag gi gdong can te/ /lha mo/ /mA ma rab 'jigs ma/ /nub tu lha mo glang po'i gdong
184a2(rgyud): dum skyes ma ni dbang ma'o/ /lho ru lha mo'i tshul can no/ /gzugs can ma ste rta yi gdong / /spyan gsum pa la sna tshogs gzugs/ /thod pa kha T+waM ga 'dzin cing / /mgo dang gri
184a3(rgyud): gug phyag na bsnams/ /gcer bu dbu skra grol ba la/ /gar gyis kyang ni legs par mdzes/ /yi dwags rgyab la skyil krung phyed/ /bzhin rnams bsgyur zhing rab tu 'jigs/ /
184a4(rgyud): 'jigs byed dang ni dus mtshan dag /lha mo'i zhabs kyi 'gro tu mnan/ /me sogs mtshams ni bzhi po la/ /byang chub sems la sogs pa'i snod/ /bum pa'i steng du rnam
184a5(rgyud): par dgod/ /dung dang kun da zla ba'i mdog /'khro lo rtsi bas na drug pa bri/ /mkhas pas de dbus bri ba ni/ /ma mo'i rigs ni bzhi pa ste/ /mA ma kI dang spyan dang ni/ /lha mo
184a6(rgyud): sgrol ma gos dkar ma/ /sngo dang dkar dang dmar ba ste/ /lha mo rdo rje rigs dbang phyug /dkar dang sdo dang dmar ba'i zhal/ /lha mo rtag pa'i rigs yin no/ /ljang dang dkar dang
184a7(rgyud): dmar pa yi/ /lha mo las kyi rigs yin no/ /dmar dang ser dang ljang gu yi/ /lha mo pad+ma'i rigs yin no/ /spyan gsum pa la skra grol zhing / /phyogs kyi gos mchog 'jig pa
184b1(rgyud): yin| |rgyan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs/ /phyag rgya drug gis rnam bar brgyan/ /thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin/ /rang gi phyag mchan bzhi pa ste/ /rdo rje la bor lo kun rdo rje/ /pad+ma
184b2(rgyud): dmar po mchog dam pa/ /thams cad de bzhin dril bu 'dzin/ /thod pa 'khyil bas rnam bar bskor /bdud bzhi zhabs kyis rnam gnon cing / ga ra dang glu yis bzhad pa'i/
184b3(rgyud): zhal| |sna tshogs pad+ma zla dbus bzhugs/ /rigs kyi dngos grub rab ster ba'o/ /phyag na mgo bo cang te'u bsnams/ /rdo rje gri gug gis rnam brgyan/ ta/hod pa'i brang ba'i dbu
184b4(rgyud): rgyan can/ /mgo yi phreng bas rnam bar brgyan/ /zur gyi cha ni thams cad du/ /gnas la sogs pa'i rim ba dgod/ /shar du rtsibs drug 'khor lo la/ /ji lta'i rjes 'brang lha mo
184b5(rgyud): dgod| |thog ma'i zur la pu lI ra/ /ma la ya na rab gtum ma'o// gnyis pa dza lan+d+ha ra gtum mig ma'o/ /gsum pa uD+yan na 'od ldan ma'o/ /bzhi pa ar bud na sna chen
184b6(rgyud): ma'o| |lnga pa go da bA ri na dpa' ba'i blo gros ma'o/ /drug pa rA me shwa ra na mi'u thung ma'o/ /gnyis pa byang gi 'khro lo'i rtsibs drug pa di pI ko Ti na lang+ka'i dbang phyug ma'o/ /
184b7(rgyud): gnyis pa mA la ba na shing grib ma'o/ /gsum pa kA ma ru pa na sa srung ma'o/ /bzhi pa o dre na 'jigs byed ma'o/ /lnga pa tri sha ku ni na rlung gi shugs can ma'o/ /drug pa ko sa la na
185a1(rgyud): chang 'thung ma'o/ /nub kyi 'khor lo gsum pa'i rtsibs drug gi shar du ka ling+ka na sngo bsangs lha mo'o/ /gnyis pa lam pa ka na rab bzang ma'o/ /gsum pa kAM tsi na rta rna ma'o
185a2(rgyud): bzhi pa hi ma la yan bya gdong ma'o/ /lnga pa pre ta pu rin 'khor lo'i shugs can ma'o/ /drug pa gr-i ha de ba tA na du ma skyes ma'o/ /lho'i 'khor lo bzhi pa'i rtsibs drug gi shar la sai rASh+Ta na chang tshang ma'o/ /
185a3(rgyud): gnyis pa na su bar+Na dwi pa na 'khro lo'i go cha ma'o/ gsum pa na rab tu dpa' mo'o/ /bzhi pa sin+d+hU na stobs chen ma'o/ /lnga pa ma ru ta na 'khro los bsgyur ma'o/ /drug pa ku lu tA na brtson 'grus chen
185a4(rgyud): mo'o| |thog ma dkar zhing ljang ba dang / /thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM ga/ /'khor lo cang te'u gri gug go/ /gnyis pa byad ni sngo la ser/ /rdo rje thod pa kha T+waM ga/ /cang te'u dang ni gri gug go/ /gsum pa nub ni dmar pa
185a5(rgyud): ser| |thod pa dang ni kha T+waM ga / pad+ma cang te'u gri gug go /bzhi pa lho yi lha mo ni/ /ser dmar sna tshogs rdo rje dang /cang te'u gri gug ga thod ba dang / /kha T+waM ga yang yongs su 'dzin/ /lha mo de dag thams
185a6(rgyud): cad kyang / /phyed ni bud med dbang phyug ma'o/ /spyan gsum pa la phyag bzhi pa/ /gcer bu dbu skra grol ba dang / /skyil mo krung phyed gar bcas pas/ /yi dwags rgyab la zhabs kyis bzhugs/ /
185a7(rgyud): thod pa'i phrod pa'i dbu rgyan can/ /phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan/ /rkang rgyan dang ni ska rags dang / /dbu rgyan rdo rjes mtshan pa'o/ /'khor lo de yi rgyab tu ni/ shar du rdo rje
185b1(rgyud): phreng bas bskor/ /byang du 'khro lo'i phreng ba ste/ /nub tu sna tshogs rdo rje phreng / /lho ru pad+ma'i phreng ba'o/ /dbus su rdo rje phreng bas brgyan/ /zur gyi cha ni thams cad du/ /sna tshogs
185b2(rgyud): rdo rje mnyam bar bri/ /de rgyab yi dwags sna tshogs kyi/ /phreng bas mkhas pas bskor bar bya/ /phyir rol dkyil 'khro sgo rnams dang / /zur gyi cha ni bzhi po la/ mkha' lo/
185b3(rgyud): 'dus pa'i gzugs de ni/ /mnyam par bzhag nas bri zhing dgos/ /khwa gdong shar du dgod pa ste/ /sngo la dmar dang yid 'phrog pa/ /'gug gdong byang sgor dgod pa ste/ /ljang
185b4(rgyud): zhing dmar la legs par mdzes/ /khyi gdong nub kyi sgo la ni/ /ser zhing dud ka rab tu gdug /phag gdong lho ru dgod pa ni/ /ljang zhing sngo ba'i gzugs can no/ /spyan gsum
185b5(rgyud): bzhin bsgyur rab gdug cing / / dam pa phyogs kyi gos 'chang ba'o/ /mig g.yan dang ni gzugs mi sdug /g.yas brkyang pa yi zhabs kyis bzhugs/ /sna tshogs pad+ma'i nyi
185b6(rgyud): dbus bzhugs/ /phyag rgya lnga yis rnam bar brgyan/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can/ /sna tshogs gzugs can yid 'phrog pa/ /gcir bu skra grol rnam bar 'jigs/ /gshin rje sreg
185b7(rgyud): ma ma he gdong / /me yi phyogs su rnam par bzhugs/ /gshin rje pho nya bong bu'i gdong / /bden bral phyogs su rnam par bzhugs/ /gshin rje mche ba rnga mo'i gdong / /gdug pa rlung
186a1(rgyud): phyogs rab tu bzhugs/ /gshin rje 'joms ma rta yi gdong / /'di dag chags pas rab tu myos/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can/ /sna tshogs
186a2(rgyud): gzugs can yid 'phrog ma'o/ /gcer bu dbu skra grol ba la/ /skyil krung phyed par gar dang bcas/ /mche ba rnam par gcigs pa'i zhal/ /spyan gsum pa la g.yo ba'i
186a3(rgyud): sku| |sna tshogs pad+ma'i nyi dbus bzhugs/ /mi sdug rjes su chags pas myos/ /thams cad yi dwags steng na bzhugs/ /'khor lo sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor rnams/ /thod
186a4(rgyud): pa kha T+wAM ga 'dzin cing / /gri gug dang ni mgo bo 'chang / /phyag g.yas dag na cang te'u yi/ /shin tu 'jigs pa'i sgra yang sgrog /phyi rol bskor ba'i tshul can no/ /gzhan du
186a5(rgyud): rnam pa du ma yi/ /glu dang gar gyi mchod pa dang / /sna tshogs dam tshig dam pa yi/ /me tog spos dang mar me dang / /dri dang phreng ba byug pa dang / /lha yi gos kyi rnam pa dang / /
186a6(rgyud): lha mo si la snyan mchog dam pa/ /phyi rol rnal 'byor ma dag mchod/ /de yi dbus mdun mtha' yas pa'i/ /thams cad du ni 'khor yongs kyis/ /nam mkha'i khams ni
186a7(rgyud): yongs gang ba'i/ /phag mo'i mchog ni dam pa dang / /rnal 'byor ma gdug rnams kyang mchod/ /mchog 'di dag ni gsang zhing sba/ /su la yang ni mi brjod do/ /phyi rol yi
186b1(rgyud): dgas phreng ba yis/ /dkyil 'khor mchog gi rang bzhin ni/ /rnam par 'phrul pa dgod bya ste/ /ji lta'i rim pas rjes su dgod/ /sen mo so ni rab gtum ma'o/ /skra dang spu ni
186b2(rgyud): gtum mig ma'o/ /pags pa dang dri ma ni/ 'od ldan ma'o/ /sha ni/ sna chen ma'o/ /rtsa rgyus ni/ dpa' bo'i blo gros ma'o/ /rus pa ni/ mi'u thung ma'o/ /mkhal ma ni/ lang+ka'i
186b3(rgyud): dbang phyug ma'o/ /snying ni/ shing grib ma'o/ /mig ni/ sa srung ma'o/ /mkhris pa ni/ 'jigs byed chen mo'o/ /glo ba ni/ rlung gi shugs can ma'o/ /rgyu ma ni/ chang 'thung ma'o/ /
186b4(rgyud): gnye ma ni/ sngo bsangs lha mo'o/ /lto ba ni/ rab bzang lha mo'o/ /lgang ba ni/ rta rna ma'o/ /skra mtshams ni/ bya gdong ma'o/ /bad kan ni/ 'khor lo'i shugs can ma'o/ /
186b5(rgyud): rang ni| dum skyes ma'o/ /khrag ni/ chang tshong ma'o/ /rdul ni/ 'khor lo'i go cha ma'o/ /tshil ni/ shin tu dpa' mo'o/ /mchi ma ni/ stobs chen ma'o/ /mchil ma ni /
186b6(rgyud): 'khor los bsgyur ma'o/ /snabs ni/ brtson chen ma'o/ /pu l+lI ra ma la ya ste/ mgo po la rab gtum ma'o/ /dzA lan+d+ha ra ste/ spyi gtsug la gtum ma'i mig can ma'o/ /
186b7(rgyud): u D+yin te/ rna ba g.yas par 'od ldan ma'o/ /ar bu da ste/ spyi bo'i rgyab tu sna chen ma'o/ /go da ba ri ste/ rna ba g.yon par brtan pa'i blo can ma'o/ /rA me shwa ra ste/ smin
187a1(rgyud): ma'i dbus su mi'u thung ma'o/ /de bI ko Ti ste/ mig tu lang+ka'i dbang phyug ma'o/ /mA la ba ste/ phrag ba gnyis su shing grib ma'o/ /kA ma rU ba
187a2(rgyud): ste| mig gnyis la sa srung ma'o/ /o tre ste/ nu ma gnyis su 'jigs byed chen mo'o/ /tri sha ku ni ste/ lte bar rlung gi shugs can ma'o/ /ko sa la ste/ sna rtser chang
187a3(rgyud): 'thung ma'o/ /ka ling+ka ste/ khar sh+yA ma de ba'o/ /laM pA ka ste/ mgrin par shin tu bzang mo'o/ /kAM tsi ste/ snying gar rta rnam ma'o/ /hi ma la ya ste/ 'doms su bya gdong
187a4(rgyud): ma'o| |phre ta pu ri ste/ mtshan ma la /'khor lo'i shugs can ma'o/ /gr-i had ba tA ste/ gzhad la du ma skyes ma'o/ /sau rASh+Ta ste/ brla gnyis la chang tshong ma'o/ /
187a5(rgyud): su bar+Na dwI ba ste/ rje rar gnyis la 'khor lo'i go cha ma'o/ /na ga ra ste/ sor mo rnams la dpa' bo'i blo gros ma'o/ /sin+d+hu ste/ rkang pa'i bo la la stobs chen ma'o/ /ma ru
187a6(rgyud): ste| mthe bong gnyis la 'khor los bsgyur ma'o/ /ku lu tA ste/ pus mo gnyis la brtson chen ma'o/ /sa'i khams ni/ 'phebs ma/ chu'i khams ni/ gsod ma/
187a7(rgyud): ma'i khams ni/ 'gugs ma/ rlung gi khams ni/ gar gyi dbang phyug ma'o/ /nam mkha'i khams ni/ pad+ma'i dra ba ma'o/ /gzugs kyi phung po ni/ rnam par snang mdzad/
187b1(rgyud): tshor ba'i pung po ni/ rdo rje nyi ma/ 'du shes kyi phung po ni/ gar gyi dbang phyug /'du byed kyi phung po ni/ rdo rje chags pa/ rnam par shes pa'i byang po ni/ rdo rje sems dpa'/ de
187b2(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag nyid ni/ rdo rje shrI he ru ka'o/ /mig ni/ gti mug rdo rje/ rna ba ni/ zhe sdang rdo rje/ sna ni/ ser sna rdo rje/ dag ni/ chags ba rdo rje/ lus ni
187b3(rgyud): phrag dog rdo rje/ skye mched thams cad ni/ dbang phyug rdo rje/ yid ni/ mi 'khrugs rdo rje/ ngag ni/ dpag med rdo rje/ lus ni/ snang mdzad rdo rje/ 'di dag dgod par bya ba
187b4(rgyud): ni| ye shes 'khor lo mthong ba yin/ /sbyor ba 'di la gnas na ni/ /de yis thams cad bsgoms par 'gyur/ /dbang bskur mchod dang dam tshig dang / /sgom pa mnyam
187b5(rgyud): pa bcud du byed/ /de snying ye shes sems dpa' la/ /ye shes bdud rtsi bcud kyis mchod/ /lus ngag yid kyi dam tshig rnams/ /sems dang sems min legs par
187b6(rgyud): brtag / bzlas dang sgam pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /rnam rtog thams cad spangs nas ni/ /dam tshig mchog gi bzlas pa yis/ /gsang sngags rgyal po mchog kyang 'grub/ /oM
187b7(rgyud): bai ro tsa nI ye hUM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM sarba bud+d+ha DA kI nI ye badzra bar+Na NI ye huM hUM phaT swAhA/ bstod dang ming du yang dag sbyar/ /hUM hUM phaT dang ldan pa yi/ /rab gtum ma sogs gsang
188a1(rgyud): sngags dag / sbyar nas mchog gi bzlas pa bya/ /bzlas pa yongs su rdzogs nas ni/ /zhi ba'i btung ba mchog kyang btung / /chos rnams thams
188a2(rgyud): cad yongs mnyam pa'i/ /mnyam pa'i dam tshig mchog yin te/ /de bas de bsgom rnam par dag /sum cu bdun pa'i go 'phang mchog /bdag med chos dang lam dang
188a3(rgyud): ni| |dkyil 'khor mchog la rab tu bzhugs/ /shes rab pha rol rnal 'byor ma/ /rnal 'byor las ni ngal bsos nas/ /mtshan med go 'phang gnas nas su/ /mtshan
188a4(rgyud): med la ni mnyam par brten/ /chos rnams med cing mtshan ma med/ /chos min chos can dag kyang med/ /rten 'brel chos kyang mkha' dang mnyam/ /dngos po med cing
188a5(rgyud): mtshan ma med/ /de nyid bzhi la 'dir gnas na/ /ye shes mig gis mthong ba yin/ /gnas sogs 'khor lo nges par yang / /nyi zer rdul dang mnyam par mthong / /skra
188a6(rgyud): yi rtse mo 'bum bshags pa'i/ /cha yang yongs su rtogs shing mthong / /b+ha ga'i dbus na bzhugs pa yis/ /he ru rnal 'byor ma lhan cig /'khor los bsgyur ba rab
188a7(rgyud): sbyor ba| |khwa gdong la sogs phyi rol dgod/ /he ru ka dpal bdag po ni/ /mkha' 'gro bzhi yis yongs su bskor/ /phan tshun bdag pos bya ba ni/ /rdo rje sems sogs
188b1(rgyud): sbyor ba ni/ /rnal 'byor ma dang thun mong 'grub/ /sbyor ba gsum ni dam tshig mchog /khams gsum bdag po chen po ni/ /rnam par spyod par mthong ma gyur/ /mi 'grub 'khor
188b2(rgyud): los bsgyur ba dang / /khams gsum bdag po'i rgyal por 'gyur/ /grub na de na rnal 'byor che/ /srid pa gsum gyi bdag po 'thob/ /de bzhin cho ga'i sbyor ba yis/ /stobs
188b3(rgyud): kyis shi ba bza' bar bya/ /mtshams med pa ni byed pa dag /bkug la mkhas pas byin gyis brlab/ /gzhan du dngos grub 'jig par 'gyur/ /ji ltar 'dod pa'i 'tsho ba'i
188b4(rgyud): 'bras| |phyugs gsad pa yi sbyor ba ni/ /rnal 'byor ma la zhus te bya/ /lha bshos sgrub pa'i sbyor ba 'o/ /ma dang sring mo lhan cig tu/ /mchog dang bar ma de bzhin te/ /
188b5(rgyud): gzhan du bu mo lhan cig tu/ /dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyor ba/ /mnyam pa mchog gi sgrub pa'o/ /rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis/ /'dod pa lnga ni spyad par bya/ /phag mo ru ni
188b6(rgyud): bdag bsgoms te/ /lte bar sdigs mdzub bzhag nas ni/ /mkha' 'gro ma sogs 'khor lor bzhugs/ /lha mo rab tu dang byas nas/ /sgo dgu la ni zhugs nas kyang / /
188b7(rgyud): snying po pad+ma phug nas ni/ /rnal 'byor ma ni brgyab tsam gyis/ /rma skyes mchog ni btung bar bya/ /bsnun pa de yis zos na ni/ /sangs rgyas 'gyur gyi gzhan du min/ /mngon
189a1(rgyud): par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ rnal 'byor ma'i gnas sgrub pa'i mtshan ma'i rim pa bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /rnal 'byor dpa' bo'i cho ga dang / /rnal 'byor ma yi gnas 'byung ba/ /'dus pa bdag gis bshad par bya/ /dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma thams
189a2(rgyud): cad| |bla ma'i bka' las gzhan du min/ /thams cad mkha' 'gro ma rnams ni/ /nges par legs ba stsol bar 'gyur/ /re'u mig dgu pa dbus su ste/ /phyi rol du ni bcu
189a3(rgyud): drug bri| |re'u mig dbus kyi dkyil du yang / /shin tu mdzes pa'i pad+ma bri/ /sna tshogs pad+ma brgyad pa ste/ /lte pa dang ni ge sar bcas/ /de dbus zla ba blta byas te/ /a la sogs
189a4(rgyud): ba rnam par sbyar/ /A li kA li mnyam byas te/ /hUM ni nang du chud par bya/ /rdo rje sems dpas kun khyab pa/ /he ru ka ni rnam par bsgom/ /zhal lnga phyag ni bcu pa ste/ /
189a5(rgyud): phag mo yis ni yongs su brgyan/ /dkar zhing sngo la de bzhin dmar/ /ljang gu ser po steng du ste/ /spyan gsum pa la 'jigs pa'i zhal/ /g.yas brkyang pa yi gnas pas
189a6(rgyud): bzhugs/ /'jigs byed dang ni dus mtshan nyid/ /shin tu myos pas zhabs 'og gnon/ /thod pa'i phreng pa'i dbu rgyan can/ /zla ba phyed pa 'dzin pas mdzes/ /sna tshogs rdo rje cod
189b1(rgyud): pan can/ /ral pa'i dbu rgyan dbu la 'ching / /phyag rgya drug gis rgyas btab cing / /sku la rdo rje rgyan gyis spud/ /rdo rje dril pu mnyam par ldan/ /bde ba chen po'i bde ba mchog /
189b2(rgyud): rtse gsum dang ni cang te'u 'dzin/ /rdo rje gri gug de bzhin te/ /thod pa kha T+wAM tshangs pa'i mgo /dgra sta dang ni zhags pa'o/ /g.yas dang g.yon gyi phyag la ni/ /na ra'i phags
189b3(rgyud): pa gos su man bas/ /zhabs gnyis mnyam par 'khril ba ni/ /phag mo yis ni kha sbyar byas/ /de mdog phyag dang bzhugs stangs can/ /dbu skra grol zhing gcer bu ste/ /stag
189b4(rgyud): gi pags pa gos su man bas/ /dum bu'i rgyan gyi ska rags can/ /drag po'i thod pa'i phreng ba can/ /thugs rje'i chags pas rnam par myos/ /shar gyi 'dab la mkha' 'gro
189b5(rgyud): ma| |byang du lA ma mkha' 'gro ma/ /nub tu dum skyes ma yin no/ /lho ru gzugs can mkha' 'gro ma/ /nag dang sngo bsangs dmar ser skya/ /phyogs kyi gos 'chang g.yas
189b6(rgyud): brkyang bzhugs/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can/ /skra grol gnyis su med pa ste/ /zur gyi cha ni thams cad du/ /byang chub sems kyi snod kyang bzhag /thod pa kha T+wAM dril bu
189b7(rgyud): dang / /cang te'u gri gug mgo bo thogs/ /zhal gsum spyan gsum bzhin rnams bsgyur/ /drag po chags pa'i chags pas myos/ /bcom ldan bde bas gzigs nas ni//
190a1(rgyud): bde ba che la rjes su chags/ /mgo po'i do shal 'chang ba yis/ /he ru ka ni rnam par bsgom/ /'di ltar re'u mig dbus dkyil du/ /mchog de dag
190a2(rgyud): kyang bsgom par bya/ /de yi shar gyi re mig la pu l+lI ra ma la yan thod pa'i dum bu dang / rab gtum ma ste/ ser po'o/ /byang du dzA lan+d+ha ra na keng dus chen po dang / gtum
190a3(rgyud): mig ma ste/ sngon po'o/ /nub tu u T+yan na keng rus can dang / 'od ldan ma ste/ dkar po'o/ /lho ru ar bu da na mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa dang / sna chen ma ste /
190a4(rgyud): ljang gu'o/ /me'i phyogs su go da pa ri na lha dgra dang / dpa' bo'i blo gros ma ste/ dmar po'o/ /bden bral du rA me shwa ra na 'od dpag med dang / mi'u thung ma ste/ pad+ma'i
190a5(rgyud): mdog can no/ /rlung phyogs su de bi ko ti na rdo rje 'od dang / lang+ka'i dbang phyug ma ste/ dud ka sngon po'o/ /dbang ldan du mA la ba na rdo rje lus dang / shing grib ma ste/ ljang gu
190a6(rgyud): dang / mu tig lta bu'o/ /phyag na rdo rje dang dril bus 'khyud pa'o/ /de la re'u mig gnyis pa'i shar phyogs su kA ma rU pa na myu gu can dang / sa srung ma ste/ dmar po'o/ /byang du
190a7(rgyud): oM dren rdo rje ral bcan dang / 'jigs byed chen mo ste/ ljang gu'o/ /nub tu tri sha ku ni na dpa' bo chen po dang / rlung gi shugs can ma ste/ sngon po'o/ /lho phyogs ko sa la na rdo rje hUM
190b1(rgyud): mdzad dang / chang 'thung ma ste/ dkar po'o/ /me'i phyogs su ka ling+ka na rab bzang dang / sngo bsangs lha mo ste/ nam mkha' ser skya'o/ /bden bral du laM pA ka na rdo rje bzang dang /
190b2(rgyud): rab bzang ma ste/ dmar po'o/ /rlung gi phyogs su kAM po tsin 'jigs byed chen po dang / rta rnam ste/ ser bo'o/ /dbang ldan du hi ma la yan mig mi bzang dang / bya gdong ma
190b3(rgyud): ste| sngon po'o/ /pad+ma dang dril bu 'dzin pas 'khyud pa'o/ /re'u mig gsum pa'i shar du pre ta pu ri na stobs po che dang / /'khor lo'i shugs can ma ste/ nam mkha' dang
190b4(rgyud): ser skya'o/ /byang du gr-i ha de bA tA na rdo rje 'od dang du ma skyes ma ste ser po'o/ /nub tu sau rASh+Da na rta mgrin dang / chang tshong ma ste/ dmar po'o/ /lho phyogs su bar+Na dwi pa na nam
190b5(rgyud): mkha'i snying po dang / 'khor lo'i go cha ma ste/ sngon po'o/ /me'i phyogs su na ga ra na dpal khrag 'thung dang / rab dpa' mo ste/ dud pa'i mdog can no/ /bde na bral du sin+d+hu
190b6(rgyud): na pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug dang / stobs chen ma ste/ ljang gu'o/ /rlung gi phyogs su ma ru ta na rnam par snang mdzad dang / 'khor los bsgyur ma ste/ sngon po'o/ /dbang ldan du ku lu tA
190b7(rgyud): ma rdo rje sems dpa' dang / brtson 'grus chen mo ste/ dkar po'o/ /'khor lo dang dril bu 'dzin pas 'khyud pa'o/ /gzhan yang thod pa dang / kha T+wAM ga dang / cang te'u dang / gri gug
191a1(rgyud): dang / mgo bo 'dzin pa/ phyag drug pa/ zhal gsum pa ste/ zhal ni/ man ngag gi rjes su 'brang bas bstan/ spyan gsum pa/ g.yas
191a2(rgyud): brkyang bas bzhugs pa/ phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan/ /stag gi pags pa gos su man bas/ /mgo bo'i phreng bas brgyan pa ste/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i cod pan can/ /rdo rje phreng
191a3(rgyud): dang phad 'khor lo/ /ji lta'i rim pas dpral bar brgyan/ /lha mo skra grol gcar bu ste/ /byin pa gnyis kyis legs par 'khril/ /ji ltar thabs bzhin shes rab ste/ /
191a4(rgyud): mtshan ma'i phyag rgya legs khyab pa/ /zur bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /rta babs bzhis ni rnam par brgyan/ /dra ba dra phyed kyis brgyan pa/ /dar dang phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /'khor
191a5(rgyud): lo'i gzugs can la bkod nas/ /ji ltar mdzes par rab tu brtag/ /'di ltar phyi yi 'khor lo yi/ /de la sgo srung rnams kyang dgod/ /mtshams dang zur du lha mo rnams//
191a6(rgyud): mkhas pas bri bar bya ba ste/ /cho ga du ma thos nas ni/ /'bad pas gcig tu bsdus pa yin/ /shar gyi sgor ni khwa gdong ma/ /zhal gsum pa la phyag drug pa/ /g.yas
191a7(rgyud): dang g.yon gyi zhal gdong ni/ /bya rog chu skyar zhal yin te/ /mi 'u thung la mi sdug zhal/ /byang gi sgor ni 'ug gu dang / /'ug pa byi la rnam mdzes te/ /g.yas dang
191b1(rgyud): g.yon gyi zhal gdong gi / lce bskyod 'jigs pa'i gzugs can ma/ /nub tu b+ha ba gi zhes pa/ /khyi dang seng+ge'i gdong pa can/ /g.yon ba dang ni g.yas pa yi/ /lce bskyod shin tu mdzes
191b2(rgyud): pa'o| |lho phyogs sa 'dzin lha mo ni/ /phag gdong ma he'i gzugs can te/ /g.yas dang g.yon gyi zhal gdong ni/ /zab cing drag la 'jigs pa 'o/ /thog ma khwa gdong zhes
191b3(rgyud): bya ba| |gnyis pa 'ug pa de bzhin te/ /gsum pa khyi yi gdong can la/ /bzhi pa dag ni phag nyid do/ /sngo dang dud ka dkar po'i gdong / /ljang gu ser po dmar po ste/ /ser zhing dmar
191b4(rgyud): la sngo ba'i zhal/ /dkar dang sngo dang ljang gu'i mdog /dang po me nas dbang ldan bar/ /gshin rje sreg ma pho nya mo/ /gshin rje mche ba 'joms pa nyid/ /dmar dang ser dang ljang
191b5(rgyud): gu dang / /sngo dang ser dang ljang gu dang / /dud ka ser dang ljang gu dang / /dkar dang ser dang ljang gu ste/ /de dag zhal gsum phyag drug ste/ /spyan gsum g.yas pa brkyang bas bzhugs//
191b6(rgyud): phyogs kyi gos 'chang gsus pa 'phyang / /dbu skra dag ni grol ba ste/ /phyag rgya lnga yis rgyas btab cing / /'khor lo dag ni thams cad kyang / /yi dwags steng du rnam par bzhugs/
191b7(rgyud): sna tshogs pad+ma nyi ma dang / /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dag la bzhugs/ /thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM ga /zhags pa lcags kyu cang te'u dang / /mgo bo gri gug phyag na 'chang / /thod pa'i phreng bas
192a1(rgyud): rnam par brgyan/ /dga' zhing dgyes pas rnam par myos/ /rjes su chags pa'i zhal gdong ni/ /'jigs pa'i sdang mig 'gyur ba 'o/ /de nas
192a2(rgyud): gshin rje sreg sogs sgo/ /khwa gdong la sogs mtshams su ste/ /rang gi thabs dang mnyam par gzhag /sbyor ba'i rim pa bsgoms nas ni/ /'khor lo dpa' bo thams
192a3(rgyud): cad kyang / /ji bzhin rdo rje mkha' 'gro ste/ /snga ma'i rjes su thams cad kyang / /mkha' 'gro ma sogs kun de bzhin/ /ji bzhin bla ma'i bka' bzhin du/ /ji ltar 'dod pa
192a4(rgyud): gnas de bzhin/ /ji ltar sems kyi khyad par gyis/ /rnal 'byor ma yi dkyil 'khor bsgom/ /bum pa sna tshogs sbyor ba yis/ /thod pa yis ni yongs su brgyan/ /
192a5(rgyud): 'o mas bkang ba'i thod pa ni/ /bum pa'i steng du gzhag par bya/ /phyi rol yongs su bskor ba ste/ /sna tshogs mkha' 'gro ma gnas pa/ /glu dang gar ni nyer ldan pas/ /
192a6(rgyud): sna tshogs rol mo rnam par sprul/ /me tog bdug spos mar me dang / /dri dang gos mchog dam pa ste/ /sna tshogs dam tshig ro yi zas/ /sna tshogs bza' ba chang gis
192a7(rgyud): mchod| |dkyil 'khor sna tshogs mchog dam pa/ /phyi rol yi dwags gyis yongs bskor/ /dngos dang dngos med rnam par bsgom/ /bla ma'i man ngag bka' bzhin
192b1(rgyud): du| |rdo rje pad bskor 'khor lo ni/ /zur bzhi par ni rab tu gnas/ /mtshams su rdo rje phyed pas mtshan/ /rdo rje ka ba'i mdun dbus su/ /re'u mig rdo rje ldan par bya/ /sna tshogs pa
192b2(rgyud): yi cho ga mchog / gnas sogs rim pas dgod par bya/ /khams dang phung po de bzhin te/ /skye mched drug kyang rnam par dgod/ /ye shes rdo rje rnam par bsgom/ /sku gsung thugs
192b3(rgyud): su sbyor ba yis/ /ye shes 'khor lo mthong ba na/ /ar+g+haM zhabs bsil dag gis mchod/ /dam tshig sna tshogs mchog dam pa/ /sna tshogs pa yi khyad par gyis/ /mAM sa rak+ta
192b4(rgyud): dag gis mchod/ /go cha gnyis po sbyor ba yis/ /phyag rgya ye shes mchog dam pa/ /ro gcig ma lus bsgoms na ni/ /ye shes 'khor lo rnam par bsgom/ /reg pa yi ni khyad
192b5(rgyud): par gyis/ /mkhas pas sbyor ba gsum du sbyar/ /bsgoms pas rnam par dag pa'i don/ /mkhas pas sum cu rtsa bdun te/ /ye shes bzlas pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /dam tshig
192b6(rgyud): gsum gyi mchog gis bza'/ /spro dang bsdu ba'i sbyor ba yis/ /bzlas pa'i bsgom ba rnam par bsgom/ /dus bzhi dag tu dam tshig can/ /gnas sbyor mkhas bas bsrung bar
192b7(rgyud): bya| |sa steng du ni mthong ba kun/ /thams cad he ru ka dpal gzugs/ /'gro ba drug po'i srid pa sbyangs/ /sems can don ni gzhal med byas/ /thams cad zhugs te zhugs
193a1(rgyud): sbyor bas/ /'dis ni thams cad gzhug par bya/ /'di ni sbyor ba nges pa ste/ /nges pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /dung chen phreng ba dag
193a2(rgyud): gis ni| |dam tshig mchog gis bzlas pa bya/ /tshogs kyi go cha'i rim pa bzhin/ /rnal 'byor pa yis sngags mchog bzla/ /oM shrI badzra he he ru ru kaM DA ki nI dzA la saM ba
193a3(rgyud): raM huM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM hrIH ha ha huM hUM phaT swAhA/ snying po dang nye ba'i snying po'o/ /oM badzra bai ro tsa nI ye huM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM sarba bud+d+ha DA ki nI ye badzra war+Na nI ye huM hUM phaT swAhA/
193a4(rgyud): phag mo'i snying po dang nye ba'i snying po'o/ /oM ka ra ka ra khaN+Da ka pA li huM hUM phaT/ oM pra tsaN+De huM hUM phaT/ oM ku ru ku ru ma hA kaM ka la huM hUM phaT/ oM tsaN+DA k+ShI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM ban+d+ha ban+d+ha
193a5(rgyud): kaM ka la huM hUM phaT/ oM pra b+hA ba tI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM trA sa ya trA sa ya bi ka Ta daM Sh+Ti Ni huM hUM phaT/ oM ma hA nA se huM hUM phaT/ oM k+Sho b+ha ya k+Sho b+ha ya su ra bai ri Ni huM hUM phaT/ oM bI ra ma trI ye huM hUM phaT/
193a6(rgyud): oM hrauM hrauM a mi trA b+he huM hUM phaT/ oM kharba ri ye huM hUM phaT/ oM hra hra badzra pra b+he huM hUM phaT/ oM laM ke shwa rI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM pheM pheM badzra de he huM hUM phaT/ oM dru mats+tsha ye huM hUM phaT/ oM
193a7(rgyud): phaT phaT aM ku ri ke huM hUM phaT/ oM ai rA ba tI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM da ha da ha badzra dza Ti la huM hUM phaT/ oM ma hA b+hai ra ba ye huM hUM phaT/ oM pa tsa pa tsa ma hA bI ra huM hUM phaT/ oM bA yu be
193b1(rgyud): ge huM hUM phaT/ oM b+hak+Sha b+hak+Sha badzra hUM kA ra ba sa ru d+hi ra an+t+ra mA lA ba laM bi ni huM hUM phaT/ oM su ra b+hak+Shi ye huM hUM phaT/ oM gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na su b+ha dra sa pa pA tA la ga ta b+hu dzaM ga sarba bA ta r+dz+dza ya
193b2(rgyud): tar+dz+dza ya huM hUM phaT/ oM sh+yA ma de bI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM A kaD+D+h+ya A kaD+D+h+ya badzra b+ha dre huM hUM phaT/ oM su b+ha dre huM hUM phaT/ oM hriM hriM ma hA b+hai ra ba huM hUM phaT/ oM ha ya kar+Ne huM hUM phaT/ oM dz+NauM dz+NauM
193b3(rgyud): bi rU pAk+Sha huM hUM phaT/ oM kha ga na ne huM hUM phaT/ oM k+Sh+mAM k+Sh+mAM ma hA ba la huM hUM phaT/ oM tsakra be ge huM hUM phaT/ oM haM haM rat+na badzra huM hUM phaT/ oM khaN+Da ro he huM hUM phaT/ oM hriM hriM ha ya grI ba huM hUM phaT/
193b4(rgyud): oM shauN+Di nI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM hUM hUM A kA sha gar+b+he huM hUM phaT/ oM tsakra ba rmi NI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM ki li ki li he ru ka huM hUM phaT/ oM su bI re huM hUM phaT/ oM shi li shi li pad+ma na rte shwa ri
193b5(rgyud): huM hUM phaT/ oM ma hA b+ha le huM hUM phaT/ oM hi li hi li bai ro tsa nI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM tsa kra brti nI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM d+hi li d+hi li badzra satwa huM hUM phaT/ oM ma hA bIR+ye huM hUM phaT/ oM DA ki nI ye
193b6(rgyud): huM hUM phaT/ oM lA me huM hUM phaT/ oM khaN+Da ro he huM hUM phaT/ oM rU pi NI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM kA kA s+ye huM hUM phaT/ oM u lU kA s+ye huM hUM phaT/ oM shwA nA s+ye huM hUM phaT/ oM sU ka rA s+ye huM hUM
193b7(rgyud): phaT| oM ya ma dA D+hI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM ya ma du tI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM ya ma daMSh+TI nI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM ya ma ma tha nI ye huM hUM phaT/ rnal 'byor cho ga bzlas tsam gyis/ /rdo rje
194a1(rgyud): bkug cing gnas nas su/ /'khrug cing rab tu g.yo ba ste/ /lus las 'od 'bar dgod pa dang / /de yi mig ni 'bar ba dang / /tshig 'jam
194a2(rgyud): pa dang 'bar ba dang / /rnal 'byor pas ni bzlas tsam gyis/ /rdo rje 'jug pa mthong ba dang / /sngags pa mnyam bzhag bzlas nas ni/ /dam tshig spyod pa ldan byas nas/ /srog
194a3(rgyud): dang rtsol ba bsngams byas te/ /gsal byed huM ni brjod nas kyang / /chos kyi dbyings su spro bar bya/ /sems can kun la phan pa dang / /gdul dka' ba dag 'dul ba'i
194a4(rgyud): phyir| |sangs rgyas chos rnams mdun du spro/ /khro bo'i go 'phang de mthong nas/ /khams gsum dag tu bsdu bar bya/ /lus ngag yid la bcug nas kyang / /sa steng du
194a5(rgyud): ni spyod pa spyad/ /mnyam gzhag min pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ /snying rjes brlan pa nyid kyis ni/ /sems can thams cad mthong ba ni/ /srid pa gsum po he ru ka/ /sngags
194a6(rgyud): pa ci dang ci za ba/ /dam tshig mchog ni bsgoms nas kyang / /thams cad chos kyi dbang phyug rgyal/ /mnyam pa nyid la rab tu gnas/ /dam tshig can ni langs dus su//
194a7(rgyud): bla ma mchod pa rjes dran nas/ /byang chub sems kyi chus khrus bya/ /yid 'ong phyag rgya la gnas nas/ /khro bo sangs rgyas dpa' bo dang / /rnal 'byor ma dang mkha' 'gro
194b1(rgyud): ma'i| |go 'phang du ni byin brlabs nas/ /yid 'ong mchod pa dag tu bshad/ /mkha' dbyings dkyil 'khor khyab pa la/ /smon lam dag ni bya ba yin/ /de ma thag pa'i rnal 'byor
194b2(rgyud): gyis| |rgyu dang mi rgyu mthong ba ni/ /rang bzhin dag pa bcom ldan 'das/ /rang bzhin yang ni dngos med byas/ /sems can rang bzhin dag pa ste/ /srid pa mchog tu byas pa
194b3(rgyud): yin| |rdo rje phag mo bla med pa/ /phyag rgya ru ni byin brlabs nas/ /rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis/ /thams cad 'di ltar rab tu brtag /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma
194b4(rgyud): las| re'u mig dgod pa dang / gnas bsdu ba bstan pa ste le'u bcu gsum pa'o// //de nas gsang ba bshad bya ba/ /gnas dang 'dus pa mchog yin
194b5(rgyud): pas| |dngos grub kun gyi rang bzhin ni/ /mnyam par 'dres pa bcud du 'gyur/ /gnyis med blos ni mnyam bzhag ste/ /'khor lo gsum mdog ldan par ni/ /dkyil 'khor
194b6(rgyud): gru bzhi'i dbus dag tu/ /nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i 'khor lo mchog /de yi dbus su pad+ma che/ /sna tshogs pad+ma legs par mdzes/ /'dab ma brgyad pa lte bar bcas/ /ge sar dag
194b7(rgyud): gis nye bar mdzes/ /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /rta babs bzhis ni rnam par brgyan/ /phreng ba dang ni phreng phyed brgyan/ /mtshan nyid kun dang yang dag ldan/ /nyi ma'i dkyil
195a1(rgyud): 'khor dbus su ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba che/ /A li kA li zhu gyur las/ /ye shes lnga ni rnam par bsgom/ /de yi yongs su 'phel
195a2(rgyud): 'gyur bas/ /rdo rje he ru ka rnam bsgom/ /dus mtha'i me chen tshol ba yis/ /gdul dka' thams cad rab tu gsheg /'jigs byed dang ni dus mtshan dag /zhabs
195a3(rgyud): kyi 'og tu rnam gnon cing / /zhal gyi mche ba rnam par gtsigs/ /spyan gsum 'jigs pa rab tu 'jigs/ /sku lus dag ni sngon po las/ /sdo zhing 'bar ba'i sku
195a4(rgyud): yang sprul/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can/ /sangs rgyas lngas ni byin gyis brlabs/ /sna tshogs rdo rje dbu rgyan can/ /zla ba phyed pa rnam par mdzes/ /zhal drug dpa'
195a5(rgyud): po mi sdug pa/ /sgeg pa dang ni bzhad ba dang / /drag shul 'jigs pa'i sku lus can/ /phyag rgya drug gis rgyas btab cing / /sku ni sna tshogs rgyan gyis spud/ /phag mo dang ni
195a6(rgyud): yang dag ldan/ /byin pa dag gis gnyis med 'khyud/ /g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs gnas shing / /g.yon brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis bzhugs/ /ha ha mdzad cing huM hUM mdzad/ /hi hi mdzad cing 'jigs pa can/ /
195a7(rgyud): huM hUM mdzad cing phaT phaT can/ /a Ta Ta yi sgra chen smra/ /sngo zhing ser la de bzhin dmar/ /ljang gu dkar po de bzhin te/ /steng gi zhal gdong gdug pa che/ /zas su gdug pa
195b1(rgyud): longs spyod cing / /rdo rje dril bu mnyam ldan pas/ /lha mo dag gi nu ma 'tshir/ /drag po'i pags pa'i gos mnabs shing / /khrag rlon 'dzag par ba gsol te/ /thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin/ /
195b2(rgyud): mdung dang gri gug lcags kyu dang / /zhags pa dang ni mgo bo 'dzin/ /gdug pa gtum zhing cang te'u dang / /mdung ni 'bar ba'i phyag rgya can/ /dpral ba dag tu nye bar mdzes/ /
195b3(rgyud): de lta'i phyag dang sku mdog bzhugs/ /dbu skra grol zhing gcer bu ste/ /'di lta'i phyag rgya rnam par bsgom/ /dum bu'i ska rags kyis brgyan cing / /phag mo yang ni 'di 'drar
195b4(rgyud): bsgom| |rnal 'byor som nyi spangs nas ni/ /thabs dang shes rab mnyam ldan pas/ /thugs rje chags pa'i bde ba yis/ /sems can don gyi phyir byung ste/ /snying rje chen pos
195b5(rgyud): brlan pa yis/ /nam mkha'i sbyor ba'i longs spyod kyis/ /thugs rje chen po'i bcud bde bas/ /'gro drug srid pa rnam sbyangs nas/ /sems can de ni mchog nyid mdzad/ /stong
195b6(rgyud): pa'i ye shes las byung zhing / /rtogs pa med pa'i gnas bzhi la/ /rang bzhin med cing mchog tu phra/ /thig le sgra ni rnam spangs pa/ /mnyam pa'i dam tshig mthong nas
195b7(rgyud): ni| |phyi dang nang gi mchog gyur pa/ /snying po ye shes dam tshig ni/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus dag tu/ /der ni phyag mtshan mdog mthong nas/ /zla ba'i rdo rje sa bon ni/ /de
196a1(rgyud): 'dir snying po bsgom bya ste/ /bsnyen pa'i rnal 'byor dag tu brtag /mkha' 'gro la sogs rim pa yis/ /pad+ma dag ni dgod par bya/ /shar
196a2(rgyud): du mkha' 'gro dgod par bya/ /byang du de bzhin lA ma ste/ /nub tu dum skyes ma yin no/ /lho ru de bzhin gzugs can ma/ /sngo dang ljang dang dmar ba dang / /ser de de bzhin
196a3(rgyud): bzhi po ni/ /bzhin rnams bsgyur zhing spyan gsum gdug /skra grol phyogs kyi gos can yin/ /rgyan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs/ /phyag rgya lnga yis rgyas btab
196a4(rgyud): cing / /thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM ga /g.yon gyi dpung pa la brten cing / /cang te'u gri gug mgo bo ni/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi dam tshig mchog /byang chub sems kyi chus gang ba'i/ /
196a5(rgyud): thod pa bum pa'i steng du bzhag /'khor lo dgod par bya ba ni/ /sngon du grub pa'i rnal 'byor ma/ /byin gyis brlab sogs rim pa yis/ /shar phyogs byang gi rim pa ste//
196a6(rgyud): pul+li ra ma la ya na thod pa'i dum bu dang / rab gtum ma ste/ nam mkha' ser skya'o/ /dzA lan+d+ha ra na keng rus chen po dang / gtum mig ma ste/ mdog ser po'o/ /au D+yan na
196a7(rgyud): keng rus can dang / 'od ldan ma ste/ mdog ljang gu'o/ /ar bu da na mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa dang / sna chen ma ste/ mdog nam mkha' ser skya'o/ /go da ba ri na lha dgra dang /
196b1(rgyud): dpa' ba'i blo gros ma ste/ mdog ser po'o/ /rA me shwa ra na 'od dpag med dang / mi'u thung ma ste/ mdog ljang gu'o/ /de bI ko Ta na rdo rje 'od dang / lang+ka'i dbang phyug ma ste/ nam mkha'
196b2(rgyud): ser skya'o/ /mA la ba na rdo rje lus dang / shing grib ma ste/ mdog ser po'o/ /kA ma ru ba na myu gu can dang / sa srung ma ste/ mdog ljang gu'o/ /o dre na rdo rje ral pa can dang /
196b3(rgyud): 'jigs byed chen mo ste/ nam mkha' ser skya'o/ /tri sha ku ni na 'jigs byed chen po dang / rlung gi shugs can ma ste/ mdog ser po'o/ /ko sa la na rdo rje hUM mdzad dang / chang
196b4(rgyud): 'thung ma ste/ mdog ljang gu'o/ /ka ling+ka na rab bzang dang / sngo bsangs lha mo ste/ nam mkha' ser skya'o/ /laM pA ka na rdo rje bzang po dang / rab bzang mo ste/ mdog ser
196b5(rgyud): po'o| |kAny+tsi na 'jigs byed chen po dang / rta rnam ste/ mdog ljang gu'o/ /hi ma la ya na mig mi bzang dang / bya gdong ma ste/ nam mkha' ser skya'o/ /pre ta pu ri na stobs
196b6(rgyud): po che dang / 'khor lo'i shugs can ma ste/ mdog ser po'o/ /gri ha de ba tA na rdo rje rin chen dang / dum skyes ma ste/ mdog ljang gu'o/ /sau rASh+Ta na rta mgrin dang / chang tshong
196b7(rgyud): ma ste| nam mkha' ser skya'o/ /su bar+Na dwi pa na nam mkha'i snying po dang / 'khor lo'i go cha ma ste/ mdog ser po'o/ /na ga ra na he ru ka dang / rab dpa' mo ste/ mdog ljang
197a1(rgyud): gu'o| |sin+d+hu na pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug dang / stobs chen ma ste/ nam mkha' ser skya'o/ /ma ru ta na rnam par snang mdzad dang / 'khor los bsgyur
197a2(rgyud): ma ste| mdog ser po'o/ /ku lu tA na rdo rje sems dpa' dang / brtson chen mo ste/ mdog ljang gu'o/ /yang na sku gsung thugs kyi ni/ /ci 'dod mdog ni dbye ba bya/ /
197a3(rgyud): g.yon gyi rim pa ji lta bar/ /sgo rnams dag ni bya ba ste/ /shar du khwa gdong ma/ byang du 'ug gdong ma/ nub tu khyi gdong ma/ lho ru phag gdong ma sngo ba dang / ljang
197a4(rgyud): gu dang / dmar ba dang / ser po'i mdog can no/ /me'i phyogs su gshin rje sreg ma mdog dmar po/ /bden bral gyi phyogs su gshin rje pho nya ma mdog sngon
197a5(rgyud): po| |rlung gi phyogs su gshin rje mche ba ma dud ka'am char sprin gyi mdog lta bu/ dbang ldan gyi phyogs su gshin rje 'joms ma mdog dkar po ser skya'o/ /
197a6(rgyud): thod pa'i dum bu la sogs pa'i dpa' bo dang / rab gtum ma la sogs pa 'dra bar gdong gcig pa/ phyag bzhi pa/ zhabs g.yas brkyang bas bzhugs pa/
197a7(rgyud): thod pa'i phreng ba can/ stag gi pags pa mnabs pa/ phyag rgya lnga 'chang ba/ lha mo'i zhabs kyis 'khyud pa/ gcer bu mgo bo'i phreng bas brgyan pa/ spyan gsum
197b1(rgyud): pa| thod pa'i phreng bas dpral ba brgyan pa/ rdo rje dang dril bus 'khyud pa/ gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba'i mnyam pa dang ldan pa/ lha mo'i nu ma 'tshir ba/ thod pa dang kha
197b2(rgyud): T+wAM 'dzin pa/ cang te'u 'chang ba/ yang na rigs gsum dbye bas rtsa ba'i mtshan ma 'dzin pa/ thams cad phyogs kyi gos 'chang zhing / lha mo skra grol gdug pa mo//
197b3(rgyud): khwa gdong la sogs lha mo rnams/ /skra grol phyogs kyi gos can la/ /g.yas brkyang pa yi gnas pas bzhugs/ /spyan gsum pa la zhal rnams bsgyur/ /thod pa'i
197b4(rgyud): phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can/ /mgo bo'i phreng ba'i se ral brgyan/ /thams cad phyag rgya lnga yang 'chang / /'dod pa'i chags pas rab tu myos/ /rang gi thabs dang lhan cig
197b5(rgyud): tu| |mi g.yo ba dang de bzhin sbyor/ /lto ba 'phyang zhing lag pa 'phyang / /sku lus 'jigs shing gdong yang bsgyur/ /rab 'jigs nyi ma pad+ma yi/ /steng du sgrub par rab
197b6(rgyud): gnas nas/ /gang zhing ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin/ /rjes su chags pas zhal nyid ni/ /de lta bu yi bsam pa yis/ /rnal 'byor pas ni bsgom par bya/ /thod pa kha T+wAM ga
197b7(rgyud): 'dzin cing / /cang te'u gri gug mgo bo 'chang / /dkyil 'khor dag ni thams cad kun/ /yi dwags la ni bzhugs par bsgom/ /mkha' 'gro'i tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor
198a1(rgyud): la/ /nye bsnyen rjes su rnal 'byor te/ /dpa' bo'i yan lag sbyar ba yis/ /sgrub pa lhag pa'i snyoms par 'jug /sen mo dang so dag ni thod pa'i
198a2(rgyud): dum bu'o/ /skra dang spu dag ni keng rus chen po'o/ /pags pa dang dri ma dag ni keng rus can no/ /sha ni mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa'o/ /rtsa rgyus ni lha dgra'o/ /rus
198a3(rgyud): pa ni 'od dpag tu med pa'o/ /mkhal ma dag ni rdo rje 'od do/ /snying ni rdo rje sku'o/ /mig ni rdo rje myu gu can no/ /mkhris pa ni rdo rje ral pa can/ glo ba ni dpa' bo chen po'o/ /
198a4(rgyud): rgyu ma ni rdo rje hUM mdzad do/ /gnye ma ni rab tu bzang po'o/ /lte ba ni rdo rje bzang po'o/ /lgang pa ni 'jigs byed chen po'o/ /skra mtshams ni mig mi bzang ngo / /
198a5(rgyud): bad kan ni stobs po che'o/ /rnag ni rin chen rdo rje'o/ /khrag ni rta mgrin no/ /rdul ni nam mkha'i snying po'o/ /tshil ni dpal he ru ka'o/ /mchi ma ni pad+ma gar
198a6(rgyud): gyi dbang phyug go / mchil ma ni rnam par snang mdzad do/ /snabs ni rdo rje sems dpa'o/ /pu l+li ra ma la ya ste/ mgo bor rab tu gtum ma'o/ /dzA lan+d+ha ra
198a7(rgyud): ste/ spyi gtsug tu gtum pa'i mig can ma'o/ /uD+yin ste/ rnab g.yas par 'od ldan ma'o/ /ar bu da ste/ spyi bo'i rgyab tu sna chen ma ste/ gnas so/ /
198b1(rgyud): gong ba ri ste/ rna ba g.yon par brtan pa'i blo can ma'o/ /ra me shwa ra ste/ smin ma'i dbus su mi'u thung ma'o/ /de bI ko Ta ste/ mig tu lang+ka'i dbang phyug ma'o/ /ma
198b2(rgyud): la ba ste/ phrag pa gnyis su shing grib ma ste/ nye ba'i gnas so/ /kA ma ru pa ste/ mchan khung dag tu sa srung ma'o/ /o dre ste/ nu ma gnyis su 'jigs byed chen mo ste/
198b3(rgyud): zhing ngo / /tri sha ku ni ste/ lte bar rlung gi shugs can ma'o/ /ko sa la ste/ sna rtser chang 'thung ma ste/ nye ba'i zhing ngo / /ka ling+ka ste/ khar sngo bsangs lha mo'o//
198b4(rgyud): laM pA ka ste/ mgrin par shin tu bzang mo ste/ 'dus pa can no/ /kAny+tsi ste/ snying gar rta rna ma'o/ /hi ma la ya ste/ mdoms su bya gdong ma ste/ nye ba'i 'dus pa can no/ /pre ta pu
198b5(rgyud): ri ste/ mtshan ma la 'khor lo'i shugs can ma'o/ /gri ha de ba tA ste/ bshang ba'i lam la du ma skyes ma'i ste/ 'dus pa can no/ /sau rASh+Ta ste/ brla gnyis su chang 'tshong ma'o/ /su
198b6(rgyud): brtsa dwi ba ste/ byin pa gnyis la 'khor lo'i go cha ma'o/ /nye ba'i 'dus ba can no/ /na ga ra ste/ sor mo rnams la shin tu dpa' mo'o/ /sin+d+hu ste/ rkang pa'i bol la stobs
198b7(rgyud): chen ma ste/ 'di dag ni dur khrod do/ /ma ru ste/ mthe bong dag la 'khor los bsgyur ma'o/ /ku lu tA ste/ pus mo gnyis la brtson 'grus ma chen
199a1(rgyud): mo'o| |'di dag ni/ nye ba'i dur khrod do/ /sa'i khams ni/ ltung byed ma'o/ /chu'i khams ni/ gsod byed ma'o/ /me'i khams ni/ 'gugs byed
199a2(rgyud): ma'o| |rlung gi khams ni/ gar gyi dbang phyug ma'o/ /nam mkha'i khams ni/ pad+ma'i dra ba ma'o/ /gzugs kyi phung po ni/ rnam par snang mdzad do/ /tshor ba'i phung po ni/ rdo rje
199a3(rgyud): nyi ma'o| |'du shes kyi phung po ni/ pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug go /'du byed kyi phung po ni/ rdo rje rgyal po'o/ /rnam par shes pa'i phung po ni/ rdo rje sems dpa' ste/ de bzhin
199a4(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag nyid ni/ dpal he ru ka'o/ /mig gnyis ni/ gti mug rdo rje'o/ /rna ba gnyis ni/ zhe sdang rdo rje'o/ /sna gnyis ni/ ser sna rdo rje'o/ kha ni/
199a5(rgyud): 'dod chags rdo rje/ reg bya ni/ phrag dog rdo rje/ skye mched thams cad ni/ dbang phyug rdo rje/ yid ni/ mi 'khrugs rdo rje/ ngag ni/ dpag med rdo rje/ lus ni/ rdo rje rnam snang
199a6(rgyud): ngo / /'di dag sgrub pa'i rnal 'byor yin/ /rang snying lcags kyu'i sbyor ba yis/ /ye shes 'khor lo bkug nas su/ /de dag sprul cing bkod nas ni/ /ji lta'i rim pas dbang
199a7(rgyud): yang bskur/ /zhugs par gyur nas bcing bar bya/ /dgyes pas rjes su chags pas sbyor/ /rang gi ngo bo gcig gyur nas/ /de la go cha gnyis po dgod/ /oM ha snying ga la
199b1(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa'/ na ma hi mgo bo la rnam par snang mdzad/ swAhA hu spyi gtsug la pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug /bau ShaT he phrag pa gnyis la he ru ka /hUM hUM hoH mig gnyis la rdo rje
199b2(rgyud): nyi ma'o| |phaT haM lus thams cad kyi go cha ste/ rta mchog go /oM baM lte ba la rdo rje phag mo'o/ /haM yoM snying ga la ya mi ni'o/ /hrIM yoM kha la rmongs byed ma'o/ /hreM hreM mgo la bskyod
199b3(rgyud): byed ma'o/ /hUM hUM spyi gtsug la skrag byed ma'o/ /phaT phaT tsaN+Di ka ste/ yan lag thams cad kyi mtshon cha'o/ /mdzub mo 'dud byas gung mo nges par sbyar/ /mthe bong rdo rje
199b4(rgyud): brtan por rab tu sbyar/ /de ni dpral ba'i dbus su rang bzhag nas/ /bskor cing bskor bar kun tu sbyar bar bya/ /rkang pa phyed mnan steng du blta/ /gyen du pheM gyi sgra sgrog
199b5(rgyud): cing / /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams bzhugs pa'i/ /dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma rnams bkug /dzaH hUM baM hoH/ sbyor bas bkug nas gzhug pa dang / /bcings nas dbang
199b6(rgyud): du bya ba yin/ /dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma rnams kyis/ /mkha' dkyil yongs su gang mthong nas/ /ye shes chu yi bdud rtsi yis/ /gang ba'i bum pa blangs nas ni/ /lag pas
199b7(rgyud): de la dbang bskur bya/ /glu dang gar gyi mchod pa yis/ /dbang bskur dag ni dbul bar bya/ /de la sngags ni/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi She ka ta sa ma ya shri ye hUM hUM/
200a1(rgyud): glu 'di blangs pas bskul ba'am/ yang na mkha' 'gro ma chen mo rnams thugs dgyes pa dang / rab tu dgyes par gyur te/ dbang bskur
200a2(rgyud): rol mo'i bde chen po/ /mkha' 'gro dra ba'i bde chen po/ /dgyes chen gsol ba'i bde chen po/ /mkha' 'gro dra ba'i bde chen po/ /gsal mdzad bde ba chen po ste/ /
200a3(rgyud): mkha' 'gro dra ba'i bde chen po/ /a la la ho/ /mchog tu gyur pa bde chen po/ /mkha' 'gro dra ba'i bde chen po/ /a la la ho/ /bde chen ye shes dgyes nas ni/ /
200a4(rgyud): dam tshig dam tshig can la bzhugs/ /ye shes ro gcig bsgoms nas ni/ /ro gcig 'khor lo'ang de bzhin bsgom/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i dbu rgyan can/ /ye shes lnga
200a5(rgyud): dang yang dag ldan/ /rtsa ba'i sngags sogs dpa' bo gang / /tshangs pa'i skud pa la sogs brtag /rdo rje phag mo'i sngags gang yin/ /mgul nas mgul du rnam par
200a6(rgyud): brgyan| |lha mo'i snying po'i sngags kyis ni/ /phreng ba brgya phyed kyis brgyan cing / /gsang sngags yi ge bdun pa yis/ /nor bu rna cha legs mdzes shing / /sangs rgyas kun
200a7(rgyud): gyi mkha' 'gro ma/ /pags pa'i gos ni 'dzin pa'i mchog /rnal 'byor ma drug gsang sngags kyis/ /ska rags rgyad du byas pa yin/ /go cha drug po dag gis ni/ /phyag
200b1(rgyud): rgya lus ni rab tu mdzes/ /'khor lo kun gyi rnal 'byor ma/ /sngags kyi btung ba'i thod pa yin/ /rnam snang mdzad ma sngags gang gis/ /thod pas spyi gtsug rgyan du byas/ /dpa'
200b2(rgyud): bo nyi shu rtsa bzhi yis/ /lus kyi khams la rnam par brtag /de ltar bdag nyid rnam bsams te/ /tsham dam sngags kyis legs par bsrung / /tshangs par spyod pa brtags
200b3(rgyud): gyur nas/ /rkang pa brgyad pa'i sngags kyis mchod/ /'jigs pa thams cad rnam spangs te/ /de ltar rnal 'byor bdag nyid bsam/ /spro dang bsdu ba'i ye shes bsgom/ /
200b4(rgyud): snyoms 'jug ye shes bzlas pa bya/ /rnal 'byor chen po sgrub chen po/ /rdo rje khro bo'i thig le las/ /khams gsum du ni spro bar bya/ /rdo rje'i sna yi rtse mo 'bar/ /spro bya nam
200b5(rgyud): mkhar thig le las/ /rdo rje phra mo mthong gyur pa/ /ba spu'i khung bu'i bar dag nas/ /rgyu ba dang ni mi rgyu bar/ /khro bo sangs rgyas sprin rnams spro/ /rnam par dag pa'i rnal 'byor
200b6(rgyud): ni| |sum cu rtsa bdun rim pa yin/ /lus dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ni/ mkha' 'gro ma'o/ /tshor ba dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ni/ lA ma'o/ /chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ni/
200b7(rgyud): dum skyes ma'o/ /sems dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ni/ gzugs can ma'o/ /'dun pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ni/ rab gtum ma'o/ /brtson 'grus kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ni/
201a1(rgyud): mi'u thang ma'o/ /dpyod pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ni/ 'od ldan ma'o/ /sems kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ni/ sna chen ma'o/ /dad pa'i dbang po ni/ dpa'
201a2(rgyud): ba'i blo gros can ma'o/ /brtson 'grus kyi dbang po ni/ mi'u thung ma'o/ /dran pa'i dbang po ni/ lang+ka'i dbang phyug ma'o/ /ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po ni/ shing grib ma'o/ /
201a3(rgyud): shes rab kyi dbang po ni/ sa srung ma'o/ /dad pa'i stobs ni/ 'jigs byed chen mo'o/ /brtson 'grus kyi stobs ni/ rlung gi shugs can ma'o/ /dran pa'i stobs ni/ chang
201a4(rgyud): 'thung ma'o/ /ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs ni/ sngo bsangs lha mo'o/ /shes rab kyi stobs ni/ shin tu bzang mo'o/ /ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni/ rta rna ma'o//
201a5(rgyud): brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni/ bya gdong ma'o/ /dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni/ 'khor lo'i shugs can ma'o/ /shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag
201a6(rgyud): byang chub kyi yan lag ni/ dum skyes ma'o/ /chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni/ chang tshong ma'o/ /dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni/
201a7(rgyud): 'khor lo'i go cha ma'o/ /btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni/ shin tu dpa' mo'o/ /yang dag pa'i lta ba ni/ stobs chen ma'o/ /yang dag pa'i rtog pa
201b1(rgyud): ni| 'khor los bsgyur ma'o/ /yang dag pa'i ngag ni/ dpa' bo chen mo'o/ /yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' ni/ bya rog gdong can ma'o/ /yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba ni/ 'ug pa'i gdong can
201b2(rgyud): ma'o| |yang dag pa'i rtsol ba ni/ khyi'i gdong can ma'o/ /yang dag pa'i dran pa ni/ phag gi gdong can ma'o/ /yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ bcom ldan 'das dpal he ru ka'o/ /dge ba'i
201b3(rgyud): chos ma skyes pa rnams bskyed pa ni/ gshin rje sreg ma'o/ /dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams yang dag par srung ba ni/ gshin rje pho nya ma'o/ /mi dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams yang dag par
201b4(rgyud): spong ba ni/ gshin rje mche ba ma'o/ /mi dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams mi skyed pa ni/ gshin rje 'joms ma'o/ /dam tshig gi 'khor lo rnam par sbyang ba'i sgom pa'o/ /de nas
201b5(rgyud): dam tshig 'khor lo dag / mnyam par bzhag ste bzla bar bya/ ha ha/ hUM hUM/ hi hi/ phaT/ hUM hUM/ a a/ oM shrI badzra he he ru ru ki hUM hUM phaT/ DA ki nI dzA la shaM ba ra hUM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM hrIH
201b6(rgyud): ha ha huM hUM phaT swAhA/ snying po dang nye ba'i snying po'o/ /oM badzra pai ro tsa nI ye huM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM sarba bud+d+ha Da ki nI ye badzra bar+Na nI ye huM hUM phaT swAhA/ lha mo'i snying po dang nye ba'i snying po'o/ /oM
201b7(rgyud): DA ki nI ye hUM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM lA me huM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM khaN+Da ro he huM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM rU pi NI ye huM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM khaN+Da ka pA li ni kar ka ra huM hUM phaT/ oM pra tsaN+De huM hUM phaT/ oM ma hA kaM
202a1(rgyud): ka la ku ru ku ru huM hUM phaT/ oM tsaN+DA k+ShI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM kaM ka la ban+d+ha ban+d+ha huM hUM phaT/ oM pra b+hA ba tI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM bi ka Ta daM Sh+T+ri Ni tra sa ya trA sa ya
202a2(rgyud): huM hUM phaT/ oM ma hA nA se huM hUM phaT/ oM su rA bai ri Ni k+Sho b+ha ya k+Sho b+ha ya huM hUM phaT/ oM bI ra ma tI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM a mi tA b+he hroM hroM huM hUM phaT/ oM kharba rI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM
202a3(rgyud): badzra pra b+hA hraH hraH huM hUM phaT/ oM laM ke shwa rI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM badzra de ha pheM pheM huM hUM phaT/ oM dru mats+tsha ye huM hUM phaT/ oM ang+ku ri ka phaT phaT huM hUM phaT/ oM ai ra ba tI ye huM hUM
202a4(rgyud): phaT| oM badzra dza Ti la da ha da ha huM hUM phaT/ oM ma hA b+hai ra ba ye huM hUM phaT/ oM ma hA bI ra pa tsa pa tsa huM hUM phaT/ oM bA yu be ge huM hUM phaT/ oM badzra hUM kA ra b+hak+Sha b+hak+Sha ba sa ru d+hi ra
202a5(rgyud): an+t+ra mA lA ba laM bi ni huM hUM phaT/ oM su ra b+hak+Shi ye duM hUM phaT/ oM su b+ha de gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na sap+ta pA tA la b+hu dzaM ga sarbaM pA tar+dz+dza ya ta r+dz+dza ya huM hUM phaT/ oM sh+ya ma de bI ye huM hUM phaT /
202a6(rgyud): oM badzra b+ha dra A kaD+D+h+ya A kaD+D+h+ya huM hUM phaT/ oM su b+ha dre huM hUM phaT/ oM ma hA b+hai ra ba hriM hriM huM hUM phaT/ oM ha ya kar+Ne huM hUM phaT/ oM bi rU pAk+Sha dz+Nau dz+Nau huM hUM phaT/ oM kha ga na ne huM hUM
202a7(rgyud): phaT| oM ma hA ba la k+Sh+mAM k+Sh+mAM huM hUM phaT/ oM tsakra be ge huM hUM phaT/ oM rat+na badzra haM haM huM hUM phaT/ oM khaN+Da ro hi huM hUM phaT/ oM ha ya grI ba haM haM huM hUM phaT/ oM shauN+Di ni ye huM hUM
202b1(rgyud): phaT| oM A kA sha gar+b+he hUM hUM hUM hUM phaT/ oM tsakra barmI NI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM he ru ka ki li ki li huM hUM phaT/ oM su ra bI rI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM pad+ma na rte shwA ri si li si li huM hUM phaT/
202b2(rgyud): oM ma hA ba le huM hUM phaT/ oM bai ro tsa na hi li hi li huM hUM phaT/ oM tsakra brti ni ye huM hUM phaT/ oM badzra satwa d+hi li d+hi li huM hUM phaT/ oM ma hA bIR+ye huM hUM phaT/ oM kA kA s+ye huM hUM phaT/ oM
202b3(rgyud): u lU kA s+ye huM hUM phaT/ oM shwa nA s+ye huM hUM phaT/ oM sU ka rA s+ye huM hUM phaT/ oM ya ma dA D+hi ye huM hUM phaT/ oM ya ma dU tI e huM hUM phaT/ oM ya ma daMSh+t+ri NI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM ya ma ma
202b4(rgyud): tha nI ye huM hUM phaT/ 'di dag ji lta'i rim pa yis/ /dung chen phreng ba blangs nas su/ /lag g.yon mthe bong srin lag gis/ /gsang sngags dag ni bzlas pa bya/ /dus bzhin
202b5(rgyud): ji lta 'dod pa ru/ /rnal 'byor pas ni bzlas pa bya/ /sgom pa rtse gcig bya ba ste/ /dam tshig dang ni dam tshig sbyor/ /bza' dang bzlas pa bsdus nas su/ /cho ga bzhin du
202b6(rgyud): gtor ma sbyin/ /dkyil 'khor la ni ci bde bar/ /gcer bu skra grol 'dug pa yis/ /brtul zhugs can gyis gtor ma sbyin/ /rkang pa g.yas brkyang gnas nas su/ /
202b7(rgyud): mnyam par bzhag ste phyag rgya bcing / /mdzub mo 'dud byas gung mo nges par sbyar/ /mthe bong rdo rje brtan por rab tu sbyar/ /dpral ba'i dbus kyi phyogs su rab bzhag
203a1(rgyud): nas/ /gcu zhing gcu zhing bskor nas 'di brjod do/ /oM A ra l+li hoH dzaH hUM baM hoH badzra DA ki nI sa ma ya s+t+wAM dri sh+yA hoH/ 'di ni gsum dang bzhi dang ni/ /lnga yi
203a2(rgyud): bar du brjod par bya/ /skra grol gcer bur byung ba yis/ /rnal 'byor mtho ba'i gnas nas langs/ /lho phyogs kha bltas gnas pa yi/ /mtshan phyed du ni gtor ma sbyin/ /
203a3(rgyud): ji lta'i las kyi rjes 'brangs nas/ /de nyid gsum gyis mngon bsngags te/ /rdo rje thal mo gyen phye nas/ /gsang sngags 'di dag rab tu brjod/ /oM kha kha khA hi khA hi/ sarba
203a4(rgyud): yak+Sha rak+Sha sa/ b+hu ta/ pre ta/ pi shA tsa/ un mA da/ a pasmA ra/ DA ka DA ki n+ya da ya/ i maM ba laM gr-ih+Na tu sa ma ya rak+Shan+tu sarba sid+d+hi m+me pra yats+tshan+tu/ ya thai baM/ ya theSh+TaM/ b+huny+dza tha/ pi
203a5(rgyud): pa tha| ji g+h+ra tha/ mA ti kra ma tha/ ma ma sarbA kA ra ta yA/ sata su khaM bi shud+d+ha ye/ sa ha yi ka b+ha ban+tu hUM hUM phaT swAhA/ dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma thams cad/ /bde chen mchan
203a6(rgyud): gyis gar mdzad cing / /bcom ldan sku gsung thugs la bzhugs/ /A li kA li mnyam byas te/ /der ni re ba'i sbyor ba yis/ /steng du 'bar ba'i re pha ni/ /'og tu 'dzag par
203a7(rgyud): byed pa yin/ /'dzag pa'i khu ba'i tshul can ni/ /'chi med thigs pa'i gzugs su 'gyur/ /srub dang bsrub pa yang dag sbyor/ /ye shes me la las kyi rlung / /rab tu
203b1(rgyud): bskyod pas byas pa yis/ /lte ba'i dkyil 'khor dud pa 'byung / /'od zer dag ni 'bar bar byed/ /dam tshig 'khor lo nges de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bsregs nas de
203b2(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi longs spyod kyi 'khor lor song ste/ thabs des lan gsum du bskor ba byas nas smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu nas gnad 'byed pa'i sgo
203b3(rgyud): l as 'das te byung nas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams su de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bzhugs pa la ye shes lnga'i bdud rtsi blangs te spyi bo'i gtsug gser sgo dzA
203b4(rgyud): lan+d+ha ra zhes bya bar zhugs te / so'i mtshams kyi bu ga'i nang du song nas longs spyod kyi 'khor lor ngal bsos nas bsregs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dga'
203b5(rgyud): ba bskyed nas lte ba'i dkyil 'khor du gnas par 'gyur ro/ /des skra'i rtse mo 'bum du gshags pa'i cha tsam yang 'byung ba dang / 'jug pa mthong ste dga' zhing ji ltar
203b6(rgyud): bde bar gnas so/ /rang lhag lha yi rnal 'byor gyis/ /thams cad 'di ltar rab tu brtag /bsam pa med la bsam pa ste/ /sems kyang mtshon par bya ba min/ /bsam
203b7(rgyud): du med pa'i sgom pa yis/ /dngos dang dngos min rnam spangs yin/ /sems kyis bsams pa'i sems de ni/ /rnyed pa gang yin gzung bar bya/ /kha T+wAM ga ni lha yi sku/ /Da ma ru
204a1(rgyud): sgra shes rab yin/ /nyin mo bcom ldan dpa' bo ste/ /mtshan mo rnal 'byor ma ru bshad/ /dag pa'i chos kyi sprul pa ni/ /phag mo dag gi gzugs
204a2(rgyud): su bstan/ /shrI gnyis med ye shes te/ /he ni rgyu tshogs rnam par spangs/ /ru ni bkod pa dang bral ba/ /ka ni gang na'ang mi gnas pa'o/ /rnal 'byor sems ni ngal bso sa
204a3(rgyud): la| |mya ngan 'das zhes bstan pa yin/ /rnal 'byor 'pho ba'i dus kyi tshe/ /he ru ka sems dpa' rnal 'byor/ /lag na me tog sna tshogs bsnams/ /sna tshogs rgyal
204a4(rgyud): mtshan bdan can/ /sna tshogs rol mo'i sgra sgrog cing / /sna tshogs glu yis mchod par bya/ /'chi ba zhes bya'i rnam rtog 'di/ /mkha' la spyod pa'i gnas su khyer/ /

204a6(rgyud): mo'i sgom pa dgye bar bya/ /gsang sngags kun gyi gnas sbyor ba/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas/ /thams cad mkhyen cing thams cad mdzad/ /bde ba chen
204a7(rgyud): pos kun la khyab/ /mgon po sangs rgyas kun bdag ste/ /sems can kun gyi snying la gnas/ /oM aM AM/ i IM/ uM UM/ eM aiM/ oM auM/ /aM aH hUM/ 'di ni bcom
204b1(rgyud): ldan de nyid kyi/ /he ru ka ni dbang phyug mchog /mkha' la dri med zla ba yi/ /lte ba'i dbus su bsgom par bya/ /r-iM r-IM l-iM l-IM/ mkha' 'gro ma ni pad 'dab bzhugs/ /kaM khaM gaM
204b2(rgyud): g+haM ngaM / tsaM tshaM dzaM dz+haM nyaM/ TaM ThaM DaM D+haM NaM/ taM thaM daM d+haM naM/ paM phaM baM b+haM maM/ de yi thod pa'i dum sogs dang / /gtum mig ma la sogs kun gyis/ /sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo
204b3(rgyud): ste| |dngos grub thams cad rab tu stsol/ /yaM raM laM waM/ shaM ShaM saM haM k+ShaM/ de yi khwa gdong la sogs dang / /gshin rje sreg sogs kun gyi 'o/ /yi ge k+Sha yi bdag nyid ni/ /

204b5(rgyud): cing phra ba'i dbus/ /'di ni tshad med rtag pa'i thugs/ /rang gi gzugs ni mkha' lta bu/ /'di ni bdag nyid bcings pa ste/ /'di ni dgrol la mkhas pa yin/ /'di ni
204b6(rgyud): lte ba'i dbus bzhugs shing / /shu kra'i gzugs kyis bde chen gnas/ /sku gsung thugs kyi sbyor ba yis/ /'khor lo gsum gyi dbus su dgod/ /'di ni gsang
204b7(rgyud): ba mchog yin te/ /gang la yang ni bstan mi bya/ /sngar bshad phyag dang phyag mtshan dang / /go cha yang ni de bzhin te/ /sngar bshad bzhin du bkod nas kyang / /phung po
205a1(rgyud): khams dang skye mched dag / dpa' bo'i yan lag rnam dag nyid/ /byang chub phyogs kyang de bzhin te/ /lugs su 'byung dang ldog pa yis//

205b1(rgyud): byed dang ni dus mtshan dag / g.yas brkyang ba yis mgo la mnan/ /rgyan drug sna tshogs rdo rje dang / /zla ba phyed pas rnam par brgyan/ /stag gi pags pa gos su mnabs/ /

206a1(rgyud): la mkha' 'gro ma yang dmar/ /ci 'dod gzugs su'ang 'gyur ba yin/ /khwa gdong la sogs kun ljang gu/ /gshin rje sreg sogs nun dud
206a2(rgyud): ka / de ltar mdog gi bye brag gis/ /sgom pa'i mchog gis shes par bya/ /mkha' 'gro ma thod kha T+wAM 'dzin/ /cang te'u gar gyis rnam par bzhugs/ /thams cad dbu skra grol

206a4(rgyud): cig bcas/ /gsung gi 'khor lo'i dpa' bo rnams/ /rnal 'byor ma 'khor sdigs mdzub can/ /pad+ma dril bus rnam par brgyan/ /rnal 'byor ma ni thod pad+ma/ /bsdigs
