206a6(rgyud): gang ba'o/ /khwa gdong la sogs lha mo ni/ /thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM ga /gri gug dang ni sdigs mdzub bcas/ /gshin rje sreg sogs lha mo ni/ /cang te'u mgo bo bsdigs
206a7(rgyud): mdzub dang / /thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can/ /skyil krung phyed pas gar dang bcas/ /dpa' bo g.yas brkyang gnas pa ste/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi byin pas 'khril/ /
206b1(rgyud): gnyis su med par mnyam ldan pa/ /thugs rje chags pa'i bde ba che/ /ye shes 'khor lo mnyam ldan pas/ /bde ba'i bde ba gcig tu 'gyur/ /chos kyi ro las yang dag
206b2(rgyud): 'byung / /rang min sa bon dang bcas pa/ /phreng ba'i sngags dang mnyam par sbyar/ /gsal byed mnyam par sbyar nas su/ /hUM gnyis phaT dang yang dag sbyar/ /dpa' bo'i gsang
206b3(rgyud): sngags yang dag sbyar/ /rnal 'byor ma yang de bzhin bshad/ /rang gi ming gi sa bon dbus/ /gsal byed dang ni mnyam par ldan/ /hUM hUM phaT kyang de bzhin te/ /sngags pa
206b4(rgyud): 'di ltar sbyar bar bya/ /dbus su khrag 'thung rdo rje ste/ /gsang sngags 'di ni mkhas pas bzla/ /oM shrI badzra he he ru ru kaM hUM hUM phaT/ oM hrIH ha ha huM hUM phaT/ snying po dang nye ba'i snying po'o/ /
206b5(rgyud): oM badzra bA rA hi huM hUM phaT/ oM badzra bai ro tsa nI ye hUM hUM phaT/ lha mo'i snying po dang nye ba'i snying po'o/ /dus bzhi dag tu cho ga bzhin/ /rnal 'byor pa yis bzlas pa bya/ /mdun du ba spu'i
206b6(rgyud): khung bu las/ /chos dang longs spyod rnam par spro/ /sems can rnams la phan gdags phyir/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bstan par bya/ /'gro ba rigs drug grol nas ni/ /bla med
206b7(rgyud): gnas su 'jog par byed/ /sngags pas ji ltar 'dod sbyor ba/ /rigs lnga rnams kyi dbus su yang / /gang gis rigs gsum dbus khyab pa/ /khams gsum gyi ni bdag
207a1(rgyud): po ste| |sangs rgyas thams cad yang dag 'dus/ /sku gsung thugs kyi dbye ba'o/ /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ las
207a2(rgyud): dang po pa'i sbyor ba'i sgom pa bstan pa ste le'u bcu drug pa'o/ / //rdo rje snying pos rab bshad pa/ /dngos grub thams cad 'grub pa ste/ /phyag bzhi po yi
207a3(rgyud): cho ga yis/ /dbang po bar ma rnam par bsgom/ /gcig car skyed pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /sgom pa dag ni rnam par bsgom/ /phyag bzhi pa la zhal bzhi pa/ /spyan gsum
207a4(rgyud): drag po 'jigs pa ste/ /g.yas brkyang pa yi gnas pas bzhugs/ /'jigs byed dang ni dus mtshan gnon/ /sku lus mi mgo'i do shal can/ /thod pa'i dbu rgyan
207a5(rgyud): mchog can te/ /zla ba phyed pas mdzes pa yin/ /sna tshogs rdo rjes rnam par mtshan/ /phyag rgya drug po drag po'i gzugs/ /sku mdog dkar po 'jigs pa ste/ /sngo
207a6(rgyud): zhing ljang gu dmar po ste/ /steng gi zhal gdong rnam par bsgom/ /thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin/ /rdo rje dril bu cang te'u dang / /rdo rje phag mo mnyam par ldan/ /lha mo'i ku tsa
207a7(rgyud): 'tshir ba ste/ /stag gi pags pa gos su mnabs/ /phyogs kyi gos mchog 'dzin pa ste/ /skra grol dum bu'i ska rags can/ /de phyag zhal dang mdog gis mtshan/ /
207b1(rgyud): mkha' 'gro ma ni sngo la ser/ /lA ma ljang dang ser po ste/ /dum skyes ma ni dmar la ljang / /gzugs can ma ni ser la dmar/ /thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin/ /gri gug mgo
207b2(rgyud): ni 'dzin pa'i mchog / cang te'u sgra ni du ma sgrog /gcer bu skra ni grol ba ste/ /thod pa dag gis cod pan byas/ /spyan gsum pa la drag po'i zhal/ /rang gi mdog dang phyag
207b3(rgyud): de bzhin/ /skyil krung phyed pa'i gar can te/ /bdud bzhi zhabs 'og gnon pa dang / /'dod pas lta zhing rtog pa ste/ /thugs kyi 'khor lo'i dpa' bo ni/ /sngo dang ser bar
207b4(rgyud): rnam par bsgom/ /de bzhin rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'ang / /dkar zhing sngo bar rnam par bsgom/ /thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin/ /rdo rje dril bus legs par 'khyud/ /cang te'u
207b5(rgyud): yi ni sna tshogs sgra/ /rdo rje sgra ni yongs su rdzogs/ /thod pa dang ni sdigs mdzub dang / /gri gug dang ni mi thod 'dzin/ /lha mo'i phyag rnams de bzhin te/ /byin pa
207b6(rgyud): gnyis kyis legs par 'khril/ /g.yas brkyang pa yi gnas pas bzhugs/ /'jigs pa chen po bzhin rnam bsgyur/ /rdo rje phreng ba'i cod pan byas/ /dpa' bo rdo rjes
207b7(rgyud): mtshan pa'o/ /gsung gi 'khor lo'i dpa' bo gang / /dmar zhing nag la 'jigs pa ste/ /pad+ma'i dpa' bos rnam par khyab/ /rang gi phyag mtshan 'dzin pa ste/ /pad+ma'i mkha' 'gro
208a1(rgyud): ma de bzhin/ /ljang dang dkar ba'i sku lus can/ /sku yi 'khor lo'i dpa' bo yang / /ser dang ljang ba'i sku lus can/ /'khor los dpa' bo yongs
208a2(rgyud): su khyab| |'khor los bsgyur ba'ang ster bar byed/ /'khor lo mkha' 'gro ma de bzhin/ /dkar dmar dang ni yid 'phrog pa'o/ /rang gi mtshan dang yang dag ldan/ /chos kyi 'khor
208a3(rgyud): lor rab bskor ba/ /khwa gdong sogs bzhi mkha' 'gro ma/ /sna tshogs mdog can yid 'phrog pa'o/ /thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin/ /gri gug mgo bo cang te'u 'dzin/ /gshin rje
208a4(rgyud): sreg sogs lha mo ni/ /dud ka dmar po de bzhin no/ /gshin rje dbyig to gri gug mgo /thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin/ /'khor gyi ma sogs mkha' 'gro ma/ /yi dwags gdan la
208a5(rgyud): rnam par bzhugs/ /byin pa gnyis kyis mnyam par 'khril/ /mkha' 'gro ma ni dgyes pa che/ /skra grol phyogs kyi gos 'chang zhing / /thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can/ /
208a6(rgyud): thams cad phyag rgya lnga 'dzin cing / /dpa' bo mkha' 'gro ma yi 'khor/ /spyan gsum drag po rnam bsgyur ba/ /dpa' bo 'dod pa'i zas la rol/ /chags pa'i mig
208a7(rgyud): gis rnam par lta/ /sngar bshad cho ga'i rim pa bzhin/ /gsang sngags rang ming sa bon dang / /dpa' bo gsang sngags 'di ru bshad/ /mkha' 'gro ma yang de bzhin te/ /
208b1(rgyud): rtsa ba'i gsang sngags 'di nyid ni/ /gsang sngags mchog kyang de bzhin no/ /oM shrI badzra he he ru ru kaM huM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM hrIH ha ha huM hUM phaT/ oM badzra bA rA hi baM huM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM badzra be
208b2(rgyud): ro tsa nI ye huM hUM phaT swAhA/ thams cad bsgoms te mthong ba na/ /bdag po dang ni 'khor la sogs/ /ya shes 'khor lo de mthong nas/ /legs par dbang bskur gzhug par
208b3(rgyud): bya| |bsgoms pas gcig tu byas nas ni/ /bdud rtsi mchog gis tshim par bya/ /ye shes bzlas pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /khro bo tshogs mchog spros nas ni/ /dpa' bo mkha'
208b4(rgyud): 'gro mthong ba na/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rim pa yis/ /dam tshig can gyis bzlas pa bya/ /'khor sogs dpa' bo mkha' 'gro ma/ /'di ni kun gyi gsang sngags te/ /don dam
208b5(rgyud): bzlas par bshad pa yin/ /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ dbang po bar ma'i sgom pa bstan pa ste le'u bcu bdun pa'o// //de nas gzhan
208b6(rgyud): yang bshad bya ba/ /rdo rje snying po'i gsang ba ste/ /gang yang de nyid rim pa dag /sgrub pa po la phan pa'i phyir/ /dbang po rnon po'i sgom pa bshad/ /bskyed pa'i rim pa'i sbyor ba
208b7(rgyud): dag / sgom pa de yis bsgom par bya/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang / /lam gyi rnam mkhyen ye shes so/ /A li kA li mnyam sbyor ba/ /bdag nyid he ru kar yang bya/ /
209a1(rgyud): mgon po zhal gsum phyag drug pa/ /spyan gsum rnam par bsgyur ba'i zhal/ /g.yas brkyang ba yi gnas pas bzhugs/ /'jigs byed dang ni
209a2(rgyud): dus mtshan gyi/ /mgo bo la ni zhabs kyis gnon/ /na ra'i pags pa gos su mnabs/ /zla ba phyed pas rnam par brgyan/ /sna tshogs rdo rjes dbu la mnan/ /thod pa'i phred
209a3(rgyud): ba'i dbu rgyan can/ /sku lus phyag rgya drug gis btab/ /rdo rje phag mo mnyam par ldan/ /gnyis su med par sbyor ba yi/ /byin pa gnyis kyis legs par 'khril/ /gcer
209a4(rgyud): bu skra ni grol ba ste/ /dum bu'i rgyan gyi ska rags can/ /thod pa yi ni phreng ba ste/ /snying rje bde bas rnam par myos/ /rdo rje dril bu mnyam ldan pa/ /'dod pa'i chags pas
209a5(rgyud): bde bar dgyes/ /thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin/ /ral gri dang ni cang te'u 'chang / /tshangs pa'i mgo bos phyag gzhan la/ /phyag rgya drug gis rnam par brgyan/ /de yi sku mdog
209a6(rgyud): zhal phyag mtshan/ /'on kyang gri gug 'dzin pa yin/ /gnam mdog sar skya dmar dang dkar/ /rnam thar gsum dang sku gsum dang / /thams cad 'khor sogs
209a7(rgyud): mkha' 'gro ma/ /dpa' po rnal 'byor ma mkha' 'gro/ /thams cad zhal gsum phyag drug pa/ /spyan gsum g.yas brkyang gnas pas bzhugs/ /yi dwags gdan la
209b1(rgyud): brtan par gnas/ /gnyis su med pa'i sbyor bas bzhugs/ /mkha' 'gro ma ni dkar sngo dmar/ /lA ma ljang gu sngo la dkar/ /dum skyes ma ni dmar dkar sngo/ /gzugs can
209b2(rgyud): ma ni ser sngo dmar/ /'di dag ni/ spyan gsum pa/ gcer bu skra grol ba/ yi dwags kyi steng du g.yas brkyang bas bzhugs pa/ thod pa dang / khwa T+wAM ga dang / ral gri dang / 'khor
209b3(rgyud): lo dang / gri gug dang / mgo bo dang / cang te'u bsnams pa'o/ /thugs kyi 'khor lo'i dpa' bo dang / rnal 'byor ma rnams la shar du thod pa'i dum bu dang / rab gtum ma ste/ sngo ba
209b4(rgyud): dang / dkar ba dang / dmar ba'o/ /byang du keng rus chen po dang / gtum mig ma ste/ dmar ba dang / dkar ba dang / sngo ba'o/ /nub tu keng rus can dang / 'od ldan ma ste/ dkar ba dang /
209b5(rgyud): dmar pa dang / ljang gu'o/ /lho ru mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa dang / sna chen ma ste/ ljang gu dang / dkar ba dang / dmar ba'o/ /me'i phyogs su lha dgra dang / dpa' ba'i blo gros ma ste/
209b6(rgyud): dmar ba dang / sngo ba dang / dkar ba'o/ /bden bral du 'od dpag tu med pa dang / mi'u thung ma ste/ ser ba dang / sngo ba dang / dkar ba'o/ /rlung gi phyogs su rdo rje'i 'od dang / lang+ka'i dbang phyug
209b7(rgyud): ma ste/ sngo ba dang / dkar ba dang / dmar ba'o/ /dbang ldan du rdo rje lus dang / shing grib ma ste/ ljang ba dang / dkar ba dang / dmar ba'o/ /gsung gi 'khor lo'i shar phyogs su myu gu can
210a1(rgyud): dang / sa srung ma ste/ dmar ba dang / sngo ba dang / dkar ba'o/ /byang phyogs su rdo rje ral pa can dang / 'jigs byed chen mo ste/ sngo ba dang / dkar ba dang /
210a2(rgyud): dmar ba'o/ /nub tu dpa' bo chen po dang / rlung gi shugs can ma ste/ ljang ba dang / dkar ba dang / dmar ba'o/ /lho ru rdo rje hUM mdzad dang / chang 'thung ma ste/ ser ba dang / sngo ba dang /
210a3(rgyud): dmar ba'o/ /me'i phyogs su rab bzang dang / sngo bsangs lha mo ste/ ljang ba dang / ser ba dang / dmar ba'o/ /bden bral gyi phyogs su rdo rje bzang dang / rab bzang ma ste/ sngo ba dang / dkar
210a4(rgyud): ba dang / dmar ba'o/ /rlung gi phyogs su 'jigs byed chen po dang / rta rnam ste/ dmar ba dang / sngo ba dang / ser ba'o/ /dbang ldan du mig mi bzang dang / bya gdong ma ste/ dkar ba
210a5(rgyud): dang / sngo ba dang / ljang gu'o/ /sku'i 'khor lo'i shar phyogs su stobs po che dang / 'khor lo'i shugs can ma ste/ dkar po dang / sngon po dang / ser po'o/ /byang phyogs su rdo
210a6(rgyud): rje rin chen dang / dum skyes ma ste/ ser ba dang / sngo ba dang / ljang gu'o/ /nub phyogs su rta mgrin dang / chang tshong ma ste/ dmar ba dang / sngo ba dang / dkar ba'o/ /lho phyogs
210a7(rgyud): su nam mkha'i snying po dang / 'khor lo'i go cha ma ste/ sngo ba dang / dmar ba dang / ljang gu'o/ /me'i phyogs su khrag 'thung dang / rab dpa' mo ste/ ljang gu dang / ser po dang /
210b1(rgyud): dmar po'o/ /bden bral du pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug dang / stobs chen mo ste/ dkar ba dang / sngo ba dang / ljang gu'o/ /rlung gi phyogs su rnam par snang mdzad dang / 'khor los bsgyur ma ste/
210b2(rgyud): ljang ba dang / dmar ba dang / ser ba'o/ /dbang ldan gyi phyogs su rdo rje sems dpa' dang / brtson 'grus chen mo ste/ nam mkha'i mdog can sngo bsangs dang / ser ba dang / ljang gu'o/ /
210b3(rgyud): shar phyogs kyi sgor khwa gdong ma ste/ sngo ba dang / ser ba dang / dmar ba'o/ /byang du 'ug gdong ma ste/ ljang gu dang / dmar ba dang / dkar ba'o/ /nub tu khyi gdong ma ste/ ser ba
210b4(rgyud): dang / sngo ba dang / ljang gu'o/ /lho ru phag gdong ma ste/ dmar ba dang / sngo ba dang / ljang gu'o/ /me'i phyogs su gshin rje sreg ma ste/ dkar ba dang / sngo ba dang / ljang gu'o/ /bden
210b5(rgyud): bral du gshin rje pho nya ma ste/ sngo ba dang / dkar ba dang / dmar ba'o/ /rlung gi phyogs su gshin rje mche ba ma ste/ /dud ka dang / dmar ba dang / dkar ba'o/ /dbang ldan du gshin rje
210b6(rgyud): 'joms ma ste/ dmar ba dang / sngo ba dang / dkar ba'o/ /thod pa'i dum bu la sogs pa dang / rab gtum ma la sogs pa rdo rje dril bus mnyam par ldan pa ral gri dang /cang te'u
210b7(rgyud): dang / mgo bo dang / thod pa dang / kha T+wAM ga 'dzin pa/ pad+ma pad+ma'i dril bu dang / 'khor lo 'khor lo'i dril bu ste/ /sku gsung dag ni gnyis po yang / /thugs kyi 'khor lo ji lta
211a1(rgyud): pa'o| |lha mo cang te'u ral gri dang / gri gug kyang ni de bzhin te/ /khwa gdong la sogs pa ni/ ral gri dang / cang te 'u dang / gri gug dang / thod pa dang /
211a2(rgyud): kha T+wAM ga dang / mgo po dang / dril bu 'dzin pa'o/ /gshin rje sreg ma la sogs pa ni/ thod pa dang / kha T+wAM ga dang / ral gri dang / lcags kyu dang / cang te'u dang / dril bu
211a3(rgyud): dang / mgo bo 'dzin pa'o/ /de thams cad kyang spyan gsum pa/ phyag rgya lngas rnam par brgyan pa/ na ra'i pags pa mnabs pa/ dpa' bo rnams ni/ g.yas brkyang bas
211a4(rgyud): bzhugs pa/ thod pa'i phreng ba can/ rang gi rigs kyi cod pan can/ yi dwags kyi steng na bzhugs pa/ rnal 'byor ma'i byin pa gnyis kyis legs par 'khril ba/ /gcer bu sla
211a5(rgyud): grol ba| dum bu'i rgyan gyi ska rags can/ /khwa gdong ma la sogs pa dang / gshin rje sreg ma la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams ni/ gcer bu skra grol ba/ yi dwags kyi steng du
211a6(rgyud): g.yas brkyang ba'i zhabs kyis gnas pa/ spyan gsum pa/ phyag rgya lngas rnam par brgyan pa/ thod pa'i phreng ba can/ gsus pa rlo ba/ skye gnas ring ba mche ba rnam par
211a7(rgyud): gtsigs pa'i zhal mnga' ba/ thugs rje'i chags pa'i ros rnam par myos pa/ 'jigs pa'i g.yo bas 'jigs su rung ba/ 'di ltar ma lus bsgoms nas ni/ /ye
211b1(rgyud): shes 'khor lo mthong ba dang / /ye shes chu sogs arga dang / /dam tshig mchog gis mchod par bya/ /mthong ma thag tu dbang yang bskur/ /mchod nas thim par byas nas ni/ /ye
211b2(rgyud): shes bzlas pa'i cho ga bzhin/ /btab nas 'thor 'thung rab tu bya/ /srog dang rtsol ba'i sbyor ba yis/ /'dod pa'i dngos grub thob pa yin/ /dam tshig 'khor lo bzlas byas
211b3(rgyud): nas| |'chi med ye shes lnga lhan cig / gsang sngags khro bo'i tshig gis bzla/ /bde ba'i dngos grub ster bar mdzad/ /dkyil 'khor ma lus thams cad bya/ /mnyam par
211b4(rgyud): bzhag ste bzlas pa bya/ /shes rab thabs kyi cho ga bzhin/ /rnal 'byor bzlas pa don chen ster/ /rnal 'byor ma dang mkha' 'gro dpa'/ /mngon sum du ni mchog kyang
211b5(rgyud): stsol| |oM shrI a badzra he he ru ru kaM huM hUM phaT/ oM a A/ i I/ u U e ai/ o au/ aM aH hUM hUM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM hrIH ha ha huM hUM phaT/ oM badzra bai ro tsa nA ye huM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM
211b6(rgyud): sarba bud+d+ha DA ki nI ye badzra bar+N+Na nI ye huM hUM phaT swAhA/ dpal khrag 'thung dang / phag mo'i snying po dang nye ba'i snying po'o/ /oM DA ki nI DA+oM DAM huM hUM phaT/ oM lA me lAM huM hUM
211b7(rgyud): phaT| oM khaN+Da ro he khaM huM hUM phaT/ oM rU pi NI ye ruM huM hUM phaT/ oM ka ra ka ra kaM huM hUM phaT/ oM pra tsaN+De huM hUM phaT/ oM ku ru ku ru ma huM hUM phaT/ oM N+DA k+ShI ye hUM hUM
212a1(rgyud): phaT/ oM b+han+d+ha b+han+d+ha kaM huM hUM phaT/ oM pra b+ha ba ti ye huM hUM phaT/ oM trA sa ya trA sa ya baM huM hUM phaT/ oM mahA nA se huM hUM phaT/ oM k+Sho b+ha ya k+Sho b+ha ya saM huM hUM phaT/ oM bI
212a2(rgyud): ra ma tI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM hroM hroM AM huM hUM phaT/ oM kharba rI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM hraH hraH baM huM hUM phaT/ oM laM ke shwa rI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM pheM pheM baM huM hUM phaT/ oM dru ma ts+tsha ye huM hUM phaT/
212a3(rgyud): oM phaT phaT oM huM hUM phaT/ oM e ra ba tI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM da ha da ha baM huM hUM phaT/ oM mahA b+hai ra bi ye huM hUM phaT/ oM pa tsa pa tsa maM huM hUM phaT/ oM bA yu be ge huM hUM phaT/ oM
212a4(rgyud): b+hak+Sha b+hak+Sha ba sa ru d+hi ra an+ta mA la ba laM bi nAM ye huM hUM phaT/ oM su ra b+hak+Shi ye huM hUM phaT/ oM grih+Na grih+Na su sab+ta pA tA la ga ta b+hu dzaM ga sarbaM pA tar+dz+dza ya tar+dz+dza ya huM hUM phaT/ oM sh+yA ma de bI
212a5(rgyud): ye huM hUM phaT/ oM A kaD+D+h+ya aD+D+h+ya baM huM hUM phaT/ oM su b+ha dre huM hUM phaT/ oM hriM hriM maM huM hUM phaT/ oM ha ya kar+N+Ne huM hUM phaT/ oM j+NauM oM j+NauM baM huM hUM phaT/ oM kha gA na ne huM hUM phaT/
212a6(rgyud): oM k+Sh+maM k+Sh+mAM saM huM hUM phaT/ oM tsakra be ge huM hUM phaT/ oM haM haM rA huM hUM phaT/ oM khaN+Da ro hi huM hUM phaT/ oM hiM hi haM huM hUM phaT/ oM shauN+Di nI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM hUM hUM haM huM hUM phaT/ oM tsakra warmi
212a7(rgyud): Ni ye huM hUM phaT/ oM ki li ki li haM huM hUM phaT/ oM su bI re huM hUM phaT/ oM si li si li baM huM hUM phaT/ oM mahA ba le huM hUM phaT/ oM hi li hi li baM huM hUM phaT/ oM tsakra brti ni ye huM hUM phaT/ oM d+hi li
212b1(rgyud): d+hi li baM hUM hUM phaT/ oM mahA bIR+ye huM hUM phaT/ oM kA kA s+yA+e huM hUM phaT/ oM u lU kA s+ye huM hUM phaT/ oM shwA nA s+ye huM hUM phaT/ oM sU ka rA s+ye huM hUM phaT/ oM ya ma dA D+hI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM ya ma
212b2(rgyud): du tI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM ya ma daMSh+Ti NA ye huM hUM phaT/ oM ya ma ma tha nI ye huM hUM phaT/ 'di dag ji lta'i rim pa yis/ /bzlas dang sgom pa byas nas ni/ /ye shes bdud rtsi sgom byas nas//
212b3(rgyud): rang gi lha yi sbyor bas gnas/ /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ dbang po rnon po'i sgom pa rjes su bstan pa'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o// //rdo rje snying
212b4(rgyud): pos gsungs pa/ de nas mchog gi dam pa bshad/ /mnyam par sbyor ba'i sdom pa dag /sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor ba/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi sdom ba mchog /gcig car
212b5(rgyud): 'jug pa mthong nas su/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bsgoms nas spro/ /A li kA li las byung ba/ /he ru kar ni bdag nyid byas/ /ser dang sngo dang ljang ku ste/ /steng ni dkar po zhi ba'o//
212b6(rgyud): dbu rgyan thod pa'i cod pan can/ /spyan gsum thugs rje drag po ste/ /phag mo yis ni rnam par brgyan/ /'jigs byed dang ni dus mtshan gyi/ /mgo la g.yas brkyang gnas
212b7(rgyud): bas bzhugs/ /drag po gdul dka' 'dul mdzad cing / /bgegs rnams thams cad 'dul bar mdzad/ /zla ba phyed dang ral pa 'ching / /sna tshogs rdo rje rnam par gnon/ /sku la
213a1(rgyud): phyag rgya drug gis mtshan/ /phyag rgya sdom pa mchog yin te/ /stag gi pags pa gos su mnabs/ /mgo bo'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /rdo rje phag mo dmar
213a2(rgyud): mo ste| |gcer bu skra ni grol ba yin/ /de yi sku dang zhal dang mtshan/ /byin ba gnyis kyis legs par 'khril/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can/ /mchu dang mchu ni bi di dam//
213a3(rgyud): g.yer kha yi ni ska rags can/ /rigs kyi dga' bas rnam par mos/ /rdo rje dril bu mnyam ldan pas/ /phag mo yi ni ku tsa 'dzin/ /thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin/ /zhags pa lcags
213a4(rgyud): kyu mchog kyang 'dzin/ /tshangs pa'i pags pa brkyang nas ni/ /mgo bo'i steng du phyag gis 'dzin/ /cang te'u sgra ni snyan bdag /chos kyi sgras ni rab tu 'gengs/ /g.yon dang
213a5(rgyud): g.yas kyi thad du ni/ /mkha' 'gro bzhi po rnam par bsgom/ /g.yas phyogs mkha' 'gro ma lA ma/ /byang du bu ma skyes gzugs can ma/ /sngo dang dur smrig dkar la ser/ /
213a6(rgyud): spyan gsum rnam bsgyur drag po dang / /dkar sngon ljang dmar dur smrig ste/ /de ni rab tu cher 'bar ba'o/ /g.yas pa'i phyogs su bsgoms nas ni/ /dngos grub thams cad
213a7(rgyud): rab tu stsol/ /g.yon phyogs dmar dang sngo dang ljang / /dkar po steng gi zhal de bzhin/ /ljang dang dmar po ser po ste/ /steng gi sngon po bde ba'ang de/ /g.yas brkyang ba yi
213b1(rgyud): zhabs kyis bzhugs/ /phyogs kyi gos mchog 'chang ba dang / /skra grol ba ni 'jigs pa ste/ /mgo bo'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /bdud bzhi po ni zhabs 'o ga gnon/ /phyag rgya lnga yis
213b2(rgyud): rnam par brgyan/ /thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin/ /rdo rje mdung ni phyag na bsnams/ /na ra'i pags pa gos su mnabs/ /dril bu cang te'u de bzhin te/ /mgo bo'i gri gug phyag na
213b3(rgyud): bsnams/ /g.yer kha'i ska rags sgra sgrog pa/ /rkang rgyan ru lu ru lu'i sgra/ /sna tshogs pad+ma'i steng du ni/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus bzhugs te/ /gdan gcig la ni rnam par
213b4(rgyud): bzhugs/ /snying la dam tshig ye shes ni/ /de mchog phyag dang phyag mtshan te/ /rdo rje sems dpa' he ru ka /mi bskyod pa yi cod pan can/ /thams cad de ltar bsgoms nas ni//
213b5(rgyud): mtshan dang dpe byad dang bcas pa/ /ye shes gcig tu byas nas ni/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi sdom pa bzla/ /oM AH shrIH badzra he he ru ru kaM DA ki nI dzA la shaM ba raM hUM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM hrIH ha ha huM hUM
213b6(rgyud): phaT/ oM AHbadzra bA rA hI h+ye baM/ DA ki nI dzA la shaM ba raM huM hUM phaT swAhA /oM badzra bai ro tsa nI ye huM hUM phaT swAhA/ dpal khrag 'thung dang / /phag mo'i snying po dang nye ba'i snying po'o/ /oM badzra
213b7(rgyud): rA ki nI ye huM hUM phaT/ /oM badzra lA me huM hUM phaT/ oM badzra khaN+Da ro he huM hUM phaT/ oM badzra rU pi NI ye swAhA/ 'di dag ji lta'i rim pa yis/ /bzlas pa dang ni bsgom pa bya/ /dus bzhi'i
214a1(rgyud): rjes 'brang rim pa yis/ /dam tshig sdom pa gnyis med pa/ /mar me lnga yang bza' bar bya/ /rtag tu dur khrod nang du bsgom/ /nub bdun du ni
214a2(rgyud): sbyor ba yis/ /mi snang dngos grub nges par 'grub/ /mthong bar byed par yang kun 'gro/ /sna tshogs gzugs can bde ba che/ /bza' ba rnams ni bza' bya zhing / /sgom
214a3(rgyud): gyi btung ba'ang de bzhin te/ /phyogs kyi gos can gar gyis ni/ /myos shing myos pa lta bur gnas/ /grib ma yang ni med pa ru/ /rnal 'byor chen po rnam par spyod//

214a7(rgyud): zhal ni bcu gnyis te/ /phyag ni nyi shu rtsa bzhi'o/ /yang na sna tshogs phyugs kyi zhal/ /phyag ni brgya dang ldan par bya/ /yang na de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs/ /byang chub
214b1(rgyud): sems dpa' dpa' bo dang / /mkha' 'gro ma dang gzugs dang ni/ /pha rol phyin pa'ang de bzhin te/ /phan tshun bye brag can gyis zhal/ /mdog gi bye brag sna tshogs dang /

215a1(rgyud): tshogs rdo rjes dbu la mnan/ /sangs rgyas lnga yi cod pan can/ /rdo rje sems dpa' spyi gtsug rgyan/ /spyan gsum stag gi pags pa mnabs/ /

215a3(rgyud): grol ba| |phyag gnyis pa la zhal gcig pa/ /dum bu'i rgyan gyi ska rags can/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i rgyan can te/ /rdo rje sdigs mdzub thod pas 'khyud/ /byin pa

215b1(rgyud): bltas nas su/ /sna tshogs phyag mtshan sna tshogs 'byung / /ji srid phyag ni 'bum gyi bar/ /phyag rgya sna tshogs de bzhin te/ /cho ga sna tshogs de bzhin no/ /mkha' 'gro ma

219b7(rgyud): bla ma'i bla ma las/ srung ba'i phyir zlog gi le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o// //de nas de yi sgom ba bshad/ /sems can kun la phan 'dogs pa'i/ /skad
220a1(rgyud): cig gis ni bdag nyid dag / lha mo phyir zlog rim pa ste/ /zhal bzhi pa las phyag bcu drug /gdug pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i/ /bgegs ni
220a2(rgyud): pad+ma'i 'og mnan nas/ /g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis bzhugs/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus na gnas/ /dkar zhing sngo la dmar dang ser/ /steng gi zhal gyis rnam par
220a3(rgyud): brgyan| |rgyan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs/ /na bza' dkar ba'i rgyan dang ldan/ /sangs rgyas lnga yi dbu rgyan can/ /'chi ba yang dag 'tsho ba'i mchog/ spyan gsum
220a4(rgyud): pa la 'jam pa'i ngag / gzhan ni gdug cing gtum pa la/ /sdigs mdzub rdo rje gsor mdzad cing / /dril bu zhags pa 'dzin pa'i mchog /rdo rje ral gri mdung dang ni/ /dgra
220a5(rgyud): sta thod pa lcags kyu dang / /gzhu dang kha T+wAM ga 'dzin cing / /mda' ni dam pa 'gongs par byed/ /tho ba 'khor lo mi 'jigs pa/ /dngos grub thams cad rab stsol ba'o//
220a6(rgyud): yang na 'di la zhal brgyad pa/ /g.yas dang g.yon pa'i ngos dag tu/ /g.yas pa sngo zhing dmar la ser/ /drag shul ha har bzhad pa'o/ /g.yon pa ljang zhing dmar ba
220a7(rgyud): dang / /dud ka dag gi mdog can yin/ /steng ni mdzes shing zhi ba ste/ /sku lus zla ba'i mdog can no/ /de yi thugs kar 'khor lo ni/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus
220b1(rgyud): dag tu| |dad pas shin tu mnyam bzhag ste/ /'chi ba 'tsho ba'i rig sngags bzla/ /oM a mr-i ta saM dzI ba ni/ ma hA a mr-i ta su mu khe dzI baM/ pra be sha ya phra be sha ya/ sarba badzra pad+ma
220b2(rgyud): sa ma yo ga mA ya/ bo d+hi tsit+ta bas bi ta mU rti huM hUM/ a A| aM a haM swAhA/ 'di ni khri tsam bzlas byas pas/ /'chi ba thams cad 'tsho bar byed/ /dus min 'chi ba zhi 'gyur
220b3(rgyud): zhing / /'chi ba las ni nges par slong / /gzhan du rnal 'byor ma dgyes nas/ /rmad du byung bar mdzad pa ni/ /so so nas ni gang mdzad cing / /hi hi dag gis dga' ba dang //
220b4(rgyud): ho ho dag gis dgyes pa dang / /he he dag gis tshig ta smra/ /huM huM dag gis rdzogs pa'o/ /huM huM dag ni bsam gtan no/ /phaT phaT dag gis gsod pa dang / /hUM hUM dag
220b5(rgyud): gis phur bu'o/ /dzaHdzaH dag gis legs par drongs/ /sa sa dag ni bden par byed/ /nges par legs so zhes pa'i sgra'o/ /huM baM dag ni gsod pa 'o/ /hUM b+hUM hUM hUM hUM
220b6(rgyud): dag ni thal bar rlog pa'o/ /ha ha dag gis gsal bar byed pa'o/ /b+huM b+huM dag ni gzi byin byed/ /hrI hrIM dag gis legs par drongs/ /t+r+ya t+r+yaM dag ni mchod pa'o/ /saM saM dag
220b7(rgyud): gis dngos grub thams cad kyi 'bras bu ster ba'o/ /hi hi dag ni rmongs pa'o/ /laM laM dag ni shis pa'o/ /di di dag ni 'dzin pa'o/ /dzi dzi dag ni legs par drongs/ /huM
221a1(rgyud): huM dag ni 'khor ba 'o/ /hri hri dag ni gsod pa 'o/ /dzAM dzAM dag ni rmugs par mdzad pa 'o/ /ho ho mdzad pa rjes su chags par bya'o/ /haM haM dag
221a2(rgyud): ni srung ba 'o/ /ho ho dag ni dgyes pa 'o/ /TaM TaM dag ni gdug pa 'o/ /g+hUM g+hUM dag ni me tog go /gaM gaM ni/ dri'o/ /raM raM ni/ gsang ba'o/ /'di dag ji lta'i rim pa yis//
221a3(rgyud): zhi ba la sogs cho ga yi/ /rim pa 'di la rjes su gnas/ /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ /'chi ba slong bar byed pa'i las thams cad byed pa
221a4(rgyud): sgom pa bstan pa ste le'u nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o/ / //de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /sngags kyi de nyid cho ga'i rim/ /rdo rje snying pos bshad pa ste//
221a5(rgyud): gsang ba kun gyi mchog tu bshad/ /rnal 'byor ma yi bde ba mchog /rnal 'byor ma yi brgyud pa'i rim/ /gsang zhing gsang la mchog tu gsang / /bskyed
221a6(rgyud): pa'i rim pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /bsam gtan sgom pa'i mchog yin te/ /bdag nyid he ru kar byas nas/ /mkha' 'gro mas ni yongs su khyab/ /sku lus dmar
221a7(rgyud): po 'jigs pa che/ /ye shes lnga las nges byung ba/ /dmar zhing sngo la ljang ba dang / /ser zhing zhi la steng zhal dkar/ /spyan gsum pa la phyag bcu gnyis/ /g.yas
221b1(rgyud): brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis bzhugs/ /'jigs byed che dang dus mtshan dag /skyabs su 'ongs nas zhabs 'og gnon/ /phyag rgya drug dang zla ba phyed/ /sna tshogs rdo rje ral pa 'chang //
221b2(rgyud): glang po'i pags pa gos su banabs/ /rdo rje dril bu mnyam par ldan/ /ral gri mdung ni 'jigs pa'i mchog /thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin/ /zhags pa lcags kyu 'chang ba'i
221b3(rgyud): mchog |cang te'u tshangs pa'i mgo bo dang / /mgo bo'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can/ /sangs rgyas lnga yis rnam par brgyan/ /de mdun rdo rje
221b4(rgyud): phag mo ni/ /de yi mdog dang phyag mtshan 'dzin/ /zhags pa lcags kyu 'chang ba'i mchog /cang te'u tshangs pa'i mgo bo dang / /mgo bo'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /byin
221b5(rgyud): pa gnyis kyis legs par 'khril/ /gnyis med sbyor ba mnyam ldan pa/ /phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan/ /k+Sha yi ye shes las byung ba/ /de yi sku dang zhal phyag mtshan//
221b6(rgyud): zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /ye shes sems dpa' rnam par bsgom/ /bcu gnyis cha las nges 'byung ba/ /dam tshig sems dpa' bde ba che/ /thams cad mkhyen
221b7(rgyud): r+pa nges 'byung ba/ /sngags kyi rgyud ni 'di ru bzla/ /oM shrI badzra he he ru ru kaM /a A/ i I/ u U/ e ai/ o au/ /aM aH/ DA ki nI dzA la saM ba raM huM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM a A a
222a1(rgyud): aHhUM hUM phaT/ snying po dang / nye ba'i snying po'o/ /oM badzra bA ra hi a A/ i I/ u U/ e ai/ o au/ aM aHhUM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM badzra bai ro
222a2(rgyud): tsa nI ye a A aM AH huM hUM phaT swAhA/ lha mo'i snying po dang / nye ba'i snying po'o/ /oM DA kI nI r-iM huM hUM phaT/ oM lA me r-IM huM hUM phaT/ oM khaN+Da ro he l-iM huM hUM phaT/ oM ru pi
222a3(rgyud): NI ye l-IM huM hUM phaT/ oM khaN+Da kA pA la kaM huM hUM phaT/ oM praM huM hUM phaT/ oM gaM kA la khaM huM hUM phaT/ oM tsaM huM hUM phaT/ oM ma hA kaM kA la kaM huM hUM phaT/ oM praM huM hUM phaT/ oM bi ka Ta
222a4(rgyud): daMSh+Ti Ne g+haM huM hUM phaT/ oM maM huM hUM phaT/ oM su ra bai ri Ni daM daM huM hUM phaT/ oM bIM huM hUM phaT/ oM a mi tA b+hA tsaM huM hUM phaT/ oM khaM huM hUM phaT| oM badzra pra b+hA tsha huM hUM phaT/ oM laM huM hUM phaT/ oM badzra
222a5(rgyud): de ha dzaM huM hUM phaT/ oM huM huM hUM phaT/ oM a ku ri kaM dz+ha huM hUM phaT/ oM ai huM hUM phaT/ oM badzra dzA Ti la nyaM huM hUM phaT/ oM maM huM hUM phaT/ oM ma hA bI ra TaM hUM hUM phaT/ oM baM huM hUM phaT/ oM
222a6(rgyud): badzra hUM kA ra ThaM huM hUM phaT/ oM suM huM hUM phaT/ oM su b+ha dra TaM huM hUM phaT/ oM Sh+T+raM huM hUM phaT/ oM badzra b+ha dra D+haM huM hUM phaT/ oM suM huM hUM phaT/ mahA b+he ra ba NaM huM hUM phaT/ oM haM huM hUM phata/ oM
222a7(rgyud): bi ru pAk+Sha taM huM hUM phaT/ oM khaM huM hUM phaT/ oM ma hA ba la thaM huM hUM phaT/ oM tsaM huM hUM phaT/ oM rat+na badzra daM huM hUM phaT/ oM khaM huM hUM phaT/ oM ha ya gri ba d+haM huM hUM phaT/ oM shoM huM hUM phaT/ oM
222b1(rgyud): A gA sha gar+b+ha naM huM hUM phaT/ oM tsaM huM hUM phaT/ oM he ru ka baM huM hUM phaT/ oM suM huM hUM phaT/ oM pad+ma nir+t+ne shwa ra phaM huM hUM phaT/ oM maM huM hUM phaT/ oM bai ro tsa na baM huM hUM phaT/ oM tsuM huM hUM phaT/
222b2(rgyud): oM badzra satwa b+haM huM hUM phaT/ oM maM huM hUM phaT/ oM yaM huM hUM phaT/ oM raM huM hUM phaT/ oM laM huM hUM phaT/ oM baM huM hUM phaT/ oM shaM huM hUM phaT/ oM ShaM huM hUM phaT/ oM saM huM hUM phaT/ oM haM huM hUM phaT/ 'di
222b3(rgyud): dag ni dpa' bo dang / rnal 'byor ma'i 'khor gyi snying po'i gsang sngags gsang ba'i mchog tu gyur pa/ de nyid sbas pa 'khor lo gsum gyi yin te/ thugs kyi 'khor lo'i dpa' bo dmar/ /mkha'
222b4(rgyud): 'gro ma ni sngon po ste/ /rdo rje dril bu mnyam par ldan/ /'jigs byed chen po bzhin rnam sgyur/ /zhe sdang gis khyab bde chen po/ /gsung gi 'khor lo dpa' bo dkar/ /mkha' 'gro ma
222b5(rgyud): ni dmar po ste/ /pad+ma dril bu mnyam par ldan/ /'dod chags kyis khyab bde chen po/ /sku yi 'khor lo'i dpa' bo ser/ /mkha' 'gro ma dkar me yi mdog /gti mug gis
222b6(rgyud): khyab bde ba che/ /mkha' 'gro ma sogs lha mo rnams/ /sna tshogs mdog can snod chen po'o/ /khwa gdong la sogs lha mo rnams/ /dmar ser dkar la ljang gu'o/ /gshin rje
222b7(rgyud): sreg sogs lha mo rnams/ /sngo zhing ser la ljang ba dang / /de bzhin dkar ba'i mdog can no/ /'khor la sogs pa thams cad kun/ spyan gsum g.yas brkyangs zhabs kyis
223a1(rgyud): bzhugs/ /dpa' bo stag gi bags mnabs shing / /lha mo thams cad gcer bu ste/ /skra grol ba ni rnam par mdzes/ /byin pa
223a2(rgyud): gnyis kyis legs par 'khril/ /dum bu'i rgyan gyi ska rags can/ /thams cad thod ba'i phreng ba 'chang / /phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan/ /thod pa kha T+wAM ga 'dzin
223a3(rgyud): cing / /dpa' bo dang ni lha mo rnams/ /thod pa rdo rje pad+ma dang / /'khor lo yang ni de bzhin no/ /mkha' 'gro ma sogs khwa gdong dang / /gshin tu sreg sogs lha mo
223a4(rgyud): rnams| |thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin/ /me long dri dang ro dang reg /gos mchog yid du 'ong ba dang / /cang te'u dang ni dril bu 'dzin/ /mkha' 'gro ma ni thod pa dang / /kha T+wAM
223a5(rgyud): ga yang 'dzin mdzad cing / /dril bu cang te'u gri gug bsnabs/ /khwa gdong la sogs lha mo rnams/ /phyag mtshan 'di yis rab tu brtag /thams cad yi dwags gdan
223a6(rgyud): la bzhugs/ /phyogs kyi gos ni 'dzin pa'i mchog /thugs kyi 'khor lo drag po ste/ /gsung gi 'khor lo bskyod pa'i zhal/ /sku yi 'khor lo zhi ba ste/ /mkha' 'gro
223a7(rgyud): ma ni bzhin rnam sgyur/ /ji ltar 'dod bzhin bsgoms nas ni/ /dbus kyi gtso bor rnam par brtag /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' 'am/ /khro bo sna tshogs du
223b1(rgyud): ma 'am| |kha cig de bzhin gshegs pa 'am/ /ma mo rigs kyi khyad par dang / /'od zer can nam skul byed ma/ /shes rab pha rol phyin de bzhin/ /gang dang gang dag sgom
223b2(rgyud): pa ni| |yid kyi dbang po sbyor ba dag / de yis dregs par byas pa ni/ /sna tshogs gzugs can rin chen bzhin/ /yang na rdo rje sems dpa' ni/ /sna tshogs gzugs kyis
223b3(rgyud): 'gro bar gnas/ /thams cad mkhyen cing thams cad mdzad/ /bde ba chen pos kun khyab yin/ /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ rnal 'byor ma'i gsang
223b4(rgyud): ba'i dam tshig gi de kho na nyid kyi sgom pa bstan pa ste le'u nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o/ / //de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /mkha' 'gro rigs kyi cho ga'i
223b5(rgyud): rim| |sna tshogs du ma'i rigs su bshad/ /mdor bsdus na ni gsum dang ldan/ /drug tu yang ni rab tu grags/ /rnal 'byor sbyor ba'i bla ma ste/ /mkha' 'gro ma 'khor la
223b6(rgyud): sogs kun/ /khams gsum dag ni ma lus pa/ /rigs las yang dag 'byung ba yin/ /sku kun so sor 'byung ba ste/ /gzhan du thams cad ma mo'i rigs/ /dga' zhing
223b7(rgyud): dgyes la yid 'ong pa/ /yid las skye zhing 'byung ba yin/ /bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po bde ba'i rigs kyi bdag pos de kho na nyid kyi gsang ba'i snying po'i sa bon
224a1(rgyud): 'di bshad cing bstan pa/ hUM bruM aM hrIM khaM baM/ de nas sngags chen bshad pa yis/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi sras po rnams// rab tu g.yo zhing
224a2(rgyud): brgyal nas kyang / /rdo rje ye shes rjes su dran/ /mi 'khrugs pa dang rtag pa'i rigs/ /rdo rje nyi ma de bzhin te/ /'od dpag med dang don yod grub/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde
224a3(rgyud): ba che| |'di ltar sangs rgyas sku lus kyang / /rdo rje mkha' 'gro rab tu grags/ /thog mar rdo rje mkha' 'gro ste/ /gnyis pa sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro yin/ /gsum pa rin
224a4(rgyud): chen mkha' 'gro ste/ /bzhi pa pad+ma'i mkha' 'gro yin/ /lnga pa sna tshogs mkha' 'gro ste/ /drug pa rdo rje sems dpa' yin/ /lnga po he ru kar shes bya/ /rdo rje dpa' bo yang de
224a5(rgyud): nyid| |nam mkha'i zas kyis longs spyod cing / /zla ba'i zas kyi longs kyang spyod/ /sprul pa'i longs spyod nam mkha' ste/ /pad+ma'i zas kyi longs spyod kyang / /sna tshogs longs
224a6(rgyud): spyod sprul pa ste/ /sna tshogs rigs kyi mchog dam pa/ /mkha' mnyam dri med rnam par dag /gangs kyi rang bzhin lta bur bsil/ /dag pa'i mdog can mchog gi mdog /zla ba'i zer
224a7(rgyud): dang 'dra ba'i mchog / spyan gsum skal pa sna tshogs bzang / /sna tshogs pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs/ /zla ba nyi ma'i dbus na gnas/ /rdo rje skyil mo krung du bzhugs/ /
224b1(rgyud): thams cad ral pa'i cod pan can/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'ang de bzhin te/ /phyag rgya drug ni thams cad rgya/ /rang gi gdan la legs par bzhugs/ /glang po seng+ge rta dang ni/ /rma bya
224b2(rgyud): dang ni nam mkha' lding / /de yi steng du yi dwags gdan/ /bsgoms na dngos grub rab tu stsol/ /rdo rje lag gis sa la reg /rdo rje dril bu dkur brten cing / /zhal gyi mchu ni
224b3(rgyud): rnam par bsgyur/ /'khor lo dril bu 'gying dang bcas/ /rin chen dril bu'ang de bzhin te/ /pad+ma'i dril bu'i rim pa dang / /dril bu sna tshogs rdo rje nyid/ /thams cad snyems
224b4(rgyud): par rnam bsgoms te/ /rigs kyi rdo rje mchog dam pa/ /dkyil 'khor drug ni bri bar bya/ /sgo bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan/ /rdo rje 'khor los bskor ba ste/ /rin chen pad+mas de bzhin
224b5(rgyud): bskor| |sna tshogs rdo rjes bskor ba ste/ /dbus su rdo rjes bskor bar bya/ /phyi rol dkyil 'khor bri bar ni/ /khang pa brtsegs pa yid 'ong mchog /rigs drug dag ni rnam par
224b6(rgyud): dgod| |der ni gnas sogs rim pa dgod/ /dkyil 'khor dbus su dgod pa ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba che/ /de yi shar phyogs kyi sgo la/ /pu li ra ma yan thod pa'i dum
224b7(rgyud): bu dang / rab gtu ma ma'o/ /byang du dzA lan+d+ha ran keng rus chen po dang / gtum mig ma'o/ /nub tu au n+yan na keng rus can dang / 'od ldan ma'o/ /lho ru ar bu da na mche ba rnam
225a1(rgyud): par gtsigs pa dang / sna chen ma ste dbus su ni/ sa dang po rab tu dga' ba ste/ dpa' bo sku mdog nag po/ mkha' 'gro ma thal ba dang / sprin gyi
225a2(rgyud): mdog can/ dpa' bo ni/ rdo rje dang / rdo rje dril bu dang / mkha' 'gro ma ni/ thod pa dang / /rdo rje sdigs mdzub bo/ /rnam par snang mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor dbus su bcom
225a3(rgyud): ldan 'das sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro bde ba chen po'o/ /shar phyogs kyi sgor go da ba rin lha dgra dang / dpa' bo'i blo can ma'o/ /byang du rA me shwa ra na 'od dpag med dang /
225a4(rgyud): mi'u thung ma'o/ /nub du de bI ko Ta na rdo rje 'od dang / lang+ka'i dbang phyug ma'o/ /lho ru mA la ba na rdo rje sku dang / shing grib ma'o/ /dpa' bo'i sku lus dkar po/ mkha' 'gro ma
225a5(rgyud): ni ser po'o/ /dri ma med pa'i sa na dbus ma ste/ sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro ma'o/ /'od byed pa'i sa'i dbus na rin chen mkha' 'gro ste/ shar gyi sgo ru kA ma rU pa na myu
225a6(rgyud): gu can dang / sa srung ma'o/ /byang du o tre na rdo rje ral pa can dang / 'jigs byed chen mo'o/ /nub tu tri sha ku ni na dpa' bo chen po dang / rlung gi shugs can ma'o/ /lho
225a7(rgyud): ru ko sa la na rdo rje hUM mdzad dang / chang 'thung ma ste dpa' bo ser po/ mkha' 'gro ma ljang gu'o/ /'od 'gro ba'i sa'i dbus su pad+ma'i mkha' 'gro/ /de'i shar phyogs kyi
225b1(rgyud): sgor ka ling+ka na rab bzang dang / sngo bsangs lha mo'o/ /byang du laM pA ka na rdo rje bzang dang / rab bzang ma'o/ /nub tu kaM ci na 'jigs byed chen po dang / rta rna ma'o/ /lho ru hi ma la
225b2(rgyud): ya na mig mi bzang dang / bya gdong ma ste/ dpa' bo dmar po/ /mkha' 'gro ma ni/ dkar mo'o/ /sbyang dka' ba'i dbus su rdo rje mkha' 'gro /de'i shar gyi sgor pre ta pu rin stobs
225b3(rgyud): po che dang / 'khor lo'i shugs can ma'o/ /byang du gri ha de ba ta na rdo rje rin chen dang / dum skyes ma'o/ /nub tu sau rASh+Ta na rta mgrin dang / chang tshong ma'o/ /lho ru su bar+Na dwI pa na
225b4(rgyud): nam mkha'i snying po dang / 'khor lo'i go cha ma'o/ /dpa' bo nag po/ mkha' 'gro ma ser mo'o/ /mngon du gyur pa'i sa'i dbus su sna tshogs mkha' 'gro /de'i shar phyogs
225b5(rgyud): kyi sgor na ga ra na he ru ka dang / ra ba dpa' mo'o/ /byang du sin+d+hu na pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug dang / stobs chen ma'o/ /nub tu ma ru tan rnam par snang mdzad dang / 'khor los
225b6(rgyud): bsgyur ma'o/ /lho ru ku lu tA na rdo rje sems dpa' dang / brtson chen mo ste/ dpa' bo ni/ sna tshogs kyi mdog can la/ mkha' 'gro ma dud pa'i mdog can no/ /dkyil 'khor
225b7(rgyud): de yi phyi rol tu/ /yi dwags phreng bas yongs su bskor/ /de yi phyi rol kun rdo rje/ /zur du mkha' 'gro ma yang bri/ /mkha' 'gro ma dang lA ma dang / /dum skyes ma dang gzugs
226a1(rgyud): can ma| |thod pa bzhi ni mtshams su bri/ /dbus kyi dkyil 'khor mtshams su ni/ /ring du song sa mkha' 'gro ma/ /lA ma mi g.yo ba yi sa/ /
226a2(rgyud): legs pa'i blo gros dum skyes ma/ /gzugs can ma ni chos kyi sprin/ /sngo zhing ser la ljang ba dang / /bzhi pa dmar ba'i mdog can yin/ /khwa gdong la sogs mkha'
226a3(rgyud): 'gro ma| |sna tshogs mdog can yid 'phrog ma/ /gshin rje sreg sogs mkha' 'gro ma/ /phyed ni bud med dbang phyug zhal/ /dpa' bo thams cad g.yas brkyang gnas/ /
226a4(rgyud): phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan/ /stag gi pags pa gos su mnabs/ /mgo bo'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /phyogs kyi gos 'chang skra grol ba/ /yid 'ong mkha'
226a5(rgyud): 'gro ma yi rigs/ /thams cad yi dwags steng du bzhugs/ /dkyil 'khor mchog ni rnam par bsgoms/ /pad+ma la gnas 'khor lo ni/ /dkyil 'khor sdom pa'i
226a6(rgyud): mchog yin no/ /thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin/ /cang te'u ni phyag g.yas na/ /'di ltar mkha' 'gro ma yi gzugs/ /phyag mtshan dag gis rnam par brgyan/ /khwa gdong
226a7(rgyud): la sogs mkha' 'gro ma/ /lcags kyu zhags pa la sogs mtshan/ /g.yon par kha T+wAM g.yas par ni/ /ji srid zhags pa lcags sgrog dang / /dril bu yang ni de bzhin
226b1(rgyud): no| |gshin rje sreg sogs mkha' 'gro ma/ /me long dang ni pi wang dang / /dri dang ro ni g.yas pa na/ /g.yon pa thod pa kha T+wAM ga /dngos grub thams cad rab stsol ba'i/ /rang
226b2(rgyud): gi rigs kyi dbu rgyan can/ /thod pa'i steng na yang dag gnas/ /'khor lo so sor bsgoms nas ni/ /'khor dang bcas pas yongs su khyab/ /ye shes sems dpa'
226b3(rgyud): thugs kar blta/ /rnal 'byor kun gyi sbyor ba yis/ /ye shes 'khor lo de mthong nas/ /bsgoms pas thim par byas nas su/ /sku gsung thugs kyi ye shes kyis/ /dbang
226b4(rgyud): bskur nas ni rim par spro/ /oM AHbaM hUM/ 'di dag ji lta'i rim pa yis/ /srog dang stsol ba rim pas bya/ /mnyam par spros nas dbang bskur sbyin/ /ji ltar rim pa'i
226b5(rgyud): sbyor ba yis/ /dogs pa med par bzlas bsgom bya/ /ji ltar gsang sngags rjes mthun par/ /dam tshig can gyis bzlas pa bya/ /hUM bruM/ oM hrIM khaM baM/ oM a baM hUM/ oM shrI
226b6(rgyud): ma hA su khaM badzra satwa DA ki nI dzA la shaM ba raM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM shrI bud+d+ha DA ka a la la la aHhUM DA ki nI dzA la shaM bar hUM phaT swAhA/ oM shrI rat+na DA ki trAM aM a DA ki nI dzA la saM baM
226b7(rgyud): raM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM shrI pad+ma DA ki hrIM hrIM a huM a huM DA ki nI dzA la shaM ba raM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM shrI badzra DA ki aHhUM phaT DA ki nI dzA la shaM ba raM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM shrI bi shwa DA ki ho khaM A
227a1(rgyud): hUM DA ki ni dzA la saM ba ra hUM phaT swAhA/ oM khaM hUM phaT/ oM praM hUM phaT/ oM kaM hUM phaT/ oM kaM tsaM hUM phaT/ oM maM hUM phaT/ oM praM hUM phaT/ oM baM hUM phaT/

227b2(rgyud): snang rdo rje nyi ma dang / /pad+ma gar dbang rgyal po dang / /dbang phyug rta mchog he ru ka /gnas sogs pa yi sbyor ba yis/ /mkhas pas nges par bsgoms nas ni/ /rim par sbyor

227b5(rgyud): nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /rnal 'byor lam ni rnyed dka' ba/ /rnal 'byor ma yi sbyor snying po/ /gzhan gyi rnal 'byor rjes mthun par/ /yi ge las byung gcag car
227b6(rgyud): tshul| |gcig car mtshan ma phyag mtshan yin/ /gcig car rdo rje sems dpa' ste/ /bde ba chen po bla na med/ /de ru 'jug cing de yi tshul/ /gcig car he ru ka dpal
227b7(rgyud): mchog / ston ka'i nam mkha' dri med ltar/ /zar ma'i me tog dang mtshungs pa/ /phyag brgyad pa la zhal bzhi pa/ /'jigs shing rab tu 'jigs par mdzad/ /g.yas brkyang ba
228a1(rgyud): la zhabs kyis bzhugs/ /spyan gsum rnal 'byor ma yi gtso/ /zhal gdong g.yon dkar g.yas dmar te/ /steng gi zhal ni ser la mdzes
228a2(rgyud): dpa' bo thod pa'i phreng ba can/ /sangs rgyas lnga yi byin rlabs can/ /stag gi pags pa gos su banabs/ /mgo bo'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /'jigs byed dang ni
228a3(rgyud): dus mtshan dag / zhabs kyis pad+mar gnon par bzhugs/ /rdo rje dril bu mnyam pas 'khyud/ /phag mo yis ni byin pas 'khril/ /gnyis mad sbyor pa mnyam ldan
228a4(rgyud): pas| |dbu skra grol ba phyogs gos can/ /sku mdog mnyam zhing mtshungs par ldan/ /dum bu'i rgyan gyi ska rags can/ /de yi zhal dang phyag mtshan can/ /rnal 'byor
228a5(rgyud): dngos grub rab tu stsol/ /thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin/ /rgyal ba'i pags pa steng du ste/ /tho ba mdung ste gzhan du ni/ /tshangs pa'i mgo po brgyan pa la/ /zla ba phyed sa zhi ba
228a6(rgyud): 'dzin| |sna tshogs rdo rje dbu la brgyan/ /phyag rgya drug gis sku la brgyan/ /rdo rje mtshan ma dag gis brgyan/ /rdo rje phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can/ /'og pag dag gis ska rags
228a7(rgyud): byas| |dpung rgyan rdo rje mtshan pa ste/ /sngags pa'i gtso bos gsang sngags ni/ /'di ltar cho ga'i snying po shes/ /phag mo bde bar gnas pa ni/ /rgyal ba'i pags pa
228b1(rgyud): rnam par spangs/ /phag mo rgyal ba'i mtshan sogs las/ /cang te'u gri gug rnams kyis brgyan/ /bcom ldan 'das ni lte ba'i dbus/ /pad+ma 'dab brgyad yid 'ong ba/ /
228b2(rgyud): sna tshogs pad+ma mdog mdzes la/ /thams cad rnam dag mchog dam pa/ /shar gyi 'dab sogs phyogs cha la/ /mkha' 'gro ma sogs bzhi po dgod/ /shar du mkha'
228b3(rgyud): 'gro ma dgod cing / /byang du lA ma de bzhin te/ /nub tu dum skyes ma yin no/ /lho ru gzugs can ma yin te/ /sngo dang ser dang de bzhin dmar/ /ljang gu dag ni bzhi pa 'o/ /
228b4(rgyud): zhal bzhi pa la phyag brgyad pa/ /spyan gsum drag po gzi brjid can/ /skyil mo krung ni phyed par bzhugs/ /skra grol ba ni yid 'ong ba/ /phyogs kyi gos can mgo yi phreng //
228b5(rgyud): phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan/ /thod pa kha T+wAM ga 'dzin cing / /dril bu cang te'u gri gug dang / /de bzhin gzhu dang mda' 'dzin cing / /rdo rje mdung mchog phyag na 'dzin//
228b6(rgyud): snyems pa'i phyag gis gar mdzad cing / /thugs rje chags pas rnam par myos/ /sngo ba dang ni ser ba dang / /ljang gu steng gi zhal dkar po/ /ser zhing sngo la ljang ba dang //
228b7(rgyud): steng gi zhal gdong drag la dmar/ /dmar dang sngo dang ljang ba dang / /steng gi zhal ni dkar la zhi/ /ljang dang dmar dang sngo ba dang / /steng gi zhal ni ser po mchog /bdud
229a1(rgyud): bzhi bo ni zhabs kyis gnon/ /bcom ldan 'das la gdong gis lta/ /zur gyi char ni bum pa dag /ye shes bdud rtsis yongs gang ba/ /de yi
229a2(rgyud): steng du thong pa ni/ /byang chub 'o mas rab gang ba/ /phyi rol dam tshig gsum 'khor la/ /khang pa brtsegs pa legs par mdzes/ /shar phyogs su ni gau rI ste/ /byang du de
229a3(rgyud): bzhin tsau ri ma/ /nub tu rab rmongs ma yin no/ /lho ru yang ni ro langs ma/ /me la spos byed ma yin te/ /bden bral du ni gtum mo yin/ /rlung phyogs sme mo nyid yin te//
229a4(rgyud): dbang ldan he ru ka ma ste/ /de bzhin rnal 'byor ma brgyad ni/ /dkar mo ser la sngo ljang gu/ /skul byed dmar la sngo ljang gu/ /rab rmongs ma ni sngo ser ljang / /ro langs
229a5(rgyud): ma ni dkar sngo ljang / /spos byed ma ni sna tshogs mdog /dmar dang sngo dang ljang gu'o/ /gtum mo yang ni ljang sngo ser/ /sme mo yang ni dud sngo ljang / /he ru ka ma sngo ljang
229a6(rgyud): dmar| |'di ltar de dag thams cad kyang / /spyan gsum pa la skra grol ba/ /phyogs kyi gos 'chang gar dang bcas/ /yi dwags gdan la legs par bzhugs//

229b1(rgyud): phan byas/ /'di ltar gnas dang nye gnas kyi/ /dngos grub thams cad rab tu stsol/ /'di ltar thugs kyi 'khor lo ni/ /lha mo dkar mo la sogs pa/ /rnal 'byor ma ni
229b2(rgyud): rab tu bshad/ /bsnyen pas bka' drin stsol mdzad de/ /thogs pa med pa'i 'bras bu 'grub/ /lha mo mkha' spyod grub nas ni/ /mkha' la spyod pa'i go 'phang rnyed/ /de
229b3(rgyud): yi phyi rol gsung 'khor lo/ /shar du pi paM stangs thabs ma/ /byang du gling bu'i stangs thabs ma/ /nub tu rdza rnga che stangs thabs/ /lho ru rdza rnga'i stangs stabs te/ /sngo dang ser
229b4(rgyud): dang dmar ljang gu/ /me sogs rdo rje bzhad ma ste/ /rdo rje sgeg mo rdo rje glu/ /rdo rje gar te dmar ba dang / /sngo dang ser dang ljang gu'o/ /de dag zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa/ /gcer
229b5(rgyud): bu dbu skra grol ba dang / /thod pa yi ni phreng ba can/ /spyan gsum pa la yid 'ong ba/ /thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin/ /tsham ngam lag pa'i stangs thabs kyis/ /rdo rje dril bu stangs

229b7(rgyud): yi 'khor lo'i shar du ni/ /me tog ma byang bdug pa ma/ /nub tu mar me lho ru dri/ /ser dang dud ka dmar dkar po/ /me long ro dang reg bya chos/ /me phyogs la sogs mtshams
230a1(rgyud): bzhi ste| |zla ba'i mdog can dmar ljang dkar/ /de dag spyan ni gsum pa ste/ /gcer bu dbu skra grol ba dang / /zhabs kyis kun tu gar
230a2(rgyud): byed cing / /phyag tu mchod pa thogs nas ni/ /thod pa kha T+wAM ga 'dzin cing / /cang te'u ni phyag ni bsnams/ /thod pa yi ni phreng ba can/ /lha mo de dag 'du sa dang / /nye ba'i
230a3(rgyud): 'du sa dur khrod dang / /nye ba'i dur khrod dag yin te/ /rnam par snang mdzad dbu rgyan byas/ /sgo rnams rdo rje lcags kyu dang / /rdo rje zhags pa rdo rje sgrog /rdo rje dril bu de
230a4(rgyud): bzhin te/ /sngo dang ljang dang dmar dang ser/ /shar dang byang dang nub dang ni/ /lho yi phyogs kyang de bzhin no/ /me la sogs pa'i mtshams su ni/ /gshin rje sreg la

230a7(rgyud): rim pas rjes su gnas/ /de yi snying gar ye shes sems/ /sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo gsum/ /gtso bo'i bdag po bsgom par bya/ /dkar dang dmar dang sngo ba
230b1(rgyud): yod| |dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma lhan cig / ji lta bu yis bsgoms pa ni/ /rjes su bstan pa'i sgom pa las/ /ye shes lcags kyu dag gis ni/ /ye shes 'khor lo bkug nas

230b7(rgyud): phaT| oM badzra bi ne huM hUM phaT/ oM badzra baM she huM hUM phaT/ oM badzra mr-i daM ge huM hUM phaT/ oM badzra muM ra dze huM hUM phaT/ oM badzra hA s+ye huM hUM phaT/ oM badzra lA s+ye huM hUM phaT/ oM badzra gI te huM
231a1(rgyud): hUM phaT/ oM badzra nri t+ye huM hUM phaT/ oM badzra puSh+pe huM hUM phaT/ oM badzra d+hu pe huM hUM phaT/ oM badzra dI pe hUM hUM phaT/ oM badzra gan+d+he huM hUM phaT/ oM rU pa
231a2(rgyud): badzri huM hUM phaT/ oM ra sa badzri huM hUM phaT/ oM spaR+Sha badzri huM hUM phaT/ oM d+harma d+ha tu badzri huM hUM phaT/ oM badzra aM ku sha dzaH huM hUM phaT/ oM badzra pA sha huM hUM phaT/ oM badzra s+pho Ta
231a3(rgyud): baM huM hUM phaT/ oM badzra A be sha hoH huM hUM phaT/ oM ya ma dA D+hi ye huM hUM phaT/ oM ya ma dU tI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM ya ma daMSh+Ti NAM ye huM hUM phaT/ oM ya ma ma tha nI ye huM hUM

231a6(rgyud): kyang / /sa rnams gsum po ma lus par/ /thams cad der ni bsdus nas kyang / /sku gsung thugs la rnam par gnas/ /'di ni rnal 'byor cho ga ste/ /'khor lo

231b1(rgyud): bo dang ni rnal 'byor ma/ /mkha' 'gro dang ni mkha' 'gro ma/ /kun gyis gsol ba gdab par bya/ /khro bo bde ba'i dgyes pa yi/ /longs spyod las ni byung ba yi/ /rab rmongs ma
231b2(rgyud): yis bsnyen byas nas/ /bde ba'i sbyor ba la zhugs te/ /ra ma he nad+Ta Na su ra A ma hA su hU ba ra dzo i ni ka ma la su hu/ a la la la ho/ /su ra a ut+ta ma ma hUM/ ma hA sidz+dza/ u
231b3(rgyud): ma dzo i ni dza la ma ho/ /a I/ A a ra ho/ /a ru he byi nu su ba ya nA he/ su ra a su hu de hi ba ra TA i ni/ dza la su hU bi sa pha na ta ro Na Na pa de hi ma hA su hU ma dz+dza mu hU mo
231b4(rgyud): k+Shu pa la ga kha u/ tut+tu sa hU na i su hUM/ badz+dzi u mo khu su hUM/ i na i du/ kha la tha i mo khu su hu/ ba su i paM ka u mdza ta nu na ba rA/ A pa da triM/ b+hu dza ta nu muny+ma
231b5(rgyud): hA su hU/ i la daR+pa ya/ u ma hU/ a ra bI a gi a paM u ra su/ 'di yis mgon po bskul na ni/ /dkyil 'khor dngos grub nges pa ste/ /snyan cing 'jam pa'i mgrin
231b6(rgyud): pa'i dbyangs/ /dpyid kyi rgyal po'i glu blangs pas/ /mkha' 'gro'i dra ba dri med rnams/ /gzigs shing las kun mdzad pa yin/ /rdo rje pad+ma yid 'ong ma/ /sbyor pas dngos grub
231b7(rgyud): thams cad 'grub/ /dgyes pa 'di yis bskul na ni/ /bde ba chen po stsol ba yin/ /sbyor ba yi ni dus dag tu/ /rdo rje can gyis rab tu sbyar/ /thog ma dbus dang mthar thug

232a3(rgyud): 'dod| |dngos grub thams cad gnas pa yin/ /oM badzra he ru ka sa ma ya ma nu pA la ya badzra he ru ka /twe no pa tiSh+Tha/ dri D+ho me b+ha ba/ su toSh+yo me b+ha ba/ a nu rak+to me b+ha
232a4(rgyud): b+ha ba| |su po Sh+yo me b+ha ba/ sarba sid+d+hi m+me pra yats+tsha/ sarba karma su tsa me tsit+taM shri yaH ku ru hUM/ ha ha ha ha ho/ /badzra he ru ka mA me muny+tsa he ru ka b+ha ba/ ma hA sa ma ya satwa aH
232a5(rgyud): hUM phaT swAhA/ 'di ni bcom ldan kun khyab cing / /yi ge brgya pa mchog gyur pa/ /he ru ka mchog rang nyid yin/ /phyir zlog pa ni gang yin pa/ /bcu drug 'dab ma la
232a6(rgyud): bkod cing / /rjes su bstan pa'i dkyil 'khor kun/ /bdag gis bsgoms shing brtan par bya/ /rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis/ /ji ltar bde bar gnas par bya/ /
232a7(rgyud): rnal 'byor 'di 'dra bsgoms na ni/ /khams gsum pa yang mthong 'gyur te/ /bdag nyid dpa' bo'i mtshan nyid de/ /de ltar srid ba'ang stong pa yin/ /bsgoms
232b1(rgyud): bas bdag nyid yang dag gnas/ /'dir ni dka' thub bshad pa med/ /phreng ba med cing sngags kyang med/ /gzungs dang sbyin sreg las rnams dang / /cho ga'i rim pa'i gzhi
232b2(rgyud): yang med/ /rnal 'byor phyag rgya byed pa'ang med/ /g.yas brkyang zhabs kyi rim pa'ang med/ /rdo rje chen po dngos 'dzin pa/ /rang byung dngos grub kun mdzad pa/ /'gog pa nyid
232b3(rgyud): kyang mdzad pa med/ /bdag nyid bdag gis mchod par bya/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gang ba ni/ /lte ba'i dbus su rnam par bsgom/ /yi ge gnas kyi mchog gyur pa/ /lha yi
232b4(rgyud): gzugs su sgom pa ni/ /de yi dbus su rnam par bsam/ /sku gsung thugs ni 'dus pa can/ /de yi lus las 'das gyur te/ /sems kyi dngos kyang btsal du med//
232b5(rgyud): chags pa med cing chags bral med/ /chags bral dang ni ldan gyur pa/ /snying gi pad+ma'i dbus su ni/ /brtags pas legs par rnyed pa ni/ /yid kyis ngal bsos byas
232b6(rgyud): pa ste| |rnal 'byor ma kun bud med yin/ /phyag rgya mchog tu bshad pa 'o/ /zla ba'i steng du brgya phyed rgyan/ /ye shes sems ni bsam pa ni/ /mchog ste spyad par bya ba med/ /bla
232b7(rgyud): ma'i man ngag lam dang ni/ /sems ni mchog tu 'bar ba yis/ /'di ltar zhi ba'i gnas de ni/ /'jig rten du mas ma rtogs te/ /sbyor dang sbyor ba bral byas nas/ /go 'phang
233a1(rgyud): gcig bus khyab pa yin/ /'di ltar byang chub 'bras bu rnyed par dka' ba ste/ /dang por dbyangs kyi yi ge las byung gzhan du yang / /steg dan
233a2(rgyud): gzhung lugs log pa'i blo gros de nyid ni/ /ma ning shes rab long ba gzugs bzhin 'bras bu med/ /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ /sku gsung thugs
233a3(rgyud): kyi gnas kyi rim pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'o/ / //de nas sbyor ba bshad bya ba/ /thod pa sangs rgyas mchog dam pa/ /de nyid sbyor ba kun gyi mchog /dngos
233a4(rgyud): grub thams cad rab stsol ba/ /gsang ba legs par sba bya zhing / /gang gis su la 'ang mi bstan to/ /de nyid mchog gi sgom pa gzung / /rnal 'byor ma yi snying la gnas//
233a5(rgyud): gsang ba bstan par sba bya zhing / /bla ma'i ngag ni bsgom par bya/ /dur khrod gnas ni yid 'ong ba/ /sgrub pa po yis nges bstan pa/ /bskyed pa'i rim pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /sa
233a6(rgyud): dang gnas kyi rim pa dang / /rdo rje lte ba'i dbus su ni/ /yi ge hUM ni bsgom par bya/ /de yis khyab par bdag nyid ni/ /sangs rgyas thod pa can gyi mchog /gnas med zhi
233a7(rgyud): zhing dag pa ste/ /rtog pa thams cad rnam spangs yin/ /A li kA li las rang byung / /gnyis med mchog tu zhi ba ste/ /phyag gnyis pa la zhal gcig pa/ /phyag rgya
233b1(rgyud): drug gis rnam par brgyan/ /'dzam bu'i mdog can mnyam pas khyab/ /'od zer phreng bas kun tu 'khrigs/ /thod ba'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can/ /spyan gsum pa la bzhad pa'i
233b2(rgyud): zhal| |sems dpa' kun gyi sgom pa ste/ /gnyis med chos ni bla na med/ /stag gi pags pa gos su banabs/ /na ra'i pags pa steng du brkyang / /thod pa dang ni kha twAM 'dzin/ /
233b3(rgyud): g.yas pa mi 'jigs phyag rgya can/ /sangs rgyas lnga yi dbu rgyan can/ /mgo bo'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /de yi phyag g.yon thod pa ni/ /rkang gis rab tu gang ba dang /
233b4(rgyud): sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir/ /ye shes 'chi med lngas bsres pa/ /kha T+wAM ga ni lha'i rnal 'byor/ /thod pa dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma/ /g.yas pa mi 'jigs dag pa ste/ /'jigs
233b5(rgyud): pa ma lus mi 'jigs grol/ /gdug cing 'jigs pa ma lus kun/ /'dir ni zhabs kyis gnon par mdzad/ /gdug pas 'jigs pa thams cad spong / /zla ba phyed pa zhi ba
233b6(rgyud): 'dzin| |sna tshogs rdo rje dbu la mtshan/ /rdo rje phreng bas dpral ba mdzes/ /rkang rgyan yid 'ong rgyan cha can/ /sna tshogs pad+ma 'dab brgyad kyi/ /lte ba'i dbus nas bzhengs pa ni//
233b7(rgyud): 'jigs byed dang ni dus mtshan dag /chags pa zhe sdang zhabs kyis gnon/ /ye shes sems dpa' de gzugs can/ /yi ge bruM las byung bar bsgom/ /thugs kyi 'khor lo
234a1(rgyud): snying ga ru/ /he ru ka ni rnam par bsgom/ /gsung gi 'khor lo kha la bsgom/ /sku yi 'khor lo snga ma bzhin/ /sngo dang dmar dang dkar ba dang / /
234a2(rgyud): phyag drug pa la zhal gsum pa/ /rdo rje dril bu mnyam par ldan/ /spyan gsum pa la bzhin rnam sgyur/ /thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin/ /rtse gsum pa dang thod pa 'chang / /rang
234a3(rgyud): rig lus dang yang dag 'dus/ /bde ba chen po'i go 'phang gnas/ /dkyil 'khor bzhi yi dbus dag tu/ /yi ge gsum sogs las byung ba/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu
234a4(rgyud): rgyan can/ /rang gi mtshan ma'i mchog dang ldan/ /gnas la sogs pa'i rim sbyor ba/ /sdom pa gsum gyi mchog dam pa/ /mkha' 'gro ma dang lA ma dang / /dum skyes ma
234a5(rgyud): dang gzugs can ma/ /pad+ma'i phyogs kyi gnas la dgod/ /thod pa bzhi po mchog yin te/ /mkha' 'gro ma ni kha dog ser/ /lA ma pa la sha yi mdog /dum skyes ma ni sngon po
234a6(rgyud): ste| |gzugs can ma ni dmar la 'bar/ /thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin/ /g.yas pa mi 'jigs mchog yin te/ /sgo rnams su ni lha mo bzhi/ /khwa gdong la sogs mkha'
234a7(rgyud): 'gro ma| |sngo dang ser dang de bzhin dmar/ /ljang gu drag po'i gzugs can no/ /mtshams su gshin rje sreg la sogs/ /rab 'jigs shin tu 'jigs pa ste/ /thod pa dang
234b1(rgyud): ni kha T+wAM 'dzin/ /mi 'jigs mchog kyang de bzhin te/ /cang te'u dang ni gri gug nyid/ /bdud ni bzhi po'i steng na bzhugs/ /spyan gsum pa la skra grol ba/ /phyogs kyi gos mchog
234b2(rgyud): 'dzin pa ste/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can/ /phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan/ /me long ro dang dri dang ni/ /reg gi mchod pa bzhi po ste/ /sa bcu dag ni rim pa dang / /sku gsung
234b3(rgyud): thugs kyi sbyor ba yis/ /phyi dang nang gi chos rnams kun/ /byang chub phyogs kyis rnam par dag /ka la sogs pa nyi shu bzhi/ /mgo la bin+dus mnan pa ste/ /gsal byed hUM
234b4(rgyud): gnyis dang yang sbyar/ /mthar ni phaT dang rab tu sbyar/ /dpa' bo kun gyi gsang sngags ni/ /'dod pa'i 'bras bu thams cad ster/ /gsal byed mkha' 'gro ma yi ming / /
234b5(rgyud): mthar ni hUM hUM phaT yin te/ /'di ltar rab gtum mkha' 'gro ma/ /sngags kyi de nyid bde ba ster/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ni/ /hUM AHoM/ 'di ni rab tu gsang ba ste/ /pad+ma'i
234b6(rgyud): 'dab la mkha' 'gro ma/ /gsal byed ma ning dang bcas pa/ /hUM ni gnyis pa nyid yin te/ /mkhas pas mthar ni phaT dang sbyar/ /kha gdong la sogs gsang sngags ni/ /ya
234b7(rgyud): ra la wa| gsal byed dang ni bcas pa ste/ /mthar ni hUM dang phaT dang sbyar/ /gshin rje sreg ma la sogs pa/ /sha Sha sa ha/ gsal byed dang ni hUM gnyis dang / /phaT kyang de
235a1(rgyud): bzhin sbyar bar bya/ /dbus su sangs rgyas thod pa yi/ /gsang sngags de bzhin rjes su dran/ /oM aM AM/ iM IM/ uM UM/ e ai/ aM aH Sha swA hA
235a2(rgyud): khams dang phung po skye mched la/ /go cha rnams ni sbyar bar bya/ /ye shes 'khor lo dam tshig dang / /mnyam pa'i ro yis mchod par bya/ /mchod pa bzhi po'i gsang sngags
235a3(rgyud): rnams| |rang ming gsal byed hUM byas te/ /'di ltar dkyil 'khor dag dang sbyar/ /sangs rgyas thod pa las byung ba/ /rdo rje rgyan ni bgos pa ste/ /thams cad rim pa bzhin
235a4(rgyud): du sbyar| |'thor 'thung du ni rab sbyar bas/ /gsang ba bzhi po bzla bar bya/ /spro dang bsdu ba'i sbyor ba yis/ /'khor lo gsum gyi rim pa dang / /'dir ni cho ga'i sbyor ba
235a5(rgyud): yis| |dus bzhi dag tu sbyar nas su/ /dam tshig 'khor lo'i bzlas pa bya/ /dam tshig mchog ni dngos grub 'gyur/ /dam tshig can gyi gsang sngags kun/ /sangs
235a6(rgyud): rgyas thod pa mchog yin te/ /mnyam par ma bzhag sbyor ba yis/ /'di ltar thams cad rab tu brtag /dam tshig rtag tu bskyang bya zhing / /ye shes 'chi med lnga yi mchog/
235a7(rgyud): yang na rang ming bzlas pa bya/ /sngags kyi de nyid bzlas par bya/ /oM shrI bud+d+ha ka pA li bruM AH hUM DA ki nI dzA la shaM ba raM hUM phaT swAhA/ 'di ni yid 'ong sbyor ba'i mchog /rnal 'byor
235b1(rgyud): ma yi ye shes mchog / gang du dam tshig nyams pa la/ /sbyor ba 'di ni sbyin par bya/ /zhi bar gyur nas bla med pa/ /rnal 'byor me yis dbang yang bskur/ /dus bzhi dag tu
235b2(rgyud): rim pa yis/ /phyi dang nang gi chus khrus bya/ /yang na dam tshig sdom pa blang / /bla ma la ni gsol ba gdab/ /bdag ni mi shes rmongs pa ste/ /dam tshig las ni 'gal
235b3(rgyud): zhing nyams/ /bla ma mgon pos skyabs mdzod cig /gtso bo rdo rje 'dzin pa ste/ /thugs rje chen po'i bdag nyid can/ /'gro ba'i gtso la skyabs su mchi/ /des ni the tshom
235b4(rgyud): med byas nas/ /nges par dngos grub can du 'gyur/ /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ dam tshig las ldang ba sangs rgyas thod pa bskyed pa ste le'u nyi shu
235b5(rgyud): rtsa drug pa'o/ / //de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /gsang ba'i de nyid rnyed dka' ba/ /gsang sngags kun ni bskyed pa dang / /'gro ba'i gnas dang 'gro ba
235b6(rgyud): dang / /rnal 'byor ma dang dpa' bo kun/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi gnas mchog yin/ /mi zad gnyis med rnam par dag /thog ma dbus mthar dri ma med/ /a yi ye shes
235b7(rgyud): las byung ba/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba che/ /zhal gsum phyag drug zhi ba ste/ /spyan gsum pa la thugs rje'i nyams/ /phyag rgya che dang yang dag ldan/ /rang bzhin dag cing
236a1(rgyud): dri ma med/ /ral pa zla phyed dbu la brgyan/ /sna tshogs rdo rjes dbu la mtshan/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can/ /sangs rgyas lnga yis rnam
236a2(rgyud): par brgyan/ /sems dpa' skyil mo krung gis bzhugs/ /phyag rgya drug gis rnam par brgyan/ /rdo rje dril bu mnyam par ldan/ /ral gri lcags kyu phyag na bsnams/ /rin
236a3(rgyud): chen zhags pa mdzes pa 'dzin/ /dngos grub thams cad rab tu stsol/ /dkar dang sngo dang dmar ba'i zhal/ /rnam thar gsum gyi gnas kyi mchog /ye shes sems
236a4(rgyud): dpa' snying ga ru/ /'khor lo gsum gyi mchog kyang sgom/ /hUM las thugs kyi 'khor lo ste/ /de yi phyag mtshan sngon po dang / /AH las gsung gi 'khor lo ste/ /de
236a5(rgyud): yi phyag mtshan dmar po 'o/ /oM las sku yi 'khor lo ste/ /de yi phyag mtshan dkar po yin/ /dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma mnyam sbyor/ /sku gsung thugs ni dri ma med/ /raM
236a6(rgyud): las phyag rgya chen po ste/ /lte ba'i dbus su rnam par bsam/ /i las b+ha ga pad+ma ste/ /byang chub zla ba dri ma med/ /u ni snying gar bsam pa ste/ /e ni mgo la rnam par
236a7(rgyud): dgod| |e ni spyi gtsug dag tu dgod/ /aM ni mig tu dgod pa ste/ /i ni go char byas nas su/ /a ni mdun gyi mtshon cha'o/ /l-i las lha mo spyan yin te/ /r-i las
236b1(rgyud): dam tshig sgrol ma yin/ /l-I las lha mo gos dkar mo/ /r-I las rin chen yang dag 'byung / /rin chen sgron dang ye shes sgron/ /dkar zhing pa la sha yi mdog /dmar zhing
236b2(rgyud): dzam bu chu bo'i mdog / zhal gsum pa la phyag drug pa/ /spyan gsum dgyes pas rnam par myos/ /thams cad phyogs kyis gos can te/ /rang gi thabs dang mnyam par
236b3(rgyud): ldan| |'khor lo sna tshogs rdo rje dang / /pad+ma dmar po rin chen dang / /rdo rje dril bu lhan cig sbyar/ /'dod pa thams cad rab tu stsol/ /ral gri mda' dang lcags kyu 'dzin//
236b4(rgyud): gzhu ni 'gugs par 'dzin pa ste/ /mtshan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs/ /thod pa yi ni cod pan can/ /sna tshogs pad+ma'i dbus su ni/ /sems dpa'i skyil mo krung du
236b5(rgyud): bzhugs/ /de dag sgo ru dgod pa ste/ /dbus su gtso bo'i zla ba'i gdan/ /zur la mchod pa rnam pa bzhi/ /phyogs kyi gos can skra grol ba/ /zhal gsum pa la phyag drug pa//
236b6(rgyud): sbyan gsum thod pa'i phreng ba can/ /me long dang ni pi wang dang / /dri dang dung dang bcud kyis len/ /chang gi btung ba lag pas mchod/ /gzhan du ji ltar bdag po bzhin/ /rgyan
236b7(rgyud): rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs/ /skyil krung phyed par legs par bzhugs/ /lag pa snyim pa'i thal mo yis/ /mchod pa lag tu thogs nas ni/ /'di lta'i cho gas
237a1(rgyud): thams cad mkhyen/ /A li de nyid dri ma med/ /gsang ba mchog ni rnyed dka' ba/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bshad pa yin/ /sngags kyi de nyid cho

238a2(rgyud): bzla| |gsang gsum 'khor lo spros nas ni/ /khams gsum dag ni bsdu bar bya/ /'di ni mchog tu gsang ba ste/ /gang gis su la'ang bstan mi bya/ /mngon par brjod

239a1(rgyud): 'phrog pa dang ni gsod byed cing / /gang du las ni ci 'dod pa/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi 'khor los 'grub/ /las 'dir yid gnyis dpyod pa med/ /

239b3(rgyud): bzhag nas yi ge rnams/ /srog dang rtsol bas gsang sngags bzla/ /rang gis 'thor 'thung byas nas su/ /gsang ba gsum gyi ye shes spro/ /oM shrI k+Sha DA ki nI dzA la sa ba raM

240a1(rgyud): 'jigs pa rab 'jigs pa/ /zhal gyi mche ba rnam par gtsigs/ /g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis bzhugs/ /zla ba phyed pa ral pa

240a3(rgyud): sku la brgyan/ /rnam par rtog pa 'jigs byed nyid/ /sred dang phrag dog dus mtshan nyid/ /zhabs kyi 'og tu gnon par mdzad/ /gdul dka' thams cad 'dul mdzad
240a4(rgyud): cing / /bgegs kyi mgo bo'i phreng ba can/ /sna tshogs mdog can legs par mdzes/ /dkar ba'i mdog can sked pa phra/ /lha yi gzi brjid 'bar ba can/ /sngo zhing
240a5(rgyud): ser la dud ka dang / /g.yas pa'i zhal yang de bzhin te/ /ljang gu dmar dang ser skya ste/ /g.yon pa'i zhal yang sna tshogs mdzes/ /steng gi thal kha sprin mdog zhi/ /chags
240a6(rgyud): shing rjes su chags pas lta/ /thugs rje'i ro ni yang dag rdzogs/ /sku lus ldem zhing 'dzo bag can/ /A li mkha' 'gro ma yi sku/ /phyag gnyis pa la gcer bu'i

242a1(rgyud): lo'i lha mo rnam par dgod/ /dgyes pa chen po bde ba'i mchog ces bya ba'i rdo rje sems dpas dbus su'o/ /'khor la sogs pa kun gyi
