247a4(rgyud): mig dgu sogs sgo dang bcas/ /sgo ru lha mo bzhi bkod la/ /mkha' 'gro ma ni dngos grub ste/ /phyi rol dkyil 'khor lha mo bri/ /snam bu'i mtshams bzhi de ru ni/ /
247a5(rgyud): lha mo nyi shu dgod bya zhing / /mkha' 'gro ma sogs mtshams rnams su/ /zur bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /phyi rol dkyil 'khor dag tu brtag /sgo rnams su ni lha mo
247a6(rgyud): bzhi| |'dod pa'i 'bras bu thams cad du/ /rta babs bzhis ni rnam par brgyan/ /zur bzhi cha ni thams cad dang / /sgo dang sgo khyud mtshams rnams su/ /rdo rje rin
247a7(rgyud): chen gyis brgyan cing / /phyi rol dkyil 'khor thig gdab bo/ /de yi nang du re'u mig dgu/ /sgo rnams kyang ni bya ba ste/ /'di ltar mkha' 'gro mkha' 'gro ma/ /dra
247b1(rgyud): ba'i sdom pa stong pa ste/ /byang chub phyogs ni sum cu bdun/ /chos kyi rnam par dag pa yin/ /dbus su sa ni bcu gsum ste/ /phyi rol gnas dang nye ba'i gnas/ /dur khrod
247b2(rgyud): dang ni nye dur khrod/ /'di ltar sbyor bas rnam dag par/ /sdom pa mchog ni bsgom par bya/ /de ni thugs kyi ye shes te/ /ye shes mkha' 'gro mkha' 'gro ma'o/ /phung po
247b3(rgyud): khams dang skye mched la/ /cho ga gnyis po sbyar bar bya/ /ye shes mchog gi sgom pa ste/ /gsang ba gsum gyi 'khor lo dgod/ /phyed dang phyed du rnam par dgod/ /mkha'
247b4(rgyud): 'gro gsum ni 'khor lo'i dbus/ /dam tshig rnal 'byor 'byung ba che/ /ye shes 'khor lo bkug nas ni/ /zhabs bsil byas nas gzhug par bya/ /ye shes chu yis
247b5(rgyud): dbang bskur nas/ /gtso bo dag ni rnam par bsgom/ /bdag med chos kyi ro kun gyis/ /dam tshig mchog ni dri ma med/ /ba spu khung bu thams cad las/ /dam tshig gsang
247b6(rgyud): ba gsum spros nas/ /sems can ma lus dam tshig gi /mkha' 'gro ru ni rab gnas bya/ /'bad pa yis ni bsdus nas kyang / /gsang ba gsum du gzhug par bya/ /
247b7(rgyud): sngon grub pa yi mkha' 'gro ni/ /byin rlabs gnas su dgod par bya/ /'di ni rdo rje theg chen te/ /mkha' 'gro spyod pa'i gnas la bzhugs/ /sdom pa mchog ni bzlas
248a1(rgyud): pa yis| |bla na med pa'i go 'phang ster/ /dus bzhi dag tu ci 'dod par/ /skyo ba med par rtag tu sgom/ /lugs su 'byung dang ldog pa
248a2(rgyud): yis| |'khor lo mchog ni rnam par spro/ /ba spu'i khung bu las mdun du/ /bde mchog spros nas mchod par bya/ /rdo rje gsum ni dbang bskur nas/ /'gog pa'i
248a3(rgyud): khro bo rnam par bsgom/ /ye shes khro bo lhan cig tu/ /sprin gyi 'brug sgra lta bur bzla/ /'gro zhing 'ong ba sbyor ba yis/ /mi smra rdo rje brtul zhugs che/ /zhag bdun gyis
248a4(rgyud): ni nges par yang / /mthu dang stobs ni 'grub 'gyur te/ /g.yo zhing ldeg par byed pa dang / /'khrug cing g.yengs dang gzhug pa dang / /nad med pa ni nad yod byed/ /nad
248a5(rgyud): yod pa ni nad med byed/ /de ltar sgom pa byas nas ni/ /las 'dir the tshom med pa yin/ /nang gi bdag nyid sbyor ldan pas/ /bsgom dang bzlas la dga' ba dang / /dam
248a6(rgyud): tshig zas la dga' ba ni/ /thogs pa med par tshe yang brtan/ /'di ltar rang gi cho gas bzlas/ /sangs rgyas gnas su legs par 'jug /der ni dam tshig 'khor
248a7(rgyud): lo ni| |mkhas pas sgom mchod bzlas pa bya/ /gsang sngags 'di dag bshad bar bya/ /oM shrI badzra DA ki nI AH d+hi hUM DA ki nI dzA la shaM ba raM huM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM shrI bud+d+ha DA
248b1(rgyud): kI nI A b+h+ruM hUM DA ki nI dzA la shaM ba ra huM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM shrI karmA DA ki a khaM hUM DA ki nI dzA la shaM ba ra huM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM shrI pad+ma DA ka a hrI hUM DA ki nI dzA la shaM ba ra huM hUM phaT/ oM
248b2(rgyud): shrI rat+na DA ka aM hUM DA ki nI dzA la shaM ba ra huM hUM phaT swAhA/ mkha' 'gro bzhi po de dag dang / /mkha' 'gro ma dang lA ma dang / /dum skyes ma dang gzugs can ma/ /mgrin
248b3(rgyud): pa mnyam par bsnol ba ste/ /byin pa gnyis kyis legs par 'khril/ /de yi mdog dang phyag dang zhal/ /phyag mtshan rnams kyang rnam par bsgom/ /lha mo mngon du byas
248b4(rgyud): nas ni| |snying po'i gsang sngags so so yin/ /oM shrI badzra bA rA hi baM huM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM shrI DA ki nI DAM huM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM shrI lA me lAM huM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM shrI khaN+Da ro he khaM huM hUM
248b5(rgyud): phaT swAhA/ oM shrI rU pa Ni rUM huM hUM phaT swAhA/ 'di ni lnga po'i bdag nyid kyi'o/ /mtshams kyi mkha' 'gro ma'i sngags ni/ oM shrI bud+d+ha DA ki nI huM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM shrI karmA DA ki nI
248b6(rgyud): huM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM shrI pad+ma DA ki nI huM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM shrI rat+na huM hUM phaT swAhA/ sgo ru mkha' gro ma yi sngags/ /'dod pa'i 'bras bu thams cad ster/ /bzhi po sna tshogs
248b7(rgyud): mdog can te/ /ji bzhin rigs kyis kun la khyab/ /oM hUM rU pe huM hUM phaT/ /oM su rU pe huM hUM phaT/ oM badzra dun+ti huM hUM phaT/ oM pra b+hA ka ri huM hUM phaT/ shar phyogs kyi ni
249a1(rgyud): snam bu la/ /lha mo bzhi po dgod pa ste/ /sku lus dkar po'i mdog can la/ /de yi gsang sngags bshad pa yin/ /oM badzra pa DA ba mu khI huM hUM
249a2(rgyud): phaT| oM g+ho ra mu khi huM hUM phaT/ oM badzra g+ho Ne huM hUM phaT/ oM ya sha swi ni hUM hUM phaT/ lho phyogs kyi ni snam bu la/ /lha mo bzhi po dgod par bya/ /sku mdog dag ni ser ba ste/
249a3(rgyud): de yi sngags su bshad pa yin/ /oM badzra dU ti huM hUM phaT/ oM badzra na kha huM hUM phaT/ oM badzra kau ma rI huM hUM phaT/ oM badzra kaM puts+dzi huM hUM phaT/ nub phyogs kyi ni snam bu la/ /
249a4(rgyud): lha mo bzhi po sku mdog dmar po can gyi sngags yin no/ /oM badzra be tA li huM hUM phaT/ oM badzra sa yi ki hUM hUM phaT/ oM gan+d+ha ri huM hUM phaT/ oM ba mi ba da ne huM hUM phaT/ byad
249a5(rgyud): gi snam bu la lha mo bzhi sku mdog ljang gu ste/ de'i gsang sngags bshad pa yin/ /o tsaN+Da shaM kha re huM hUM phaT/ oM b+h+r-i ku Ta huM hUM phaT/ oM bi shwa rU pe huM hUM phaT/ oM badzra
249a6(rgyud): kaD+D+ha ni huM hUM phaT/ dbang ldan la sogs pa'i mtshams bzhi ru lha mo bzhi po gzugs gnyis pa'i mdog can te/ de'i sngags bshad pa/ oM shrI badzra kha le huM hUM phaT/
249a7(rgyud): oM badzra ma le huM hUM phaT/ oM badzra ya shaH ka ri huM hUM phaT/ oM badzra nA lA ra ke huM hUM phaT/ sgo rnams su ni lha mo bzhi po sna tshogs pa'i mdog can drag po'i gzugs ldan
249b1(rgyud): pa ste| de'i sngags su bshad pa/ shar du oM shri badzra paM ge le dzaH dzaH huM hUM phaT/ lho ru oM shrI badzra dz+wa li ni hUM huM hUM phaT/ nub tu oM shrI badzra kuN+Da li paM baM huM hUM phaT/ byang du
249b2(rgyud): oM shrI badzra phai ra bi ho huM hUM phaT/ thams cad gsal byed mtha' ru ni/ /shrI ni sbyar zhing mchog rim bzhin/ /sngags pas de ltar bzlas na ni/ /mkha' 'gro ma ni dra ba yi/ /sdom
249b3(rgyud): pa'i dngos grub thob pa ste/ /zla ba drug gis bde dbang 'gyur/ /gcug tu byas te bsdus na ni/ /rnal 'byor chen po gzi byin can/ /dra ba'i mchog ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /gsang
249b4(rgyud): sngags 'di dag thams cad ni/ /khri 'am du bzlas na ni/ /gsang sngags rgyal po 'grub pa yin/ /snying po dag ni bzlas pa yis/ /dpa' bo mkha' 'gro ma grub cing / /rang
249b5(rgyud): nyid ji ltar 'dod par 'gyur/ /gzhan gyi lus su zhugs 'gro zhing / /mi snang ba dag thob nas ni/ /rnal 'byor chen po rnam par spyod/ /sna tshogs gzugs ni 'dzin pa yin/ /
249b6(rgyud): mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ dam tshig gi sdom pa las 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa gnyis pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro'i cho ga'i rim/ /sngar bshad sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro yi/ /lung la sogs pa'i rim pa bya/ /rnal 'byor lung ni
250a1(rgyud): mi shes pa/ /sangs rgyas mu stegs can yin te/ /rtag tu lung ni spang mi bya/ /dkon mchog gsum ni mi spang zhing / /sangs rgyas chos dang
250a2(rgyud): dge 'dun la/ /rtag tu bdag ni skyabs su 'gro/ /shes rab pha rol phyin dmigs na/ /rnal 'byor gyi ni dngos grub 'grub/ /gcig car 'jug pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /bdag
250a3(rgyud): gi lus ni rnam par bsam/ /sngo zhing drag la bzhin rnam sgyur/ /gtum zhing 'jigs pa 'jigs par mdzad/ /zhal gyi mche ba rnam par gtsigs/ /ral pa zla phyed spyi
250a4(rgyud): gtsug 'chid/ /sna tshogs rdo rjes ral pa gnod/ /thod pa'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /rgyan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs/ /baM hUM badzra las byung sku lus can/ /
250a5(rgyud): phyag rgya drug dang yang dag ldan/ /stag gi pags pa gos su mnabs/ /skyil krung phyed pas legs par gnas/ /spyan gsum drag po'i sku lus can/ /mgrin pa bzhi la
250a6(rgyud): zhal bzhi pa/ /bcu gnyis phyag dang yang dag ldan/ /stong pa'i ye shes yang dag mchog /gdug pa kun gyi thod pa'i phreng / /dus mtha' las byung do shal can/ /gdug
250a7(rgyud): pa kun ni zhabs 'og gnon/ /nyon mongs 'jigs byed mgo bo dang / /sred pa gti mug phrag dog ste/ /dus mtshan mo ni khas phub la/ /gdug pa'i bgegs ni
250b1(rgyud): 'jigs pa can/ /thams cad zhabs kyi 'og tu gnon/ /nam mkha' dang ni skya ba dang / /dkar ba dang ni dmar ba dang / /ljang gu steng du bltas pa'i zhal/ /rdo rje dril bu mnyam
250b2(rgyud): ldan pa| |phag mo dag dang bde bas 'khyud/ /kun tu gnyis med sbyor ba yis/ /chos rnams kun gyi ro gcig tu/ /sbyangs pa'i yon tan zhes bya ba/ /dpal gyi bde ba chen po
250b3(rgyud): ni| |rdo rje he ru ka nyid yin/ /thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin/ /chos kyi 'khor lo mkhar gsil dang / /lhung bzed mdung dang zhags pa dang / /lcags kyu mgo bo cang te'u dang / /g.yas
250b4(rgyud): dang g.yon pa'i phyag dag gis/ /na ra'i pags pa brkyang nas bsnams/ /shar du mA tang+gi dang DoM bi ka /dza ra ki dang puk+ki si/ /kha Ta ki dang sha ba ri/ /dzi ba ri dang sa ma ri/ /lha
250b5(rgyud): mo brgyad po de dag ni/ /ji bzhin rim pas rjes su dgod/ /ser dang sngo dang de bzhin dmar/ /dud pa yi ni mdog can te/ /dmar dang ljang dang dud ka'i mdog /brgyad pa
250b6(rgyud): dkar po nyid yin no/ /sgo rnams su ni dgod bya ba/ /khrag 'thung rdo rje gtum mo dang / /rdo rje srid mchog ma dang ni/ /rdo rje 'jigs byed drag mo ste/ /gdul dka' thams cad
250b7(rgyud): gsol mdzad cing / /thal pa sprin mdog ljang gu dang / /dmar dang sngo dang lhag par 'jigs/ /brgyad pa'i dbus su chos mkhar gsil/ /thod pa cang te'u gri gug ste/ /phrag
251a1(rgyud): ba'i steng du gos 'dzin pa'o/ /sgo rnams su ni lha mo bzhi/ /thod pa kha T+wAM mi 'jigs pa/ /chos kyi mkhar gsil cang te'u/ /zhal gcig pa
251a2(rgyud): la phyag bzhi pa/ /yi dwags gdan gyi steng du ni/ /skyil krung phyed pa'i gar gyis bzhugs/ /bsod snyoms pa dang chos gos gsum/ /phyis mi len dang tsog bu ba//
251a3(rgyud): gzhi ji bzhin dang stan cig pa/ /bla gab med dang shing drung pa/ /dgon pa pa dang dur khrod dang / /khrod pa dang ni phying ba pa'o/ /'di dag ji lta'i rim pa yis/ /sbyangs pa'i
251a4(rgyud): yon tan rnam dag bsgom/ /ye shes mnyam pa'i dam tshig mchog /ro gcig tu ni rnam par bsgom/ /oM shrI ma hA su kha badzra he he ru ru kaM AH huM hUM phaT/ oM maM ma taM
251a5(rgyud): gi huM hUM phaT/ oM DaM badzra DoM bi ni huM hUM phaT/ oM raM rA dza ki huM hUM phaT/ oM puM puk+ka si huM hUM phaT/ oM khaM kha ta kaM huM hUM phaT/ oM shaM shA ba ri huM hUM phaT/ oM dziM dzi ba ri huM hUM phaT/
251a6(rgyud): oM saM sa ma ri hUM hUM phaT/ oM teM he he ru ki huM hUM phaT/ oM baM badzra tsaN+Di huM hUM phaT/ oM hUM badzra rAk+Sha si huM hUM phaT/ oM b+heM badzra b+hai ra bI huM hUM phaT/ de kun gcer bu skra grol ba/ /spyan
251a7(rgyud): gsum pa la zhi ba ste/ /mche ba rnam gtsigs lce bskyod cing / /phyag rgya lnga yis sku lus brgyan/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can/ /bzhad dang zhi dang snying rje dang / /sgeg
251b1(rgyud): pa dang ni rngam pa dang / /drag cing khro ba'i nyams can te/ /bzlas dang sgom pa spro zhing bsdu/ /lus dag yid la bde bar gnas/ /sems can mos pa sna tshogs pa/ /gdul ba'i thabs
251b2(rgyud): kyi bde ba yis/ /yul la yongs su spyod pa na/ /bla med ye shes 'bras bu 'thob/ /sems can thams cad 'di yis bde/ /'chi med bde ba'i longs spyod kyis/ /ye shes 'bras
251b3(rgyud): bu rnyed pa yin/ /'di ni sems can thams cad kyi/ /mchog gi go 'phang thob pa'o/ /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ sbyangs pa'i yon tan bskyed pa'i le'u
251b4(rgyud): ste sum cu rtsa gsum pa'o/ / //de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /char dbab cho ga'i rim pa ni/ /pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad mchog gi/ /lte ba ge sar bcas pa la//
251b5(rgyud): de yi dbus su rdo rje che/ /mche ba rnam gtsigs 'jigs pa can/ /phyag brgyad pa la zhal bzhi pa/ /spyan gsum 'jigs pa'ang rab tu 'jigs/ /rdo rje mtshon ni gsor mdzad
251b6(rgyud): cing / /sdigs mdzub zhags par ldan pa dang / /thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin/ /lcags kyu dang ni mdung bsnams shing / /dpa' bo'i pags pa bsnams shing 'dzin/ /cang te'u
251b7(rgyud): dang ni brgyad par bshad/ /g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis ni/ /chu lha 'jigs pa myos pa gnon/ /zla ba phyed pa ral pa 'ching / /sna tshogs rdo rjes rnam par brgyan/ /phyag rgya
252a1(rgyud): drug gis sku la brgyan/ /thod pa'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /stag gi pags pa gos su man bas/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i cod pan mchog/
252a2(rgyud): mchus gnon zhal gdong rnam sgyur zhing / /khro bar lta zhing 'jigs par gzigs/ /'dab ma brgyad la klu brgyad bri/ /mtha' yas dang ni nor rgyas dang / /'jog po
252a3(rgyud): pad+ma pad+ma che/ /dung skyong dang ni stobs kyi rgyu/ /dga' bo dang ni brgyad yin te/ /dkar dang sngo dang dmar dang ljang / /ser dang dud pa'i mdog can te/ /ljang gu dang ni ser
252a4(rgyud): po ste| |thal mo sbyar bar byas nas ni/ /bcom ldan 'das la mngon phyogs pa/ /'jigs pas bka' drin slong bar byed/ /skrag pas lta zhing gnas pa 'o/ /bcom
252a5(rgyud): ldan sku lus sngon po can/ /'jigs shing shin tu 'jigs par mdzad/ /g.yas pa dud ka dmar po ste/ /g.yon pa ljang gu dud ka 'o/ /steng gi zhal ni mkha' lding
252a6(rgyud): gdong / /zhal rnam sgyur zhing 'jigs pa 'o/ /nyi ma dmar po'i gzi brjid can/ /nyi ma bcu gnyis nyi mnyam 'od/ /phag mo dag gis mgul 'khyud cing / /byin pa gnyis
252a7(rgyud): kyis legs par 'khril/ /yang na phyag ni bcu gnyis pa/ /bde chen mchog ni bcu gnyis pa/ /gri gug tshangs pa'i mgo bo dang / /rdo rje dril bu yang dag ldan/ /lha mo'i
252b1(rgyud): mchu ni rnam par 'tshir/ /gcer bu dbu skra grol ba dang / /spyan gsum pa la sku rags can/ /dzam+bu'i chu bo mchog gi sku/ /gnyis su med par sbyor bar gnas/ /klu ni rang
252b2(rgyud): gi chung mar bcas/ /chu lha'ang chung mar bcas pa dang / /chu lha'i lus ni dkar po can/ /bka' drin dag ni slong bar byed/ /snying gar ye shes 'khor lo dag /de mdog phyag
252b3(rgyud): dang zhal yang skyed/ /de yi snying ga hUM nAM hUM dgod cing / /lus ngag yid kyang de bzhin te/ /klu yi rang snying de nyid la/ /hUM nAM hUM ni rnam par dgod/ /gsang sngags rgyal
252b4(rgyud): po'i cho ga ni/ /khro bo'i tshig ltar bzlas brjod bya/ /chu bo'i 'gram mam rgya mtsho 'am/ khron pa'am klu yi mtsho dang ni/ /rdzing bu lteng ka rnams su ni/ /blo can khro bo'i bzlas
252b5(rgyud): pa bya| |yang na klu yi gnas su ni/ /sgom pa bzlas pa dag la 'jug /oM shrI badzra he he ru ru kaM hUM nAM nA ga bar ShA pa ya hUM DA ki nI dzA la shaM ba ra hUM phaT swAhA/ 'di dag bsgom
252b6(rgyud): te khri tsam bzla/ /dus bzhi dag tu stong du 'o/ /zhag bdun gyis ni nges par yang / /sa rnams kun tu char 'bab 'gyur/ /dam tshig sbyin sreg mchod dus su/ /glu dang gar
252b7(rgyud): ni nyer ldan pas/ /'o ma dag ni bza' zhing btung / /rnal 'byor pas ni klu brgyad bzla/ /'o ma'i khrus kyi cho ga yis/ /'o mas sbyin sreg bsreg blugs bya/ /'o ma'i shing
253a1(rgyud): gi bud shing bya/ /'o ma'i shing gi yam shing dang / /'o mar bcas pas sbyin sreg bya/ /bum pa 'o mas yongs su dgang / /me sogs
253a2(rgyud): mtshams dang phyogs rnams su/ /'o mar bcas pa'i gtor ma sbyin/ /oM aM a nan+ta ya hUM nAM hUM swAhA/ oM baM bA su ke hUM nAM hUM swAhA/ oM taM tak+Sha ka hUM nAM hUM swAhA/ oM paM
253a3(rgyud): pad+ma hUM nAM hUM swAhA/ oM maM mahA pad+ma hUM nAM hUM swAhA/ oM shaM shaM kha pA la hUM nAM hUM swAhA/ oM kaM karko Ta hUM nAM hUM swAhA/ oM aM a nan+ta tap+ta hUM nAM hUM swAhA/ oM hUM baM ba ru Na ya nA
253a4(rgyud): gA d+hi pa te ye nA gaM baR+ShA pa ya hUM nAM hUM swAhA/ 'di bzlas khro bo dang bcas pas/ /kun gyi bzlas pa khri tsam bya/ /'o ma 'bras snying zas su bza'/ /dbang po thul cing yod
253a5(rgyud): mi smra| |bri gzugs spangs pa'i mngon sum du/ /khri tsam bzlas na mngon du 'gyur/ /mngon sum du ni dngos grub cing / /smras pa tsam gyis char 'bebs te/ /'di la
253a6(rgyud): the tshom ma byed cig / dngul gyi snod kyi nang du ni/ /yungs kar dang ni chu blugs la/ /de la nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar du yongs su bzlas te sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs la
253a7(rgyud): dri chu dang 'om bsres pas khrus byas te chu 'gram gyis sbrus pa las klu'i gzugs byas la nub tu mgo bstan te mgo bo dgu la chus dbang bskur te/ /de nas chu bo'i
253b1(rgyud): nang du bzhug go/ /de ma thag tu lhas char 'bebs shing / dzam+bu'i gling du char 'bebs 'gyur/ /sa rnams 'bru yis gang 'gyur zhing / /nags tshal rnams ni 'phel bar byed/ /
253b2(rgyud): sems can thams cad bde reg nas/ /phan tshun khro bo'i gzugs can ni/ /bdag bsgoms rgyud kyi rjes 'brangs nas/ /rang gti snyin ga kho nar ni/ /he ru rdo rje bsgoms pa yi//
253b3(rgyud): char pa yang ni 'bab par 'gyur/ /ri'i steng du 'dzegs te rtse gsum pa la yongs su bzlas na ser ba gcod par 'gyur ro/ /cang te'u la yongs su bzlas na me mched
253b4(rgyud): pa'i me rengs par 'gyur ro/ /zhags pa la yongs su bzlas na 'gugs par byed/ thod pa la yongs su bzlas na khrag 'gugs par byed do/ /dgra sta la yongs su bzlas
253b5(rgyud): na gsod par byed do/ /kha T+wAM ga la yongs su bzlas na zhi bar byed do/ /gri gug la yongs su bzlas na 'jig rten gsum du rgyu ba gsod par byed do/ /mgo bo la yongs su
253b6(rgyud): bzlas na 'chi ba slong bar byed do/ /rdo rje gsor zhing yongs su bzlas na sa 'og gi dngos grub tu 'gyur ro/ /dril bu la yongs su bzlas na mi dga' ba yongs su 'gugs
253b7(rgyud): par byed do/ /glang po che'i pags pa la yongs su bzlas te bting na bar snang la 'phur bar 'gyur te/ dpag tshad stong phrag brgyar 'gro zhing slar ldog go /phyag rgya drug la
254a1(rgyud): yongs su bzlas na pha rol gyi mdun du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /sa steng du ni kun spyod cing / /ci bde bar ni gnas par 'gyur/ /mngon par
254a2(rgyud): brjod pa'i rgyud bal ma'i bla ma las/ char dbab pa'i cho ga'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa bzhi'o// //de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /gsang ba mchog
254a3(rgyud): ni mdor pa sdus nas/ /skad cig gis ni bdag sgom pa/ /he ru ka dpal gzugs su bya/ /sdo zhing drag po rnam sgyur pa/ /drag po spyang sum zhal drug mchog /zla ba
254a4(rgyud): phyed pa ral pa 'dzin/ /sna tshogs rdo rje dbu mchog la/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can/ /rdo rje phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /sku la mgo bo'i do shal can/ /phyag rgya
254a5(rgyud): drug gis rnam par brgyan/ /stag gi pags pa gos su mnabs/ /phag mo yis ni sku la brgyan/ /zhabs gcig pa ni bzhengs pa ste/ /g.yas pa ser la dud pa'i
254a6(rgyud): mdog / g.yon pa dmar la ljang gu 'o/ /steng gi zhal ni rta gdong ste/ /dkar zhing sprin mdog drag cing 'jigs/ /rdo rje dril bu mnyam par ldan/ /lha mo mchu ni
254a7(rgyud): 'tshir ba ste/ /rgyal ba'i pags pa gos su man bas/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi rigs 'dzin cing / /thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin/ /rdo rje mtshan gyis brgyan pa ste/ /zhags pa
254b1(rgyud): lcags kyu phyag na bsnams/ /cang te'u dang ni mgo bo 'dzin/ /gri gug zhags pa de bzhin te/ /phyag ni bcu gnyis dag tu bshad/ /dkyil 'khor dag ni thams cad kyang / /
254b2(rgyud): zhabs gcig tu ni rnam par bsgom/ /glang po'i gdong dang byi 'u'i gdong / /seng+ge'i gdong yang de bzhin te/ /dang po khyi yi gdong yin te/ /gnyis pa 'ug pa'i gdong yang
254b3(rgyud): yin| |gsum pa phag gi gdong yin te/ /bzhi pa khra yi gdong can no/ /gnas kyi dbyibs kyi chos bdag nyid/ /sna tshogs gzugs ri chen po 'dzin/ /mtha' yas rnam
254b4(rgyud): rgyal grags pa ste/ /thams cad mkhyen cing thams cad pa/ /ji ltar 'dod pa'i sku lus 'chang / /de bzhin bsgom zhing rnam bsgom ste/ /sna tshogs gzugs can rin chen
254b5(rgyud): bzhin| |bdag nyid chen po rnam par rol/ /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ /las sna tshogs sgrub pa'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa lnga pa'o// //de nas
254b6(rgyud): gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /phag mo'i mchog ni sgrub ba ste/ /bskyed pa'i rim pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /bdag nyid bsgom zhing rnam par bsgom/ /sku ni nyi ma bcu gnyis gzi//
254b7(rgyud): sku lus sin+dur 'dra mi g.yo/ /me tog ban+tu ka lta bu/ /zhal gsum pa la phyag drug pa/ /rgyan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs/ /sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis
255a1(rgyud): bzhugs/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can/ /rdo rje dril bu mnyam par ldan/ /dbu skra mdzes pas 'khril ba ste/ /thabs kyi zhal mchu rnam
255a2(rgyud): 'tshir zhing / /mda' dang gzhu ni 'dzin pa ste/ /rna ba'i mthar thug 'gengs par byed/ /thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin/ /lcags kyu mchog gis 'gugs pa ste/ /pad+ma dmar
255a3(rgyud): po'i dbus bzhugs shing / /'dod pa thams cad rab tu stsol/ /yang na phyag ni bcu gnyis pa/ /zhal drug lha mo'i sku lus 'byung / /steng gi zhal ni phag rgod gdong /
255a4(rgyud): drag po gzi brjid 'jigs pa'i gzi/ /shar gyi 'dab la rdo rje gsang ba'i mchog /g.yon pa'i phyogs su rdo rje dam tshig mchog /nub kyi phyogs su rdo rje gzi brjid
255a5(rgyud): mchog / lho yi phyogs su rdo rje rin chen mchog /me yi phyogs su rdo rje ye shes mchog /bden bral phyogs su rdo rje rig mchog ma/ /rlung gi phyogs su rdo rje grub mchog
255a6(rgyud): ma/ /dbang ldan phyogs su rdo rje thal mchog ma/ /sgo la rdo rje 'bar mchog ma/ /rdo rje gzi brjid mchog ma ste/ /rdo rje khro bo mchog ma dang / /rdo rje mche ba mchog ma 'o/ /lha mo
255a7(rgyud): de dag thams cad kyang / /dmar ba'i mdog can zhal gsum pa/ /phyag drug pa la spyan gsum pa/ /sems dpa'i skyil mo krung du bzhugs/ /dbu skra dag ni grol ba ste/
255b1(rgyud): thams cad rgyan gyis rnam brgyan cing / /rdo rje dril bu mnyam ldan pas/ /rang gi lus kyis thabs la 'khril/ /zhags pa dang ni lcags kyu dang / /thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin//

255b3(rgyud): dwags gdan la bzhugs/ /rdo rje gsor zhing sdigs mdzub dang / /zhags pa dang ni yang dag ldan/ /gzhan yang phan tshun dag tu yang / /ji ltar 'khor la sogs phyag
255b4(rgyud): 'tshal| |de snyid ye shes lha mo ni/ /sku gsung thugs dang bcas pa bsgom/ /ye shes dkyil 'khor sbyor ba yis/ /chos kyi ro ni mnyam par thim/ /ye shes bzlas pa spros nas
255b5(rgyud): ni| |cho ga'i rim pas yang dag bsdu/ /dam tshig mchog gi bzlas pa yis/ /zla ba'i de nyid 'grub par 'gyur/ /oM shrI badzra bA rA hi A baM huM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM shrI badzra gu h+ya ut+ta me
255b6(rgyud): huM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM shri badzra sa ma ya ut+ta me huM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM shrI badzra te dzot+ta me huM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM shrI badzra rat+not+ta me huM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM shrI badzra dz+nya no t+ta me huM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM shrI
255b7(rgyud): badzra bid+ya ut+ta me huM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM shrI badzra sid+d+he t+ta me huM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM shrI badzra b+hasmot+ta me huM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM shrI badzra dzA lot+ta me dzeH huM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM shrI badzra aM mr-i tot+ta me huM hUM phaT
256a1(rgyud): swAhA/ oM shrI badzra kro d+hot+ta me baM huM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM shrI badzra daMSh+Tot+ta me hoHhuM hUM phaT swAhA/ 'di dag ji lta'i rim pa yis/ /sgom pa dang ni bzlas pa

256a3(rgyud): te| |gsang ba gsum la rab tu gzhug / gsang gsum gnas ni chos yin te/ /chos kyang de bzhin de lta bu/ /bdag med chos ni chos yin te/ /chos las chos ni
256a4(rgyud): yod ma yin/ /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ gsang ba gsum gyi dam tshig gi mchog ces bya ba'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa drug pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /rnal 'byor ma drug cho ga'i rim/ /pad+ma 'dab lnga bris nas ni/ /lte ba ge sar khyab par ni/ /de yi dbus su phag mo ni/ /dmar zhing sna
256a5(rgyud): tshogs 'bar ba'i 'od/ /zhal gsum pa la phyag drug mdzes/ /spyan gsum dbu skra grol ba ste/ /thod pa'i phreng pa'i dbu rgyan can/ /phyogs kyi gos ni 'dzin pa'i

256b7(rgyud): dang pad+ma'i gar/ /skyong byed ma dang khrag 'thung ste/ /skrag byed rdo rje nyi ma dang / /tsaN+Di ka dang rta mchog ste/ /rdo rje sems sku dkar po ste/ /rnam par snang mdzad ser po yin/ /pad+ma
257a1(rgyud): bkad dbang dmar ba ste/ /he ru ka dpal sngon po yin/ /rdo rje nyi ma dmar po ste/ /rta mchog dag ni ljang gu 'o/ /yang na so sor bsgom par

257a5(rgyud): phaT swAhA/ oM shri hAM yoM yaM huM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM shrI hI moM maM huM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM shrI hreM hriM saM huM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM shrI hUM hUM saM huM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM shrI phaT phaT tsam hUM hUM

260b1(rgyud): bya ba ma 'ongs yin/ /so zhes bya ba chags pa yin/ /'di dag yi ge'i brda yin te/ /dbang bskur dus su rnal 'byor pas/ /bza' dang bza' med sbyin par bya/ /dbang
260b2(rgyud): bskur ba ni mchog yin te/ /dam tshig mchog ni shes pa dang / /dam tshig can gyi dam tshig dus/ /dam tshig 'khor lo 'dus pa dang / /dad pa rnams la sbyin par bya//
260b3(rgyud): ma dad pa la sbyin mi bya/ /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ brda'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa brgyad pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba//
260b4(rgyud): rnal 'byor ma yi mtshan nyid ni/ /gang gis shes pa tsam gyis ni/ /sgrub pa po yis dngos grub thob/ /bud med pad rtsa ltar dkar zhing / /pad+ma'i 'dab ltar dkyus ring
260b5(rgyud): mig / rtag tu gos ni dkar la dga'/ /tsan+dan gsar pa'i dri dang ldan/ /de gshegs 'dus pa nyid la dga'/ /de rigs las byung shes par bya/ /bud gang btso
260b6(rgyud): ma'i gser 'dra zhing / /dmar dang ser ba'i gos la dga'/ /dzA ti tsam pa'i dri dang ldan/ /de yang bzang po'i rjes 'gror 'gyur/ /thams cad ut+pal ltar sdo bsangs//
260b7(rgyud): dri dang gos ni sdo la dga'/ /ut+pal sngon po'i dri yod pa/ /de /ni dpa' bo bzang rjes 'gro/ /bud med pad dkar 'dra mdog gang / /rtag tu pad+ma'i rtsa ba dri/ /de yang de
261a1(rgyud): bzhin dpa' mo'i blo/ /dmar zhing ser skya'i bud med gang / /gzugs bzang gos ni dmar ba dang / /ma la ki dang ut+pal dri/ /de
261a2(rgyud): ni rdo rje'i rigs byung yin/ /ser zhing ljang ba'i bud med gang / /gos ni dkar la dga' ba dang / /mgo la me tog dri dang ldan/ /de bzhin gshegs rigs rjes
261a3(rgyud): 'gro yin/ /bud med gang zhig kha dog dmar/ /de'i mdog can gyi gos 'chang zhing / /rtag tu ga bur dri dang ldan/ /rnam snang rigs kyi rjes 'gro zhing / /rnal
261a4(rgyud): 'byor ma yi rigs rnams ni/ /de ltar bdun po ngas bshad pa/ /g.yon pa'i kun spyod la rtag dga'/ /rang gi mdog gis rigs drug ldan/ /rigs kyi rigs
261a5(rgyud): pa'i yi ge yang / /kha dog drug tu 'gyur ba yin/ /rang gi phyag rgya 'ching ba dang / rang rigs las byung tshig tu smra/ /g.yon las 'gro ba'i bud med gang / /rnal
261a6(rgyud): 'byor pa la g.yon la rtag / lag pa g.yon gyis mtshon pa dang / /g.yon nas lta bas rnam par blta/ /lha mo rnams dang gar smra ba/ /de ni dam tshig ldan par
261a7(rgyud): bshad| |bud med gang byas de nyan cing / /rigs kyis bon rab tu smra/ /rigs kyi bya ba mi spong ste/ /rang gi bstan bshad mi 'dor la/ /rang gi rigs kyi rig pa
261b1(rgyud): zlos| |de ni dam tshig ldan par bshad/ /phyag 'tshal ba ni gang 'ching ba/ /g.yon pa'i lus kyis rtag tu bdud/ /lha mo rnams dang kun smra ba/ /de ni nges par bde bar
261b2(rgyud): 'gro| |mthe bong g.yon pas sa la ni/ /rkang pas ri mo 'bri byed cing / /mgo ni 'phrug par byed pa dang / /zur gyis lta zhing lag pa ston/ /sgrub pa po la khyad par du/ /de
261b3(rgyud): yis rang rig dran pa dang / /'khur pa'am kos ko dag dang ni/ /sna dag tu ni thal mo ston/ /zur gyis lta zhing lan gcig bsngags/ /zlos shing rigs la rnam par lta/ /
261b4(rgyud): bden par 'gro ba'i rnal 'byor ma/ /nges par dam tshig can yin na/ /de nas rnyed dka' rnal 'byor ma/ /de bzhin mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi/ /bdud rtsi lnga rnams yang
261b5(rgyud): dag 'byung / /ya mi ni dang skrag byed ma/ /'dod ldan phag mo 'jigs gzugs ma/ /kun tu spyod pa bsu ra/ /rnal 'byor ma ni rnam pa bdun/ /mdor bsdus rang
261b6(rgyud): mtshan bshad pa yin/ /gzugs can ma dang tsum+ba ki/ /lA ma yongs gyur byis bcas mo/ /mi ldog a hi ka lha mo/ /mkha' 'gro ma ni bdun du bshad/ /mngon
261b7(rgyud): par zhen pas lta ba dang / /smin ma 'degs par gar byed cing / /sngon bzhin gzugs ni sdud byed la/ /phyis ni 'jigs par byed pa dag /gzugs can ma ni yin
262a1(rgyud): par bshad/ /gnyis med dpa' bos bsnyen par bya/ /sdug pa'am yang na mi sdug pa/ /byis pa 'khyud cing tsum pa na/ /de ni tsum+pa kir
262a2(rgyud): zhes bya| |mkha' 'gro mchog kyang de nyid yin/ /zas mi lta bar zur du lta/ /khro gnyer dang ni gdong dag dang / /smin ma sgyur zhing sdigs mdzub dang / /'di ni
262a3(rgyud): gzhan yang dbugs mi 'byin/ /'jigs par byed pa gang yin pa/ /de ni lA ma yin par bstan/ /phag dang dred dang byil dang / /lce spyang rigs dang rta dag
262a4(rgyud): dang / /thams cad dar ni 'jigs byed pa/ /yongs su gyur par de bshad de/ /shin tu dga' bas dgod pa dang / /song nas slar yang mi ldog la/ /rjes su chags
262a5(rgyud): pas gsal bar dgod/ /du ma skyes mar ni de bshad de/ /yid ni kun tu skye ba dang / /rkang pa lag pas bong ba'am/ /gos mtha' ma yang na shing dag gis/ /
262a6(rgyud): des reg pa ni 'tsho mi 'gyur/ /mi ldog par ni shes bya ste/ /sgrub min par ni de bshad do/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi rigs phyag rgya/ /dpa' bos bsnyen cing mtshan ma
262a7(rgyud): blta| |thod pa dgra sta mche ba dang / /ral gri kun tu skrag byed yin/ /rdo rje dang ni dung nyid dang / /rigs kyi phyag rgya yin par bshad/ /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i
262b1(rgyud): bla ma las/ rnal 'byor ma'i mtshan ma'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa dgu pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /mkha' 'gro rnams kyi mtshan nyid ni/ /
262b2(rgyud): gang zhig yang dag shes pa yis/ /mkha' 'gro'i dam tshig la gnas pa'o/ /dmar zhing ser ba'i bud med gang / /pad+ma'i dri ni rnam par gtong / /lta stangs rang bzhin
262b3(rgyud): zhi pa dang / /zhen pas lta ba'i rjes 'gro ba/ /bud med gang gi sen mo dmar/ /mig ni kun tu zhen pa dang / /khyim du pad+ma 'bri ba ni/ /pad+ma gar dbang rigs 'byung yin//
262b4(rgyud): smin pa'i dbus na rtse gsum yod/ /lus ni sngo bsangs skya ba dang / /rtag tu rdo rje rigs sgom pa/ /gang gi khyim du rdo rje 'bri/ /rtag par mchod pa byed pa yi/ /mkha'
262b5(rgyud): 'gro ma ste dpal ldan ni/ /he ru ka yis rigs byung yin/ /gang gi dpral bar rtse gsum ni/ /mdung thung dag ni snang 'gyur zhing / /mig dmar mdog ni dmar ser
262b6(rgyud): dang / /de bzhin rkang pa lag pa dmar/ /ra skyes khyim bya dag la yang / /rtag tu yid ni dgar 'gyur zhing / /de yi khyim du rdo rje mtshan/ /rtag tu gang zhig mchod byed pa//
262b7(rgyud): shrI he ru ka'i rigs byung ba/ /mkha' 'gro yin par gdon mi za/ /'khor lo gang gi dpral ba'am/ /lag par yang ni snang 'gyur ba/ /sprin sngon dag dang 'dra ba ni/ /
263a1(rgyud): rtag tu dpral bar 'chang byed pa/ /skal ba chen po kun tshogs shing / /mchog tu bden pa gang yin dang / /khyim du 'khor lo 'bri
263a2(rgyud): byed cing / /rtag tu de la mchod byed pa/ /rdo rje phag mo rigs byung ba'i/ /mkha' 'gro ma ni stobs kyis dregs/ /gang zhig mig sman nag 'dra zhing / /so ni
263a3(rgyud): dkar zhing mtho ba dang / /rtag tu gdug par gyur pa dang / /sems stobs ldan par gyur pa dang / /rtag tu khrus la dga' ba dang / /mang du smra bar mi byed cing //
263a4(rgyud): khyim du rdo rje 'bri ba dang / /rtag tu dge bas mchod byed pa/ /rdo rje phag mo'i rigs byung ba/ /stong phrag bcu dang lnga pa yin/ /ser zhing gser gyi mdog 'drar
263a5(rgyud): snang / /mig mi g.yo zhing kha spu ser/ /rdo rje gang gi dpral ba'am/ /lag par yang ni snang 'gyur ba/ /rtag tu rgyal srid dag la gnas/ /snyems shing bden
263a6(rgyud): par smra ba dang / /mi li ka yi dri 'byung zhing / /gang gi khyim du rdo rje ni/ /rtag tu 'bri zhing cher mchod pa/ /dum skyes ma yi rigs las byur/ /rnal 'byor ma
263a7(rgyud): yi dbang phyug mchog/ /gang zhig rtag par sha la dga'/ /skem zhing mig sman nag pa'i mdog/ /dpral ba mdung rtse lta bu yod/ /gang zhig gdug pa'i las
263b1(rgyud): la dga'/ /rtag tu dur khrod dag tu 'gro/ /'jigs pa med cing rtse med de/ /gang gis dpral bar thig le dang / /khyim du thong pa 'bri zhing mchod/ /dpal ldan he
263b2(rgyud): ru ka de yi/ /mkha' 'gro'i rigs las byung ba yin/ /sprin gyi mdog 'dra'i bud med gang / /so ni mi mnyam par gnas shing / /rtag tu gdug pa'i las la dga'//
263b3(rgyud): g.yon gyi mche ba gtsigs pa dang / /de yi khyim du dgra sta ni/ /'bri zhing rtag tu mchod byed pa/ /rnam par 'dren pa'i rigs byung ba'i/ /mkha' 'gro mar ni the tshom med//
263b4(rgyud): mkha' 'gro ma yi tshogs 'di dag /shri he ru ka'i rigs las byung / /sgrub pa po la phan pa'i phyir/ /mtshan nyid yang dag bshad pa yin/ /mngon par brjod pa'i
263b5(rgyud): rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ mkha' 'gro ma'i mtshan nyid kyi le'u ste bzhi bcu pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /sgrub pa po yis lA ma yi/ /
263b6(rgyud): mtshan nyid kyi ni khyad par dang / /yan lag tshogs ni shes par bya'o/ /gang gi bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor ni/ /kun tu zlum por snang 'gyur zhing / /kha yi smra ra rtag tu
263b7(rgyud): yod| |spu dang smin ma ring ba dang / /gos bzang gtsang zhing zhi ba dang / /mi 'khrug ba den par smra ba dang / /rtag tu dam pa'i chos la dga'/ /dpa' bo'i sring mor de
264a1(rgyud): shes bya/ /pad+ma'i phyag rgyar sbyin bya ba/ /yang na rus spal phyag rgya bya/ /pags pa bum pa spyi blugs nyid/ /phyag rgya'i lan du
264a2(rgyud): shes par bya/ /de ni tshes bcu'i res dag la/ /khyim du pad+ma 'bri bar 'gyur/ /lA ma yi ni bud med kyi/ /mtshan nyid gyur pa 'di dag yin/ /gsus pa rlo zhing
264a3(rgyud): mig dkyus ring / /mig ni dmar zhing ser skyar gnas/ /phyug cing skal bzang dpal yon tan/ /ser zhing tsam pa lta bur snang / /shin tu ring min thung ba'am
264a4(rgyud): min| |sna tshogs pa yi gos la dga'/ /dpral bar ri mo gsum yod cing / /mtshams kyi gyen du bltas pa nas/ /rgod cing dga' pa nyid dag dang / /lam
264a5(rgyud): ni rnam par gnon cing gnas/ /g.yul du 'chi ba rnams kyi ni/ /gtam dag la ni rtag tu dga'/ /de lta'i rab dregs mthong na ni/ /mdung gi phyag rgya bstan
264a6(rgyud): par bya| |rkang pa g.yon pa bskum pa yi/ /bdag nyid kyang ni bstan par bya/ /g.yon pa dag ni yongs ldog pa/ /phyag rgya'i lan ni yin par bshad/ /bcu bzhi
264a7(rgyud): dang ni tshes brgyad ni/ /de ni dus tshigs yin par bshad/ /khyim du mdung rtse gsum pa yang / /bris nas de ni rtag tu mchod/ /'jig rten dbang phyug lA ma yi/ /
264b1(rgyud): mtshan nyid gyur pa 'di dag yin/ /gang gi mkhur tshos dag tu ni/ /khung bur snang ba gnas gyur cing / /de bzhin bzhin rtag tu dmar zhing ser/ /mig ni ljang ser dag tu snang / /

264b4(rgyud): mdung gi phyag rgya bstan par bya/ /gnyis pa nyid ni 'bad pa yis/ /dril bu'i phyag rgya bstan par bya/ /g.yon gyi phyogs su ldog pa ni/ /phyag rgya'i lan ni yin par

264b6(rgyud): bya zhing / /'bad pa yis ni gnyis pa yang / /dung gi phyag rgya bstan par bya/ /g.yon nas yongs su ldog pa ni/ /phyag rgya'i lan ni yin par bshad/ /bcu bzhi de yi
264b7(rgyud): dus yin te/ /de yi khyim du rdo rje 'bri/ /shrI he ru ka lA ma yi/ /mtshan nyid gyur ba de dag yin/ /lus kun la ni ba spu yod/ /mig ni nag cing ser ba dang / /sbom
265a1(rgyud): zhing rnam sgyur mi bzod pa/ /bzhin 'phel che zhing kha che la/ /ma mchu rlo zhing kha dog nag /mig zlum sna ni nyams pa dang / /rtag tu glu ni

265a4(rgyud): bar byed/ /rdo rje phag mo lA ma yi/ /mtshan nyid gyur pa 'di dag yin/ /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ lA ma'i mtshan nyid kyi le'u ste bzhi

265a6(rgyud): shes par 'gyur pa'o/ /gang zhig lag g.yon ston pa ni/ /gsong bor smra ba ston pa yin/ /gang zhig srin lag ston pa ni/ /gsong por smra ba lan 'gyur yin//
265a7(rgyud): gang zhig lto ba rdeb pa ni/ /bdag ni bkres par sten pa yin/ /gang zhig dpral ba ston pa ni/ /nam mkha' las ni 'ongs zhes pa'o/ /gang zhig khar ni sor mo 'dzud//

266b1(rgyud): bstan par bya/ /gang zhig sa ni ston byed pa/ /de la nam mkha' bstan par bya/ /gang zhig nam mkha' ston byed pa/ /de la nyi ma bstan par bya/ /gang zhig chu bo ston

267a6(rgyud): longs spyod sa gzhi yin/ /gzhir ni sa gzhi byas nas su/ /rnal 'byor pa yi sdom pa mchod/ /go ldog pa yis lta ba ni/ /bzhin ni rnam par 'gyur ba dang / /

267b1(rgyud): su zlum/ /mkha' 'gro ma rnams des 'gro ba'i/ /de yi mtshan ma shes par bya/ /gal te ldog par gyur na ni/ /sngar bshad don ni btang bar 'gyur/ /de yi dngos
267b2(rgyud): ni 'jig gyur pa/ /rdo rje lta bur gsal ba yin/ /sgra ni khu byug skad lta pur/ /gsal ba de ni rtag tu gyur/ /'di ni mtshan ma'i khyim du ni/ /rdo rje lta bu me long
267b3(rgyud): bcas| |ral gri 'dra ba'i me long bcas/ /phyag mtshan mdung 'drar rtag tu 'byung / /de gsal me long yin zhes bya/ /mtshan mar byas pa'i gzugs

267b5(rgyud): ti po taM gi zhes bya ba ni/ /gsong por smra ba'i lan no/ /ga mu zhes bya ba ni/ 'gro'o zhes bya ba yin no/ /luM baM zhes bya ba ni/ /'ong ngo zhes bya ba yin no/ /de
267b6(rgyud): hi zhes bya ba ni/ zas zhes bya ba yin no/ /gri ha na zhes bya ba ni/ bram ze zhes smra ba yin no/ /pi ra NaM zhes bya ba ni/ /snying nyid do/ /ma ra Na zhes bya ba ni/ sgra
267b7(rgyud): dan no| |g+han+d+ha zhes bya ba ni/ /ka ra ni ka'o/ /shi ro ni/ rdzun no/ /ka ra ni/ lto ba'o/ /ba ra ni/ sgra'o/ /shra ra mo No n-i/ rna ba'o/ /a mr-i ta swa ni/ srub pa'o/ /sa ma
268a1(rgyud): ga ma ni| mi'o/ /ta li ka ni/ mkha' 'gro ma'o/ /na ra ka ni/ dkyil 'khor ro/ /a mo ka ni/ dur khrod do/ /ka li ka ni/ sgo'o/ /
268a2(rgyud): shwa sa ni| bram ze'i rigs so/ /ba ri d+hi ni/ rgyal rigs so/ /bi ra ti ni/ rje'i rigs so/ /kru ra ni/ dmangs so/ /an+ta s+tha ni/ sme sha can no/ /ba shu li
268a3(rgyud): ka ni| khyim mo/ /TA ka ni/ sring mo'o/ /me la ba ka ni/ chu'o/ /gri ha ra Na ni/ rdo rje chu gtong ba'o/ /lce so la reg pa ni/ ltogs par ston pa'o/ /hri sham
268a4(rgyud): ni| dris bsgo ba'o/ /ku ta ni/ gnas che ge mo nas 'ongs so zhes bya ba'o/ /ki ra ni ni/ me tog go /tu mu la ni/ rgod pa'o/ /tan+ta ni/ char dbab pa zlog pa'o//
268a5(rgyud): tri p+ta ni| zhu ba'o/ /d+hur R+yo ni/ shes pa'o/ /nri ha ni/ sprin no/ /d+hu pa ni/ bdug pa'o/ /sa nu ni/ ri bo'o/ /sa ri ta ni/ chu bo'o/ /a gu li ni/ yan

268a7(rgyud): ni| ri dwags so/ /yan+ti ni/ dkyil 'khor ro/ /sha na ma ni/ bzhi mdo'o/ /phal ku shi ni/ skye ba'o/ /ma hA k+Sha ra ba ni/ phyugs chen po'o/ /ga ni/ ra skyes
268b1(rgyud): so| |na ni/ mi'o/ /go ni/ khyu mchog go /ma ni/ ma he'o/ /b+ha ni/ bza' ba'o/ /ha ni/ rnam grangs so/ /a d+h+ya ni/ rgyal po'o/ /kha la reg pa ni/ zos so zhes
268b2(rgyud): pa'o| |lce la reg pa ni/ ngoms so zhes pa'o/ /na sti ni/ snying po'o/ /hri ni/ ngo tsha'o/ /me thun gyis shig pa'o/ /brla la reg pa ni/ stong pa'o/ /steng du gcig
268b3(rgyud): go / 'og tu med pa'o/ /phyag rgya dang phyag rgya'i lan no/ /dpa' bo'i gsung gi gsang ba'i brda'o/ /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ mkha' 'gro
268b4(rgyud): ma'i brda'i cho ga'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa lnga pa'o/ / //de nas rnal 'byor rgyud du ni/ /rnyed dka'i dam tshig nga yis bshad/ /skyes pa'am bud
268b5(rgyud): med g.yon nas 'gro/ /'dod pa'i dngos grub ster bar byed/ /khyim dang zhing du rnam gnas pa/ /shin tu ring yang shes par 'gyur/ /he ru ka las sbyor gzhan
268b6(rgyud): med| |slob dpon rnal 'byor ma nyid ni/ /rgyud 'di ru ni sgrub pa 'o/ /legs par gyur pa nyid yin te/ /brnyas mi bya zhing spang mi bya/ /nus pa yis ni mchod
268b7(rgyud): par bya| |pho nya mo brgyad 'di dag ni/ /mos dang dad pa 'phal byed pa/ /rtag par dngos grub rnams kyi rgyu/ /dam tshig rnams kyang skyong ba 'o/ /lha mo gzhan dag
269a1(rgyud): kun sbyor ba'i/ /'dod la rmongs par gyur pa dang / /gnyis su med dang thogs med dang / /dam tshig spyad par spyod pa dang / /bud
269a2(rgyud): med dbang phyug shin tu sbyor/ /tshangs par spyod pa de bzhin gzhi/ /khro med rgyun gyi kun tu spyod/ /'di brgyad dam tshig kun spyod yin/ /sgrub pa la ni gnas
269a3(rgyud): pa yi| |sgrub pa po yis rtag shes bya/ /rgyud kun gyi ni thun mong ste/ /rgyu med pa ni gzhom mi bya/ /dad pa nyid kyis blang bya yi/ /mig dang lag pas ma yin
269a4(rgyud): no| |gsang ba 'di ni mi bstan cing / /rab tu 'bad de sba ba dang / /blo ldan mthe chung bskyed par ni/ /pho nya mo rnams yang dag gnas/ /dag dang ma dag
269a5(rgyud): 'dres pa ste/ /sgrub pa po ni gsum du gnas/ /mnyes byed rnam par dag pa dang / /gsal byed yon tan ldan pa'i mi'o/ /yul yul du ni dka' thub
269a6(rgyud): can| |pho nya'i gzugs kyi mtshan ma brtag / pho nya ral gri so 'dra zhing / /dag byed pa bsod nams 'phel byed yin/ /de bzhin pho nya legs 'dres pas/ /
269a7(rgyud): sgrub pa po yis dngos grub thob/ /bzlas mchod bsam gtan med par yang / /myur ba nyid du 'grub par 'gyur/ /sngags dang phyag rgya sgrub pa pos/ /mchod
269b1(rgyud): pa nyid la rab tu 'jug / 'di las gzhan pa'i mchod med de/ /de ltar bstan bcos nges pa yin/ /pho nya'i lam la dga' ba dang / /sgrub pa po ni dngos grub
269b2(rgyud): brtson| |rig sngags phyag rgyar yang dag ldan/ /zas la rtag tu spyad par bya/ /sgrub pa po ni legs pa ru/ /mnyam par bzhag pa'i rigs rnams ni/ /kun
269b3(rgyud): la nye bar spyad bya zhing / /bza' min par ni mi brtag go /'di nyid du ni de dbyer med/ /pho nya mo yi sgrub pa nyid/ /dngos grub cho ga la spyod tshe/ /pho nya gcig pu kho na
269b4(rgyud): yin| |byang chub phyogs kyi dngos grub ni/ /sgrub pa dag dang nye bar dang / /bla ma brgyud rim gyis thob pa'i/ /dbang bskur bas ni sngags legs ldan/ /pho nya rnams su
269b5(rgyud): yang dag bshad/ /phyag rgya legs sbyor ngang tshul dang / /chags med gtong dang tshul khrims dang / /ye shes chu skyes yang dag rdzogs/ /sems kyis bdag nyid nang
269b6(rgyud): par langs/ /lus kyi bya ba kun byas te/ /lus la shin tu mtshon cha ni/ /lus la gnas par kun tu spyad/ /dag byed byas pa'i lus kyis ni/ /rtag tu sngags ni brjod
269b7(rgyud): par bya| |rnal 'byor gnas rnams nges bstan cing / /mtshon cha rnams ni 'gom mi bya/ /dam tshig can la khro mi bya/ /mngon par brtson las 'da' mi bya/ /de dang lta
270a1(rgyud): lhan cig bde bar bya/ /bdag gi don dang gzhan don du/ /dam tshig spyod pa nyid du bya/ /'di la lhan cig longs spyod bya/ /mtshan mo rtag

270a4(rgyud): blta| |spyi gtsug la sogs bcing pa spang / /pho nya gtsang sbra dang po yin/ /gnyis pa sbyor ba yin par 'dod/ /zas gcig tu ni za ba nyid/ /gtsang sbra gsum

270a6(rgyud): gang gsungs dang / /de bzhin bde mchog las gang gsungs/ /gsang ba'i rgyud las yang dag bshad/ /de bzhin dpal mchog dang po dang / /rdo rje

270b4(rgyud): yi| |gang zhig spyod pa byed pa yi/ /mi mchog sdig pa thams cad ni/ /rnam dag bdag nyid bde gshegs kyi/ /sa rnams kyang ni thob par 'gyur/ /skye zhing skyo
270b5(rgyud): bar de bzhin gshegs/ /rigs 'gyur chos ldan rgyal por 'gyur/ /de ltar rtag tu mchod byas nas/ /dad pa yis ni gtor ma sbyin/ /de nas mchod pa rnam
270b6(rgyud): dag pas/ /mya ngan 'das las byung ba 'o/ /de bzhin bdag nyid mchod pa dang / /sangs rgyas kun tshogs sras bcas dang / /dpa' bo kun dang rnal 'byor ma//
