302b4(rgyud): dbye| |gdod nas grub byed 'di yin te/ /dngos grub kun la 'jug byed pa'o/ /yi ge brgyad cu rtsa gnyis pa/ /de bzhin dbyangs yig gnyis par sbyar/ /phyi mo yi ni lnga pa la/ /de bzhin yi
302b5(rgyud): ge brgyad cu brgyad/ /ma mo yi ni lnga pa dang / /brgyad cu dgu pa de bzhin te/ /ma mo lnga pa blangs byas te/ /de bzhin yi ge dgu bcu pa/ /ma mo'i lnga pa blangs byas te/ /yi ge dgu bcu
302b6(rgyud): gcig par sbyor/ /ma mo yi ni gnyis pa dang / /yi ge dgu bcu rtsa drug pa/ /dbyangs yig gnyis pa ldan pa yi/ /yi ge dgu bcu rtsa dgu pa/ /gdug pa thams cad skrag
302b7(rgyud): byed pa| |ma mo kun gyi bde ba'i gnas/ /dbyangs kyi yi ge bcu gsum pa/ /yi ge gnyis pa dag dang ldan/ /ma mo bcu gsum pa nyid ni/ /yi ge lnga pa dag dang sbyar/ /gdug
303a1(rgyud): pa thams cad 'khrug byed de/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi bde ba'i gnas/ /dbyangs yig bcu bzhi pa yis ni/ /yi ge brgyad pa dag dang sbyar/ /bco lnga
303a2(rgyud): pa yis rab tu sbyar/ /dbyangs yig bcu bzhi pa nyid ni/ /yi ge dgu pa dag dang sbyar/ /steng du thig le yang dag gnas/ /yi ge dag ni sgrub pa ste/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi khyad
303a3(rgyud): par yin/ /dbyangs yig bcu gcig pa nyid ni/ /yi ge bcu gnyis pa dang sbyar/ /steng du bi n+du sa rnam par brgyan/ /dbyangs kyi yi ge bcu gcig pa/ /yi ge bcu gsum
303a4(rgyud): pa dang sbyar/ /thig les kyang ni rnam par brgyan/ /'byung po kun ni skrag byed cing / /sgrub pa pos ni dga' ba yin/ /dbyangs kyi yi ge lnga pa la/ /yi ge sum cu rtsa gnyis
303a5(rgyud): sbyar| |dbyangs kyi gsum pa nyid dag ni/ /yi ge sum cu gsum dang sbyar/ /ma mo gnyis pa nyid dag dang / /yi ge sum cu rtsa bzhir sbyar/ /dbyangs kyi gnyis pa dag
303a6(rgyud): dang ni/ /yi ge sum cu drug dang sbyar/ /dang po yi ni gnyis pa dag/ yi ge sum cu bdun dang sbyar/ /dbyangs kyi yi ge gsum pa ni/ /yi ge bzhi bcu dang sbyar ba/ /ma
303a7(rgyud): mo bcu gcig pa nyid ni/ /yi ge bzhi bcu gcig dang sbyar/ /dbyangs kyi yi ge gnyis pa yin/ /yi ge bzhi bcu gnyis par sbyar/ /dbyangs kyi gsum pa dag dang
303b1(rgyud): ni| |yi ge bzhi bcu bzhi dang sbyar/ /ma mo'i gnyis pa nyid dang yang / /yi ge bzhi bcu brgyad bar sbyar/ /dbyangs kyi yi ge gnyis pa dang / /yi ge bzhi bcu dgu dang sbyar/ /dbyangs kyi yi ge gnyis pa
303b2(rgyud): dag/ yi ge lnga bcu gnyis par sbyar/ /phyi mo'i lnga pa nyid dang ni/ /yi ge lnga bcu lnga dang sbyar/ /yi ge lnga bcu rtsa bzhi pa/ /thig les kyang ni rnam par brgyan/ /yi ge lnga bcu rtsa lnga pa/ /thig les kyang ni rnam par
303b3(rgyud): brgyan/ /dbyangs kyi yi ge gnyis par sbyar/ /yi ge lnga bcu rtsa brgyad pa/ /thig les mgo la mnan par bya/ /dbyangs kyi yi ge gnyis pa dag/ yi ge drug cu drug cu sbyar/ /phyi mo gnyis pa nyid
303b4(rgyud): kyang ni/ /yi ge drug cu bdun dang sbyar/ /gdug pa'i dngos grub kun 'grub cing / /sgrub pa po la dpal yang stsol/ /dbyangs kyi yi ge bzhi pa dang / /yi ge bdun cu pa dang sbyor/ /thig
303b5(rgyud): les kyang ni rnam par brgyan/ /phyi mo yi ni bzhi pa yis/ /yi ge bdun cu gsum dang sbyar/ /bco lnga pa ni rab blangs te/ /dbyangs yig bcu bzhi pa dang ni/ /yi ge bdun cu
303b6(rgyud): bzhi par sbyar/ /phyi mo bcu bzhi dag pa ni/ /yi ge bdun cu gsum dang sbyar/ /de bzhin bco lnga pa dang sbyar/ /dbyangs kyi yi ge gnyis pa ni/ /yi ge bdun cu bzhi
303b7(rgyud): dang sbyar/ /phyi mo'i yi ge gnyis pa yang / /yi ge bdun cu bdun dang sbyar/ /thig les kyang ni rnam par brgyan/ /phyi mo yi ni gnyis pa yang / /yi ge bdun
304a1(rgyud): cu brgyad dang sbyar/ /thig le gnyis kyis rnam par brgyan/ /phyi mo yi ni gnyis pa yang / /yi ge bdun cu dgu dang sbyar/ /ma mo'i bzhi pa nyid dang
304a2(rgyud): ni| |yi ge brgyad cu pa dang sbyar/ /thig les mgo la mnan par bya/ /dbyangs yig bzhi pa dag kyang ni/ /yi ge bdun cu dgu dang sbyar/ /thig le sgra yis bskyed pa
304a3(rgyud): ste| |thig les kyang ni rnam par brgyan/ /dbyangs kyi yi ge gsum pa dag/ yi ge bcu drug pa dang sbyar/ /'og dang steng gi yi ge grangs/ /dgu bcu rtsa bdun bshad
304a4(rgyud): pa ste| |'di ni rtsa ba'i gsang sngags su/ /mkhas pa rnams kyis shes par bya/ /dngos grub kyi ni gnas yin zhing / /mkha' 'gro'i snying ni 'joms pa na/ /dpal
304a5(rgyud): ldan khrag 'thung lha rigs rgyal/ /bklags pas grub pa don yod pa/ /oM ni dang por sbyar bar bya/ /hUM hUM phaT ni mthar sbyar ba/ /'di ni rtsa ba'i gsang sngags te/ /
304a6(rgyud): grub pa thams cad grub byed yin/ /de nas rang gi bdag nyid kyi/ /dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ /mkha' 'gro ma ni dra ba yi/ /'khor lo bde mchog yin
304a7(rgyud): par 'dod/ /oM shrI badzra he he ru ru kaM huM hUM phaT/ DA ki nI dzA la shaM ba raM swAhA/ hA swA raM ba saM la dzA nI ki DA Ta pha hUM hUM kaM ru ru he he dzrab shrI oM/ /rig pa'i rgyal po'i snying po ni/ /
304b1(rgyud): ma byung 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /Ta pha hUM huM ha ha hriH oM/ /yi ge baM dang yoM dang ni/ /yi ge moM dang tri nyid dang / /hUM dang phaT ces bshad pa yin/ /oM baM badzra bA rA hi/ haM yoM ya mi nI/ hriM moM mo
304b2(rgyud): ha nI/ hreM hrIM saM tsa la nI/ hUM hUM saM trA sa ni/ phaT phaT tsa N+Di ka /rnal 'byor ma ni drug tu bsgrags/ /re'u mig drug la rnam par bsgom/ /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ go
304b3(rgyud): cha'i snying po sgom pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa brgyad pa'o/ / //de nas gzhan yang lha mo yi/ /snying po bla med bshad par bya/ /oM badzra bai ro tsa nI ye hUM hUM phaT swAhA/ /lha mo'i
304b4(rgyud): snying po'i sbyor ba ni/ /bcu gsum pa ni bdag nyid dge/ pad+mo dbus su phag mo ste/ /'dab ma la ni lha mo dgod/ /sgo bzhi dag gi phyogs su ni/ /lha mo'i snying po rnam par bsgom/ /oM
304b5(rgyud): las byung ba'i rta gdong dang / /rdo rje snying po gdug pa'i sgra/ /drag po yang ni g.yo ma dang / /mi 'phrog ma dang dri med ma/ /hUM mdzad ma dang ldan lha mo/ /bsreg blugs ma dang phaT byed
304b6(rgyud): ma| |rang 'byung ma dang bcu gnyis te/ /ha mdzad g.yas pa'i gtso bo yin/ /rdo rje phag mo zhes bya ba/ /dngos grub thams cad stsol mdzad pa/ /sngo dang ser dang dmar ba dang / /ljang gu
304b7(rgyud): steng zhal dkar po ste/ /spyan gsum pa la bzhin rnam sgyur/ /ma che ba rnam par gtsigs pa ste/ /g.yas brkyang bzhugs shing thod phreng can/ /gsus pa rlo zhing skra grol ba/ /phyogs
305a1(rgyud): kyi gos can 'jin pa ste/ /rang gi thabs dang sbyor bas gnas/ /'jigs byed tso muN+De 'jigs mos/ /zhabs kyi 'og tu gnon pas bzhugs/ /thod
305a2(rgyud): pa dang ni kha T+wAM ga / mdung dang gri gug cang te'u dang / /rdo rje dril bu zhags pa dang / /lcags kyu tshangs pa'i mgo bo dang / /dgra sta dang ni sdigs mdzub dang / /na ra'i lpags
305a3(rgyud): pa steng du brkyang / /sku rags dang ni dpung rgyan dang / /phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan/ /sangs rgyas lnga yi cod pan can/ /thugs rje khro gnyer 'jigs pa ste/ /'dab la lha
305a4(rgyud): mo thams cad dgod/ /ma mo dag ni brgyad pa ste/ /ser dang dmar dang ljang ba dang / /lho ni sngo ba'i mdog can te/ /me phyogs dmar la dud ka ste/ /sngo ba dang ni dkar ba
305a5(rgyud): dang / /dbang ldan du ni dgod pa ste/ /spyan gsum pa la skra grol ba/ /phyag rgya lnga dang yang dag ldan/ /skyil krung phyed pas legs par bzhugs/ /thod pa yi ni dbu rgyan
305a6(rgyud): can| |phyogs kyi gos can bzhin rnams sgyur/ /thams cad yi dwags gdan la bzhugs/ /thugs rje'i chags pas rnam par myos/ /rdo rje'i mchog ni gar mdzad cing / /thod
305a7(rgyud): pa rak+tas bkang ba dang / /dril bu cang te'u sgra yang sgrog/ /lha rnams dga' bar byed pa yin/ /sgo rnams su ni sgo srung ste/ /dbang po'i steng du rnam par bzhugs/ /
305b1(rgyud): g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis bzhugs/ /spyan gsum pa la dbu skra brdzes/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can/ /phreng ba'i rgyan gyis spud pa ste/ /thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM ga/ rdo rje
305b2(rgyud): mgo bo phyag na bsnams/ /thams cad rnam bsgyur gsus pa 'phyang / /thams cad mgo bo'i phreng bas brgyan/ /sngo dang ljang dang dkar po ste/ /ser zhing phyag bzhi mdog gnyis
305b3(rgyud): pa| |gcer bu pad+ma'i rgya yang che/ /rang gi rigs kyi dbu rgyan can/ /thams cad rang thabs gnyis pa ste/ /bcu gsum pa ni rnam par bsgom/ /snying po mchog ni sgom pa yin//
305b4(rgyud): 'dod pa thams cad rab tu stsol/ /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ go cha dang lha mo'i snying po sgom pa bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa dgu pa 'o// //de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /shin tu rnyed dka'i dgod pa ste/ /gang zhig shes pa tsam gyis ni/ /myur du dngos grub 'grub pa 'o/ /sa yi cha ni mnyam yid 'ong / /tsan+dan
305b5(rgyud): gyis ni nye bar bsku/ /dri bzang dri ldan sa la ni/ /me tog sil ma gcal bkram shing / /spos kyi dri yis nyams dgar bya/ /bdag gi bya ba kun byas shing / /phyogs bcing ba
305b6(rgyud): bzhin byas nas su/ /de nas rdza rnga'i bcing byas te/ /re mig bzhi bcu dgu zlum la/ /yi ge'i phyi mo dgod par bya/ /der gnas pa las dpa' bo ni/ /'dod pa'i don kun grub/
306a1(rgyud): byed btu/ /rim bzhin 'byung dang rim min sa/ /dbyangs dang yi ge sgrub pos so/ /thub pa de lta'i grangs 'gyur las/ /re'u mig sum cu gnyis pa blang / /
306a2(rgyud): lnga pa yi ni khyad par bya/ /brgya phyed phyed pa yang dag blang / /nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa yis phye/ /re'u mig sum cu drug pa blang / /gsum pa yis ni khyad par dbye/ /de nas sum cu
306a3(rgyud): gnyis pa blang / /lnga pa yis ni khyad par bya/ /de nas nyi shu lnga pa gzung / /nyi shu bzhi pa dag dang sbyar/ /sum cu rtsa gsum yang dag blang / /re'u mig bco lnga la yir ldan//
306a4(rgyud): lnga pa dag dang yang dag bcas/ /de nas nyi shu gnyis pa gzung / /bcu gcig pa yang de bzhin no/ /mdzes pa mchog ni yin par 'dod/ /re'u mig gi ni bcu dgu pa//
306a5(rgyud): ma yi bu dang yang dag ldan/ /re'u mig gsum par rnam par dbye/ /ya mtshan brgyad pa'i sa bon la/ /re'u mig sum cu drug pa dang / /yang dag ldan pa'i yi ger
306a6(rgyud): 'gyur| |slar yang yi ge de dag nyid/ /'dod pa'i don kun grub byed yin/ /de nas rang phyung blangs nas su/ /re'u mig la ni lnga par sbyar/ /spyi bor thig le dag dang
306a7(rgyud): sbyar| |de nas nyi shu gnyis pa gzung / /bcu gcig pa yang de bzhin no/ /don kun grub byed ces bya ba'i/ /tshig ni gnyis pa yin par bshad/ /re'u mig bcu dgu pa
306b1(rgyud): nyid la| |nyi shu rtsa bdun pa yis phye/ /gsum pa dag dang yang dag ldan/ /sum cu gsum pa legs blangs te/ /re'u mig ni gnyis par sbyar/ /nyi shu pa dang yang dag ldan//
306b2(rgyud): mdzes pa'i mchog ni yin par 'dod/ /de bzhin nyi shu gcig pa nyid/ /de bzhin nyi shu drug pa yin/ /lan gnyis bzlas pa'i tshig tu ni/ /shin tu mnyam par bzhag ste
306b3(rgyud): btu| |de nas go rims bzlog pas gzung / /re'u mig las ni dang po nyid/ /bzhi pa'i mtha' dang yang dag ldan/ /de bzhin bco lnga pa dang sbyar/ /de nas nyi shu gnyis
306b4(rgyud): pa gzung / /bcu gcig pa yang de bzhin no/ /chos don 'dod dang thar pa yi/ /tshig ni gsum pa yin par bshad/ /re'u mig gnyis pa'i sa bon dang / /re'u
306b5(rgyud): mig sum cu drug pa nyid/ /de bzhin nyi shu drug pa dang / /sum cu gsum pa yang dag blang / /re'u mig bcu gsum pa yir ldan/ /re'u mig las ni bcu pa nyid/ /go rim
306b6(rgyud): ldog pa sgrub pas blang / /re'u mig las ni bcu dgu pa/ /re'u mig nyi shu gsum pa la/ /gnyis pa dag ni yang dag ldan/ /steng du thig les brgyan par bya/ /de nas chu
306b7(rgyud): yi sa bon gzung / /brgyad pa yang ni de bzhin te/ /me yi bu yis khyad par dbye/ /yi ge hUM phaT mtha' ru sbyar/ /'di ni khams gsum rgyal zhes bya/ /sngags tshig
307a1(rgyud): bzhi yis rnam brgyan pa'o/ /oM ni sku la gsal byed yin/ /hUM dang phaT ni mtha' ru sbyar/ /rig rgyal 'khor lo sgyur ba'i sngags/ /'di ni ma byung 'byung mi
307a2(rgyud): 'gyur| |de nyid bsdus dang dpal mchog dang / /bde mchog rdo rje 'jigs byed du/ /khro bo bzhi dang yang dag ldan/ /sku brgyad dang ni bcas pa ru/ /dkyil 'khor bsrung ba'i don du ni//
307a3(rgyud): gdug pa kun la khyad par du/ /'di ni rnyed pa tsam gyis kyang / /brtag mi dgos par 'chi bar 'gyur/ /sha chen dag gis thams cad kun/ /rdo rje yang ni med par bshad/ /rnal
307a4(rgyud): 'byor thun mong brjod pa ni/ /dngos grub kun gyi 'bras bskyed pa'o/ /oM sum+b+ha ni sum+b+ha huM hUM phaT/ oM gr-ih+na gr-ih+na huM hUM phaT/ oM gr-ih+na pa ya gr-ih+na pa ya huM hUM phaT/ oM A na ya ho
307a5(rgyud): b+ha ga baM badzra huM hUM phaT/ 'di ni gdug pa thams cad du/ /'jigs byed mi bzad par bshad do/ /nam mkha'i khams kyi sa yi mchog /pad+ma'i lte ba'i dbus su ni/ /rdo rje hUM mdzad rnam par
307a6(rgyud): sgom| |gdug pa thams cad nges par gnon/ /phyag ni bcu drug yang dag ldan/ /zhal brgyad pa la bzhin rnam sgyur/ /zhal gyi mche ba rnam par gtsigs/ /thod pa'i phreng bas
307a7(rgyud): rnam par brgyan/ /sangs rgyas lnga yi cod pan can/ /thams cad kun gyis rnam par spud/ /rdo rjes mtshan pa'i phyag rgya drug /sku lus drug pa thugs rje'i nyams/ /g.yas brkyang
307b1(rgyud): ba yi gnas pa yis/ /dbang ldan gyi ni thod pa gnon/ /u ma mchog gi ku tsa gnon/ /khros pa'i spyan gyis rnam par gzigs/ /sku la mgo yi do shal can/ /mgo po'i phreng ba dbu la bcings/
307b2(rgyud): rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya can/ /'jig rten gsum rgyal de bzhin te/ /lcags kyu sdigs mdzub 'ching ba ste/ /dpral ba'i steng du yang dag gnas/ /thugs kar dpral ba phyag rgya ste/ /
307b3(rgyud): bgegs ni rnam par gnon pa yin/ /thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin/ /ral gri lcags kyu 'chang ba ste/ /mdung dang mgo bo cang te'u dang / /na ra'i pags pa'i steng du ste/ /phyag ni bcu
307b4(rgyud): drug de bzhin no/ /stag gi pags pa gos su man bas/ /rang rig gnyis med bde ba'i sku/ /sngo dang dkar dang ser ba dang / /dmar po de bzhin g.yon pa mdzes/ /dkar
307b5(rgyud): dang sngo dang ser ba dang / /steng gi zhal ni dmar po ste/ /spyan gsum pa la dmar ba'i spyan/ /khro bo bzhi dang yang dag ldan/ /las rnams thams cad byed pa dge /'dod
307b6(rgyud): pa'i rdo rje rdo rje sngon/ /bskyed pa'i rdo rje nyid dang ni/ /mi g.yo ba yi rdo rje ste/ /sngo dang ljang dang dmar ba dang / /dud ka ngur smrig bsres pa ste/ /mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa'i
307b7(rgyud): zhal| |thod pa'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /g.yas brkyang pa yi zhabs kyis ni/ /bdud bzhi po ni rnam par gnon/ /na ra'i rus pas sku brgyan cing / /sna tshogs khro
308a1(rgyud): bo'i rigs kyang 'phro/ /thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin/ /rdo rje sdigs mdzub brkyang ba ste/ /rang gi rigs dang gnyis med 'khyud/ /khro bo'i lta bas gzigs mdzad
308a2(rgyud): cing | |dril bu phyag mtshan yang dag ldan/ /'dzin pa'i phyag rgya 'ching ba ste/ /'jig rten gsum rgyal phyag rgya mis/ /khro bo thams cad bcings pa yin/ /stag gi pags pa gos
308a3(rgyud): su mnabs/ /spyan gsum mi bzad 'jigs pa ste/ /tho ba dbyug to mda' dang ni/ /ral gri dril bu de bzhin te/ /yang na rdo rje dril bu dang / /thams cad khre bo'i rigs rjes 'gro/ /
308a4(rgyud): 'khyud pa'i phyag kyang de bzhin te/ /zhal gsum pa la phyag drug pa/ /thams cad spyan gsum dngos grub mchog /sku gsung thugs su sbyor ba yis/ /dkyil 'khor dngos
308a5(rgyud): grub mchog dam pa/ /sum cu rtsa bdun rnam par dag /yi ge'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ /oM sum+b+ha ni sum+b+ha hUM hUM phaT/ oM gr-ih+na gr-ih+na hUM hUM phaT/ oM gr-ih+na pa ya gr-ih+na pa
308a6(rgyud): ya gr-ih+Na pa ya hUM hUM phaT/ oM A na ya ho b+ha ga bAM badzra hUM hUM phaT/ /dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma mthong nas/ /thams cad bskyed par rnam par bsgom/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i sbyor
308a7(rgyud): ba te| |kha sbyar lnga yis ngo bo nyid/ /rnal 'byor pa yi dkyil 'khor yin/ /snying po mchog gi sgom pa yin/ /de bzhin khyi dang phag gi sha /zangs kyi gtsug phung can de
308b1(rgyud): bzhin/ /mngon spyod kyi ni bya ba la/ /bza' dang sbyin sreg gtor ma bya/ /ma lus lus pa med grub cing / /rgyal srid thams cad rab grub 'gyur/ /dung dang nya phyis mu tig ste/ /gsum
308b2(rgyud): char rgyur las byung ba yin/ /chos kyi ye shes lus can gyi/ /thod pa la ni su zhig smod/ /dpa' bo thod pa'i phreng ba 'chang / /zla ba phyed pas rgyan du byas/ /dpa' bo'i dpa'
308b3(rgyud): dbang yin par bshad/ /khrag 'thung rdo rje can rnam pa/ /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ /srung ba zhal bzhi par byin gyis brlabs pa khro bo bzhi'i dkyil 'khor
308b4(rgyud): rdo rgyus kyis bris pa rdo rje hUM mdzad bskyed pa'i le'u ste drug cu pa'o/ / //de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /sde tshan brgyad ni rnam sgom pa/ /mkha' dbyings pad+ma'i
308b5(rgyud): dbus gnas par/ /khrag 'thung rdo rje rnam par bsgom/ /zhal lnga pa la phyag bcu pa/ /spyan gsum shin tu dmar ba ste/ /g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis bzhugs/ /zhal
308b6(rgyud): rnam sgyur zhing 'jigs pa ste/ /mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa'i zhal/ /thod pa'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /drag po zla ba phyed pa 'dzin/ /sna tshogs rdo rjes dbu la mnan/ /ral
308b7(rgyud): pa'i cod pan 'ching ba ste/ /phyag rgya drug gi mtshan gyis rgyan/ /stag gi pags pa gos su mnabs/ /rig pa gnyis med bde ba'i nyams/ /sku la thod rlon do shal can/ /thugs
309a1(rgyud): rje'i nyams kyis khyab par myos/ /dkar dang sngo dang sprin gyi gzugs/ /sku ni sgeg cing ldem bag can/ /g.yas dang g.yon gyi zhal dag ni/ /ser dang
309a2(rgyud): dmar dang ljang ba dang / /dud pa yi ni mdog can no/ /rdo rje dril bus mnyam ldan pas/ /rang gi rigs dang yang dag 'khril/ /tshangs lpags bshus nas mnabs par mdzad/ /
309a3(rgyud): rgyab tu nges par 'dzin pa yin/ /thod pa kha T+wAM ga 'dzin cing / /mdung dang cang te'u gri gug dang / /thod pa dag ni 'dzin pa ste/ /bcom ldan baM hUM nges 'byung ba/ /'jigs byed rang
309a4(rgyud): gi chung mar bcas/ /zhabs kyi 'og tu mnan par sbyar/ /shar 'dab lha mor dgod pa ste/ /ji srid lho phyogs de bzhin te/ /me la sogs pa'ang dgod par bya/ /de srid dbang ldan sogs
309a5(rgyud): de bzhin/ /A yi mkha' 'gro ma dang ni/ /kA yi mkha' 'gro ma de bzhi/ /tsa yi mkha' 'gro ma dang ni/ /Ta yi mkha' 'gro ma dag ste/ /dkar dang dmar dang ser ba dang / /sngo
309a6(rgyud): ba'i mdog can lho phyogs so/ /dmar dang dud ka ljang gu dang / /ser po dbang ldan yang dag gnas/ /ta yi mkha' 'gro ma dang ni/ /pa yi mkha' 'gro ma de bzhin/ /de nas
309a7(rgyud): ya yi mkha' 'gro ma/ /sha yi mkha' 'gro ma brgyad pa/ /de dag kun ni spyan gsum ste/ /zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa/ /'jig rten skyong ba brgyad po yi/ /rkang pa g.yas brkyang
309b1(rgyud): zhabs kyis gnon/ /rnam gyur mche ba rnam gtsigs zhal/ /phyogs kyi gos mchog 'dzin pa ste/ /phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan/ /skra grol thugs rje khro bo bzhin/ /drag po
309b2(rgyud): yul 'khrug byed pa ste/ /'dod pa'i don kun grub byed yin/ /'gro ba thams cad smon byed de/ /thams cad ci 'dod rdzogs pa yin/ /thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin/ /dril bu cang
309b3(rgyud): te'u yis brgyan pa/ /sde tshan mkha' 'gro bde ba ste/ /'di dag rnal 'byor ma yis bsgom/ /yang na phag mo dgod bya ste/ /bdag mo yang ni gzhag par bya/ /rdo rje sems
309b4(rgyud): dpa'i bdag po ste/ /mkhas pas kyang ni bsgom par bya/ /sku gsung thugs su sbyor ba dang / /sa 'og sa steng rab tu 'khrug /oM a ka tsa Ta ta pa ya sha huM hUM phaT swAhA/ brtan
309b5(rgyud): pa dang ni g.yo ba'i bdag / ma lus ji srid 'di yis 'grub/ /sde tshan mkha' 'gro dam pa mchog /b+ha ga'i dbus su bsgom par bya/ /a sha /kA kaM /tsarma tsa/ TaM ta pa ka /ta
309b6(rgyud): pa sa ta tha/ pa ba na dza yaM ma b+ha haM tsa/ sha ra b+ha tsa ta tha/ sbrang rtsi mar dang bcas pa ni/ /rtag tu dus su 'di brgyad bza'/ /rgas dang nad dang 'chi med par/ /skye ba 'di la dngos
309b7(rgyud): grub 'byung / /chang gi btung ba dang bcas pa/ /zos pa tsam gyis dbang du 'gyur/ /de ma rnyed na'ang sa lus bya/ /skye ba bdun pa'i nang gnas shing / /phyugs ni zas su rta spyad
310a1(rgyud): na| |skad cig gis ni mkha' spyod 'gyur/ /'di la yid gnyis dpyod pa med/ /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ sde tshan gyi sbyor ba'i
310a2(rgyud): le'u ste drug cu rtsa gcig pa'o/ / //de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /rnal 'byor mchog gis gar da ba/ /dpa' bo dang ni rnal 'byor ma/ /ma mo'i dkyil 'khor
310a3(rgyud): sngar bshad do/ /mkha' 'gro ma sogs mkha' 'gro ni/ /gar da pa yi gzugs su bya/ /phag mo'i gzugs ni de nyid kyang / /zhal ni gar da ba ru bya/ /sngar bshad gnas dang
310a4(rgyud): phyag mtshan dang / /zhal ni gzhan yang rtogs par bya/ /sngar bshad mtshan ma'i rim pa yis/ /mkha' 'gro ma ni lag mdung thogs/ /thugs kyi 'khor lo thams cad kun/ /
310a5(rgyud): mkha' lding gdong ni 'jigs pa can/ /gsung gi 'khor lo rma bya'i gdong / /sku yi 'khor lo seng+ge'i gdong / /khyi dang phag dang 'ug pa dang / /khwa yi zhal gdong de bzhin te/ /
310a6(rgyud): zur la gshin rje sreg sogs kun/ /ma he ri dwags zhal gdong yin/ /dkyil 'khor ma lus can rnams kyang / /spyan gsum mig ni shin tu dmar/ /'di ni rnal 'byor
310a7(rgyud): mchog dam pa/ /sdug bsngal thams cad zad par byed/ /rnal 'byor blo gros dngos grub dag /rnal 'byor mchog ni ster bar 'gyur/ /rdo rje theg pa'i man ngag
310b1(rgyud): dang / /ngag gi dngos grub rab tu ster/ /ma thos pa yi chos bstan pas/ /sems can rnams ni srid las grol/ /bla na med pa nyid bstan pas/ /mi snang la sogs dngos
310b2(rgyud): grub 'gyur/ /su yang rung bas 'jig rten gsum/ /de kun de ma thag tu mthong / /sngar bshad dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma'i/ /gsang sngags rnams kyang de bzhin te/ /mkha'
310b3(rgyud): 'gro ma mo de bzhin no/ /sngar bshad sngags kyi bdag po rnams/ /bzlas na dngos grub rab ster cing / /rtag tu bde ba thams cad 'thob/ /rnal 'byor nye snying bzlas na ni/ /gar
310b4(rgyud): da'i dngos grub mkha' la 'gro/ /brtul zhugs med pa'ang brtul zhugs 'thob/ /mi gtsang pa'ang gcang bar 'gyur/ /dbul po'ang nor gyi bdag por 'gyur/ /nad yod pa yang
310b5(rgyud): med par 'gyur/ /long ba yis kyang mthong bar 'gyur/ /mngon par shes pa lnga thob 'gyur/ /bong bu'i sha dang rta sha dang / /khyi dang ba lang glang po mi/ /rnga mo lce spyang de bzhin te/ /
310b6(rgyud): brgyad po'ang mnyam pa mchog yin no/ /rnal 'byor bdag gis de brgyad bza'/ /dri chen chu dang sbrang rtsi mar/ /bsam gtan bsgoms te bza' byas nas/ /yang ba'i dngos grub
310b7(rgyud): thob par 'gyur/ /gzugs yongs bsgyur pa'i dngos grub cing / /rang gi gzugs su'ang 'gyur ba yin/ /rnal 'byor gang dang gar gnas par/ /bza' ba yang ni bza' bar
311a1(rgyud): bshad/ /'gro dang mi 'gro de bzhin te/ /btung zhing btung zhing dngos grub 'gyur/ /ma dang bu mo sring mo dang / /rang gi gnyen dang tsha mo dang / /blo ldan
311a2(rgyud): ji ltar 'dod pa yis/ /phyag rgya phyag rgya chen po 'grub/ /gar da'i mkha' 'gro bsgoms na ni/ /myur du 'gugs pa'i dngos grub 'gyur/ /mchog 'di yang ni gsang ba ste/ /
311a3(rgyud): su la yang ni brjod mi bya/ /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ ji ltar 'dod pa'i bong bu'i mdzad pa dngos grub kyi rgyu sgrub pa'i le'u ste drug cu rtsa gnyis pa'o// //da nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /mkha' 'gro lnga yi rnam sgom pa/ /rigs las brgyad pa'i cho ga yin/ /gdan dang phyag mtshan sa bon te/ /'di ni sa bon mchog gyur pa'o/ /nga nya Na
311a4(rgyud): na ma zhes pa/ /'di ni sa bon mchog grub pa/ /nga ni rdo rje mkha' 'gro ste/ /nya ni sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro yin/ /Na ni rin chen mkha' 'gro ste/ /na ni pad+ma mkha' 'gro yin/ /ma ni sna
311a5(rgyud): tshogs mkha' 'gro ste/ /mkha' 'gro lnga ni mchog yin te/ /zhe sdang gti mug nga rgyal dang / /chags dang phrag dog de bzhin te/ /rigs ni lnga po 'di dag gis/ /'dod las
311a6(rgyud): grol ba'i 'bras bu stsol/ /rdo rje 'khor lo rin chen dang / /pad+ma ral gri lnga pa yin/ /sngo dang dkar ba nyid dang ni/ /ser dang dmar po ljang gu dang / /rdo rje'i phyag rgya byang chub
311b1(rgyud): mchog / rin chen phyag rgya'ang de bzhin te/ /pad+ma'i phyag rgya bzhi pa ste/ /ral gri'i phyag rgya lnga pa yin/ /glang po seng+ge rta dang ni/ /rma bya mkha' lding de bzhin te/ /khyab 'jug
311b2(rgyud): tshangs pa nyi ma dang / /dbang phyug che dbang po yang de/ /rang rig yan lag dang bcas pa/ /gnyis med bde bas yang dag gnas/ /shar dang lho dang nub dang ni/ /byang du yang ni de
311b3(rgyud): bzhin 'dir/ /dpa' bo'i 'khor dang bcas par dgod/ /lnga po yang dag lnga sangs rgyas/ /lnga po bdag nyid lnga yin no/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ste/ /zla ba'i dkyil
311b4(rgyud): 'khor shar du'o/ /lho dang nub dang de bzhin te/ /byang na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor lo/ /yang na dbus su zla ba ste/ /shar du yang ni nyi ma'i gdan/ /de dag dpa' bor gyur pa ste/ /'di lta
311b5(rgyud): ste| rdo rje thod pa dang / rdo rje mkha' mnyam dang / rdo rje snying po dang / rdo rje sra ba dang bzhi po de dag ni/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i dkyil 'khor te/ glang po che'i gdan khri bya'o/ /rdo rje zla ba
311b6(rgyud): dang / rdo rje rgyal mtshan dang / rdo rje rgyal po dang / rdo rje sgra dang de dag ni/ sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro'i dkyil 'khor te/ seng+ge'i gdan khri'o/ /'dod pa'i rdo rje dang / rdo rje sprin dang /
311b7(rgyud): rdo rje Ta har dang / rdo rje bzhad pa dang de dag ni/ rin chen mkha' 'gro'i dkyil 'khor ste/ rta'i gdan khri'o/ /rdo rje mes dpal dang / rdo rje 'joms pa dang / rdo rje sreg byed dang /
312a1(rgyud): rdo rje dri bral dang / de dag gi pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor te/ rma bya'i gdan khri'o/ /rdo rje ba dan dang / rdo rje glu dang / rdo rje dpa' ba dan dang / rdo rje 'jigs byed dang de dag ni/
312a2(rgyud): las kyi mkha' 'gro'i dkyil 'khor te/ /mkha' lding gi gdan khri'o/ /dpa' bo de dag kyang rang gi rigs dang / thod pa'i phreng ba can/ spyan gsum pa/ rang gi shes rab dang
312a3(rgyud): 'khyud pa/ rdo rje skyil mo krung gis yi dwags kyi gdan la bzhugs pa'o/ /mche ba rnam bar gtsigs shing rnam par 'gyur ba/ stag gi pags pa gos su mnabs pa/
312a4(rgyud): zhal gcig pa/ phyag bzhi pa/ thod pa dang kha T+wAM 'dzin pa/ cang te'u'i sgra hUM dang bcas pa/ mgo bo'i phreng ba'i do shal gyis brgyan pa/ phyag rgya lnga 'chang ba/ rang gi
312a5(rgyud): rigs kyi dbu rgyan can/ ral pa dang zla ba 'dzin pa'o/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i shar dkar po/ byang ljang gu /nub dmar po/ lho ser po/ las kyi mkha' 'gro'i shar ser
312a6(rgyud): po| byang sngon po/ nub dkar po/ lho dmar po/ pad+ma'i mkha' 'gro'i shar dkar ba/ byang ljang gu /nub sngon po/ lho ser po/ rin chen mkha' 'gro'i shar ljang gu /
312a7(rgyud): byang ser po/ nub dkar po/ lho sngon po/ sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro'i shar sngon po/ byang ljang gu /nub dmar po/ lho ser po/ 'di dag ji lta'i rim pa yis/ /rdo rje
312b1(rgyud): 'khor lo ral gri dang / /pad+ma rin chen phreng ba yin/ /chas ni yongs su bskor bar bya/ /grwA bzhi ma mo bzhi bsgom ste/ /ma mo rmongs byed ma dang ni/ /ma mo zhe sdang nyid yin te/ /
312b2(rgyud): chags pa yi ni ma mo dang / /phrag dog ma mo de bzhin te/ /me yi phyogs la sogs par dgod/ /dkar dang sngo dang dmar dang ljang / /skra grol ma la bzhin rnam sgyur/ /spyan
312b3(rgyud): gsum pa la gcer bu ste/ /phyag rgya lnga ni 'dzin pa yin/ /phyag bzhi pa la zhal gcig pa/ /yi dwags gdan la rnam par bzhugs/ /dbang chen me dang chu dang ni/ /rlung gi
312b4(rgyud): dkyil 'khor dag tu gnas/ /rigs kyi gdan la bzhugs pa yin/ /'khor lo rdo rje pad+ma dang / /ral gri thod pa kha T+wAM ga /gri gug yang ni phyag na 'chang / /ma ning las byung lha mo
312b5(rgyud): bsgom| |thod pa yi ni phreng ba can/ /skyil mo krung ni phyed pa'o/ /rdo rje gnod sbyin dang / rdo rje srung ba dang / rdo rje 'gying ba dang / rdo rje rta gdong dang / rdo rje dred gdong dang / rdo rje bde
312b6(rgyud): mchog dang / rdo rje dam tshig dang / rdo rje rta mchog ste/ khro bo'i rgyal po de dag ni/ /sgo rnams dang ni mtshams su ste/ /sngo dang ljang dang dmar ser po/ /dmar dang sngo dang dud ka dkar/ /
312b7(rgyud): lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dang / /dril bu thod pa kha T+wAM ga /cang te'u yang ni de bzhin te/ /thod pa dbyig to mdung dang ni/ /dgra sta thod pa kha T+wAM ga /mgo bo phyag na bsnams
313a1(rgyud): pa'o| |zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa/ /dbu skra dmar ser gyen du brdzes/ /phyag rgya lnga ni 'dzin pa ste/ /stag gi pags pa gos su mnabs/ /thod pa
313a2(rgyud): yi ni phreng ba 'chang / /mgo bo'i dor shal rnam par brgyan/ /nyi ma pad+ma'i steng du ni/ /g.yas brkyang ba yis zhabs kyis bzhugs/ /phyogs skyong brgyad kyi khri la bzhugs/ /
313a3(rgyud): mche ba rnam gtsigs rnam gyur zhal/ /spyan gsum rang rigs cod pan can/ /rang gi rigs dang gnyis med sbyor/ /snying rje yi ni nyams can te/ /phyi rol rdo rje yi dwags
313a4(rgyud): kyis| |yongs su bskor bar bsgom par bya/ /thog mar gsal byed ming dang hUM/ /mtha' ru phaT dang sbyar bar bya/ /sngar bshad cho ga'i srung ba bya/ /phung po khams dang sgye
313a5(rgyud): mched dang / /lus ngag yid las bsgom par bya/ /mkha' 'gro zhal drug phyag bcu gnyis/ /rang gi mtshan ma dril bu yis/ /gnyis su med par mnyam par ldan//
313a6(rgyud): mdung dang lcags kyu thod pa dang / /kha T+wAM ga dang mgo bo dang / /cang te'u dang ni gri gug dang / /na ra'i pags pa 'dzin pa yin/ /sngo dang ser dang dmar ljang gu/ /dud ka dang ni dkar
313a7(rgyud): ba dang / /dkar dang sngo dang ser dmar dang / /ljang dang thal ba'i mdog lta bu'o/ /ser dang sngo dang dkar ba dang / /dmar dang ljang gu pad+ma'i mdog /dmar dang dkar dang sngon po dang //
313b1(rgyud): ser dang ljang dang nam mkha'i mdog /ljang dang dkar dang dmar ba dang / /sngo dang ser dang dkar ba'i mdog /de dag mkha' 'gro lnga yi ni/ /zhal mdog gi ni khyad par yin/ /yang na
313b2(rgyud): zhal gcig phyag gnyis bsgom/ /phreng ba'i gsang sngags ming dang bcas/ /mkhas pas zur bzhi mtshams nas so/ /mthar ni hUM hUM phaT dang sbyar/ /oM ma hA su kha badzra DA ka hUM Da ki
313b3(rgyud): nI dzA la shaM ba ra AH hUM phaT swAhA/ /oM ma hA su kha bud+d+ha DA ka bruM DA ki nI dzA la shaM ba ra AH hUM phaT swAhA/ /oM ma hA su kha rak+Sha DA ka traM DA ki nI dzA la shaM ba ra AH hUM phaT swAhA/ /oM ma hA su
313b4(rgyud): kha pad+ma DA ki hrIH DA ki nI dzA la shaM ba ra A hUM phaT swAhA/ oM ma hA su kha bi shwa DA ka khaM DA ki nI dzA la shaM ba ra AH hUM phaT swAhA/ /de dag ni/ mkha' 'gro lnga'i snying po'i gsang sngags
313b5(rgyud): te 'di ni/ ye shes kyi snying por gyur pa yin no/ /oM badzra DA ka daM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM bud+d+ha DA ka nyaM hUM phaT/ oM rat+na DA ka NaM hUM phaT/ oM pad+ma DA ka naM hUM phaT/ oM bi shwa DA ka maM hUM
313b6(rgyud): phaT| ye shes dam tshig ro gcig pa/ /mkhas pas bsgoms par byas nas su/ /dam tshig gis ni legs dbang bskur/ /sna tshogs mchod pa rnam par bsgom/ /dkyil 'khor
313b7(rgyud): dag ni thams cad kyang / /go 'phang dran nas dbang yang bskur/ /sna tshogs phun sum tshogs pa'i mchog /de bzhin 'khyud dang tsum pa na/ /b+ha ga'i ling+ga'i sbyor ba dag /ye shes
314a1(rgyud): rnam smin dpa' ba'i mchog / shes rab thabs kyi phyag rgya drug /rnam par lta zhing nges par brtag /dga' pa dang po ye shes te/ /mchog tu dga' ba mnyam
314a2(rgyud): par sbyor/ /bde bar dga' bar grub pa che/ /lhan cig skyes dga' bla med yin/ /sbyor ba dang ni shin tu sbyor/ /sbyor ba che dang ye shes sbyor/ /de dag cho ga'i rim pa'o/ /thig le'i
314a3(rgyud): gzhung gi spyor shes na/ /phra ba'i sbyor bas blta bar bya/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rgyu/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi go 'phang thob/ /cho ga nges par bsgrubs nas ni/ /myur du rnal
314a4(rgyud): 'byor pa yis 'grub/ /'di ni nges pa kho na'o/ /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ gsang ba'i ye shes kyi le'u ste drug cu rtsa gsum pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /thugs kyi snying po mchog gyur pa/ /mkha' dbyings rdo rje'i dbus gnas par/ /ye shes zla ba rnam par bsgom/ /A yi yi ge las byung ba/ /rdo rje
314a5(rgyud): sems dpa' bde ba che/ /kha ba kun da'i mdog lta bu/ /dag pa'i shel dang mtshungs pa'o/ /zhal gsum phyag drug zhi ba ste/ /spyan gsum pa la thugs rje'i nyams/ /sna tshogs
314a6(rgyud): pad+ma zla dbus bzhugs/ /stong pa'i ye shes las byung ba/ /zla ba phyed pa ral pa 'ching / /thod pa yi ni dbu rgyan can/ /rgyan rnams thams cad yang dag rdzogs/ /rdo rje skyil
314b1(rgyud): mo krung gis bzhugs/ /rang gi lus dang sbyor bar gnas/ /snying rje chags dang mngon gyur pa/ /dkar zhing sngo la dmar ba'i zhal/ /rnam pa gsum gyi rang bzhin can/ /rdo rje dril bu
314b2(rgyud): mnyam par ldan/ /lha mo mchu ni rnam 'tshir te/ /rdo rje mdung dang thod pa dang / /kha T+wAM ga dang thod pa 'dzin/ /yi ge A dang nyi dbus bzhugs/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rnam par bsgom//
314b3(rgyud): i las rdo rje zla ba ste/ /I las rdo rje sgyu 'phrul lo/ /e las chos kyi rdo rje ste/ /ai las sna tshogs sgyu 'phrul ma/ /lha mo bzhi po de dag ni/ /de yi zhal mdog 'dzin pa'o/ /
314b4(rgyud): skra grol ba la mig po che/ /snying rje chags pas rnam par myos/ /rang gi thabs dang lhan cig bcas/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /sna tshogs yi dwags steng du bsgom/ /gtso
314b5(rgyud): bo shes rab skyil mo krung / /thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can/ /phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan/ /rdo rje dril bus mnyam par ldan/ /mdung dang gri gug phyag na bsnams/ /thod pa kha
314b6(rgyud): T+wAM ga 'dzin cing / /dngos grub thams cad rab tu stsol/ /ji ltar dpa' bo'i rnal 'byor bzhin/ /de yi mdog dang phyag mtshan 'dzin/ /lha mo bzhi yi kha sbyar gsang / /snying po sbyor ba mchog
314b7(rgyud): yin no| |gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa na| / thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs/ /gsang ba kun gyi mchog de nyid/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi snying po mchog /gsang ba'i ye shes dam tshig ste/ /
315a1(rgyud): chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin yin/ /u ni snying gar sgom pa ste/ /U ni mgo bor de bzhin no/ /oM ni spyi gtsug dag tu ste/ /oM ni mig tu dgod par bya//
315a2(rgyud): aM ni go char dgod pa ste/ /aH ni mtshon du rnam par dgod/ /sku gsung thugs su sbyor pa yis/ /bdag nyid kyang ni sgom par gnas/ /ye shes dam tshig sbyor ba yis/ /bla
315a3(rgyud): med mchog dang dbang yang bskur/ /mnyam pa'i dam tshig sbyor ba yis/ /chos kyang de bzhin mnyam pa yis/ /dngos po kun ni ro gcig ste/ /gnyis su med pa'i mchog grub
315a4(rgyud): pa| |dam tshig thun mtshams bzhin du ste/ /dus bzhi dag tu rnam par bsgom/ /kha sbyor bzhi yi sbyor ba ni/ /thun bzhi la ni rnam par bsam/ /snying rjes kun la 'gro bya zhing / /
315a5(rgyud): cha med par ni rnam par bsgom/ /thams cad rdo rje sems dpa' ste/ /shes rab cha med rjes su 'gro/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor dbang phyug sbyor/ /bdag nyid rdo rje bdag po yin/ /bgrang
315a6(rgyud): du med pa'i rus pa yin/ /ye shes bzlas pa yin par bshad/ /bzlas pa ye shes sgom pa ste/ /sprul pa drug ni spro ba'o/ /de bas dam tshig bzlas pa yin/ /cho ga bzhin du bzlas
315a7(rgyud): pa bya| |u o o uH/ AM aH/ oM AH/ a AH/ i I/ u U/ e A+ai/ o au/ aM AH hUM swAhA/ dung chen phreng ba blangs nas ni/ /rtag tu gsang sngags rgyal
315b1(rgyud): po bzla| |dag byed bsod nams chen po ste/ /dge zhing nyes pa 'joms pa yin/ /sdug bsngal thams cad 'joms byed cing / /dge ba kun gyi 'bras bu ste/ /gsang sngags kun
315b2(rgyud): gyi ston pa ste/ /rnam par dben pa'i sa phyogs su/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi snying po yi/ /dgyes pa'i bde ba las byung ba/ /lha mo bzhi po dga' ba ste/ /rnal 'byor dbang phyug mchog tu
315b3(rgyud): bde| |rigs kyi bde ba bcom ldan 'das/ /rang byung rdo rje sems dpa' yin/ /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ lha mo bzhi'i gsang ba kha sbyor gyi le'u ste drug cu
315b4(rgyud): rtsa bzhi pa'o/ / //de nas sbyor ba'i mchog bshad pa/ /gdug pa thams cad za byed pa/ /ma rungs phyi dang nang 'joms pa/ /nam mkha' stong ba lta bu las/ /yi ge k+Sha
315b5(rgyud): las mngon byung zhing / /mkha' 'gro dra ba bde mchog ni/ /phyag gnyis pa la zhal gcig pa/ /spyan gsum pa la 'jigs pa'i zhal/ /g.yas brkyang ba yis bzhugs pa la/ /ma rungs
315b6(rgyud): bdud kyi dgra gnon cing / /phyag rgya chen po mnyam ldan pas/ /thod pa dril bus yang dag 'khyud/ /thod pa'i dbus su yid 'ong ba'i/ /rdo rje mchog gis rnam par mtshan/ /ye shes
315b7(rgyud): bdud rtsis yongs gang ba/ /lag pa g.yas par bzhag nas ni/ /sna tshogs pa yi sku lus la/ /phyag rgya drug gis sku yang brgyan/ /zhal gdong mche ba rnam gtsigs shing / /spyi
316a1(rgyud): gtsug thod pas rgyan du byas/ /sna tshogs rdo rjes spyi bor mtshan/ /zla ba byed par la pa 'chang / /rdo rje sems dpa'i dbu rgyan can/ /rdo rje 'jigs byed sgom pa
316a2(rgyud): yin| |dogs pa rnam par spangs shing yongs su dag pa'i blos/ /rnam par rtog pa'i dri ma'i khyad par med par byed/ /byams dang snying rje'i rgyan gyis lus la rgyan du byas/ /
316a3(rgyud): 'dzem med bde ba'i rnal 'byor legs par bslabs pa'i bdag /shin tu 'jigs pa'i dud 'gro'i dur khrod chen po na/ /ro langs srin po sna tshogs sgra rnams sgrog
316a4(rgyud): par byed/ /pheM gyi sgra byed pa yi 'jigs pas khyad par byed/ /gzhan yang sgrub po rnal 'byor mthun pa'i yul du sgrub/ /yang na zhal ni bzhi pa dang / /'di la phyag brgyad

316a6(rgyud): la bskyod pa'i ljags/ /hA hA hI hI hUM hUM phaT/ /phaT ces bya ba'i sgra sgrog cing / /dpa' bo'i gcig pu 'jigs mdzad pa/ /gdul dka' thams cad 'dul mdzad
316a7(rgyud): cing | |sku gsung thugs kyi sbyor ba yis/ /khro bo'i sprin ni mkhas pas spro/ /bsam gtan dga' ba bsgrub pa'i phyir/ /khro bo yi ni sku ru sgrub/ /dam tshig bza' zhing
316b1(rgyud): bzlas pa bya/ /dam tshig kha sbyar byas nas bzla/ /mnyam par gnas shing bzlas nas su/ /chos rnams ma lus bsgom par bya/ /oM ak+sha hUM phaT/ srid gsum sdig pa
316b2(rgyud): zad byed cing / /mtshams med lnga yang zad byed par/ /sdug bsngal thams cad zad byed cing / /srid pa dag kyang sbyong bar byed/ /sbyor ba yi ni mchog dam pa/ /bklags tsam gyis

316b4(rgyud): sprul pa'i rgyan rnams spro/ /khams gsum dag ni sgrol bar byed/ /sngags pas sngags kyi mchog de ni/ /ming dang bcas pas lhan cig bzla/ /oM phaT che ge mo b+hak+Sha ya phaT/ k+Sha hUM phaT/

321b7(rgyud): 'dren pa/ /saM las ngan song kun 'joms pa/ /dzaM las dra ba can gyi 'od/ /tsaM las zla ba'i 'od yin te/ /raM las byung ba'i rin chen 'od/ /sUM las nyi ma'i 'od yin no/ /

322a7(rgyud): ma| |ye shes sgron dang rgyal byed ma/ /sgrol ma ngang ni gos dkar mo/ /spyan dang mA ma kA ma chog dang / /rgyal mtshan so sor 'brang ma dang / /rma bya dang ni ri khrod
322b1(rgyud): ma| |lu gu rgyud dang phyir zlog ma/ /lha mo gtsug tor rdor 'jigs ma/ /sngon grub pa yi lha mo ste/ /'dod pa'i 'bras bu thams cad stsol/ /gsal byed ming dang bcas

322b3(rgyud): par mdzad pa yin/ /shes rab mthar byed bzhi po ni/ /'dod pa'i don kun sgrub byed yin/ /'dod rgyal dbyug sngon stobs pa che/ /brgyad par mi g.yo grags pa ste/ /

322b6(rgyud): hUM phaDa swA hAr sbyar/ /gsal byed ming dang hUM dang ni/ /mthar ni phaDa dang swA hAr sbyar/ /gzugs dang sgra yi lha mo dang / /dri dang ro yi lha mo ste/ /'dab ma bzhi la rnam
322b7(rgyud): par sbyar/ /phyogs kyi gos can skra grol ma/ /reg pas reg pa'i rdo rjer grags/ /gnyis su med par yang dag gnas/ /dbus su khrag 'thung rgyal po ni/ /lha mo'i
323a1(rgyud): reg pas bde bar bzhugs/ /snying po chos kyi dbyings su grags/ /shes rab pha rol phyin las byung / /ye shes sems dpa' gnyis
323a2(rgyud): med bzhugs/ /rdo rje chos kyi dbyings ma ste/ /gnyis med mnyam pa'i ye shes ni/ /chos kyi dbyings de mi dmigs pa'o/ /de ni gsang ba de nyid mchog /rdo rje
323a3(rgyud): can ni yang dag stsol/ /che ba'i mchog ni 'dus pa ste/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog /sbyor ba rgyud kyi rjes 'brangs pa/ /bgrod dang bgrod min rnal 'byor
323a4(rgyud): ma| |rig pa'i rgya mtsho mchog yin te/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro nyung zad cig /sgyu 'phrul sdom pa'i rgyud yin no/ /rnal 'byor ma ni 'byung ba'i rgyud/ /gsang ba'i rgya
323a5(rgyud): mtsho rgyud yin te/ /nges brjod rgyud ni bla med pa/ /'dus pa mchog ni bshad pa yin/ /ji ltar bsam pa'i khyad par gyis/ /sems can rjes su gzung pa'i
323a6(rgyud): rgyur| |'dus pa mchog gi dam pa 'di/ /sangs rgyas byang chub 'bras bu ste/ /rigs ni rnam pa lnga bshad pa/ /byang chub sems dpa' du ma dag /ji ltar 'dod
323a7(rgyud): pa de ltar ni/ /bdag po nyid du bya ba yin/ /ji ltar ming gi rjes mthun par/ /nges brjod rgyud kyi rim pa dag/ /rdo rje sgrub pa po yis ni/ /nges brjod rgyud kyi las rnams
323b1(rgyud): bya| |yid kyis dogs pa kun spangs te/ /gnyis su med pa'i sgom pa nyid/ /theg pa chen po'i dam pa mchog /dngos grub che dang ldan par 'gro/ /de nas phyag mtshan
323b2(rgyud): mchog bshad bya/ /gzugs dang mdog gi cho ga'i rim/ /yi ge he las nges 'byung ba/ /bdag nyid he ru ka ra bsgom bya/ /sku lus dkar la drag shul che/ /mche ba rnam
323b3(rgyud): gtsigs 'jigs pa ste| |spyan gsum pa la zhal lnga pa/ /phyag drug zhabs ni bzhi pa ste/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can/ /ral ba zla phyed dbu la bcings/ /sna tshogs
323b4(rgyud): rdo rje'i dbu rgyan can/ /phyag rgya drug gis sku lus brgyan/ /stag gi pags pa gos su mnabs/ /mgo bo'i do shal gyis brgyan pa/ /dkar dang ser dang de bzhin dmar/ /
323b5(rgyud): ljang gu steng zhal sngo ba'o/ /bzhad dang dpa' dang sgeg pa dang / /rngam dang zhi dang drag po ste/ /rdo rje dril bu mnyam ldan pas/ /rdo rje reg pas gnyis med gnas/ /rgyal ba'i
323b6(rgyud): pags pa mchog kyang 'dzin/ /bde ba kun gyi 'bras bu stsol/ /thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin/ /rdo rje mdung ni phyag mchog ste/ /g.yas brkyang ba yi gnas pa yis/ /bdud
323b7(rgyud): bzhi po yi zhabs 'og gnon/ /rig pa'i rdo rje ljang ba dang / /dkar ba'i mdangs kyis gzugs can la/ /ljang dang ser dang dmar ba dang / /dkar ba'i g.yon pa'i
324a1(rgyud): zhal gdong ste/ /steng gi zhal gdong sngo la 'jigs/ /skra grol ba ni rnam par myos/ /seng+ge'i rnam grol phyag rgya can/ /byin pa gnyis ni legs
324a2(rgyud): par 'khril/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can/ /spyan gsum shin tu dmar ba ste/ /rdo rje thod par mnyam par ldan/ /dril bu cang te'u yis brgyan/ /mdung dang kha T+wAM
324a3(rgyud): phyag na bsnams/ /chags pa chen po me yi 'od/ /phyogs kyi gos can zhi ba'i nyams/ /gdul dka' thams cad 'dul mdzad cing / /sna tshogs sems can
324a4(rgyud): 'dul bar mdzad/ /thugs rje'i nyams ni yongs su rdzogs/ /zla ba nyi ma'i dbus su yang / /sna tshogs pad+ma'i dkyil na bzhugs/ /'jigs byed dang ni dus
324a5(rgyud): mtshan dag / zhabs kyis gnon par rnam par bsgom/ /'khor kun dag ni zhal gsum pa/ /thod par phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can/ /drag cing zhi ba nyid yin te/ /
324a6(rgyud): rigs gsum gyis ni phye ba'i gzugs/ /rigs gsum gyi ni phyag mtshan 'dzin/ /lha mos phye ba'i gzugs can ni/ /dam tshig gnyis su med par sbyor/ /
324a7(rgyud): thams cad yi dwags gdan la bzhugs/ /g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis gnon/ /byin pa gnyis kyis legs par 'khril/ /shes rab thabs ni rnam par
324b1(rgyud): bsgom| |mtshams rnams su ni bum pa dag / thod pa zla ba yongs su gang / /zur rnams su ni sgo srung ste/ /ji ltar mdog gi cha rnams so/ /g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs
324b2(rgyud): kyis bzhugs/ /'jig rten skyong ba zhabs 'og gnon/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can/ /thugs rje khro bas rnam par myos/ /dkar po la sogs mdog sbyor ba/ /ji ltar
324b3(rgyud): g.yas pa'i zhal rim pa zhin/ /phyag rgya rim pa'ang de bzhin no/ /lugs 'byung lugs las ldog par ni/ /'khor sogs mchog kyang dgod par bya/ /rdo rje pad+ma'i
324b4(rgyud): dbus su ni/ /rigs kyi 'khor lo gsum dkyil na/ /rang gi byin rlabs 'chang ba'i mchog /sangs rgyas mu stegs can la sba/ /'di ni rab tu gsang ba ste/ /bla ma'i
324b5(rgyud): ngag la gnas pa yin/ /rnal 'byor ma yi drin yin no/ /gnas la sogs pa'i rim sbyor ba/ /sum cu rtsa bdun rnam dag dgod/ /shes rab thabs bdag 'gro ba yin/ /
324b6(rgyud): sa bcu pa yi mchog kyang 'gugs/ /pha rol phyin pa bcu la gnas/ /sbyor ba gsum gyi rnam dag don/ /'di ni dri mad sgom pa mchog /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i
324b7(rgyud): bla ma las/ bdag nyid chos kyi yi ge las bskyed pa'i byin gyis brlabs pa'i sgom pa'i le'u ste drug cu rtsa bdun pa'o// //de nas mchog tu bshad bya ba/ /
325a1(rgyud): bdag nyid cho ga'i sgom pa'i rim/ /mA ma kI dang spyan dang ni/ /lha mo sgrol ma gos dkar mo/ /'od zer can dang dzaM b+ha la/ /lha mo skul byed sa 'dzin ma/ /rang
325a2(rgyud): gi sa bon las byung ba/ /phyag bcu gnyis kyis rnam par brgyan/ /spyan gsum pa la g.yas brkyang bzhugs/ /sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs/ /rdo rje skyil mo krung gis
325a3(rgyud): gnas/ /rig byed bzhi yi zhal gdong ste/ /phyogs kyi gos can ro yi gdan/ /skra grol ba la 'jigs pa ste/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can/ /khro bas lta zhing thugs
325a4(rgyud): rje'i nyams/ /shes rab pha rol phyin lha mo/ /de nyid ye shes mchog las byung / /so so yang dag sbyor ba'i bdag/ de nyid ye shes gdon mi za/ /khro bo sna tshogs
325a5(rgyud): gzugs can ni/ /dpa' bo rang nyid las byung ba/ /khro mchog mkha' 'gro 'byung ba yang / /gos pa med par nyams pa yi/ /bdag po nyid du sbyar bar bya/ /bdag nyid
325a6(rgyud): sgom pa nyid yin no/ /mnyam par ma bzhag sbyor ba yis/ /sgom zhing rnam par bsgom par bya/ /phra ba'i khro bo'i rdo rje can/ /snying ga'i pad+ma'i dbus su ni/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro
325a7(rgyud): thugs brtse can| |'di nyid du ni gnas mdzod cing / /rdzogs sangs rgyas kun byang chub sems/ /'gro ba gsum po 'di lag gnas/ /'di nyid kyis mchod pa nyid kyis/ /mchod 'os
325b1(rgyud): thams cad mchod pa yin/ /gang zhig 'di la rtag lta ba/ /de ni rgyal bas mchod par bzhed/ /nang gi sbyor ba rdo rje yis/ /rnal 'byor rdo rje can du 'dod/ /de bas rdo rje mchod
325b2(rgyud): pa yis| |yid 'dod rnams kyi lus la 'dod/ /mchog pa lnga yi sbyor ba yis/ /myur du sangs rgyas nyid thob par/ /gang 'di rgyud las gsungs pa dag /de ni pha rol gzhan
325b3(rgyud): du 'dod/ /dngos med bzhi la dgod pa yis/ /lha yi gzugs su sgom pa yi/ /mnyam nyid mchod pa chen po ste/ /sangs rgyas thams cad rab sgrub pa'o/ /sngags dang de nyid
325b4(rgyud): bstan pa yi/ /bstan pa tsam du legs 'byung ba'i/ /rgyud ni don dam ma yin te/ /don dam yang dag skyes pa na/ /ston pa med cing bstan pa'ang med/ /nyi shu rtsa bzhir
325b5(rgyud): phye ba yi| |gnas sogs 'di nyid la gnas te/ /de bas de ru 'khor ba nyid/ /skyo bya de nyid can gyis min/ /gal te de nyid med gyur na/ /de yi 'khrul pas ci zhig bya/ /
325b6(rgyud): 'on te de nyid ldan gyur na/ /de la 'khrul pa ci zhig yod/ /gnas dang nye ba'i gnas mchog rnams/ /bstan pas dri ma med par 'gyur/ /yang na mi nus bag
325b7(rgyud): med pa'i/ /mi yi gnas ni bsgrag par bya/ /nga yis 'di ltar bshad pa ni/ /sems can bsam pa'i dbang gis te/ /bsam gtan las gzhan bde med phyir/ /de
326a1(rgyud): bas bsam gtan mchog gzhol bya/ /rnal 'byor pa ni phyi rol 'khor/ /de yi khams rnams zad par 'gyur/ /de bas phyi rol spangs nas
326a2(rgyud): ni| |rnal 'byor rol pas gnas par bya/ /dpal ldan rdo rje rnal 'byor can/ /rnam dag ye shes spyan gyis ni/ /thugs rje thugs gdungs ring po nas/ /rdo rje rnal
326a3(rgyud): 'byor can dag gzigs/ /de rnams dgyes pas dngos grub mchog /ci 'dod par ni stsol bar 'gyur/ /des ni rje btsun ye shes kyang / /rab tu 'bad de bsgrub
326a4(rgyud): par bya/ /sna tshogs spyod pa yang dag ldan/ /spyod dang brtul zhugs spyad pa yi/ /spyod dang brtul zhugs 'dir spongs la/ /de nyid brtul zhugs la dgar bya/ /
326a5(rgyud): gang yang rung ba'i zas gnas pa/ /rnam pa des byas brtul zhugs can/ /bsam gtan zas mchog gzhol 'gyur bas/ /smyon pa'i spyod pas gnas par gyis/ /
326a6(rgyud): gcer bu'am yang na gcer bu min/ /gang rung ji lta de ltar 'gyur/ /rang gi lhag pa'i lha dmigs la/ /de nyid gcig pu rnam par bsam/ /skugs pa'i dngos
326a7(rgyud): por gyur pa yis/ /zla drug tsam gyis nges par ni/ /rnal 'byor can gyis nyer bsten na/ /rnal 'byor chen mo 'di gsal 'gyur/ /ye shes sgron ma'i mchog
326b1(rgyud): mthong na/ /rnal 'byor ma rnams legs 'dus te/ /pad+ma'i 'byung gnas nyams dga' bar/ /dang pa'i tshogs 'dus ji bzhin no/ /mig 'phrul mkhan ltar 'jig rten
326b2(rgyud): du| |'gro kun don ni byed pa 'o/ /dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin par ni/ /mngon 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /spyod pa 'di la nges par ni/ /ji skad bshad pa der 'gyur bar/ /
326b3(rgyud): sems ni dag par gyis shig ces/ /sems can rnams la bdag gsol 'debs/ /gang gis rmad byung snying rjer ldan/ /gang gis gsung ba de nyid 'gyur/ /rdo
326b4(rgyud): rje drag po'i sbyor ba yis/ /mkha' 'gro ma ni snying gar dgod/ /snying gar rdo rje lcags kyur sbyor/ /thugs kyi rdo rjes nang sbyar te/ /gzhan yang rdo rje dgod bya ba/ /
326b5(rgyud): chos kyi dbyings su rnam par brtag /rang gis nam mkhar sbyor nas su/ /gzi brjid gzugs ni 'dzin par bsgom /rang gi chos kyi yid dgod pa/ /rang drod rang
326b6(rgyud): bzhin dri ma med/ /rang gi sgom pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /rang gi chos kyi yi ge bsgom/ /ji lta ji ltar rtogs pa yi/ /gzhan nyid gzugs kyi sgom pa la/ /yid kyi
326b7(rgyud): gti mug grub pa yi/ /dbang po gzhan na bsgom par bya/ /ji lta ji ltar mos pa yis/ /gzhan nyid gzugs la blta bar bya/ /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i
327a1(rgyud): bla ma las/ bdag 'dul ba'i mchod pa'i le'u ste drug cu rtsa brgyad pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
327a2(rgyud): pa thams cad kyis gsang ba'i ye shes gsang ba 'di gsungs so/ /rang bzhin bdag med chos rnams ni/ /nam mkha' lta bur dri ma med/ /stong nyid ye shes
327a3(rgyud): rdo rje yis/ /stong nyid rtag tu bsgom par bya/ /legs so bya ba rnams byin nas/ /rgyud skyes pa yi sbyor ba las/ /legs so legs so ye shes che/ /nges par
327a4(rgyud): brjod pa mchog gi mchog / legs so rdo rje tshul drag po/ /sangs rgyas byang chub bka' drin rab/ /legs so gnyis med sbyor ba ni/ /mchog dang mchog
327a5(rgyud): ni grub pa la/ /legs so zhes bya nges par sbyor/ /'dod pa med pa'i sgom pa ni/ /legs so thams cad 'gro ba'i mgon/ /theg pa chen po bstan pa 'di/ /
327a6(rgyud): gnyis med ye shes mchog dang ni/ /man ngag thob pa'i dang po ste/ /legs so rdo rje bla ma kun/ /de la bstan pa rnal 'byor ma/ /legs so 'khor gyi
327a7(rgyud): dkyil 'khor la/ /dngos grub bla na med pa byin/ /rdzogs te cang mi gsung bar gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas de skad ces bka'
327b1(rgyud): s tsal nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khro bo'i rdo rje rnams nges par brjod pa'i rgyud bla na med pa'i mkha' 'gro ma'i dra ba'i sdom pa bcom ldan 'das kyis
327b2(rgyud): gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma zhes bya ba gsang ba'i yang gsang ba bde mchog rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po the tshom med
327b3(rgyud): par de kho na sgom pa bstan pa'i le'u ste drug cu rtsa dgu pa'o/ / //mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ gsang ba las gsang ba'i bde
327b4(rgyud): mchog gi rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po zhes bya ba rdzogs so/ / //rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di ta chen po dI paM ka ra shrI dz+nyA na dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba chen po dge
327b5(rgyud): slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur zhing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ phyis paN+Di ta chen po dz+nyA na shrI dang / lo tsA ba khyung po chos kyi brtson 'grus kyis kyang zhus pa'o/ /phyis
327b6(rgyud): paN+Di ta A nan+da dang / lo chung gis chad lhag rnams bsabs nas zhus dag byas nas legs par bcos te gtan la phab pa// //rgya gar
327b7(rgyud): skad du/ shrI badzra DA ka nA ma ma hA tan+t+ra rA dzA/ bod skad du/ rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po
328a1(rgyud): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mkha' 'gro kun dngos sems dpa' ni/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i
328a2(rgyud): mchog / gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa na/ /thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs/ /'di ni rang byung bcom ldan 'das/ /lhag pa yi ni lha gcig nyid/ /'byung gnas
328a3(rgyud): sgra tshul nges 'byung rnams/ /dam tshig spyod pa'i spyod yul yin/ /'jig rten gsum du rnyed dka' ba/ /thog ma dbus mthar yang dag gnas/ /'dod chags ma yin
328a4(rgyud): chags bral min/ /dbu mar yang ni mi dmigs so/ /bud med kun gyi sgyu ma'i rgya/ /'di ni gnyis med ye shes mchog /rnyed dang bde ba kun mos pas/ /ngan par spyod
328a5(rgyud): pa'ang 'grub par 'gyur/ /nam mkha' kun tu rgyu grub pas| /mkha' 'gro ma zhes rab tu grags/ /sna tshogs kun tu phyag rgya ni/ /sna tshogs kun gyi sdom pa yis/ /
328a6(rgyud): mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro zhes byar grub/ /de nyid med sems rnal 'byor ba/ /lha la dmigs par byed pa dang / /kun tu gzugs brnyan
328a7(rgyud): yid kyis ni/ /lugs sogs rnal 'byor skye ba min/ /byang chub sems chen rnal 'byor gang / /rnal 'byor dbang phyug rang nyid gtso/ /byang chub sems 'di rdo rje
328b1(rgyud): ste| |sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin no/ /'gro pa'i rtsal lag rang bzhin gyis/ /sna tshogs g.yogs te rnam bzhugs pas/ /de phyir 'bad pa thams cad kyis/ /sna tshogs tshul
328b2(rgyud): gyis mchod par bya/ /bdag nyid sangs rgyas thams cad dang / /dpa' bo thams cad bdag yin te/ /rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis/ /bdag nyid rab tu bsgrub par bya/ /'di
328b3(rgyud): yis sangs rgyas thams cad dang / /dpa' bo thams cad nyid dang ni/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad du/ /tshe 'di nyid du 'grub 'gyur zhes/ /mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor
328b4(rgyud): ba'i| |rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog / rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /dpal ldan bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs/ /thams cad nam mkha'i mtshan nyid
328b5(rgyud): de| |nam mkha' la ni mtshan nyid med/ /khams gsum pa ni ma lus pa'i/ /'gro kun sgyu ma sta bu yin/ /brtan pa dang ni g.yo ba yi/ /'gro ba dmigs su med pa ste/ /mthong
328b6(rgyud): ba dang ni reg pa'i dngos/ /thams cad sgyu ma ji bzhin no/ /gang gis blun po 'ching 'gyur ba/ /'dir des mkhas rnams rnam par grol/ /phyag rgya'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni/ /sa
328b7(rgyud): gsum ma lus bza' bar bya/ /gzhan du gal te sbyor ba ni/ /ma tshang mar me lta bur 'da'/ /gzugs ni sangs rgyas rnam snang mdzad/ /tshor ba rdo rje nyi ma yin/ /'du shes
329a1(rgyud): pad+ma gar dbang ste/ /'du byed rdo rje rgyal po yin/ /rnam shes rdo rje sems dpa' ste/ /'di dag dngos kun rang bzhin no/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro
329a2(rgyud): zhes byar grags/ /yang dag chen po gcig pa'i lha/ /bde ba thams cad rab ster ba/ /sgyu ma chen po'i rang bzhin gyis/ /chags bral chags pa zhes byar bshad/ /
329a3(rgyud): sa khams ltung byed ma yin te/ /de bzhin chu khams gsod ma'o/ /me khams 'gugs byed ma yin te/ /de bzhin rlung ni gar dbang ngo / /nam mkha'i khams ni sgyu ma
329a4(rgyud): che| |rang nyid 'gro ma zhes byar bshad/ /sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor ba/ /mkha' 'gro ma ni 'bar ba'i mchog /'byung ba lnga yi rang bzhin gyis/ /de ni rdo rje
329a5(rgyud): gtso mor gnas/ /mig gnyis gti mug rdo rjer bshad/ /nyan pa zhe sdang rdo rjer brjod/ /sna ni ser sna rdo rje ste/ kha ni 'dod chags rdo rjer gsungs/ /lus ni phrag dog
329a6(rgyud): rdo rje ste| |skye mched thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog /gzugs 'di thams cad stong pa nyid/ /stong pa'i tshul gyis mig gis ni/ /dogs
329a7(rgyud): pa med par sgom pa'i mchog / rnam par mi rtog pa yis blta/ /nam mkha'i tshul gyi sems kyis ni/ /der ni thams cad nam mkha'i dngos/ /dgos pa med pa'i
329b1(rgyud): sgom par ldan/ /rnam par mi rtog skye 'gyur zhes/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de
329b2(rgyud): b zhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thogs pa med cing gdon mi za ba bde ba chen po'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i rim pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di skad ces
329b3(rgyud): gsungs so/ /ji srid 'khor ba'i gnas su ni/ /mkhas mchog 'dug par gyur pa'i bar/ /de srid sems can mtshungs med de na/ /mya ngan mi 'da' bar ni mdzad/ /de ltar
329b4(rgyud): sems can dam pa rnams/ /srid pa'i zhags pas 'jigs med par/ /mi skyo bar ni brtson 'grus kyis/ /rtag tu sems can don rnams mdzad/ /nam mkha'i gnas kyi
329b5(rgyud): mthas thug par/ /smon lam rnam par spyod byed cing / /sems can don brtson sems kyis ni/ /dpa' bo srid pa sbyong bar mdzad/ /rtag tu 'dod pas myos pa yi/ /lha yi
329b6(rgyud): bu 'di rnams dang ni/ /gzhan yang skye bo chags can phyir/ /'dod chags thams cad dag par mdzad/ /bde chen shin tu grub bya'i phyir/ /rtog pa rgyas par sbyin pa dang / /
329b7(rgyud): thog ma tha ma med pa'i mchog /rtog pa thams cad dang por bshad/ /'das pa'i dus na sngo na byung ba/ /rtog pa dang po bde ba che/ /der ni rdo rje sems chen gyi/ /lhag pa yi ni lha
330a1(rgyud): gcig bzhugs/ /'jig rten khams rnams mtha' yas kyi/ /sems can kun don 'byung ba'i phyir/ /glu dang rol mo sogs pa'i gar/ /srid pa
330a2(rgyud): kun gyi gtso bor gyur/ /sems can thams cad 'byung ba yi/ /dga' ba yang dag bsdus pa dang / /de nas sems can skye 'gyur ba'i/ /'dod pa'i chags pa rnam spangs te/ /
330a3(rgyud): des 'dul bar ni mkhyen nas su/ /yi ge las byung rnam spangs shing / /nam mkha'i lta bur bdag med par/ /dag pa nyid du de nas so na/ /de nas sems can sangs
330a4(rgyud): rgyas kyi| |bla med don ni nus med pa'i/ /stong pa nyid la rtag bzhugs pas/ /'gro kun stong pas bcom nas ni/ /thams cad dmyal bar ltung mthong ste/ /slar yang bdag
330a5(rgyud): dang gzhan don la/ /mos pas gus pa nyid du gyur/ /de nas 'jig rten khams kun na/ /bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas kun bsdus te/ /myur ba nyid du bdag la bskul/ /oM
330a6(rgyud): ma hA su kha badzra satwa dzaHhUM baM hoHsu ra ta staM/ 'ongs ni bskul ba tsam gyis kyang / /dag pa'i bde ba kun ster ba/ /'dod pa'i don kun sgrub byed cing / /'gro kun bde ba bskyed
330a7(rgyud): par gyur/ /nga ni 'dod pa'i gzugs kyi mchog /sangs rgyas kun gyis byin brlabs pa/ /nga nyid chos kyi sku yi mchog /sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag po yin/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi sbyor

343b6(rgyud): kha chings shig ces brjod na kha chings par 'gyur ro/ /mu kha ti Sh+ThaM ti mu ka gats+tsha ti/ mu kha DaM ta laM ga laM mu ka na mu dra pu ri Sha Na/ de ba dat+ta s+ya mu kha baM d+hA mi swA hA/

345a7(rgyud): gyen du 'greng zhing sbrul gyis rgyan gyis brgyan pa 'od 'bar ba dang bcas pa bris la/ sbrul zhags kyi ltor dur khrod kyi sol bas dgra'i tshogs kyi ming sngags dang spel ba bris te

350b1(rgyud): shing gcer bu zhal mche ba gtsigs pa/ 'od zer sna tshogs 'phro ba/ khro gnyer gyi rim pa can/ zur mig tu gzigs pas sa gzhi bskyod cing / klu'i tshogs skrag pas kha sbub

350b4(rgyud): bsres la sbrang rtsis sprus te mgo bdun pa'i klu'i gzugs sor bcu gnyis pa byas la/ de'i khang pa sor bcu drug yangs par byas nas/ khang pa de gru bzhi la gdong bzhi byas
350b5(rgyud): te| gru gcig pa ni/ rta'i gdong pa/ gnyis pa la seng ge'i gdong pa/ gsum pa la spre'u'i gdong pa/ bzhi pa la nya'i gdong ba byas te/ de'i nang du klu'i rgyal po ras kha dog sna
350b6(rgyud): tshogs pas g.yogs te bzhag la/ de nas sngags brgya rtsa brgyad yongs su bzlas pas btab ste/ yid kyis ji ltar 'dod pa'i me tog dang / bdug pa dang / gtor ma la sogs pa'i
350b7(rgyud): mchod pa bsam ste byin la/ yungs kar la lan bdun sngags te klu'i steng du gtor te/ de nas 'dod pa thams cad pa'i gtor ma byin na/ des klu'i rgyal po rnams mdza' bor
351a1(rgyud): gyur nas klu thams cad kyis than pa byung ba'i dus su nyi ma bdun char phab pas 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad gang bar byed do/ /char mi 'bab pa'i dus su
351a2(rgyud): de ltar byas na gdon mi za bar char 'bab bo/ /ci ste klu gdug pa can yin na yang rlung grang mo dang / rdo char dang / klog dang / ser ba 'bebs te/ de bzlog par 'dod na rig pa
351a3(rgyud): 'dzin pas thal ba dang / yungs kar zho gnyis tsam la lan nyi shu'i bar du bzlas te/ ji srid 'dod pa'i sa phyogs su mtshams bcings la/ yang de nyid la lan bdun bzlas te/
351a4(rgyud): klu'i mgor bsnun zhing yid kyis ji snyed 'dod par phyogs bcing ba byas te/ phyogs mtshams dang steng 'og tu gtor na mtshams chen po bcings par 'gyur ro/ /ji ste dgra
351a5(rgyud): thams cad dang / 'gran zla dang / sdang ba'i grogs po dang / sdang ba'i phyogs byed pa rnams dang / pha rol gyi 'khor lo 'jigs shing gdul bar 'dod pa dang / btags pa dang /
351a6(rgyud): bcing ba dang / gsad pa dang / rengs pa dang / gzhom par 'dod na/ rta bla mo de nyid dur khrod kyi thal ba dang bsgos te/ skyes pa'am/ bud med kyi gzugs byas la/ khro bo chen
351a7(rgyud): po'i sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ dur khrod kyis brkos pa'i nang du ming nas smos te bzhag la/ yungs kar la brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te de'i steng du gtor la/ seng ldeng gi
351b1(rgyud): phur bu la lan brgyad bzlas te btab nas sbas na/ ji srid phur bu ma bton gyi bar du sdug bsngal chen po nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ rig pa 'dzin pa ma gtogs pa gzhan
351b2(rgyud): gyis dgrol bar mi nus so/ /ci ste gsad par 'dod na mi rus kyi phur bu la sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pas bsnun la/ khrag dang bcas pa'i yungs kar la bzlas te gtor na

351b4(rgyud): can gyis gsungs/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las/ klu thams cad dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba'i chog rgyas pa ste rim par phye ba lnga pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha mo rnams kyis slar yang mchod cing phyag byas te 'di skad ces gsol to/ /sgra chen pos rnam par 'phrul pa'i klu'i sngags mi 'tshal na bka'
351b5(rgyud): drin chen pos bshad du gsol/ /bka' stsal pa/ sngags kyi rgyal po chen po'i mtshan nyid skal ba chen po'i lha mo nyon cig /gshin rje mche ba can ma nyid/ /rus sbal
351b6(rgyud): gyi ni stan la bzhugs/ /dbu ma yi ni tha ma nyid/ /slar yang bzhi pa la gnas pa/ /gshin rje'i phyogs kyi mthar gnas pa/ /bzang po yis ni steng du brgyan/ /slar
352a1(rgyud): yang gshin rje'i mche ba can/ /rus sbal gyis ni rab tu brgyan/ /oM b+ha zhes bya'i tshig dang ldan/ /dang po ru ni rus sbal gyi/ /stan bzhugs mgon
352a2(rgyud): po ri mo dang / /rtses brgyan lan gnyis bsgyur bar bya/ /mgon po phan phan tshig gis brgyan/ /ka ki mu khi/ mu ka ke si/ na ga gi /i n+d+hu b+ha ga gi /ko ti sadz+dzi/ bi hi ba di hi/
352a3(rgyud): a pa ri'o si'o/ /ka ha ka ha dz+dza'i/ kasma da thaM/ dza'i in+da b+ha mi bid thu ma he sa ro pa tsa k+khe bi sarba ba la bo ha No bi ho bi Na sa n+ta ha Na se'i/ ka ki hi ya ya pa ri san thaM yaM zhes/ mkha'
352a4(rgyud): 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /dbugs byed pa ni sa

352a6(rgyud): 'bar ba 'bugs pas rnam par klubs/ /byang phyogs kyi ni dang po dang / khyu mchog steng na gnas pa yi/ /gshin rje phyogs kyi mthar gnas dang / /rlung ni yugs sa mo
352a7(rgyud): yis brgyan/ /bden bral la ni gnas pa yi/ /gshin rje yi ni mche ba can/ /gti mug rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan/ /gshin rje 'joms ma gti mug klubs/ /klu yi phyag rgya
352b1(rgyud): 'di yis ni/ /mkha' 'gro ma kun dga' mgur 'gyur/ /sgyu 'phrul chen po bcu drug 'di/ /yi ge re rer kun gnas zhes/ /mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /mkha' 'gro
352b2(rgyud): ma ni bde ba'i mchog / rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /dang po rus sbal gzung bar bya/ /bzang po'i steng du gnas pa yi/ /byang
352b3(rgyud): gi dang por gnyis par ldan/ /gshin rje pho nya chu lhar bzhugs/ /yi ge ra ni gti mug brgyan/ /slar yang ka Sha zhes byar brjod/ /gshin rje mche can bzang pos brgyan/ /slar
352b4(rgyud): yang mche can bden bral bzhugs/ /gti mug dang ni lhan cig ldan/ /der ni sa mtha' zhes bya ba/ /gti mug gis ni lhan cig brgyan/ /lha mo bstan pa 'di yis ni/ /bu mo
352b5(rgyud): rnams ni dgug pa'i mchog / shar phyogs nas ni brgyad bzung zhing / /bzhi bar ldan pa'i dbus ma'i mtha'i/ /yugs sa mo yis spyi bor brgyan/ /slar yang dbu ma'i mtha'
352b6(rgyud): ma bzung / /'bugs pa dang ni ldan par bya/ /gshin rje 'joms ma bzung nas su/ /yugs sa mo yis rna cha bya/ /mthar ni swAhAs yongs su brgyan/ /rig byed kyis ni mnyes par
352b7(rgyud): bya| |thod pa'i dbus gnas rgyal bar 'gyur/ /mu oM Ni ka ka kA saM wi i ka mu ka Na/ ru ba te/ sa ga mi/ ka mu pin+ni a N+Do ha pa tha la ha/ la rI ga Ni le a hi/ mu pha ka te/
353a1(rgyud): s+ya in+dzi a bi/ mu taM/ ki gra s+ya ha/ a mu ka hats+tsha ha kA kA tha ki /ba yaM d+ha thI ma su swA khaM hA phaT/ klu'i phyag rgya 'di yis ni/ /bcing ba dang ni bskrad par
353a2(rgyud): 'gyur| |oM iM de Na/ ha de b+ha ha a dza me na u/ ba di a dzi ha hA dA bA ha/ daM de na ta dzi ya shu la re Na sU li ya swAhA/ oM dzaM b+ha ni dzaM b+he hi/ oM stam+b+ha ni stam+b+ha hi oM mo ha ni mo he hi/
353a3(rgyud): oM A kaR+Sha Ni A kaR+She hi/ oM thaM b+ha thaM b+ha/ ma hA thaM b+ha/ ma hA mu kaM thaM b+hA yA swAhA/ de ltar rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi cho ga bzhin las bstan pa'o// //oM na mo
353a4(rgyud): b+ha ga ba ni tsa muM d+he su kha mu khi Shu ka kan+The ga Do da ri/ a mu ka s+ya mu khaM/ ba d+ha baM d+ha/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa hUM phaT swAhA/ mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /

353a6(rgyud): gyi pags pa dang / man da dang / nyan pa dang / mig sman dang / rdo dang / dmar po rnams ma'i khrag dang btags la slar yang tsan+dan dmar po dang lan mang du sbal
353a7(rgyud): te a mra'i ril bur gyur pa dang / dbus su lig bu mig bcug ste grib ma la bskams nas nyi ma dang / zla ba dang / sreg byed kyi dbus su ril bu bcug la slar skar ma
353b1(rgyud): rgyal la lhag par gnas par byed/ rig pa'i rgyal po'i zhal du bcug la ji srid mi snang bar gyur pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o/ /sbrul gyi rgyal po rnyed pa dang / ri mo dkar nag du ma
353b2(rgyud): bu so sor phye la dkar nag so sor shes par byas pa de dang / shang+ka puSh+pa dang / a ga ru nag po la stong phrag nyi shu rtsa bzhir gcig gis ma tshang ba'i sngags bzlas la/ phyis kyang

353b5(rgyud): 'gyur zhing gang la 'dod pa de la 'dod pa spyod par 'gyur ro/ /de'i kha'i bu gar lig bu mig bcug ste du ba med par bsregs la/ de tshig pa dang mtshan mo zhib mor btags

353b7(rgyud): bcug ste gter du sbas la/ de nas rul zhing zags pa dang bton te/ de'i thod pa'i rus ba brdar te thig ler byas na/ grib ma yang med par byed do/ /de zags pa'i sas
354a1(rgyud): lus la byugs na/ dug sna tshogs zhi bar byed do/ /gang gi rdul gyi dri rtag tu zhim zhing skra g.yas su 'khyil pa dang / yid du 'ong zhing grib ma bdun
354a2(rgyud): dang ldan la lus la rma med cing bden par smra ba dang / yun ring du mig mi 'dzum pa de ni/ lha mo dngos grub byed par 'gyur te/ gzhan yang kha'i dbugs dri zhim zhing
354a3(rgyud): rtag tu skyid de bar gnas pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ltar sbyin pa chen po rtag tu gtong bas sgrub pa po rnams bskyab pa'i phyir mi ro'i gzugs kyis gnas te/

354a6(rgyud): kyis kyang bskor te gnas la/ yang dbang po'i tshul gyis gzugs de la gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / lha dang / yi dags la sogs pas kun nas bskor te gnas pa

364a7(rgyud): brgyan par bya/ /'bugs pa rmi lam zla ba can/ /shar gyi gsum pa bzung nas su/ /ri zhes bya ba'i 'og tu sbyin/ /lho mtha' stan la gnas pa yaM/ /rlung gi phyi rol da nas bzung / /

370b5(rgyud): ri med| |bum pa chu yis bkang sogs pa/ de dbus lha mo bsam pa ni/ /pad+ma'i stan la yang dag bzhugs/ /zhal gcig phyag ni gnyis pa ste/ /shin tu mdzes pa'i na bzas klubs/ /
370b6(rgyud): rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa ste/ /pad+ma'i phreng bas mdzes par byas/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi 'khor lo spro/ /gangs dang kun da zla 'dra ba'i/ /bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun 'bab pa yis/ /dug gi
370b7(rgyud): mthu ni 'phrog par mdzad/ /lha mo'i sbyor ba 'di lta bus/ /bsams na dug ni 'joms par 'gyur/ /'o ma nag por gyur gyi bar/ /mun pas ring du zil mnan pa/ /slar yang bdug
371a1(rgyud): pas bdug par bya/ /dpyid zla ra sogs rim bzhin du/ /nyi ma byang du 'gro ba'i tshe/ /ji lta'i dus bzhin mtshan ma ni/ /rim gyis rim gyis sbyar bar bya/ /
371a2(rgyud): nyin mo yi ni chu tshod dag /mkhas pas bzhi dang bcu gnyis bsgyur/ /mtshan mo drug dang bcu gsum bsgyur/ /chu tshod mkhas pas brtsam par bya/ /re'u mig dag ni gnyis
371a3(rgyud): pa la| |dus la mkhas pas mtshan ma bya/ /nyin mo drug dang bcu gnyis bsgyur/ /chu tshod kyi ni mtshan ma bya/ /bzhi dang bcu gsum bsgyur ba ni/ /mtshan mo'i chu tshod du ni
371a4(rgyud): brtag / brgyad dang bcu gnyis bsgyur ba dag /nyin mo'i ru ni brtag par bya/ /gnyis dang bcu ni gsum bsgyur bya/ /mtshan mo'i chu tshod du ni brtag /chu tshod sum cu tham pa
371a5(rgyud): ni| |dbus kyi bi shu gnyi gar sbyar/ /gnyis dang bcu ni gsum po dag /nyin mo'i chu tshod shes bya ste/ /brgyad dang bcu gnyis bsgyur ba dag /de yi mtshan mo'i mtshan

371b1(rgyud): gsum bsgyur chu tshod ni/ /nyin mo yi ni bshad pa yin/ /drug dang bcu ni gnyis bsgyur ba/ /mtshan mo yi ni mtshan mor bya/ /gnyis dang bcu ni gsum bsgyur ba/ /de bzhin
371b2(rgyud): nyin mo'i chu tshod yin/ /brgyad dang bcu ni gnyis bsgyur ba/ /chu tshod mtshan gyir rab tu grags/ /bcu ni gsum du bsgyur ba dag /bi shu'i nyin mo'i chu tshod de/ /de bzhin
371b3(rgyud): mtshan gyis chu tshod kyang / /bcu ni gsum du bsgyur bar bya/ /brgyad dang bcu ni gnyis bsgyur ba/ /nyin mo yi ni bsam par bya/ /gnyis dang bcu ni gsum bsgyur ba/ /mtshan mo'i chu tshod

371b7(rgyud): pa gnyis kyis mtshon par bya/ /gnyis po dag ni bcur bsgyur ba/ /de bzhin lo yi chu tshod do/ /de yi mtshan ma ldan pa yis/ /nyin mtshan gyi ni dbugs su brtsi/ /ngag gi dbang
372a1(rgyud): phyug kun bzung nas/ /dbyangs kyi mtshan mar mngon bar gzhag /ma ning gnyis ni spangs nas su/ /sa yi dbang phyug kun tu gzhag /a me rim pa la
372a2(rgyud): bab na| |dpal dang mngon par mnyam 'grogs shing / /nor rnyed par ni snang ba ste/ /skal pa bzang por gdon mi za/ /A yi re'u mig la bab na/ /rims dang nad kyis gzir ba
372a3(rgyud): dang | |'jigs shing skrag par snang 'gyur bas/ /a zhes bya bas nges par ston/ /yi ge i la bab gyur na/ /rgyal po'i dpal ni ster 'gyur te/ /kun nas nor ni rnyed pa dang / /

372a5(rgyud): bab gyur na/ /dpal ldan grogs mo rnyed pa dang / /nor dang 'bru ni 'phel ba dang / /dpal rnams kyang ni rnyed par 'gyur/ /U la gal te bab gyur na/ /de ni dgra yis 'tshe bar
372a6(rgyud): snang | |bran gza' dang ni gnyen tshan rnams/ /'jigs shing skrag par snang bar 'gyur/ /yi ge e la bab gyur na/ /'phral du skye bo skal can 'gyur/ /skyes pa bud med dag

372b1(rgyud): rims kyis thebs par 'gyur/ /o yi mtshan ma la bab na/ /gnas kyi dbang por 'gyur ba dang / /nor dang 'bru ni rnyed 'gyur zhing / /yid 'ong rim pa de bzhin no/ /au yi mtshan ma

372b5(rgyud): kyog bri| |dbyangs kyi dang po la sogs bgrang / /yang na me tog gtor nas ni/ /de bzhin sa ni mtshon par bya/ /yang na snga dro ro hi ta'i/ /dus su rtsib bo yis blta/ /rnal 'byor

372b7(rgyud): lam la ni spun gyis bsam/ /bya ku la la nye du ste/ /bi hri la ni bu yi bsam/ /sme ba la ni dgra yir bstan/ /ran DA la ni sbyar ba bsam/ /ma ka ra la gso dpyad don/ /rus sbal
373a1(rgyud): la ni chos kyi don/ /khyu mchog la ni drag po'i las/ /bzang po la ni nor shes bya/ /gti mug la ni kun tu 'khrug /'phel ba la ni reg byed na/ /don
373a2(rgyud): rnams 'grub par 'gyur ba dang / /nor dang 'bru dang phrad pa dang / /grogs po sdug dang phrad par 'gyur/ /dus ni ring por mi sdod cing / /myur du phrad 'gyur gdon mi za/ /sa

377a1(rgyud): rdzogs pa/ /b+ha ga'i dbus su bsgom par bya/ /de yi dbus gyur sa bon ni/ /sngo zhing cung zad dmar ba'i 'od// 'od zer sngon po'i phreng 'khrugs las/ /

377a6(rgyud): dang / /dpang po dang ni 'dod lha sogs/ /yi ge phan tshun bskul ba yis/ /chung ma dang ni bcas te 'gug /bcom ldan de ni shes bya ba/ /spyod pa'i gar gyis gtso bo yin//
377a7(rgyud): de nas dbus ma'i mtha' dang ldan/ /thig le sgra yis yang dag mtshan/ /sku gsung thugs la legs gnas par/ /dngos po sgom pas bsgoms byas na/ /gong bu
377b1(rgyud): dgug pa'i dam pa yin/ /b+ha ga yi ni dbus gyur par/ /ye shes rgya mtsho bsgoms byas la/ /yi ge mi 'gyur rdzogs pa las/ /sku mdog dkar po zhal bzhi pa/ /rdo rje dang ni kha T+wAM
377b2(rgyud): bsnams/ /dpa' bo spyi gtsug zla phyed brgyan/ /gshor dang thod ba'ang bsnams pa ste/ /dbugs mi g.yo bar bsgom par bya/ /rlung dang me ni yang dag ldan/ /chu dang dbang che na
377b3(rgyud): mnan pa ste/ /spro ba'i bdag nyid can gyis spro/ /'bad de bsgrub bya dmigs na ni/ /khu ba dgug pa'i dam pa yin/ /tsi yi ye shes las byung ba/ /sku mdog ser pa kun tu 'bar/ /
377b4(rgyud): zhal bzhi pa la phyag bzhi pa/ /mgo skyes thod pa'i phreng bas brgyan/ /sdigs mdzub rdo rje zhags pa dang / /ka pA la ni phyag g.yon na/ /g.yas na rdo rje 'bar ba dang / /de bzhin du
377b5(rgyud): ni lcags kyu'i mchog / rta zhal tshul du byas nas ni/ /tshang 'gugs pa yi dam pa yin/ /ra yi ye shes las byung ba/ /'od zer dmar po drag chen po/ /dpa' bo thod pa'i phreng ba can/ /
377b6(rgyud): rgyan kun gyis ni rnam par klubs/ /zhal bzhi pa la phyag bzhi pa/ /lce spyang gi ni gdong can te/ /kha T+wAM ga dang thod pa dang / /rdo rje de bzhin ral gri bsnams/ /khrag gis gang
377b7(rgyud): ba'i lus can bsgom/ /'bad de bsgrub bya dmigs nas ni/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi 'khor lo spro/ /rdo rje phra mos phug nas su/ /'jig pa nyid du rab bsgoms na/ /khrag dgu pa
378a1(rgyud): yi dam pa zhes/ /sgyu ma kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro zhes grags pa/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan
378a2(rgyud): rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las/ /sgyu ma kun tu rnam par 'phrul pa'i rim par phye ba ste bcu gcig pa'o// //rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i sgrub thabs ni/ /bshad par bya yi lha mo nyon/ /dang por ro ni bsgoms byas te/ /mkhas pas chos dbyings rang bzhin bsam/ /rnal 'byor pa ni der
378a3(rgyud): gnas nas/ /go 'phang mchog ni bsgom par bya/ /rang snying zla ba'i dbus su ni/ /de nyid thams cad bkod nas su/ /de yi 'od zer las byung ba/ /mkha' 'gro ma sogs

378a6(rgyud): chub sems/ /dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi/ /sangs rgyas rnal 'byor bskyed sdom pa/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te/ /bla na med pa'i dkon mchog
378b1(rgyud): gsum| |deng nas brtsams te mchog tu bzung / /bslab pa yi ni tshul khrims dang / /dge ba'i chos ni bsdu ba dang / /sems can don byed tshul khrims gsum/ /bdag
378b2(rgyud): gis so sor brtan por bzung / /rdo rje rigs mtho chen po la/ /rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya yang / /yang dag nyid du bzung bya zhing / /slob dpon dag kyang bdag gis bzung / /rin
378b3(rgyud): chen rigs chen rnal 'byor gyi/ /dam tshig yid du bong ba la/ /nyin re zhing ni dus drug tu/ /sbyin pa rnam bzhi stsal bar bgyi/ /byang chub chen po las byung ba'i/ /pad+ma'i rigs
378b4(rgyud): chen dag pa la/ /phyi nang gsang ba'i theg pa gsum/ /dam chos yang dag bzung bar bgyi/ /las kyi rigs mchog chen po la/ /mchod pa ci nus bgyi ba dang / /sdom pa

380b1(rgyud): cig de la 'bar/ /de nas 'bar phreng rgya mtshor ni/ /kun nas sgo yi 'khor lo bsam/ /lte ba snying ga kha dang ni/ /dpral steng spyi gtsug 'khor lo ni/ /dang po sngags tshogs byin gyis

380b6(rgyud): tshul nyi ma'i 'od can ni/ /bskal pa'i me ltar rab 'jigs pa'i/ /gsod ma bsams te yid kyis su/ /bsgrub byar lhan cig gcig gyur nas/ /steng du bltas na 'chi bar 'gyur//
380b7(rgyud): de nas rlung dang me yi ni/ /dkyil 'khor la gnas me stag gi/ /phung po 'phro ba'i 'gugs ma bsam/ /yid kyis bsgrub bya'i snying zhugs te/ /de yi snying ni rtsa nas dbyung / /'gugs ma'i
381a1(rgyud): sngags bzlas 'gugs par 'gyur/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor sems kyis ni/ /rlung mdog bsgrub bya rlung nang bsam/ /slar yang bdag dang bsgrub bya ni/ /
381a2(rgyud): gcig tu gyur te gar mdzad pa'i/ /sngags zlos shing ni gar byas na/ /gar byed byed du 'jug par 'gyur/ /mchod pa rdo rje rab sbyor gyis/ /de nas las rnams kun bsgrub bya/ /snying

382a1(rgyud): khung de bzhin du/ /nu ma o trer rab tu grags/ /de dag zhing ste lta ba ni/ /tri sha ku ni zhes bya yin/ /sna yi rtse mo ko sa la/ /de dag nye ba'i zhing du brjod/ /kha

383b1(rgyud): chen mo ste/ /snabs gzhon nu 'bab pa'o/ /nye ba'i dur khrod do/ /sku yi 'khor los 'og spyod/ /snyoms par zhugs pas zhugs yin zhes/ /mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /rdo
