383b7(rgyud): ldan| |zla ba nyi ma zhes bya ba/ /g.yon dang g.yas kyi nges gnyis su/ /dpa' bo mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi/ /'gro dang 'ong bar nges par brjod/ /gnas gnyis la ni mnyam par zhon/ /'og dang
384a1(rgyud): steng du yang dag brten/ /g.yon dang g.yas kyi ngos gnyis su/ /dbyangs yig bcu gnyis steng bltas bris/ /ka sogs 'og tu bltas pa ni/ /ngos gnyis dag tu
384a2(rgyud): spel ba ste/ /dbus su des ni sbyar bar ya/ /de ltar bstan pa 'di dag ni/ /rtsa dang sgra yi rang bzhin ni/ /gnyis med ye shes rdo rje ste/ /mkha' 'gro sgra yi rang bzhin no/ /nges 'byung sangs
384a3(rgyud): rgyas thams cad de/ /gang du skye ba zhes byar grags/ /shin tu rnam dag ye shes che/ /lha mo kun gyi rang bzhin gang / /rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ste/ /mchog tu bde bar brjod pa yin/ /rang
384a4(rgyud): byung gi ni gzugs 'di nyid/ /spro dang sdud par byed pa'o/ /yi ge pho nya la sogs sngags/ /der ni cha dang bral ba gang / /b+ha ga'i dbus su gzugs med pa/ /de ni rtag tu gnas pa yin/
384a5(rgyud): smin dbus pad+ma'i zla ba ru/ /bcu drug sdud pas bskor ba yin/ /shes rab thabs kyi mnyam sbyor gyis/ /kha sbyor zhes byar brjod pa yin/ /lag gnyis kun tu 'khyud pa yin/ /
384a6(rgyud): rdo rje lu gu rgyud bcings brjod/ /slar yang rnam par grol ba'i lam/ /'bab pa'i tshogs ni mchog tu dga'/ /sbyor ba kha sbyar nyid dang ni/ /rdo rje lu gu rgyud du bzhed/ /rdo rje
384a7(rgyud): pad+ma dbye ba dang / sgro chun sbrang rtsi byed par bshad/ /bskor ba gang phyir bskyod pa ste/ /bde de'i thabs kyis kun rig pa'o/ /dga' dang bde ba'i rang bzhin gyis/ /zhags pa
384b1(rgyud): pad+mor bcug pa yin/ /chags pa lcags kyu kho na ste/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgug /mi 'khrug rdo rjes dkrug par bya/ /de ni gsal shing zhes byar brjod/ /de nas
384b2(rgyud): chags sogs nyon mongs kyi/ /bag chags dum bu nyid du bya/ /shin tu rgya cher dmigs pa yi/ /kun rdzob de bzhin brdung ba dang / /dngos kun rdo rjes mid par bya/ /rdo rje zhes bya de
384b3(rgyud): bzhin gshegs/ /ji ltar bstan kyang de dbus su/ /rtag stong 'byin dang sdud pa po/ /de ni de nyid ces bya ste/ /rang byung gcig gis khyab pa'o/ /rang byung gcig gis khyab pa'o/ /gang ming sangs rgyas thams cad
384b4(rgyud): kyi| |sgyu ma zhes byar grags pa ste/ /gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa na/ /thams cad bdag nyid gang gnas pa'o/ /'di ni kun mkhyen zhes bya ste/ kun tu 'gro ba mi shigs pa'o/ /
384b5(rgyud): pad+ma yi ni sna rtse ru/ /rgyu dang mi rgyu kun bsgom bya/ /phyi rol yi ge spangs nas su/ /yid kyi bzlas dang ldan par bya/ /nges pa'i go 'phang rtag tu gnas/ /brtan pa chos dbyings rang bzhin no/ /
384b6(rgyud): rtag tu phra brdul dang bral/ /ye shes sku ste dru ma med/ /gsal ba chos kyi rang bzhin shes/ mya ngan 'das pa 'ba' zhig yul/ /phan tshun mdud pa gsang sngags ni/ /bye brag tu ni
384b7(rgyud): phye nas su/ /sa bon phreng ba de nas bsgom/ /hUM gi skud pas brgyu bar bya/ bsgrub bya 'gog par 'gyur na ni/ /gom pa gnyis kyang mi 'gro'o/ /'di ye shes rab lhan skyes te/ /
385a1(rgyud): de yi gzugs su gyur pas gnas/ /las kyi rlung gis bskyod nas su/ /lte ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di nas 'bar/ /sgyu ma chen po zhes byar bshad/
385a2(rgyud): las rnams thams cad rab sgrub pa'o/ /skra rtse brgyar gyur pa yi cha/ skad cig glog gi 'od zer can/ /lha yi rnal 'byor dus su ni/ /ba sbu rnams kyi bu ga gnas/ /phyogs
385a3(rgyud): bcu rnams su spros nas ni/ /lha dang lha min kun bsdigs te/ /snying ga'i chos kyi 'khor lo ni/ /bsregs te longs spyod 'khor lor song / /sna bug g.yas nas byung nas ni/ /
385a4(rgyud): slar yang zhugs te smin mtshams kyi/ /mdzod spu'i khung nas byung nas su/ /phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi/ /sna sgo
385a5(rgyud): g.yon du zhugs nas ni/ /spyi bo'i 'khor lo bsregs nas su/ /sngon gyi lam nas slar byung ste/ /slar yang spyi gtsug tu ni zhugs/ /bsregs par gyur pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/ /
385a6(rgyud): dga' ba bskyed nas lte ba yi/ /dkyil 'khor du ni song gyur nas/ /sngon bzhin du ni gnas par gyur/ /dus min 'chi ba las rgyal nyid/ /yan lag kha T+wAM ga dang sbyar/ /thod pa'i
385a7(rgyud): mchod yon snod du ni/ /zhal du mchod yon nges sbyar zhes/ /mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje sems dpa'i de bzhin gshegs/ /
385b1(rgyud): bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las /sku gsum dang / sngags dang / rgyud kyi 'byung ba dang / 'chi ba blu ba zhes bya ba'i rim par
385b2(rgyud): phye ba ste bco lnga pa'o/ / //de nas dngos grub kun gyi gnas/ /gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa ste/ /yid 'ong bcud ni kun gyi rtan/ /sems can kun la bde ster ba/ /'dod pa'i
385b3(rgyud): yon tan lnga yis brgyas/ /bla re dam pa bres pas 'bar/ /'dab stong ldan pa'i pad+ma che/ /sbyor ba'i gdan la bzhugs pa la/ /der ni lha mos zhus gyur pa/ /'khor lo kun gyi nges pa dang
385b4(rgyud): dbyangs rnams kyi ni bye brag dang / /yi ge dbye ba mi 'tshal te/ /'khor lo'i grangs ni ji lta bu/ /de rnams las ni ci zhig lags/ /sna tshogs glu yi sngags dang ni/ /'khrul 'khor dag
385b5(rgyud): ni mdor bsdus dang / /'khor lo'i dbang phyug dus dang ni/ /de bzhin dpa' bo rnams kyis bstan/ /'di dag la ni the tshom mchis/ /bde ba chen pos bshad du gsol/ /bcom
385b6(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyud rnams kun tu spas pa gang / /de dag thams cad zhu 'dod pa/ /legs so legs so lha mo che/ blo gros chen mo legs so legs/ /
385b7(rgyud): mkha' 'gro ma ni thams cad kyang / /the tshom skye na gzhan ci smos/ /sgyu ma kun tu rnam 'phrul ba/ /nyon cig lha mo sgyu ma che/ /gang zhig bris pa tsam gyis ni/ /sgrub po
386a1(rgyud): dngos sgrub thob 'gyur ba/ /mdor bsdus nas ni brjod bya ste/ /de ni bdag gis bshad kyi nyon/ /nag dang dmar par rtag gyur nas/ /khyad par du ni
386a2(rgyud): gtor ma sbyin/ /tsa ru'i bza' ba lhan cig bya/ /sgrub pa po yis g.yon nas bskor/ /'di yis sgrub po kun la ni/ /ma mo dga' 'gyur the tshom med/ /de nas mkha' 'gro ma
386a3(rgyud): rnams ni/ /sa rnams la ni rnam rol ba/ brtson chen 'khor los sgyur ma dang / /stobs chen ma dang rab dpa' mo/ /'khor lo'i go cha glang sna ma/ /khaN+Da ro ha 'khor lo'i shugs/ /
386a4(rgyud): bya gdong ma dang rta rna mo/ /shin tu bzang mo sngo bsangs mo/ /chang 'thung ma dang rlung shugs ma/ /de bzhin 'jigs byed chen mo dang / /sa srung ma dang ljon grib ma/ /lang+ga'i bdag mo
386a5(rgyud): mi'u thung mo/ /dpa' bo'i blo ma sna chen mo/ 'od ldan ma dang gtum mig ma/ /rab gtum ma ste sgrub byed yin/ /mkha' 'gro ma ni nyi shu bzhi/ /'di dag sngon nyid grub pa yin/ /
386a6(rgyud): rang ming brjod pa'i sngags la ni/ /mthar ni hUM hUM phaT dang sbyar/ /oM ni thams cad gsal byed do/ /grub gsol 'dod pa thams cad la/ /rnal 'byor dam mchog 'dir
386a7(rgyud): mthong na/ /gzhan dag snying po med rtswar mtshungs/ /dpa' bo nyid gyur grub pa ni/ /dpal ldan he ru ka yi ni/ /dkyil 'khor dam pa mthong ba yin/ /de nas de shes rtag sgom pa/ /dngos
386b1(rgyud): grub de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs/ /nyon cig lha mo shes rab can/ /rig pa'i rgyal po sgrub pa'i thabs/ /'khor lo chen po rmad gyur ba/ /gdengs ka'i dbang phyug zhes bya ste/ /thos
386b2(rgyud): pa tsam gyis sreg byed na/ /ming dang ldan par bris pa yis/ /gdengs ka thams cad smos ci dgos/ /dbang ldan nas ni brtsams nas su/ /klu rnams sa bon las byung ba/ /rin chen dang
386b3(rgyud): ldan gdengs gsum mtho/ /gzhan yang phyogs ni kun tu bsam/ /de nas mgur ni 'di bzhes te/ /shar du k+Sha mang bar du bri/ /nub tu hi ste byang du haM/ /gshin rjer hUM zhes bya ba bri/
386b4(rgyud): ki li ki li yi dwags su/ /srin por ci li ji snyed pa/ /rlung ni si li si li bri/ /me yi phyogs su d+hi li nyid/ /dang por rab gtum ma nas ni/ /brtson chen ma yi mthar thug pa/ /sngags
386b5(rgyud): 'di dag ni byin gyis brlab/ /'khor lo 'di ni skal chen ldan/ /dgra rnams kyi ni gnad gcod pa/ /hUM phaT ces bya spel ba yi/ /bsgrub bya de yi dbus su bri/ /lan gcig bzlas pa'i gu gul
386b6(rgyud): gyis| |gdug pa nyid du sbyar byas na/ klu rnams thams cad 'bebs par 'gyur/ /lag pa g.yon pa la 'khor lo 'di dngos su'am yid kyis bris la sngags lan gcig bzlas
386b7(rgyud): pas bya bas na/ 'chi bas dus su zin pa slong bar byed do/ /gA ra bI ra'i 'dab ma'i khu bas gAr bI ra'i smyug gus bris te lan gcig bzlas pas reg na/ mngal gang du 'dod pa der 'pho
387a1(rgyud): bar 'gyur ro/ /dug dang lan tshwa dang ske tshes bris te khros na/ /gsod par 'gyur ro/ /ro bsregs pa'i mgal ba d+hA ru ra'i khu bas bsad de 'byung po'i
387a2(rgyud): nyi ma la de nyid kyis 'khor lo bris la lan gcig zlas pa des gang la bsnun pa ltung bar 'gyur ro/ /saM ko ta'i smyug gus sngags tshag snga ma bzhin bris la thal ba la mngon
387a3(rgyud): par bsngags te gang la bsnun pa de sha zas bzung bar 'gyur ro/ /dur khrod kyi sol bas shing leb bam rtsig ngos la 'byung mo'i mtshan mo gang gi snying gar ming bris pa de gdon
387a4(rgyud): chen pos bzung bar 'gyur ro/ /bsgrub bya'i gzugs byas la de'i snying gar 'khrul 'khor bcug ste zhag bdun gyi bar du dri'i chu'i nang du bzhag nas a ti mug+ha'i lcug ma la lan bdun
387a5(rgyud): bsngags te de la bsnun na/ zhag bdun kyi mthar rlung gi shugs kyis 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /'khor lo de nyid bye brag tu dur khrod kyi ras la pho nya'i kha dog gis bye brag tu gyur ba bris
387a6(rgyud): la las kyi pho nya dang lhan cig tu bsgrub par bya'o/ /gA ra bI ra'i lcug ma khru phyed dang gnyis kyi tshad dang ldan pa la gang la mngon par phyogs te sngags bris nas ro bsregs
387a7(rgyud): pa'i me 'bar ba la dor te/ ji srid dam tshig pa dang myur du blangs la rig pa'i rgyal po lan bdun bzlas nas gang zhig dran te klad la bskor na/ /de de'i mod la rlung gi shugs kyis
387b1(rgyud): 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /skyes pa'i ro'i kham phor la ba bla dang yung ba'i khu bas gang gis ming bris pa de de'i mod la bcings par 'gyur ro/ /dur khrod kyi ras sam zla mtshan gyi ras la shing
387b2(rgyud): a shog ka'i smyug gus klu rnams spangs pa'i 'khor lo 'di bris la/ /de'i dbus su sngags pas chog gzhin yi ge e dang spel ba bris na/ /mkha' 'gro ma'i khyad par thams cad dang
387b3(rgyud): lus srul po thams cad bcings par 'gyur ro/ /thod pa la skyes pa'i khrag gis gang gi ming bris la sngags pa khro ba dang bcas pas sngags bzlas na/ /de'i khrag 'gugs par byed
387b4(rgyud): la yid zhi ba dang ldan pas zhi bas sngags bzlas na/ /slar gtong bar 'gyur ro/ /'khor lo de nyid zla bas brgyan cing gsal bar go ro tsa nas grog la skar ma rgyal gyi nyin par bris te
387b5(rgyud): bud med gang gis rtag tu bcings na/ /rig pa'i rgyal po nyid de'i lhums su 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /bud med dang zhi ba'i 'dus pas kun tu spyod pa'i mchog de'i lag mthil na yod
387b6(rgyud): pa'i dpal gang gis kyang dbrog par mi nus la/ /rnam pa de lta bu'i cho ga dang ldan pas ni/ /dngos grub thams cad kyi 'bras bu ster bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das
387b7(rgyud): 'di la ni/ brtul zhugs dang / spyod pa dang / /bsnyung ba dang / /cho ga med par yang cho ga zhib mo'i sbyor ba'i tshul 'di nyid kyis las thams cad ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin byed do/ /
388a1(rgyud): nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus bsam pa/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ste/ /'od zer tshogs ni gsal ba'i mdangs/ /'khor lo'i phreng ba rnam par
388a2(rgyud): klubs| |de dbus 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad dang / /pad+ma'i phreng bas shin tu mdzes/ /slar yang 'khor lo bri bar bya/ /rdo rje phreng ba shin tu mdzes/ /slar yang 'khor lo bri bar bya/ /
388a3(rgyud): rdo rje phreng ba rnam par 'phro/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yi/ /dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor lta bu yin/ /nam mkha' thams cad g.yogs byed pa/ /rang gi lus las spro bar bya/ /dkar
388a4(rgyud): dang dmar dang sngon po ste/ /kha dog mchog gi bye brag bya/ /bya ba'i cho ga 'di yis ni/ /dpa' bo'i dbang phyug de bzhin bri/ /dbus su bsgrub par bya ba'i ming / /ji ltar 'dod bzhin
388a5(rgyud): sbyar bar bya/ /phyi rol rdo rje'i phreng ba ni/ /'od zer 'bar ba'i phreng 'khrugs bri/ /'di ni srung ba chen po ste/ /thams cad srung bla na med/ /rims dang nad dang dug dang ni/ /mkha' 'gro
388a6(rgyud): ma yis 'tshe ba dang / /gdon dang bdud dang log 'drin dang / /gang yang lus srul la sogs pa/ /grib ma yang ni mi 'god na/ /de yi lus lta smos ci dgos/ /zla gzugs
388a7(rgyud): lta bu'i yi ge blta/ /phyogs bcur rnam par 'byer bar byed/ /dkar po yis ni zhi 'gyur te/ /nag pos skad cig dag gis gsod/ /dmar po yis ni dbang byed de/ /de nyid
388b1(rgyud): kyis ni nges par 'gugs/ /ser pos nges par 'ching 'gyur te/ /dmag gi dpung ni 'ching bar 'gyur/ zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs te/ /las thams cad 'byung ba zhes bya
388b2(rgyud): ba'i srung ba'i 'khor lo'o/ /bka' yi 'khor lo'i khyad par ni/ /de nas yang dag bshad par bya/ /las kyi cho ga mthong ba yis/ /sems can kun gyi don byed pa'o/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi
388b3(rgyud): dbus gnas par/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lta bu yi/ /dkyil 'khor 'khor lo lta bu bsam/ de dbus pad+ma bri bya ba/ /bcu drug 'dab mas rnam par brgyan/ /de dbus pad chen 'dab
388b4(rgyud): brgyad pa/ /rdo rje rtse lnga pa yi mchog /'od zer dkar pos shin tu mdzes/ /sgrub pos 'khor lo'i phyi rol bri/ /pad+ma'i lte bar swAhA bri/ /dngos grub thams cad ster ba'o/ /ma mo'i

388b6(rgyud): rtsa brgyad du bzlas par bya/ /yan lag rus pas brgyan bsam zhing / /gcer bur gyur pas rang gis bri/ /yi dwags gos sam ro yi ni/ /bum pa skam po dag la yang / /yi dwags
388b7(rgyud): sren rtsi khrag dang ni/ /de bzhin tsan+dan dmar pos bri/ /'khor lo de yi steng gnas te/ /ji ltar 'dod bzhin thun gsum du/ /blo ldan mthe'u chung bskyod nas ni/ /bram ze gsod pa'ang nyin
389a1(rgyud): bdun 'grub/ /tsan+dan dmar po'i rdul las ni/ /bsgrub par bya ba'i gzugs byas la/ /tsha ba gsum gyis lus byugs nas/ /spra tshil gyis kyang byug par
389a2(rgyud): bya| |zangs ma'i khab kyis skye gnas dbug / seng ldeng 'dag ma du med la/ /blo dang ldan pas nyin bdun bsro/ /sgrub pa po yis brgya bzlas na/ /rgyal po blon bcas mdun na 'don/ /
389a3(rgyud): btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas par ni/ /myur du 'gugs par byed pa yin/ /gro ga yi ni 'dab ma la/ /ro yi sen rtsi ro tsa nas/ /mi yi bdag po 'khor bcas la/ /ming dang
389a4(rgyud): spel te bri bar bya/ /mngon par phyogs te bzlas bzhin du/ /seng ldeng dang ni dur khrod mer/ /ji srid spra tshil ma zhu bar/ /me yi steng du gdung bar bya/ /bsgrub bya mngon par
389a5(rgyud): gdungs tsam gyis/ lha dang lha min 'ong 'gyur na/ /sa steng skye bo smos ci dgos/ /yi dwags sen rtsi skyes pa yis/ /khrag dang gi wang bcas pa yis/ /bsgrub bya'i ming sbel
389a6(rgyud): gro gar bri/ /bsgrub par bya ba'i rkang rjes sa/ /tsan+dan dmar po nyid dang ni/ /dur khrod zas lhag thal ba rnams/ /sgrub pa po yis gcig bsdus nas/ /seng ldeng me ni du
389a7(rgyud): med la/ /rdul de lag pa gnyis kyis ni/ /mnyes nas sbyin sreg byas pa yi/ /thal ba de ni bzung nas su/ /bsgrub par bya ba'i gzugs bya ste/ /snying gar 'khor lo
389b1(rgyud): bcug nas ni/ /zlos bzhin du ni mer gdungs na/ /brgyal zhing sems dang bral 'gyur la/ /rmongs shing rab tu myos nas ni/ /rlung gi shugs kyis 'ong bar 'gyur/ /cho ga'i
389b2(rgyud): bya ba 'di yis ni/ /yi ge nyi shu rtsa gnyis bzhed/ /lha mo sngags chen 'di dag ni/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi snying 'joms yin/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs kun gyi/ /yid 'ong zhi ba
389b3(rgyud): skyed pa mo/ /bka' yi 'khor lo bshad par bya/ /mkha' dbyings dbus gyur bsam pa ni/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ste/ /rdo rje rtse gsum pa bzhi pa/ /des ni de nas bri bar bya/ /de
389b4(rgyud): dbus pad+ma 'dab brgyad pa/ /shin tu mdzes pa bris nas su/ /bai ro tsa na'i rig pa che/ /sems can kun byed sdud pa mo/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan rdo rje can

389b6(rgyud): 'khor lo zhes bya bka' stsal pa/ /ge sar lte ba'i ldan pa yi/ /pad+ma 'dab ma drug par bri/ /zla ba bzang pos nye bar brgyan/ /rdo rje phreng bas rnam par klubs/ /de yi phyi rol 'khor
389b7(rgyud): bo ste/ /ston ka'i zla ltar dri med pa/ /yi ge'i mchog ni rnam pa bdun/ /lha mo chen mo phan pas gcig /bdud thams cad kyi las 'joms par byed pa 'khor lo rgyal po zhes bya'o/ /tsan+dan
390a1(rgyud): dkar po ro tsa nas/ /gro ga la ni bris nas su/ /'khor lo lag pa g.yon par bcang / /'khor lo 'di ni lha mo che/ /las kyi 'od kyis brgyan pa yin/ /de nas
390a2(rgyud): bsgrub bya nyi dbus su/ /bsams te stong du bzlas nas ni/ /yi ge shel gyi rnam pa ltar/ /bsams te nad kyis gdungs la bstan/ /mthong ba tsam gyi mod la ni/ /nad rnams
390a3(rgyud): kun las rnam grol bar/ /'gyur ba nyid du the tshom med/ /lag pa g.yon par 'khor lo 'di/ /zla ba'i dbus su rnam bkod na/ /ston ka yi ni zla 'drar 'gyur/ 'khor lo 'di ni

390a5(rgyud): bstan pa yi sel ba dang / /skyes pa'i khrag gi snag tsha yis/ /sgrub pos ming rus smyug gus bri/ /nyi ma'i dbus su gyur khro sems kyis /gzugs brnyan byas la bsgrub bya

390a7(rgyud): 'di yi nad rnams thams cad ni/ /'phel dang de bzhin sbyor byed pa'o/ /rims la yi dwags snying gar bri/ /'ga' ri yi dwags klad pa ste/ /brjed byed rlung dang sprin la
390b1(rgyud): bri/ /gzer bar bya ba mdung la ste/ /dug dang mdze nad lto 'phye la/ /gza' la gza' yi mtshan mar bri/ /mdor bsdus nas 'khor lod god/ /shel dang zla ba'i 'od 'dra ba'i/ /
390b2(rgyud): yi ge bdud rtsi rgyun 'bab pas/ /ston ka'i zla zer lta bur ni/ /bsam gtan bsam pa tsam gyis ni/ /'chi ba'ang nges par slong bar 'gyur/ /sprul chen brgya yis zin nas ni/ /'chi
390b3(rgyud): ba'ang myur du slong bar byed/ /dug gis brgyal bar gyur pa dag /bstan pa tsam gyis slong bar 'gyur/ /rims dang gdon dang brjed byed dang / /lag pa mthong bas brlag par
390b4(rgyud): byed/ /grib ma yang ni mi 'gom na/ /de yi lus lta smos ci dgos/ /zangs ma yi ni 'dab ma 'am/ /lag pa g.yon par 'khor lo 'di/ /ba bla dang ni yung bas bri/ /de nas chu
390b5(rgyud): yi nang bzhag la/ /ji ltar 'byung bzhin 'bad de mchod/ /mtshams kyi dus su mnyam bzhag pas/ /de bzhin du ni sngags bzlas bya/ /chu yi nang nas bton nas su/ /'o mas
390b6(rgyud): bkrus la rgya mtshor gzhug / g.yul du khu tshur bcangs nas ni/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam brgyan te/ /yid la rtag tu zlos byed na/ /ji srid khu tshur ma dkrol bar/ /myur
390b7(rgyud): du thams cad rengs 'gyur te/ /dgra bo gal te lag na ni/ /mtshon cha phyar te thogs pa yang / /ji srid khu tshur ma dkrol bar/ /mtshon cha gtong bar mi nus so/ /yi ge bdun dang rnal
391a1(rgyud): 'byor ma/ /drug gi yi ge 'di dag ni/ /'khor lo drug la gnas par ni/ /lag pa'i dbus su bkod nas su/ /cho ga rig pas bcang bar bya/ /kha nas
391a2(rgyud): gsang sngags rgyal po zlos/ /de yi gzugs gyur bzung nas ni/ /de ni 'gugs 'gyur the tshom med/ /tsan+dan dmar po'i rdul dang ni/ /lan tshwa ske tshe de bzhin te/ /bsgrub bya'i

391a5(rgyud): nas su| |lan bdun du ni bzlas par bya/ /lam gyi bzhi mdor sor brgyad tsam/ /brkos te dgra yi ming nas ni/ /bzung nas sa yis dgab par bya/ /gang gi ming bzung de bcings 'gyur/ /

391b1(rgyud): de slar yang bkrus na ni/ /grol 'gyur 'di ni the tshom med/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /de nas bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs/ /

391b4(rgyud): rgyas kun gyi go cha che/ /mdzes ma'i gdong can khyod la bshad/ /dbus su snga ma'i gsang sngags bri/ /pad+ma'i 'dab mar de bzhin gzhan/ /ring po drug ni yongs spangs pa/ /rdo rje yi ni

391b7(rgyud): med| |lte ba der ni thig la yis/ /bskor ba'i thig le dag kyang bya/ /a ri tsa ta ka bcud dang / /yung ba dag gis khyad par du/ /a sho ka yi smyug gu yis/ /dpa' bo yis ni ras mar bri/ /

392a2(rgyud): pa las/ /sgrub pos gzugs brnyan byas nas su/ /bcing bas bcings te de yi ni/ /snying ga ru ni gzhug par bya/ /me tog ser pos mchod nas ni/ /gsang ba'i gnas su sbas
392a3(rgyud): gyur na| |dgra rnams thams cad 'ching 'gyur zhing / /rlag par byed pa mi bzad par/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /mkha'

397a6(rgyud): sen mo dang / /thal sman 'bus zos shing phye dang / /ma hA ha ta mo k+Sha dang / /puska ra dang brta gi /ku ba sin+du ba ri phye/ /bcas par mi yi rkang du gzhug /cung zad bzhag ste phyung nas su/ /rdo
397a7(rgyud): yi gtun du mnye bar bya/ /'od ma'i nang du blugs nas ni/ /btso dza rgod ma'i kha 'dra dang / /kar na da yi chu yi dbyibs/ /bong bu'i gdong dang rnga mo'i gdong / /kha chen 'di dag bcing ba
397b1(rgyud): dang | |tshar bcad pa la bsngags pa yin/ /gang yang 'khrul 'khor kha che ba/ /rdza rnga yi ni dbyibs 'dra dang / /'o ma'i dbyibs 'dra la sogs dang / /mtshon cha ral gri'i shugs 'dra ba/ /kang+ka yi
397b2(rgyud): ni mgrin pa 'dra/ /nyes pa tshar gcod pa la bsngags/ /gzhan yang dngul chu bcings pa la/ /bshad pa de dag rjes su gzung / /bzhi cha lus pa btso yin te/ /phyed lus stobs chen btso ba yin/ /dngul
397b3(rgyud): chur brten pa'i dri ma ni/ /de bzhin du ni sbyang bar bya/ /sbyang pa dang ni rtogs pa dang / /rmongs pa de bzhin gsod pa'o/ /de nas lhang cher rdul phye dang / /bcas par rtsi yi nang du blug /ban du zhes
397b4(rgyud): bya'i phye ma ni/ /skyo mar bcas pa'i nang du btung / /lhang tsher dngul chu rnon po yi/ /cho ga yis ni so sor bcing / /de nas cung zhig ngal bso bya/ /bzhag pa me yi gnas sam ni/ /chu yi shing
397b5(rgyud): la brten par bya/ /lci ba'am 'bras kyi phung po'ang rung / /rngo ba yi ni nang dag dang / /ba lang ma ho sogs pa'i ltas/ /bye ma yi ni phung por sbo/ /de nas ngal bso phyung nas ni/ /gzugs
397b6(rgyud): dang sgra dang dri ro sogs/ /tshad dang mtshan ma ji bzhin brtag /la la'i 'bras bu la'i rtsa/ /kha cig me tog 'dab ma dang / /shun pa dang ni rus pa'ang rung / /rnal 'byor pa yis longs
397b7(rgyud): spyod ni/ /rnam pa sna tshogs blta bar bya/ /bcos pa'ang bcos min yo byad ni/ /rnyed na rdo rje 'dzin 'drar 'gyur/ /de yang stobs can bcud bral na/ /sngon bzhin nyes pa sna tshogs 'gyur/ /
398a1(rgyud): dngul chu lhang tsher kha dog ni/ /sna tshogs dang ldan skyon yin te/ /khrag dang mkhris pa skyed byed yin/ /dmar pos khrag kyang skyed par byed/ /dkar pos
398a2(rgyud): zug gzer skyed 'gyur zhing / /srog ni 'joms par byed pa yin/ /ljang ser dag ni ma smin dang / /ser skya lam ni 'gag 'gyur zhing / /nyis 'gyur cha ni shin tu 'ching / /nyes pa dag
398a3(rgyud): ni brgyar ldan pas/ /blo dang ldan pas dpyad de bza'/ /sngo dang nag po bcud chen yin/ /de ltar bcud len rnam dpyad na/ /chu skyes chen po'i yon tan ldan/ /dngul chu'i 'ol so
398a4(rgyud): gcig dang ni/ /rgya mtsho las byung nyis 'gyur ldan/ /bzhi 'gyur gyi ni me tog bcas/ /sna sman bldag pa'i mchog yin te/ /khrag dang dngul chu bcu 'gyur du/ /rim gyis spel te bza'
398a5(rgyud): bar bya| |de phan chad ni 'bras bu med/ /dngul chu bso bas rmongs pa dang / /khyad par du ni bsad kyang rung / /sngar bstan pa yi me tog dang / /byang chub sems dang bcas te bza'/ /
398a6(rgyud): thams cad du ni snga dro bza'/ /cho ga'i rim pa 'di yin no/ /lhang tsher chu dang dngul chu ni/ /dgong mo'i dus su bldag par bya/ /zla ba la ni zla ba'i lam/ /nyi ma la ni nyi ma ste/ /de dang
398a7(rgyud): de nas sbyin par bya/ /de ltar yul dang dus dang ni/ /rdzas rnams rgya cher bstan pa dag /yid gzhungs la sogs 'phel byed yin/ /mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /rdo rje mkha'
398b1(rgyud): 'gro bde ba'i mchog / rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las/ /bcud kyis len gyi cho ga'i rim par phye
398b2(rgyud): ba ste bcu bdun pa'o/ / //de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /rgyud du sbas pa nges par bya/ /yang dag bsdus pa'i cho ga ni/ /bshad kyi sgrub pa po rnams nyon/ /bde mchog
398b3(rgyud): bla ma'i gnas la sogs/ /mkha' 'gro mas ni thams cad khyab/ /ye shes ldan pa'i rang skyes gnas/ /yul dang yul du mngon par skye/ /'di ni mkha' 'gro ma zhes bya/ /rdo rje dkyil
398b4(rgyud): 'khor gtso mo yin/ /rnal 'byor ma drug sgrub po la/ /brda yi skad kyis bshad pa yin/ /ku lu ta dang ma ru yi/ /yul du gnas pa ma mo ste/ /sin+d+hu dang ni na ga rar/ /rigs kyi gtso
398b5(rgyud): mo rnams yin no/ /lam pa ka dang sau rASh+Tar/ /gang gnas rigs kyi lha mo yin/ /kha ba'i ri dang kany+tsi na/ /gang yod byis bcas mo zhes bya/ /pAny+tsa la yi yul dag dang / /gri ha de ba
398b6(rgyud): tA dag na/ /lhan cig skyes pa'i bu mo gnas/ /ka ling+ka dang ko sa lar/ /brtul zhugs 'dzin ma sha chen za/ /pre ta pu ri zhes bya dang / /tri sha ku na ri sbom dbang phyug /khaN+Da ro ha zhes
398b7(rgyud): bya gnas/ /pu l+lI ra dang dzA lan+d+ha ra/ /tsaN+Da li yi bud med gnas/ /o Te dang ni kI rU yi/ /yul du bu mo chen mo ste/ /de bI ko Ti zhes bya dang / /rA me shwa ri'i bu mo'ang 'dod/ /go dA ba ri
399a1(rgyud): ar bu dar/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi dbang phyug mchog /gser gling ji ltar bstan pa bzhin/ /aud+ya na yang ni de bzhin no/ /yul 'di rnams kyi bu mo gang //
399a2(rgyud): dpa' bo gnyis med khyab pa ste/ /kun kyang 'dod pa'i gzugs can ma/ /yid kyi shugs kyis 'jug ma yin/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha mos slar yang mchod cing phyag byas
399a3(rgyud): te 'di skad ces gsol to/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi khyad par dang / /zhing skyong 'jigs pa chen po yi/ /ming dang zhing gi ming dang ni/ /gnas rnams kyi ni khyad par dang / /gang du sgrub pa
399a4(rgyud): pos thos na/ /the tshom med par 'grub 'gyur ba/ /de dag thams cad mdor bsdus te/ /gtso bos bdag la bshad du gsol/ /de nas bcom ldan rdo rje can/ /rdo rje sems dpa'
399a5(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs/ /nga yis gang la'ang ma bshad pa'i/ /gsang chen shin tu rnyed dka' ba'i/ /gang yin khyod ni zhu 'dod pa/ /legs so legs so lha mo che/ /sgyu ma chen mor
399a6(rgyud): rang 'gro ba/ /bshad kyi rtse gcig yid kyis nyon/ /a T+Ta ha se'i yul gnas pa/ /zhi ba'i gdong zhes grags pa ste/ /rgyal ba'i lha mo'i skye gnas 'byung / /rdo rje yi ni mtshon cha bsnams/ /
399a7(rgyud): yul der gnas pa'i lha mo de/ /ka taM pa yi shing la brten/ /dril bu chen po zhes bya ba'i/ /k+She tra pA la stobs po che/ /kau la kir ni dpal chan mo/ /gtsigs pa'i skye gnas las byung ba/ /
399b1(rgyud): gtsigs pa'i gzugs can lha mo ste/ /rnam par 'gyur zhing 'jigs su rung / /grong khyer der gnas drag shul can/ /ri yi rtse mor brten te gnas/ /me yi gdong pa zhes bya ba/ /k+She tra pA
399b2(rgyud): la mdzes pa'i gdong / /da ra nar ni bde byed ma/ /sme brtsegs chen po'i skye gnas byung / /lha mo ga yi mtshon cha bsnams/ /chos kyi dbang phyug gsol ba mo/ /zhing der gnas par
399b3(rgyud): grags pa ste/ /ta la'i shing la brten te gnas/ /gyen du 'bar skra zhes bya ba/ /k+She tra pA la gtsigs pa che/ /de bI ko Tir rna mo che/ /stobs po che yi skye gnas byung / /lha mo lag na mdung
399b4(rgyud): can te/ /rnal 'byor dbang phyug kun gyi mchog /gnas der lha mo drag chen mo/ /b+ha dra'i shing la brten te gnas/ /k+She tra pA la lus chen po/ /mchog gi dbang phyug rgyu zhes bya/ /pi ra
399b5(rgyud): dzar ni phyi mo ste/ /ba dan gyi ni phyag na bsnams/ /zhi ba'i gzugs can lha mo che/ /'dod pa'i dbang phyug rab stsol pa/ /zhing der gnas pa me 'bar ma/ /a mra'i shing la brten te
399b6(rgyud): gnas| |ha har dgod pa sgra chen po/ /sems can thams cad 'jigs par byed/ /e ru dar ni me lce 'bar/ /thod pa dge ba'i skye gnas byung / /lha mo rdo rje shag+ti bsnams/ /zhing der
399b7(rgyud): shin tu myos pas gnas/ /grong khyer der gnas lha mo de/ /gser shing la ni brten te gnas/ /dril bu sgra zhes bya ba yi/ /k+She tra pA la dpa' bo che/ /pre ta pu rir dmar ser te/ /'jigs
400a1(rgyud): pa chen mo'i spyan dang ldan/ /lha mo gtun shing mtshon cha bsnams/ /gtsigs pa'i skye gnas las byung ba'o/ /zhing der gnas pa'i lha mo der/ /dzA ti'i
400a2(rgyud): shing la brten te gnas/ /byin chen zhes bya'i zhing skyong ni/ /shin tu gtsigs shing 'jigs su rung / /e la phu ring bong zhon ma/ /rab tu gtum pa'i skye gnas byung / /phyag na
400a3(rgyud): zhags pas 'jigs chen mo/ /zhing der myos pas yang dag gnas/ /khyogs der gnas pa'i lha mo de/ /stobs chen pha rol gnon pa mo/ /glang chen rna ba zhes bya ba'i/ /
400a4(rgyud): zhing skyes mchog las skyes pa'o/ /kha che'i yul du ba lang rna/ /gtum pa'i skye gnas las byung ma/ /rdo rje lcags sgrog thogs nas ni/ /sgra rnams 'joms la mchog tu brtson/ /
400a5(rgyud): gnas der gnas pa'i lha mo de/ /ri yi rtse la brten te gnas/ /spu gu'i byin pa can zhes bya'i/ /k+She tra pA la 'jigs chen po/ /ma ru'i yul du rim pa mo/ /'jigs gdong dpa' bo'i skye gnas
400a6(rgyud): byung | |lcags kyu zhags thogs lha mo de/ /zhing der shin tu myos pas gnas/ /yul der gnas pa'i lha mo de/ /dbye chen la ni brten te gnas/ /gtsigs pa zhes bya'i zhing skyong ni/ /
400a7(rgyud): rmongs par byed pa'i bzhin yangs pa'o/ /nag rar ni thong gshol ma/ /sme brtsegs yan lag skye gnas byung / /ro langs can ni 'od chen ma/ /dpa' bo kun la dngos grub stsol/ /
400b1(rgyud): gnas der gnas pa'i bzang mo de/ /sba yi shing gi ldum rar gnas/ /sbu yi byin pa zhes bya ba'i/ /k+She tra pA la gtsigs pa che/ /pUN+Da bar+d+ha'i yul du ni/ /tsa muN+DI zhes bya ba ste/ /stobs po che
400b2(rgyud): yi skye gnas byung / /kha T+wAM ga yis lag pa brgyan/ /lha mo spyod dang grol bar byed/ /sdig pa ma lus zad byed pa/ /bum pa zhes bya'i zhing skyong ni/ /zhing de na ni yang dag gnas/ /dzA lan+d+ha ra ni bzhin
400b3(rgyud): dwangs ma/ /chags pa'i rigs kyi skye gnas byung / /rdo rje lcags sgrog thogs nas ni/ /bde ba'i mchog ni kun la ster/ /grong khyer mchog der gnas lha mo/ /khang pa brtsegs mar brten te
400b4(rgyud): gnas| |ral pa gsum zhes bya ba yi/ /zhing skyong shin tu gtsigs pa che/ /pre ta pu rir glog gi gdong / /gtsigs pa'i skye gnas yang dag byung / /lha mo dbyig pa shag+ti thogs/ /bsam
400b5(rgyud): pa thams cad rdzogs byed ma/ /zhing der gnas pa'i lha mo de/ /drag po'i gzugs can 'jigs par byed/ /dril bu'i sgra zhes bya ba yi/ /k+Shi tra pA las smad pa min/ /'ug pa'i gdong
400b6(rgyud): can 'jigs su rung / /so pa der ni me lce'i gdong / /zangs gri yis ni lag pa brgyan/ /sha chen gyi ni stan la gnas/ /bde ba'i dbang phyug rab ster ba/ /zhing dar gnas pa'i lha mo che/
400b7(rgyud): shal ma li yi shing la gnas/ /bya ba kun mdzes zhes bya ba'i/ /k+She tra pA la 'jigs chen po/ /tsa rit+ta yi yul du ni/ /ka rany+tsa gnas zhes bya ba/ /shag+ti gtsigs pa'i skye gnas byung / /
401a1(rgyud): shag+ti yi ni phyag rgya thogs/ /dril bu chen po zhes bya ba/ /k+She tra pA la stobs po che/ /sbrul dang ldan pa'i gyen skra can/ /gdug pa thams cad 'jigs
401a2(rgyud): par mdzad/ /au D+yan du ni lha mo che/ /gsang ba zhes bya'i skye gnas byung / /lha mo rdo rje lcags sgrog thogs/ /shin tu drag cing gsal ba'i gzugs/ /sgra chen zhes bya drag po'i
401a3(rgyud): gzugs/ /k+She tra pA la stobs po che/ /gnas mchog der gnas lha mo de/ /a sho ka yi shing brten gnas/ /dzA lan+d+ha rar gtum mo ni/ /zhi ba yi ni skye gnas byung / /lag na
401a4(rgyud): zangs kyi phyar te thogs/ /dbang phyug thams cad ster ba mo/ /gnas der gnas pa drag chen mo/ /gser shing la ni brten te gnas/ /skyed pa zhes bya'i dpa' bo che/ /bdud rnams
401a5(rgyud): thams cad 'jigs par byed/ /k+She re ker ni skye bo'i ma/ /drag cing sngo la stobs chen ma/ /ral gri lag thogs lha mo che/ /dngos grub thams cad ster ba mo/ /lha mo chen mo gyan skra
401a6(rgyud): 'bar| |sA la'i shing la brten te gnas/ /lhun po chen po zhes bya ba'i/ /k+She tra pA la zhing der gnas/ /ma ya pu rer 'dod ma ste/ /'jigs pa'i gdong gi skye gnas byung / /rdo rje
401a7(rgyud): shag+ti dge ba thogs/ /sgrub po rnams la stobs ster ba/ /gzugs sngon 'jigs pa chen mo ste/ /'byung po'i shing la brten te gnas/ /der gnas 'jigs pa zhes bya ba'i/ /
401b1(rgyud): k+She tra pA la stobs po che/ /bu ta nar ni a mra ke /dgra rnams thams cad 'jigs byed pa/ /thong gshol dang ni ga ya thogs/ /sems can thams cad dbang byed ma/ /da ru'i shing
401b2(rgyud): la brten te gnas/ /sems can thams cad 'jigs par byed/ /brtul zhugs chen po zhes bya ba'i/ /k+She tra bA la zhing der gnas/ /rgyal ba'i khab tu dzan sa/ /khrag chen gyi ni skye
401b3(rgyud): gnas byung / /rdo rje lcags kyur yang dag ldan/ /pha rol g.yul las rgyal bar mdzad/ /zhing der gnas pa'i lha mo de/ /dzi li 'i sgra 'byin 'jigs par byed/ /rna chen zhes bya'i
401b4(rgyud): zhing skyong ni/ /rtag tu de dang nye bar gnas/ /bod yul du ni lhan skyes te/ /rang byung gi ni skye gnas byung / /chu srin rgyal mtshan lag na thogs/ /zhi zhing gsal ba'i gzugs can te/ /
401b5(rgyud): yul der gnas pa'i lha mo de/ /brag gi khyim la brten te gnas/ /longs spyod ces bya'i dpa' bo che/ /k+She tra pA la thub dka' ba'o/ /ma la bar ni dbang bskur ma/ /tho ba yi ni phyag rgya
401b6(rgyud): thogs/ /sgrub pa bo la rtag tu brtse/ /grags dang dpal dang bkra shis ster/ /zhing der gnas pa'i lha mo de/ /mngar ba'i shing la brten te gnas/ /skyes bu'i dbang phyug ces bya ba'i//

402a2(rgyud): dngos grub kun ster ba'i/ /mchod pa'i cho ga bshad par bya/ /me tog bdug pa de bzhin du/ /mar me dri yi khyad par dang / /gtor ma'i snod kyis nye bar mchod/ /sha rlon

402a5(rgyud): gnas| |nag pa drag po drag chen po/ /lha sbyin mnyam du bsten pa dang / /nag po gtsigs pa 'jigs byed dang / /rga las 'das dang log 'dren rnams/ /rgan byed ma dang drag

402a7(rgyud): ma| |dbang mo dang ni zla ba mo/ /drag tu ldang dang 'phyang ba mo/ /'phrog byed ma dang mar me ma/ /'jib byed grong gnas rnal 'byor ma/ /drag mo'i gzugs dang gzugs chen mo//
402b1(rgyud): mche ba gtsigs dang thod chen ma/ /thod phreng phreng can kha T+wAM ma/ /sprul chen ral gri dgra sta can/ /rdo rje de bzhin gzhu can ma/ /de nyid chen mo'i mkha' 'gro lnga/ /las kun rjes su sgrub

402b3(rgyud): thams cad kun nas 'dir sbyon cig /oM kA kA ka d+ha na b+ha ba ban+d+ha na kha kha khAd+ha na sarba duSh+Ta na/ ha na ha na/ g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya/ a mu ka s+ya kA R+yaM ku ru hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT phaT dzaH swAhA/ bdud
402b4(rgyud): rtsi yis ni kha bkang ste/ /lha rnams thams cad tshim par bya/ /rnal 'byor rnal 'byor ma yis ni/ /las rnams thams cad sgrub par bsgom/ /oM b+hak+Sha b+hak+Sha/ sarba yo ge shwa ri hUM
402b5(rgyud): hUM hUM dzaHswAhA/ la sogs sbyor ba ji bzhin du/ /gtor ma'i las ni sbyar bya ste/ /zhi dang rgyas dang dbang dang dgug /bsad dang sdang dang bcing ba la/ /sgrub pos gtor ma'i
402b6(rgyud): de nyid kyis/ /las rnams thams cad bsgrub bya zhing / /ye shes lcags kyu'i bye brag gis/ /rang 'dod lha ni tshim par bya/ /zhing dang gnas dang de bzhin grong / /grong khyer
402b7(rgyud): ri yi rtse mo ru/ /'byung po thams cad tshogs gyur par/ /'dus na sgrub po la mchog ster/ /gnas la sogs par rtag gnas shing / /sgrub pa po ni gus ldan la/ /lha mo
403a1(rgyud): rnams kyis mchog ster bar/ /sgrub pa po la the tshom med/ /gang gis sgrub pa po 'grub pa'i/ /ro yi sgrub pa bshad par bya/ /rgan po ma yin
403a2(rgyud): rma med cing / /mdze dang shu ba la sogs spangs/ /shin tu mnyam par bzhag pa yis/ /'byung po'i nyi ma la bsgrub bya/ /bdud rtsi lnga yi khyad par dang / /lha yi chu yis
403a3(rgyud): bkru bar bya/ /mar khu chen pos byug pa dang / /bdug pa chen pos de bdug bya/ /maN+Dal gru bzhi byas nas ni/ /de dbus 'bad pas gru gsum bya/ /sangs rgyas thams cad
403a4(rgyud): bdag la gson/ /zhes bya la sogs sngon bzhin brjod/ /ha hA hi hI hUM hUM he he zhes bya'i rgod pa rnam par brgyad/ /sgrub pa po yis chog bzhin bya/ /me la gnas pa'i sa bon
403a5(rgyud): ni| |rlung gi sa bon gyis phye ba/ /spyi gtsug tu ni sbyar byas la/ /sa yi steng du mchod par bya/ /rnal 'byor ma yi dbus gnas par/ /'bad pa yis ni myur du blta/ /sgrub
403a6(rgyud): pos bdag nyid bsam bya ba/ /skye gnas dbus su rim bzhin blta/ /'bar phreng gi rgya mtsho ste/ /pho nya 'od dang bcas blta zhes/ /mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /rdo
403a7(rgyud): rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog / rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las/ 'du
403b1(rgyud): ba'i gnas nges pa dang / sgrub pa'i cho ga'i rim par phye ba ste bco brgyad pa'o/ /de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /ma mo'i dkyil 'khor dge ba dang / /lha rnams thams cad sgrub pa dang / /de
403b2(rgyud): bzhin pho nya'i khyad par dang / /'byung po gdon gyi rig pa che/ /gang gzhan lus srul la sogs pa/ /de bzhin sngags kyi phreng ba rnams/ /da ni khyod la bshad kyi nyon/ /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi
403b3(rgyud): pa| |sgo khyud dang ni ldan pa yi/ /dkyil 'khor nyams dga' bri bar bya/ /dngos grub kun gyi yon tan gnas/ /'dod yon lnga yis rab brgyan pa/ /mchod pa lnga dang yang dag ldan/ /
403b4(rgyud): ro la g.yogs pa'i ras sam ni/ /mtshon gyis brgyab pa'i ras dag dang / /bu btsas pa yi ras dang ni/ /ba lang ko ba la sogs la/ /dam tshig can gyi 'bri mkhan gyis/ /sgrub po mchog
403b5(rgyud): gis 'bri ru gzhug / tshes brgyad dang ni bcu bzhi la/ /'byung po'i dkyil 'khor bsgrub par bya/ /de nas 'bum phrag gcig bzlas pas/ /mngon sum du ni mdun gnas 'gyur/ /
403b6(rgyud): tshangs pa mo dang zhi ba mo/ /gzhon nu mo dang phag mo dang / /dbang mo dang ni tsa muN+DI/ /tshogs kyi dbang mo sreg byed ma/ /rim pa gnyis pa'i 'o/ /dbang po gshin rje chu lha dang / /lus

410a5(rgyud): zhal gcig pa la spyan gsum pa/ /ral pa'i thor tshugs dag dang ldan/ /'od zer dmar po 'bar zhing 'khrug /mche ba gtsigs pa 'jigs par bri/ /dgra sta dang ni gtun
410a6(rgyud): shing dang / /mda' dang gzhu ni de bzhin te/ /kha T+wAM ga dang lcags kyu dang / /khrag gis gang ba'i thod pa dang / /de bzhin rdo rje ral gri ste/ /gzhan yang sha chen thod pa bsnams/ /
410a7(rgyud): mu sun+di dang ba dan gsum/ /shag+ti dang ni bcu gnyis so/ /oM a mo g+ha sid+d+h+ya sarbAr+tha me pra sA d+ha ya hUM hUM dzaHdzaHswAhA/ spyan drang ba'i sngags so/ /oM AHga hUM swAhA/ bzlas
410b1(rgyud): pa'i sngags so/ /stong phrag brgyas ni 'grub gyur te/ /de nas las ni brtsam par bya/ /lan gcig bzlas nas thig le dag /sngags pas byas na skal bzang 'gyur/ /rgyal po sgor yang
410b2(rgyud): mchod 'thob ste/ /dgra rnams thams cad zad byed 'gyur/ /bgegs rnams ma lus bskrad pa dang / /'dod pa kun gyi 'bras ster bar/ /'gyur ba 'di la the tshom med/ /cho ga'i
410b3(rgyud): sbyor ba de nyid kyis/ /ma mo rnams kyi sgrub thabs mchog /sbyor ba'i rim pa de nyid kyis/ /gza' rnams kyang ni sgrub par 'dod/ /oM sarba ti thi na k+Sha tra gra ha mang+ga bye b+h+yaHswAhA/
410b4(rgyud): gza' thams cad kyi sngags so/ /oM zhes bya ba dang po ste/ /swAhA'i mtha' can byin brlab ces/ /mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje
410b5(rgyud): sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dang la rdo rje mkha' 'gro las/ 'byung po dang gdon thams cad kyi sgrub thabs 'byung
410b6(rgyud): ba'i rim par phye ba ste bcu dgu pa'o/ / //de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha mo rnams kyis mchod cing phyag byas te 'di skad ces gsol to/ /ye shes de nyid khyad par dang / /
410b7(rgyud): lus kyi mtshan ma ji ltar lags/ /rtsa rnams gang la brten gyur dang / /de rnams dbye ba mi 'tshal te/ /bcom ldan 'das la nyan par 'tshal/ /bde ba chen pos bshad du gsol/
411a1(rgyud): nyon cig lha mo sgyu ma che/ /sgyu ma kun tu rnam 'phrul ba/ /rtsa chen po ni sum cu gnyis/ /de dag gzhan las shin tu gtso/ /bcu dang gnyis ni de bzhin du//
411a2(rgyud): dbyangs rnams 'pho ba'i mtshan nyid de/ /yar ngo mar ngo'i bye brag gis/ /nyi shu rtsa bzhir brjod pa yin/ /dus ni myur dang ring ba dag /yan lag mtshan ma'i mtshan nyid ni/ /
411a3(rgyud): gang zhig shes pa tsam gyis ni/ /'chi ba'i dus la bab pas gnas/ /dbugs ni rnam par rgod gyur na/ /lus can drug dang gnyis kyis 'chi/ /snga dro ro hi ta'i dus su/ /de yi mtshan
411a4(rgyud): ma mtshon par bya/ /sna dang mig gi gnas dang ni/ /'gram pa dang ni rna ba'i rtsa/ /lce dang so yi mtshams dang ni/ /de bzhin mgrin pa'i phyi rol dang / /snying ga'i dra ba lte ba dang / /brla dang
411a5(rgyud): byin pa de bzhin gzhan/ /chu so dang ni mtshan dag dang / /mgo dang spyi gtsug gi ni phyogs/ /dbugs ni tshad cing chad gyur pa'i/ /lus kyi mtshan ma myur ba ru/ /'chi ba'i dus ni ston
411a6(rgyud): par byed/ /nyi ma'i grangs kyi tshad kyis ni/ /'khor los dus kyi bdag nyid brtsi/ /sgo gcig nas ni nyin drug tu/ /gang tshe dbugs ni rgyu gyur pa/ /yon tan gsum gyi lo dag ni//
411a7(rgyud): zhag ni sum brgya drug cu ru/ /bgos pa yi ni tshad dag ni/ /mdor bsdus nas ni bstan par bya/ /lo gnyis dang ni zla ba dag /dus kyi grangs su bsten pa dang / /nyin zhag dag ni
411b1(rgyud): bco ba rgyad du/ /de yi tshad ni yang dag brjod/ /nyi ma dag ni bdun dang mtha'/ /gal te rlung ni rgyur gyur na/ /lo gnyis dang ni de bzhin du/ /zla ba drug tu 'tsho 'gyur zhing / /de bzhin
411b2(rgyud): lo gnyis zla ba ni/ /rig byed kyi ni grangs dang ni/ /nyi ma nyi shu rtsa bzhi ru/ /'tsho 'gyur dus kyi grangs yin no/ /gal te nyin dgur rgyu gyur na/ /lo gnyis zla ba bzhi dang ni/ /nyin zhag nyi
411b3(rgyud): ma'i grangs su ni/ /lus can rnams kyi sbyor pa yin/ /gal te nyin bcur rgyu gyur na/ /lo gnyis las ni mi 'tsho'o/ /gal te nyin zhag bcu gcig tu/ /sgo gcig nas ni rgyu ba dag /
411b4(rgyud): lo gcig zla ba dgu dang ni/ /nyin zhag bco brgyad dag las ni/ /mi 'tsho mdzes ma khyod la bshad/ /nyin zhag bcu gnyis rgyu na ni/ /lo gcig dang ni zla ba ni/ /dbyangs kyi grangs dang nyin
411b5(rgyud): zhag ni/ /dus kyi grangs las mi 'tsho'o/ /gal te nyin ma bcu gsum du/ /g.yas kyi lam nas rgyu ba ni/ /lo gcig dang ni zla ba dag /rig byed kyi ni grangs dang ni/ /nyi ma dgu las mi 'tsho
411b6(rgyud): zhes/ /mdzes ma'i gdong can khyod la bshad/ /gal te bdun phrag gnyis su ni/ /g.yas kyi lam nas rlung rgyu de/ /lo gcig zla ba gnyis dang ni/ /nyi ma bcu yi phyed dag las/ /'tsho
411b7(rgyud): bar mi 'gyur de yi ni/ /tshe tshad nges par bstan pa yin/ /gang zhig nyi ma lnga gsum du/ /g.yas kyi sgo nas rlung rgyun/ /lo gcig na ni gdon mi za/ /gang zhig brgyang phrag gnyis su ni/ /
412a1(rgyud): g.yas nas rlung ni rgyu ba dag /de yi tshe tshad nges pa dag /zla ba bcu dang nyi ma ni/ /nyi shu rtsa bzhi dag las ni/ /mi 'tsho bar ni ngas bshad do/ /
412a2(rgyud): gal te nyin zhag bcu bdun du/ /g.yas kyi lam nas rlung rgyun/ /de nas de yi tshe tshad ni/ /zla ba dgu dang nyin zhag ni/ /bco brgyad dag las mi 'tsho bar/ /gdon mi za bar
412a3(rgyud): bshad pa yin/ /nyin zhag bco brgyad rgyu na ni/ /zla ba dag ni brgyad dang ni/ /nyin zhag nyi ma'i grangs su ni/ /de yi dbus ni bshad pa yin/ /gal te nyin zhag bcu dgu ru/ /dri
412a4(rgyud): yi bzhon pa rgyu ba dag / ji srid 'tsho bar bshad par bya/ /zla ba dag ni bdun dang ni/ /nyin zhag dus kyi grangs las ni/ /'tsho bar mi 'gyur gdon mi za/ /gal te nyin zhag nyi shur
412a5(rgyud): ni| |rgyu ba zla ba drug na ni/ /de yi srog ni 'gro bar 'gyur/ /gal te nyin zhag nyi shu gcig /nyi ma'i lam nas rlung rgyu ba/ /zla ba lnga dang nyi ma ni/ /nyi ma'i grangs las mi 'tsho'o/ /
412a6(rgyud): nyin zhag nyi shu gnyis rgyu na/ /zla ba rig byed grangs dang ni/ /nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa bzhi las/ /mi 'tsho bar ni yang dag brjod/ /gal te nyin zhag nyi shu gsum/ /sgo gcig nas ni rlung
412a7(rgyud): rgyun/ /zla ba bzhi dang nyi ma ni/ /dus kyi grangs las mi 'tshor brjod/ /nyi shu rtsa bzhir rgyu ba dang / /zla ba gsum dang nyi ma ni/ /bcu gcig dag las mi 'tsho 'o/ /nyin zhag nyi shu lnga rgyun/ /zla
412b1(rgyud): ba gsum las mi 'tsho'o/ /de las gong ma sngar bstan pa'i/ /grangs las mdor bsdus shes par bya/ /bcu dang gnyis kyi rtsis las ni/ /bar bar gyi ni bstan pa yin/ /cha dang cha yis
412b2(rgyud): rim bzhin du/ /bar bar nyi ma gsal bar byas/ /blo dman rnams kyis rtogs bya'i phyir/ /dus de dag ni bshad pa yin/ /rnal 'byor pa rnams la ni dus/ /shin tu phra ba ngas bshad pa/ /
412b3(rgyud): khams rnams snyoms pa'i lus la ni/ /de dag blta zhing yid ches bya/ /sgo ni steng du ltas 'bab pa/ /sna yi bar sha chad gyur na/ /nyin zhag bdun gyis the tshom med/ /cha shas dgu ni yang dag
412b4(rgyud): gnas| |de bzhin sgo ni steng bltas las/ /mig gi chu ni chad gyur na/ /nyi ma lnga na 'chi bar 'gyur/ /cha shas bcu ni shes bya ba/ /steng du bltas te 'gro ba las/ /rna ba g.yon dang
412b5(rgyud): 'gram pa yi/ /ngos kyi mtshan ma dag las ni/ /nyin zhag gcig las mi 'tsho'o/ /cha shas bcu gcig gnas pa yi/ /gsal bar steng du 'gro ba las/ /rna ba g.yas par brten pa yis//
412b6(rgyud): nyin zhag bco brgyad dag na 'chang / /cha shas bcu gnyis de bzhin gnas/ /lce yi skud pa nag mthong na/ /lus can dus kyi nyin zhag 'chi/ /cha shas bcu gsum brten pa yi/ /de bzhin
412b7(rgyud): steng du 'bar ba yi/ /steng 'og so ni 'thams gyur na/ /'byung pa dag ni ma lus 'dren/ /srog ni dus grangs nyi mas 'gro/ /dbyangs yig bcu bzhi brten pa ni/ /mgrin pa'i bla na gnas pa'i rtsa//
413a1(rgyud): steng du bltas pa zhes grags kyi/ /nyin zhag lnga las mi 'tsho'o/ /cha shas bco lnga gnas pa yi/ /steng du bltas pa'i mchog de la/ /brang gi dra ba zhom gyur
413a2(rgyud): zla phyed na ni gdon mi bra/ /cha shas bcu drug rdzogs pa'i bdag /lte ba'i dbus gyur steng bltas pa/ /sen mo'i khrag ni med gyur na/ /nyin zhag bcu na yang dag nyal/ /slar yang cha shas
413a3(rgyud): bcu bdun ni/ /gnas pa'i brla yi mtshan ma las/ /nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa bzhi na/ /'chi 'gyur 'dir ni gdon mi za/ /cha shas bco brgyad gnas pa yi/ /byin pa la ni gnas pa'i
413a4(rgyud): rtsa| |de bzhin steng du bltas pa yis/ /nyin zhag nyi ma'i grangs kyis mchi/ /bcu dgu yi ni cha shas gnas/ /chu so de bzhin steng bltas pas/ /de dang mnyam pa'i nyin zhag gis/ /
413a5(rgyud): 'chi 'gyur 'dir ni the tshom med/ /cha shas nyi shu gnas pa yi/ /pho mtshan la ni gnas pa'i rtsa/ /steng du bltas pa mchog dbang phyug /mtshan mas nyin zhag dus kyi ni/ /grangs kyis
413a6(rgyud): 'chi 'gyur the tshom med/ /re'u mig bcu gnyis brtsis pa la/ /bar bar nyi ma bstan pa dag /lo yi rim gyis de sbyangs te/ /bdun cu rtsa gnyis rim pa dang / /sum cu rtsa drug bco
413a7(rgyud): brgyad kyis/ /zla ba la sogs go rim bzhin/ /rim gyis rim gyis 'bri bar bya/ /lhag mar gang zhig gyur pa ni/ /bsdus te 'tsho ba'i dus su ni/ /lha mo chen mo shes bya zhes/ /
413b1(rgyud): mkha' 'gro gun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po dpal rdo rje
413b2(rgyud): mkha' 'gro las/ /rtsa dang mnyam par sbyor ba'i dbugs 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i rim par phye ba ste nyi shu pa'o// //sgo dgu po yi mtshan nyid dang / /rtsa ni gang bar
413b3(rgyud): gnas pa yi/ /yon tan skyon sogs ji ltar blta/ /de rnams bye brag mi 'tshal te/ /ye shes dbang la nyan par 'tshal/ /bde ba chen pos bshad du gsol/ /god du 'pho ba'i sbyor
413b4(rgyud): mtshan nyid/ /bshad kyi lha mo mnyan par gyis/ /sngon du bdag nyid sbyangs byas la/ /phyi nas las ni brtsam par bya/ /gzugs med gnas pa mdog sngo ba'i/ /bde chen zla ba lta bu 'dzag/
413b5(rgyud): slar yang gzugs su gnas pa ste/ /rnam pa kun gyis brgyan pa'o/ /cha shas bzhi dang yang dag ldan/ /kha ni thur du bltas te 'phyang / /go 'phang gnas pa'i gnas nas ni/ /kun da zla 'dra rtag tu
413b6(rgyud): dag / rnam shes ye shes bdud rtsi ni/ /lha mo chen mo 'bab pa'i mchog /rten du gyur pa'i pad+ma gang / /zla ba'i 'od kyis rnam par brgyan/ /de ni cha dang cha yi gzugs/ /gong du gnas pa zhes
413b7(rgyud): byar brjod/ /de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /gnas kyi mtha' ni dag par bya/ /dag nas srid pa 'pho bya yi/ /gzhan du na ni don med 'gyur/ /dgang ba yis ni lus bkang na/ /dug dang rims
414a1(rgyud): kyis tsha ba 'phrog / bum pa can gyis sgo bcings na/ /sgo yi sbu gu dag par 'gyur/ /'thor bas sna tshogs rdul du bya/ /rab tu zhi bas zhi bar 'gyur/ /rnam shes
414a2(rgyud): dbrog pa'i cho ga dang / /gzhan du 'gro ba'ang bshad par bya/ /de nas phyi rol sbyor ba ni/ /mkhas pa yis ni sbyang bar bya/ /gnas gnyis dag ni bsams nas su/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor
414a3(rgyud): bsgom par bya/ /rlung gi dbus su me yis ni/ /yang dang yang du dbye bar bya/ /A li kA lir ldan pa yi/ /sa bon der ni sbyar bar bya/ /rnal 'byor pa yis khyad par du/ /'byung dang
414a4(rgyud): 'jug pas bzlas par bya/ /'byung ba ye shes sa bon gyis/ /bsnun dang ldan par bsam par bya/ /'jug pa snying gi rnam shes la/ /me tog lta bur bsnun par bya/ /rnal 'byor pas ni 'byung
414a5(rgyud): bzlas te/ /bdag nyid las ni phyi rol bya/ /'jug pa 'byung bar 'tsho bya ste/ /de kho na nyid mnyam par bsgom/ /mnyam gzhag dngos po bsgoms na ni/ /'grub 'gyur 'dir ni the tshom
414a6(rgyud): med| |de nas phyi rol lus la ni/ /sgrub pa po yis rnam par sprul/ /nyi ma'i lam nas dang phyung ste/ /lha mo cha shas ldan par bya/ /bsgrub bya'i snying gar zhugs nas ni/ /rlung dang me yis
414a7(rgyud): 'bar ba dag / de yi rnam pa des bzung nas ni/ /lus kyi dkyil 'khor du ni gzhug /bsgrub bya'i rnam shes bsdus nas su/ /'og gi 'khor lor sbyar bar bya/ /ji srid zad par byas bar du/ /
414b1(rgyud): de srid lkugs te gnas par 'gyur/ /'chi ba'i dus la bab gyur na/ /'chi ba'i mtshan ma ston pa dang / /rims la sogs pas ma phog par/ /gong du 'pho ba mchog yin no/ /de nas gzhan lus
414b2(rgyud): la 'jug pa/ /mdor bsdus nas ni bshad par bya/ /seng+ge rnam rol phyag rgya yis/ /rnal 'byor pa yis bcings nas su/ /rtag tu srog dang rtsol bar bya/ /khyod kyis gnas su sbyar nas ni/ /
414b3(rgyud): rang gi lus ni yongs btang ste/ /rim gyis sbyor pas phye nas su/ /cho ga 'di ltar byas pa yis/ /sngags pa gzhan gyi lus la 'jug /sbyor ba'i rim pa de nyid kyis/ /rang gi lus la sbyar bar
414b4(rgyud): 'dod| |'gro dang 'ong ba'i bye brag gis/ /mnyam par bzhag ste gang byed pa/ /dpa' bo'i dbang phyug thams cad dang / /mkha' 'gro ma dang sbyor bas mchod/ /gang gi ring nas thes gyur
414b5(rgyud): pa| |de ni yang dag bshad kyi nyon/ /de bzhin mkhas pas gzhan sems kyi/ /bsam pa rjes su shes par bya/ /sgom dang bzlas pa'i khyad par bgyi/ /sbyor ba'i dam pa skye bar 'gyur/ /gang
414b6(rgyud): gis lam nas bsams na ni/ /'grub 'gyur 'dir ni the tshom med/ /'khor lo gang zhig sngar bstan par/ /zhugs te nyan pa gnyis su ni/ /'jig rten gsum dang 'dres nas ni/ /me stag
414b7(rgyud): bzhin du rnam par 'khor/ /rlung gis bskyod pa'i me yis ni/ /shes rab ldan pas zhugs bsams na/ /zla drug tsam gyis nges par ni/ /ring na gnas pa thos par 'gyur/ /sgom pa'i sbyor
415a1(rgyud): ba 'di yis ni/ /ye shes mig gis mthong gyur pa/ /shin tu ring na gnas pa yang / /sgrub pos skad cig gsal bar mthong / /bstan dang ma bstan gang ci'ang
415a2(rgyud): rung | |de kun nga yis yang dag bshad/ /nyon cig lha mo sgyu ma che/ /dge ba'i sgo nas 'gro ba dang / /gang gis lam nas 'gro ba yis/ /thar pa'i dngos grub rab ster ba/ /mchog dang tha
415a3(rgyud): ma'i bye brag rnams/ /mdor bsdus nas ni bshad par bya/ /lte ba las ni 'dod khams lha/ /thig ler gzugs can mtho ris te/ /steng nas 'gro bar steng gi ni/ /myur du 'gro ba
415a4(rgyud): byed par 'gyur/ /sna nas gnod sbyin gnas su ste/ /rna ba dag ni grub pa'i lha/ /gal te mig las ye shes 'gro/ /mi rnams kyi ni bdag por 'gyur/ /srid pa'i sgo las yi
415a5(rgyud): dwags te/ /de bzhin chu las dud 'gro'o/ /chu min gyis ni dmyal bar ltung / /thar pa'i lam las gzhan du 'gro/ /sngon du bum pa brtsams pa yis/ /sgo rnams thams
415a6(rgyud): cad bcing bar bya/ /rgyal ba lnga yi mchod rten gyi/ /sgo yi bu gar bsgom par bya/ /de la 'og gi sgo ru ni/ /chu yi sa bon dkar po bsam/ /chu dang chu min sgo la ni/ /me yi sa
415a7(rgyud): bon 'bar ba ste/ /de la shin tu mnyam bzhag pas/ /dbugs ni bum pa can du bsgom/ /lus ni rlung gi mdog tu ste/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ /rlung gi mtha' ni rtsa ba
415b1(rgyud): can| |rlung gi sa bon 'bar ba ste/ /thig le sgra dang ldan pa yi/ /rtsa ba'i sa bon drang bar bya/ /'og tu rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyis/ /sgra dang sgra yis 'phul bar byed/ /dus la bab na 'pho bya ste//
415b2(rgyud): dus min lha rnams gsod par 'gyur/ /lha rnams bsad pa tsam gyis ni/ /dmyal bar nges par sreg par 'gyur/ /de bas 'chi tha'i mtshan ma ni/ /mkhas pas 'bad de shes par bya/ /
415b3(rgyud): rnal 'byor pa yis sngar bstan pa'i/ /sngon chen bde ba phun sum tshogs/ /sgrub po rnams kyis smin pa la/ /steng gi rtsa ba bza' bar bya/ /chu dang skya rengs ldan pa dag /g.yon pa'i bdud
415b4(rgyud): rtsir sbyar byas la/ /zos na zhi dang rgyas pa ste/ /dug dang rims kyis tsha ba 'phrog /cho ga'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni/ /rnying dang smin pa 'joms par byed/ /lha mo slar yang bzlog pa yis/ /nam
415b5(rgyud): mkhar 'gro ba brjod par bya/ /rlung dang me yi bye brag gis/ /rkang pa'i 'khor lor sbyar byas te/ /yid kyis rab tu zhir sbyar nas/ /nam mkha' la ni 'gro 'gyur zhing / /mkha' 'gro kun
415b6(rgyud): gyis bskor nas su/ /lha yi lus kyi sa kun tu rtse/ /ji srid zla nyi yod kyi bar/ /de srid nam mkhar gnas par 'gyur/ /slar yang lugs las ldog pa yi/ /kha dog dkar po'i pad+ma bsam//
415b7(rgyud): bsgrub bya'i dbus su sbyar na ni/ /rtag tu ngag gi dngos grub byed/ /rang gi lus dbus bsgom bya ba/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor 'khrug pa ltar/ /rang gi kha nas byung nas su/ /bsgrub bya'i kha ru
416a1(rgyud): thim par bya/ /nyi ma bdun gyis dngos grub tu/ /'gyur te gzhan du yong ma yin/ /rlung gi lam nas bsgrub bya yi/ /lus la thim par gyur pa dang / /de yi
416a2(rgyud): sems ni bzung nas su/ /bdag la gzhug ste me la ni/ /bsams te rlung dang me sbar bas/ /de yi lus ni 'khrug par 'gyur/ /tshigs dgu las ni steng gzhan gyis/ /mod la 'pho bar
416a3(rgyud): shes bya ste/ /nyin re bram ze gsod pa dang / /mtshams med lnga ni byed pa dang / /rku 'phrog 'dod la spyod pa yang / /lam 'di yis ni dag 'gyur te/ /sdig pas gos par mi 'gyur zhing / /
416a4(rgyud): srid pa'i skyon las ring du 'gro/ /ji ltar 'dam las skyes pa yi/ /pad+ma dri med yid 'ong ba/ /de bzhin lus kyi 'dam las ni/ /ye shes sku ni 'dod bzhin 'gro/ /mkha' 'gro
416a5(rgyud): kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po
416a6(rgyud): dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las/ gong du 'pho ba'i bsam gtan dang / seng+ge rnam par rol pa'i phyag rgya'i sbyor ba 'byung ba'i rim par phye ba ste nyi shu gcig pa'o/ /ngag gi phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid ni/ /de nas yang dag bshad par bya/ /g.yas kyi cha ru rnal 'byor pa/ /g.yon du rnal 'byor ma nyid de/ /sor mo khar ni 'jug byed pa/ /mkha' 'gro
416b1(rgyud): ma yi mtshan ma'o/ /g+ho g+hu/ thal mo spyi bor 'jog byed pa/ /'bar byed ma yi mtshan ma'o/ /gu g+hu/ mthe bong 'tshir bar byed pa ni/ /'jib byed ma yi mtshan ma'o/ /mu g+hu/ lag pa rnam par
416b2(rgyud): rdeb pa ni/ /blo ldan 'phrog byed rtags yin no/ /lu g+hu/ sna rtser skyor ma rdeb pa ni/ /thugs bde mi bde 'dri ba yin/ /daMSh+Tu/ sha ba'i mgo ltar ston byed pa/ /rnal 'byor byed pa'i mtshan ma
416b3(rgyud): 'o| |gan+d+ho de/ gang zhig smin ma'i dbus reg pa/ /nga yi snying sdug grogs po'o/ /a li ni da ha/ so yis lce ni 'tshir byed pa/ /'dus nang gtor ma bza' zhes pa'o/ /b+hak+She yo/ /lag pa rtsa
416b4(rgyud): la 'du byed pa/ /khyod kyi khyim du ngas phyin pa'o/ /dwa ri ti/ lag pa snying gar nyed byed na/ /da ni nga yi yid 'ong ba'o/ /ru tsa ba ta ba te/ sna rtser khu tshur 'chang ba ni/ /med do zhes ni ston pa'o/ /shU
416b5(rgyud): n+ya ta/ | lag pa brkyang ste ltor rdeb na/ /phun sum ldan par yod ces pa'o/ /tri ka sa ha/ lte ba ru ni nyed byed na/ /kha zas za bar 'dod pa'o/ /tsar+N+DA li ka /mdzub mo mdun du ston byed na/ /zhe
416b6(rgyud): nag gtum la drag pa'o/ /ni la dan+ta pa tra/ smin ma la ni reg byed na/ /'dir 'dod pa ni da lta ston/ /a naM ga yu ta/ lce ni 'dril bar byed pa dag /da ltar 'chi zhes bya ba'o/ /dur ga ti/

422b7(rgyud): dpo dang khrums stod gnyis po ni/ /khyu mchog ces ni bshad pa ste/ /stobs 'dod pas ni shes par bya/ /me bzhi dang ni sa ri gnyis/ /ma her shes bya stobs kyi mchog /tha skar dang ni
423a1(rgyud): khrums smad gnyis/ /rta yi rigs zhes bya bar grags/ /chu stod dang ni gro zhun gnyis/ /spre'u'i rigs su brjod pa yin/ /bra nye dang ni nam gru gnyis/ /glang
423a2(rgyud): po'i rigs kyis byin brlabs pa'o/ /mon gru dang ni mon gre dag /mi yi rigs su yang dag gsungs/ /stobs chen pha rol gnon pa ru/ /lha mo nges ni bden par bshad/ /chu smad
423a3(rgyud): dang ni byi bzhin dag / ne'u le'u rigs su grags pa yin/ /mang po nyid kyis ci zhig bya/ /mdor bsdus pa ni bshad kyi nyon/ /rang gi skye ba'i skar ma ni/ /bya ba kun la dpyad mi dgos/ /
423a4(rgyud): skar ma mi yi srog yin te/ /gzhan du ngas ni ma bshad do/ /skar ma'i cha ni bzlog pa dang / /bzung na nges par 'chi bar 'gyur/ /lug dang srang dang karka Ta/ /chu srin dag ni g.yo bar
423a5(rgyud): brjod| |sdig pa bum pa seng+ge dang / /khyu mchog dag ni brtan pa ste/ /nya dang gnyis sbyor gzhu dang ni/ /bu mo rnams ni 'dren ma'o/ /lha yi bla ma nyi ma dang / /mig dmar skyes pa'i gzugs
423a6(rgyud): yin te| |pa ba sangs dang sgra gcan dang / /zla ba mo yi gzugs yin no/ /gza' lag dang ni spen pa gnyis/ /ma ning nyid du bstan pa ste/ /nam mkha'i 'khor lor gnas pa'i
423a7(rgyud): gza'| |mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje sems dang bde bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /rgyud kyi rgyal
423b1(rgyud): chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las/ /skar ma rnams kyi stobs la dbang ba'i cho ga'i rim par phye ba ste nyi shu rtsa bdun pa'o// //tshes dang skar ma gza' 'chad ba/ /rab tu
423b2(rgyud): bshad kyi lha mo nyon/ /ro hi ta yi tshes la ni/ /smin drug dang ni mig dmar la/ /mgron po lam du 'jug par bzang / /tshes de rnyed pa 'thob 'gyur ba'o/ /ma ka ra yi nyi ma la/ /mchu dang
423b3(rgyud): mig dmar ldan pa la/ /gzer dang 'dzoms sogs 'byung bas na/ /tshes de yongs su spang bar bya/ /swa pa na yi nyi ma la/ /lag dang spen par ldan pa'i tshe/ /nag po nyid du shes bya
423b4(rgyud): bas| |tshes de'ang yongs su spang bar bya/ /ro hi ta yi nyi ma la/ /mchu dang gza' lag ldan pa la/ /bkra shis dang ni bzang por byed/ /raN+Da yi ni nyi ma la/ /lag dang gza'
423b5(rgyud): lag bcas pa dag / kun tu 'dzoms par bshad pas na/ /mchog gi sbyor bas de yang spang / /sa yi dbang phyug tshes la ni/ /bra nye dang ni gza' lag ldan/ /de yang nag po'i
423b6(rgyud): dus shes bya/ /b+ha dra yi ni tshes dag la/ /gre dang lha yi bla mar ldan/ /tshes de rnyed pa byed pas na/ /sbyor ba po yis bsten bar bya/ /mi ki ra yi tshes la ni/ /mon gru lha yi bla ma dang / /
423b7(rgyud): gal ten ni 'dzoms gyur na/ /'bru dang nor rnams zad byed par/ /gdon mi za bar bshad pa yin/ /tshes ni bcu gsum dag la ni/ /skad dang lha yi bla ma dag /gal te 'dzoms na
424a1(rgyud): nag po bas/ /nyes pa kun gyis 'jigs par 'gyur/ /br-i Sha b+ha yi tshes la ni/ /stobs ldan gyi ni blon po dang / /gal te khrums stod 'dzoms na ni/ /tshes de
424a2(rgyud): rgyas pa ster 'gyur zhing / /dge ba'i grogs rnams thams cad byed/ /br-i d+d+hi ka yi nyi ma la/ /chu stod dang ni pa ba sangs/ /gal te 'dzoms na nad kyis ni/ /gdungs shing 'joms
424a3(rgyud): par the tshom med/ /'byung po yi ni nyi ma la/ /bra nye dang ni ba bsangs/ /'dzoms na gshin rje'i mche ba ste/ /tshes de yongs su spang bar bya/ /kurma yi ni nyi ma la/ /smin drug
424a4(rgyud): dang ni spen pa ru/ /gal te 'dzoms par 'gyur na ni/ /rnyed dang grags pa la sogs dang / /bsod nams kun gyi 'bras bu 'thob/ /bya ku li yi nyi ma ni/ /skag dang spen par ci
424a5(rgyud): zhig ltar/ /'dzoms na gdung bar byed pas na/ /nyi ma de la'ang 'gro ba spang / /zla ba nya yi nyi ma la/ /mchu dang spen par ldan gyur na/ /'chi ba'i dus la bab pas na/ /tshes de shin tu
424a6(rgyud): spang bar bya/ /me yi mtshams su mi kir bri/ /gshin rje du ni raN+Da ste/ /srin po ru ni karma bri/ /chu yi phyogs su khyu mchog ste/ /'jigs byed du ni bya ku la/ /gter gyi phyogs su swa pa na/ /
424a7(rgyud): mig gsum phyogs su bzang po bri/ /shar gyi phyogs su'ang khyu mchog go /zla ba nyi ma'i bye brag gis/ /de rnams su ni rgyu bar bshad/ /b+ha dra nas ni raN+Dar ste/ /bya ku li dang bri Sha b+ha/ /
424b1(rgyud): 'di dag nyi ma rgyu bar ni/ /rigs mchog ma ni khyod la bshad/ /khyu mchog dang ni mi ki ra/ /swa pa na dang kurma ni/ /zla ba'i rgyu bar bshad pa ste/ /rim pa de ltar brjod pa yin/ /nya la me mtshams
424b2(rgyud): gnas pa ste/ /stong la rlung gi phyogs su gnas/ /de ltar de dag dbus su ni/ /gnas pa de dag gdung bar 'gyur/ /zla ba nyi ma las byung ba'i/ /ri mo mnyam du lta bas na/ /des na shes
424b3(rgyud): rab can gyis spang / /zhi dang sdig par lta bas na/ /lta ba'i chad pa 'byung pa ste/ /myur du gsod par byed pa yin/ /sgra gcan gyis ni rgyu ba yi/ /dus ni mdo ru bsdus pa yin/ /yar ngo mar
424b4(rgyud): ngo'i bye brag gis/ /blo ldan 'bad de shes par bya/ /mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan rdo rje
424b5(rgyud): can gyis gsungs/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las/ /tshes grangs dang skar ma'i nges pa rim par phye ba ste nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa'o// //nyon cig
424b6(rgyud): lha mo sgyu ma che/ /sgyu ma kun gyis rnam rol pa/ /lus can kun gyi rnam shes te/ /lus las 'das shing dri ma med/ /lhun po dang ni ti se dang / /de bzhin du ni 'bigs byed sogs/ /shar
424b7(rgyud): gyi lus 'phags ba lang spyod/ /byang gi sgra mi snyan dang ni/ /dzam bu'i gling dang bcas pa dang / /lan tshwa can dang 'o ma yi/ /rgya mtsho la sogs chu tshogs dang / /'og dang steng du gang gyur pa/ /khams
425a1(rgyud): gsum ma lus zad par bya/ /gzugs la sogs pa'i phung po dang / /skye mched khams rnams zad par bya/ /'byung po la sogs phyogs bcu yi/ /'jig
425a2(rgyud): rten khams kun zad bsams te/ /dngos dang dngos med 'dres par ni/ /bdag nyid kyang ni bsgom par bya/ /gzugs la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid rnams/ /mnyam nyid stong pa nyid
425a3(rgyud): du blta| |thams cad nam mkhar thim nas ni/ /ba lang rmig par grong khyer bsgom/ /rnal 'byor can gyis cho ga bzhin/ /sems ni me mar lta bur bsgom/ /de dbus yid kyis bltas
425a4(rgyud): nas ni| |der ni mtshan ma brtag par bya/ /me mar lta bus zhi bar gyur/ /dmar pos brgyan na rgyas pa ste/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ltar snang ni/ /chags pa la sogs 'grub par 'gyur/ /
425a5(rgyud): tha mar du ba 'am nag mthong na/ /mngon spyod du ni grags pa yin/ /rlung gi mdog ltar rab 'khrugs na/ /de ma thag tu bskrad par 'gyur/ /'od zer dkar po long long pos/ /blo ldan
425a6(rgyud): sngags kyi dngos grub ni/ /rnal 'byor pa yis 'grub ces bya/ /bkra shis kyi ni lam ston yin/ /chog 'dis ni gzhan gsal dang / gzhan gyi gzugs sogs dbu ma rnams/ /
425a7(rgyud): de 'og rnal 'byor bskyed par bya/ /ye shes la sogs sems kyis ni/ /gang zhig stong nyid shes byas na/ /sems ni myur du thar par 'gyur/ /ye shes kyis ni shes bya brtag /shes
425b1(rgyud): byas 'gro ba brtag par bya/ /pha dang ma ni bsad byas shing / /bram ze gtsang ma gnyis bzung nas/ /rgyal po yul 'khor bcas bcom na/ /mi de dag par 'gyur zhes bya/ /ye shes rang bzhin
425b2(rgyud): kun dang sbyor/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las/
425b3(rgyud): ye shes 'byung ba'i rim par phye ba ste nyi shu rtsa dgu pa'o// //ye shes khyad par gang gis ni/ /ye shes thun mong byin brlabs pa/ /bye brag can ni ji lta bu/ /lha las rol
425b4(rgyud): mo mnyan par 'tshal/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /lci bar gyur pa sum cu pos/ /dge dang sdig pa'i 'bras 'byung ba/ /nga rgyal gyis ni byin brlabs pa/ /sems kyis byas

426b1(rgyud): snyam sbyor ba'i/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las/ /rdo rje sems

427a7(rgyud): yan lag brgyad/ /sa la ji bzhin dgod par bya/ /phyag na pad+ma byams pa dang / /mkha' snying kun tu bzang po dang / gnod sbyin bdag dang 'jam pa'i dpal//

429a1(rgyud): rags ldan/ /de bzhin du ni shes rab dang / /bdud rtsi yi ni bum par ldan/ /mtshan nyid thams cad yongs su rdzogs/ /dra ba dra phyed dpyang

429a7(rgyud): gnyis dbus su/ /pad+ma la ni pad phreng gnyis/ /rin chen la ni rin po che/ /de bzhin ska rags ldan par bya/ /don yod grub pa zhes bya la/ /ska rags gnyis
429b1(rgyud): dbus ral gris brgyan/ /kun la shes rab gdong ldan pas/ dpa' bo kun gyis rgyal bar 'gyur/ /kun la'ang 'khar ba'am yang na ni/ /lcags gsum las
429b2(rgyud): byung dril bu ste/ /cha gsum dang ni ldan par bya/ /rdo rje'i rigs la ba glang gdong / /ska rags rdo rje'i phreng las bskor/ /bum pa'i steng du gnas pa yi/ /kha khyer cung
429b3(rgyud): zad gru bzhir byed/ /pa glang gdong ni myur ba ru/ /nor dang 'bru rnams 'phel bar byed/ /nad med stobs ni rtags ster zhing / /sdug bsngal thams cad 'phrog par byed/ /

429b6(rgyud): mo 'di ni dril bu yi/ /sgrub thabs rgya cher bstan pa ste/ /thun mong gi ni rgyud kun las/ /dpa' bo rnams kyis bsngags pa yin/ /mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /rdo rje

436a5(rgyud): pa'o|| ||mtshon cha kun gyi mtshan nyid ni/ /rab tu bshad kyi lha mo nyon/ /'khrul 'khor gyis 'phen mi 'phen dang / /de bzhin lag pas
436a6(rgyud): 'phen pa dang / /'phangs nas slar ni gzung pa dang / /lag pas 'gyed dang rnam pa lnga/ /dbyibs dang bde blag sbyor ba dang / /ltong rgyud sbyor dang 'dren dang myur/ /
436a7(rgyud): 'gengs dang 'phen dang gsal ba 'o/ /grims pa nyid dang sran 'dzugs dang / /mnyen zhing yan lag brtan pa dang / /rgya chen 'gongs shing rnam par dag /lus
436b1(rgyud): gyi phyag rgya bde blag can/ /'di yis lus la brgyan nas ni/ /rims dang dug dang dbyig dug dang / /mkha' 'gros gtses dang gdon rnams kyis/ /nam yang tshugs
436b2(rgyud): par mi 'gyur ro/ /rang gi snying gar 'dren tshul du/ /bde blag can gyis gzhu bzung nas/ /g.yas su rab tu bskor byed cing / /mngal 'phangs na ni grub par 'gyur/ /shar
436b3(rgyud): phyogs legs par bsrangs nas ni/ /nub phyogs cung zad bkug nas su/ /gzhu rgyud dal bus drangs na ni/ /'gro ba thams cad 'gugs par 'gyur/ /thams cad
436b4(rgyud): dgug pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /rna drung bar du zlum por ni/ /ci rigs par ni legs par bzung / /yi ge oM gyis khar drangs te/ /ji srid yi ge a brjod pa/ /de srid bar du gzung
436b5(rgyud): bar bya| |'dzin pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /ci rigs par ni drangs nas su/ /cho ga bzhin du bzung nas su/ /der ni cung zad dbye bar bya/ /'gengs pa thams cad grub par 'gyur/ /
436b6(rgyud): 'gengs pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /chad pas 'ben ni bsgribs nas su/ /mig ni cung zad gdangs te blta/ /lta ba chang ba la gtad de/ /myur du 'phangs na 'grub pa'i mchog/
436b7(rgyud): mda' gzhus rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /gru bzhi pa dang rnon po dang / /de bzhin kun nas zlum po ste/ /g.yas phyogs nas ni bskor nas su/ /steng dang de bzhin 'og tu
437a1(rgyud): ni| |rim gyis gnon cing drag tu gnon/ /'bigs pa bcu yi rgya mchog gis/ /khams gsum rgyal srid chen po la/ /bde bar rgyal
437a2(rgyud): zhing longs spyod 'gyur/ /dpal khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya'i sbyor ba bla na med pa'o/ /mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde
437a3(rgyud): ba'i mchog / rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las/ mtshon cha thams
437a4(rgyud): cad kyi brda'i ye shes kyi cho ga'i rim par phye ba ste sum cu rtsa bdun pa'o/ / //pho nya gdul ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs/ /de nas yang dag bshad par bya//
437a5(rgyud): tha mal sngags kyi lus can dang / /zhing skyes ma ni gang yang rung / /sgrub pos de dag thams cad la/ /phan pa'i mchog gis bde ba sgrub/ /'di dag gnas pa longs
437a6(rgyud): spyod kyi/ /bsnyen bkur gyis ni bsten mi bya/ /skal bzang phyug cing sra ba ste/ /rang gi bkra shis rigs spyod dang / /ri mo can ni sems g.yo zhing / /'o ma 'dzin
437a7(rgyud): sbom pad+ma can/ /lte ba dung 'dra dung can ma/ /de dag rim pa bzhin du brjod/ /'byung po'i shing gi rtsa ba 'bad pas khar bcug na ji srid du bu mo'i bde ba rnyed pa de
437b1(rgyud): srid kyi bar du sngags pas 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /gan du sha dang la k+Sha na'i sman btags te til mar du btsos la rkang pa la bskus na yang 'dod pa la spyod pa rnams
437b2(rgyud): kyis bsngags so/ /a shwat+tha'i shing kan da dang / pa tha dang / pu shel rtsi rnams cha bsnyams te shing arga'i 'o ma dang sbyar la/ des pho mtshan dril phyis byas na/ /gdon
437b3(rgyud): mi za bar 'phel bar 'gyur te/ de'i 'og tu myur du chu dron gyis bkrus na ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin 'gyur ro/ /pad+ma dkar po'i ge sar sbrang rtsi dang lhan cig btags te lte
437b4(rgyud): bar bskus na/ bud med sra ba rnams kyang khu ba 'dzag par 'gyur ro/ /til dkar po dang / na ga ge sar dang / dpa' bo tshig 'greng gi rtsa ba rnams btags te sbrang
437b5(rgyud): rtsi dang ma he'i mar dang lhan cig tu sbyar te lte bar bskus na/ pho mtshan mkhrang zhing bud med chags pa che ba rnams yid 'phrog par 'gyur zhing / /bong bu ltar ni 'dod
437b6(rgyud): spyod pas/ /bde don gnyer la bde ster ba/ /'dul ba don yod rgyud las te/ /ngas ni 'dzin pa bshad pa yin/ /ling+gas bud med bsgrub bya zhing / /b+ha gas skyes pa
437b7(rgyud): bsgrub par bya/ /ling+ga don gnyer mtshan ma zhes bshad de/ /b+ha ga la ni spel bar bya/ /phyag rgya phyag rgyar sbyor ba yin/ /rnam par rol pas ling+ga zhes/ /bya ba ru ni bstan
438a1(rgyud): pa ste| |rnam par 'byed pas b+ha ga yin/ /mi bstan gsal bar bstan pa ste/ /nye bar bstan pa'i rang bzhin nyid/ /a yig ba yi yaM
438a2(rgyud): ge las| |b+ha ga ling+ga bskyed nas ni/ /bung ba la sogs rim ji bzhin/ /mkha' 'gro ma kun bsgrub par bya/ /mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /rdo rje
438a3(rgyud): mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog / rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las/

438a5(rgyud): ces gsol to/ /sems can bsod nams med pa dang / /sngags rnams rten par mi nus pa/ /de rnams dngos grub ji ltar 'thob/ /stobs med rnams ni stobs
438a6(rgyud): bskyed cing / /sngags dang bral yang srung 'gyur ba/ /mdor bsdus nas ni bshad du gsol/ /sgyu ma kun tu rnam 'phrul ba/ /nyon cig lha mo sgyu ma che/ /sems

438b1(rgyud): nas sa bon bsgrub par bya/ /sems can rnams ni chags pa dang / /de bzhin bya ba sna tshogs byed/ /sa bon la sogs gzugs pa yi/ /las rnams sna tshogs
438b2(rgyud): 'byung ba'o/ /lha mos gsol pa/ ji lta bu'i sa bon la sogs pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ e ran+Da dang gser shing la sogs
438b3(rgyud): pa'i shing gi sa bon te/ de la sogs pa yongs su smin pa rnams cho ga bzhin bsgrub par bya'o/ /mar ngo'i 'byung po'i nyi ma la/ /zla mtshan tshon dang dbang po bsgo//

438b7(rgyud): cad grims par ni/ /g.yon phyogs su ni bsgran nas su/ /mgrin pa'am spyi bor bzung byas na/ /mtshon cha lnga ni zlog par byed/ /gdul ba'i bu mo mdog sngon gyi/ /pad+ma
439a1(rgyud): las ni skyes pa dang / /bdud rtsi lnga yis bsgos nas su/ /nyi tshan dag la bskam par bya/ /khyi nag po yi thod pa ni/ /dur khrod sa
439a2(rgyud): yis bkang ba ru/ /mar ngo'i tshes brgyad bcu bzhi la/ /pha mas kyi ni nags su gzugs/ /de ni 'bad de blangs nas su/ /dur khrod dang ni bla ma dang / /he ru ka
439a3(rgyud): dpal mchod byas la/ /grub pa'i sa bon bzung byas te/ /thod pa ru ni bzhag pa la/ /cho ga bzhin du mngon bsngags te/ /mgul pa bcings na sbed par

439a6(rgyud): ste| |bzhi mdo lam gyi dbus sam ni/ /chu bo yi ni 'gram dag tu/ /sgrub po shin tu mnyam bzhag pas/ /thod par dgong mo'i dus su gzhag /gtor ma sbyin zhing

439b1(rgyud): spyod par ldan pa yis/ /cho ga bzhin du bskyed byas na/ /sha za la sogs co mi 'dri/ /sa bon smin pa bzung nas ni/ /mkhas pas sngon bzhin mchod byas nas/ /grub
439b2(rgyud): pa'i rdzas kyi phud dag ni/ /khyad par du ni bla mar dbul/ /sgrub pos de ni khar bcug na/ /sna tshogs pa yi gzugs su snang / /lha dang sbyin bdag gnod sbyin sogs//

439b4(rgyud): bya zhing / /shing bskyed cho ga rgyas pa las/ /'byung bzhin srung ba la sogs bya/ /gzhan du me tog 'bras bu sogs/ /drag po'i gdon gyis gtses pas ni/ /

439b6(rgyud): bya| |gang dang gang gi khrag gis ni/ /yang dang yang du 'bras bu bsgo/ /de yi khrag gis bsgos pa yi/ /sha la sogs pa mtshon bya zhing / /de yi thal bas bskyed
439b7(rgyud): par bya/ /de yi thod par gzugs pa dang / /de yi sha khrag zhag gis ni/ /yang dang yang du bcu par bya/ /de yi sha sogs bdug pa dang / /byug pa'ang yang dang yang

440a4(rgyud): ni zin dus su/ /paN+Di rA ga zhes bya ba dang / /dpa' bo gcig pa stobs po che/ /snga dro nyi ma shar dus su/ /byang phyogs rtsa ba brkos nas ni/ /mnyam par bzhag pas

440a7(rgyud): srid bar du bza' bar bya/ /ji srid de ni ma zhu'i bar/ /rdo rje 'dzin 'dra'i lus su 'gyur/ /de'i lus mtshon cha phog pa yang / /chu yi thigs pa ltar mi gnod/ /

443a1(rgyud): cho ga mthong ba yis/ /mtshon cha thams cad 'ching 'gyur te/ /'di ni ba lang lhas su sgrub/ /su ra gta dang seng ldeng dang / /nim pa
443a2(rgyud): dang ni a rka'ang rung / /skar ma rgyal dang nyi ma la/ /shing bu de gnyis bzung nas ni/ /myos par byed pa'i rig pa che/ /rig pa kun gyi gtso mo ste/ /lan brgya ru
