443a6(rgyud): ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las/ /stobs bskyed pa'i cho ga'i rim par phye ba ste sum cu rtsa dgu pa'o// //gang gis sgrub pa po 'grub pa'i/ /de nas sbyor ba gzhan bshad bya/ /ras ster gyi ni sa bon dag /snye ma'i rtser gnas blang bar bya/ /sngon bzhin cho ga'i sbyor ba
443b1(rgyud): yis| |'byung ba'i nyi ma gza' bzang la/ /gau rI la sogs mkha' 'gro mar/ /bcas pa'i he ru ka mgon mchod/ /bud med kyi ni me tog gis/ /yang dang yang du
443b2(rgyud): bsgo bar bya/ /bsgegs pa 'am ni mtshon gyis bsad/ /spyang ki la sogs ma zos pa'i/ /bud med thod pa mdzes pa ru/ /cho ga de yis bskyed par bya/ /de yang
443b3(rgyud): rnga mo dag gi ni/ /'khrul 'khor la ni bskyon nas su/ /de yi rtse mo blang bar bya/ /sngags pas mchod pa byas nas ni/ /bu mor bsgoms shing de bskol ba'i/ /chu ni
443b4(rgyud): 'bad dang bcas te gtor/ /bud med ro bsregs sa dang ni/ /thal bar bcas pas de bkang la/ /ras ster gyi ni sa bon nyid/ /thod pa der ni bskyed par bya/ /bgegs
443b5(rgyud): dgra dang ni gshin gshed kyi/ /sngags ni mngon par bzlas pa yis/ /mchod dang gtor ma phul nas ni/ /ci rigs su ni bsrung bar bya/ /zhi ba'i tshigs bcad sngags kyis
443b6(rgyud): ni| |brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas pa'i chus/ /der ni bcu ste bskyed par bya/ /gzhan du yi dwags 'tshe ba 'byung / /'bu la sogs pa srung ba dang / /shing bskyed rig byed
443b7(rgyud): bzhin du bya/ /de ni 'bad de smin pa yi/ /ras bla dag ni bzung nas su/ /gzhon nu ma yi khrag gis ni/ /bskos la sngar gyi bu mo yis/ /skra dang bcas pa bu mos
444a1(rgyud): bkal/ /skud pa de yis bcings gyur na/ /de ma thag tu skyes bu ni/ /'dod chags gdungs pa'i bud med 'gyur/ /dkrol na slar yang rnal
444a2(rgyud): mar 'gyur/ /bsgegs pa'i ro yis khrag dang ni/ /zhag gis yungs kar yang yang bsgo/ /gsang ba yi ni zhing sa ru/ /tshes brgyad skar ma rgyal la ni/ /lam dang
444a3(rgyud): rigs mchog thod pa ni/ /ro bsregs sa bkang ro dang bcas/ /nyi ma shis pa dag la gzugs/ /de ni shin tu smin pa blang / /ci rigs 'khrul 'khor btsir ba'i
444a4(rgyud): mar| |bskrad pa la sogs bya ba kun/ /blo ldan ji ltar 'dod bzhin byed/ /sa mtha' lnga yang yang dag ldan/ /rlung gi sa bon las byung ba/ /de yi mod la bskrad
444a5(rgyud): 'gyur te/ /bsgrub bya de ni slar mi ldog /bsgegs nas bsad pa'i skyes bu'i ro/ /cho ga'i rim bzhin mchod byas la/ /sngar ni ji ltar bstan pa bzhin/ mar des yan
444a6(rgyud): lag kun tu byug / he ru ka yi spyod pa yis/ /sngags ni zlos shing kun tu gnas/ /sbyor chen des ni bgegs bskrad bya/ /sngags pa chen pos de dus su/ /bgegs
444a7(rgyud): ni rnam pa sna tshogs pa/ /ro yi lus las byung mthong ste/ /de nas der ni de dus su/ /grub pa'i rdzas kyi bar chad byed/ /g.yog dang bcas pa'i sgrub pa pos/ /de tshe
444b1(rgyud): phyag rgya bcing bya ste/ /skye gnas phyag rgya dpral ba yi/ /steng du bcings la bstan bya zhing / /drag po yi ni gzugs kyis su/ /dba' bo'i dam tshig ci rigs bstan/ /sha dang
444b2(rgyud): khrag tu bcas pa yi/ /gtor ma yi dwags rnams la spyin/ /de yi lus las 'jags pa'i mar/ /blangs te bsku ba la sogs blugs/ /de yis lus la byugs tsam
444b3(rgyud): gyis| |nam mkhar rgyu ba 'grub par 'gyur/ /gzhan yang ral gri mig sman dang / /rtsi la sogs pa rab tu 'grub/ /khrag dang mi yi zhag gis ni/ /yungs kar la ni bsgos
444b4(rgyud): nas su| |mi ro yi ni khar bcug la/ /srung pa la sogs 'bad de bya/ /de nas snga ma bzhin bskyed pa'i/ /yungs kar gang la bsnun pa yi/ /bsgrub bya de ni rims nad kyis/ /
444b5(rgyud): 'dzin te de ma thag tu 'chi/ /so bya yi ni khrag dang ni/ /zhag gis snu ma ster bsgo byas la/ /de yi thod par ro bsregs pas/ /bkang ba ru ni bskyed par bya/ /mchod dang
444b6(rgyud): gtor ma la sogs pa/ /sngar bstan bzhin du ci rigs bya/ /smin pa'i 'bras bu khar bcug na/ /skyes bu bya yi gzugs su 'gyur/ /de ltar sa bon gzhan dag kyang / /
444b7(rgyud): dog pa la gnas 'bras bu gzung / /de dang 'dra ba'i gzugs 'gyur te/ /kha las bton na sngon bzhin 'gyur/ /bya rnams kyi ni tshe dang mtshungs/ /glang po'i gzugs sogs
445a1(rgyud): de bzhin bya/ /bi di ri yis bon ni/ /mar ngo skar ma rgyal dang ni/ /gza' ni nyi ma dag la gzung / /ma tu lung ga yar ngo la/ mi ro'i zhag/
445a2(rgyud): gis byugs nas su/ /zla ba gzas ni zin pa'i tshe/ /de yi yan lag mchog tu gzugs/ /zin pa de yi gzugs su 'gyur/ /de yi rus pa rkang dang ni/ /sha la
445a3(rgyud): sogs pa bskyed par bya/ /de yi pags pa rus pa yi/ /phyag rgyas yan lag brgyan byas la/ /blo dang ldan pas sngar bstan bzhin/ /mchod sogs byas te thal
445a4(rgyud): pa gtong / /sngags dang bcas pa'i chu yis ni/ /mkhas pa yis ni rtag tu bcug /bgegs mthar byed dang gshin gshed kyi/ /sngags ni sngags pas rtag tu
445a5(rgyud): bzla| |sha za la ni gtor ma sbyin/ /gzhan du na ni bton te khyer/ /sa bon de ni smin pa gzung / /lcug ma gsum gyis dkris nas su/ /khar bcug na ni sped 'gyur
445a6(rgyud): te| |nyi ma zla ba sogs pas kyang / /'jig rten gsum 'dir mthong mi 'gyur/ /ma du lung ga gcig pu ni/ /khar bcug ma du lung gar 'gyur/ /bton na slar yang
445a7(rgyud): snang 'gyur te/ /'bras skyed thun mong cho ga'o/ /de nas sngags kyi chog bshad/ /spyan ba'i sngags kyis gzugs par bya/ /mA ma kI yi sngags kyis bcu/ /sgrol ma'i
445b1(rgyud): sngags kyis bskyed par bya/ /de bzhin gos dkar mos ni srung / /'di dag sa la sogs pa ste/ /thams cad 'dzin cing gso ba yin/ /des na 'bad pa thams cad kyis/ /spyan
445b2(rgyud): la sogs pas bsrung bar bya/ /de nas dgong mo'i dus su ni/ /ku ba khan de'i sa bon dag /mi yi zhag sogs kyis byugs la/ /bzhi mdo'i sas bkang thod par bskyed/
445b3(rgyud): de yi dpral bar thig le bya/ /bza' dang bca' sogs rnam pa lnga/ /mthong ba tsam gyis kha bar 'gyur/ /de nas thig le phyis na ni/ /de yi mod la rnal mar 'gyur/ /'ol
445b4(rgyud): ma se yi sa bon ni/ /bram ze yi ni thod pa ru/ /skar ma rgyal la sngags pas bskyed/ /de nas phyung ste slar yang ni/ /tha mal skyed bu'i thod par bskyed/ /sa bon de ni 'grub
445b5(rgyud): gyur na/ /kha ru bcug pas de gzugs 'gyur/ /skyes pa bud med ma ning sogs/ /bya ba'i cho ga bzhin du 'gyur/ /kha las gton na slar yang ni/ /tha mal gzugs
445b6(rgyud): 'gyur the tshom med/ /sbyor ba 'di ni grub pa ste/ /gzhan dag tu ni nga mi smra/ /sngags pas bung ba'i rgyal po'i sman/ /gsal shing bsad pa'i thod par bskyed/ /zhag dang
445b7(rgyud): khrag gis gtor bar bya/ /de yi rtsa ba blangs nas su/ /srin lag gi ni khrag dang ni/ /zhag tu bcas pa bsre bar bya/ /spyi bor bzhag na rgyal bar 'gyur/ /lha la sogs
446a1(rgyud): pa dbang du byed/ /ba lang rna ba'i lcug ma ni/ /rnyed nas de yis bon ni/ /smin par bzung ste khar bcug nas/ /g.yul du zhugs na rgyal
446a2(rgyud): bar 'gyur/ /b+hing gi rA dza bzung nas su/ /shan pa'i bu mo sngon mo yi/ /khrag gis zla ba mar ngo la/ /yang yang byugs te sbyar bar bya/ /ba lang rna ba'i lcag dang
446a3(rgyud): ni| |skyes pa'i thod par bskyed dang bcas/ /'bras bu chen po ster bar 'gyur/ /de la sogs pa'i rtsa ba dang / /'bras bu tshul bzhin bskyed pa yis/ /bgegs
446a4(rgyud): rnams thams cad brlag byed par/ /sangs rgyas nges pa'i rgyud las gsungs/ /bsgrub par mi bya ba dang ni/ /'grub par mi 'gyur ci yang med/ /man ngag
446a5(rgyud): dag ni ma gtogs par/ /dngos grub snang bar mi 'gyur ro/ /ko ka na ta'i 'bras bu ni/ /sna chen gyi ni thod par bskyed/ /dur khyod skyes pa'i b+hing gi ni/ /thod
446a6(rgyud): par bskyed pa'i rtsa dang bcas/ /yar ngo mar ngo'i bcu bzhi la/ /bdud rtsi lnga dang lhan cig btab/ /ril bu mdzes pa byas nas ni/ /grib ma la ni bskam par
446a7(rgyud): bya| |de yis thig le byas nas ni/ /'gro kun bran bzhin dbang du 'gyur/ /aM ba'i shing gi rus pa ni/ /mar khu chen pos byugs pa dang / /de bzhin ba yi rnam
446b1(rgyud): lngas byug / lag bar khu ba byugs nas su/ /'bras de gang la byin pa ni/ /de dbang 'gyur te gzhan du min/ /bal po se'u'i 'bras bu ni/ /khrag gis byugs te bud med kyi/ /
446b2(rgyud): thod par btsugs pa smin pa yi/ /'bras bu de ni mi dbang la/ /rgyal la byin na rtag dbang 'gyur/ /sku ba khan de'i sa bon ni/ /nim pa la sogs
446b3(rgyud): 'bras bus byug / ro bsregs sa dang ldan pa yis/ /chags can kham phor sa bon bskyed/ /shin tu mnyam par bzhag ste bsrung / /mar ngo yi ni nyi ma la/ /nyin
446b4(rgyud): phyed nyi ma tsha dus sgrub/ /de ni blugs pa tsam gyis su/ /chang sogs brlag 'gyur the tshom med/ /de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /yungs kar smin pa brgya dang ni/ /rtsa
446b5(rgyud): brgyad blangs nas zhag gis ni/ /bsgos te legs par thum por bya/ /bud med ro yi lto bar gzhug /nyin bdun bzhag ste phyung nas su/ /de yi mchin par bcas
446b6(rgyud): pa'i sas/ /de yi thod pa bkang bar bskyed/ /gtor ma dang ni srung ba dang / /bdug pa dang ni chus bcu sogs/ /shin tu 'bad dang bcas pa yis/ /las rnams
446b7(rgyud): thams cad sngon bzhin bya/ /ji srid smin gyi bar du bskyed/ /de nas sngar bzhin 'bad pas blang / /bud med gyi ni khrag gis byug /'dab ma dang ni sa bon sogs/ /de
447a1(rgyud): yi yan lag ci yang rung / /bud med gang dang gang bsnun pa/ /de ni phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur/ /'ol se'i sa bon 'bad de gzung / /
447a2(rgyud): dmar ser thod par bskyed par bya/ /de yi lcug ma bzung nas su/ /blo dang ldan pas sgo nga bya/ /de yi nang du chang blugs na/ /snod der gnas pa'i rdzas rnams
447a3(rgyud): ni| |ji srid ma zad bar du ni/ /de na gnas pa'ang zad mi 'gyur/ /chu 'gram sa dang rdza mkhan sa/ /de bzhin thod par chags pa'i sa/ /grog mkhar gyi ni sa dag
447a4(rgyud): dang / /mtshan ma gcig pa'i sa rnams ni/ /bskyed pa kun la shin tu bsngags/ /gci ba'i shul gyi sa bzung la/ /sngags kyis mngon par byin gyis brlab/ /
447a5(rgyud): bong bu'i gcin dang bcas pa las/ /mkhas pas mi yi gzugs brnyan bya/ /gser shing sngar bzhin spyad byas la/ /sngags pas de yi khar bskyed bya/ /de yi
447a6(rgyud): yan lag lnga bzung ste/ /ril bu rag ni mdzes par bya/ /las rnams thams cad byed 'gyur te/ /khyad par du ni dbang du byed/ /yungs kar la sogs 'bras
447a7(rgyud): bu ni/ /glang po che yi sha dag dang / khrag dang rus pa'i zhag la sogs/ /de yi thal ba sogs pas byug /de yi thod par bskyed pa dag /de yi kha ru bcug tsam
447b1(rgyud): gyis| |glang po che yi gzugs su 'gyur/ /'di ni thun mong cho ga ste/ /de bzhin rta dang ma he sogs/ /de bzhin stag dang ri bong sogs/ /cho ga de bzhin bskyed pa yis/
447b2(rgyud): khrag bcas bsgoms na stag sogs 'gyur/ /sbyor ba'i cho ga'i dus su ni/ /grub pa'i gza' la sogs dang sbyar/ /rtag tu sgom dang bzlas la dga'/ /dam
447b3(rgyud): tshig spyod pa srung ba dag / de yis rtag pa 'grub 'gyur te/ /gzhan du na ni 'bras bu med/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis
447b4(rgyud): gsungs/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las/ 'bras bu bcos ma'i phyag rgya'i ye shes kyi rim par phye ba ste bzhi bcu pa'o// //
447b5(rgyud): de nas A li kA li gnyis/ /de nyid las ni kun bskyed cing / /spro zhing sdud par byed pa po/ /tha snyad kyi ni cho ga ste/ /sngags kyi mtshan nyid thun mong ba/ /cho ga 'di
447b6(rgyud): dag ji bzhin nyon/ /a zhes bya ba mdog dmar ba/ /mgo dang thig le slangs pa ni/ /sgrub bya'i snying ga mgo po dang / /gsang ba dang ni lte bar bsam/ /a zhes
447b7(rgyud): bya bar thig ler ldan/ /mtshan dang 'ol ma se dang ni/ /ku su ma ni lta bu'i mdog /bsgrub bya'i mgor ni bsam byas la/ /myos shing sems dang bral ba dang / /klugs/
448a1(rgyud): shing rnam par nyams par bsam/ /de yi lus ni rang nyid kyi/ /sa bon gyis dkrugs rmongs bsgoms na/ /ring por mi thogs dbang
448a2(rgyud): 'gyur te/ /rtag tu thams cad ster bar 'gyur/ /i zhes bya ba skas lta bu/ /dbyangs yig gsum pa thung ngu ni/ /bsgrub bya'i snying ga lte ba dang / /de bzhin du ni
448a3(rgyud): mgrin par bsgom/ /I zhes bya ba'i dbyangs yig bzhi/ /li khri yi ni mdog lta bu/ /bsgrub bya yi ni dbral bar dgod/ /gang gi lus la gsum pa dang / /
448a4(rgyud): bzhi pa'i mchog ni bkod pa yis/ /myos shing cha lugs nyams pa dang / /sems dang bral bar byas nas su/ /ji srid 'tsho yi bar du ni/ /lkugs pa bzhin du
448a5(rgyud): dbang du 'gyur/ /de nas dbyangs yig lnga pa yi/ /dbang po'i mtshon cha lta bu'i 'od/ /U zhes bya ba'i bsgrub bya yi/ /mgrin par zhags pa lta bur bsam/ /glog
448a6(rgyud): dang mtshungs par 'bar ba ni/ dbyangs yig mchog ni drug pa ste/ /U zhes bya ba bsgrub bya yi/ /snying gi dbus su bsgom par bya/ /lkugs shing myos par
448a7(rgyud): 'gyur ba dang / /lus ni g.yo zhing sems dang bral/ /gang du sgrub pa por gnas par/ /'khrugs bzhin du ni 'ong bar 'gyur/ /bdag nyid dang ni nor dang bcas/ /
448b1(rgyud): dbang du yang ni 'gyur ba yin/ /ri zhes bya ba du ba'i mdog /dpral bar lus dang bral ba ste/ /dbyangs yig gi ni dam pa de/ /snying ga dang ni gsang bar bsgom/ /de nas
448b2(rgyud): rA nI mun pa'i mdog / bsgrub bya'i lus kyi mgo bo dang / /de bzhin rkang pa mgrin pa ru/ /ring po de ni bsgom par bya/ /bdun pa dang ni brgyad pa 'dis/ /myur du skrod
448b3(rgyud): par byed pa ste/ /sems ni rmugs shing nyams gyur nas/ /sa gzhi ma lus rgyu 'gyur te/ /mthong ba yi ni tshe 'di la/ /slar yang ldog par mi 'gyur ro/ /l-i zhes bya
448b4(rgyud): ba srid pa sdom/ /bya rog gi ni gshog pa 'dra/ /sgrub pos bsgrub bya'i mig dang ni/ /mgrin pa dang ni gsang bar bsgom/ /dbyangs yig ring po l-I zhes pas/ /bsgrub
448b5(rgyud): par bya ba dkris par bsam/ /bsgrub bya'i lus la bsgoms tsam gyis/ /sdang bar byed pa'i mchog yin te/ /sems can kun gyis smad pa dang / /skye bo kun gyis
448b6(rgyud): brnyas pa dang / /mar khu phyung ba'i 'ba' cha bzhin/ /skye bo kun gyis spong bar 'gyur/ /cog la ma yi mtshal dang ni/ /lham bu chu gsher lta bu'i mdog /ai zhes bya
448b7(rgyud): pa dbyangs kyi rgyal/ /gsang dang lte ba snying gar dgod/ /ai zhes bya ba gzi brjid che/ /li khri dang ni nyi ma'i mdog /bsgrub bya'i mig dang de bzhin du/ kha dang
449a1(rgyud): mgrin par bsgom par bya/ /sgrub pa'i mchog gis yid la ni/ /las 'di byas pa tsam gyis su/ /khams gsum po ni ma lus pa/ /
449a2(rgyud): mthe bo'i khyon tsam du ni mthong / /gdong dang gdong ni mngon phyogs te/ /de yi yi ge'i cha shas kyis/ /dbugs kyi ri mo lcug mas dgug /cha shas lcug
449a3(rgyud): ma'i dam tshig dbang / /a zhes bya ba'i dbyangs yig ni/ /thig le dang ni zla phyed bcas/ /zla ba gnyis ni tsheg drag bcas/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad
449a4(rgyud): kyi| |yi ge mchog gi phyag rgya ste/ /sangs rgyas ri mor yang dag gnas/ /'di ltar A li kA li zhes/ /bcud len thams cad zhes byar brjod/ /gtso bo la
449a5(rgyud): ni thim byas nas/ /rdo rje sems dpa' sogs dang sbyar/ /de yi 'og tu phyin nas ni/ /yi ge thams cad gzhug par bya/ /ji srid snang ba yod kyi bar/ /'dis
449a6(rgyud): ni srung bar byed par brjod/ /thig le zhes bya sems yin te/ /sems kyi rang bzhin stong ba yin/ /zla ba gnyis dang yang dag ldan/ /mi 'gyur mchog gi
449a7(rgyud): phyag rgya'o/ /de las dbyangs yig rnams kyi ni/ /sgrub po bdag nyid chen po yi/ /las ni lha dang lha min dang / /mir bcas myur du dbang du byed/ /oM zhes bya ba
449b1(rgyud): nyi ma ltar/ /'od zer 'bar ba stong dang ldan/ /bsgrub bya yi ni mgo bo dang / /dpral ba khyad par snying gar bsgom/ /oM zhes bya ba rtag 'bar ba/ /nyi ma bye ba'i gzi brjid
449b2(rgyud): can| |bsgrub bya yi ni lus kun la/ /khyab pa nyid du bsgom par bya/ /bskal pa yi ni me dpung ltar/ /dbyangs kyis khyab nas sgom pa dang / /dbyangs kyi me yis bsgrub bya
449b3(rgyud): yang / /rab tu 'bar bar bsgoms byas nas/ /dgra bo lo brgyar 'tsho ba yang / /de ma thag tu ltung bar 'gyur/ /a ni thams cad sdud pa ste/ /'tshe ba zlog par byed
449b4(rgyud): pa'ang yin/ /a ni gshegs su gsol ba ste/ /ji ltar 'dod bzhin lha yang byed/ /bud med kun gyi mngal du ni/ /bsams na khu ba 'dzag par 'gyur/ /khyad par
449b5(rgyud): du ni gzhan dag la'ang / /dkar po dmar po'i ting 'dzin bya/ /a la sogs dang yi ge rnams/ /lus la bkod na dpyang mi dgos/ /de ltar dbyangs kyi las rnams
449b6(rgyud): ni| |khyod la bdag gis gang bstan la/ /dbyangs yig dge ba bcu drug ni/ /lus la go char bkod de bya/ /a zhes bya ba rkang gnyis dgod/ /A ni byin pa gnyis
449b7(rgyud): la bsam/ /pa'i ni bral la dgod bya ste/ /pa'i zhes bya ba gsang bar gnas/ /u ni lte ba'i brtsa ba ste/ /U zhes bya ba lte ba'i dbus/ /r-i Ni lte ba'i steng du dgod/ /r-I zhes bya
450a1(rgyud): bying gar yin/ /l-i zhes bya ba mgrin par dgod/ /de bzhin l-I ni rkan la 'o/ /e zhes bya ba kha la ste/ /de bzhin ai ni sna la 'o/ /o ni rna ba dag
450a2(rgyud): la ste| |au zhes bya ba dpral bar ro/ /aM ni mgo la dgod bya ste/ /aH zhes bya ba rgyab tu dgod/ /dbang dang dgug la dmar por te/ /bsad la thams cad sngon
450a3(rgyud): por ro| |du ba lta bur bsams na ni/ /bskrad pa nyid 'gyur the tshom med/ /dbyangs yig kun gyis byin brlabs 'di/ /bdag gi de nyid gsal ba yin/ /sgrub po bdag
450a4(rgyud): nyid dam pa yis/ /de ltar go cha bgos nas ni/ /sgrub pos dbyangs dang yi ge yi/ /phyi nas las rnams shin tu sbyar/ /de nas rig pa'i de nyid 'byung / /las rnams dag tu
450a5(rgyud): byas pa ste/ /ka nas ma yi mthar thug pa'i/ /las ni blo gros chen pos nyon/ /lha dang lha min mi dang bcas/ /gang gis sa gsum thams cad ni/ /sgrub bo shin tu rgyas pa yi//
450a6(rgyud): dbang du de dag thams cad 'gyur/ /yid la 'dod pa'i 'bras ster ba/ /de ni nga yis bshad par bya/ /dbyangs yig bcu drug po rnams kyi/ /mdzes ma khyod la ngas bshad
450a7(rgyud): nas| |da ni ka sogs yi ge yi/ /las rnams 'dod bzhin byed pa bshad/ /lha mo yi ge dang po ni/ /nyi ma'i gzi brjid dang mtshungs shing / /li khri sbungs pa lta bu yi/ /
450b1(rgyud): thig ler ldan pa'i yi ge che/ /sgrub pos bsgrub bya'i snying ga dang / /lte ba dang ni mgo bor bsgom/ /de yis bsgrub bya'i lus kyi ni/ /nang du phug ste khyab par bsam/ /de yis lus
450b2(rgyud): ni 'khrugs nas su/ /rmongs shing sems dang bral ba dang / /brgyal bzhin du ni dbang du 'gyur/ /ji srid lus la gnas kyi bar/ /de srid dbang du 'gyur ba ste/ /de srid 'tsho
450b3(rgyud): yi bar du ni/ /bdag nyid nor dang bcas 'gyur la/ /kha zhes bya ba'ang brtson chen ma/ /lha ma bu chu gsher lta bu dang / /nyi ma 'char kha lta bu'i mdog /thig ler bcas pa gzi
450b4(rgyud): brjid che/ /gsal zhing 'od dang bcas pa ste/ /bsgrub bya yi ni snying ga dang / /mgo dang rkang pa kun tu dgod/ /de yis bsgrub bya phug nas ni/ /rmongs shing sems dang bral bar
450b5(rgyud): bsam| |sgrub pa po yi mchog gis ni/ /de yi lus ni dkrugs pa dang / /myos shing brgyal bar bsgom par bya/ /de yis shin tu brgyal 'gyur zhing / /yi ge'i dbang pos
450b6(rgyud): che bas na/ /sgrub pa bdag nyid chen po yi/ /ji srid 'tsho yi bar du ni/ /nor dang bcas pa da'ang du 'gyur/ /ga zhes bya ba'i sa bon che/ /rang gi lha yi sdom pa ste/ /
450b7(rgyud): tsheg drag bcas pa gzi brjid che/ /gtso bo char sprin lta bu'i mdog /bsgrub bya'i mgo dang mgrin pa dang / /khyad par du ni snying gar bsam//
451a1(rgyud): de yis bsgrub par bya ba'i lus/ /yi ges kun tu phug bsam na/ /lus ni rtag tu dkrugs pas na/ /'dar zhing de yi dbang du 'gyur/
451a2(rgyud): bdag nyid dang ni nor dang bcas/ /sdang ba'i dgra rnams ma lus pa/ /khyim la sogs pa kun tu ni/ /ji srid nyi zla yod kyi bar/ /ma lus par ni 'joms par byed/ /
451a3(rgyud): g+ha zhes bya ba sgyu ma che/ /bskal pa'i me dang gzi brjid mtshungs/ /steng du thig les brgyan pa ste/ /ku su ma yi khu ba 'dra/ /bsgrub bya yi ni lte ba dang / /gsang ba snying ga kha dang
451a4(rgyud): ni| |mgo bo ru ni bsams tsam gyis/ /bsgrub bya dga' bas myos nas su/ /sems dang bral zhing nyams nas ni/ /ji srid 'tsho yi bar du ni/ /bdag nyid nor dang bcas pa ru/ /shin
451a5(rgyud): tu de yi dbang du 'gyur/ /nga zhes bya ba gzi brjid che/ /sde tshan gyi ni mtha' mar gnas/ /de ni 'dod pa'i mnga' yin te/ /'jig rten gsum po dbang du byed/ /de ni bsgrub
451a6(rgyud): bya'i gsang bar bsam/ /khu ba dag ni 'dzag par byed/ /gsang ba ru ni zhugs pa yis/ /thams cad du ni 'bigs par 'gyur/ /yan lag gi ni tshigs kun tu/ /de yi
451a7(rgyud): phug pas myos nas ni/ /nor dang bdag nyid bcas pa ni/ /myur ba nyid du dbang du 'gyur/ /ji srid 'tsho yi bar du ni/ /de la chags dang bral mi 'gyur/ /yi ge lnga po kun
451b1(rgyud): gyis kyang / /bdag nyid go cha bskon par bya/ /ka zhes bya ba snying gar dgod/ /kha zhes bya ba mgo la ste/ /ga zhes bya ba spyi gtsug tu/ /g+ha zhes bya ba go char bya/ /nga zhes bya ba sgrub bo
451b2(rgyud): po'i| |lag pa g.yon la dgod par bya/ /de nas bsgrub bya dbang dang ni/ /dgug dang gsad la sogs par sbyar/ /cho ga de ltar byas na ni/ /dpyad mi dgos par dngos grub 'gyur/ /tsang
451b3(rgyud): zhes bya ba du ba'i mdog / rlung ga gnas kyi yi ge ste/ /sgrub pos de yi snying ga dang / /mgo dang rkang par bsam par bya/ /bsgrub bya rlung la gnas nas ni/ /kun tu 'pho bar bsam
451b4(rgyud): pa dang / /sems dang bral bar gyur nas su/ /nam mkha' la ni gnas bzhin du/ /rlung gis gzhan dang gzhan dag tu/ /khyer pa ru ni bsgom par bya/ /bsam gtan
451b5(rgyud): sbyor pa 'di yis ni/ /bsgrub bya shin tu brtan pa yang / /bskrad 'gyur 'dir ni the tshom med/ /bsgrub bya'i lus ni 'phangs pas na/ /ji srid 'tsho yi bar du ni/ /
451b6(rgyud): slar yang 'ong bar mi 'gyur ro/ /tsha zhes bya ba'i yi ge che/ /gsal zhing mig sman nag po'i mdog /cha gnyis pa dang yang dag ldan/ /bsgrub bya yi ni
451b7(rgyud): mgo bor bsam/ /de yi mgo la du ba yi/ /tshogs dang mtshungs pa'i rlung gis khyab/ /cung zad tsam gyis bsgrub bya yi/ /lus ni de yis bskor bar bsam/ /slar yang tsha ni tsheg drag bcas/ /
452a1(rgyud): lte ba ru ni bsams nas su/ /lan gsum du ni brjod byas na/ /yi ge 'di ni bskrad pa'i mchog /bsgrub bya rmongs shing sems dang bral/ /dgra bo
452a2(rgyud): mdangs ni nyams nas su/ /sa steng ma lus pa ru 'khyams/ /ji srid 'tsho yi bar du ni/ /slar yang ldog par mi 'gyur ro/ /dza zhes bya ba'i yi ge rgyal/ /du ba'i mdog can gzi
452a3(rgyud): brjid che/ /'od zer ldan zhing shin tu 'bar/ /rdul phran dag ni stong du 'phro/ /bsgrub bya yi ni mgo bo dang / /gsang bar yi ge zhugs par bsgom/ /yan lag tshigs kun
452a4(rgyud): phug pa dang / /sems dang bral ba bzhin du gnas/ /yi ge yongs su bkang bas na/ /de nas rgyal bar gyur nas ni/ /nyin dang mtshan du rmongs pa dang / /mi sad par ni bsgom
452a5(rgyud): par bya| |sa steng shing dang nags tshal bcas/ /thams cad du ni 'gro bar 'gyur/ /bskrad pa'i cho ga 'di dag ni/ /dge ma khyod la nga yis bshad/ /ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar
452a6(rgyud): du ni| |slar yang 'ong bar mi 'gyur ro/ /dz+ha zhes bya ba stobs po che/ /bsgrub bya yi ni snying ga ru/ /nyi ma lta bur 'bar ba dang / /'od zer gsal ba rnam par 'phro/ /thig
452a7(rgyud): la zla ba phyed pas brgyan/ /bsgrub bya'i mgo dang snying ga dang / /lte ba'i steng du yi ge bsam/ /sgrub pa'i dbang pos bsgrub bya'i lus/ /'bar bas bcud dang phral
452b1(rgyud): bar bsam/ de yis bsgrub bya brgyal 'gyur zhing / /bskrad pa'am ni 'chi ba'am/ /yang na smyon pa nyid du 'gyur/ /yi ge yis ni ltung bas na/ /slar yang 'ong bar mi 'gyur te/ /
452b2(rgyud): sa gzhi nags tshal bcas pa ru/ /smyo zhing 'gro 'gyur the tshom med/ /dz+ha zhes bya ba 'di yis ni/ /myur du bskrad 'gyur the tshom med/ /nya zhes bya ba'i yi ge mchog /sna tshogs pa
452b3(rgyud): yi mdog dang ldan/ /pa la sha yi me tog gi /'od zer stong phrag 'bar ba ste/ /chu rgyun stong ni 'bab pa yis/ /de yi lus la dbo bar bya/ /de yis nor dang bcas pa ru/ /brgyal
452b4(rgyud): zhing sems dang bral ba dang / /rmongs shing myur du dbang du 'gyur/ /Ta zhes bya ba'i yi ge mchog /dbang po'i mtshon cha lta bu'i mdog /'od zer 'bar ba stong phrag gis/ /yi
452b5(rgyud): ge 'bar dang ldan par bsam/ /bsgrub bya yi ni dbral ba dang / /mgrin pa dang ni snying gar bsam/ /bsgrub bya'i steng du nam mkha' la/ /bdud rtsi sgo yi thig le ni/ /spyi bo'i
452b6(rgyud): steng du rtag tu bsam/ /cung zad glog ni g.yo 'dra ba'i/ /kha ba dag ni 'bab par bsam/ /sgrub pa po yis bsgrub bya ni/ /yan lag tshigs kun g.yo ba dang / /brgyal zhing
452b7(rgyud): rmongs la myos bsams na/ /ji srid nyi zla yod par du/ /nor dang bdag nyid bcas pa ru/ /de yis thams cad dbang du 'gyur/ /de ltar Ta yi rgyal po yi/ /las ni khyod la
453a1(rgyud): nga yis bshad/ /de nas yi ge gnyis pa yi/ /las kyi mchog ni bshad par bya/ /T+ha zhes bya ba'i yi ge ni/ /dbang chen dang ni 'dra bar 'dod/ /spyi bor
453a2(rgyud): bdud rtsi thig les brgyan/ /de bzhin glog dang 'brug gis brgyan/ /yi ge'i mchog ni bsgom par bya/ /bdud rtsi chu rgyun 'bab pa yis/ /bsgrub bya'i lus la kun tu gtor/ /
453a3(rgyud): bsgrub bya'i mgo dang mgrin pa dang / /snying ga ru ni gnas par bsam/ /bsgrub bya'i mgo ni phug pa dang / /lus la kun tu khyab pa yis/ /bsgrub bya myos shing 'dar ba ru/ /
453a4(rgyud): sngags pas yi ges rtag tu bsgom/ /de nas ji srid 'tsho bar du/ /brgyal zhing rmongs pas dbang du 'gyur/ /de nas Da zhes bya ba ni/ /ye ge'i rgyal po gsum pa ste/ /de yi
453a5(rgyud): las kyi mchog rnams ni/ /rtse gcig yid kyis gus pas nyon/ /Da zhes bya ba thig ler bcas/ /rdo rje lta bu'i dbyibs can yin/ /ut+pa la ltar ljang ser te/ /'od zer
453a6(rgyud): gsal ba kun tu 'gro/ /bsgrub bya'i spyi bor bsam pa yis/ /bsgrub bya'i tshigs ni 'bugs shing 'byed/ /bsgrub bya mi g.yor bsgoms byas na/ /lus ni kun tu
453a7(rgyud): g.yo bzhin du/ /ji srid 'tsho yi bar du ni/ /rmongs dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyur/ /de nas las kyi mchog gzhan ni/ /shin tu gnyer bar byed pa ste/ /D+ha zhes bya ba yi
453b1(rgyud): ge'i rgyal/ /shin tu rmad byung phyed pa po/ /dbang po'i mtshon cha lta bu'i mdog /nyi ma lta bur 'bar ba ste/ /bsgrub bya'i snying dang lte ba dang / /mgrin par yi ge bsams nas su/ /
453b2(rgyud): byang chub sems ni rab 'dzag pas/ /de yi lus la dbo bar bya/ /de yis bzi zhing brgyal nas su/ /gnyid log par ni bsgoms byas na/ /'di yis ring por mi thogs par//
453b3(rgyud): rmongs shing sgrub po'i dbang du 'gyur/ /cho ga'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni/ /nam yang chags dang 'bral mi 'gyur/ /de nas D+ha mtha' yi ge las/ /ji ltar 'dod bzhin 'bad de
453b4(rgyud): nyon| |Na zhes bya ba du ba'i mdog / cung zad 'bar zhing gsal ba ste/ /dri ma med pa'i du ba las/ /'od zer gsal ba rnam par 'phro/ /bsgrub bya yi ni lus kun la/ /de yis
453b5(rgyud): rnam par khyab byed cing / /'od zer glog stong 'khyug 'dra ba/ /bsgrub par bya ba'i steng du bsgom/ /'od zer brgya yis bkang bas na/ /myos nas su ni brgyal bar 'gyur/ /de yis
453b6(rgyud): ji srid 'tsho bar du/ /de ni de yi dbang du 'gyur/ /ta zhes bya ba'i yi ge mchog /'od zer glog ltar gsal ba ste/ /mdog ni rma bya'i mgrin pa 'dra/ /yi ge 'di ni bsgrub bya yi//
453b7(rgyud): snying dang mgrin pa gsang ba dang / /lte bar bkod de 'bugs par bsam/ /yi ge de yis rmongs pas na/ /bsgrub bya sems dang bral ba dang / /rmongs shing brgyal bar
454a1(rgyud): gyur nas su/ /ji srid 'tsho yi bar du ni/ /myos shing dbang 'gyur gzhan du min/ /de yi drung na gnas pa yi/ /tha zhes bya ba yi ge mchog /mu men
454a2(rgyud): gyi ni mdog 'dra dang / /ut+pal sngon po'i 'dab ma'i 'od/ /bsgrub bya'i snying ga dpral ba dang / /de bzhin du ni rkang par dgod/ /bsgrub bya'i lus la dbang pa yi/ /mtshon
454a3(rgyud): cha bzhin du thim par bsam/ /yi ge'i rgyal pos mnan pas na/ /bsgrub bya sems dang bral 'gyur zhing / /sa 'dzin gyi ni dbang po bzhin/ /'gro ba dag kyang bcings
454a4(rgyud): par 'gyur/ /reg bya mi shes dri mi shes/ /sgra mi shes shing gzugs mi mthong / /lce yis ro rnams mi myong zhing / /dug gis brgyal ba bzhin du gnas/ /gang dang
454a5(rgyud): gang gi steng du ni/ /nyi 'od lta bu'i yi ge bsam/ /yi ge'i rgyal po tha yis ni/ /skyes bu bcings 'gyur the tshom med/ /de nas gzhan yang de yis ni/ /sdong po'i
454a6(rgyud): las kyi cho ga nyon/ /de zhes bya ba mdog sngon ni/ /char sprin nag po'i 'od dang mtshungs/ /'od zer 'bar ba rnam 'phro ba/ /bsgrub bya yi ni mgor bsams la/ /me
454a7(rgyud): stag 'phro ba bsgoms pa ni/ /phyogs kun du ni bsam par bya/ /yi ge'i dbang phyug de yis ni/ /bsgrub bya'i mgo bo phug par bsam/ /'bar ba'i sprin ni stong
454b1(rgyud): phrag gis/ /de ni kun tu bskor bar bsam/ /de ni bkod pa tsam gyis su/ /sdong gog dang ni mtshungs par 'gyur/ /phug ste shin tu bcings pas na/ /'gro ba'ang mi g.yo
454b2(rgyud): bar ni 'gyur/ /ji srid sgrub pa 'dod bar du/ /sems dang bral zhing brtan par gnas/ /slar yang sgrub pos bsam tsam gyis/ /rmongs pa las ni grol bar 'gyur/ /de
454b3(rgyud): nas yi ge d+ha yi ni/ /las ni rmad du gyur pa nyon/ /d+ha zhes bya ba gzhu yi dbyibs/ /kha dog ser po gser gyi mdog /gser lta bu yi 'od zer 'phros/ /bsgrub bya yi ni
454b4(rgyud): mgrin pa ru/ /zhags pa lta bur 'bar bar bsam/ /sgrub pa'i dbang pos bsgrub bya ste/ /khrid de 'ong bar bsgoms byas na/ /sgrub pa po ni gar gnas par/ /rmongs de
454b5(rgyud): bcas te 'ong bar 'gyur/ /ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar du ni/ /phyugs de sems dang bral 'gyur zhing / /nyi ma brgyad pa'i cha la ni/ /rang gi gnas nas 'ong bar 'gyur/ /de nas
454b6(rgyud): yi ge na yi ni/ /las kyi cho ga'i sgrub pa nyon/ /mdog ni du ba'i phung po 'dra/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor 'khrug dang ldan/ /bsgrub bya'i snying ga mgrin pa dang / lte ba dang ni
454b7(rgyud): rkang par sbyar/ /de yis dgra rnams rang yul las/ /bskrad 'gyur 'dir ni the tshom med/ /de ni rmongs pas rang yul du/ /nam yang phyis ni 'ong mi 'gyur/ /de nas sde
455a1(rgyud): tshan lnga pa ni/ /yi ge rnams kyi dbang phyug mchog /las ni shin tu sgrub pa ste/ /gzhan dang gzhan ni bshad par bya/ /pa zhes bya ba rlung gi
455a2(rgyud): gnas| |char sprin gyi ni sprin gyis bskor/ /'bar zhing du bas 'khrigs par ldan/ /bsgrub bya yi ni mgo bo dang / /mgrin pa snying ga rked pa dang / /rkang pa dag tu bsams
455a3(rgyud): nas ni| |pa zhes bya ba'i yi ge des/ /bsgrub bya'i lus ni dkri bar bya/ /bsgrub par bya ba nga rgyal dang / /khro bas brtan gnas gtso bo yang / /yi ge gtso bo bkod pa yis/ /
455a4(rgyud): skad cig gis ni bskrad 'gyur te/ /gal te tshe rabs gzhan dag la'ang / /slar zhing ldog par mi 'gyur ro/ /de nas yi ge pha yi ni/ /las mchog nga yis bshad kyi nyon//
455a5(rgyud): yi ge pad+ma'i mdog 'dra zhing / /'bar pa bsgrub bya'i spyi bo dang / /mgrin pa snying ga lte ba dang / /gsang ba'i gnas su bkod nas ni/ /ku sum yi khu 'dra pa/ /'dzag
455a6(rgyud): pa ru ni rnam bsams te/ /bsgrub bya'i lus ni phyi nang du/ /de yis gang bar bsgoms byas na/ /bsgrub bya rmongs shing brgyal 'gyur la/ /sems med lus ni 'dar gyur
455a7(rgyud): nas| |rmongs pas sgrub pa po yi ni/ /dbang du 'gyur te dpyad mi dgos/ /ba zhes bya ba'i rgyal po ni/ /gru bzhi pa la stobs po che/ /dung dang zla 'dra dkar po'i mdog /zla ba'i
455b1(rgyud): 'od can bsgrub bya ni/ /dbus su sgrub pos thim par bsam/ /de lus dug gis mi tshugs shing / /nad la sogs pas gzir mi 'gyur/ /rims dang bkres dang skom mi 'byung / /
455b2(rgyud): 'di ni rtag tu bsgoms gyur na/ /tshe ring nad med rgyal bar 'gyur/ /bsam gtan sbyor ba 'di yis ni/ /zla ba dmar dang bcas pa ru/ /lhan cig tu ni bzlas gyur na/ /rtag
455b3(rgyud): tu bdud rtsi'i rgyun 'drar 'gyur/ /de nas rgyal po b+ha zhes pa'i/ /las kyi mchog ni mnyan par gyis/ /dbang po'i mtshon cha lta bu ste/ /nyi ma 'char ka lta bu'i mdog /bsgrub
455b4(rgyud): bya yi ni mgo bo ru/ /rgyal ba'i mchog ni rtag bsam la/ /de yi lus ni ma lus par/ /yi ge'i rgyal pos dbug par bya/ /rmongs shing sems dang bral 'gyur te/ /
455b5(rgyud): rdo rje yin yang brgyal gyur nas/ /mche bas zin ltar skad cig la/ /ltung zhing 'chi ba nyid gyur pas/ /de yi srog ni rmongs par 'gyur/ /dgra ni lo brgyar 'tsho ba yang / /
455b6(rgyud): skad cig gis ni 'chi bar 'gyur/ /de nas gzi brjid chen po yi/ /yi ge nyi shu rtsa lnga pa/ /ma zhes bya ba dam pa mchog /de yi las ni ji bzhin nyon/ /tsam pa ka ltar ser
455b7(rgyud): ba'i mdog / bskal ba'i me bzhin gzi brjid 'bar/ /'od ni glog ltar 'khyug pa bzhin/ /bsgrub par bya ba'i steng bsam la/ /de yi 'od kyis bsgrub bya yi/ /steng dang 'og
456a1(rgyud): ni ma lus par/ /lus ni kun tu g.yogs bsams na/ /gnod sbyin lha dang klu yi bu/ /sha za dang ni srin po dang / /khams gsum yi ge'i bdag
456a2(rgyud): po dang / /lha dang lha min mi dang bcas/ /sgrub po bdag nyid chen po yi/ /skad cig gis ni dbang 'gyur bar/ /mdor bsdus ngas ni khyod la bshad/ /ya zhes bya ba'i yi
456a3(rgyud): ge mchog / mun pa dang ni du ba'i mdog /rlung gi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas shing / /rlung gi gzugs can yi ge che/ /rlung bdun gyi ni gtso bo dang / /gnas zhes bya
456a4(rgyud): bar brjod pa ste/ /zla phyed kyi ni dbyibs can la/ /ba dan brgya yis rnam par klubs/ /rnam pa bzhi yi rten gyur pa/ /phyi rol gos ltar dkris pa ste/ /ra zhes pa yi yi
456a5(rgyud): ge mchog / 'bar ba bye ba stong dang ldan/ /de yi steng du bsam par bya/ /du ba yi ni phreng bas brgyan/ /bsgrub bya'i mgo bor bsgoms nas ni/ /dgra bo lo brgyar 'tsho ba
456a6(rgyud): yang / /sbrul gyi mche bas zin pa ltar/ /skad cig tsam gyis srog dang ni/ /bral zhing 'chi ba'i sgor gzhol 'gyur/ /lha sogs thams cad gang rung gi /steng du yi
456a7(rgyud): ge 'di sbyar na/ /myur du ltung 'gyur dpyad mi dgos/ /gdon dang rims rnams thams cad ni/ /de la 'bab par 'gyur ba dang / /sprul chen brgya yi mche ba 'bab/ /de yis
456b1(rgyud): myur du 'chi 'gyur na/ /gnod pa gzhan lta smos ci dgos/ /ya zhes pa dang ra zhes pa/ /rlung dang me yi gzugs can du/ /nam mkha'i phyogs su bsams nas ni/ /nam mkha'i
456b2(rgyud): ngos ni g.yogs bsams na/ /nyi zla gza' skar sogs pa'ang rung / /chu bo dang ni rgya mtsho yi/ /dbus su yi ge gnyis po dag /bsams nas nyi ma brgyad pa la/ /rgya mtsho
456b3(rgyud): la sogs thams cad skam/ /zhing sa 'bru yi phung po dang / /khyim la sogs pa'i gnas bsams nas/ /phyi rol me lce 'bar ba yis/ /thams cad yi ge thal bar
456b4(rgyud): byed| |me yi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas te/ /rlung gis kun tu bskor ba ni/ /yi ge mchog ni gnyis bsams na/ /las ni kun tu nye bar gnas/ /de nas gzhan
456b5(rgyud): yang yi ge gnyis/ /stobs chen ldan pa bshad par bya/ /dbang chen dang ni de bzhin chu/ /las rnams thams cad byed pa po/ /la zhes bya bas yin te/ /sa zhes
456b6(rgyud): bya ba 'dzin pa'i mchog / dbang po rdo rjes mtshan pa dang / /'od zer glog ltar 'bar ba ste/ /kha dog lnga dang ldan pa ru/ /yi ge'i dbang po sa la bsgom/ /de steng chu yi yi
456b7(rgyud): ge ni/ /bzhi pa legs par gnas pa ste/ /dud dang zla 'dra dkar po'i mdog /kha ba'i rgyun ni 'bab pa ste/ /la yi steng du bkod nas su/ /shin tu bsil ba'i bdud rtsi
457a1(rgyud): 'dzag / dbang chen gyis ni bskor ba yi/ /chu yi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa/ /spyi bor thig le dang ni ldan/ /char ba'i rgyun ni stong phrag
457a2(rgyud): 'bebs/ /steng du sprin gyi phung po ni/ /glog dang 'brug la sogs pas brgyan/ /bdud rtsi char gyi rgyun 'bebs pa/ /nam mkha' thams cad khyab pa ru/ /dkyil 'khor
457a3(rgyud): gnyis kyi dbus 'gyur ba/ /gang gi mgo yi steng bsgoms na/ /sgrub po bdag nyid chen po yi/ /las ni ji ltar 'dod bzhin byed/ /gdengs ka gsum gyis
457a4(rgyud): mdzes pa yi/ /lhag ma can ni zhi gzugs bsam/ /de yi mig gnyis dbang po yi/ /mtshon chas brgyan pa'i dbus su ni/ /bdud rtsi 'bebs pa'i i yig
457a5(rgyud): dgod| |grong khyer gyi ni mtha' ma ru/ /bsgrub bya yi ni steng du dbab/ /dug dang gdon dang rims la sogs/ /skad cig gis ni zhi bar 'gyur/ /de ni skra dkar
457a6(rgyud): gzhom pa yi/ /cho gar bshad kyi mnyan par gyis/ /dkyil 'khor nyis 'gyur yi ge ni/ /de ltar rtag tu bsam gyur na/ /tshe thung ba yang ring 'gyur na/ /skra dkar
457a7(rgyud): la sogs smos ci dgos/ /bud med dbang phyug rnams la ni/ /'bad pas yang dag g.yon bskor zhing / /rang gi spyi bo'i steng du ni/ /lo gcig bar du bsgoms
457b1(rgyud): byas na| |rga ba dang ni 'chi ba 'joms/ /nad kyis gdung bar mi 'gyur te/ /gal te klu chen brgyad kyi ni/ /mche ba'i dug gis zin gyur kyang / /dug ni dug med byas nas su/ /dug
457b2(rgyud): gis brgyal ba slong bar mdzad/ /mgron po lam gyis dub pa dang / /gdon la sogs pas gzir ba rnams/ /kun las thar bar 'gyur ba yin/ /bdag gi spyi bor bsam
457b3(rgyud): tsam gyis/ /skad cig gis ni bkres skom 'joms/ /nad rnams kun gyis gdungs pa la/ /yi ge bkod pas grol bar 'gyur/ /de ltar las rnams sna tshogs ni/ /lha
457b4(rgyud): mo khyod la bshad pa yin/ /gtso mo bzhi yi rnam pa bzhi/ /las kyi cho ga rgyas pa ste/ /rlung dang me dang bdud rtsi bcud/ /de bzhin drod kyi sde ba ste/ /gshin rje brtan ma phyag
457b5(rgyud): gnyis pa/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par klubs/ /lus ni me las byung ba ru/ /bskal ba'i me lce lta bur bsam/ /'og dang steng du wa yis brgyan/ /de yi phyogs
457b6(rgyud): kun thams cad du/ /'bar ba gang gi snying gar bsam/ /'od zer 'bar ba rnam par 'phro/ /wa dang ldan pa'i yi ge che/ /nam mkha' khyab pas bcings 'gyur te/ /
457b7(rgyud): brtan ma yi ni 'khrul 'khor gyi/ /yi ge'i rgyal pos bcings pas na/ /sa 'dzin la bar brtan par 'gyur/ /rkang med dang ni rkang gnyis dang / /rkang bzhi la sogs
458a1(rgyud): sems can gyis/ /lte ba ru ni bsgoms byas na/ /de ma thag tu 'chi bar 'gyur/ /de yang bskal ba'i me lta bu'i/ /'od zer 'bar ba 'phro ba yi/ /
458a2(rgyud): wa ni steng du bsgom par bya/ /slar yang me yis 'bar bsams na/ /gang gi lag pa g.yon pa la/ /yi ge de ni dgod par bsam/ /ji srid lag tu bsam gyi bar/ /sa
458a3(rgyud): steng gi ni skye bo rnams/ /rang gi gnas ni de nyid nas/ /'bebs shing 'gugs par byed pa'i mchog /'di ni gshin rje brtan ma la/ /mos pa'i las rnams bshad
458a4(rgyud): pa yin| |dbang po thams cad 'bebs pa yi/ /gshin rje'i pho nya'i las bshad bya/ /ut+pal sngon po'i 'deb 'dra ba/ /mgo dang thig le spangs pa ni/ /ut+pal
458a5(rgyud): sngon po'i 'dab lta bu/ /gang gi lce dang rkan bsams na/ /skal ba bzang po 'joms par 'gyur/ /snying dang kha dang sna dang ni/ /mig dang rna bar de bzhin du/ /yi ge dbu ma
458a6(rgyud): bkod na ni/ /dbang po thams cad 'phrog 'gyur te/ /gzugs mi mthong zhing sgra mi thos/ /dri mi tshor zhing stobs mi 'gyur/ /de bzhin lce yis ro mi myong / /dug gis
458a7(rgyud): brgyal ba bzhin du gnas/ /las rnams de dag thams cad la/ /yid kyis bzlog na grol bar 'gyur/ /gshin rje mche ba du ba'i mdog /sreg pa'i bskal pa lta bu
458b1(rgyud): ste| |thams cad khyad par 'khyams 'gyur ba/ /sna tshogs 'od can bsgom par bya/ /drod kyi sde ba'i yi ge sa/ /du ba dang ni rlung gi mdog /snying dang lag pa rkang par dgod/ /
458b2(rgyud): khams gsum yang ni bskrad 'gyur na/ /sa steng skye bo smos ci dgod/ /thig ler bcas shing ha dang ni/ /bcas pa gang gis lce steng du/ /bsams na phur bu lta bur 'gyur//
458b3(rgyud): yi ge dge ba de nyid ni/ /rtag tu lce steng bsams na ni/ /lan gcig bzlas pas zin 'gyur te/ /de ni snyan dngags mkhan por 'gyur/ /de ltar sa dang sa mtha' yi/ /
458b4(rgyud): yi ge'i cho ga bshad pa 'o/ /'jig rten gsum po 'joms byed ma/ 'od zer dmar po gzi brjid che/ /nyi ma bye ba lta bu'i 'od/ /cung zad sngo ba 'jigs chen mo/ /ma he
458b5(rgyud): dang ni rta dag gi / 'khrul 'khor sbyor ba kun la bsam/ /de yis yi ge'i rgyal po ni/ /gzi brjid chen po yi ge ha/ /de yi las ni sna tshogs mchog /'dod pa'i las ni
458b6(rgyud): bshad par bya/ /de ltar bdag lus rtag tu ni/ /yi ge sngar ni bsams byas na/ /'gro ba rnams kyi bya ba ni/ /chig gis thams cad byed par 'gyur/ /sa steng lha dang lha
458b7(rgyud): min dang / /mi dang bcas pa 'bebs byed cing / /sgrub pa po ni dus min par/ /'chi ba dag ni 'joms par byed/ /sgrub po yid la 'dod bzhin du/ /nad rnams thams
459a1(rgyud): cad gnon par byed/ /ngag tsam gyis ni dpung tshogs dang / /chu dang rgya mtsho'i mching ba dang / /gru dang khyogs dang 'khrul 'khor dang / /rta dang
459a2(rgyud): glang po la sogs 'ching / /shing chen sa la sgyel ba dang / /sems can rnams ni dbang du byed/ /las kyi cho ga mthong ba yis/ /bya ba rnams ni 'dod bzhin byed/ /ha
459a3(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i yi ge mchog / mgo dang bral zhing thig les brgyan/ /de yi las rnams ma lus pa/ /phan pa bshad kyi mnyan par gyis/ /khyab bya khyab byed stong pa ste//
459a4(rgyud): kun tu 'gro ba mi shigs pa/ /shin tu stong dang stong pa che/ /de ni sems med gnyid log pa/ /sad pa dang ni bral ba ste/ /de ni cir yang snang mi 'gyur/ /lha dang lha
459a5(rgyud): min gnod sbyin min/ /mi 'am ci dang dri za min/ /klu rnams dang ni srin po dang / /rgya mtsho dang ni ri rab min/ /chu bo'i shing dang nags chal dang / /de bzhin sa sogs
459a6(rgyud): ma yin te/ /'jigs rung dmyal ba la sogs min/ /me dang du ba sogs min zhing / /nyi ma zla ba gza' skar min/ /mi dang sha za la sogs min/ /mngal skyes
459a7(rgyud): dang ni drod las skyes/ /sgo nga dang ni rlan skyes min/ /thang la gnas dang chu gnas min/ /pad+ma las ni skyes pa dang / /dbang po khyab 'jug bde byed min/ /rlung dang
459b1(rgyud): mkhris pa bad kan sogs/ /'byung ba'i tshogs la sogs min te/ /ha zhes bya ba'i yi ge mchog /rtag tu bsams na dmigs mi 'gyur/ /lo gcig bar du bsgoms gyur
459b2(rgyud): na| |rga dang nad kun 'joms 'gyur te/ /de la dug kyang mi 'pho na/ /nad kyi 'jigs pa ga la zhig /dug ni khur bu brgya zos kyang / /de ni 'chi bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu stong nyid
459b3(rgyud): bsgoms na ni/ /de ni thar 'gyur the tshom med/ /mgo dang dpral bar yi ge k+Sha/ /de nyid mchog tu thim nas su/ /bsgoms na skad cig mngon shes skye/ /thig ler ldan pa'i sbyar
459b4(rgyud): ba yis/ /rkan dang sna sgo'i lam du ni/ /ri mo dag ni zhugs pa bsam/ /ri mo mar me'i rtse lta bu/ /dkyil 'khor bzhi yi gzhi can bsam/ /rtag tu rkan ni phug ste gnas/ /rtag tu sbyor
459b5(rgyud): bar gnas pa yis/ /nyi ma bdun na mthong 'gyur te/ /'di dang mtshungs pa yod ma yin/ /bram ze gsod pa'ang nyin bdun gyi/ /rtse mo rgyas par mthong 'gyur te/ /de ltar
459b6(rgyud): mthong ba'i rnal 'byor pas/ /gzhan gyi grong sogs 'dod bzhin 'gro/ /k+Sha yi rgyal po 'di nyid kyi/ /las ni bsam gyis mi khyab gnas/ /'jig rten 'jig rten 'das
459b7(rgyud): dngos grub/ /brtul zhugs ma ni khyod la bshad/ /re re yi ni las rnams kyang / /bstan pa ru ni nus ma yin/ /skye bo rang don byed pa yi/ /yid bzhin nor bu lta bu yin/ /yi
460a1(rgyud): ge sde tshan so so yi/ /yi ge dag ni so so zhing / /re re'ang sbyor ba bzhi bzhi ste/ /gcig kyang bzhi ru sbyor ba bzhin/ /A li kA li'i phyag rgya che/ /
460a2(rgyud): dngos grub thams cad rab ster ba/ /shes rab thabs ni ma gtogs par/ /go 'phang mchog ni thob mi 'gyur/ /sgyu ma che dang mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde
460a3(rgyud): ba'i mchog / rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las/ /A li kA li'i sngags
460a4(rgyud): kyi sgrub thabs 'byung ba'i cho ga'i rim par phye ba ste bzhi bcu rtsa gcig pa'o/ / //de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha mo rnams kyis mchod cing phyag
460a5(rgyud): 'tshal te slar gsol pa/ /khyod kyis sngar bshad gsang ba dang / /thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs/ /yi ge bcu drug rig pa che/ /bde mchog bla mar bshad
460a6(rgyud): pa dang / /khams rnams dang ni de bzhin rtsa/ /'byung gnas sgra tshul nges 'byung dang / /'jig rten gsum du rnyed dka' ba/ /thog ma dbus mthar dbye ba dag /ji ltar
460a7(rgyud): nang du yang dag gnas/ /de rnams dbye ba de bzhin gsungs/ /bka' stsal ba/ /sgyu ma kun gyis rnam rol pa'i/ /nyon cig lha mo sgyu ma che/ /sangs rgyas kun la'ang
460b1(rgyud): gsang ba ste/ /gzhan rnams la lta smos ci dgos/ /sgyu ma chen po bcu drug ni/ /ma mo nyid du rab tu bshad/ /de yis nang gi dkyil 'khor du/ /gyur pa nyid du the tshom med/ /
460b2(rgyud): rnal 'byor pa yi bdud rtsi sbyor/ /bcu drug char yang mi phod do/ /slar yang bdud rtsi rdzas rnams ni/ /da ni bshad kyi mnyan par gyis/ /ra ni dmar chen po yi khams/ /
460b3(rgyud): ha zhes bya ba ri las skyes/ /sa ni gnad pa tra ste/ /pa ni pags par bstan pa yin/ /ra zhes bya ba dri ru gsungs/ /me zhes bya ba me tog ste/ /de bzhin ra ni chu yin no/ /
460b4(rgyud): me zhes bya ba pi si ta/ /sa ni kun tu ru nyid yin/ /rwa ni sa ri zhes bya ste/ /at+ma zhes bya na la dza/ /ni zhes bya ba dri yi mar/ /sa ni so dang lag skyes yin/ /dA ni rgya mtsho
460b5(rgyud): las byung ba/ /s+thi ni kha ba'i snying po yin/ /ta zhes bya ba ga bur te/ /byang chub sems las byung ba yi/ /rtag tu ye shes dam pa mchog /rtsa rnams thams cad yang
460b6(rgyud): dag 'dus/ /de dag lha mo khyod la bstan/ /gsang sogs rnal 'byor ba yi rdzas/ /bshad dang gci sogs lnga la bya/ /khams rnams sdud pa'i sde tshan ni/ /de ltar bcud len
460b7(rgyud): bsten pa yin/ /mkha' 'gro kun dngos chags pa yi/ /sems dpa' rdo rje las byung ba/ /pad+ma 'byed pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /pad+ma gar dbang zhes bya ste/ /steng du gsal bar 'phro
461a1(rgyud): bas na| |rdo rje nyi ma zhes bya la/ /'di ni gsal zhing 'bar bas na/ /rnam snang mdzad chen thub pa'ang yin/ /rlung ni sna tshogs las byung ba/ /khyad
461a2(rgyud): par spyod pas rta mchog yin/ /rnam shes rdo rje sems dpa' ste/ /phan tshun gnyis med rang bzhin no/ /gnas der nyi ma nub pa yi/ /sprul pa'i sku yi gzugs kyi bdag /
461a3(rgyud): lha dang mi yi bde ba ni/ /bsdus byas rnyog pa med pa ste/ /'khor ba'i lam ni gcod pa po/ /spros pa thams cad nyer zhi ba'i/ /rdo rje sems dpa' he ru ka/ /mkha' 'gro ma
461a4(rgyud): kun sgra ru bshad/ /yang na mkha' 'gro ma kun gyi sgra ni/ rab gtum mo la sogs pa la bya la/ dngos bo ni/ rang bzhin te/ de rnams kyi rdul phra rab las
461a5(rgyud): bsgrubs pa'o/ /de nyid sems can gyi don la nus pa dang ldan pa'i phyir sems dpa'i sgrar brjod de/ mi shes pa'i ri bo 'joms pas na/ ye shes nyid ni/ rdo rje'o/ /
461a6(rgyud): sems dpa' rnam pa gnyis gsungs te/ /snod dang bcud kyi 'jig rten no/ /bcud ni rgyu ba zhes bshad la/ /de bzhin snod ni brtan pa'o/ /re re zhing yang gnyis gnyis
461a7(rgyud): te| |skal pa bzang dang skal ngan no/ /sa dang chu dang me rlung gi /gzugs ni rnam pa bzhi ru gnas/ /'di ni zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das de nyid rang byung bas na/
461b1(rgyud): rang byung bcom ldan 'das so/ /rang byung ba zhes bya ba ni/ 'byung ba chen po rjes su dpag pa'i rang bzhin gyi phyir ro/ /bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni/ dbang phyug la sogs
461b2(rgyud): pa'i yon tan dang ldan pas so/ /yang na nyon mongs pa'i bdud bcom pas na/ bcom ldan 'das te/ rang byung bcom ldan 'das de nyid lhag pa'i lha ni/ gcig nyid de/
461b3(rgyud): lha nyid yin zhing lhag pa nyid kyi phyir lhag pa'i lha ste/ lhag pa'i lha'i sgrar gang sngar bstan pa'i khams rnams kyi nang na gtso bo dang dam par gyur pa ste/ phung po dang
461b4(rgyud): khams dang skye mched rnams yang dag par skyed par byed pa'i khu ba dang khrag go / mchog tu bde ba de las skyes shing byung bas na/ gnas te/ nges 'byung ni/ sems
461b5(rgyud): skyed pa'i bzhed gzhung gsungs pa'o/ /sgra ni/ dbyangs te/ shes rab kyi dbyangs kyi rjes su 'jug pa'o/ /tshul ni/ sgrar brtags pa ste/ de las byung ba'o/ /bsten cing
461b6(rgyud): bsnyen par bya bas na/ dam tshig ste/ yul can gyis yang dag par bzhag pa'i gzugs la sogs pa'i yul rnams dang / don dam par dbyer med pas nye bar brtags
461b7(rgyud): nas yul can dbang po la yang yul zhes bya'o/ /spyod pa ni/ dbang po bcu gnyis po de rnams kyi nye bar rgyu ba ste/ de rnams kyis rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin byang chub
462a1(rgyud): kyi sems thob pa ni/ spyod yul lo/ /'jig rten gsum du rnyed dka' ba zhes bya ba ni/ zag pa dang bcas pa'i dngos po gsum las
462a2(rgyud): rnyed par mi 'gyur ba'i mtshan nyid de/ thog ma dbus mthar yang dag gnas pa'o/ /de la thog ma ni/ gsang ba ste/ 'di skad ces bya ba sngar 'byung gnas su gyur
462a3(rgyud): pa'i rig pa'o/ /mtha' zhes bya ba ni/ dges pa ste/ thos pa zhes bya ba bsten par bya'o/ /dbus zhes bya ba ni/ mchog ste/ bdag gi zhes bya ba shin tu dam
462a4(rgyud): par gyur pa'o/ /yang dag gnas ni/ thams cad bdag nyid de/ dus gcig na zhes bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das ma sgyu ma chen mo de nyid ngan par spyod pa ste/ lo
462a5(rgyud): brgyad pa dang rdo rje pad+mo sbyor bas byung ba'i khrag dang bcas pa'o/ /lha dang mi yi bde ba ni/ /bsdus byas rdo rje rdus kyi ni/ /bcu drug char yang mi phod pa ste/ de la bcu
462a6(rgyud): drug cha ni/ bud med kyi skud pa las byung ba'i khams rnams skud pa bcu drug dang lhan cig tu bsgril ba ste/ chags pa chen po zhes bya ba gang yin pa'o/ /de ltar skud
462a7(rgyud): pa bcu drug dang bsgril ba'i cha shas bcu drug go / bsdus byas zhes bya ba bdud rtsi lnga'i snying po'o/ /gong bur byas pa ste/ bdud rtsi lnga'i sbyor bar gyur pa'o/ /dang zhes bya
462b1(rgyud): ba ni| bsdu ba'i don te/ sde tshan rnams kyis bsdus shing bstan pa'i khams gang dang gang yin pa'i rlan de dang de sa bon dang bsgril te rtag par bya'o/ /lha'i bde ba zhes bya ba
462b2(rgyud): ni| de bdud rtsi ltar yongs su smin pas rang gi sku rdo rjer gyur pa'i skad cig go/ /mi'i yin pas na/ mi'i ste/ nges par gsal ba'i bde ba'o/ /de yang dngos grub thams
462b3(rgyud): cad kyi rang bzhin rtag tu gsal bas mtshan pa'o/ /chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam par sbyor ba'i sems kyi rdo rje mngon du bya zhing bde ba bsten pa las bde ba nyid du skye
462b4(rgyud): bar 'gyur te/ ther zug tu bde ba ster bas so/ /de yang dper na/ mngar pos bsgos pa'i sa bon ni/ /mngar po nyid ni bsten pa dang / /gang phyir mngar pos bskyed byas
462b5(rgyud): na| |de yi ro ni mngar por 'gyur/ /de bzhin du chos kyi bdud rtsi las byung ba'i bde ba bsten na/ bde ba 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /de dang mnyam pa dngos po gsum po
462b6(rgyud): gang du yang yod pa ma yin te/ cha shas kun dang mtshungs ba lta zhog /de'i rdul phra rab kyi cha dang mtshungs pa yang yod pa ma yin no/ /rdul phra rab ni/ rdo rje phra mo'i
462b7(rgyud): rang bzhin te/ byang chub kyi sems bde ba'i bdag nyid spros pa'o/ /mthu dang ngo bo nyid dag dang / /rang bzhin gyis ni grub pa ste/ /de yi rang bzhin gtam dag ni/ /bzhin mdzes
463a1(rgyud): ma ni khyod la bshad/ /gang zhig phyi rol sbyor ba dga'/ /bcu drug char yang mi phod do/ /sbyor ba'i mchog ni 'di mthong ngo / /de dag 'bus zos
463a2(rgyud): rtswa dang 'dra/ /da ni chu skyes chen po'i yon tan dang ldan pa'i gnas phun sum tshogs pa bshad par bya ste/ mi gsal brda yi tshul gyis ni/ /gnas ni gsang zhes byar
463a3(rgyud): bshad| |mi gsal pa yi dngos por ni/ /brda yi skad kyis bshad pa yin/ /'di ni rtog pa la brten nas/ /gnas ni gsang ba bshad par bya/ /dgon chen zhes bya ba la
463a4(rgyud): sogs pa ni/ sgra ji bzhin no/ /gzhan yang dgon chen zhes bya ba ni/ shes rab ste/ sngags kyi yon tan gyi shing gi tshogs dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa'i phyir ro//
463a5(rgyud): de nyid rang bzhin gyis lha'i bdag nyid bas na sa phyogs so/ /rigs mtha' yas pa'i rang bzhin gyi phyir mang po'i tshig go/ /bdag dang sems can la sogs par
463a6(rgyud): rtog pa dang bral bar rnam par dben pa ste/ lta ba ngan pa rnams kyis gzhig par mi nus pa'i phyir ri bo'o/ /'jug par dka' ba'i phyir ri bo'o/ /zang cing rgya che ba'i
463a7(rgyud): shes rab kyi chu bo'i gnas su gyur pas rgya mtsho chen po'i 'gram rnams so/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad dang / sbyin pa la sogs pa'i rang bzhin rnam
463b1(rgyud): par dag pas gdod nas grub pa ste/ nyan thos la sogs pa'i byang chub 'dod chags kyi mes bsregs pas dur khrod do/ /de ltar na me long lta bu la sogs pa lnga rnam par
463b2(rgyud): dag pas gnas rnam pa lngar bsgrags so/ /chung ngu ni/ dang por lo bcu gcig ma'i pad+ma dang 'ol pas bcud kyis len bsgrub par bya'o/ /gnyis par lo bcu gnyis
463b3(rgyud): ma dang rol pas ni/ dam tshig don du gnyer bar bya'o/ /gsum par lo bcu drug ma dang lhan cig tu dga' bas ni/ sngags rnams goms par bya'o/ /bzhi par lo
463b4(rgyud): nyi shu ma dang nam mkhar 'phur ba bsgrub par bya'o/ /lnga par lo nyi shu rtsa lnga ma dang dbang bskur bar bya ba'i bar du'o/ /de ltar na/ dbugs dbyung mchog dang bar ma dang //
463b5(rgyud): zhes bya ba gnas lnga po de dag dang rim pa bzhin du sbyar ro/ /de la rigs ldan rnams ni/ rdo rje rigs kyi bu mo la sogs pa rnams dri yi chus mchod par bya ste/ bcas pa
463b6(rgyud): zhes bya ba ni/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i me tog bzung la mkhas pas rang gi khu ba dang bcas pas mchod do/ /rtag tu zhes bya ba ni/ thams cad du rgyun mi 'chad par te/ dus kyi
463b7(rgyud): khyad par zhes bya ba snga dro'i dus su'o/ /gzhan yang lhan cig skyes grub zhes bya ba thun mong gi dngos grub dang ldan zhing sgrub pa po la brtse ba ste/ thig le des sangs rgyas
464a1(rgyud): dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams mchod par bya'o/ /gzhan yang dgon pa chen po zhes bya ba ni/ bud med kyi phyag rgya ste/ 'dod chags la
464a2(rgyud): sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa'i nags tshal dang ldan pa'i phyir ro/ /de nyid thabs kyis yongs su sbyangs nas byang chub kyi lam ste/ yongs su sbyangs pa ni/ mthar thug
464a3(rgyud): par son pa'o/ /de'i d+harmo da ya ni/ sa phyogs te/ de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bsngags pa'i rdo rje rigs la sogs pa'i bu mo bas na/ rnam
464a4(rgyud): par dben pa'o/ /de nyid bde ba chen pos mi g.yo bas na/ ri bo'o/ /sems can dman pas 'jug pa dka' bas na/ ri bor te/ phug dang ldan pas na/ tshang
464a5(rgyud): tshing ngo / /thabs dang shes rab snyoms par 'jug pa'i rgya mtshor gnas pas rgya mtsho'i 'gram ste/ sems can thams cad kyi rgyud kyi rgyud la mnyam par gnas
464a6(rgyud): pas na/ dur khrod do/ /gdod nas grub pa ni/ rtag tu grub pa ste/ 'char ba dang nub pa spangs shing nam mkha' ltar yongs su grub pas rtag tu bde ba chen po'i tshul
464a7(rgyud): gyis dmigs pas de'i rang bzhin du byas pa'o/ /ni zhes bya ba ni/ 'dus pa ste/ de dang ldan pa'i phyir ro/ /sna tshogs pad+ma ras kyis g.yogs zhes bya ba la/ sna tshogs
464b1(rgyud): ni| rnam pa du ma ste/ pad+ma ni/ gzugs kyi tshig bla dwags so/ /ras ni/ gsal bar ma byas pa ste/ g.yogs pa ni/ shin tu ma mngon par byas pa'o/ /stan ni/ rig
464b2(rgyud): pa nyid gdan du byas pa ste/ dag pa ni/ 'jam pa'o/ /lha mo rnams kyi pad+ma rang gi mtshan ma'i gos kyi rgyan gyis rgyan pa'o/ /bzhag pa ni/ mchod bar bya ba ste/ yang dang yang
464b3(rgyud): du 'dod pas mnyes par bya ba'o/ /sdom pa ni/ bde ba'i mchog go/ /pad+ma'i khrag dang zhes bya ba ni/ de bzhin du khrag ni/ bcud kyis len pa ste/ khrag ni/ pad+ma yin
464b4(rgyud): la| bshang ba la sogs pa ni/ bcud kyis len no/ /des 'di skad du bstan par 'gyur te/ khrag chen ga bur bcas pa dang / /tsan+dan dmar por sbyar ba dag /tshogs
464b5(rgyud): kyi nang du zhugs pa na/ ra sa ya na bla na med/ /ces bya ba la/ khrag chen ni/ dus su 'bab pa'i zla mtshan du gyur pa'o/ /tsan+dan dmar po ni/ sha ste/ de dang bcas
464b6(rgyud): pa'o/ /chags kyi nang du zhugs pa ni/ dbang po thams cad las byung ba ste/ de dag thams cad kyi bcud ni/ ra sa ya na'o/ /bza' bar bya ba la cho ga gang gis bza'
464b7(rgyud): par bya zhe na/ sbom po'am mtha' ltag ces bya ba la/ sbom po ni/ rdo rje'o/ /mtha' ltag ni/ b+ha ga ste/ A nA ma zhes bya ba ming gis bsnyad pa'i phyir ro/ /khar zhes bya
465a1(rgyud): bya ba ni/ de nyid kyi khas rang gi lha'i khar ro/ /de yang / dang po bla mar dbul byas te/ /de nas sangs rgyas rnams la dbul/ /phyag rgya la ni byin
465a2(rgyud): nas su| |zhi ba'i btung ba bzhin du myang / /mchod pa bzhi zhes bya ba la/ /byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa'i rim pa sgom pa pos ni/ dus bzhir mkha' 'gro ma la sogs
465a3(rgyud): pa'i lha mo dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo bzhi'i bdag nyid can ji srid stong pa nyid kyi nga rgyal nas bzung ste gzugs yongs su rdzogs pa'i bar du nges par byas
465a4(rgyud): pas mchod par bya'o/ /dpa' bo dang ni snyoms 'jug pa/ /zhes bya ba ni/ gzhan yongs su rdzogs pa'i rim pa la gnas pa'i sgom pa po'i ste/ dus kyi nges
465a5(rgyud): pa med cing thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i nga rgyal gyis rtag tu gnas pa rnams kyis ci zhig bya zhe na/ yid ni nang du chud pa'i ste/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
465a6(rgyud): kyi skyed ma mo'i shes rab dang ji lta ba bzhin du mnyam par sbyor ba dang ldan pas mchog tu dga' ba rnam par spro ste/ gnas pas tshim par bya zhes bya ba'i bar
465a7(rgyud): du'o| |de ltar mchod pas mchog dang bar ma ste/ tha ma ni/ chags pa chen po'i tshul lo/ /de yang rdo rje can gyis thams cad bsdus nas btsun mo'i b+ha ga bde ba
465b1(rgyud): can du spros la/ der ni dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/ zhes bya ba dang sbyar ba ste/ gzhan gyi de kho na nyid ji bzhin du bstan pa'o/ /bar ma ni/ bdag gi de kho na nyid rdo rje'i
465b2(rgyud): 'dzin pas 'khor lo thams cad rang gi dbus su bsdus la/ rdo rje kun gyi rang bzhin du byas pa cho ga des bsgoms pa ni/ mchog go/ bud med kun gyi sgyu ma zhes bya
465b3(rgyud): bya ba la| bud med kun ni gzugs la sogs pa'o/ /sgyu ma ni/ yon tan te/ rang bzhin gyis sku la sogs pas gnas pa'o/ /sgyu ma ste/ yon tan gyi rgyus ma lus
465b4(rgyud): pa sgyu ma'i don du gsungs so/ /ma lus pa ni/ cha shas te/ cha dang bcas pa'o/ /cha ni dngos por bstan pa ste/ /cha med yon tan zhes bya yin/ /yon tan yon tan
465b5(rgyud): can sbyar ba/ /yul dang dbang po rab tu dge /A li kA li yon tan gsungs/ /mnyam pa dam tshig spyod yul yin/ /de nyid ni/ mtshan ma yin pas na/ phyag rgya ste/
465b6(rgyud): 'di ni zhes bya ba ni/ 'dzin pa po'i blos mngon du byas pa'o/ /yon tan des rtag tu yon tan dang ldan par gyur pa'i ring po la sogs pa gnyis su med pa'i tshul nyid
465b7(rgyud): mchog ste/ bla na med cing dam par gyur pa'o/ /de yang lugs ma la sogs pa gzhan dag las phul du byung bar rang bzhin gyis grub pa'i phyir ro/ /rang bzhin gyis
466a1(rgyud): grub pa ni/ 'gyur ba med pa'i mtshan nyid dang / ngo bo nyid rnam par dag pa ste/ ji ltar 'o ma la zho la sogs pa bzhin no/ /de bas na/
466a2(rgyud): bcos ma las bye brag tu gyur ba'o/ /gzhan yang / ngan par spyod pa'ang 'grub par 'gyur/ /rnyed dang bde dang dga' kun gyis/ /zhes bya ba la/ rnyed pa ni/ byang chub
466a3(rgyud): kyi sems rnyed pa ste/ de nyid dga' ba kun gyis khyad par du 'phel bas yin gyi/ slong mos 'tsho ba la sogs pa dang / dka' thub kyi sbyor ba la sogs pa ni/ mi
466a4(rgyud): mthun pa'i phyogs yin pas nam yang 'grub par mi 'gyur te/ spang bar bya'o/ /des zhes bya ba ni/ grub pa'i rdzas kyis te/ khyad par ji lta bu zhig ce na/ rang bzhin
466a5(rgyud): dang ngo bo nyid kyis grub pa ste/ rang bzhin gyis sngags kyi yi ge yongs su gyur pa las rang gi lha'i gzugs su yongs su brje ba ste/ sngags bzlas pa dang / rang gi sa
466a6(rgyud): bon yongs su gyur pa las rang bzhin yongs su brje ba'o/ /sna tshogs zhes bya ba ni/ khams kyi rang bzhin te/ mkha' 'gro ma rnam pa bco brgyad du phye ba yin gyi/
466a7(rgyud): b+hu ba la sogs pa'i khams ni/ ma yin no/ /nam mkha' kun tu rgyu grub pa/ /zhes bya ba la/ nam mkha' sgras ni/ sems la bya ste/ ji ltar nam mkha'i khams
466b1(rgyud): la sogs pa thams cad kyi gnas su gyur pa bzhin du thams cad kyi go skabs ster ba'i phyir ro/ /yang na nyan thos la sogs pa'i gnas bsregs pas na/ nam mkha'
466b2(rgyud): ste| nam mkha' der bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin gyis rgyu zhing spyod pas na/ de ni/ nam mkha' kun tu rgyu grub pas/ /mkha' 'gro ma zhes rab tu grags/ /zhes so/ /sna tshogs
466b3(rgyud): kun tu phyag rgya ste/ /zhes bya ba la/ kun tu ni/ sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje'i rigs thams cad do/ /sna tshogs ni/ rdo rje 'dzin chen po ste/ de'i phyag rgya ni/ dkyil 'khor
466b4(rgyud): gyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgya thams cad do/ /nges na sna tshogs phyag rgya ste/ sems kyi rang bzhin gyis zla ba dang dmar po'i grub pa'i rdzas de dag nyi shu rtsa lnga'i bar tu rtag tu
466b5(rgyud): goms par bya bas stobs su gyur pa'o/ /sna tshogs sdom pa ni/ rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i bde ba grub pa ste/ mkha' 'gro kun zhes bya ba khrag dang mnyam par sbyor
466b6(rgyud): ba'i cho gas sngags pa rdo rje mkha' 'gro zhes bya bar grags pa ste/ rang nyid skyes par gyur pa'o/ /de nyid med sems ni/ de kho na nyid kyi sems med pa ste/ phyin ci
466b7(rgyud): log gi sems kyis sbyor ba'o/ /lha la dmigs pa ni/ 'dod pa'i lhar sgom pa'o/ /shin tu de nyid sems zhes bya ba ni/ de kho na nyid kyi sems kyis brgyan pa ste/ phyin
467a1(rgyud): ci ma log pa'i mtshan nyid do/ /de yang khrag la sogs pa'i khams sangs rgyas rnams kyi rang bzhin gyi de kho na nyid de/ dngos grub thams cad kyi
467a2(rgyud): gnas so/ /lugs ma la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor ni/ de spangs nas bcos ma sgom par byed pa ste/ gang gi phyir gzugs brnyan ma yin pas so/ /des ni/ 'di skad
467a3(rgyud): bstan par 'gyur te/ ji ltar smin pa'i 'bras bu bor nas shing gi rtsa ba len par byed pa bzhin du rnal ma bor te bcos ma la chags pa yang blo gros dman zhing shin tu
467a4(rgyud): blun par ston to/ /des na de kho na nyid kyi sems kyis phun sum tshogs pas bdag nyid sbyor zhing rdzogs pa'i rim pas sangs rgyas kyi sku la dmigs pa ni/ mchog tu
467a5(rgyud): mi 'gyur ba'i ye shes 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /ye shes de nyid ni/ mchog tu mi 'gyur ba ste/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i phyir ro/ /des na gzhan yang gzugs brnyan
467a6(rgyud): dang lugs ma la sogs pa spangs te khams sna tshogs kyi shes pa nyid sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus par brtag par bya'o/ /lha yi rnal 'byor dus su ni/ /ba spu rnams
467a7(rgyud): kyi bu ga nas/ /zhes bya ba la/ ba spu ni/ lte ba'i dkyil 'khor te/ bu ga ni/ nam mkha'o/ /rtse mo'i bar zhes bya ba ni/ yi ge bcu drug yongs su gyur pa'i khams
467b1(rgyud): rnams te/ spro ba dam tshig dkyil 'khor te/ /rnal 'byor pas ni rtag tu bsgom/ /dam tshig dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba/ /rang gi pad+ma'i lte dbus su/ /zla bar gnas pa'i hUM
467b2(rgyud): yin te| |sangs rgyas bye ba stong phrag ni/ /phyogs bcu dag tu spro bar byed/ /thig le bcu drug thig skud kyi/ /sngags pas thig gis thig btab pa'i/ /lto ba'i dkyil 'khor
467b3(rgyud): bcu drug par/ /a sogs k+Sha yi mthar thug pa/ /tha ma las ni sngags btu bya/ /phyi nas thig ler cha dang bral/ /bshang dang gci ba'i rang bzhin pas/ /'di ru k+Sha ni spangs bar
467b4(rgyud): bya| |yi ge ha ni yongs gyur pas/ /yi ge thams cad yal ga 'dra/ /'di ni rang byung bcom ldan 'das/ /gcig pu nyid ni lhag pa'i lha/ /sangs rgyas kun dngos stong pa yi/ /
467b5(rgyud): yi ge nyid ni mkha' 'gro ma/ /zhes bya ba ni/ sngags kyi man ngag go/ /ka sogs yang dag gnas ba yi/ /yi ge lha yi gzugs yin te/ /a sogs dbyangs rnams thams
467b6(rgyud): cad kyi| |sngags kyis sgeg cing brgyan pa yin/ /lha pa'i lha ni yi ge hUM/ /lte ba'i dbus su bsam par bya/ /lte ba pad+ma zhes bya ste/ /bsam pa bsgom par bya ba yin/ /
467b7(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun dngos stong pa nyid/ /rnam shes hUM gi gzugs nyid do/ /yi ge nyid ni mkha' 'gro ma/ /sgra yi gzugs kyis gnas pa'o/ /gang phyir gzhan yang 'di dag ni/
468a1(rgyud): ji ltar sangs rgyas kun de bzhin/ /'di ni rtag tu 'don pa dang / /sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs la gnas/ /mgo dang thig le rnam spangs pa/ /
468a2(rgyud): gcig pu nyid ni lhag pa'i lha/ /rang gi dbus gnas rdo rje can/ /yi ge rnams kyis yongs su bskor/ /de kho na nyid snang ba dam pa'i yul la 'jug pa zhes bya ba
468a3(rgyud): la| ye shes ni/ spyod yul yongs su shes pa'o/ /yongs su shes pa zhes bya ba ni/ kun nas shes pa'i ye shes te/ de nyid kyis ni/ bdag nyid sangs rgyas thams
468a4(rgyud): cad do| |bdag nyid ces bya ba ni/ kun rdzob ste/ kun rdzob yongs su shes pa ni/ sangs rgyas nyid do/ /de nyid kyis sangs rgyas dang rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid du 'grub bo/ /thabs
468a5(rgyud): gang gis she na/ de kho na nyid snang ba zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/ /mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin
468a6(rgyud): gshegs/ /bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las/ gsang ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa de kho na nyid 'byung ba'i
468a7(rgyud): rim par phye ba ste bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis pa'o/ / //sbyin sreg las kyi cho ga ni/ /ji bzhin bshad kyi lha mo nyon/ /rgyal srid phyir ni sngags pa yis/ /stong
468b1(rgyud): phrag bcur ni bzla bar bya/ /pho nya'i steng du gnas nas ni/ /sbyin sreg stong phrag lnga ni bya/ /sha chen 'o ma la bsgres pa/ /rim pa 'di yis bsregs na ni/ /dpag tshad 'bum
468b2(rgyud): phrag brgya yi bar/ /tshun chad pho brang rnyed par 'gyur/ /dpal ldan rgyal srid che grub pa/ /sus kyang gzhig par mi nus so/ /mi dang ba lang lce spyang shas/ /de bzhin ngo mtshar
468b3(rgyud): mchog 'gyur te/ /chang dang 'o mar sbags nas ni/ /sbyin sreg 'bum phrag gcig byas na/ /gling bdun la ni dbang ba yi/ /rgyal srid longs spyod dpal chen 'gyur/ /de nas
468b4(rgyud): mtshams med lnga byed pa/ /gang gi gzhom par 'dod pa des/ /dug dang khrag dang mar nag bcas/ /mi yi rus pa bsregs byas te/ /tsher ma can gyi shing dang ni/ /de
468b5(rgyud): bzhin phub ma mi skrar bcas/ /shan pa yi ni me sbar la/ /gcer bu skra ni lhug pa yis/ /lho phyogs su ni kha bltas te/ /khro dang bcas pas nyan phyed na/ /sems mi g.yengs
468b6(rgyud): bas sreg pa'am/ /yang na gos sngon gyon nas su/ /mtshan phyed na ni bsreg par bya/ /sngags kyi mthar ni ming dang sbyar/ /dgra bo stobs dang ldan pa yang / /dpung dang bcas
468b7(rgyud): par brlag 'gyur na/ /phal pa la lta ci zhig smos/ /de nas dgra bo stobs kyis ni/ /dregs pa bskrad pa'i cho ga bshad/ /khwa yi gshog pa zhag dang ni/ /nim pa'i khu bar
469a1(rgyud): bsregs pa dag / sha za'i shing la me sbar te/ /rlung du bltas te bsregs byas na/ /mtshan mo bdun ni tshun chad kyis/ /bskrad 'gyur 'dir ni the
469a2(rgyud): tshom med/ /de nas dbye ba bshad par bya/ /smyo byed me ni 'bar ba la/ /nim pa yi ni lo ma dang / /sprul gyi pags par bsres byas la/ /bya rog dang ni 'ug pa yi/ /tshang
469a3(rgyud): gi shing dang bcas pa dag / brgya rtsa brgyad du bsregs nas ni/ /mdza' shes gnyen 'dun bcas pa dag /skye bo thams cad sdang bar 'gyur/ /de nas dgug pa bshad bya
469a4(rgyud): ste| |bsgrub bya shing gi stan la ni/ /rol par bcas shing g.yo dang bcas/ /rlung gis gdong ni steng du lta/ /li khri lta bu'i mdog tu bsam/ /zhags pa lcags kyu'i
469a5(rgyud): sbyor ba yis/ /sngags kyi mthar ni dza bzlas te/ /bsgrub bya'i snying gi pad+ma dbug /bud med yin na skye gnas dbug khams gsum 'grub par gdon mi za/ /de
469a6(rgyud): nas cho ga gzhan bshad pa/ /dgug pa la sogs ji bzhin 'byung / /dum bu gcig pa'i thod pa ni/ /gzugs mdzes ma chags ma gas la/ /bsgrub par bya ba'i
469a7(rgyud): gzugs bris te/ /'dab ma rlon pa brgya la ni/ /khrag dang go ro tsa nar bcas/ /d+ha du ra yi smyu gu yis/ /sngags ni ming dang bcas par bri/ /thod pa'i nang du bzhag
469b1(rgyud): nas su| |bsgrub bya dmar po ras kyis g.yogs/ /sngags kyi nga rgyal bsgyings nas su/ /'dab ma re re bzung nas ni/ /go ldog snying po'i gsang sngags ni/ /zlos shing 'dab ma
469b2(rgyud): thams cad bsregs/ /yid la bsam bzhin 'gugs par 'gyur/ /de nas gzhan yang tsan+dan ni/ /dmar las bsgrub bya'i gzugs byas la/ /rang khrag go ro tsa nar
469b3(rgyud): bcas| |ming bris bsgrub bya'i snying gar gzhug / tsha ba gsum gyis byugs nas su/ /snying ga lte ba gsang ba'i gnas/ /zangs ma'i khab kyis dbugs byas nas//
469b4(rgyud): mtshan phyed na ni 'dod bzhin 'gug /gser btsag gis ni skye gnas kyi/ /gzugs bris de yi steng du ni/ /lag pa g.yon pa bzhag byas la/ /brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas
469b5(rgyud): na ni| |gang gi ming nas gzung gyur pa/ /de ni de mod 'ong bar 'gyur/ /rlung gis btsugs pa'i shing lo la/ /khwa yi sgo yi smyu gu yis/ /ming dang bcas pa'i 'khrul
469b6(rgyud): 'khor ni/ /mchi ma las ni bris nas su/ /gyen du ldang ba'i tshug par bskur/ /cho ga des ni bskrad par 'gyur/ /spre'u'i rus pa'i phur bu ni/ /sor drug pa yi tshang du
469b7(rgyud): bya| |sngags ni lan bdun bzlas nas su/ /gang gi khyim sgor sbas na ni/ /de yi rigs ni chad par 'gyur/ /ba lang rta dang glang chen dang / /bong bu rnga mo ma he yi/ /
470a1(rgyud): gnas su sbas na brlag par 'gyur/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i/ /bsgrub bya rnga mo'i steng du bskyon/ /gcer bu mar khus byugs pa
470a2(rgyud): dang / skra grol kha ni lho ru bltas/ /skyabs med du zhing brgyal bar bsam/ /mgrin pa zhags pas bcings nas su/ /rgyab nas khro bos rdeg byed cing / khams gsum gnon
470a3(rgyud): pa'i bsam pa yis/ /me yi mtshams su gdong bltas ste/ /sngags kyi mthar ni dza bzlas na/ /ji ltar 'dod bzhin 'grub par 'gyur/ /rta dang ma her zhon pa yis/ /dgra bo
470a4(rgyud): nang ni phan tshun du/ /mtshon cha thogs nas khros nas ni/ /phan tshun dpung dang bcas pa ru/ /'thab mo byed pa bsgom par bya/ /sngags pa g.yul du kha bltas te/ /de yi
470a5(rgyud): ming dang spel pa yi/ /yi ge ra ni bri bar bya/ /gdong gi steng du bltas par bsam/ /sgrub po ro yi steng du ni/ /rdo rje skyil krung mi g.yor gnas/ /de yis bsgrub bya mnan
470a6(rgyud): nas su| |lus dang ngag ni gzir bar bya/ /sngags ni ming dang spel ba ru/ /snga ma bzhin du bzla bar bya/ /bcing ba'i cho ga'o/ /mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /rdo
470a7(rgyud): rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog / rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las/ las thams
470b1(rgyud): cad kyi bsam gtan 'byung ba dang / sbyin sreg gi cho ga'i rim par phye ba ste bzhi cu rtsa gsum pa'o// //de ni sbyin sreg cho ga gzhan/ /rab tu bshad kyi lha mo nyon//
470b2(rgyud): sgeg pa 'am ni gzhan yang rung / /rma med shin tu mdzes pa ni/ /'byung po'i nyin zhag la rnyed pa/ /sgrub pos sngar bshad bzhin bsgrubs na/ /dngos grub thams cad rab tu
470b3(rgyud): 'grub| |zla mtshan phyis pa'i ras ma ni/ /byi la'i rtug par bcas pa dag /zhib tu brdungs pas bdug pa bya/ /bdug pa 'di yis sgrub pa po/ /shin tu byin gyis rlob par
470b4(rgyud): 'gyur| |khyi mo nag mo'i 'o ma dang / /ma sha 'bras bu bcas pa las/ /'o thug byas te ro yi khar/ /'jigs pa med par sbyin sreg bya/ /de nas ro de langs nas ni/ /ci bgyi
470b5(rgyud): zhes ni smra 'gyur te/ /ril bu mig sman dngos grub dang / rkang byug ral gri de bzhin te/ /gter dang dgra bo tshar gcod dang / /gnod sbyin mo dang bcud kyis len/ /gang bslangs
470b6(rgyud): gcig ni byin nas su/ /'gro bar 'gyur gyi gzhan du min/ /dpa' bo rnams dang rtse 'gyur ba/ /gzhan dag tu ni nga mi smra/ /de nas ro langs chen po yi/ /sgrub thabs gzhan ni
470b7(rgyud): bshad par bya/ /sngar bstan mtshan nyid ldan pa yi/ /ro ni mdzes pa bzung nas ni/ /rnal 'byor chen por legs gnas pa/ /mtshan phyed na ni bsgoms nas su/ /de yi sha ni
471a1(rgyud): dmar chen bcas/ /sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad byas na/ /dpal ldan rdo rje phag mo ni/ /mkha' 'gro ma yis bskor gyur cing / /ro langs srin po du
471a2(rgyud): mas bskor/ /ha har bzhad pas 'jigs byed pa/ /der ni drung du 'ong bar 'gyur/ /lce spyang brgya phrag mang po ni/ /bskor nas 'jigs pa'i sgra sgrog byed/ /de mthong 'jigs
471a3(rgyud): par mi bya ste/ /sngags kyis bsgyings pa'i lus su bya/ /rdo rje brtul zhugs bdag nyid sems/ /kye ho dpa' bo chen po legs/ /lha mo de skad brjod nas ni/ /sgrub po
471a4(rgyud): yid la gang 'dod pa'i/ /dngos grub brgya yang ster bar 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor ma yis yongs bskor te/ /dpa' bo rang gi gnas su 'gro/ /de ni de yi mod la yang //
471a5(rgyud): lha yi lus su gyur nas ni/ /khams gsum kun tu rgyu bar 'gyur/ /dpa' bo 'dod pa'i gzugs can te/ /skal bzang de bzhin gshegs pa 'dra/ /rtag tu nam
471a6(rgyud): mkhar 'phur ba dang / /rga dang 'chi ba rnam par spong / /sa gzhi kun tu rgyu 'gyur zhing / /ji ltar 'dod bzhin dngos grub 'jug /de nas nyon mongs zhi bya dang / /ting nge 'dzin ni
471a7(rgyud): rgyas bya'i phyir/ /rang gi lha yi sbyor bar gnas/ /nang gi sbyin sreg brtsam par bya/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /bdag nyid rtag tu bsam par bya/ /'od zer
471b1(rgyud): phreng ba 'khrugs shing drag / 'od kyi dkyil 'khor phreng ba can/ /phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i rgyal ba ni/ /stong gsum stong gi rdul mtshungs pa/ kha dog dkar la sogs
471b2(rgyud): bkug ste/ /lus mchog de la gzhug par bya/ /'di ni zhi ba'i sbyin sreg yin/ /rgyas la byang chub sems dpa' dgug /rengs pa'i gzugs su lhag par mos/ /shin
471b3(rgyud): tu nyon mongs zad bya'i phyir/ khyad par khro bo'i gzugs su bya/ /sna tshogs rjes su chags bya'i phyir/ /bud med kyi ni gzugs su bsam/ /'di ni nang gi sbyin sreg tu//
471b4(rgyud): sgrub po kun la bstan pa yin/ /phung po la sogs bud shing ni/ /las kyi rlung gis bskyod pa yi/ /lte ba'i dkyil 'khor nas 'bar ba/ /ye shes me la bsreg par bya//
471b5(rgyud): tshangs pa'i me ni sked par gnas/ /la la nA ni dgang gzar te/ /ra sa nA ni blug gzar kha/ /dbyug pa rdo rje rin chen 'og /rang gi rdo rje mtha' yi bar/ /thod pa bsreg rdzas
471b6(rgyud): snod yin te/ /rdzas rnams thams cad bsreg par bya/ /'di ni bla med sbyin sreg gi /go cha'i rim pa nyid yin te/ /lha mo khyod la bshad pa yin/ /de ltar byas na ting 'dzin
471b7(rgyud): ni| |nyams par mi 'gyur brtan 'gyur bar/ /rgyud rnams kun las thun mong du/ /cho ga 'dis ni rab tu grags/ /mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro
472a1(rgyud): bde ba'i mchog / rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las/
472a2(rgyud): ro langs sgrub pa dang / nang gi sbyin sreg gi cho ga'i rim par phye ba ste bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi pa'o// //bgrang phreng cho ga ji bzhin du/ /rab tu bshad kyi lha mo nyon//
472a3(rgyud): yang dag cho ga gang gis ni/ /'di ni grub 'gyur the tshom med/ /shel dang nya phyis mu tig dang / khams kun la sogs gzhan yang rung / /dung dang lung tang mu men ni//
472a4(rgyud): tshe dang nad med 'phel bar byed/ /gser dang de bzhin dngul dang ni/ khyad par pad+ma'i sa bon dang / /rin chen phreng ba mdzes pa ni/ /mkhas pa yis ni bgrangs nas su//
472a5(rgyud): rgyal srid phyir ni sngags bzlas na/ /dpal chen myur du thob par 'gyur/ /gur gum la sogs dri dang ni/ /khyad par du yang byi ru dang / /tsan+dan dmar po dngul la

479a4(rgyud): por 'khrul 'khor 'jug / gso la kha cig 'bras bu dang / kha cig me tog 'dab mar bcas/ /shun pa dang ni rus pa sogs/ /sgrub po nye ba'i longs spyod ni/ /

486a7(rgyud): dang ldan pas bya ba'am/ /rang skyur bar ni ba lang gcin/ /yang na mi yi gci ba'am/ /yang na bong bu'i gcin yang rung / /phaT dang spel ba'i sngags bzlas pa/ /g.yas
486b1(rgyud): kyi phyogs su bzhag nas ni/ /drag po'i las la sbyar bar bya/ /arga'i cho ga'o/ /nad sogs zhi phyir zhi ba ni/ /snying rjer ldan pas dgong mo bya/ /dpa' bo shar du bltas
486b2(rgyud): nas su| |me tog phreng sogs rgyan dang ni/ /bgo ba dag ni dkar por bya/ /'jam pa'i las la gnas nas ni/ /pad+ma'i skyil krung bcas nas su/ /dpal ldan rnam snang mdzad
486b3(rgyud): bsgoms te/ /brtse dang ldan pas mi smra bar/ /bsgrub bya yi ge oM byung ba'i/ /chu yi dkyil 'khor dkar po la/ /seng+ge pad+ma zla ba yis/ /stan la gnas pa dmigs nas su/ /
486b4(rgyud): 'og nas 'byung ba'i rim pa yis/ /sems can kun la phan bya'i phyir/ /swAhA'i mtha' can sngags bzlas la/ /rtag tu zhi ba'i las rnams bya/ /dbul dang ri sogs
486b5(rgyud): rgyas pa'i las/ /dga' dang ldan pas snga dro bya/ /gos ser la sogs brgyan dang ni/ /byang phyogs su ni kha bltas te/ /bzang po yi ni 'dug stangs sam/ /yang na rol pa'i
486b6(rgyud): stabs kyis gnas/ /'bras chan dkar po zho dang ni/ /bca' bza' de nyid rig pa yis/ /bza' dang btung bas tshim nas su/ /rin chen 'byung bar bsgoms nas ni/ /yi
486b7(rgyud): ge laM las byung ba yi/ /dbang chen gyi ni dkyil 'khor la/ /glang chen steng du gnas pa yi/ /bsgrub par bya ba dmigs nas su/ /sngags kyi mthar ni oM brjod cing //

493a1(rgyud): 'dral zhing sid ces bya ba'i sgra dang bcas par sngags pas sngon du bya zhing / gzhan yang nu ma mnye ba la sogs pas de'i rnam par 'dul ba'i bya bde
493a2(rgyud): dag so sor byed pa'i tshul rnams pa brgyad dang sbyar ro/ /sen mo 'debs pa de yang 'jam zhing gzhon nu la ni/ ku sha'i tshad tsam du gdab pa dang dral bar byas te/ rked pa
493a3(rgyud): dang rgyab dang b+ha ga'i steng dang skra dang 'gram pa la sogs pa rnams su 'bras kyi gzegs ma'i tshad tsam gyi ri mo ci rigs par chags pa lhod pa rnams la gdab bo/ /de
493a4(rgyud): yang sen mo 'ba' zhig ni/ ma yin gyi/ 'o bya ba la sogs pa rnams kyis tshim par bya'o/ /gang zhig chags pa sra ba rnams la ni/ sor mo'i ring po gsum sprul gyi
493a5(rgyud): mgo ltar byas la mo mchan gyi bu gar bcug nas sid ces bya ba'i sngags 'byung gi bar du brud par byas pas/ rgyan mo la sogs pa tshim par bya ba ni/ rdo rje sor
493a6(rgyud): mo zhes bya'o/ /gang zhig gzhon zhing mnyen pa rnams la ni/ rang gi mtshan ma dang / 'od dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems 'bab pa'i rtsar lce bcug ste bsgril ba
493a7(rgyud): tsam gyis dga' bar bya ste/ /rdo rje lce'i thur ma zhes bya'o/ /de ltar sgrub pa pos yang dang yang du bsgul bas snying 'dar ba dang / dga' bas myos shing sems kyi rdul
493b1(rgyud): phra mo'i chu 'dzag la/ ngo tsha la sogs pa dang bral te ba spu langs nas shin tu chags pas lta zhing 'khyud pa la gus par gyur cing sid ces zer ba dang / de nas skyil krung
493b2(rgyud): bcings la rdo rje dang pad+mo mnyam par sbyor bas do la dang / ku rab na dang / pu rtsi dang / ud k+Sha pa dang / su phra sa ri dang / gra ma na ga ra dang / phreng khen dang / u ru spo ta zhes bya ba la
493b3(rgyud): sogs pa ji snyed bstan bcos thams cad las byung ba'i ka ra na bsten par bya ste/ de dag kun kyang rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgyar brjod do/ /de dag gis rang gi don gyi
493b4(rgyud): dngos grub rab tu sgrub pas na/ de dag kun gab las byung ba'i/ /rdzas ni yongs su sbyong byed yin/ /zhes bya ba nyid zab mo zhes bya ste/ de yang ji srid du yul rnams kyi ra
493b5(rgyud): sa ya na la skyes bus dman par spyod cing / dga' ba'i 'khor lor zhugs nas kyang / /skyes du dman par spyod pa ni/ /mi 'pho zhes bya'o/ /bya ba kun gyi lam gyis ni/ /
493b6(rgyud): zhes pa ni/ byang chub kyi lam ste/ /zab mo zhes bya ba phyi dang nang gi mig la sogs pa'i dbang po dang / gzugs la sogs pa'i yul thams cad gcig tu bsdus shing

494a1(rgyud): longs spyod par mi 'gyur ro/ /nye bar longs spyod pa de nyid khrid par byed pas na/ lam mo/ /dngul chu yi ni shing chen po/ /zhes bya ba ni/ ji ltar dpag
