500a7(rgyud): kyi cho ga'o/ /gla sgang dang ni ku tsa dang / /yung ba dang ni sgog skya rnams/ /sings po'i nang du zhag gsum sbang / /de nas lo ma lnga pa yi/ /khu ba'i nang du bskol bar bya/ /
500b1(rgyud): 'bras phye dang ni bu ram bcas/ /shi khu'i khu ba ra gcig gyis/ /bkrus na dag par 'gyur ba yin/ /sho ban dza dang ra gcin du/ /gla rtsi dag ni spangs byas na/ /de yis dri dang
500b2(rgyud): 'bral mi 'gyur/ /kha da si yi rlig pa ni/ /dang po thal bas spu phyi la/ /de nas lo ma lnga pa yis/ /khur bar khwa tshos byas nas ni/ /slar yang shi khru'i khu ba dang / /ra yi
500b3(rgyud): gcin du spangs nas ni/ /ke ta ki yi nang bcug la/ /so pan tsa yi rtsa bar gzhug /de ni kha da si rlig sbyang / /shu dag dang ni yung ba gnyis/ /yungs mar rdo rje 'o ma
500b4(rgyud): dang / /sings po cha mnyam nang bskol bas/ /dag 'gyur 'dir ni the tshom med/ /e raN+Da yi khu ba dang / brag zhun gyi ni chur bcas pas/ /se hal le ni bkrus nas
500b5(rgyud): su| |'dab mar btum ste lci bas byug / sa yi 'og tu sbas pas 'dag /ku su ma dang 'bras bu rnams/ /dang po ta krar sbangs nas ni/ /bkrus nas shi ri ba la yi/ /
500b6(rgyud): nang du bcug nas bsros pas 'dag /mu zi mar khus dag 'gyur te/ /ba bla pa la sha yis 'dag/ bya dri ba lang lci bas sbyang / /ldong ros rang skyur gyis ni 'dag/
500b7(rgyud): gur gum mar gyis 'dag par 'gyur/ /bca' ba lang gi gcin gyis te/ /a ga ru ni khrag gis sbyang / /si hal bu mo'i khrag gis 'dag /de nas bcom ldan 'das
501a1(rgyud): la lha mos mchod cing phyag byas te 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcud kyis len ni rab sbyor ba/ /gnas ni gang du brtsam par bgyi/ /sde
501a2(rgyud): tshan rnams ni sngar bshad pa'i/ /'brel pa dag ni ji ltar lags/ /sbyor ba'i rim pa khyod bshad pa'i/ /dgongs pa dag ni ci zhig lags/ /mar nag btso ba cho ga
501a3(rgyud): dang / /yul dang 'brel pa'i ting nge 'dzin/ /khams ni bco brgyad bstan pa yi/ /phan tshun bsdus pa ji lta bu/ /'khrul 'khor bye brag bshad pa dag /phyi dang
501a4(rgyud): nang ni ji ltar lags/ /nad rnams sna tshogs byung ba dag /ji ltar smin pas 'bras bur 'gyur/ /sbom po'i bye brag du zhig mchis/ /phra mo yi ni khyad par ci/ /
501a5(rgyud): rdzas dang bcud len mi 'tshal te/ /khyod kyis sbyor ba gang bshad pa'i/ /dus kyi khyad par ji lta bu/ /de rnams bdag ni the tshom skyes/ /bde ba chen pos bshad
501a6(rgyud): du gsol/ bka' stsal pa/ sgyu ma kun gyis rnam rol pa/ /nyon cig lha mo sgyu ma che/ /sbrang rtsi lta bur bcud bsdus pa/ /rgyud rnams kun tu gsang ba yin/ /gnas
501a7(rgyud): sogs ji bzhin mchod nas su/ /bde mchog sngags kyi bsnyen par bya/ /dpa' bo rnal 'byor gnyis med pa/ /nyi shu rtsa bzhir cher mchod nas/ /rnal 'byor chen po
501b1(rgyud): de yis ni/ /bcud len sman gyi sbyor ba brtsam/ /rig pa 'dzin pa'i grogs po ni/ /sngags kyi bsnyen par gus pa dang / /skyo dub med cing dogs pa med/ /dam tshig spyod la
501b2(rgyud): gus pa ste/ /dpa' zhing brtan la g.yo sgyu med/ /'jam zhing bla ma'i bsnyen bkur brtson/ /de dang lhan cig bsgrub par bya/ /sgrub pos gzhan du byas na ni/ /dngos grub
501b3(rgyud): 'bras bu 'byung mi 'gyur/ /sngar bshad rig pa sbyangs byas te/ /dang po dam tshig sbyin par bya/ /gcer bu'i brtul zhugs 'dzin pa yis/ /gnyis pas ming sogs
501b4(rgyud): dbang ni bskur/ /dbang bskur nas ni de nyid bstan/ /stong dang stong min sogs spangs pa'i/ /rin chen mi mchog gis rtogs bya/ /sgo dgu las ni byung ba'i rdzas/ /sbom
501b5(rgyud): po zhes ni bya ba ste/ /rdzas ni 'ju bar byed pa yin/ /bcud ni dngul gyi lhag ma yin/ /len pa snying stobs zhes byar bshad/ /snying stobs rdzas zhes bya ba ste/ /dngul ni
501b6(rgyud): zhu ba zhes byar brjod/ /de ltar rdzas dang zhu ba ni/ /bsdus pa len pa zhes bya'o/ /mun pa phra mo zhes bya ste/ /phra mo nam mkha'i khams mtshan nyid/ /phung po la sogs khyad
501b7(rgyud): par dang / /khams rnams thams cad 'tshod pa yin/ /sna tshogs gzugs rnams 'byin pa ni/ /nga yi ye shes kyis bskul yin/ /de dag lha mo skal chen mo/ /rdzas dang
502a1(rgyud): khams ni bsdus pa ste/ /brtson 'grus dman zhing tha shal dang / /bsod nams dman pas mthong mi 'gyur/ /brtson 'grus bcud kun
502a2(rgyud): gnas yin pas/ /de bas brtson 'grus brtsam par bya/ /bcud ni bcing dang gso ba dag /mdor bsdus nas ni bshad pa yin/ /yongs su smin pa'i mchog gis
502a3(rgyud): ni| |mnyam med bcud la brten pa yi/ /rnam bcing la sogs nyes pa brgya/ /blo dang ldan pas dpyad de dgag /bcud ni nag po sngon po ste/ /bcud ni yongs su grub
502a4(rgyud): pa yin| |dngul chu lhang tsher cho ga yis/ /ji srid bcud chen grub kyi bar/ /de srid du ni 'bad de dpyad/ /'khrul 'khor gang zhig kha che ba/ /de ni ka ran rgod ma'i kha//
502a5(rgyud): 'khrul 'khor gang zhig rdza rnga 'dra/ /de nyid bong bu rnga mo'i kha/ /rgod ma'i kha ni 'od ma yi/ /sbu gu yis ni brgyan par bya/ /ka raN+Da yi 'khrul 'khor ni/ /ral gri shubs
502a6(rgyud): kyis brgyan par bya/ /'khrul 'khor bong bu'i kha zhes pa/ /kang+ka'i mgrin pa'i sbu gur sbyar/ /rnga mo'i kha yi 'khrul 'khor ni/ /bya rog mchu dang mtshungs par sbyar//
502a7(rgyud): tshar bcad pa ni sbal pa ste/ /'od ma can gyis sbrang rtsir btso/ /bya rog mchu can bung par btso/ /rdo leb 'bar zhing 'od dang bcas/ /kang+ka'i ma chu can glang chen bco//
502b1(rgyud): ral gri shubs can 'khrul 'khor gyis/ /seng+ge ru ni btso ba yin/ /bcud chen yib dang khros pa dang / /'thor dang shin tu chos pa yis/ /chu yi nang du 'bros par 'gyur/ /de nas
502b2(rgyud): glang chen mgo bcud dang / /mu zi la sogs byin nas ni/ /bsregs pas tshar bcad mnan pa dang / /'og tu sa la bor nas su/ /'dar zhing rmongs la du bar 'thul/ /khrol
502b3(rgyud): khrol gyi ni sgra 'byin no/ /de nas a shwa gan+d+ha dang / /ba la tsakra marda dang / /ba la ta ka shi khru ste/ /pi ni tshad ku mu dang / /ut+pal ma li ka sa bon/ /rgya shug rus pa ki sa bon/ /ku ba'i sa bon
502b4(rgyud): ma du dang / /po son pa la sha ba'i shun/ /phye ma skyo mar byas pa yi/ /nang du de nas brdung bar bya/ /cha ni nges dang bcas pas 'ching / /rdzas ni drug cha sbyin par bya/ /de nas rdo yi gtun
502b5(rgyud): du mnye| |dang po re zhig sbyang bar bya/ /de nas gci ba'i lan tsha dang / /phag gi zhag dang khrag tu bcas/ /dkrugs pas nyes pa gzhom par bya/ /'khrul 'khor gzhug pa bshad
502b6(rgyud): par bya| |tsan+dan thal sman la sogs dang / /bcas pa rkang gi nang du gzhug /dang po brgya rtsa brgyad par bya/ /phyi nas lto skyes bcas pa'i bcud/ /'od ma'i nang du bcu gnas su/ /
502b7(rgyud): sngar bshad gnas su gzhag par bya/ /rtsa ba'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba ni/ so man dza la sogs pa'i rtsa ba dang 'bras bu'o/ /ka tu ma dza dza la sogs pa'i ni/ me tog dang 'dab ma
503a1(rgyud): dang rus pa la sogs pa gzung ngo / /bcud btso ba'i sbyor ba'i cho ga'o/ /lhang tsher phyogs kyi cha dang ni/ /bcud ni dbang po'i cha dang bcas/ /cha yi
503a2(rgyud): nges pas 'ching 'gyur te/ /cha bcus rim gyis spel bar bya/ /dri zhim zla ba re re sbyin/ /gser gyi mdog ni bzang por 'gyur/ /dngul gyi so ni bzang por 'gyur/ /mu tig
503a3(rgyud): mig ni dag par 'gyur/ /nu med skra dang spu la phan/ /rdo rjes thog ni bzlog 'gyur te/ /lcags kyus chu dang mtshon rnams bzlog /sna tshogs dbang phyug sems dang ni/ /
503a4(rgyud): lhang tsher gyi ni brgya byin dang / /me dang gshin rje chu lha dang / /lus ngan la sogs bgegs kun bzlog /nA ga par ni mar gsar dang / /rgya mtsho lan tshwar bcas pa yi/ /
503a5(rgyud): dngul chu'i sbyor ba mchog 'di yis/ /rgas pa dang ni mdze nad sogs/ /ba lang lce yi sman dang ni/ /dngul chur bcas pa byugs pa yis/ /gzhang 'brum nad ni
503a6(rgyud): sel bar byed/ /ka ri ke sas gso ba ste/ /ki ri kar ni ka dang ni/ /ral pa dmar pos bzhu zhing bsad/ /'dzag dang a sho gnad dang / /nA ga ba la ba li ka/ cha mnyam
503a7(rgyud): gyis ni rmongs par bya/ /d+ha du ra yi khu ba yis/ /rang gi yon tan ma lus byed/ /de nas snying po kun bsdus pa'i/ /mar khu'i cho ga bshad par bya/ /mar khu rnam pa
503b1(rgyud): gnyis gsungs te/ /snod dang sems can las byung ba'o/ /dang po snod kyi bshad bya ste/ /'bras bu chen po gsum gyi chus/ /snum ster rnams la yang yang bsgo/ /de yi
503b2(rgyud): legs par bskams byas la/ /rdul la sogs pa'i skyon bral ba'i/ /sa yi char ni sngags pas bskyed/ /legs par smin cing snum pa dang / /skya bo la sogs skyon
503b3(rgyud): spangs nag / legs par brdungs shing bsros nas su/ /skyu ru ra khu char chus spangs/ /sra ba de yi bdug pas bsgo/ /du med me yis ran par bdug /de nas 'khrul
503b4(rgyud): 'khor dag gis btsir/ /dpyid dang sos ka ston dus gsum/ /nyi ma'i 'od la sman mar btso/ /dgun stod dgun smad dbyar dang gsum/ /mar khu me yis ran par
503b5(rgyud): btso| |gnad pa tra twa tsa dang / /sug smel nA ga pus par bcas/ /ral pa dang ni sA lu la/ /de dag phye mar byas pa ni/ /til las byung ba'i nang blugs te/ /chu ni mar
503b6(rgyud): khu'i bzhi 'gyur bya/ /a ga ru ni srang phyed dang / /sman gyi bzhi 'gyur byas nas su/ /de nas me ni ran pas bskol/ /slar yang ral pa gla sgang dang / /tsan+dan shing tsha ba
503b7(rgyud): trar bcas/ /sngar bshad phye ma mnyam por bya/ /de bzhin snga ma bzhin du btso/ /slar yang si h+la dkar min lha/ /ru rta dza la pa thar bcas/ /thams cad bsres pa srang
504a1(rgyud): gcig gtang / /mar khu srang ni brgyad dang bcas/ /'od ma'i nang du blugs nas ni/ /nyi ma bdun du nyi mar btso/ /yid 'ong skal bzang stobs
504a2(rgyud): rab ster/ /'dod pa'i don ni phun sum tshogs/ /gal te tshangs pa'i mar khur bcas/ /rnal 'byor can la mchog ster 'gyur/ /gzhan yang sba la sug smel dang / /pa ta
504a3(rgyud): b+h+ring ga rA dza dang / /sen mo ru rta pi sha tsa/ /so sor cha bzhi cha drug bdun/ /cha ni bcu gnyis dag dang bcas/ /'di rnams sman gyis skyo ma ni/ /sngar bshad pa yi tshad dang
504a4(rgyud): bcas| |sngar bshad 'od ma'i cho gas btso/ /gang tshe rkang gi mar khur bcas/ /nad rnams thams cad 'phrog par 'gyur/ /de nas sha chen mar khu dang / /lhan cig
504a5(rgyud): bsres te sbrang rtsi yi/ /snod du blugs te nyi mar bsro/ /nyi ma bdun ni tshun chad kyis/ /ri dwags lte ba dang mtshungs 'gyur/ /sbyor ba 'di ni dam pa ste/ /srung ba kun gyi
504a6(rgyud): bla na med/ /ti tra tsa yi 'bras bu dang / /tsan+dan si h+la shing tshar bcas/ /sngar bshad pa yi mar khu de/ /rkang gi mar dang bsres nas ni/ /sngar bzhin sbrang rtsi'i snod bzhag
504a7(rgyud): sogs| |de ni ga pur mtshungs 'gyur te/ /skye bo thams cad rmongs par byed/ /de nas ri skyes mar khur bcas/ /'bras gsum ga la sgang shu dag dang / /pu ti ta dkar ku su
504b1(rgyud): ma| |se ba la yi ngar pa dang / /gur gum dang ni lhan cig bcas/ /sbrang rtsi'i snod du blugs nas su/ /nyin bdun nyi ma'i drod la btso/ /skal bzang stobs 'phel mdangs dang ldan//
504b2(rgyud): rtag tu 'o ma btung bya zhing / /bsam gtan bzlas la 'bad par bya/ /tshangs par spyod la rtag gnas nas/ /khu ba dag ni dgag par bya/ /sbrang rtsi dang ni bcas pa ru/ /sgrub
504b3(rgyud): pos phra mo zla drug bza'/ /de yi bshad pa kun blangs la/ /lha mo lhan cig phye mar bya/ /rdza ma gsar pa bzhag nas su/ /tsha gsum tso ri'i phye ma ni/ /nyis 'gyur du ni byas pa
504b4(rgyud): dang / /'byin byed phye ma bcu char bsre/ /bu ram gyi ni ril bu bya/ /sgrub po shin tu mnyam bzhag pas/ /nyi ma re re zho gnyis gnyis/ /zos na nad rnams thams cad ni/ /'jig
504b5(rgyud): 'gyur khyad par gzhang 'brum 'joms/ /mes po yis ni cha bzhi dang / /sgog skya dang ni bcu drug bsre/ /'o ma dang ni lhan cig btung / /nyi ma bdun ni tshun chad kyis/ /gzer nad
504b6(rgyud): klad nad 'joms par 'gyur/ /sings po dang ni lhan cig tu/ /snga ma bzhin du 'thung na ni/ /nad rnams thams cad sel bar byed/ /zla drug sbyor ba goms pa yis/ /skra dkar
504b7(rgyud): dang ni gnyer ma 'phrog / 'bras ni dmar po'i phye ma dang / /ba la'i rtsa ba 'dab mar bcas/ /sgog skya zho gnyis lhan cig tu/ /btags te ril bu byas na ni/ /mar ram mar
505a1(rgyud): nag nang du btso/ /zos nas gcin dang 'tsham par btung / /des ni rus pa chag pa dag /'byor zhing stobs dang nyams 'phel 'gyur/ /b+h+ring ga rA dza
505a2(rgyud): tshangs pa ni/ /rlon pa gci ba dang bcas bza'/ /de yis dug ni 'phrog par byed/ /yung ba'i khu ba zho gnyis dang / /de dang mnyam pa'i gci bar bcas/ /'thung na rgyu ba'i dug
505a3(rgyud): dang ni| |shu ba dang ni nad kun 'joms/ /yung ba'i khu ba glang gcin dang / /de bzhin 'byung po'i gtso bo ste/ /rig byed grangs dang mnyam pa'i srang / /de la zho ni gnyis gnyis
505a4(rgyud): btung / /dpyid kyi dus su cung zad bskyed/ /sbyor ba'i gtso bo 'di yis ni/ /dug dang rims nad sel bar byed/ /gla sgang skyu ru ra dang ni/ /dri rnon dang ni zhag chen dang / /sbrang rtsi cha
505a5(rgyud): mnyam phye ma ni/ /khab len lcags kyi snod du gzhag /sbyor ba'i rim pa 'di yis ni/ /srang ni sum brgya'i bar du bya/ /bad san ta zhes bya ba ste/ /dngos grub thams cad rab
505a6(rgyud): ster ba| |lo gcig bar du sbyor ba yis/ /yid 'ong yid ni gzhungs par 'gyur/ /nad rnams kun las rnam par grol/ /gnyer ma dang ni skra dkar sel/ /dus kyi rlung dang nyin
505a7(rgyud): mtshan sogs/ /bsten kyang 'jigs par mi bya'o/ /sbyor ba gzhan la bsten pa ni/ /'bras bu med cing log par 'gyur/ /rtag tu bsam gtan bzlas byas nas/ /lo ni
505b1(rgyud): sum brgya'i bar du 'tsho/ /pi pi ling dang gur gum ni/ /cha ni mnyam por byas nas su/ /sos ka'i dus su bza' bar bya/ /de rjes gci ba dro 'thung na/ /kha zas yi gar 'ong zhing 'ju/ /nir guN+Di
505b2(rgyud): yi khu ba dang / /gci bar bcas pa sna sman sbyin/ /bad kan las gyur nad rnams 'phrog /de nyid pad+ma'i dri ma dang / /bcas par byugs na glang shu sel/ /mar ka da yi rtsa ba dang / /so dang sen mo'i rdul
505b3(rgyud): dang bsre/ /rma ni dang po mar gyis bkru/ /de rjes sman des byugs na ni/ /rma ni 'drub par byed pa'i mchog /so phag rdul dang sug smel che/ /gi ri kar na'i khu ba ru/ /mnyes te mig la
505b4(rgyud): byugs na ni/ /rab rib dag ni 'joms pa'i mchog /'bras bu gsum gyi khu bas sbyang / /ma ha ha ha ka yi 'dab/ /'o ma dang ni lig bu mig /'byung po'i chu dang bcas pa ru/ /mig tu
505b5(rgyud): blugs nas lo d+ha yis/ /bdugs na dri ma med par 'gyur/ /yung ba gnyis kyi cha mnyam phye/ /ba yi dar bar pre dor bcas/ /bre gang lus kyi bar du bskol/ /zhag bdun du ni de 'thung
505b6(rgyud): na| |de yis lus ni rgyas 'gyur te/ /bcud kyis len gyi sbyor ba 'di/ /dpa' bo rang nyid bshad pa yin/ /yung ba dang ni so phag dang / /de bzhin btsag dang smye byed khu/ /rlung med
505b7(rgyud): gnas su gnas nas ni/ /lus la dril phyis byas na ni/ /rtag tu stobs ni 'phel byed cing / /dngul chu bcing ba dag la phan/ /ru rta mur ba shuk+ti ka /shing tsha cha mnyam phye dang ni
506a1(rgyud): mang si tsha ni nyis 'gyur bcas/ /dril phyis byas na 'dod pa 'grub/ /brag zhun dang ni so phag dang / /nir guN+Di dang e la tsha/ /cha ni mnyam por
506a2(rgyud): byas pa yi/ /yung ba dag ni bzhi 'gyur bcas/ /gser shing khu ba cha phyed kyis/ /dril phyis byas na dug 'phrog cing / /gci bar bcas pa'i dril phyis kyis/ /khyi rdo dang ni
506a3(rgyud): mdze nad 'joms/ /khye'u dang bu mo gzhon nu'i sha /mar dang bcas pa ci rigs par/ /rgyun du zos na tshe ring 'gyur/ /mdzes ma las byung me tog ni/ /zos na rim gyis
506a4(rgyud): rga ba 'joms/ /rtag tu ga bur tsan+dan dag /bsten na nad rnams sel ba'i mchog /de bzhin bzhi mnyam gci bar bcas/ /sna sman byin na'ang nad kun sel/ /sha shang
506a5(rgyud): ka dang yung ba dang / /kha ba yi ni snying po dag /pad+ma can gyi pad+ma ni/ /smyung po yi ni khu ba dang / /sems kyi dbang phyug lag mthil du/ /mnyes te rim gyis bsten na ni/ /nad
506a6(rgyud): rnams kun las grol 'gyur zhing / /bsam pa thams cad rdzogs byed par/ /gdon mi za bar ngas bshad de/ /dpyid kyi dus su bskul bar bya/ /mkhrang ma zhes bya chen
506a7(rgyud): po'i chen/ /de yi gci ba'i lan tshwa dang / /de yi khrag dang khu bar bcas/ /dngul chu dang ni sbrang rtsir bsre/ /sbyor ba chen po 'di dag ni/ /mdzes ma'i gdong can khyod la
506b1(rgyud): bshad| |rtag tu nad med stobs ldan 'gyur/ /bad kan gyi ni mi rnams la/ /tsha ba'i rdzas dang lhan cig sbyin/ /thung ngu'i pad+ma las byung ba/ /dang po mkhas pas gzung bar bya/ /
506b2(rgyud): lce dang dkar por bcas pa las/ /sbyor ba pos ni ril bu bya/ /zla ba drug tu bsten pa yis/ /rgyu dang mi rgyu bcas par 'ching / /ji srid lus ni gnas kyi bar/ /dug kyang 'kho
506b3(rgyud): bar mi 'gyur ro/ /mkhrang ma las byung me tog gzung / /de bzhin kha gdong bdud rtsir bcas/ /sha chen dag ni nyis 'gyur bya/ /rang las byung ba'i sems dang bcas/ /
506b4(rgyud): de ni zos shing bsten pa yis/ /tshe dang nad med phun sum tshogs/ /rim 'di rtag tu bsten byas na/ /lo ni sum brgyar 'tsho 'gyur zhing / /skra dkar dang ni gnyer ma sel//
506b5(rgyud): bstan bcos kun la 'jigs med 'gyur/ /bshang ba'i phye ma zho gnyis dang / /a ba marga'i thal ba dag /mi yi gcin dang ma he'i gcin/ /bcas par mkhas pas
506b6(rgyud): blud na ni/ /stobs rnams bde bar skye 'gyur bar/ /ngas bshad pa la the tshom med/ /rdo rje bla ma mchod nas ni/ /de 'og las ni brtsam par bya/ /yung ba she ka rar bcas
506b7(rgyud): pas| |khrag dang mkhris pa'ang sel bar byed/ /mi mo'i 'o ma srang brgya dang / /rdo rje'i 'o ma srang brgyar bcas/ /skyu ru'i khu ba'ang de tsam ste/ /ba yi 'o ma kham phor gang / /yung
507a1(rgyud): ba sbrang rtsi tsan+dan dmar/ /srang gcig dang ni pa tha dag /sngar bshad mtshan nyid ldan pa ni/ /brgya rtsa brgyad ni gzung bar bya/ /sngon bzhin ran
507a2(rgyud): par btsos byas la/ /khyim gyi me tog dkar por bcas/ /dpyid kyi dus su bskul bar bya/ /spom po la sogs lnga yi ni/ /las kyi cho ga bshad par bya/ /nu ma med
507a3(rgyud): pa rtsub mo dang / /'dzer pa can te gsum pa yi/ /gci ba'i lan tshwa bzung nas su/ /mthe bong yi ni khrag dang bcas/ /'gugs par byed pa'i dam pa yin/ /rdzas la
507a4(rgyud): rta dang ma he'i khrag / khro bo yi ni khrag dang bcas/ /de bzhin du ni tha chung gi /khrag dang bcas pas gsad pa'ang 'grub/ /thung ngu yi ni lan tshwa dang / /de nyid kyi ni khu
507a5(rgyud): bar bcas/ /ring po'i khrag dang bcas pa yis/ /rgyas pa chen por 'gyur ba yin/ /de nyid srin lag 'byung po'i bdag /don yod dbang du sdud pa yin/ /dri yi chu ni
507a6(rgyud): rgyal mtshan gyi/ /khrag dang lhan cig bcas nas su/ /lag mthil du ni mnyes la bza'/ /'dod don thams cad sgrub byed yin/ /pad+ma las byung ma rnyed na/ /ro yi
507a7(rgyud): lag pa las byung gzung / /rnal 'byor don gnyer dbul po yis/ /lag pa'i mchod pas yid 'dod pa/ /rgyad rnams kun tu nang sbas la/ /de dag thams cad khyod
507b1(rgyud): la bshad/ /dbang skur lag tu bkod nas ni/ /mkhas pas rgyab tu gshegs su gsol/ /mdzes ma kun tu ru'i sa bon/ /phag gi mche bas mnyes nas su/ /thig ler

514a4(rgyud): su| |ji srid 'tsho bar dbang du 'gyur/ /lha mo klu mo gnod sbyin mo/ /lugs ma'am ni bris pa la/ /de yi ming ni bris nas su/ /blo ldan snying gar bcug ste bsgom//
514a5(rgyud): nyi ma bdun ni tshun chad kyis/ /mar me yi ni cho ga yis/ /'grub 'gyur 'dir ni the tshom med/ /gang gi dbang po rdzas yin te/ /shin tu mnyam par bzhag ste bsgrub/ /
514a6(rgyud): dbang po mig la sogs pa yin/ /rigs pa'i sbyor ba lam yin te/ /gang dang gang gi rang bzhin te/ /de dang de yi dngos po yis/ /bde ba nyid du bsgrub par bya/ /bde ba sems
514a7(rgyud): zhes bya ba ste/ /de nyid du ni bdag bde sogs/ /sdug bsngal gyis ni 'grub mi 'gyur/ /bde ba yis ni 'grub par bshad/ /shin tu bde ba'i sgrub thabs ni/ /thos dang
514b1(rgyud): bsam gtan sogs spangs pa'i/ /dman pa dag ni gang gis kyang / /sgrub par nus pa ma yin te/ /skye bo thabs dang bral bas ni/ /tshul ngan dman pa dka' bas sgrub/ /bdag
514b2(rgyud): nyid sgrub pa dang bral bas/ /skal med ngal ba don med cing / /de la dngos grub ces mi brjod/ /a sa ma zhes bya ba ni/ /dpe dang zla med pa'o/ /a d+hi ta zhes bya ba ni /rnal 'byor
514b3(rgyud): pa rnams kyi sbyor ba'o/ /sangs rgyas kun tu rang nyid 'gyur/ /zhes bya ba ni/ dngos po thams cad gnyis su med pa'i ye shes su mtshon cing 'jug pa'o/ /pra ta hang zhes bya
514b4(rgyud): ba ni| nyi ma re re zhing ngo / /yang na zla re ste/ zla ba nya la'o/ /yang na lo re zhing ste/ gal te ma 'byor ba'am/ skal ba med pa dang / 'das pa'i dbang gis kyang rung ste/ de dag
514b5(rgyud): gis ni| lo re zhing bya'o/ /de bzhin zhes bya ba ni/ dbang bskur ba'i cho ga ltar bya ba'o/ /yang na de bzhin te/ slob dpon gzhan med na ji bzhin byin gyis brlabs nas zhes bya
514b6(rgyud): ba la| de la byin gyis brlabs nas zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas kyi sdom pa ste/ de rnyed nas bdag dang lhan cig tu gar bya'o/ /sangs rgyas sdom pa ni/ sangs rgyas dang 'brel pa
514b7(rgyud): ste| de su zhig ce na/ gzugs la sogs pa dang / lang tsho phun sum tshogs pa'i bu mo'o/ /gar zhes bya ba ni/ bdag nyid rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas spyad par
515a1(rgyud): bya zhes bya ba'i don to/ /des ni/ 'di skad bsten par 'gyur te/ phyag rgya la sogs pa'i yo byad rnams ci ste rgyun du ma 'byor na/ /des bde ba
515a2(rgyud): slar yang rjes su gzung ba'i phyir rim pa 'dis mchod pa bya zhing dam tshig bsrung zhing bskyang bar bya'o/ /zhes bya ba'i don to/ /gzhan yang brdas bshad pa'i don
515a3(rgyud): bstan par bya ste/ pra ta haM zhes bya ba ni/ rab tu mang po'o/ /de ci zhig zhen/ /khams bco brgyud kyis mnyam par sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/ /zla re zhes bya ba ni/
515a4(rgyud): zla ba dang dmar po'o/ /lo re zhes bya ba ni/ lo bcu gcig ma nas brtsams te nyi shu rtsa lnga ma'i bar du'o/ /gal te de dag kyang ma 'byor na ji bzhin byin gyis brlabs
515a5(rgyud): nas zhes bya ba ni/ bdag nyid gcig pus bde ba'i sbyor bas dam tshig bskyang bar bya zhes bya ba'i don to/ /phyag byas dngos grub 'jug par 'gyur/ /zhes bya ba
515a6(rgyud): la| 'jug pa ni/ nyams su len pa'o/ /sgrub pa po yi lag g.yon gyis/ /pad+ma'i sdod ni bzung nas su/ /zhes bya ba la/ pad+ma'i snod ni/ dum bu gcig pa'i
515a7(rgyud): thong pa ste| de la ka zhes bya ba ni/ lus so/ /pA la zhes bya ba ni/ /song ba skye/ rum bu gcig pa zhes bya ba ni/ mnyams shing shin tu mdzes pa'o/ /de la pad+ma zhes
515b1(rgyud): bya ba ni| pad+ma can nam/ rigs gzhan gyi bu mo yang rung ste/ snod ni/ /de'i chos kyi 'byung gnas kyi pad+ma yin la/ de nyid ma nyams pa ste/ rma med pa zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/ /
515b2(rgyud): lag pa zhes bya ba ni/ brtan pa zhes bya bar 'jug pa'o/ /g.yon pa zhes bya ba ni/ zur mig g.yon du lta ba'o/ /ba dan gsum zhes bya ba ni/ bu mo'i bcud 'dzag pa
515b3(rgyud): ste| bza' ba'o/ /lag pa g.yas pa zhes bya ba la/ lag pa ni/ lo nyi shu rtsa lnga ma'i bar yin la/ shes nyen dang ldan pa'i phyir g.yas pa'o/ /de nyid ni/ g.yon
515b4(rgyud): pa ste| de las byung ba de longs spyod par bya ba'o/ /de la longs spyad pa zhes bya ba ni/ ji ltar bla mas nyams su bstar ba de ltar spyad pas 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /sgrub pa
515b5(rgyud): pos de ltar nges par shes par byas la de nas dus bcing bar bya'i/ /gzhan du ni/ ltung bar 'gyur ro/ /ltung ba zhes bya ba ni/ dam tshig las 'das pa zhes bya ba'i
515b6(rgyud): don to| |sngags ni bla mas bstan pa ste/ /phyag rgya de la bstan pa yin/ /de nyid rtag tu sbyor ba yis/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur/ /'di dag thams cad mi rtog pa/ /
515b7(rgyud): mi rtog pa yang ma yin te/ /rtog pa med pa'i rang bzhin gyis/ /mi rtog pa ni brtags pa yin/ /dus drug tu ni bstan pa dag /rtag tu rnam par mi rtog gnas/ /rdo rje sems
516a1(rgyud): sogs rgyal ba ru/ /de yi rang bzhin yongs shes bya/ /sos ga dang ni dbyar dang ston/ /dgun stod dgun smad de bzhin dpyid/ /de dag
516a2(rgyud): ma 'dres shes bya la/ /'dis ni las rnams thams cad bya/ /sos ka'i dus ni rta mchog ste/ /de bzhin dbyar ni he ru ka /rdo rje nyi ma ston yin te/ /pad+mas rol pa
516a3(rgyud): dgun stod yin/ /dgun smad rdo rje sems dpa' la/ /dpyid ni rnam par snang mdzad do/ /sos ka mar mes mngon bya ste/ /de bzhin dbyar ni chu yis mchod/ /ston ni
516a4(rgyud): mar khus mchod bya ste/ /dgun stod de bzhin me tog dbul/ /dgun smad ga pur bza' bya ste/ /khyad par du ni bzhi mnyam gyis/ /dpyid kyi dus su mchod
516a5(rgyud): par bya/ /dus kyi mchod dang mnyam med de/ /sbyor ba kun gyi dam pa yin/ /rnal 'byor ma ni thams cad dang / /mkha' 'gro ma dang ma mo mnyes/ /de bas 'bad
516a6(rgyud): pa thams cad kyis/ /mchod na mchod pa'i bdag nyid 'gyur/ /rang bzhin de dag rdzogs par ni/ /gang zhig gyur pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ /sgrub po rnams kyi las rnams
516a7(rgyud): ni| |thams cad byed 'gyur gdon mi za/ /de dag rang bzhin grub pa ste/ /dus zhes bya bar brjod pa yin/ /dus la sogs pa'i rang bzhin gyis/ /rgyal ba thams cad yang
516b1(rgyud): dag bzhugs/ /dus kun sems la gnas mod kyi/ /da ltar na yang rnam par 'khrul/ /mi shigs pa zhes bya ba ni yi ge hUM ste/ de yang bdag nyid kyi lus la gnas pa'i hUM ngo / /
516b2(rgyud): de nyid ni yi ge mchog ces bya ste/ yi ge mchog de'i phyag rgya ni rtsa gsum nas bde ba chen po'i sgor sna'i sgo gnyis nas rlung ji lta ba bzhin du 'jug pa yin la/ de nyid
516b3(rgyud): ni A li kA li ste/ g.yas dang / g.yon du'o/ /des 'di skad bstan par 'gyur te/ lte ba'i dkyil 'khor du byang chub kyi sems la sogs pa'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor
516b4(rgyud): 'jug pa yin la/ de'i steng du chu'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /de nas ni me'o/ /de nas ni sa'o/ /de'i steng du ni pad+ma'o/ /de'i steng gnas pa'i sa bon ni mi shigs pa dang /
516b5(rgyud): yi ge'i mchog ces brjod do/ /dbang po kun las byung ba ni/ /dam tshig thod pa zhes byar brjod/ /mdzes pa phreng ba zhes bshad de/ /de kho na nyid dbu rgyan/
516b6(rgyud): yin| |gtsug gi nor bu dbang bskur te/ /sangs rgyas zhes bya rjes gnang yin/ /he ru ka yi dbang bskur ba'o/ /thod pa lus zhes bya ba ste/ /rked pa
516b7(rgyud): phreng ba'i ming can yin/ /dbu rgyan b+ha ga zhes byar brjod/ /sangs rgyas khu ba zhes brjod do/ /gtsug gi nor bu bde bar bshad/ /rdo rje pad+ma'i dbang bskur bya'o/ /
517a1(rgyud): slar yang bshad par bya ba ste/ /thod pa dbang gnyis dam tshig ste/ /phreng ba sngags kyi bdag por brjod/ /bcu drug thig gis btab pa'o//
517a2(rgyud): stong pa dbu rgyan zhes byar bshad/ /a la sogs pa'i ma mo rnams/ /sangs rgyas zhes bya'i sgra ru brjod/ /de rnams dbus kyi bde ba gang / /de ni gtsug gi nor bur
517a3(rgyud): brjod/ /rigs rnams kun gyis thams cad du/ /rtag tu dbang bskur de lta bu/ /dpal zhes bya ba dga' ba ste/ /bde ba sangs rgyas su ni brjod/ /pad+ma pad+ma nyid yin
517a4(rgyud): la| |nags ni skya rengs zhes byar grags/ /rtsa ba byang chub sems yin no/ /yang na/ pad+ma lte ba'i 'khor lo ste/ /nags ni a sogs ma me yin/ /rtsa ba thar pa ster
517a5(rgyud): byed pa'i/ /brda yis sangs rgyas phyag rgya yin/ /yang na/ lte ba mtsho skyes zhes bya ba ste/ /nags zhes bya ba ngag yin la/ /rtsa ba lus kyi bla dwags yin/ /sangs rgyas
517a6(rgyud): sems kyi brda yin no/ /gcig pu nges pa'i rnal 'byor yin/ /dben pa rtog pa spangs pa ste/ /sbas pa gsal bar ma byas pa'o/ /nags ni sngar bshad khams rnams te//
517a7(rgyud): lhan cig mchog tu 'jug pas na/ /bsdus pa zhes ni bya bar brjod/ /lha zhes bya bar rang ming brjod/ /gza' dang skar ma la sogs lha/ /a gra zhes bya'i sgra brjod
517b1(rgyud): pa| |de ni rnal 'byor shes pa yin/ /a gra gtso bo zhes brjod cing / /a gra dam pa zhes bya la/ /a gra dang po zhes bshad cing / /a gra spyi bor gnas pa'o/ /rang gi ming dang
517b2(rgyud): ldan pa yis/ /sdig pa dag ni sel bar byed/ /yang na sa ni a sogs te/ /de rnams a gra ha zhes bya/ /mgor gnas 'og tu bltas nas ni/ /yi ge tha snyad tshar du 'bebs/
517b3(rgyud): tha snyad ces bya ba ni/ dbyangs dang / gsal byed rnams te/ /de rnams kyis 'tsho bar gyur pa'o/ /dbyangs zhes bya ba la/ /swa ni/ rang nyid kyis so/ /ra ni mdzes pa ste/
517b4(rgyud): des na me swa ra'o/ /ha ni skal bzang yi ge ste/ /rnam pa'i mchog kun ldan pa dang / /rgyan rnams kun gyis klubs pa yin/ /rdo rje sems sogs lha rnams su/ /bdag gi
517b5(rgyud): lus ni bsam par bya/ /bsam gtan sbyor ba 'di yis ni/ /sdig pa kun las grol 'gyur zhing / /bsod nams kun dang ldan pa ru/ /dngos po gsum ni yang dag
517b6(rgyud): gnas| |bris pas bsod nams gang mthong ba/ /bsam pas kyang ni de bzhin mthong / /slob ma bdag nyid chen po la/ /'di yis dbang ni bskur bar bya/ /dbang bskur
517b7(rgyud): dam pa bsgom byar 'dod/ /gang dang gang gi lha yi mchog /de dang de ni slob dpon 'gro/ /gang dang gang la lhag mos pa/ /de dag kun gyis dbang bskur bya/ /dbang ni rnam
518a1(rgyud): pa bzhi dag tu/ /yang dang yang du so sor bshad/ /gang zhig sngar ni bshad pa rnams/ /de dag kun gyis brjod pa yin/ /rnal ma'i sbyor ba rtogs bya'i
518a2(rgyud): phyir| |bcos ma yi ni sgom pa dang / /bcos ma yi ni bzlas pa bya/ /rnal ma'i sbyor ba rtogs gyur na/ /bcos ma'i sbyor ba phyi rol nas/ /rnal ma'i sbyor ba rtogs gyur pas//
518a3(rgyud): bcos ma dag ni mi bya'o/ /dper na gzings la 'jus nas ni/ /chu yi pha rol 'gro bar byed/ /pha rol phyin nas 'dor ba ltar/ /bcos ma dag kyang de bzhin no/ /dkyil 'khor
518a4(rgyud): la sogs las gang ni/ /bcos ma'i sems kyis gang byed pa/ /phyi rol las rnams gsal byed pas/ /dang po'i las can rnams la bsngags/ /dngos grub de kun 'dir gnas
518a5(rgyud): pas| |rgyal ba'i dngos nyid rig la min/ /gang yang sgra shes bstan bcos rnams/ /drang srong rnams kyis byas pa ltar/ /rang gi sems ni 'jug byed pa'i/ /skyes bu'i bcos
518a6(rgyud): ma'i bya ba rnams/ /rgyud kyi rjes su 'brang nas ni/ /'bad pas sdug bsngal slong bar byed/ /de phyir dkyil 'khor la sogs pa/ /bya ba'i cho ga la 'bad pa/ /thar pa dang bral
518a7(rgyud): phyi rol te/ /skyes bu nyon mongs 'ba' zhig byed/ /mi rtog pas ni 'tshang mi rgya/ /rtog dang bcas pas kyang de bzhin/ /shin tu rnam dag yongs shes na/ /yid 'dod rnams kyi de
518b1(rgyud): nyid 'gyur/ /rgyu dang 'bras bu'i rang bzhin ni/ /dam pa nyid du yod min cing / /rang bzhin gsal ba nyid kyi phyir/ /stong pa nyid kyang ma yin no/ /rang bzhin dbye ba thams cad kyi/ /rnam pa
518b2(rgyud): dag ni rnam gnas pa/ /rgya mtsho la ni rin chen bzhin/ /thog mtha' med pa'i tshul can yin/ /'jig rten rtag tu tha snyad spyod/ /'jig rten las 'das de dang 'gal/ /yod dang med
518b3(rgyud): ces bya ba ni/ /rang bzhin nyid du shes pa min/ /'di yi tshul gyis rab rtogs pa/ /rdzogs dang bral bas grol ba min/ /rnal ma'i lam la brten na ni/ /thams cad byas kyang
518b4(rgyud): rnam par grol/ /skyon dang yon tan 'phel byed pa'i/ /'khor ba dang ni mya ngan 'das/ /bde ba dang ni sdug bsngal dngos/ /lhan cig skyed par yang dag gnas/ /mkha' 'gro kun dang
518b5(rgyud): mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las/
518b6(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa'i dbugs dbyung ba dang / rang bzhin nyid nges par bstan pa'i rim par phye ba ste lnga bcu pa'o// //rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro rdzogs
518b7(rgyud): so/ / //rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta chen po ga ya d+ha ra dang / bod kyi zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba 'gos lhas bcos kyis bsgyur cing zhus te dpe gnyis la gtugs nas gtan la phab pa/
519a1(rgyud): rgya gar skad du/ badzra DA ka nA ma ut+ta ra tan+t+ra/ bod skad du/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro zhes bya ba'i rgyud phyi ma/ 'jig rten dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal
519a2(rgyud): lo| |gsang dang mchog dang dgyes pa dang / /thams cad bdag nyid la rtag bzhugs/ /mkha' 'gro kun dngos sems dpa' ste/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i
519a3(rgyud): mchog / 'di ni rang byung bcom ldan 'das/ /'di nyid gcig pu lhag pa'i lha/ /'byung gnas sgra gzugs las nges 'byung / /dam tshig spyod yul bcom ldan
519a4(rgyud): rnams| |thog mtha' dbus mthar yang dag gnas/ /'jig rten gsum rnams na rnyed dka'/ /'dod chags ma yin chags bral min/ /dbu mar yang ni dmig
519a5(rgyud): pa med| |sgyu ma'i phyag rgya bud med kun/ /gnyis med ye shes dam pa yin/ /spyod nam yang 'grub 'gyur te/ /bde dang spro bas thams cad 'thob/ /nam
519a6(rgyud): mkha' kun tu spyod 'grub pa/ /mkha' 'gro ma zhes rab tu grags/ /sna tshogs phyag rgya thams cad dang / /kun nas sna tshogs sdom pa ni/ /mkha' 'gro ma
519a7(rgyud): kun mnyam sbyor bas/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gror rab tu grags/ /so so'i lha la dmigs pa ni/ /de nyid bsam bral rnal 'byor te/ /dbang bskur ba las nges
519b1(rgyud): par skye| |gzugs brnyan rang bzhin rnal 'byor te/ /rnal 'byor chen po byang chub sems/ /rnal 'byor dbang phyug bdag po rang / /byang chub sems ni rdo rje ste/ /sangs
519b2(rgyud): rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin phyir/ /de phyir kun nas 'bad pa yis/ /sna tshogs rang bzhin la mchod bya/ /gnyis gnyis 'khyud pa'i rang bzhin gyis/ /sna tshogs 'gro ba
519b3(rgyud): khyab par gnas/ /sangs rgyas nyid dang bdag dang ni/ /sems can dang ni nus ldan rnams/ /rang gi lha yi rnal 'byor pas/ /bsgrub bya'i bdag nyid de yi phyir/ /'di
519b4(rgyud): yis sangs rgyas thams cad dang / /nus ldan kun gyi de nyid ni/ /thams cad rdo rje 'dzin nyid du/ /skye ba 'dir ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal
519b5(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsal to/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog /mkha' 'gro thams cad mnyam sbyor te/ /khams gsum po ni ma
519b6(rgyud): lus pa| |nam mkha' pa yi mtshan nyid du/ /thams cad nam mkha'i mtshan nyid dang / /thams cad sgyu ma lta bu'o/ /mthong ba dang ni reg pa rnams/ /thams cad
519b7(rgyud): sgyu ma ji bzhin du/ /'gro ba kun tu gnas pa rnams/ /'ga' yang dmigs pa ma yin no/ /rnal 'byor pa yi phyag rgya 'dis/ /'jig rten gsum du rgyu bar byed/ /
520a1(rgyud): rmongs pa gang gis 'ching 'gyur ba/ /mkhas pas de yi rol bas grol/ /tshogs gnas gang ba'i sems can rnams/ /gzhan dang gzhan
520a2(rgyud): du gsal skye zhing / /gzugs ni sangs rgyas rnam snang mdzad/ /tshor ba rdo rje nyi ma yin/ /'du shes pad+ma gar dbang phyug /de bzhin 'du byed rdo rje rgyal/ /rnam shes
520a3(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa' ste/ /dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin la/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gror rab tu grags/ /de dag 'byung chen gcig pu ste/ /thams cad bde ba stsol ba'o/ /
520a4(rgyud): rdul dang rdul med du brjod pa/ /sgyu ma chen mo'i rang bzhin nyid/ /sa ni ltung bar byed ma ste/ /chu khams gsod par byed ma'o/ /me yi khams ni 'gugs byed
520a5(rgyud): ma| |gar dbang phyug ma de bzhin rlung / /nam mkha'i khams kyi rang bzhin ni/ /sgyu ma chen mo'i rang bzhin no/ /'byung ba lnga yi rang bzhin gyis/ /gtso bo rdo rje de
520a6(rgyud): bzhugs so/ /'byung ba kun dang mnyam sbyor bas/ /mkha' 'gro ma mchog 'bar ma'o/ /mig la gti mug rdo rjer bshad/ /thos byed zhe sdang rdo rjer bshad/ /ser
520a7(rgyud): sna rdo rje de bzhin sna/ /kha la 'dod chags rdo rjer brjod/ /reg la phrag dog rdo rje ste/ /skye mched thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog/
520b1(rgyud): mig gis mthong sogs stong bas na/ /'di kun stong pa'i rang bzhin gyis/ /rnam par rtog med mthong ba yis/ /de ni thogs pa med par 'gyur/ /'di dag nam mkha'i
520b2(rgyud): rang bzhin te/ /thams cad nam mkha'i rang bzhin sems/ /sgom pa thogs med dang ldan na/ /rnam par mi thog rab tu skye/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje
520b3(rgyud): sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pas de skad ces bka' stsal to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thogs pa med pa don yod pa'i bde ba chen po'i dam tshig
520b4(rgyud): ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rim par bya ba gsungs pa/ /ji srid 'khor ba'i gnas na mkhyen pa mchog dang ldan pa bzhugs par gyur pa de srid du sems can gyi
520b5(rgyud): don thams cad nus pa mtshungs pa med par mi ldog ste/ 'di nyid kyis na sems can dam pa de srid pa'i zhags pa ni/ rtag tu mi 'jigs pa dang / brtson 'grus kyis
520b6(rgyud): sems can gyi don mi 'dor bar rtag tu myur bar byed pa dang / smon lam dag pa'i phyir na nam mkha'i gnas gzhi ji tsam du gyur pa dang / /srid pa dag phyir sems
520b7(rgyud): can gyi don sems kyis 'dod pa'i nus pa can te/ /de dag ni/ /lha'i bu rnams rtag tu chags pa'i dga' ba can rnams dang / gzhan yang 'dod chags can rnams
521a1(rgyud): kyi don du chags pa rnam par dag pa'i phyir na bskal par yang mi zad pa'i bde ba chen po rnam par dag pa sbyin par bya ba'i phyir te/ gdod ma nas gnas gzhi med pa bskal pa la sogs pa thams cad du bstan pa mngon du gdod ma nas byung ba/
521a2(rgyud): bskal pa thog ma nas bde ba chen po rdo rje
521a3(rgyud): sems dpa'ang der lhag pa'i lha gcig pur yod de/ sems can thams cad skyed par byed pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams cad kyi rtse mo ste/ glu dang dbyangs
521a4(rgyud): sogs rol mo dang / /dngos po kun bdag de yi phyir/ /nga ni kun tu bde bar bzhugs/ /sems dpa' thams cad bskyed pa yin/ /'dod la chags pa rnam
521a5(rgyud): bral ba| |der byung ba yi sems dpa' rnams/ /gdul bya de rnams mkhyen pa ste/ /yi ge las byung rnam par spangs/ /ye shes 'di de mchod par bya/ /de
521a6(rgyud): yongs mchod na mchod par bya/ /de yongs mchod dang srid pa zad/ /'o na ye shes las srid byung / /rang bzhin dngos po bem po min/ /de ltar na nga tshor ba ste//
521a7(rgyud): 'gro ba rnam shes tsam du brjod/ /rang rig pas na gang 'di dag /ye shes bdag nyid la las gzhan med/ /tshangs pa'i sgong brjod rang bzhin med/ /nam mkha'
521b1(rgyud): dang mnyam bdag med de/ /sems can mang yang 'ga' yis kyang / /sems can don gang yod min la/ /bla med sangs rgyas don yang med/ /bdag don dang ni
521b2(rgyud): gzhan don dang / /de las gzhan pa'i nus pa med/ /stong pa nyid la rtag gnas na/ /de las 'gro ba'i don du 'ong / /de med sems can don kun med/ /dmyal
521b3(rgyud): bar yang ni 'gro 'gyur te/ /de nas gzhan yang 'jig rten gyi/ /khams rnams kun na bzhugs pa yi/ /sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus nas ni/ /nga la myur du bskul
521b4(rgyud): bar byas/ /ma hA su kha badzra satwa dza hUM baM ho su ra ta s+t+waM/ nga la 'di yis bskul ma thag /kun la bde ba stsol ba'o/ /'dod pa dag pa don grub pa/ /'gro ba thams
521b5(rgyud): cad bde ba skyed/ /nga ni 'dod pa mchog gi gzugs/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis byin brlabs pa/ /nga yang chos kyi 'dod pa can/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag po ste//
521b6(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun gyi 'dod chags che/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi bde chen po/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi sku che ba/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung dbyangs yin/ /sangs rgyas kun
521b7(rgyud): gyi sems chen po/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rgyal po che/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gyi bdag /'jig rten dbang phyug kun gyi bdag /rin chen kun bdag dbang phyug ste//
522a1(rgyud): mkha' 'gro ma ni thams cad dang / /mnyam pa nyid du rab sbyor phyir/ /sangs rgyas kun kyang mnyam sbyor yin/ /sangs rgyas
522a2(rgyud): kun dang mnyam pa'i phyir/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gror rab tu brjod/ /de nas dkyil 'khor chen po'i sbyor ba dkyil 'khor thams cad bri bar bya ste/ de dbus
522a3(rgyud): ji lta'i tshul du ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rnam dgod de/ /zla ba'i mdog la 'dzum bag can/ /de bzhin 'od zer dmar po 'khrigs/ /sangs rgyas phreng bas
522a4(rgyud): rnam par mdzes/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan/ /zhal bzhi pa la phyag bzhi pa/ /spyan gsum ral ba'i thor tshugs can/ /rig ma bzhi dang mnyam
522a5(rgyud): par ldan/ /sangs rgyas gzugs kyis nye bar mdzes/ /g.yas zhal zhi ba dkar po yin/ /de bzhin g.yon pa dmar po mchog /nub kyi yang ni ser por
522a6(rgyud): mtshungs/ /thod pa la bzhugs gar dang ldan/ /lha rnams 'jigs par mdzad pa po/ /rdo rje dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin/ /dril bu thod pa de bzhin no/ /mkha'
522a7(rgyud): 'gro ma rnams dang mnyam ldan/ /rgya chen por ni bri bar bya/ /mkha' 'gro ma rnams dang mnyam mo/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog /bcom ldan
522b1(rgyud): 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pas de skad ces bka' stsal to/ /ma dang cha blangs ma nyid dang / /gnyen po de bzhin bzho byas la//
522b2(rgyud): gnyis gnyis sbyor bas 'dod spyad nas/ /dngos grub thams cad rab tu ster/ /ba lang sha dang rta sha sogs/ /thogs pa med par bza' bar bya/ /'jig rten la rtag
522b3(rgyud): g.yon la spyad/ /'bad de g.yon pas bsnyen bkur bya/ /brtan dang g.yo la sogs pa yi/ /'gro kun g.yon las byung bas na/ /pho nya mo la chags bral bas//
522b4(rgyud): grol ba nyid du 'gro ba min/ /rtag tu pho nya mor chags grol/ /'di la the tshom yod ma yin/ /sgrub pos de la 'bad byas na/ /brtul zhugs med na'ang brtul
522b5(rgyud): zhugs rdzogs/ /dam tshig gzhung lugs la spyod cing / /zas gcig tu ni mdzes par bza'/ /rigs gcig gi ni mtshan nyid phyir/ /rigs lnga la ni mnyam
522b6(rgyud): par spyod/ /sbrang rtsi mtshal dang ga bur bcas/ /tsan+dan dmar po dang sbyar te/ /rdo rje las byung mnyam ldan pa/ /'di dag bdud rtsi lnga yin te/ /dngos grub kun
522b7(rgyud): ni rab stsol mdzad/ /sbom po mtha' ltag kha sbyar bas/ /rtag tu rnal 'byor bzhin blangs te/ /zhi ba'i btung ba bzhin myangs na/ /dngos grub rtag par 'thob par
523a1(rgyud): 'gyur| |mchog gi dam tshig 'di rnams ni/ /zhal bzang mo khyod la bshad yin/ /thabs dang bcas pa'i las rnams kun/ /thogs
523a2(rgyud): chags med par rtag tu spyod/ /rnam par rtog med bsgoms pa yis/ /brtul zhugs rnams kyi mchog gi mchog /rnam par rtog med bsgoms pa yis//
523a3(rgyud): las rnams thams cad rtag tu bya/ /thogs pa med pas spyod pa ni/ /de bzhin bka' thub rnams kyi mchog /thogs pa med pa'i sems kyis ni/ /skra shad 'jings
523a4(rgyud): pa 'dra bar ni/ /yid la yul rnams rten byed pa/ /de ni 'da' dka'i dka' thub yin/ /gang zhig las rnams thams cad la/ /shes rab kyis ni nges par spyad//
523a5(rgyud): stong pa'i man ngag can de ni/ /bdag nyid chen po'i dka' thub 'di'o/ /shes rab gzugs brnyan lta bu la/ /rnam rtog med pa'i sems kyis ni/ /don la
523a6(rgyud): thogs pa med spyod ma/ /de yi bka' thub bdag nyid yin/ /shes rab thabs las gzhan pa min/ /gang gis sems ni gnas mi bya/ /de 'drar yang dag
523a7(rgyud): gnas byas na/ /byang chub chen po nye bar ster/ /rnam par mi rtog rjer gnas pa'i/ /rnal 'byor ba la mngon ldan na/ /de rnams kyi ni 'byung ba kun/ /shes
523b1(rgyud): rab pha rol phyin par nges/ /shes rab me long gzugs brnyan bzhin/ /'dus byas dngos po de 'dra bar/ /shes rab blo yis dran par bya/ /de yi rnam rtog
523b2(rgyud): med sems ni/ /me long nang gi gzugs brnyan dang / /rmi lam sgyu ma chu bur bzhin/ /mig 'phrul lta bur blta ba ni/ /de ni gtso bo yin par bshad/ /glog dang
523b3(rgyud): dri za'i grong khyer bzhin/ /'dus byas 'di dag rnam par smin/ /'di ltar dngos rnams rab gsal bar/ /gang de'i rnam grangs rtse mo mchog /des na sems ni gang
523b4(rgyud): zhig tu| |gnas pa yod par gzhag pa min/ /'di dag lta bur kun du byung ba'i dngos po rnams kyang sgyu ma khyad par can rnams yang dag par rdzogs par longs
523b5(rgyud): spyod pa bskyed de/ /bde bas yongs su bzhu bas khyad par can 'ga' zhig tu rdzogs par longs spyod pa skye'o/ /bzang po yongs su gyur pas ni/ /'bras bu khyad
523b6(rgyud): par can 'ga' 'thob bo/ /des ni/ /brtan pa dang g.yo ba'i dngos po rnams grib ma lta bu las gzhan 'ga' ci yang ma mthong ngo / /gang yang khyad par 'di
523b7(rgyud): d ag bsgom pa goms pa'i stobs las bde ba mchog tu zhi ba la sogs pa'i khyad par can gyi dgos pa bskyed na bla na med pa'i 'bras bu mngon du thob par byed
524a1(rgyud): pa'i rgyu'i dngos por 'gyur ba de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das skyon 'ga' yang ma mchis so/ /de'i phyir 'bad pa thams cad kyis/ /rab
524a2(rgyud): tu mchod par kun tu gnas/ /dka' thub sdug bsngal drag pos yis/ /rmongs pa bskams shing sdug bsngal te/ /sdug bsngal gyis ni sems g.yengs pa/ /g.yengs
524a3(rgyud): pa yis ni dngos grub med/ /bde ba kun tu brtan 'gyur ba/ /sems kyi rang bzhin brtan 'gyur gyi/ /sdug bsngal gyis ni sems g.yo zhing / /'gog par yang ni
524a4(rgyud): lhag par 'gro/ /lus dang ngag dang sems rnams ni/ /bde bar gnas na byang chub 'thob/ /gzhan du dus min 'chi ba dang / /dmyal bar nges par ltung bar 'gyur//
524a5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pas de skad ces bka' stsal to/ /mkha' 'gro ma thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba rdo rje
524a6(rgyud): mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i rgyud chen po las/ /mchog gi de kho na nyid snang bar byed pa dang / /yul la shes pa 'jug pa'i le'u ste dang
524a7(rgyud): pa'o|| / /de nas bcom ldan 'das la yang lha mos mchod pa byas nas phyag 'tshal te 'di skad ces gsol to/ /snying po gang gis gdug pa can rab
524b1(rgyud): tu 'dul ba ste/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bstan pa la smod pa'i gdug pa can thams cad 'dul ba dang / lha gdug pa can la sogs pa'i sems can
524b2(rgyud): thams cad gdul zhing zhi ba'i gnas la btul te/ byang chub kyi snying po'i bar du gdug par byed par mi 'gyur bar gnas pa bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung du gsol/
524b3(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi bdag pos 'di glur blangs te bka' stsal to/ /dang por rnam pa snang mdzad
524b4(rgyud): gzhag / de rjes ces tha ma ste/ /rgyu ba der lhung ba yis mthong / /snying po'i spyi bor gsum pas brgyan/ /la yi mtha' na gnas pa la/ /steng du yi ge sa dang ldan/ /gnyis
524b5(rgyud): pa yis ni gnyes bya ste/ /snying po de la a yig ldan/ /sa mtha' kun dngos de nyid do/ /rjod byed dang ni rjod byed de/ /rjod byed lnga pas gdan du byas/ /zla phyed thig les
524b6(rgyud): brgyan pa can/ /dbus gnas pa las zha bor ldan/ /sreg pa'i mtha' yis yongs su brgyan/ /sa yi de ma thag gnas pa/ /rlung gzugs su gnas 'og tu sbyar/ /de
524b7(rgyud): 'og huM huM thung du gnyis/ /yi ge phaT dang bcas rdzogs pa/ /aM dngos yi ger rdzogs par ldan/ /lnga pa'i dbus na gnas de la/ /gzhan pa'i i yis steng du brgyan//
525a1(rgyud): de nas rjod byed ra la zhon/ /spyi gtsug tu gnas dbang phyug dang / /rjod byed pa yi 'khor 'gyur ba/ /yang dang yang du gzhag par bya/ /
525a2(rgyud): rjod byed ra la skyon pa dang / /e yig rna ba dag la brgyan/ /de nas rjod byed ra nyid ni /yang ni lnga pa dag la bskyon/ /'di yang thams cad pa nyid de/ /rjod
525a3(rgyud): byed mgo bor zla phyed brgyan/ /lnga pa dang ldan nyis 'gyur bya/ /kun gyi mgon po de nyid mchog /phaT dang rin chen dag gis brgyan/ /ha ni mjug thogs nyid
525a4(rgyud): du'o| |rnam par snang mdzad kyi tshogs kun la yongs su mnyes par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pas dpa' bo drug dang
525a5(rgyud): mnyam par sbyor ba'i mkha' 'gro ma dra ba'i sdom pas de skad ces bka' stsal to/ /yang 'dir hUM yig las byung bar/ /sna tshogs pad+ma nyid dkyil 'khor//
525a6(rgyud): las kyi rdo rje dbus gnas par/ /de nyid hUM ni rnam bsgoms te/ /'od phreng du ma ldan pa yi/ /mkha' 'gro yi ni 'khor lo spro/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis spyan
525a7(rgyud): gsum ma/ /kha dog dmar mo 'jigs chen mo/ /'jigs pa'i dngos po'i nga ro can/ /spyan gsum dbu skra kham ser gyen/ /na so gzhon byed phun tshogs ma//
525b1(rgyud): stag gi pags pa'i smad dkris can/ /'jigs byed chen po ljags 'dril ma/ /'jigs pa yang ni 'jigs mdzad ma/ /mkha' 'gro ma kun dang mnyam sbyor/ /rdo rje
525b2(rgyud): mkha' 'gror rab grub pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pas de skad ces bka' stsal to/ /sngon gyi rim pa ji bzhin dang //
525b3(rgyud): me dang mnyam pa gnyis brjod dang / /ka ra ka ra bdun pa sbyar/ /ban+d+ha de bzhin dgra snying ste/ /'di yang lan gnyis rjod par byed/ /sa sde la ni ma dang bcas/ /'jig rten
525b4(rgyud): gzugs bral gyi mthar gnas/ /rang bzhin 'di yang gnyis su brjod/ /gzhan dang gzhan dang ldan par bya/ /b+ha dza dag dang nyer gnas pa/ /de ni lan gnyis dag tu
525b5(rgyud): brjod| |rjod byed la ni gsum pa dang / /khong na gnas pas ldan par bya/ /de nas zla ba gzhon nu phyed/ /yengs su gang bas brgyan par bya/ /de dag yang dang yang du
525b6(rgyud): brjod/ /nyin mor phyed pa'i rang bzhin dang / /yongs su ldan pa nyid du bya/ /rjod byed dang ni gshegs gsol gnas/ /lnga par ldan pa nyid 'gyur ro/ /phe yig drag cing
525b7(rgyud): myur ba la/ /zla ba gzhon nu dang ldan pa/ /yang gcig kyang ni brjod par bya/ /drag myur brjod pa phaDa gnyis so/ /rnam rtog kun gyi bud shing ni/ /bsreg pas da ha da ha
526a1(rgyud): ste| |de skad ces pa 'bod pa'i sngags/ /lnga pa'i nye tsher gnyis par sbyar/ /a nyi dang yang yang dag ldan/ /rjod byed gtso dang yang
526a2(rgyud): ldan pa| |yang dang yang du brjod par bya/ /b+hak+Sha b+hak+Sha zhes rjes su/ /ba sa ru d+hi ra dang ni/ /an+t+ra mA lA ba la smi ne/ /gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na dag dang ni/ /sap+ta bA tA la ka ta sbyar/ /b+hu
526a3(rgyud): dzang+ga dang sar+b+bam+bA/ /tardza ya ni gnyis brjod do/ /ka yig sde las ga nyid la/ /gnyis pa dang ni bzhi pa sbyar/ /rlung gi ngo bor gnas pa'o/ /i mtha' sa mtha' zhes
526a4(rgyud): brjod la/ /nyi ma bdun gyis gnas par brgyan/ /rjod byed la ni bzhi pas brgyan/ /yang dang yang du brjod par bya/ /ka sha o dang pa sde dang / /de 'og dang po dang
526a5(rgyud): ldan gzhag / ra dang har sprel gnyis dag la/ /thig le gnyis gnyis rab tu sbyar/ /a dang sde tshan sa bon brjod/ /sde tshan gyi ni bzhi pa dang / /dang po ru ni ldan
526a6(rgyud): par bya| |gsum pas kyang ni dang po sbyar/ /gsum pa la yang des mnyes bya/ /rjod byed kyang ni rjod byed ni/ /i yi stan du ldan par bya/ /sa sde la e ra yis
526a7(rgyud): brgyan| |zla dum dang ni thig ler ldan/ /de ni yang yang brjod par bya/ /de nyid e phyogs bzhi par ldan/ /de nas yang dang yang du bzlas/ /rjod byed dang ni bzhi
526b1(rgyud): ba sbyar| |mtha' ru la gcig i dang sbyar/ /de yang yang dang yang du bzlas/ /rjod byed yi ge ha yang sbyar/ /de steng zla dum thig les bskyon/ /lnga pa yang ni mnyes par
526b2(rgyud): bya| |de yang yang dang yang du bzlas/ /rnam mang mtha' yas rab bsgrub cing / /dge ba'i me tog mang spud pa/ /'di ni lha mo sgyu chen mo/ /dngos grub kun rab stsol ba'o//
526b3(rgyud): 'dir ni gsungs ma thag tu yang / /'jig rten khams ni thams cad g.yos/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun kyang skrag /slar yang de bzhin gshegs pa kun/ /mngon
526b4(rgyud): par byang chub rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /ri bo kun yang g.yo shing 'gas/ /gdug pa kun 'dul dul zhing zhi/ /dkyil 'khor du ni bkug nas bcug /dam tshig gis

527a1(rgyud): dbus su rdo rje bri/ kha dog dmar po 'od chen po/ /phyi rol ri mo zlum pos bskor/ /de yi dbus su bcom ldan 'das/ khro bo chen po

527b4(rgyud): gyis| |cung zad tsam zhig bzlas pa bya/ /las ni brgya tsam byed par 'gyur/ /'di lta ste/ brtan pa dang g.yo ba thams cad nges par mnon pa dang / ltung bar byed pa dang /

527b7(rgyud): shing 'jigs par byed pa dang / dud mo byed du 'jug pa dang / sdigs par byed pa dang / bdag nyid bcings nas 'tshor ba dang / brdung ba dang / long bar byed pa

528a3(rgyud): ga 'ching ba dang / ma ning du byed pa dang / 'dod pa la chags la snyoms par byed pa dang / rgod cing 'ching ba dang / gzhan gyis rang gsod du 'jug pa dang /

528a5(rgyud): bshang lam rang lug tu byed pa dang / khu ba khrag tu byed pa dang / nad rnams myur du sel bar byed pa dang / khrag las gyur pa'i mdze nad la sogs pa sud
528a6(rgyud): par byed pa dang / mya ngan dang sdug bsngal gyis bcings shing gzir bar byed pa dang / dum bu dum bur byed pa dang / lus can thams cad phye mar byed cing
528a7(rgyud): gsad pa dang / thams cad rjes su chags pas dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / g.yo ba dang / 'dar ba dang / dgod pa dang / sems can thams cad la
528b1(rgyud): rgyun du ca blar smra ba dang / sngon gyi gnas so sor thob pa ltar ston pa dang / dbang du byed pa'i las thams cad la rab tu sbyor ba dang / bran du byed pa dang / lha dang /
528b2(rgyud): klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / log 'dren dang / 'byung po dang / ma mo dang / mkha' 'gro ma thams cad 'dul bar byed pa dang / nor sbyin pa dang / sa dang /
528b3(rgyud): chu dang / me dang / rlung dang / nam mkha' thams cad la bka' bsgo bar byed pa dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dag las rnam par rgyal
528b4(rgyud): bar 'gyur ba dang / chags pa thams cad 'jig par byed pa dang / rims dang / yams dang / dug dang / mkha' 'gro ma thams cad las grol bar byed pa dang /
528b5(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad chags pa dang bral ba 'bigs par byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad 'khor ba la skyo ba 'jig par byed pa ste/
528b6(rgyud): de lta bur 'di dag ni/ lha mo thams cad grub par byed par brjod pa ste/ sngags kyi rgyal po 'di dag nyid ni/ ma byung 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das
528b7(rgyud): rdo rje 'dzin pa ste/ rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pas mkha' 'gro ma'i sgyu ma thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba'i rab tu 'grub pa de skad ces bka' stsal
529a1(rgyud): to| |'di dag ni/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i rgyud chen po las/ /las kyi tshogs thams cad kyi cho ga dang / sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i rnam par

529a4(rgyud): par 'phro byed pa/ /'byung po'i gdon rnams 'gugs par byed/ /hi ma ban+ta s+ye ut+ta re Na b+ha pa ts+tshi bo na ma/ ma hA ma so/ so ba i a d+ha ma si haM bi hi ma se hi ma se hi

529b1(rgyud): la i mi dz+nya a/ ba sa ba dza na mo hi a/ e sa bidz+dza tsa ha i na man+ta i in+d+ha na/ ha a bA i dza be na diN+Na Ni/ d+ha tam+b+ha hi mahA swa ba a na no bA d+ho si/ rAM dza ku la khaN+Da/ Da Ni
529b2(rgyud): Da| dze bA i ba d+ha/ ta d+hi Na ta Na/ na ma sid+ha na/ na ma bu pa ja dza pA da na/ ma sa wa rA Ne/ tad+ya da re ma hA da N+De da ha he du na he he swAhA/ 'dis bye ma la lan bdun du bsngags

536a7(rgyud): kyi dkyil 'khor bsgrub/ /de nas 'bum gcig bzlas byin na/ /mdun du mngon sum nyid du 'gyur/ /tshangs pa mo dang shis byed ma/ /gzhon nu ma dang phag
536b1(rgyud): mo dang / /dbang po ma dang rgan byed ma/ /tshogs kyi dbang phyug ma dang ni/ /byin za yi ni bdag can ma'o/ /rim pa gnyis pa dag la ni/ /tshangs dang gshin rje chu lha
536b2(rgyud): dang / /nor sbyin dang ni yi dwags dang / /byin za dang ni dbang ldan dang / /bden bral de bzhin rlung lha'o/ /rim pa gsum pa dag la ni/ /nyi ma dang ni zla ba dang / /mig
536b3(rgyud): dmar dang ni gza' lag dang / /phur bu dang ni pa ba sangs/ /spen pa sgra gcan 'dzin dag go /khyim pa bzhi la sgo bzhir ni/ /tshangs dang khyab 'jug de bzhin du/ /
536b4(rgyud): drag po dang ni karti ka /sa dang chu dang me dang rlung / /'byung ba chen po bzhi rnams so/ /rim pa dang po'i dbus nyid kyi/ /phyogs bzhi dang por mkha' 'gro ma/ /mar me ma
536b5(rgyud): dang mdzes pa mo/ /'jigs byed ma dang de bzhin du/ /dbus su khyab bdag nyid gnas so/ /yang dag mtha' las mthar 'gyur ba'i/ /rang bzhin gyis ni cho ga bzhin/ /

537a1(rgyud): can| |cung zad bzhad pa'i zhal dang ldan/ /kha dog sngon po gtsigs pa che/ /thod pa'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /ro gcig gar ldan nyi

537a4(rgyud): tu lha mo mdzes ma'o/ /byang du mar me ma dgod de/ /yi ge hUM las byung ba yi/ /phag mo zhal gcig phyag bzhi ma/ /mda' gzhu dang ni de bzhin du/ /rgyal
537a5(rgyud): mtshan dang ni thod pa nyid/ /kha dog sngon mo 'jigs chen mo/ /phag gi gdong bas 'jigs par mdzad/ /yi ge phaT las shis byed ma/ /kha dog dmar mo
537a6(rgyud): phyag bzhi ma/ /thod pa dang ni lcags kyu nyid/ /de bzhin kha T+wAM gcang te'u/ /yi ge ha las gzhon nu ma/ /kha dog ser mo phyag bzhi ma/ /rtse gsum dang ni
537a7(rgyud): 'phan lce gsum/ /de bzhin gzhu dang mda' nyid do/ /ho yig las ni rgan byad ma/ /kha dog nag mo phyag bzhi ma/ /kha T+wAM ga dang thod pa nyid/ /de bzhin
537b1(rgyud): ral gri cang te'u/ /baM yig las byung tshangs pa mo/ /kha dog dkar mo phyag bzhi ma/ /pad+ma dang ni thod pa nyid/ /de bzhin gzhan na gzhu dang mda'/ /g+ha yig las
537b2(rgyud): byung tshogs dbang mo/ /sngo bsangs mdog la phyag bzhi ma/ /rtse gsum de bzhin thod pa dang / /bgrang phreng dang ni la du'o/ /baM yig las ni khyab 'jug ma/ /kha dog
537b3(rgyud): sngon mo phyag bzhi ma/ /dbyug to dang ni thod pa 'dzin/ /de bzhin zhags pa ral gri bzhin/ /yi ge las byung dbang po ma/ /kha dog ser mo phyag bzhi ma/ /rdo rje
537b4(rgyud): gsal shing thod pa dang / /sdigs mdzub dang ni zhags pa'o/ /kun kyang dbu skra gyen du 'bar/ /sna tshogs rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan/ /spyan gsum dang ni ro la

537b7(rgyud): bri bya ste/ /du ba'i mdog la lag bzhi pa/ /rtse gsum nyid dang ka pA la/ /de bzhin zhags pa bgrang phreng 'dzin/ /nub tu karti ka bri ste/ /kha dog
538a1(rgyud): ser po lag bzhi pa/ /dpa' bo gsal shing dbyug pa dang / /de bzhin thod pa bgrang phreng 'dzin/ /dbang ldan khyu mchog la zhon
538a2(rgyud): pa| |kha dog dkar po lag bzhi pa/ /thod pa dang ni rtse gsum 'dzin/ /de bzhin gzhan ni thal mo sbyar/ /glang po zhon pa dbang po ste/ /kha dog ser po lag
538a3(rgyud): bzhi pa/ /rdo rje dang ni thod pa 'dzin/ /gzhan ni thal mo kha sbyar byed/ /ra skyes zhon pa me phyogs 'dzin/ /kha dog dmar po lag bzhi pa/ /me thab dang ni
538a4(rgyud): thod par ldan/ /skrag nas gzhan ni thal mo sbyar/ /gshin rje ma he la zhon pa/ /kha dog nag po lag bzhi pa/ /dbyug pa dang ni thod pa 'dzin/ /de

538a6(rgyud): thal mo sbyor/ /chu yi phyogs ni chu srin zhon/ /kha dog dkar po lag bzhi pa/ /zhags pa dang ni thod par ldan/ /gzhan dag thal mo kha sbyor byed/ /

538b1(rgyud): zhon| |kha dog ser po lag bzhi pa/ /rin po che dang thod par ldan/ /gzhan dag thal mo sbyar ba'o/ /gza' dang rgyu skar thams cad ni/ /so so'i dkyil

539b1(rgyud): sgrol ma dang / yum kun tu bzang mo dang / de rnams kyi b+ha ga la lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i tshul du bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe de'i dus na ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro ma
539b2(rgyud): dur khrod kyi bdag mo dang / khros ma nag mo dang / bde chen dkar mo dang / ser mo don grub ma dang / dmar mo sgra sgrog ma dang / sna tshogs mthar phyin ma dang / las kyi gtso mo la

543b1(rgyud): mchog / glang chen lta bu'i spyod pa bya/ /shugs dang ldan pa spyod pa'i mchog /rta mchog lta bu'i spyod pa bya/ /rnam rtog gsod pa spyod pa'i mchog /spyang ki lta bu'i spyod pa bya/ /drag
543b2(rgyud): shul lta byed spyod pa'i mchog / dred mo lta bu'i spyod pa bya/ /de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ste/ /gza' gtad med pa spyod pa'i mchog /ri dwags lta bu'i spyod pa bya/ /ngo tsha bral ba spyod pa'i
543b3(rgyud): mchog / ro langs lta bu'i spyod pa bya/ /ro dang 'grogs ba spyod pa'i mchog /rigs dan lta bu'i spyod pa bya/ /dur khrod gnas pa spyod pa'i mchog /ce spyang lta bu'i spyod pa bya/ /bag yod rngan
543b4(rgyud): pa spyod pa'i mchog / wa mo lta bu'i spyod pa bya/ /de las gzhan yang bshad par bya/ /zung du 'brel ba spyod pa'i mchog /ngur pa lta bu'i spyod pa bya/ /gzhan gyis mi mthong spyod pa'i mchog/
543b5(rgyud): khwa ta lta bu'i spyod pa bya/ /dug lnga spyod pa spyod pa'i mchog /rma bya lta bu'i spyod pa bya/ /dus tshod 'dzin pa spyod pa'i mchog /khu byug lta bu'i spyod pa bya/ /nyes pas ma gos spyod pa'i
543b6(rgyud): mchog / bya rgod lta bu'i spyod pa bya/ /de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ste/ /rim gyis 'dzeg pa spyod pa'i mchog /spre'u lta bu'i spyod pa bya/ /'jigs pa med pa spyod pa'i mchog /dom
543b7(rgyud): bu lta bu'i spyod pa bya/ /mtshan mo rgyu ba spyod pa'i mchog /zhag mig can gyi spyod pa bya/ /gang la mi gnas spyod pa'i mchog /bung ba lta bu'i spyod pa bya/ /snang ba lta ba spyod pa'i mchog
544a1(rgyud): 'bar ba lta bu'i spyod ba bya/ /de las gzhan yang bshad bya ste/ /dgos 'dod 'byung ba spyod pa'i mchog /nor bu lta bu'i spyod pa bya/ /sman dug gnyid
544a2(rgyud): med spyod pa'i mchog / ga pur lta bur shes par bya/ /cis kyang mi tshugs spyod pa'i mchog /rdo rje lta bur shes par bya/ /mi mthun gcod ba spyod pa'i mchog /ral gri lta bur shes par
544a3(rgyud): bya| |de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ste/ /thabs dang shes rab spyod pa'i mchog /mda' gzhu lta bur shes par bya/ /stong pa'i kha 'byed spyod pa'i mchog /shaka ti lta bur shes
544a4(rgyud): par bya/ /'bigs par byed pa spyod pa'i mchog /mdung thung lta bur shes par bya/ /nga bdag gsod pa spyod pa'i mchog /sta re lta bur shes par bya/ /gdul bya 'dren pa spyod pa'i
544a5(rgyud): mchog / lcags kyu lta bur shes par bya/ /dgon pa'i gnas dang dur khrod dang / /grong khyer dag tu rnal 'byor rgyu ba'i tshe/ /de 'dra'i skyes bu'i phyag rgya cher rtogs byed/ /de
544a6(rgyud): nyid sems kyi khyad par mthong gyur na/ /brtul zhugs med kyang sangs rgyas sa la 'gro/ /sems nyid gnyis kyi gnad dang ma bral na/ /brtul zhugs sbyad kyang sdug bsngal
544a7(rgyud): sna tshogs skye/ /bsam gyis mi khyab brtul zhugs rab ldan na/ /rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bor dbang bskur ltar/ /thogs pa med ba phyag rgya chen po de/ /skye ba 'di la sangs
544b1(rgyud): rgyas sa la reg / ces gsungs so/ /mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi thugs gnyis su med pa'i ye shes bsam gyi sa mi khyab pa phag mo mngon par 'byung ba'i rgyud las spyod pa'i rab tu dbye
544b2(rgyud): pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o/ / //de nas dur khrod bdag mo des/ /ston ba la ni 'di skad gsol/ /yang dag brda ni brda chen po// kun gyis mi rtog sbas ba'i don/ /bar
544b3(rgyud): chad sel ba brda yi chos/ /bsam gyis mi khyab bshad du gsol/ /de nas ston pas bka' stsal pa/ /snang ba thams cad las kyi brda/ /tshig ni ji snyed ngag gi brda/ /de la bsam
544b4(rgyud): gyis mi khyab gnas/ /don gyi brda ru shes par bya/ /de nas dur khrod bdag mos yang zhus pa/ gang zag 'jug pa'i rim pa dang / /dpa' po brtag pa'i rim pa dang / /phyag rgya mo yi
544b5(rgyud): brtag pa dang / /mchog dang thun mong dngos grub dang / /tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i dus dag dang / /rnal 'byor phag mo rdzogs byed dang / /brda yi bye brag ji snyed pa /'gro mgon khyod
544b6(rgyud): kyis bshad du gsol/ /mgon po dpa' bos bka' stsal pa/ /thams cad kun gyi brda chen po/ /sbas pa'i brda ni bshad bya ba/ /g.yas pa thabs kyi rang bzhin dang / /g.yon pa
544b7(rgyud): shes rab rang bzhin dang / /lus kyi brda rnams rdzogs par bya/ /mi rtog sgom pa ston pa la/ /lag pa g.yon pa bstan pa ni/ /sa ro zhes ni brjod par bya/ /rkang pa grong khyer sa bgrod
545a1(rgyud): pas| |spyod pa nyams myong gis 'gro ba/ /go ba'i phyir nas rkang bstan te/ /a g+hu la zhes brjod par bya/ /srin lag mkha' 'gro ma yi rtsa/ /de yi phyir na de
545a2(rgyud): bstan te/ /shes rab chen por go bya'i phyir/ /b+ha ta ri zhes brjod par bya/ /lce yis zas kyi ro myong ltar/ /stong pas bde ba myong bstan phyir/ /lce bstan tsaR+ya g+ha zhes brjod/ /skal
545a3(rgyud): bar ldan pa'i bdag nyid ni/ /yul la rig par bya ba'i phyir/ /lto ba zas kyi snod bstan pa/ /an b+ha li zhes brjod par bya/ /lto ba zas kyi snod yin phyir/ /de bzhin snod ni bsten
545a4(rgyud): par bya/ /bla ma'i brgyud pa go cha'i phyir/ /paM ka ta zhes brjod par bya/ /sor mo lnga'i ni rgyud gcig ltar/ /lnga yi rtsa ba e baM du/ /bsdus phyir sor mo lnga bstan la/ /tshan d+ho ha zhes
545a5(rgyud): brjod par bya/ /so yi stobs kyis zas 'dul ltar/ /e baM ji bzhin rtogs par byed/ /gang gis so ni bstan byas pas/ /tsa la ni zhes brjod par bya/ /byin pas lus kyi stobs
545a6(rgyud): bskyed ltar/ /goms pas 'bras bu skyed pa'i phyir/ /go phyin pa ni bstan byas la/ /me ga pa zhes brjod par bya/ /sa gzhi 'gro ba kun 'degs ltar/ /'bras bu dam tshig gis
545a7(rgyud): bsten ltar/ /sa gzhi gru bzhir bstan byas la/ /maN Dal zhes su brjod par bya/ /sor mo lnga ni rgyu mthun phyir/ /phung lnga rigs lngar rgyas btab pas/ /g.yas pa'i sor mo lnga
545b1(rgyud): bstan pa/ /s+pha ra na zhes brjod par bya/ /mi bskyod pa dang rdo rje 'chang / /rgyas gdab gnyis ni go bya'i phyir/ /dbugs ni la ni dbyung bar bya/ /dpa' kun sham zhes brjod par bya/ /so
545b2(rgyud): 'cha' ba yi zhe sdang gis/ /'bras pu'i rtags ni yin pa'i phyir/ /gnyis snang gcod phyir so 'cha' bas/ /ma ta khra zhes brjod par bya/ /sha ni srog chags thams cad las/ /'byung zhing
545b3(rgyud): chos rnams thams cad ni/ /sems yin phyir nas sha bstan pas/ /ra tsa na zhes brjod par bya/ /khro gnyer khros pa'i rtags yin pas/ /bya ba thams cad sdug bsngal gyi/ /rtags
545b4(rgyud): yin phyir na khro gnyer bstan/ /ni ri ha zhes brjod par bya/ /bsdums pas dbye ba med pa ltar/ /'khor 'das dbyer mi phyed pa ltar/ /b+ha ga ni zhes brjod par bya/ /dpe yis mtshon pa'i
545b5(rgyud): don du ni/ /dri ma kun las grol ba'i phyir/ /bsdams pa bkrol nas gre nan brjod/ /byin gyis brlabs pa'i gtor ma yin/ /thams cad tshim par byed pa ltar/ /sna tshogs snang
545b6(rgyud): ba'i chos kun la/ /bde ba chen po'i ros tshim phyir/ /gtor ma btang la hi ka ka brjod/ /lto ba zas kyi snod yin ltar/ /sems can sangs rgyas snod yin pas/ /don du lto ba
545b7(rgyud): bstan nas ni/ /ni gar ma zhes brjod par bya/ /de rnams phan yon dang yid pas/ /snying po rgyud du gsal bar bstan/ /brda dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ /bdud rtsi rnam pa
546a1(rgyud): lnga po la/ /longs spyod ba ni thabs kyi mchog /byin gyis brlabs dang sa bon dang / /rang bzhin bdud rtsi la 'bad pas/ /dpag med rim gyis
546a2(rgyud): phan yon 'byung / /de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ste/ /lnga bsdus rtse mo mnan pa ni/ /bum pa'i dbang ste lus kyi brda/ /mtheb srin e yi drang ro gcig/ /gsang ba'i dbang ste
546a3(rgyud): lus kyi brda/ /byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya ni/ /gsum pa shes rab ye shes yin/ /skyes dang ma skyes gnyis med pas/ /bzhi pa yin te lus kyi brda/ /de yi ngag gi brda smras
546a4(rgyud): smras pa/ /ka la sha ya bum pa'i dbang / /yar la wa gsang ba'i brda'o/ /e baM ma ya gsum pa'i brda'o/ /e hUM oM AHbzhi pa'o/ /mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi thugs gnyis
546a5(rgyud): su med pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa phag mo mngon par 'byung pa'i rgyud las brda'i le'u ste drug pa'o/ / //de nas dur khrod bdag mo des/ ston
546a6(rgyud): ba mtshan nyid bzhi dang ldan pa de la phyi'i mchog pa'i tshogs dpag tu med pa dang / nang gi mchod pa'i tshogs dpag tu med pa dang / gsang ba'i mchod pa'i tshogs dpag tu med
546a7(rgyud): pa dang / de kho na nyid kyi mchod pa phul nas 'di skad zhus so/ /bla med ston pa he ru ka /'khor ba'i sems can 'dren mdzad pa/ /thugs rje che dang ldan pa khyod/ /nad pa lta bu'i
546b1(rgyud): sems can la/ /chos kyi sman mchog bstan du gsol/ /long ba lta bu'i sems can la/ /chos kyi sgron me sbar du gsol/ /rgyal po lta bu'i ston pa khyod/ /kun la byams pa mdzad du
546b2(rgyud): gsol/ /blo na po lta bu'i ston pa khyod/ /kun la phan pa mdzad du gsol/ /zhes zhus so/ /de nas ston pa 'jigs byed he ru ka de thugs rab tu dgyes te/ sku'i sgo nas mdzes gar rnam
546b3(rgyud): pa gsum mdzad/ gsung gi sgo nas rdo rje'i tshig rnam pa gsum mdzad/ thugs kyi sgo nas khyad par gyi ye shes rnam pa gsum bskyed nas/ 'khor rnams la spyan gzigs nas tshangs
546b4(rgyud): pa'i gsung gis rdo rje'i tshig 'di bka' stsal to/ /nyon cig dur khrod bdag mo khyod/ /'khor ba'i sems can thams cad la/ /ma rig pa yi mun pas bsgribs/ /'khor ba'i rgya mtsho chen por ltung / /nyon
546b5(rgyud): mongs 'dam du bying ba yis/ /dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/ /chos kyi sgo mo brgyad khri dang / /bzhi stong gi ni grangs rnyed kun/ /nyon mongs pa yi gnyen por bstan/ /dbang po rab 'bring dang sbyar nas/ /thun mong
546b6(rgyud): theg pa rim gyis bstan/ /mdo sde 'dul ba mngon pa gsum/ /bstan pa kun gyi rtsa ba yin/ /bder gshegs thugs rje bsam mi khyab/ /sems can rnams la de ltar bstan/ /de nas dur khrod bdag
546b7(rgyud): mo des yang 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bla med ston pa he ru ka/ /thun mong theg pa de ltar bstan/ /khyad par gsang sngags ji ltar lags/ /rgyud sde rnams kyi dbye ba zhu/ /smin pa'i lam ni
547a1(rgyud): ji ltar lags/ /grol ba'i lam ni gang la bgyi/ /dpa' bo chen pos bshad du gsol/ /zhes zhus so/ /de nas ston pa he ru kas/ /nyon cig dur
547a2(rgyud): khrod bdag mo khyod/ /skal bar ldan pa'i gang zag la/ /gsang sngags rgyud sde ngas bshad kyis/ /snod skyon gsum po spangs la nyon/ /bya ba gtso bor byed pa la/ /kri ya'i rgyud
547a3(rgyud): sde rnam lnga bstan/ /spyod pa gtso bor byed pa la/ /gnyis pa'i rgyud sde rnam lnga bstan/ /sems nyid gtso bor byed pa la/ /rnal 'byor rgyud sde rnam lnga bstan/ /bde stong gtso bor

547a5(rgyud): grags/ /re re la yang lnga lnga ste/ /rgyud chen nyi shu rtsa lnga ni/ /ma byung 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas yang dur khrod bdag mo des yang zhus pa/ rgyud kyi
547a6(rgyud): dbye ba de ltar na/ /smin zhes bgyi ba ji ltar lags/ /lam zhes bgyi ba ngag la bgyi/ /de yi dbye ba bshad du gsol/ /zhes zhus so/ /de nas ston pas bka' stsal pa//
547a7(rgyud): nyon cig dur khrod bdag mo khyod/ /'khor ba'i sems can thams cad la/ /de nyid yod de smin lam med/ /des na 'bras bu thob mi 'gyur/ /lam log mu stegs byed rnams
547b1(rgyud): la| |de nyid yod de smin lam med/ /des na 'bras bu thob mi 'gyur/ /dman pa nyan thos rang rgyal la/ /de nyid yod de smin lam med/ /de phyir bskal pa grangs med du/ /dka' thub
547b2(rgyud): spyod pa nyon re mongs/ /ma smin mdo sder zhugs rnams la/ /de nyid yod de smin lam med/ /des na tshe gcig sangs rgyas dka'/ /zhes so/ /de nas dur khrod bdag mo des yang zhus pa/

547b6(rgyud): po sa gzhi yongs su gzung / /gnyis pa sta gon gnas pa ste/ /nub gsum pa la 'jug par bya/ /rgyud rnams gzhan du shes par bya/ /de nas dkyil 'khor shar gyi sgor/ ba yi
547b7(rgyud): rnam lnga'i maN+Dal bri/ /skal ldan slob ma der bzhag la/ /bum pa'i dbang rnams rdzogs par bskur/ /dkyil 'khor de yi lho'i sgo ru/ /bdud rtsi lnga yi maN+Dal bya/ /skal ldan slob
548a1(rgyud): ma der bzhag la/ /gsang ba'i dbang rnams rdzogs par bskur/ /dkyil 'khor de yi nub sgo ru/ /dal gyi chos 'byung e dbyibs bri/ /skal ldan
548a2(rgyud): slob ma der bzhag la/ /shes rab ye shes dbang bskur te/ /gsum pa'i dbang rnams rdzogs par bskur/ /dkyil 'khor de yi byang sgo ru/ /phrin las rnam bzhi'i maN+Dal
548a3(rgyud): bri| |skal ldan slob ma der bzhag la/ /bzhi pa'i dbang rnams rdzogs par bskur/ /dkyil 'khor de yi pho brang du/ /seng chen bsnol ba'i khri steng sa su/ skal ldan slob

548a7(rgyud): cu rtsa lnga bya/ /de nas bkra shis rdzas brgyad kyis/ /dbang rnams ma lus rdzogs par bskur/ /de nas dbang rdzogs gang zag de/ /bder gshegs rnams kyi sras yin te//
548b1(rgyud): mkhyen rab bde gshegs rnams dang mnyam/ /mthu stobs khro rgyal rnams dang mnyam/ /tshe tshad nyi zla gnyis dang mnyam/ /dang po las can sbyor ba yis/ /sa brgyad pa la rab tu
548b2(rgyud): gnas/ /dbang bskur gnang ba ma thob na/ /rig pa shes rab rtsal rdzogs kyang / /slob dpon bya ba yod mi nus/ /dbang bskur gnang ba ma mthong na/ /gzhan gyi yon tan kun 'chang

549a1(rgyud): bzhin rnam dag phag mo bstan/ /dbang po 'bring gi gang zag la/ /brjod pa sgra yi phag mo bstan/ /dbang po tha ma'i gang zag la/ /mtshon pa
