549a7(rgyud): gang zag dang / /zhes dang can gyi gang zag dang / /'dod pa gtsor byeng gang zag dang / /nga rgyal can gyi gang zag dang / /phrag dog can gyi gang zag lnga/ /de rnams
549b1(rgyud): gang zag gang gis grol/ /zhes zhus so/ /de nas ston pas bka' stsal te/ /gti mug can gyi gang zag la/ /sku yi phag mo dkar mo bstan/ /gti mug tshul gyis gti mug 'joms/
549b2(rgyud): 'dod pa gtsor byed skyes bu la/ /gsung gi phag mo dmar mo bstan/ /'dod chags tshul gyis 'dod chags 'joms/ /zhe sdangs can gyi gang zag la/ /thugs kyi phag mo nag mo
549b3(rgyud): bstan/ /zhe sdang tshul gyis zhe sdang 'joms/ /nga rgyal can gyi gang zag la/ /yon tan can gyi phag mo bstan/ /nga rgyal tshul gyis nga rgyal 'joms/ /phrag dog can gyi gang zag la/ /
549b4(rgyud): phrin las phag mo ljang khu bstan /phrag dog tshul gyis phrag dog 'joms/ /de nas dur khrod bdag mo des/ /he ru ka la tshig 'di gsol/ /dug lnga shas che gang zag la/ /'bras bu
549b5(rgyud): bu sku lnga ni ji ltar thob/ /ye shes lnga ni ji ltar snang / /rigs lnga zhes ni gang la bgyi/ /khro mo lnga ni ji ltar bsgom/ /'khor lo lnga ni ji ltar gnas/ /snying po lnga ni ji ltar bzlas/ /dam
549b6(rgyud): tshig lnga ni ji ltar bsrung / /nyams myong lnga ni ji ltar 'byung / /nyon mongs lnga ni ji ltar 'byung / /ye shes lnga ni ji ltar 'phel/ /grangs kyi tshad ni ji ltar bzlas/ /mtshan ma'i rtags
549b7(rgyud): ni ji ltar 'byung / /dus kyi tshad ni ji ltar lags/ /las tshogs rnams ni ji ltar 'grub/ /ces zhugs so/ /de nas dpa' bo he ru kas/ /thugs rab tu dgyes te brda'i tshig 'di/
550a1(rgyud): bka' stsal to/ /nyon cig dur khrod bdag mo khyod/ /dug lnga spyod pa'i gang zag lnga/ /'bras bu rnam pa lnga thob ste/ /kun la khyab pa chos sku dang / /
550a2(rgyud): theg chen spyod pa longs sku dang / /gang la gang 'dul sprul sku dang / /cis kyang mi shigs rdo rje'i sku/ /ngo bo nyid kyi sku mchog dang / /skye ba gcig gis thob par 'gyur/ thob
550a3(rgyud): pa'i don la goms par byed/ /tshe 'di nyid la sangs rgyas 'thob/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis rgyud du bshad/ /thob bya'i ye shes rnam lnga yang / /spros bral chos dbyings ye shes
550a4(rgyud): dang / /me long ye shes gzugs brnyan ltar/ /bdag gzhan gnyis med mnyam pa nyid/ /gsal la ma 'dres so sor rtog /phrin las mthar phyin bya ba rtogs/ /ye shes lnga ni
550a5(rgyud): ni de ltar skye/ /gzhan nas ma yin rang nyid la'o/ /dug lnga spyod pa'i gang zag lnga/ /rigs ni rnam pa lnga thob ste/ /spros med de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs/ /dgos 'dod
550a6(rgyud): 'byung ba rin chen rigs/ /skyon gyis ma gos pad+ma'i rigs/ /sems can don grub las kyi rigs/ /gzhan nas ma yin rang nyid la/ /dug lnga spyod pa'i gang zag de/ /
550a7(rgyud): ye shes khro mo lnga bsgoms nas/ /bde ba skye ba sku yin pas/ /bde chen dkar mo bsgom par bya/ /nus pa 'byung ba gsung yin pas/ /dmar mo sgra sgrogs bsgom par bya/ /
550b1(rgyud): rtogs tshad 'char ba thugs yin pas/ /khros ma nag mo bsgom par bya/ /brtan par byed pa yon tan te/ /ser mo don grub bsgom par bya/ /bar chad sel ba phrin las te/ /sna tshogs mthar
550b2(rgyud): phyin bsgom par bya/ /rim gyis ma yin cig car yin/ /rgya dang 'bur gyi tshul du bya/ /yig 'bru rnams kyi gnas lugs ni/ /spyi gtsug bde chen 'khor lo na/ /bde byed sku yi yi ge bzhi//
550b3(rgyud): rang bzhin rtsa yi gzugs can no/ /mgrin pa longs spyod 'khor lo na/ /gsung mchog yi ge rnam bzhi ni/ /rang bzhin rtsa yi tshul du gnas/ /snying ga chos kyi 'khor lo na/ /thags mchog
550b4(rgyud): yi ge rnam bzhi ni/ /rtsa yi dbyibs dang mthun par gnas/ /lte ba sprul pa'i 'khor lo na/ /rten byed yon tan yi ge bzhi/ /de yi rang bzhin rtsa yi dbyibs/ /phrin las yi ge rnam
550b5(rgyud): bzhi ni/ /zhi rgyas dbang drag yi ge bzhi/ /las dang rjes mthun gzugs su gnas/ /snying po lnga yi bzlas thebs ni/ /phyi dang nang dang gsang ba dang / /phrin las bzhi yi tshul du
550b6(rgyud): bzlas/ /dam tshig lnga yi bsrung tshul ni/ /bde chen dkar mo'i dam tshig tu/ /sems can kun la byams pa bsgoms/ /khros ma nag mo'i dam tshig tu/ /drag cing rtsub pa'i spyod pa
550b7(rgyud): bya| |ser mo don grub dam tshig tu/ /dngos po kun la chags med bya/ /dmar po sgra sgrogs dam tshig tu/ /smra zhing bud med bsten par bya/ /sna tshogs mthar phyin dam tshig tu/
551a1(rgyud): rgyud cing mchod pa'i spyod pa bya/ /mkha' 'gro spyi yi dam tshig tu/ /bdud rtsi lnga dang sha lnga la/ /rtag tu longs spyod bya ba ni/ bza' ba'i dam tshig
551a2(rgyud): rnam lnga ste/ /gsang sngags spyod pas bsten par bya/ /de nas nyams dang byin brlabs ni/ /go rims skye tshul 'di lta ste/ /dmigs pa med pa'i snying rje skye/ /sangs rgyas mkha'
551a3(rgyud): 'gro'i nyams myong yin/ /chos rnams gzugs brnyan ltar mthong ba/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i nyams myong yin/ /thams cad mnyam pa nyid skye ba/ /rin chen mkha' 'gro'i nyams myong
551a4(rgyud): yin| |chos rnams ma 'dres so sor gsal/ /pad+ma mkha' 'gro'i nyams myong yin/ /dngos po gang la'ang thogs med pa/ /las kyi mkha' 'gro'i nyams myong yin/ /nyon mongs
551a5(rgyud): lnga yi 'gyur lugs ni/ /gti mug chos kyi dbyings su 'gyur/ /zhe sdang me long ye shes 'gyur/ /nga rgyal mnyam pa nyid kyir 'gyur/ /'dod chags so sor rtog par 'gyur/ /phrag
551a6(rgyud): dog bya ba nan tan 'gyur/ /de nas 'gyur ba lam du byed/ /de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ste/ /sku yi yi ge rnam bzhi yis/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes 'phel/ /gsung gi yi ge
551a7(rgyud): rnam bzhi yis/ /so sor rtog pa'i ye shes 'phel/ /thugs kyi yi ge rnam bzhi yis/ /me long lta bu'i ye shes 'phel/ /yon tan yi ge rnam bzhi yis/ /mnyam pa nyid kyi ye
551b1(rgyud): shes 'phel/ /phrin las yi ge rnam bzhi yis/ /bya ba grub pa'i ye shes 'phel/ /A li dang ni kA li yis/ /sgra don dag gis rtogs par 'gyur/ /zhes so/ /de nas gsang ba bshad bya
551b2(rgyud): ste| |grangs kyi tshad ni 'di lta ste/ /'bum phrag gcig gis bgegs rnams skrod/ /'bum phrag gnyis kyis grong khyer skrod/ /'bum phrag gsum gyis rgyal po 'joms/ /'bum
551b3(rgyud): phrag bzhi yis bud med 'gugs/ /'bum phrag lnga yis phyogs rnams bsreg /'bum phrag drug gis 'byung ba bzlog /'bum phrag bdun gyis gnas khang g.yo/ /'bum phrag
551b4(rgyud): brgyad kyis mngon shes 'char/ /'bum phrag dgu yis zas nor 'du/ /'bum phrag bcu yis gang 'dod 'grub/ /de nas gsang ba bshad bya ste/ /mtshan ltas rab 'bring tha ma
551b5(rgyud): gsum/ /skal dang ldan pa'i gang zag la/ /ye shes khro mo rnam pa lnga/ /mngon sum dag tu mthong bar 'gyur/ /dbang po rab kyi snang ba ste/ /las 'phro can gyi snang ba yin/ /skal
551b6(rgyud): pa 'bring gi gang zag la/ /ye shes khro mo rnam pa lnga/ /rang gi las dang gang mthun par/ /rmi lam dag tu mchog tu gsel/ /skal ba 'bring gi mtshan ltas yin/ /skal pa dman pa'i
551b7(rgyud): gang zag la/ /tshul bzhin bris pa'i thang sku ste/ /'od dang sgra dang 'dzum pa dang / /mkha' 'gro lung bstan 'byung ba dang / /skye ba 'di la nges par 'grub/ sbyor ba dman pa'i
552a1(rgyud): gang zag la/ /bar ma do nas lam sna 'dren/ /mkha' spyod gnas su 'khrid par byed/ /dus kyi tshad ni rnam gsum ste/ /rab la skad cig rnam drug yin/ /
552a2(rgyud): 'bring la zla ba drug gis grol/ /tha ma lo drug sbyar ba'o/ /phyi dang nang dang gsang ba gsum/ /rnam pa gsum du shes par bya/ /las tshogs rang bzhin dbye ba zhi/ /rgyas dang bsdus pa
552a3(rgyud): shin tu rgyas/ /rnam pa gsum du shes par bya/ /bsdus pa tshar gcad rjes gzung gnyis/ /rgyas pa phrin las rnam pa bzhi/ /shin tu rgyas pa thun mong brgyad/ /de las 'phros pa nyi shu
552a4(rgyud): lnga| |bde chen dkar mo'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /zhi ba'i las tshogs rnam lnga 'grub/ /ser mo don grub ting 'dzin gyis/ /rgyas pa'i las tshogs rnam lnga 'grub/ /dmar po sgra sgrogs
552a5(rgyud): ting 'dzin gyis/ /dbang gi las tshogs rnam lnga 'grub/ /khros ma nag mo'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /drag po'i las tshogs rnam lnga 'grub/ /sna tshogs mthar phyin ting 'dzin gyis/ /
552a6(rgyud): phrin las bzhi yi las rnams 'grub/ /mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi thugs gnyis su med pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phag mo mngon par 'byung ba'i rgyud las 'bras
552a7(rgyud): bu'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o/ / //de nas dur khrod bdag mo des/ /ston pa mtshan nyid bzhi ldan la/ /phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pa 'di phul nas 'di skad
552b1(rgyud): zhus te/ skal bar ldan pa'i gang zag gis/ /bdag dang gzhan la phan gdags phyir/ /sku dang mchod rten ji ltar bgyi/ /de yi go rims bshad du gsol/ /zhes zhus pa'o/ /de nas ston pas
552b2(rgyud): bka' stsal te/ /nyon cig dur khrod bdag mo khyod/ /rigs can lnga yi gang zag des/ /bdag don gzhan don byed 'dod pas/ /sku lnga gdung lnga mchod rten lnga/ /rgyu lnga sngags lnga las rim
552b3(rgyud): lnga| |lnga tshan lnga ru shes par bya/ /de yi bya ba'i rim pa ni/ /de nyid gsum dang ldan par bya/ /dang po bdag gi de nyid dang / /gnyis pa rgyu yi de nyid dang / /gsum pa 'bras bu'i de nyid do/ /dang po
552b4(rgyud): po bdag gi de nyid ni/ /de bzhin rigs kyi gang zag de/ /dad dang brtson 'grus rab ldan pas/ /sku dang mchod rten 'debs dus su/ /'du shes gsum dang ldan par bya/ /gnyis pa rgyu yi de
552b5(rgyud): nyid ni/ /rnam pa lnga ru shes par bya/ /sa gzhi dkar zhing snum pa la/ /rin chen sna lnga la sogs pa'i/ /lnga tshan lnga ni legs sbyar te/ /lus ngag yid gsum sbyor ba yis/ /sku dang mchod
552b6(rgyud): rten ci rigs gdab/ /'og min gnas nas sbyan drangs la/ /rab tu gnas pa gzhung bzhin bya/ /de nas mnga' gsol na bza' gsol/ /de la mchod dang bstod pa bya/ /bzhugs
552b7(rgyud): su gsol ba'i rim pa ni/ /dam chos gzhan dang mthun par bya/ /zhi ba'i las rnams 'grub par 'gyur/ /dang po bdag gi de nyid ni/ /rin chen rigs kyi gang zag des/ /dad dang
553a1(rgyud): brtson 'grus rab ldan pas/ /sku 'am mchod rten 'debs dus su/ /'du shes gsum dang ldan par bya/ /gnyis pa rgyu yi de nyid ni/ rnam pa lnga ru shes
553a2(rgyud): par bya/ /sa gzhi ser la 'tsher ba la/ /gong du bstan pa ji lta bar/ /sku dang mchod rten ci rigs gdab/ /'og min gnas nas spyan drangs nas/ /rab tu gnas pa gzhung bzhin bya/ de
553a3(rgyud): la mnga' gsol na bza' gsol/ /mchod dang bstod pa bzhugs pa rnams/ /dam chos gzhan dang mthun par bya/ /rgyas pa'i las rnams 'grub par 'gyur/ /dang po bdag gi de
553a4(rgyud): nyid ni/ /pad+ma rigs kyi gang zag de/ /dad dang brtson 'grus rab ldan pas/ /sku dang mchod rten byed dus su/ /'du shes gsum dang ldan par bya/ /gnyis pa rgyu yi de nyid ni/ rnam
553a5(rgyud): pa lnga ru shes par bya/ /sa gzhi dmar la gdang ba la/ /lnga tshan lnga dang legs sbyar te/ /lus ngag yid gsum sbyor ba yis/ /sku dang mchod rten ci rigs gdab/ /'og min gnas
553a6(rgyud): nas spyan drangs la/ /rab tu gnas pa gzhung bzhin bya/ /de la mnga' gsol na bza' gsol/ /mchod dang bstod dang bzhugs pa kun/ /dam chos gzhan dang mthun par bya/ /
553a7(rgyud): dbang gi las rnams 'grub par 'gyur/ /dang po bdag gi de nyid ni/ /rdo rje rigs kyi gang zag de/ /dad dang brtson 'grus rab ldan pas/ /sku dang mchod rten 'debs dus su/ /
553b1(rgyud): shes gsum dang ldan par bya/ /gnyis pa rgyu yi de nyid ni/ /rnam pa lnga ru shes par bya/ /sa gzhi gnag cing rtsub pa la/ /khrag dang dug dang tsher ma dang / /yungs kar yungs nag skye che dang / /lnga
553b2(rgyud): tshan lnga dang bcas pa la/ /lus ngag yid gsum sbyor ba yis/ /sku dang mchod rten ci rigs gdab/ /'og min gnas nas spyan drangs la/ /rab tu gnas pa gzhung bzhin bya/ /de la mnga'
553b3(rgyud): gsol na bza' gsol/ /mchod dang bstod pa bzhugs pa kun/ /dam chos gzhan dang mthun par bya/ /drag po'i las rnams 'grub par byed/ /dang po bdag gi de nyid ni/ /las kyi rigs
553b4(rgyud): kyi gang zag de/ /dad dang brtson 'grus rab ldan pas/ /sku dang mchod rten 'debs dus su/ /'du shes gsum dang ldan par bya/ /gnyis pa rgyu yi de nyid ni/ /rnam pa lnga ru shes par bya/ /
553b5(rgyud): sa gzhi ljang zhing kha dog ser/ /gong du lnga tshan lnga dang sbyar/ /de la sku dang mchod rten rnams/ /ji ltar nus pa bzhin du gdab/ /'og min gnas nas spyan drangs la/ /rab tu gnas pa gzhung
553b6(rgyud): bzhin bya/ /de la mnga' gsol na bza' gsol/ /mchod dang bstod pa bzhugs pa rnams/ /dam chos gzhan dang mthun par bya/ /drag po'i las rnams 'grub par 'gyur/ /bstod pa lnga
553b7(rgyud): ni so sor bstod/ /mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi thugs gnyis su med pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa phag mo mngon par 'byung ba'i rgyud las sku dang mchod rten gdab pa'i le'u ste dgu
554a1(rgyud): pa'o/ / //de nas dur khrod bdag mo des ston pa mtshan nyid bzhi ldan la phyi nang gsad pa'i mchod pa gsum phul nas 'di skad zhus so/ /
554a2(rgyud): kye kye mgon po bdag la gson/ /khams gsum 'khor ba'i sems can rnams/ /nyon mongs brgyad khri bzhi stong dang / /rnam rtog brgyad khri bzhi stong gis/ dus gsum kun tu sdug
554a3(rgyud): bsngal bskyed/ /de yi gnyen po bshad du gsol/ /khams gsum 'khor ba'i sems can rnams/ /rgyu ni ma rig pa yis bskyed/ /rkyen ni rnam par rtog pa ste/ /de rnams rnam rtog ji ltar
554a4(rgyud): bsal/ /phyogs ngan la sogs 'gro ba'i tshe/ /de yi rtog pa gcad par zhu/ /legs nyes kun gyi stangs gcod pa'i/ /mna' dang gal gyis 'jigs pa la/ /de yi rtog pa gcad par
554a5(rgyud): zhu| |nyon mongs nad kyis nyen pa la/ /de las thar ba'i thabs cig zhu/ /bdag gzhan gnyis po rtsod dus su/ /de las rgyal ba'i thabs cig zhu/ /lus sems gnyis po 'bral dus
554a6(rgyud): der| |de las thar ba'i thabs cig zhu/ /de nas ston pas tshig 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rgyu 'bras kun tu sdug bsngal ba/ /ma lus dbyer med shes gyur na/ /sdug bsngal ma
554a7(rgyud): lus bde bar 'gyur/ /gzhan yang thun mong 'di lta ste/ /phyogs ngan la sogs 'gro ba'i tshe/ /phyogs las rnam par rgyal bar bya/ /nyes legs kun gyi stangs gcod pa/ /mna'
554b1(rgyud): 'am gal gyis 'jigs pa la/ /mna' las rnam par rgyal bar bya/ /nad dang gdon gyis nyen pa la/ /bgegs las rnam par rgyal bar bya/ /bdag gzhan gnyis po rtsod pa la/ /dgra las rnam
554b2(rgyud): par rgyal bar bya/ /lus sems gnyis po 'bral dus der/ /rlung las rnam par rgyal bar bya/ /mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi thugs gnyis su med pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa phag mo
554b3(rgyud): mngon par 'byung ba'i rgyud las rnam par rgyal ba rnam pa lnga'i le'u ste bcu pa'o/ / //de nas mgon po he ru kas 'khor rnams la de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / gsang
554b4(rgyud): sngags kyi sdud pa mo rab tu dga' ste/ 'khor rnams 'dus pa'i tshogs kyis kyang de ltar dga' mgu yi rangs te/ phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pa phul nas/ mgon po thugs rje dang ldan
554b5(rgyud): pas| |bdag dang 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams dang / /'khor ba'i sems can thams cad la/ /thugs rjes gnang ba bka' drin lags/ /zhes dga' mgu yi rang te/ bcom ldan 'das
554b6(rgyud): kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ / //mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi thugs gnyis su med pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa phag mo mngon par 'byung ba
554b7(rgyud): rtsa ba'i rgyud bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed he ru kas gsungs pa rdzogs so/ / //dur khrod bdag mos gsol pa/ lha mo rnams kyi sku mdog ni/ /ji ltar shes ni grol
555a1(rgyud): grol bar 'gyur/ /phag mo zhes bya/ /phag mo zhes bya gang la bya/ /yi ge'i don ni gang la bskyal/ /bskyed rdzogs ngo bo gang la bya/ /dpa' bo he ru kas bka' stsal pa/ nyon
555a2(rgyud): cig dur khrod phag mo khyod/ /nyes pa'i skyon gyis ma gos ba/ /dkar zhing sbros bral zhi bar byed/ /ma chags skyon gyis ma gos pa/ /dmar la gdang ba sgra sgrogs yum/ skyon med
555a3(rgyud): sems nyid rang dbang 'dus/ /gnyen po gcig kyang mi 'gyur bas/ /khros ma nam mkha'i kha dog bzhin/ /mi 'gyur rang sems dbyings su grol/ /che ba ye shes la rgyas pa/ /ser mo
555a4(rgyud): skyon med don grub ma/ /ngo bo rgyal la g.yo dang bral/ /sna tshogs skyon gyis ma gos pas/ /in+d+ra nI la'i mthar phyin ma/ /sna tshogs ngo bo gcig tu 'dus/ /rnam pa gang yang 'gyur ba
555a5(rgyud): med/ /chos kyi dbyings las 'gyur ba med/ /rnam rtog cis kyang ma gos pas/ /phag ces bya ba rtog med yin/ /dbyings nyid rtog pa sbros bral bas/ /me zhas bya ba dbyings su thim/ /
555a6(rgyud): de la phye na rnam pa gsum/ /dam chos skye med phag mo ni/ /skye 'gag med pas chos sku yin/ /brjod pa sga yi phag mo ni/ /phag ni kA li thabs yin la/ /mo ni A li longs skur
555a7(rgyud): 'dod/ /mtshon pa dbyings kyi phag mo ni/ /stong nyid mtshon pa'i sku mdog la/ /rtog med snying rje phag gi gdong / /thabs dang shes rab phag mo la/ /bde stong skyon bral gcer bu
555b1(rgyud): ni| |rtog pa med pas sbrul sku'o/ /yig 'bru gsal la mi rtog pas/ /thim pa na yang cang te'u/ /snang stong mtha' dang bral ba'o/ /bskyed rdzogs ngo bo dbyer med pas/ /mtshon pa snang ba stong pa'i ngang / /de nyid
555b2(rgyud): snang ba'i ngo bo nyid/ /dbyer med zung 'jug khas len bral/ /gcig la gcig rgyas gdab par bya/ /grol 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /ces gsungs so/ /mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi thugs gnyis su med pa'i
555b3(rgyud): ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa phag mo mngon par 'byung ba'i rgyud las rgyud phyi ma bskyed rim bstan pa'i le'u ste dang pa'o/ / //de nas dur khrod bdag mo des dpa' bo chen po la 'dzum pa dang bcas nas
555b4(rgyud): zhus pa/ gsang sngags rnams kyi sngags ni gang / /bzlas par bya ba'i yi ge gang / /'khor lo rnam bzhi dgod pa gang / /zhes zhus pas/ he ru kas bka' stsal pa/ dur khrod bdag mos gus par gyis/ /gsang
555b5(rgyud): sngags rnams kyi yi ge ni/ /thams cad byed pa yi ge oM/ /dgyes pa sku yi yi ge ni/ /badzra bA ra hi zhes 'byung / /nus pa 'byung ba gsung gi kro tA kA li/ /rtogs pa thugs ni ha ri sa/ /yon tan 'byung ba A be Sha ya/ /phrin
555b6(rgyud): las mdzad pa e baM ma yA/ /de las gzhan yang 'di lta ste/ /'khor lo lnga yi dbus nyid du/ /yi ge bzhi pas rgyas btab nas/ /bzlas pa phyi nang gsang ba gsum/ /zhi ba phyi yi bzlas pa ni/ /yig 'a bru rnams ni kha
555b7(rgyud): dog dkar/ /de las 'od zer dkar po 'phros/ /nyon mongs shes bya'i sgrib pa kun/ /ba sbu'i sgo nas bstan pa yi/ /sems can kun la phog pas kyang / /sgrib pa thams cad dag par bsam/ /de bzhin
556a1(rgyud): gshegs la phog pas kyang / /mnyes pa'i mchod pa phul bas so/ /bdag la slar thim zhi ba 'grub/ /rgyas pa ser po 'phro 'du yis/ gong bzhin spro bsdu
556a2(rgyud): shes par bya/ /dmar po dbang gi 'phro 'du bya/ /drag po nag po'i 'phro 'du bya/ /sna tshogs 'phros pas phrin las bzhi'i/ /dngos grub thams cad 'grub pa yin/ /nang dang gsang ba'i
556a3(rgyud): bzlas pa yang / /gong bzhin sbro bsdu shes par bya/ /dur khrod phag mos yang gsol pa/ /zad cing 'phel bar byed pa gang / /mthar thug pa yi yi ge gang / /zhes zhus so/ /dpa' bo chen
556a4(rgyud): pos yang gsungs pa/ /gti mug zad byed a yin te/ /has ni zhe sdang zad par byed/ /da rgyal zad byed ri yin te/ /ni yis 'dod chags zad par byed/ /phrag dog zad byed sa yin no/ /a
556a5(rgyud): ni chos dbyings ye shes 'phel/ /ha ni me long ye shes 'phel/ /ri yis mnyam nyid ye shes 'phel/ /ni yis so sor rtog byed 'phel/ /sa yis bya grub ye shes 'phel/ /a ni sangs
556a6(rgyud): rgyas mkha' 'gror snang / /ha ni rdo rje mkha' 'gror snang / /ri ni rin chen mkha' 'gror snang / /ni yis pad+ma mkha' 'gror snang / /sa yis las kyi mkha' 'gror snang / /as ni de bzhin rigs
556a7(rgyud): thob ste/ /has ni rdo rje'i rigs chen thob/ /ri ni rin chen rigs thob ste/ /ni yis pad+ma'i rigs thob bo/ /sa ni las kyi rigs chen thob/ /chos sku'i mthar thug a yin te/ /longs sku'i rnam pa yi ge
556b1(rgyud): ha| |sbrul pa sku ni ri yin no/ /ngo bo nyid sku'i yi ge ni/ /rdo rje'i sku ni yi ge sa/ /zhes gsungs so/ /dur khrod bdag mos yang zhus pa/ /dbang po rab 'bring rim pa yis/ /ji ltar shes na grol bar 'gyur/ /
556b2(rgyud): dpa' bo chen pos yang gsungs pa/ /dbang po rab 'bring gsum yin te/ /dbang po rab kyi gang zag la/ /skad cig drug gi gdams ngag bstan/ /ye shes skad cig dang po yis/ /gzung ba'i rnam par rtog
556b3(rgyud): pa gcad/ /skad cig gnyis pa'i ye shes kyis/ /'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa gcad/ /skad cig gsum pa'i ye shes kyis/ /gzung 'dzin gnyis kyi rtog pa gcad/ /skad cig bzhi pa'i ye shes
556b4(rgyud): kyis| |nyams la zhe na pa'i rnam rtog gcad/ /skad cig lnga pa'i ye shes kyis/ /nyams myong bde pa'i rnam rtog gcad/ /skad cig drug pa'i ye shes kyis/ /yid la byed pa'i rnam tog bcad/ /grol
556b5(rgyud): 'gyur rab la the tshom med/ /dbang po 'bring po'i gang zag la/ /rlung drug man ngag bstan pa ni/ /lhan cig skyes pa'i rlung goms pas/ /rang bzhin sgrib pa sel bar byed/ /thad kar 'byung ba'i
556b6(rgyud): rlung goms pas/ /mtshan mo lta bu'i sgrib pa sel/ /rang las skyes pa'i rlung goms pas/ /chod pa'i sgrib pa sel bar byed/ /spong byed rlung la goms pa yis/ /sngon du rgyu ba'i sgrib pa sel/ /
556b7(rgyud): sbyong byed rlung la goms pa yis/ /shes bya'i sgrib pa sel bar byed/ /rdzogs byed rlung la goms pa yis/ /sa rnams rim gyis gnon par byed/ /ye shes rnams ni du sa gcig 'char/ /shes bya
557a1(rgyud): thams cad dus gcig chod/ /rlung drug ma yin ye shes yin/ /mun ba rnams ni bsgribs pa yis/ /ye shes rim gyis skye ba dang /sgrib pa rim gyis sel
557a2(rgyud): bar byed/ /grol 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /dbang po tha ma'i gang zag la/ /yul ni dag pa'i sangs rgyas zhing / /lus dag pa ni dkyil 'khor yin/ /rang sems dag pa phag mo'i sku/ /
557a3(rgyud): ngag dag pa ni sngags su gsungs/ /lta bsgom dag pa dngos grub yin/ /dpe don gnyis su med pa gang / /skal med dngos grub mi 'byung bas/ /lo drug bsgoms na the tshom med/ /
557a4(rgyud): ces gsungs so/ /mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi thugs gnyis su med pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa phag mo mngon par 'byung pa'i rgyud las rgyud phyi ma dzogs rim bstan
557a5(rgyud): pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa rdzogs so/ / //paN+Di ta ga ya d+ha ra'i zhal snga nas lo ts+tsha ba gyi jo zla ba 'od zer gyis bsgyur ba'o// //
557b1(rgyud): empty page
